Title: (At) Any Time Of Day
Lyrics:
(At) Any Time of Day, Morning Noon or Night
I Always Sing Sai Ram
Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama X 3
Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama 
His Love Brings Us joy, Eternal Happiness Within, His Name is Bliss, Ananda
Ananda Ananda Ananda Ananda X 3
Ananda Ananda Ananda

2nd Speed (sing the following lines)
Ananda Sai Rama Ananda Sai Rama X 3
Ananda Sai Rama Ananda
Songglossary: anand, ram, sai

Title: (Sai) Oinaru Kami yo
Lyrics:
(Sai) Oinaru Kami yo
 Puttaparthi ni Owasu
 Sai Baba Warera no Kami yo
 (Sai) Oinaru Kami yo
 Shin ni Kiyosa to Bi ni
 Renge no Hitomi Kagayaku
 Kokoro no Yami wo Harai
 Sono Ai de Hikari wo Tomosu

Title: A hollow flute I am in Thy hands
Lyrics:
A hollow flute I am in Thy hands
 Your breath is my sound
 Your movement is my flow
 A hollow flute I am in Thy hands
 No ego, no envy, no pride
 The warmth of Your hands is my peace
 I delight in knowing my place is in Thy hands
 A hollow flute I am in Thy hands

Title: A Temple In My Heart
Lyrics:
A Temple In My Heart, A Prayer In My Soul, 
    A Song On My Lips, And I Sing To You
[Chorus:] Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, 
    Baba Sai Baba, I Sing To You
Sathya Sai Baba, Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, I Call To You

A Light In My Heart, A Yearning In My Soul,
    A Name On My Lips, And I Call To You
[Chorus:] Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba ... 

Joy In My Heart, Peace In My Soul,
    A Smile On My Lips And I Sing To You
[Chorus:] Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba ...
Songglossary: baba, sai, sathya

Title: Aa Gye Baba Ji
Lyrics:
Aa Gye Baba Ji Tvadde Nam De Bhikhari
Nam De Bhikhari Tvadde Nam De Bhikhari
Aa Gye Baba Ji Tvadde Nam De Bhikhari
Sabto Unchan Tera Nam Mere Vahe Guru Tera Nam
Sabto Unchan Tera Nam Mere Saiyaa Tera Nam
Main Mangta Dar Tere Aiyaa Chhod Ke Duniya Sari
Fast:
Sat Naam Vahe Guru Sat Naam Vahe Guru
Vahe Guru Bhai Vahe Guru Vahe Guru Bhai Vahe Guru

Title: Aanandha is the ocean
Lyrics:
Aanandha is the ocean, Aanandha is the ocean
 Aanandha, You are one with me
 Once a tiny stream but now a mighty sea
 O Bliss, I am one with Thee
 Shanthi is the ocean..O Peace, I am one with Thee
 Prema is the ocean..O Love, I am one with Thee
 Sathya is the ocean..O Truth, I am one with Thee
 Sai Baba is the ocean..O Baba, I am one with Thee

Title: Aao Aao Aao Aao
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Aao Aao
Aao Sundara Nanda Gopal
Navaneetha Chora Manasa Vihara
Darshana Do Nandalala (2)
Mujhey Darshana Do Nandalala
Meaning: Welcome the charming Gopala, the son of Nanda who lovingly stole butter and who revels in the hearts of devotees. O Nandalala, grace us with your Darshan.
Songglossary: aao, chora, darsh, do, gopal, manasa, mujhe, nanda, navaneetha, sundara, vihar

Title: Aao Aao Antaryami
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Antaryami
Adi Narayana Sai Narayana [ Aao Aao ... ]
Hrudaya Vihari Hey Giridhari
Hey Giridhari Hey Giridhari
Hari Hari Sri Hari Sai Murari
Meaning: Welcome Lord Sai Narayana, the indweller of our hearts! Chant the name the one who lifted the Govardhan hill, You are the one who assumed the form of Hari and Murari to remove the demonic characteristics in our minds.
Songglossary: aao, adi, antar, giridhar, hari, hey, hrudaya, murare, narayana, sai, sri, vihar

Title: Aao Aao Ganapathi Deva
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Ganapathi Deva
Aao Aao Sai Guru Deva [ Aao Aao ... ]
Eshwari Nandana Gajamukha Deva
Eshwaramba Nandana Sathya Sai Deva
Vamana Roopa Varana Deva
Vanchita Dayaka Sai Guru Deva (2)
Meaning: Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced son of Mother Goddess is Lord Sai the son of Eshwaramba. The short statured Lord, our guru, fulfills our desires.
Songglossary: aao, dayaka, deva, eshwar, gajamukha, gananayaka, guru, nanda, roopa, sai, sathya, vamana, vanchita, varada

Title: Aao Aao Hey Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Hey Bhagawan
Sab Jeevan Ke Karo Kalyan [ Aao Aao ... ]
Tum Ho Parama Krupa Ke Sagar
Tum Ho Guna Mandir Nata Naagara
Tum Ho Sathya Sanathana Swami
Ghata Ghata Vasi Antaryami
Meaning: Welcome O Lord! Bless and grant auspiciousness and peace. You are the Ocean of Compassion, the Temple of Virtues. You are the Truth and Eternal Bliss, omnipresent in every being.
Songglossary: aao, antar, bhagawan, ghata, guna, hey, ho, jeeva, kalyan, karo, ke, krupa, mandir, naagar, nata, param, sab, sagar, sanatana, sathya, swami, tum, vasi

Title: Aao Aao Nandalala
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Nandalala
Sundara Shyama Gopala [ Aao Aao ... ]
Tum Hi Ho Bansidhari Shyama
Ayodhya Pathi Sita Rama
Parthi Baba Karuna Sindhu (Nidhan)
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Bala
Meaning: Welcome Oh Nandalala (Krishna). You are beautiful and the holder of the divine flute. You are Lord Rama of Ayodhya, the Lord of Sita. You are Lord Sai of Parthi the compassionate one. You are also the darling son of Mother Yashoda, the one who stole butter.
Songglossary: aao, ayodhya, baba, bala, bansi, chora, gopal, hai, ho, karuna, maakhan, nanda, nidhan, pathi, puttaparthi, ram, sham, sindhu, sita, sundara, tum, yashoda

Title: Aao Aao Nandalala
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Nandalala
Sundara Shyama Gopala [ Aao Aao ... ]
Tum Hi Ho Bansidhari Shyama
Ayodhya Pathi Sita Rama
Parthi Baba Karuna Sindhu (Nidhan)
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Bala
Meaning: Welcome Oh Nandalala (Krishna). You are beautiful and the holder of the divine flute. You are Lord Rama of Ayodhya, the Lord of Sita. You are Lord Sai of Parthi the compassionate one. You are also the darling son of Mother Yashoda, the one who stole butter.

Title: Aao Aao Sai
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Sai
Hrdaya Mandir Me Aao Sai [ Aao Aao ... ]
Darshan Dey Prabhu Paapa Vinashaka
Sharanagatha Ke Bhava Bhaya Mochaka
Prema Swaroopa Aao
Sathya Swaroopa Aao Sai
Meaning: Sai, please come into the temple of our hearts and give us your darshan. Destroy our sins and liberate us from this worldly existence. You are the personification of love and truth.
Songglossary: aao, bhava, bhaya, darsh, dey, hrudaya, ke, mandir, paapa, prabhu, prem, sai, sathya, sharan, swaroopa, vimochana, vinasha

Title: Aao Aao Sai Natha
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Sai Natha
Aao Aao Hey Jagannatha [ Aao Aao ... ]
Darshan Ke Liye Taras Rahey Hai
Nayan Hamarey O Sai
Darsha Dikhao Daya Ke Sagar
Aao Shankara Hey Parameshwara
Aao Aao Sai Natha
Aao Aao Hey Jagannatha (2)
Meaning: Welcome! Oh Sai, Lord of the Universe, Our eyes are eager to see Your Divine form. Kindly grant us your Divine Darshan O Ocean of Compassion! Welcome Oh Lord Krishna.
Songglossary: aao, darsh, daya, dikhao, hai, hamarey, hey, jagan, ke, liye, natha, nayan, param, rahey, sagar, sai, shankara, taras

Title: Aao Aao Sai Pyaarey
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Sai Pyaarey
Keertan Karoon Main Sai Tumharey [ Aao Aao ... ]
Tum Ho Merey Nayanon Ke Taarey
Darshan Do Jeevan Ke Saharey
Meaning: Welcome, Oh Beloved Lord Sai! I sing Your glory! Oh Supreme Lord you are the twinkling star of my eyes. Oh companion of my life, kindly grant us your Divine Darshan.
Songglossary: aao, darsh, do, ho, jeeva, karoon, ke, keertan, mera, nayan, pyaara, saharey, sai, taarey, tum, tumhara

Title: Aao Aao Shyam Kishora
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Shyam Kishora
Aao Aao Nanda Kumara
Rhum Jhum Nachata Payal Bajavata
Aao Navanita Chora
Aao Aao Parti Vihara [ Aao Aao Shyam ... ]
Man Mandir Me Sankeertan Me
Sankeertan Me Sai Bhajan Me
Aao Parti Vihara
Aao Aao Hrdaya Vihara
Meaning: Please come, Krishna, son of Nanda. Let us hear the sound of the anklets adorning your dancing feet. O Lord of Parthi, please come into the temple of our hearts through our songs.
Songglossary: aao, bajao, bhaja, chora, hrudaya, kishora, kumara, mana, mandir, nach, nanda, navaneetha, payal, puttaparthi, rhuma-jhuma, sai, sankeertana, sham, vihar

Title: Aao Aao Shyama Gopal
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Shyama Gopal
Madhura Manohara Sai Gopal Aao [ Aao Aao ... ]
Dharma Uddharana Bhaktha Parayana
Aao Narayana Krishna Gopal (Aao)
Meaning: Welcome Oh Shyam Gopala, the one who has a charming and a captivating form. You are the upholder of righteousness and very dear to the devotees who treads the right path. We welcome you as Narayana, Krishna and Gopala.
Songglossary: aao, bhaktha, dharma, gopal, krishna, madhu, manohar, narayana, parayana, sai, sham, uddhara

Title: Aao Aao Swami
Lyrics:
Aao Aao Swami
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Swami [ Aao Aao ]
Darshana Dey Prabhu Paapa Vinashaka
Sharanagatha Ke Bhava Bhaya Mochana
Sathya Swaroopa Aao
Prema Swaroopa Aao Swami
Meaning: Welcome Lord. Please come and install yourself in our hearts. Your Divine Darshan dispels all sins. Give me refuge and save me from the cycle of birth and death. Please come, Oh embodiment of Divine Love and Truth.
Songglossary: aao, bhava, bhaya, darsh, dey, hrudaya, ke, mandir, mochana, paapa, prabhu, prem, sathya, sharan, swami, swaroopa, vinasha

Title: Aao Gopala Giridhari
Lyrics:
Aao Gopala Giridhari
Aao Aao Antaryami
Aao Aao Ananda Sai [ Aao Gopala ... ]
Aao Aao Hrudaya Nivasi
Aao Aao (Pra) Shanthi Nivasi
Meaning: Welcome Lord Sai Giridhari Gopala! The indweller of our hearts. Welcome, Oh Blissful Lord of Prasanthi.
Songglossary: aao, anand, antar, giridhar, gopal, hrudaya, nivasi, sai, shanthi

Title: Aao Gopala Shyama Gopala
Lyrics:
Aao Gopala Shyama Gopala
Darsha Dikhao Mujhey Parthi Gopala [ Aao Gopala ]
Brindavan Ke Krishna Gopala
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Gopala
Aao Gopala Shyama ( Sai ) Gopala
Meaning: Come and grant us your divine Darshan Oh Gopala! The one with Blue complexion who dwells in Brindavan and Parthi.
Songglossary: aao, brinda, darsh, dikhao, gopal, ke, krishna, mujhe, puri, puttaparthi, sai, sham

Title: Aao Prabhu Aao Sai Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Aao Prabhu Aao Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Sai Bhagawan [ Aao Prabhu ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradatha
Nithya Nirmala Jeevana Daata
Jagadodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Aao ( Sai ) Narayana Bhakthon Ke Pran
Meaning: Welcome! O Lord Sathya Sai Bhagawan! You endow everyone with purity of life, truth, righteousness, bliss and love. O Lord Sai Narayana! You are the saviour of entire creation and the Lord dear to your Devotees.
Songglossary: aao, bhagawan, bhaktha, bhakthon, daata, dharma, jagadodhara, jeeva, ke, narayana, nirmala, nithya, parayana, prabhu, pradatha, pran, prem, sai, sathya, shanthi

Title: Aao Pyaarey Nayana Hamarey
Lyrics:
Aao Pyaarey Nayana Hamarey Sai Hamarey Aao
Tum Bin Koi Nahin Rakhwaley
Tum Bin Kaun Saharey (Baba)
Tum Bin Kaun Saharey Aao Sai Pyaarey
Sai Hamarey Aao (3)
Meaning: Welcome! Oh Beloved Lord Sai! You are our protector. Without You, there is no one to protect and support us.
Songglossary: aao, baba, bin, hamarey, kaun, koi, nahin, nayan, pyaara, rakhwaley, saharey, sai, tum

Title: Aao Sai Gopal
Lyrics:
Aao Sai Gopal
Aao Gopal Aao Gopal Aao Sai Gopal [ Aao Sai ... ]
Aao Hey Prabhu Parama Dayal
Aao Natavara Lal
Aao Sundara Aao Abhayankara Aao Shiva Shankara Sai
Meaning: Welcome! Oh Sai Gopal, the Lord who is most merciful. Welcome! Oh Sai, who is the form of Shiva Shankara, the beautiful one and the protector of the Universe.
Songglossary: aao, abhaya, dayal, gopal, hey, lal, natavara, param, prabhu, sai, shankara, shiva, sundara

Title: Aao Sai Hrdaya Mandir Me
Lyrics:
Aao Sai Hrdaya Mandir Me
Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai [ Aao Sai ... ]
Mata Pitha Guru Pran Sakha Sai
Sab Tiratha Merey Terey Charan Me
Meaning: Welcome, Lord Sai. Please kindle the flame of wisdom in the temple of my heart. You are my life breath, my father, mother, divine guide and kith and kin. Your divine feet are my pilgrimages.
Songglossary: aao, antar, chara, guru, hrudaya, jalao, jyoth, mandir, mata, mera, pitha, pran, sab, sai, sakha, tera, tiratha

Title: Aao Sai Narayana Darshan Deejo
Lyrics:
Aao Sai Narayana Darshan Deejo
Tum Ho Jagat Vidhata (2)
Tum Hi Ho Brahma Tum Hi Ho Vishnu
Tum Hi Ho Shankara Roopa (2)
Tum Hi Ho Rama Tum Hi Ho Krishna
Tum Ho Vishwa Vidhata (2)
Meaning: Welcome Sai Narayana grant us your Darshan. You are Brahma, Vishnu, Shankara, Rama, Krishna and you are the one who creates and organizes the universe.
Songglossary: aao, brahma, darsh, deejo, hai, ho, jagat, krishna, narayana, ram, roopa, sai, shankara, tum, vidhata, vishnu, vishwa

Title: Ab-woon d’ba-she-maya
Lyrics:
Ab-woon d'ba-she-maya
 Net-qa-dash she-mukh
 Tay-tay mal-ku-takh (x2)
 Ne-way tzev-ya-nach ay-kan-na
 d'ba-she-ma-ya af b'ar-ha
 Hav-lan lach-ma d'sun-qa-nan yao-ma-na
 Wash-boq-lan khau-beyn
 ay-kan-na daf kh-nan shwo-qan l'khay-ya-bayn
 Way-la tach-lan l'nes-yu-na, eh-la patzan
 min bi-sha
 Me-tul di-lakh-ee mal-ku-ta, wah-haila,
 wa-tesh-buch-ta
 L'ah-lam al-min, ah-meyn
Meaning:
Father in Heaven, May Your Name be holy,
 May Your Kingdom come,
 May Your Will be done as it is in Heaven, so also on the Earth.
 Give us the bread that we need from day to day.
 Forgive us our wrongs, just as we have forgiven those who have wronged us.
 Do not let us enter into temptation, but separate us from error.
 For Yours is the Kingdom, the Power, and the Glory
 From age to age, Amen.

Title: Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Lyrics:
Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Parthi Pureeshwari Paapa Vimochani
Hrudaya Viharini Sai Janani (2)
Meaning: Oh Mother, you are the one who bestows protection from fear, you are bliss personified having eyes resembling the lotus petal. Oh goddess, of Parthi you are the remover of sins and the one who revels in our hearts.
Songglossary: abhaya, anand, dayini, hrudaya, janani, lochana, paapa, purishwara, puttaparthi, raja, rajeeva, rajeshwari, sai, swaroopa, vihar, vimochana

Title: Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Lyrics:
Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Sai Mata Sathya Sai Mata
Himagiri Nandini Bhava Bhaya Bhanjani
Jaya Jagat Janani Devi Bhavani
Parthi Pureeshwari Sai Janani
Meaning: Mother Sai is the embodiment of truth, the one who bestows protection from fear and bliss personified. You are the daughter of Daksha (Ice Mountain) and destroyer of worldly miseries. Victory to this universal mother Bhavani, the goddess of Parthi.
Songglossary: abhaya, anand, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, dayini, devi, himagiri, jagat, janani, jay, mata, nandi, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, swaroopa

Title: Abhaya Pradayini Mata Mahalakshmi
Lyrics:
Abhaya Pradayini Mata Mahalakshmi
Alankara Roopini Mata Mahalakshmi [ Abhaya Pradayini ... ]
Mata Mahalakshmi Sai Mahalakshmi
Ananda Dayini Mata Mahalakshmi
Amrutha Varshini Mata Mahalakshmi [ Mata Mahalakshmi ... ]
Meaning: Mother Mahalakshmi (the Goddess of wealth) is the One who has decorated Herself grandly. She confers freedom from fear, Bliss and Grace in a torrent who is presently moving on Earth as Sai Mahalakshmi.
Songglossary: abhaya, alankara, amrutha, anand, dayini, mahalakshmi, mata, sai, swaroopa, varshini

Title: Abhayankara Sai Shiva
Lyrics:
Abhayankara Sai Shiva
Avinashi Naaga Bhushana (Abhayankara ...)
Hara Hara Shambho Haalaahala Dhara
Pinaka Vaibhava Sai Shiva
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai Shiva who destroys the fear of birth and death. He is eternal and indestructible, and swallowed the haalaa-hala poison to protect the world. He is adorned with the cobra and the Pinaka bow and is verily Sai Shiva.
Songglossary: abhaya, avinashi, bhushan, dhara, haalaahala, hara, naga, pinaka, sai, shambho, shiva, vaibhava

Title: Abhinandan He Sai Hamara
Lyrics:
Abhinandan He Sai Hamara
Shubh Janam Din Aaj Tumhara
Dhanya Dhanya He Sat Guru Deva
Sikha Rahey Jo Gyaan Dhyan Seva
Krupa Karo Ab Sab Bhakto Par
As Liye Khade Hai Darbar [ Abhinandan He.. ]
Ram Nam Dhan Dedo Baba
Sab Ko Shanthi Dedo Baba
Krupa Karo Ab Sab Bhakto Par
Meaning: We Celebrate this day, Your birthday, Lord Sai, our eternal teacher. Please shower Your blessings and wisdom, and teach us to meditate on You, and serve You. Bestow mercy and peace on us devotees, who are in Your holy presence.
Songglossary: aaj, ab, abhinandana, baba, bhakthon, darbar, deva, dhan, dhanya, dhyaan, din, do, gnana, guru, hai, hamara, janam, jo, karo, khada, krupa, liye, nam, par, rahey, ram, sab, sai, sat, seva, shanthi, shubh, sikha, tumhara

Title: Abre al mundo la flor
Lyrics:
Abre al mundo la flor de loto de mi corazon
 Que en el calmado lago de mi corazon mi cuerpo flote
 Tu cara reflajada en las aguas (Sai)
 Y tu pelo acariciando mi ser
 Shanti shanti shanti Senor
Meaning:
Open to the world the lotus flower of my heart, that in the calm lake of my
 heart, My body afloat, Your face reflected in the waters; Your hair caressing
 my being; Peace, peace Lord.

Title: Adi Mudalvane Ganapathiye
Lyrics:
Adi Mudalvane Ganapathiye
Anaittu Vinaigalaiyum Tirppavane
Ettu Disaigalilum Undan Namame
Olittidum Podellam Paramanandame
Vezha Mugattone Gnana Porulone
Naada Brahma Shiva Balagane
Sharanam Sharanam Vinayagane
Sharanam Sayi Vinayagane
Meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the primeval God, the destroyer of all ill-effects. Son of Lord Shiva, you are the symbol of knowledge. It brings us immense joy when your name resonates in all eight directions. We surrender to You, the embodiment of eternal Aum.
Songglossary: adi, anaittu, bala, brahma, disaigalilum, ettu, gananatha, gnana, mudal, mugane, naada, namam, olittidum, param, podu, porule, sai, sharan, shiva, tirkkum, undan, vezha, vinai, vinayaka

Title: Adi Nama Sathyanarayana
Lyrics:
Adi Nama Sathyanarayana
Bhajore Manasa Sadguru Charanam [ Adi Nama ... ]
Sai Natha Nagendra Shayana
Chandra Vadana Kamala Nayana
Meaning: O mind! Chant the primal name of Sathya Narayana, and take refuge at the feet of our true guru. Lord Sai is the embodiment of Lord Vishnu who reclines on the serpent (Adi Sesha) and who has an effulgent face like the moon and eyes beautiful as the lotus.
Songglossary: adi, bhajao, chand, chara, kamala, manasa, naam, nagendra, natha, nayan, sadguru, sai, sathya, shayana, vadana

Title: Adi Narayana Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Adi Narayana Sai Narayana
Jaya Hari Narayana Jaya Jaya
Pandari Vasa Hari Narayana
Parthi Nivasa Sai Narayana
Varada Narayana Veda Narayana [ Jaya Hari ]
Meaning: Victory to Lord Sai Narayana, the primordial one. You are the resident of Pandari and the Lord of Parthi. Victory to Lord Narayana who confers boons, who is the source for the origin of the Vedas.
Songglossary: adi, hari, jay, narayana, nivasa, pandari, puttaparthi, sai, varada, vasa, veda

Title: Adi Parashakthi Ma Ananda Roopini
Lyrics:
Adi Parashakthi Ma Ananda Roopini Ma
Parthi Nivasini Ma Jagadodharini Ma
Teri Mahima Jo Koi Gave
Janam Janam Ka Dukh Bisrave
Premamayi Sai Ma Sathya Swaroopini Ma [ Parthi Nivasini Ma ]
Meaning: Oh Mother! the resident of Parthi, you are the supreme power and bliss personified who sustains the universe. Those who sing your glory would be free from miseries accumulated from multiple lives. You are the embodiment of Love and supreme Truth.
Songglossary: adi, anand, bisrave, dukh, gao, jagadodhara, janam, jo, ka, koi, ma, mahima, nivasi, parashakthi, premamayi, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, swaroopa, tera

Title: Adi Poojita Gajanana
Lyrics:
Adi Poojita Gajanana
Mangala Kari Maha Ganadhipa [ Adi Poojita ... ]
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambho Kumara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Gajanana
Meaning: Oh Gajanana (elephant headed god), you are the first adored (worshipped), bestower of auspiciousness and the head of Ganaas (devotees of Shiva in Mt. Kailash) (group of demigods). You are the one who makes us cross this turbulent world, victory to you, oh son of Lord Parvathi and Shiva.
Songglossary: adi, amba, bhava, gajamukha, ganadhipa, hey, jay, kari, kumara, maha, mangal, poojita, shambho, shiva, tanaya

Title: Adi Poojya Deva Gajanana
Lyrics:
Adi Poojya Deva Gajanana
Gowrivara Tanaya Shubhanana [ Adi Poojya.. ]
Vighna Vinashaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Jaya Jagavandana Tava Charanam
Meaning: At the outset, worship Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Gowri who bestows good fortune. He destroys difficulties and grants success. The entire Universe worships His Feet.
Songglossary: adi, chara, deva, gajamukha, gowri, jagavandana, jay, poojya, shubh, siddhi, tanaya, tava, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Adi Shesha Anantha Shayana
Lyrics:
Adi Shesha Anantha Shayana
Srinivasa Sri Venkatesha
Raghukula Tilaka Raghu Ramachandra
Sita Pathey Sri Ramachandra [ Adi Shesha ]
Yadu Kula Tilaka Yashoda Bala
Radha Pathey Gopala Krishna
Pannaga Bhooshana Gowri Manohara
Uma Pathey Shiva Shambho Shankara
Meaning: Adore the Lord Srinivasa also known as Venkatesha, who reclines on the seven headed serpent. Sing the glory of Ramachandra, the supreme of Raghu dynasty who is worshipped by his consort Sita. Chant the name of Krishna, the son of mother Yashoda and the supreme of Yadu dynasty who fostered the cowherds and who is worshipped by His consort Radha. Worship Lord Shiva bestower of auspiciousness, one who wears a serpent as His ornament and who is adored by his consort Parvathi.
Songglossary: adi, ananta, bala, bhooshan, gopal, gowri, krishna, kula, manohar, pannaga, pathey, radha, raghu, ramachandra, shambho, shankara, shayana, shesha, shiva, sita, sri, srinivasa, tilaka, uma, venkatesha, yadu, yashoda

Title: Aganita Guna Abharana Vibhushani
Lyrics:
Aganita Guna Abharana Vibhushani
Adi Parashakthi Devi Namo
Sakala Charachara Srishti Samrakshini
Jagadeeshwari Jaganmata Namo
Meaning: Oh supreme goddess Shakthi (Parvathi), salutation to thee, who has immeasurable good qualities as your ornaments and who protects and sustains both animate and inanimate things of this creation. Oh goddess of the universe salutation to thee.
Songglossary: abharana, adi, aganita, chara, devi, guna, jagadeeshwari, jagan, namo, parashakthi, sakala, samraksha, srishti, vibhushani

Title: Agarva Sarva Mangala
Lyrics:
Agarva Sarva Mangala Om Namah Shivaya
Kishora Chandrashekara Om Namah Shivaya
Bhujanga Raja Shobhita Om Namah Shivaya
Mrudanga Tunga Mangala Om Namah Shivaya
Dharadharendra Vanditha Om Namah Shivaya
Prachanda Tandava Shiva Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya
Meaning: Shiva, salutation to thee. You are the embodiment of primordial sound Om who exhibits humility and bestows auspiciousness. You adorn the crescent moon and the mighty serpent, dancing to the rhythm of drums during creation. All Gods and eminent people worship you, Oh Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: agarva, bhuja, chand, dhara, kishora, mangal, mrudanga, namah, om, prachanda, raja, sarva, shiva, shobhita, tandava, tunga, vanditha

Title: Aho Madhura Aho Madhura Atmaka
Lyrics:
Aho Madhura Aho Madhura Atmaka Lingam
Sathya Sai Nabhi Kamala Udbhava Lingam
Shivarathri Mahotsava Atmaka Lingam
Shuddha Sphatika Jyothirmaya Mangala Lingam
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram Atmaka Lingam
Tat Pranamami Sada Sayeeshwara Lingam
Meaning: We bow to that immortal Linga (symbol of Lord Shiva) created from the Naval of Sayeeshwara during the festival of Shivarathri, which is the symbol of light and purity and the embodiment of truth, auspiciousness and beauty.
Songglossary: aho, atmaka, jyoth, kamala, linga, madhu, mahotsava, mangal, nabha, pranamami, sada, sai, sathya, sayee, shiva, shuddha, sphatika, sundara, tat, udbhava

Title: Ai no Kami yo
Lyrics:
Ai no Kami yo
 Mayoeru Mono ni
 Ai no Te wo Noberu Tomo
 Nozomi Ushinai Aegu Hito womo
 Jiai no Umi no youni
 Okina Ai de Tsutsumu
 Anata wa Saiai no Tomo
 Puttaparthi ni Owasu Kami
 Ai no Te wo Noberu Tomo
GeneralComments: The tune is similar to the bhajan "Hey Ram Bhagawan".

Title: Ajanu Bahum Aravinda Netram
Lyrics:
Ajanu Bahum Aravinda Netram
Atmabhi Ramam Manasa Smarami (2)
Bhooloka Vaikunta Parthi Nivasam
Prabhu Sai Ramam Manasa Smarami (3)
Meaning: Meditate on the form of Lord Rama, whose abode is the heart of devotees, whose arms extend upto his knees and whose eyes are like the blooming lotus. Meditate on Lord Sai Rama, the Dweller of Parthi, which is verily the Heaven on Earth.
Songglossary: ajanu, aravinda, atmabhi, bahum, bhooloka, manasa, netram, nivasa, prabhu, puttaparthi, ram, sai, smaran, vaikunta

Title: Akhanda Jyothi Jalao Sai
Lyrics:
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao Sai Man Mandir Mey
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao
Koti Surya Sama Teja Swaroopa
Sai Tum Ho Divya Swaroopa
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao (2)
Divya Jyothi Gnana Jyothi Prema Jyothi Jalao [ Akhanda Jyothi ]
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao (4)
Meaning: O Lord Sai! Illumine the temple of my mind so that the flame of knowledge may glow continuously. You, my Lord have the effulgence of ten million suns, kindle the infinite flame of divinity, wisdom and Divine Love in my mind.
Songglossary: akhanda, divya, gnana, ho, jalao, jyoth, koti, mana, mandir, prem, sai, sama, surya, swaroopa, teja, tum

Title: Akhila Jagat Ke Daata Sai
Lyrics:
Akhila Jagat Ke Daata Sai
Shirdi Nivasi Bhagawan
Darshan Do Bhagawan ( Sai )
Kalimala Bhanjana Parama Daya Ghana
Karuna Nidhey Shirdi Vasa (Parthi Vasa)
Deena Janavana Parthi Mahesha
Shirdi Nivasi Bhagawan [ Darshan Do ]
Meaning: Lord Sai, the dweller of Shirdi, grace us with your divine presence. Oh Sai, you are the supreme reserve of compassion and kindness. Annihilate our acquired impurities. Lord of Parthi, you are the refuge of the forlorn.
Songglossary: akhila, bhagawan, bhanjana, daata, darsh, daya, deen, do, ghana, jagat, janavana, kalimala, karuna, ke, mahesha, nidhey, nivasi, param, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi, vasa

Title: Akhila Loka Nayaki Devi
Lyrics:
Akhila Loka Nayaki Devi Tripura Sundari
Ananda Dayini Devi Jagadeeshwari
Adi Mahakaali Lakshmi Mahadevi Roopini [ Ananda Dayini ... ]
Meaning: Oh goddess, you are beauty personified, head of all the worlds and the universe. You are the bestower of bliss and adored as Kaali, Lakshmi and Parvathi.
Songglossary: adi, akhila, anand, dayini, devi, jagadeeshwari, kaali, lakshmi, loka, mahadev, nayaka, soundari, swaroopa, tripura

Title: Akhilanda Koti Brahmanda Sai
Lyrics:
Akhilanda Koti Brahmanda Sai
Anandadayi Sai Ram
Parameshwara Partheeshwara
Praneshwara Sayeeshwara
Karunakara Karunamaya
Prashanthi Sai Sundara
Meaning: Lord Sai created the entire cosmos. He grants bliss to all. He is the supreme Lord of Puttaparthi. He is the Lord of our breath. He is the embodiment of compassion. This beautiful Lord resides in Prasanthi Nilayam.

Title: Akhilanda Koti Nayaka Avatara Sai
Lyrics:
Akhilanda Koti Nayaka Avatara Sai
Avatara Sai Antaranga Sai [ Akhilanda Koti ... ]
Aganita Guna Sheela Ananda Sai
Adi Shesha Sai Veda Saara Sai
Avatara Sai Paramatma Sai
Atma Linga Sai Antaranga Sai
Meaning: O Sai, the supreme leader of all gods and worlds descended on earth who has become the indweller of hearts, reserve of immeasurable good qualities and bliss personified. You are the one who reclines on the Adi Sesha (7 headed serpent), you are the essence of Vedas and the divine incarnate.
Songglossary: adi, aganita, akhila, anand, antar, atma, avatar, guna, koti, linga, nayaka, param, saara, sai, sheela, shesha, veda

Title: Akhilandeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Lyrics:
Akhilandeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Daya Sagari Parama Krupa Kari
Samba Vinodini Shiva Sai Shankari (2)
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari
Meaning: Supremely Divine, the Goddess of the whole Universe, the ocean of compassion, is Sai Shankari. She is the delight of Shiva, and the divine mother who grants auspiciousness.
Songglossary: akhila, daya, gowri, kari, krupa, maheshwari, mangal, mata, param, raja, rajeshwari, sagar, sai, samba, shankari, shiva, vinodini

Title: Al mirarte a los ojos
Lyrics:
Al Mirarte A Los Ojos Sai Baba, Despertaste Todo Mi Amor
Amor, Amor, Amor, Sai, Que Estaba Dentro En Mi Ser
Al Mirarte A Los Ojos Sai Baba, Despertaste Todo Mi Amor
Amor, Amor, Amor, Amor, Sai, Es Lo Que Ahora Soy Por Ti
Meaning: When I looked into Your eyes, Sai Baba, all the love within me blossomed. That love is now what I am because of you. This is sung to the same tune as chitta chora Yashoda.
Songglossary: baba, ley, sai, todo

Title: Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Lyrics:
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Narayan Narayan
Narayan Narayan Narayan Sriman Narayan (2)
Meaning: O Narayana, the one who is free of all blemishes and remover of fear and ignorance in this world, we Chant Your holy name.
Songglossary: alakh, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, narayana, niranjan, sai, sriman

Title: Alakh Niranjan Sai Sundara
Lyrics:
Alakh Niranjan Sai Sundara
Madhava Giridhari Mohana [ Alakh Niranjan ... ]
Sripathi Sri Hari Dayamaya Hari
Sri Ranganath Hari Keshava
(2nd Speed Starts From Madhava Giridhari Mohana)
Meaning: Sai, you are beauty personified having captivating look, unstained from the world and attribute-less. Mother Lakshmi is your consort who resides in your heart and you lifted the Giridhari mountain on your finger tips. You are having a compassionate heart to remove the miseries of your devotees. You are the resident of Srirangam and the destroyer of demon Keshi.
Songglossary: alakh, dayamayi, giridhar, hari, kesha, madhava, mohan, niranjan, ranga, sai, sri, sripathi, sundara

Title: Alakha Niranjana Narayana
Lyrics:
Alakha Niranjana Narayana
Sab Dukha Bhanjana Narayana
Meera Ke Prabhu Narayana
Radha Vallabha Narayana (2)
Patitha Pavana Narayana [ Sab Dukha ... ]
Narayana Hari Narayana (3)
Meaning: Lord Narayana is pure and without attachments. Lord Sai Narayana who is Meera's Lord and Radha's favorite removes all sorrows, saves the pure and the destitute.
Songglossary: alakh, bhanjana, dukh, hari, ke, meera, narayana, niranjan, patitha, pavan, prabhu, radha, sab, vallabha

Title: All I ask of You
Lyrics:
All I ask of You is forever to remember Me--as loving You 
Ishk Allah Mahbud Lallah (2X)

Title: Allah Allah Karo Pukar
Lyrics:
Allah Allah Karo Pukar
Sathya Sai Ki Jai Jai Kaar [ Allah Allah ]
Yesu Pitha Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Mahavir Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Zohrashtra Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Sarva Dharma Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Meaning: Victory to Lord Allah, Yesu, Mahavir, Zohrashtra and Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of all religions.
Songglossary: allah, dharma, jai, kaar, karo, mahavir, pitha, pukar, sai, sarva, sathya, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Allah my inner light
Lyrics:
Allah Allah my inner light
 Allah Allah my inspiring Sight
 Allah O Akbar (3X)
 Allah Allah my inner Self
 Allah Allah my Goal in life
 Allah O Akbar (5X)

Title: Allah Allah Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Allah Allah Sai Baba
Yesu Masiha Sai Baba [ Allah Allah ... ]
Nanak Sri Buddha Sai Baba
Zohrashtra Mahavira Sai Baba
Meaning: Chant the divine name of Sai Baba who is also Allah, Yesu, Nanak, Zohrashtra and Mahavir.
Songglossary: allah, baba, buddha, mahavir, masiha, nanak, sai, sri, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Bhajo Maulah Bhajo
Lyrics:
Allah Bhajo Maulah Bhajo Hey Allah Sai Bhagawan
Ram Bhajo Hey Krishna Bhajo Hey Rama Krishna Bhagawan
Nanak Bhajo Gautam Bhajo Hey Buddha Sai Bhagawan
Yesu Bhajo Zohrashtra Bhajo Hey Mahavir Bhagawan
Sai Bhajo Shirdi Sai Bhajo Hey Shirdi Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Bhajo Sathya Sai Bhajo Hey Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: Chant the divine names of the Lord - Allah, Rama, Krishna, Nanak, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavir, Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, bhaja, buddha, gautam, hey, krishna, mahavir, maulah, nanak, ram, sai, sathya, shirdi, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Nam
Lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Nam
Bhajare Manuva Mohammad Nam [ Allah Eshwar ... ]
Allah Bolo Eshwar Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Nanak Bolo Yeshu Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Gautam Buddha Mahavir Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Bolo Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram

Version 2
Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Nam
Bhajare Manuva Mohammad Nam [ Allah Eshwar ... ]
Yeshu Masiha Tera Sahara
Guru Nanak Ji Ki Bolo Jai Kar
Gautam Buddha Mahavir Nam [ Allah Eshwar ... ]
Allah Bolo Eshwar Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Yeshu Bolo Nanak Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Gautam Buddha Mahavir Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Bolo Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Meaning: O! Mind! Chant the names of Allah, Eshwar, Nanak, Buddha, Jesus, Mahavir, and Sai. All are one and all are our saviors.
Songglossary: allah, bhaja, bolo, buddha, ek, eshwar, gautam, guru, hai, jai, ji, karo, mahavir, manuva, masiha, mohammad, nam, nanak, ram, sahara, sai, tera, yesu

Title: Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Nam
Lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Nam
Sab Mil Bolo Hari Ka Nam
Ram Rahim Yeshu Sai Nam
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Nam
Ek Omkar Bolo Jai Sathya Nam
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Nanak Nam
Meaning: Let us all sing the name of the Lord who is our guru, Sathya Sai who has many names: Allah, Hari, Buddha, Zoroaster, Yeshu(Jesus), Mahavir, and Nanak.
Songglossary: allah, bolo, buddha, ek, eshwar, guru, hai, hari, jai, ka, mahavir, milo, nam, nanak, om, rahim, ram, sab, sai, sathya, vahey, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Eshwar Terey Naam
Lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Terey Naam Karuna Sindhu Sai Ram
Mahavir Tum Buddha Zohrashtra
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Nanak Shyam
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan (2)
Meaning: Oh Sai, you are full of kindness and we adore you as Allah, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Yesu, Nanak and Shyam (Krishna).
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, buddha, eshwar, hai, karuna, mahavir, naam, nanak, pitha, prabhu, ram, sab, sai, sham, sindhu, tera, tum, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Eshwar Tu
Lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Tu
Yesu Buddha Prabhu Tu
Zohrashtra Mahavira Tu
Sai Rama Tu Sai Krishna Tu
Sarva Dharma Prabhu Tu
Sathya Sai Prabhu Tu
Treta Yug Mey Rama Prabhu Tu
Dwapara Yug Mey Krishna Prabhu Tu
Kali Yug Mey Sai Prabhu Tu [ Sarva Dhama ] | Sathya Sai |
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! You are Allah, Eshwar, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavir, Rama, Krishna. In the Treta Age, you incarnated as Lord Rama; in the Dwapara Age as Lord Krishna and in the Kali Age as Lord Sathya Sai who fosters the unity of all religions.
Songglossary: allah, buddha, dhama, dharma, dwapara, eshwar, kali, krishna, mahavir, prabhu, ram, sai, sarva, sathya, treta, tum, yesu, yuga, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Eshwara Ek Hi Naam
Lyrics:
Allah Eshwara Ek Hi Naam
Bhajorey Manuva Baba Naam [ Allah Eshwar ... ]
Allah Bolo Eshwar Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Nanak Bolo Yesu Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Gautam Buddha Mahavira Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Bolo Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Meaning: All divine names are HIS, so adore oh! Mind the names of Allah, Eshwar. Chant with the devotion all names such as Allah, Eshwara, Sai Ram, Nanak, Yesu, Buddha and Mahavira.
Songglossary: allah, baba, bhajao, bolo, buddha, ek, eshwar, gautam, hai, mahavir, manuva, naam, nanak, ram, sai, yesu

Title: Allah Ho Akbar
Lyrics:
Allah Ho Akbar, Allah Ho Akbar, Allah Ho Akbar
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Allah Ho Akbar, Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Tum Ho
Guru Nanak Bhi Tum Ho
Zohrashtra Mahavira Tum Ho
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Tum Ho
Allah Ho Akbar Tum Ho ( Sai )

(only in 2nd speed)
La Ilahi Il Allah, Mohammadur Rasool Allah
Meaning: Allah is supreme, Allah is supreme and as he is also Yesu, Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai, Guru Nanak, Zohrashtra and Mahavir chant their glorious names.
GeneralComments: http://dl.radiosai.org/MBV_02_02_10_M_SUJITH_SARVA_DHARMA_ALLAH_HO_AKBAR.mp3
Songglossary: akbar, allah, bhi, guru, ho, ilahi, mahavir, mohammad, nanak, pitha, prabhu, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi, tum, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Ho Akbar Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Allah Ho Akbar Sai Ram Maulah Ho Akbar Sai Ram
Rama Rama Jai Sai Ram Bolo Sundara Naam
Ram Ram Sai Ram Bolo Sundara Naam [ Allah Ho ]
Bolo Mahavir Naam Yesu Prabhu Ka Naam
Gurbani Ki Jai Jai Bolo Jai Jai Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the divine names Allah, Maulah, Rama, Mahavir and Yesu. Victory unto them and Gurubani (divine verses of Gurugranth scripture of Sikhs).
Songglossary: akbar, allah, bolo, guruban, ho, jai, ka, mahavir, maulah, naam, prabhu, ram, sai, sundara, yesu

Title: Allah Ho Tum
Lyrics:
Allah Ho Tum Eshwar, Bhi Tum Mahavir Nanak Ram
Partheesha Sai Shankara, Tum Hi Ho Merey Pran [ Allah Ho ... ]
Zohrashtra Yesu Buddha Tum Ho, Sab Ke Palanhaar
Satchidananda Sai Tera, Brindavana Shubh Dhaam
Meaning: Dweller of Brindavan the sacred abode O Sai you are Allah also Eshwar, Mahavira, Nanak, Ram. Oh Sai Shankara of Parthi, you are our life and protector and the embodiment of existence, knowledge and bliss.
Songglossary: allah, bhi, brinda, buddha, dhaam, eshwar, hai, ho, ke, mahavir, mera, nanak, palanhaar, partheeshwara, pran, ram, sab, sai, satchidananda, shankara, shubh, tera, tum, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Jehovah Jesus Christ Our Lord
Lyrics:
Allah Jehovah Jesus Christ Our Lord
Lord Sai You Are Ever Beside Me
Lord Sai You Are Ever Within Me
All Names Are Yours My Lord, All Forms With You Begin
Formless Or Form We Adore Thee
God Is Love, We Are Love Ever Expanding (4)
GeneralComments: The tune is same as the Bhajan "Allah Tum Ho".
Songglossary: allah, sai

Title: Allah Kaho Chahey Eshwar Kaho
Lyrics:
Allah Kaho Chahey Eshwar Kaho
Buddha Nanak Mahavir Kaho
Yesu Pitha Zohrashtra Kaho
Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Kaho
Jis Naam Se Shanthi Miley To
Wohi Naam Baar Baar Kaho
Meaning: Chant repeatedly any of the names of Lord - Allah, Buddha, Nanak, Mahavir, Yesu, Zohrashtra, Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai - which confers peace.
Songglossary: allah, baar-baar, buddha, chahey, eshwar, jis, kaho, mahavir, miley, naam, nanak, pitha, puttaparthi, sai, se, shanthi, shirdi, woh, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Mazda Jehovah
Lyrics:
Allah, Mazda, Jehovah, What Shall I Call Thee
There Is Just One God, He Is Omnipresent
I Know Truth To Be His Name, And Love Is His Body
Songglossary: allah, mazda

Title: Allah Naam Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
Lyrics:
Allah Naam Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo Maulah Naam Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
Nanak Yesu Mahavir Naam Bhajo
Sri Buddha Deva Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo Shirdi Sai Baba Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
Sri Raghu Rama Bhajo Govinda Krishna Bhajo
Sri Sathya Sai Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
Meaning: Chant the divine names Allah, Maulah, Nanak, Mahavir, Buddha, Shirdi Sai Baba, Rama, Govinda, Krishna and Sri Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: allah, baba, bhajao, buddha, deva, govinda, krishna, mahavir, maulah, naam, nanak, raghuram, sai, sathya, shirdi, sri, yesu

Title: Allah Nam Tero Nam Sai
Lyrics:
Allah Nam Tero Nam Sai Nam Ek Hi Nam
Yeshu Nanak Baba Nam
Buddha Mahavira Sai Nam (2)
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Baba Nam
Sai Nam Ek Hi Nam
Meaning: Allah, Jesus, Nanak, Buddha, Mahavir; all names and forms of God are Lord Sai's.
Songglossary: allah, baba, buddha, dharma, ek, hai, mahavir, nam, nanak, prem, sai, sathya, shanthi, tera, yesu

Title: Allah Sai Allah Maulah Sai
Lyrics:
Allah Sai Allah Maulah Sai Maulah (3)
Tum Hi Ram Rahim O Sai Tum Hi Yesu Mahaan
Tum Hi Yesu Mahaan
Tum Hi Krishna Karim O Sai Tum Hi Mera Pran
Tum Hi Mera Pran
Meaning: Sai you are Allah and Maulah. You are the Ram the merciful and the great Yesu. You are Krishna the benevolent and O Sai you are our life force.
Songglossary: allah, hai, karim, krishna, maha, maulah, mera, pran, rahim, ram, sai, tum, yesu

Title: Allah Sai Maulah Sai
Lyrics:
Allah Sai Maulah Sai
Sadguru Sai Antaryami
Nanak Sai Prema Sai
Yesu Sai Karuna Sagara
Sarva Dharma Priya Sathya Sai
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are Allah, the all pervading Divine Teacher, You are Nanak, Jesus, the Loving and Compassionate one, fostering all faiths.
Songglossary: allah, antar, dharma, karuna, maulah, nanak, prem, priya, sadguru, sagar, sai, sarva, sathya, yesu

Title: Allah Tero Naam Sai
Lyrics:
Allah Tero Naam Sai Maulah Tero Naam
Ram Rahim Sai Krishna Karim Sai
Parthi Vihara Sai Bhaktha Janon Ke Sai
Parama Dayalu Sai Parama Krupalu Sai
Meaning: Oh compassionate and kind Sai residing in Parthi, you are for your devotees, you are none other than Allah, Maulah, Ram, Rahim, Krishna and Karim.
Songglossary: allah, bhaktha, dayal, jana, karim, ke, krishna, krupa, maulah, naam, param, puttaparthi, rahim, ram, sai, tera, vihar

Title: Allah Tum Ho Eshwar Tum Ho
Lyrics:
Allah Tum Ho Eshwar Tum Ho
Tum Hi Ho Ram Rahim (2)
Merey Ram Merey Ram Ram Rahim
Yesu Tum Ho Nanak Tum Ho
Zohrashtra Bhi Ho Mahavir Tum Ho
Gautama Buddha Karim
Tum Hi Ho Ram Rahim
Merey Ram Merey Ram Ram Rahim (3)
Meaning: Oh Lord! You are Allah, Eshwar, Rama, Rahim, Jesus, Guru Nanak, Zohrashtra, Mahavir, Gautama Buddha. O Lord Ram, Rahim.
Songglossary: allah, bhi, buddha, eshwar, gautam, hai, ho, karim, mahavir, mera, nanak, rahim, ram, tum, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah Yesu Buddha Deva Andaru Neevey
Lyrics:
Allah Yesu Buddha Deva Andaru Neevey
Maulah Sai Mahavira Nanak Neevey
Rama Krishna Shiva Roopa Dhariyu Neevey
Veda Geeta Granthamula Saramu Neevey
Mathamulanni Poojinchu Devuduvu Neevey
Sarva Dharma Priya Sathya Saivu Neevey
Sai Ram Sai Ram [ Sai Ram Sathya ]
Meaning: Sairam Sri Sathya Sairam You are Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Maulah, Mahavir and Nanak. Other forms we adore you are Rama, Krishna and Shiva. You are the essence of Veda, Geeta and other Scriptures. One God worshipped by all religion O Sai you love and foster all faiths.
Songglossary: allah, andaru, buddha, deva, devudu, dhari, dharma, geeta, grantha, krishna, mahavir, matha, maulah, nanak, neeve, poojinchu, priya, ram, roopa, sai, sainatha, saramu, sarva, sathya, shiva, veda, yesu

Title: Allah Yesu Niyanro
Lyrics:
Allah Yesu Niyanro
Anaittume Sayi Un Uruvamanro
Makka Madina Vazh Deivamanro
Nabigal Nayagam Niyallavo
Buddha Mahavir Zohrashtranumai
Yesuvai Avataram Seidavane
Ellaiyilla Karunai Kadalallavo
Nambinorkku Arulbaven Niyallavo
Meaning: Lord Sai, You are Allah and Jesus. Everything visible is Your own form. Your are the Lord Nabi of Mecca and Medinah. Incarnated previously as Buddha, Mahavir, Zoroaster and Jesus. You are the boundless ocean of compassion and the Lord who blesses the faithful.
Songglossary: allah, anaittu, arul, avatar, buddha, deivam, ellaiyilla, kadalallavo, karuna, madina, mahavir, mecca, nabigal, nambinorkku, nayaka, niyallavo, sai, seibavane, un, uruvai, vazh, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Allah, You are Lord
Lyrics:
Allah, You are Lord--Eshwara, You are Lord
 You are the merciful Ram (2X)
 Jesus, You are Lord --Nanak, You are Lord
 Zoroaster, You are Lord-- Mahavir, You are Lord
 You are the giving Buddha (2X)
 You are Lord, You are Lord, Lord of Many Names (3X)

Title: Alleluia Allelu Alleluia
Lyrics:
Alleluia Allelu Alleluia
 Alleluia Alleluia
 O Bhagawan Sathya Sai Baba, O Bhagawan Sathya Sai
 O Bhagawan Sathya Sai Baba, O Bhagawan Sathya Sai
 Sai Baba, Sai Baba
 O Bhagawan Sathya Sai

Title: Almighty Father with thousands of names
Lyrics:
Almighty Father with thousands of names
 Almighty Father with thousands of forms
 Why differ over names
 Why differ over forms
 We are all one and the same
 You are embodiments Love divine
 We are birds, God is wing
 We can fly when we are one
 We are all one and the same

Title: Alokya Sri Bala Krishnam
Lyrics:
Alokya Sri Bala Krishnam
Ananda Sundara Tandava Krishnam
Neela Megha Shyama Sundara Krishnam
Nanda Sunandadi Vanditha Krishnam
Meaning: Oh Bala Krishna! you are unworldly and while dancing on the Kalinga serpent, you look beautiful and blissful, presenting the cloud like complexion adored by Nanda and Sunanda.
Songglossary: alokya, anand, bala, krishna, megha, nanda, neela, sham, sri, sunanda, sundara, tandava, vanditha

Title: Although I don’t see You, You are there
Lyrics:
Although I don't see You, You are there
 Although I can't touch You, You are there
 Although I don't know You are Love
 Although I don't understand You,
 You are wisdom in my heart
 Thank You, Lord for letting me believe in You
 Thank You, Lord, I know wherever I am You are,
 wherever I am You are.

Title: Amazing Grace
Lyrics:
Amazing Grace, how sweet the sound
 That saved a wretch like me
 I once was lost, but now I am found
 Was blind, but now I see
 Through many trials, toils and snares
 I have already come
 His Grace has brought me safe so far
 And Grace will lead me on
 Twas Grace that taught my heart to fear
 And Grace my fears relieved
 How precious did that Grace appear
 The hour I first believed
 When we've been there ten thousand years
 Bright shining as the sun
 We've no less days to sing God's praise
 Than when we first begun.

Title: Amba Bhairavi Ambe Bhavani
Lyrics:
Amba Bhairavi Ambe Bhavani
Jagadambe Mata Jagat Janani [ Amba Bhairavi ... ]
Narayani Patitha Pavani
Parthipurishwari Sai Janani
Meaning: Sai of Puttaparthi, the Mother Goddess, is the source, support and mother of the Universe. She is the savior of the fallen.
Songglossary: amba, bhairavi, bhava, jagadamba, jagat, janani, mata, narayani, parteeshwari, patitha, pavan, sai

Title: Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani (4)
Lyrics:
Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani (4)
Sri Chakra Vasini Ananda Dayini
Gnana Pradayini Jyothi Swaroopini
Omkara Roopini Sri Sai Roopini
Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani
Meaning: Oh universal mother Bhavani, resident of srichakra, bestower of bliss and knowledge and having glowing look. You are the embodiment of Omkara (primordial sound) descended in the form of Sri Sai.
Songglossary: amba, anand, bhava, chakra, dayini, gnana, jagadamba, jyoth, om, sai, sri, swaroopa, vasini

Title: Amba Bhavani Saishwari (Jagad)
Lyrics:
Amba Bhavani Saishwari (Jagad)
Durga Bhavani Jagadishwari [ Amba Bhavani ... ]
Mata Bhavani Maheshwari
Parthishwari Amba Parameshwari
Meaning: Chant the names of Mother Parvathi. Amba, Durga and Maheshwari. Lord Sai is Supreme Mother of Universe.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, durga, jagadeeshwari, jagat, maheshwari, mata, param, parteeshwari, saiyeeshwara

Title: Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambhu Kumara
Lyrics:
Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambhu Kumara
Sri Gananatha Shanthakara
Purana Purusha Sathya Sai Natha
Pranava Swaroopa Partheesha
Meaning: O Lord Ganesha, beloved son of Shiva and Mother Parvathi, you are the embodiment of peace. O Lord Sathya Sai! You are the one adored in ancient holy scriptures and you are the very form of the primordial sound.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, gananatha, kumara, natha, partheeshwara, pranava, puran, purusha, sai, sathya, shambho, shantha, shiva, sri, swaroopa

Title: Amba Manda Haasa Vadani
Lyrics:
Amba Manda Haasa Vadani Manohari Sai Jagat Janani
Mata Mata Mata Jagat Janani [ Amba Manda ]
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini
Sai Jaganmata
Sathya Sai Jaganmata
Meaning: Worship the auspicious Mother of the Universe, Mother Sai who has an enchanting face with a charming smile.
Songglossary: amba, hasita, jagan, jagat, janani, kaarini, manda, manohar, mata, sai, sathya, shubh, vadana

Title: Amba Parameshwari Akhilandeshwari
Lyrics:
Amba Parameshwari Akhilandeshwari
Adi Parashakthi Paalaya Maam
Sri Bhuvaneshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Ananda Roopini Paalaya Maam
Meaning: Oh Divine Mother of the Universe (Bhuvaneshwari, Raja Rajeshwari) and the Consort of Lord Shiva, the all-powerful one, you are bliss personified, we pray to you to protect us.
Songglossary: adi, akhila, amba, anand, bhuvaneshwari, maam, paalaya, param, parashakthi, raja, rajeshwari, sri, swaroopa

Title: Amba Sahita Samba Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Amba Sahita Samba Sadashiva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva Shambho
Parvathi Ramana Sadashiva [ Hara Hara ]
Meaning: We Pray to Shiva, who is accompanied by Mother Parvathi. We chant the names of Mahadeva, the divine consort of Parvathi.
Songglossary: amba, hara, mahadev, parvathi, ramana, sadashiva, sahita, samba, shambho

Title: Amba Shankari Parameshwari Shashi Shekari
Lyrics:
Amba Shankari Parameshwari Shashi Shekari Amba
Sarveshwari Jagadeeshwari Maheshwari Amba
Sundari Guna Manjari Shiva Shankari Amba
Kadambari Shwetambari Hari Sodari Amba
Meaning: Glory to Mother Shankari Parameshwari who is the consort of Shiva (adorns with the beautiful Crescent Moon on the head) you are the Goddess who is the Protector of the Universe. And you are the Goddess who is the most beautiful with abundant good qualities. You are the sibling of Lord Hari. We offer our salutations to you Oh Mother.
Songglossary: amba, guna, hari, jagadeeshwari, kadamba, maheshwari, manjari, param, sarvesha, shankari, shashi, shekara, shiva, shwetambari, sodari, soundari

Title: Amba Vandanam Eshwaramba Vandanam
Lyrics:
Amba Vandanam Eshwaramba Vandanam
Janani Vandanam Jagat Janani Vandanam (2)
Sai Vandanam Sai Mata Vandanam
Mata Vandanam Eshwaramba Nandanam
Meaning: Oh universal mother Sai we bow to you and also we bow to Eshwaramba whom you made your physical mother during your advent on earth.
Songglossary: amba, eshwar, jagat, janani, mata, nanda, sai, vandana

Title: Ambe Bhavani Anand Ma
Lyrics:
Ambe Bhavani Anand Ma
Adi Parashakthi Sai Ma [ Ambe Bhavani ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Parti Ma
Atmanandamayi Sai Ma
Meaning: Mother Sai, the primal energy is our refuge. She is eternal bliss and the indeweller.
Songglossary: abhaya, adi, amba, anand, atmananda, bhava, dayini, ma, parashakthi, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Ambe Bhavani Ma Jai Jai
Lyrics:
Ambe Bhavani Ma Jai Jai Bhavani Ma
Raksha Karo Raksha Karo Ambe Bhavani [ Ambe Bhavani ]
Ambe Bhavani Teri Jyothi Jalavun
Jyothi Jalavun Teri Arati Utarun
Ambe Bhavani Jai Jai (Jagadambe) Bhavani [ Raksha Karo ]
Meaning: Victory to mother Bhavani and we chant your divine name. Protect us from all miseries. We illumine you with Arati and in return you illumine our hearts.
Songglossary: amba, arati, bhava, jagadamba, jai, jalavun, jyoth, karo, ma, raksha, tera, utaru

Title: Ambe Jagadambe Jagadambe Gowri Ma
Lyrics:
Ambe Jagadambe Jagadambe Gowri Ma
Ambe Jai Jai Ma Jagadambe Jai Jai Ma
Mahalakshmi Mata Meri Ambe Jai Jai Ma
Daya Nidhey Dukha Harnewaali Ambe Sai Ma
Bholi Bhaali Mata Meri Ambe Jai Jai Ma [ Ambe Jagadambe ]
(2nd Speed Starts With Ambe Jai Jai Ma)
Meaning: Victory to Mother of the Universe. You are Mother Lakshmi, the compassionate one and remover of worldly miseries and who is innocence personified.
Songglossary: amba, bhaali, bholi, daya, dukh, gowri, haarini, jagadamba, jai, ma, mahalakshmi, mata, mera, nidhey, sai

Title: Ambe Janani Abhirami
Lyrics:
Ambe Janani Abhirami
Abhaya Pradayini Shivakami [ Ambe Janani ]
Sambhavi Shankari Sarveshwari
Shantha Swaroopini Shivaranjani
Sathya Swaroopini Sai Mata
Shashwata Ananda Dayini Mata
Meaning: Oh pleasing divine mother, the consort of Shiva known also as Abhirami Sambhavi, Shankari the one who grants fearlessness and is omnipresent. We chant your glorious names. You are Sai Mata the embodiment of truth and peace who grants us with eternal peace.
Songglossary: abhaya, abhirami, amba, anand, dayini, janani, mata, sai, sambhavi, sarvesha, sathya, shankari, shantha, shashwat, shiva, swaroopa

Title: Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
Lyrics:
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
Gajavadana Gananatha Gajanana
Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka
Tribhuvana Palaka Mangala Dayaka
Vidya Buddhi Siddhi Pradayaka
Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka (2)
Meaning: O loving son of Mother Parvathi, the Elephant-headed Lord Ganesha, kindly protect us. You are the sustainer of the three worlds, the one who confers auspiciousness, knowledge, wisdom and success.
Songglossary: amba, buddhi, dayaka, gajamukha, gananatha, ganesha, mangal, paahi, palaka, pradayaka, siddhi, tanaya, tribhuvan, vidya, vinayaka

Title: Amruthamaya Vichara
Lyrics:
Amruthamaya Vichara
Sri Rama Charitha Katha Saara [ Amruthamaya ... ]
Sri Rama Charitha Katha Saara (2)
Meaning: Oh Mind! Dwell on the nectarine experience of Story of Sri Rama.
Songglossary: amrutha, charitha, katha, ram, saara, sri, vichara

Title: Amruthavarshini Premamayi Triloka Palini Ma
Lyrics:
Amruthavarshini Premamayi Triloka Palini Ma
Jagadamba Bhavani Saraswati Narayani Sai Ma
Amruthavarshini Premamayi Triloka Palini Ma
Prasanthi Swaroopini Abhaya Pradayini Roopa Manohari Ma
Daya Karo Ab Darshan Do Mujhe Nayanon Mein Aao Sai Ma
Meaning: The Love of the Mother has cascaded down the times sanctifying and beautifying the tiniest spec of creation. Mother's Love is therefore Amritavarshini, the eternal shower of God's ambrosia. No wonder Amritavarshini is a distinctive melody or Raga inspired by the selflessness of Mother's Love. With Love She rules over the three worlds as - Jagadamba Bhavani - the Mother of All; Saraswati - Transcendental Wisdom; Narayani - the Goddess of prosperity and auspiciousness; and Sai Maa - the Beloved Mother Sai. She is verily the embodiment of eternal peace, fearlessness and beauty that steals away the hearts of devotees. Be merciful to me by stepping into my eyes and taking permanent residence there so that I see no one but your blissful form forever.

Title: Ana el na refa nala
Lyrics:
Ana el na refa nala,
 Ana el na refa nala.
 From deep within the home of my soul
 Now let the healing, let the healing begin.
 Ana el na refa nala,
 Ana el na refa nala.
 Heal our bodies, open our hearts,
 Awaken our minds, (El) Schechina

Title: Anai Mugane Shri Ganesha
Lyrics:
Anai Mugane Shri Ganesha
Adi Mudalvane Shri Ganesha
Arul Ni Purivai Shri Ganesha
Arivai Koduppai Shri Ganesha
Bhaktharai Kappai Shri Ganesha
Padam Panindom Shri Ganesha
Meaning: O elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the source of all sources, bless us and enlighten our intellect. Protect us devotees; We surrender at Your feet.
Songglossary: adi, anai, arivai, arul, bhaktha, ganesha, kappai, koduppai, mudal, mugane, ni, paada, panindom, pozhiyum, sri

Title: Anand Se Bolo Jai Baba Jai
Lyrics:
Anand Se Bolo Jai Baba Jai
Prem Se Bolo Jai Baba Jai
Jai Jai Jai Jai Amba Ki Jai
Jai Jai Jai Mahalakshmi Ki Jai [ Ananda Se ]
Jai Jai Jai Shirdi Ki Jai
Jai Jai Jai Sathya Sai Ki Jai
Meaning: Chant jai Baba jai blissfully suffused in Love. Victory be to Mother Mahalakshmi who is also Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: amba, anand, baba, bolo, jai, mahalakshmi, prem, sai, sathya, se, shirdi

Title: Ananda Mangala Arati Gao
Lyrics:
Ananda Mangala Arati Gao
Veena Venu Mrudanga Bajao [ Ananda Mangala ]
Madhava Madhava Hari Narayana
Sathya Sai Ki Jai Jai Bolo
Madhura Madhura Sangeeta Sunao
Meaning: Perform the blissful auspicious Arati of Sathya Sai who is also Madhava to the accompaniment of musical instruments such as Veena, Flute and Mrudunga set in tune to sweet melodious music.
Songglossary: anand, arati, bajao, bolo, gao, hari, jai, madhava, madhu, mangal, mrudanga, narayana, sai, sangeeta, sathya, sunao, veena, venu

Title: Ananda Maya Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Ananda Maya Bhagawan Hey Prema Maya Bhagawan
O Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan [ Ananda Maya Bhagawan ... ]
Hey Karuna Nidhey Prabhu Sai Ram
Krupa Nidhey Deenon Ke Pran
Lelo Prabhu Mujhey Sharan Lagalo
Mujhey Daya (Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Meaning: Oh Sai Bhagawan, You are love and bliss personified, repository of compassion and kindness and hope of the downtrodden. Kindly accept us at Your Lotus Feet.
Songglossary: anandamayi, bhagawan, daya, deenon, hey, karo, karuna, ke, krupa, lagalo, lelo, mujhe, nidhey, prabhu, pran, premamayi, ram, sai, sharan

Title: Ananda Nandana Hey Bhaktha Chandana
Lyrics:
Ananda Nandana Hey Bhaktha Chandana
Hey Yadu Nandana Krishna Krishna
Devaki Nandana Gokula Balana
Natavara Mohana Krishna Krishna
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Krishna
Meaning: Hey Krishna, Sai Krishna you are bliss personified and beloved of devotees, star of Yadukula, Son of Devaki brought up in Gokula and you are an elegant dancer who is captivating.
Songglossary: anand, bala, bhaktha, chand, devaki, gokul, hey, krishna, mohan, nanda, natavara, sai, yadu

Title: Ananda Ram Ananda Shyam
Lyrics:
Ananda Ram Ananda Shyam
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Prema Swaroopa Brahmananda
Satchidananda Hari Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana [ Narayana Sai ]
Meaning: Oh Blissful Lord Ram and Shyam, we chant your name Narayana, Hari and Sai, you are the embodiment of Divine Love, truth, awareness and bliss.
Songglossary: anand, brahma, hari, narayana, prem, ram, sai, satchidananda, sham, swaroopa

Title: Ananda Rama Ayodhya Rama
Lyrics:
Ananda Rama Ayodhya Rama
Karunya Rama Kamaneeya Rama [ Ananda Rama ]
Sitabhi Rama Sundara Rama
Saketa Rama Sayeesha Rama
Meaning: Lord Rama, you are bliss personified who resides in Ayodhya. You are compassionate and beloved of devotees. You are the adorable consort of Sita. You the star of Ayodhya, who has taken the form of Sayeesha.
Songglossary: anand, ayodhya, kamaneeya, karuna, ram, saketa, sayee, siyavar, sundara

Title: Ananda Roopini Sai Narayani
Lyrics:
Ananda Roopini Sai Narayani
Himagiri Nandini Ma [ Ananda Roopini ... ]
Triloka Palini Mata Tridayini
Tri Jagata Vandini Parti Nivasini
Sai Bhavani Ma
Meaning: Mother Goddess, Narayani, (Parvathi) from Himalaya mountains, is the protector of three worlds; She is the liberator and personifies supreme bliss. Mother Sai of Parthi, is worshiped by the entire world.
Songglossary: anand, bhava, himagiri, jagat, ma, mata, nandi, narayani, nivasi, palini, puttaparthi, sai, swaroopa, tri, triloka, vandini

Title: Ananda Sagara Muralidhara
Lyrics:
Ananda Sagara Muralidhara
Meera Prabhu Radhey Shyam Venu Gopala [ Ananda Sagara ... ]
Nanda Yashoda Ananda Kishora
Jai Jai Gokula Bala Jai Venu Gopala
Meaning: Oh Krishna, you are the ocean of bliss and the one who plays captivating music on flute, the Lord of Meera and Radha, the son of Nanda and Yashoda. Victory to Gopala.
Songglossary: anand, bala, gokul, gopal, jai, kishora, meera, murali, nanda, prabhu, radha, sagar, sham, venu, yashoda

Title: Ananda Sagari Daya Kari
Lyrics:
Ananda Sagari Daya Kari
Adi Parashakthi Krupakari
He Jagadishwari Partheeshwari
He Jagadishwari Saishwari
Meaning: Mother Sai, the Goddess of the Universe, the primal and supreme force, is an ocean of bliss. She confers mercy and compassion.
Songglossary: adi, anand, daya, jagadeeshwari, kari, krupa, parashakthi, partheeshwari, sagar, saiyeeshwara

Title: Ananda Sri Sai Parthi Pureesha
Lyrics:
Ananda Sri Sai Parthi Pureesha
Sadananda Madhava Prashanthi Vasa
Mandara Dhara Govinda Mukunda
Sundara Roopa Sri Satchidananda
[ Sadananda Madhava ]
Meaning: Oh Sai Madhava, dweller at Prashanthi of Parthi, you are eternally blissful, beauty personified. You are embodiment of existence, awareness and bliss. You are Govinda, the one who carried the Mandara mountain, who bestows Mukti (liberation) to devotees.
Songglossary: anand, dhara, govinda, madhava, manda, mukunda, prashanthi, pureesha, puttaparthi, roopa, sadana, sai, satchidananda, sri, sundara, vasa

Title: Ananda Tandava Rudra Maheshwari
Lyrics:
Ananda Tandava Rudra Maheshwari
Aartha Samrakshaki Abhinava Sundari
Gnana Vishweshwari Ananda Bhairavi
Anandeshwari Sai Maheshwari
Meaning: Sai Maheshwari, you are so blissful during the cosmic dance (creation), you are the protector of troubled devotees, looking beautiful. You are the blissful universal Goddess Bhairavi who bestows knowledge.
Songglossary: aartha, abhinava, anand, bhairavi, gnana, maheshwari, rudra, sai, samraksha, soundari, tandava, vishweshwari

Title: Anandamaya Sai
Lyrics:
Anandamaya Sai
Dayamaya Krupamaya Premamaya [ Anandamaya Sai ... ]
Dinakara Koti Tejonmaya
Deena Vatsala Sai Karunamaya
Shantha Saguna Parabrahmamaya
Sarvamaya Niramaya
Sai Satchidanandamaya
Meaning: Sai, You are verily the embodiment of Bliss, Compassion and Love. Your divine effulgence is equivalent to the splendour of crores of sun. You are pleasantly disposed towards the underprivileged, storehouse of eternal Peace, all pervasive divinity. You are Omnipotent, blemishless and the embodiment of Existence, Awareness and Bliss.
Songglossary: anand, dayamayi, deen, dinakara, karuna, koti, krupa, niramaya, parabrahma, premamayi, saguna, sai, sarva, satchidananda, shantha, tejonmaya, vatsala

Title: Anandamey Sai Naamamey
Lyrics:
Anandamey Sai Naamamey
Adbhutamey Sai Geetamey
Akhandamey Jyothirmayamey
Sundaramey Sai Roopamey (Ati)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! Chanting your divine name is true bliss and singing your glory confers ecstacy. Your infinite effulgence is all pervading and Your form is beauty personified.
Songglossary: adbhuta, akhanda, anand, ati, geeta, jyoth, naam, roopa, sai, sundara

Title: Anatha Bandho Sai Prabho
Lyrics:
Anatha Bandho Sai Prabho
Aparadha Kshama Karo Sai Prabho
Jeeva Yatra Mey Saath Raho
Nija Prem Bhakthi Hum Ko Deejo
Hrudaya Mandir Se Math Jao
Charanamrutha Seva Deejo Prabhu
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! You are the Lord of the deprived people. Kindly forgive our misdeeds and be with us in our journey of life. Bless us with Divine Love and devotion and be constantly in our thoughts and our hearts, grant us the opportunity to serve your Lotus feet.
Songglossary: anath, aparadha, bandho, bhakthi, chara, deejo, hrudaya, hum, jao, jeeva, karo, kshama, mandir, math, nija, prabhu, prem, raho, saath, sai, se, seva, yatra

Title: Anatha Rakshaki Sai Maheshwari
Lyrics:
Anatha Rakshaki Sai Maheshwari
Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini [ Anatha Rakshaki ... ]
Ambuja Lochani Akhilandeshwari
Abhayam Abhayam Dehi [ Anatha Rakshaki ... ]
Sajjana Vanditha Sankata Nashini
Sharanam Sharanam Sai
Meaning: Mother Sai protects and gives refuge to the destitute. The lotus-eyed Goddess of the Universe frees us from fear, destroys grief and is worshipped by all living beings. Let us surrender to Sai.
Songglossary: abhaya, akhila, ambuja, anand, anath, dayini, dehi, lochana, maheshwari, raksha, sai, sajjan, sankata, sharan, swaroopa, vanditha, vinashana

Title: Ancient Mother I hear you calling
Lyrics:
Ancient Mother I hear you calling
Ancient Mother I hear your song
Ancient Mother I feel your laughter
Ancient Mother I taste your tears
O La Mama Waha su ko la
O La Mama Waha suWa an
O La Mama KaWe Ha Ha Ha Ha
O La Mama Ta te KaYee
GeneralComments: This is a Native American song that is best sung in unison with harmonies.

Title: Anjana Nanda Veeram
Lyrics:
Anjana Nanda Veeram Ashoka Vana Sancharam
Vande Lanka Bhayankaram
Sita Shoka Vinashakaram
Meaning: Salutation to thee, O son of mother Anjana, the valorous and powerful. You wandered the Ashoka vana (forest) and instilled fear among the demons to redeem Mother Sita from distress.
Songglossary: anjana, ashoka, bhaya, lanka, nanda, sanchara, shoka, sita, vana, vande, veera, vinasha

Title: Anjana Sutha Anjaneya
Lyrics:
Anjana Sutha Anjaneya
Vayu Putra Vathathmaja
Vanarotthama Bala Bheema
Rama Dootha Ranadheera
Meaning: Oh Anjaneya the son of Mother Anjana and Vayu, you are the supreme among the Vanaras (monkeys) and the strongest. You are a supreme warrior and humble emissary of Rama.
Songglossary: anjana, bala, bheema, doota, hanuman, putra, ram, ranadheera, sutha, vanarotthama, vathathmaja, vayu

Title: Anjaneya Hanumantha Veera
Lyrics:
Anjaneya Hanumantha Veera
Anjana Sutha Vayu Kumara
Sita Mata Shoka Vinasha
Sri Rama Dootha Namo Namasthey
Sri Rama Dootha Namo Namosthey (4)
Meaning: Oh valorous Hanumantha, you are the son of Anjana and Vayu. Salutation to thee, who is the ambassador of Sri Rama and the redeemer of mother Sita's distress.
Songglossary: anjana, doota, hanuman, kumara, mata, namo, namostuthey, ram, shoka, sita, sri, sutha, vayu, veera, vinasha

Title: Anjaneya Paahi Maam
Lyrics:
Anjaneya Paahi Maam Hanumantha Paahi Maam
Vayu Nandana Paahi Maam Lanka Dahana Paahi Maam
Aprameya Paahi Maam Suprakasha Paahi Maam
Rama Dootha Paahi Maam Sathya Sai Paahi Maam
Meaning: Oh Anjaneya son of Vayu (wind god) protect us. Hanumantha who set Lanka on fire protect us. Protect us O effulgent one having immeasurable qualities O Rama's ambassador who is in the form of Sathya Sai protect us.
Songglossary: aprameya, dahana, doota, hanuman, lanka, maam, nanda, paahi, ram, sai, sathya, suprakasha, vayu

Title: Anjaneya Veera Hanumantha Shoora
Lyrics:
Anjaneya Veera Hanumantha Shoora
Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera [ Anjaneya ... ]
Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jai Jai Ram Sita Ram Jai Radhey Shyam (4)
Meaning: Oh Anjaneya, Hanuman, the offspring of Vayu (Wind God) you are brave and powerful. Chant the names Sri Ram, Sita Ram, Radhey Shyam.
Songglossary: hanuman, jai, jay, kumara, radha, ram, sham, shoora, sita, sri, vanara, vayu, veera

Title: Annapoorneshwari Paalaya Maam
Lyrics:
Annapoorneshwari Paalaya Maam
Adi Parashakthi Paalaya
Sri Bhuvaneshwari Paalaya Maam
Sri Jagadeeshwari Paalaya
Parthi Pureeshwari Paalaya Maam
Paahi Maheshwari Paalaya
Sundara Roopey Paalaya Maam
Chira Sukha Dayini Paalaya
Meaning: Oh Mother! You are the nourisher, sustainer and protector of the universe. O Mother Sai! You are beauty personified and the one who gives wealth and comforts.
Songglossary: adi, annapoorna, bhuvaneshwari, chira, dayini, jagadeeshwari, maam, maheshwari, paahi, paalaya, parashakthi, purishwara, puttaparthi, roopa, sri, sukh, sundara

Title: Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai
Lyrics:
Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai
Brahma Sanathani Daya Karo
Daya Karo Hey Poorna Jyothirmayi
Shiva Shakthimayi Krupa Karo
Deena Dayamayi Patitha Pavani
Sai Jagat Janani Raksha (Krupa) Karo
Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You have neither beginning nor end. Kindly illumine our soul and shower your mercy. Oh Effulgent Mother of the Universe! You are the form of Shiva and Shakthi and merciful to the deprived. Kindly protect us.
Songglossary: antar, brahma, daya, dayamayi, deen, hey, jagat, jalao, janani, jyoth, karo, krupa, patitha, pavan, poorna, raksha, sai, sanatana, shakthi, shiva

Title: Antar Jyothi Namo
Lyrics:
Antar Jyothi Namo Paramatma Jyothi Namo
Akhanda Jyothi Namo Mama Jeevana Jyothi Namo
Antaryami Namo Jaya Sadguru Sai Namo
Meaning: Bow to the omnipresent light, the light of God within. Bow to the never-ending light, which is the very essence of life. Bow to the indwelling true guru, Lord Sai.
Songglossary: akhanda, antar, jay, jeeva, jyoth, mama, namo, param, sadguru, sai

Title: Antaranga Sai Anatha Natha Sai
Lyrics:
Antaranga Sai Anatha Natha Sai
Deena Bandhu Sai Karuna Sindhu Sai [ Antaranga Sai ]
Rama Krishna Shiva Shakthi Prema Roopa Sai
Yuga Avatara Baba Sri Sathya Sai
Meaning: Oh Sai Bhagawan, you are love and bliss personified, repository of compassion and kindness and hope of the downtrodden. You are verily Rama, Krishna and the incarnation of Supreme Love in the modern era, otherwise known as Sri Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: anath, antar, avatar, baba, bandhava, deen, karuna, krishna, natha, prem, ram, roopa, sai, sathya, shakthi, shiva, sindhu, sri, yuga

Title: Antaryami Aao Nandalala
Lyrics:
Antaryami Aao Nandalala
Sathya Dharma Premi Sai Gopala
Ghana Shyama Neela Karunyashila
He Madhava Govinda
Narayana Govinda
Radha Pathey Krishna Gopala (Priya)
Meaning: Lord Krishna, the indweller is Lord Sai who loves truth and righteousness. He is the compassionate son of Nanda and Radha's beloved who I also called Narayana and Govinda.
Songglossary: aao, antar, dharma, ghana, gopal, govinda, karuna, krishna, madhava, nanda, narayana, neela, pathey, premi, priya, radha, sai, sathya, sham

Title: Antaryami Sai
Lyrics:
Antaryami Sai
Poorna Brahma Avatari
Hey Giridhari Hrudaya Vihari Krishna Kunja Vihari [ Antaryami ... ]
Gopala Leela Dhari
Hey Gopi Mana Sanchari
Madhusudhana Murari [ Hey Giridhari ]
Meaning: Oh indweller Sai, you have descended from supreme unmanifested state (Brahman). You are Krishna, the resident in the hearts of devotees, who wandered in the Brindavan lifting Giridhari mountain. Exhibited divine Leela (sports) with Gopi Gopala imprinting yourself in their minds. You are the Madhusudhana and Murari.
Songglossary: antar, avatar, brahma, dhari, giridhar, gopal, gopi, hey, hrudaya, krishna, kunja, leela, madhu, mana, murare, poorna, sai, sanchari, vihar

Title: Antaryami Sai Murari
Lyrics:
Antaryami Sai Murari
Deena Dukhiyon Ke Tum Hitakari [ Antaryami Sai ... ]
Sai Naam Ke Mahima Bhaari
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Gao
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Murari! You are the Indweller of the heart and benefactor to those distressed. Mysterious is the power of the name "Sai" which helps us cross the ocean of life and death.
Songglossary: antarayami, bhaari, bhava, deen, dukhiya, gao, hitakari, ke, mahima, murare, naam, paar, ram, sagar, sai, se, tum, utharo

Title: Antaryami Sri Raghurama
Lyrics:
Antaryami Sri Raghurama
Akhilanda Koti Nayaka Rama [ Antaryami ]
Atmabhi Rama Pavana Naama
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Palaka Rama
Kali Yug Ke Avatar Sai Rama
Sarva Dharma Priya Sri Sai Rama
Meaning: Oh Sri Raghurama you the indweller and supreme leader of the universe. You are Atma (soul) in all and your name purifies everybody. You foster the truth, righteousness and peace in the world. After descending in the Kali Yuga as Sai Rama loved all faiths.
Songglossary: akhila, antar, atmabhi, avatar, dharma, kali, ke, koti, naam, nayaka, palaka, pavan, priya, raghu, ram, sai, sarva, sathya, shanthi, sri, yuga

Title: Antes del Om solo eras Tu
Lyrics:
Antes del Om solo eras Tu. 
Tu lo quisiste y se hizo la Luz. 
Por tu Voluntad aparecieron
La Tierra, el Hombre, el Mar y el Cielo. 
Sin tu Amor yo no podria sobrevivir ni un solo dia. 
Tu mirada me inspira Amor 
tus palabras me dan valor. 
Senor ayudanos a comprender q debemos cumplir nuestro Deber.
Meaning:
Before The Om.

Only You exists 

By your divine will.

appear the earth, the human being and the sky. 

Without your love I can't survive even for one day. 

Your divine sight inspire Love in me. 

Your divine words give me courage. 

Oh Lord help us to understand that we must accomplish our higher Duty. (dharma)
Songglossary: ley, ni, om, se, tum, un

Title: Anupama Sundara Nanda Kishora
Lyrics:
Anupama Sundara Nanda Kishora
Brindavana Ghana Shyam
Murali Madhava Radhey Govinda
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyam Sathya Sai Sundara Shyam
Brinda Vihari Mandara Giridhari
Kamala Nayana Bhagawan
Bhakthon Ke Prabhu Partheeshwara Sai
Natavara Sundara Shyam Sathya Sai Sundara Shyam
Meaning: O Krishna son of Nanda! You are unsurpassingly beautiful! You are dark as the clouds and adored in Brindavan as Radhey Govinda, Madhusudhana and Giridhari. O Lotus eyed Lord Sathya Sai! You are beloved to your devotees and adored as the same dancing Shyam.
Songglossary: anupama, bhagawan, bhakthon, brinda, ghana, giridhar, govinda, kamala, ke, kishora, madhava, madhu, mandara, murali, nanda, natavara, nayan, partheeshwara, prabhu, radha, sai, sathya, sham, sundara, vihar

Title: Aradhana Suno Prabhu Giridhari
Lyrics:
Aradhana Suno Prabhu Giridhari
Radha Madhava Kunja Vihari [ Aradhana Suno ... ]
Bhaktha Jano Ke Pranadhari
Daya Karo Mujhey Mohana Pyaarey
Parti Vihari Sai Murari
Meaning: Worship Lord Krishna who held the Govardhana mountain up. He walked the garden (in Brindavan). He is the life sustainer of devotees. Lord Sai, of Parthi, please bestow mercy on us.
Songglossary: aradhana, bhaktha, daya, giridhar, jana, karo, ke, kunja, madhava, mohan, mujhe, murare, prabhu, pranadhari, puttaparthi, pyaara, radha, sai, suno, vihar

Title: Araj Suno Giridhari Gopal
Lyrics:
Araj Suno Giridhari Gopal
Sundara Shyama Murari Gopal [ Araj Suno ... ]
Mohana Murali Dhaari Gopal
Brindavana Sanchari Gopal
Radha Hrudaya Vihari Gopal
Saath Raho Sathya Sai Gopal
Meaning: O Krishna the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain, kindly listen to my prayer. You are charming and captivating and sanctified Brindavan by your presence. You are the indweller of Radha's heart. Always be our companion.
Songglossary: araj, brinda, dhaari, giridhar, gopal, hrudaya, mohan, murali, murare, radha, raho, saath, sai, sanchari, sathya, sham, sundara, suno, vihar

Title: Araj Suno Merey Parama Krupalu
Lyrics:
Araj Suno Merey Parama Krupalu
Partheeshwara Sai Deva [ Araj Suno ... ]
Sathya Sanathana Antaryami
Sakala Charachara Tum Ho Swami
Janam Maran Se Paar Karo
Bhava Bandhan Se Uddhar Karo (Baba)
Meaning: O Supremely merciful Lord of Parthi! Kindly listen to my prayer and to help me to come out of the bondage of the cycle of birth and death. O Lord Sai! You are omnipresent, infinite and indweller of our heart.
Songglossary: antar, araj, baba, bandha, bhava, chara, deva, ho, janam, karo, krupa, maran, mera, paar, param, partheeshwara, sai, sakala, sanatana, sathya, se, suno, swami, tum, uddhaar

Title: Araj Suno Prabhu Sai Natha
Lyrics:
Araj Suno Prabhu Sai Natha
Darshana Do Ab Swami
Dwar Khada Hoon Aao Sai
Charana Sharana Do Swami
Hrudaya Nivasi Sai Baba Sai
Pran Sakha Tum Swami
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Natha, please listen to my appeal and appear before me now. I am standing at your door step, bestow me the protection of your feet, Oh the indweller Sai, you are my best friend.
Songglossary: aao, ab, araj, baba, chara, darsh, do, dwarey, hoon, hrudaya, khada, natha, nivasi, prabhu, pran, sai, sakha, sharan, suno, swami, tum

Title: Arati Karu Mai
Lyrics:
Arati Karu Mai Shri Sai Charanam (3)
Parti Nivasa Shri Sai Rama
Shirdi Nivasa Shri Sai Rama
Ashraya Do Mujhey He Bhagawan
Meaning: Please grant me refuge, Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi, as I offer the lamp of love at Your holy feet.
Songglossary: arati, ashraya, bhagawan, chara, do, karoon, mai, mujhe, nivasa, puttaparthi, ram, sai, shirdi, sri

Title: Aravinda Lochana Aartha Janavana
Lyrics:
Aravinda Lochana Aartha Janavana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana [ Aravinda Lochana ... ]
Eshwaramba Nandana Dosha Nivarana
Parama Niranjana Hey Shubhanana
Meaning: O lotus-eyed Lord Narayana! You are the protector of the deprived and distressed. O auspicious son of Mother Eshwaramba, the blemishless one, You are the redeemer of our defects.
Songglossary: aartha, aravinda, dosha, eshwaramba, hey, janavana, lochana, nandana, narayana, niranjan, nivarana, parama, sai, sathya, shubanana

Title: Arul Tara Varuvai Guru Nada
Lyrics:
Arul Tara Varuvai Guru Nada
Parti Purisha Sayi Mahesha [ Arul Tara ... ]
Annaiyum Niye Tandaiyum Niye
Arulum Niye Anaittum Niye
Gadi Niye Ena Saranamadaindom
Parindemai Kappai Parti Purisha
Guru Naada Sayi Guru Naada
Meaning: Grace us with Your presence, Our guru Lord Sai, full of mercy. You are our mother, father and our all; We surrender to You, our only refuge. Save us Guru Sai, O compassionate one.
Songglossary: amma, anaittu, arul, gathi, guru, kappai, mahesha, naada, nada, niyallavo, parindemai, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai, sharan, tandai, tara, varum

Title: Aruna Ramana Sri Guru Deva
Lyrics:
Aruna Ramana Sri Guru Deva
Shesha Ramana Sadguru Deva [ Aruna Ramana ... ]
Bhava Bhaya Harana Sri Sai Deva
Sri Sai Deva Sri Sai Deva [ Bhava Bhaya ]
Guru Hai Sath Chith Ananda Deva
Ananda Deva Sri Sai Deva
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, we worship you as our guru, who gives delightness to the eyes at the dawn. You are the blissful eternal guru reclining on Sesha (seven headed serpent) who protects us from fear and worldly miseries. You are the our Lord Sai who is the embodiment of existence, awareness and bliss.
Songglossary: anand, aruna, bhava, bhaya, chitha, deva, guru, hai, harana, ramana, sadguru, sai, sat, shesha, sri

Title: Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva
Lyrics:
Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva, Aruna Shiva
Akshaya Linga Atma Linga
Tejonmaya Vigraha Linga
Iha Para Sukha Dayaka, Esha ( Sai ), Iha Para Sukha Dayaka
Om Namah Shivaya, Shivaya Namah Om (3)
Meaning: O Shiva, you are the resident of Arunachala (place) and in the form of imperishable Atma Linga. An effulgent symbol of Shiva, which bestows peace and happiness in this and the higher world. O Shiva salutation to thee, the embodiment of Primordial sound.
Songglossary: akshaya, aruna, atma, dayaka, esha, iha, linga, namah, om, para, sai, shiva, sukh, tejonmaya, vigraha

Title: Asathoma Sad Gamaya
Lyrics:
Asathoma Sad Gamaya
Thamaso Maa Jyothir Gamaya
Mrithyor Maa Amritham Gamaya
Om Shanthi Shanthi Shanthihi
English version
From The Unreal, Lead Me To The Real
From Darkness, Lead Me To The Light
From Death, Lead Me To Immortality
Aum Peace, Peace, Peace
Songglossary: jyoth, maa, shanthi

Title: Ashi no Suzu no
Lyrics:
Ashi no Suzu no We wo Takarakani
 Narashi Mai Odore
 Mai Odore
 Utyu no Mai wo
 Mai Odore
 Utyu no Mai wo
 Ashi no Suzu no We wo Takarakani
 Narashi Mai Odore
 Taiko no Ne mo Naru Shiva Shiva Shiva Om
 Kodaiko mo Utau Hara Hara Hara Om
 Veena mo Kanaderu Sai Ram Sai Ram
 Mai Odore
 Utyu no Mai wo
 Mai Odore
 Utyu no Mai wo

Title: Ashraqat nafsi bi noorimin fuaadi
Lyrics:
Ashraqat nafsi bi noorimin fuaadi
Hinama radattu ya rabala ibaadi
Wantashat ruhi wasara damu auyajari
Ya Ilahi, khuz bi Qalbi lirrashaadi
Ya'Adheeman, Ya Ilahi (2x)
Ya Raheeman, Ya Ilahi
Ya'Adheema, Ya Ilahi
Meaning:
My soul is brightened by a light in my heart
When I praised God of mankind
And my soul is cheered up and the tears were flowing
Oh God! guide my heart to reason
In the tranquility of the night I pray during worshiping
While the black darkness is all around me
Oh Kind! Oh Most Merciful! Oh Most Forbearing!
Oh Kind! Your gifts are endless Oh All-Hearing! Oh Answerer! Oh Most Magnificent!
Oh Creator of the strong predatory animals! Guide me
Guide me to truth, God
I depend on your guidance today
Oh God of the universe! You are my aid
You are the refuge of man in the afterworld
Here I am God, asking your forgiveness
Forgive me and grant me my wish

Title: At this time of our devotion
Lyrics:
At this time of our devotion
Let there be no barriers
Cast them away, Lord Ganesha (2x)
Bless us with your loving grace
Oh Lord with the elephant face
May out hearts be filled with joy
Singing out in love for Sai
Bless us, bless us, Sai Ganesha (2x)

Title: At Thy Lotus Feet My Lord
Lyrics:
At Thy Lotus Feet, My Lord, What Bliss It Is
At They Lotus Feet, My Lord, How Sweet It Is
All The Pain That Is In My Heart, All The Sorrows In My Soul
Vanish And Turn Into A Rainbow, At Thy Lotus Feet

Title: At Your Feet Dear Lord We Pray
Lyrics:
At Your Feet Dear Lord We Pray
Grace Us With Your Love This Day
Sai Baba, Sai Baba, You Are Krishna, You Are Rama
Oh Baba, Oh Baba, You Are Mother, You Are Father
All Names, Every Form, All That Was And Will Be Born
(You Are) All Names Every Form All There Is Forever More
Songglossary: baba, krishna, more, ram, sai

Title: Atma Linga Sai
Lyrics:
Atma Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Amrutha Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Jyothir Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Netra Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Meaning: O Sathya Sai you in the form of Atma Linga (created by you from within) also in the form of Amrutha Linga (immortal symbol), Jyothir Linga (effulgent one) and Netra Linga (symbol with eyes).
Songglossary: amrutha, atma, jyoth, linga, nethra, sai, sathya

Title: Atma Lingam Bhajorey
Lyrics:
Atma Lingam Bhajorey Ati Adbhuta Lingam Bhajorey
Naga Lingam Navamani Lingam
Nabhi Kamala Udbhava Lingam
Eshwara Lingam Bhajorey Sayeeshwara (Partheeshwara) Lingam Bhajorey
Meaning: Sing in praise of the Atma Lingam, the auspicious and astonishing divine form of Lord Shiva, the Naga Lingam studded with nine precious stones that has emerged out of the navel of Shiva. Sing in praise of the Eshwara Lingam and Sayeeshwara Lingam.
Songglossary: adbhuta, ati, atma, bhajao, eshwar, kamala, linga, nabha, naga, navamani, partheeshwara, sayee, udbhava

Title: Atma Me Bas Jao Baba
Lyrics:
Atma Me Bas Jao Baba Atma Me Bas Jao Baba
Tum Bina Sab Mandir Hai Sune [ Atma Me ... ]
Paramatma Tum Sare Jagat Ke
Ram Rahim Tum Sare Jagat Ke
Sune Mana Me Vas Karo Tum
Ghar Ghar Me Bas Jao Baba (2)
Meaning: Baba, please reside in our empty heart; the temple is empty without you. You are the Lord of the Universe, Rama and Rahim. Please stay in our home.
Songglossary: atma, baba, basayi, bina, ghar, hai, jagat, jao, karo, ke, mana, mandir, param, rahim, ram, saarey, sab, tum, vasa

Title: Atma Ram Ananda Ram
Lyrics:
Atma Ram Ananda Ram
Adbhuta Ram Ayodhya Ram
Sita Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Sundara Ram Sugunabhi Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ram (3)
Meaning: Worship the wonderful form of Lord Rama, the resident of Ayodhya and who is indweller of our heart and who confers bliss. Chant the name of Ram and Sairam, the Lord of Sita and the virtuous one.
Songglossary: adbhuta, anand, atma, ayodhya, ram, sai, sathya, sita, suguna, sundara

Title: Atma Rama Ananda Naama
Lyrics:
Atma Rama Ananda Naama
Ananda Mohana Sri Parandhama [ Atma Rama ... ]
Mayabhi Rama Manasa Prema
Sundara Naama Sugunabhi Rama
Meaning: O Lord Rama! The indweller of hearts. Your form gives happiness, bliss and love. You are the embodiment of virtues who assumed an illusive form of the human being.
Songglossary: anand, atma, manasa, maya, mohan, naam, parandhama, prem, ram, sri, suguna, sundara

Title: Atma Rama Ananda Ramana
Lyrics:
Atma Rama Ananda Ramana
Achyutha Keshava Hari Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Vanditha Charana
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Nayana
Adi Narayana Anantha Shayana
Satchidananda Sathya ( Sai ) Narayana
