Meaning: O Lord Rama! You are indweller of hearts and you are the embodiment of bliss. Chant the names of Keshava, Narayana, Sai Narayana the remover of worldly fears. O Lotus eyed jewel of the Raghu dynasty, the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss, we bow down to your lotus feet.
Songglossary: achyutha, adi, anand, ananta, atma, bhava, bhaya, bhooshan, chara, harana, hari, kesha, narayana, nayan, raghu, rajeeva, ram, ramana, sai, satchidananda, sathya, shayana, vanditha

Title: Atmabhi Rama Ananda Rama
Lyrics:
Atmabhi Rama Ananda Rama
Sita Rama Sai Rama
Sundara Naama Hey Ghana Shyama
Radhey Shyama Sai Rama
Meaning: Chant the sweet names of Lord Rama, Ghana Shyama, Radhey Shyama, Sai Rama, the indweller of our hearts and embodiment of bliss.
Songglossary: anand, atmabhi, ghana, hey, naam, radha, ram, sai, sham, sita, sundara

Title: Avatarini Amba Bhaya Harini
Lyrics:
Avatarini Amba Bhaya Harini
Bhairavi Shankari Durga Bhavani [ Avatarini Amba ]
Bhaktha Jana Priya Tribhuvana Dharini
Bhagawathi Bharati Brahma Sanathani [ Bhairavi Shankari ]
Meaning: O universal mother you have descended in the form of Bhairavi, Shankari, Durga, Bhavani. You are the beloved of devotees and who supports the three worlds. We chant you as Bhagawathi, Bharati and the Brahma Sanathani (primordial goddess).
Songglossary: amba, avatar, bhagavathi, bhairavi, bhaktha, bharati, bhava, bhaya, brahma, dhari, durga, haarini, jana, priya, sanatana, shankari, tribhuvan

Title: Awaken from the dream
Lyrics:
Awaken from the dream, awaken my child,
 Listen to your heart, He's calling you
 Deep in the silence within your soul, listen to
 His voice, He's calling you
 Awaken to the bliss, awaken to the Love,
 Awaken to the light, He's calling you
 Come home, my child, come home to Me,
 Listen to His voice, He's calling you
 Awaken from the dream, awaken my child,
 Listen to your heart, He's calling you

Title: Ayodhya Ke Sita Ram
Lyrics:
Ayodhya Ke Sita Ram Brindavan Ke Radhey Shyam
Radhey Shyam Jaya Radhey Shyam
Radha Madhava Radhey Shyam
Sai Ram Jaya Sai Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the names of Sita Ram, the Lord of Ayodhya and Radhey Shyam who resides in Brindavan. Victory to Lord Sairam of Parthi.
Songglossary: ayodhya, brinda, jay, ke, madhava, purishwara, puttaparthi, radha, ram, sai, sham, sita

Title: Ayodhya Shiromani Dasharatha Ram
Lyrics:
Ayodhya Shiromani Dasharatha Ram
Saketa Ranjana Kaivalya Dhama [ Ayodhya Shiromani ... ]
Neeraja Lochana Sai Narayana
Bandha Vimochana Bhaktha Parayana
Prana Sakha Merey Prabhu Sai Rama [ Saketa Ranjana ]
Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lotus eyed Saketa Rama, the son of Dasharatha and the jewel in the crown of Ayodhya dynasty. Free us from the bondage of life and death as you are our dearest companion and our ultimate abode.
Songglossary: ayodhya, bandha, bhaktha, dasha, dhama, kaivalya, lochana, mera, narayana, neeraja, parayana, praan, prabhu, ram, ranjana, sai, saketa, sakha, shiromani, vimochana

Title: Ayodhya Vasi Ram
Lyrics:
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ayodhya Vasi Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Ram Jaya Jaya Janaki Jeevana Ram
Aranya Vasi Ram Aranya Vasi Ram [ Dasharatha Nandana ]
Ahalya Uddhara Ram Ahalya Uddhara Ram [ Dasharatha Nandana ]
Bhaktha Vatsala Ram Bhaktha Vatsala Ram [ Dasharatha Nandana ]
Meaning: Oh Ram, son of Dasharatha resident of Ayodhya the consort of Janaki. During your exile in the forest you redeemed Ahalya from her curse and you are the beloved of all devotees.
Songglossary: ahalya, aranya, ayodhya, bhaktha, dasha, janaki, jay, jeeva, nanda, ram, uddhara, vasi, vatsala

Title: Ayodhya Vasi Ram Hai
Lyrics:
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Hai Dwaraka Mey Aayey
Dwaraka Vasi Shyam Hai Shirdi Mey Aayey
Shirdi Vasi Shyam Hai Parthi Sathya Sai
Bolo Ram Sai Ram Bolo Sathya Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the name of Sathya Sai Ram, who is the same Lord who incarnated in Ayodhya as Ram, in Dwaraka as Shyam, in Shirdi as Lord Shirdi Sai and in Parthi as Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: aana, ayodhya, bolo, dwaraka, hai, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sathya, sham, shirdi, vasi

Title: Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ram Ram
Lyrics:
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ram Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Patitha Pavana Janaki Jeevana Sita Mohana Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ram Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Patitha Pavana Janaki Jeevana Sita Mohana Ram
Meaning: Chant the name of Rama, the Lord of Ayodhya, the Son of Dasharatha and the consort of Sita and whose name purifies the deprived.
Songglossary: ayodhya, dasha, janaki, jeeva, mohan, nanda, patitha, pavan, ram, sita, vasi

Title: Ayodhya Vihari Sri Rama Rama
Lyrics:
Ayodhya Vihari Sri Rama Rama Rama
Dwaraka Vihari Sri Krishna Krishna Krishna [ Ayodhya Vihari ... ]
Saptagiri Vihari Govinda Govinda
Nija Bhaktha Hrudaya Vihari Sri Sai Natha Deva
Meaning: Sing the glory of Rama who is the resident of Ayodhya, Krishna the resident of Dwaraka and Govinda the God of seven hills. O Lord Sai you revel in the hearts of devotees.
Songglossary: ayodhya, bhaktha, deva, dwaraka, govinda, hrudaya, krishna, natha, nija, ram, sai, sapta, sri, vihar

Title: Ayyappa Sharaname (3) Swami Ayyappa
Lyrics:
Ayyappa Sharaname (3) Swami Ayyappa Sharaname (2)
Sabarinayaka Shanthi Dayaka Ayyappa Sharaname Swami ...
... Ayyappa Sharaname
Parthi Nayaka Prashanti Dayaka Ayyappa Sharaname Swami ...
Ayyappa Sharaname
Meaning: Take refuge in Ayyappa, the Lord of Sabari mountain and Puttaparthi, who bestows supreme peace.
Songglossary: ayyappa, dayaka, nayaka, prasanthi, puttaparthi, sabari, shanthi, sharan, swami

Title: Baar Baar Prabhu Janam Liya
Lyrics:
Baar Baar Prabhu Janam Liya
Sri Madhusudhana Janam Liya [ Baar Baar ... ]
Kausalya Nandana Sri Raghu Ram
Devaki Nandana Hey Ghana Shyama
Eshwari Nandana Sai Bhagawan
Janam Liya Prabhu Sai Bhagawan
Narahari Narayana Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: O Lord Madhusudhana! You incarnated as the Lord Hari, Ghana Shyama, Narahari, Narayana, as the beloved son of Kausalya, Devaki and Mother Eshwaramba. Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Ghana Shyama and Sai.
Songglossary: baar-baar, bhagawan, devaki, eshwar, ghana, hey, janam, kausalya, ley, madhu, nanda, narahari, narayana, prabhu, raghu, ram, sai, sham, sri

Title: Baar Baar Tum Aao Sai
Lyrics:
Baar Baar Tum Aao Sai
Darshana Do Bhagawan (2)
Nithya Nirmala Nithyananda
Satchidananda Prabho
Darshana Do Bhagawan
Meaning: Welcome Oh Lord Sai! Grant us the Darshan of your ever pure and blissful form again and again.
Songglossary: aao, baar-baar, bhagawan, darsh, do, nirmala, nithya, prabhu, sai, satchidananda, tum

Title: Baba Aao Merey Keertan Mey
Lyrics:
Baba Aao Merey Keertan Mey
Antaryami Darsha Dikhao
Naiya Hamarey Paar Lagao [ Baba Aao ... ]
Antar Jyoth Jalao Sai
Jeevan Jyothi Tum Ho Sai
Meaning: Oh Beloved Baba! grant your Divine Darshan while we sing Your glory and help us cross the boat of life. Kindle the lamp of wisdom in our hearts just as you illuminated our lives.
Songglossary: aao, antar, baba, darsh, dikhao, hamarey, ho, jalao, jeeva, jyoth, keertan, lagao, mera, naiya, paar, sai, tum

Title: Baba Dil Mey Basey Raho
Lyrics:
Baba Dil Mey Basey Raho
Janam Janam Mey Saath Raho
Haath Na Chodo Anatha Natha
Saath Na Chodo Sai Prabho (Merey)
Terey Charan Mey Lelo Sai Prabho
Meaning: Baba, please install thee in our hearts, be with us for all births. Oh supreme Lord Sai! Do not leave our hands and deprive us from your grace and always place us at your lotus feet.
Songglossary: anath, baba, basayi, chara, chodo, dil, haath, janam, lelo, mera, na, natha, prabhu, raho, saath, sai, tera

Title: Baba Merey Parti Vihari
Lyrics:
Baba Merey Parti Vihari
Ham Sab Aye Hai Sharana Tumhari [ Baba Merey ... ]
Dukh Bhanjana Mera Sath Na Chodo
Dedo Darshana Asha Na Todo
Sunalo Vinati Hamari
Meaning: Baba, Lord of Parthi, please listen to our prayers. We all have taken refuge in You. Please destroy our sorrows, do not leave us or take away our hopes to Your darshan.
Songglossary: aao, asha, baba, bhanjana, chodo, darsh, do, dukh, hai, ham, hamarey, mera, na, puttaparthi, sab, sat, sharan, sunle, todo, tumhara, vihar, vinati

Title: Baba Sanbi no Uta ni Kitare
Lyrics:
Baba Sanbi no Uta ni Kitare
 Subete ni Yadoru Kami yo Kitare
 Rinne no Umi wo Watshi tamae
 Baba Sanbi no Uta ni Kitare
 Uchi Naru Hikari wo Tomosu Sai
 Kokoro ni Hikaru Anata wa Sai
GeneralComments: Sung to the tune of Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim.

Title: Baba Sathya Palana
Lyrics:
Baba Sathya Palana
Sai Sathya Palana
Shirdipuri Vasa Sai Sarvesha
He Parthipuri Vasa He Shirdipuri Vasa Sarvesha Sathya Palana (Baba)
Akhila Nivasa Jaya Hrishikesha
Mangala Kara He Pavana Purusha
Shirdipuri Vasa Sai Sarvesha
He Parthipuri Vasa He Shirdipuri Vasa Sarvesha Sathya Palana (Baba)
Meaning: Baba, You are the guardian of Truth, and the Lord of all. As the resident of Shirdi, Puttaparthi, Hrishikesh and the whole Universe. You are the Supreme Being who endows auspiciousness to all.
Songglossary: akhila, baba, hrishikesha, jay, kara, mangal, nivasa, paalaya, pavan, purusha, puttaparthi, sai, sarvesha, sathya, shirdi, vasa

Title: Baba will keep you in perfect peace
Lyrics:
Baba will keep you in perfect peace
 If you keep your mind stayed on Him
 Baba will keep you in perfect peace
 If you keep your mind stayed on Him (hold)
 When confusion all around, it won't get you down
 You will have Baba's Peace to surround you
 God will keep you, in perfect peace
 If you only keep your mind stayed on Him

Title: Baba, be my heart
Lyrics:
Baba, be my heart, Baba, be my goal,
 Baba, be my life, Baba, fill my soul,
 Baba, grant me freedom, Baba grant me peace,
 Baba, through your grace, You're my release

Title: Baba, my heart is singing
Lyrics:
Baba, my heart is singing to You, come and hear
 You dwell within me, yet I would see You
 Remove my darkness, and I shall be You(Baba)
 You are my soul's light, You are the Spirit
 You are the Spirit(2X)
 You are my Soul's light, You are the Spirit
 My heart is singing, please come and hear it
 My heart is singing, I know you hear it

Title: Bada Chitha Chora Brindavana Sanchara
Lyrics:
Bada Chitha Chora Brindavana Sanchara
Gopala Gopala Hey Murali Gopala
Govardhanodhara Gopala Bala
Gopi Manohara Radhey Gopala
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, who played in Brindavan, who lifted the Govardhana mountain and who captivated the hearts of Radha and the Gopis.
GeneralComments: English version : "O Lord Purify Me".
Songglossary: bada, bala, brindavana, chitha, chora, gopal, gopi, govardhanadhara, hey, manohar, murali, radha, sanchara

Title: Bada Chitha Chora Mana Mohan
Lyrics:
Bada Chitha Chora Mana Mohan
Mera Chitha Chora Jaganmohan
Ayodhya Ke Sita Ram
Brindavan Ke Radhey Shyam
Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
Parthi Ke Sathya Sai
Meaning: Chant the names of the Sita Ram - the Lord of Ayodhya, Radhey Shyam - the Lord of Brindavan, Sai Baba of Shirdi and Puttaparthi, the darling of every heart.
Songglossary: ayodhya, baba, bada, brinda, chitha, chora, jagan, ke, mana, mera, mohan, puttaparthi, radha, ram, sai, sathya, sham, shirdi, sita

Title: Bahut Diya Tune Anand Baba
Lyrics:
Bahut Diya Tune Anand Baba
Dukh Ko Sukh Kiya Jeevan Me Mera [ Bahut Diya ... ]
Tumne Mujhko Prema Sikhaya
Sathya Dharma Ka Raha Dikhaya
Man Mandir Me Deep Jalaya
Pavan Kiya Tune Jeevan Mera
Meaning: Baba, You gave me immense happiness and changed my life of sorrow into bliss. You taught me how to be loving and showed me path of truth and right living. You lit the flame of knowledge in me and made mu life holy.
Songglossary: anand, baba, bahut, deep, dharma, dikhao, diya, dukh, jalaya, jeeva, ka, karo, mana, mandir, mera, mujhe, pavan, prem, raha, sathya, sikha, sukh, tum

Title: Bala Gopal Jai Jai Sai Shyam
Lyrics:
Bala Gopal Jai Jai Sai Shyam
Prem Bharo Dil Mey Hamarey Sai Ram
Hamarey Sai Ram Badey Pyaarey Sai Ram [ Prem Bharo... ]
Hum Bhakthon Ke Tum Ek Sai Ram
Tumharey Jagat Mey Bada Pyaara Pyaara Naam
Sangh Raho Har Dum Hamarey Sai Ram
Sangh Raho Hamarey Sai Ram
Meaning: Victory to Sai Shyama, the Infant Gopala, our Beloved Lord. Saturate our hearts with Divine Love and be with us in every moment of our life. Your dear name and glory engulfs the entire world.
Songglossary: bada, badey, bala, bhakthon, bharo, dhum, dil, ek, gopal, hamarey, har, hum, jagat, jai, ke, mey, naam, prem, pyaara, raho, ram, sai, sangh, sham, tum, tumhara

Title: Bala Gopala ( Sai )
Lyrics:
Bala Gopala ( Sai )
Devaki Nandana Gopala [ Bala Gopala ... ]
Vasudeva Nandana Gopala
Yashoda Nandana Gopala
Nanda Gopala Ananda Gopala
Sai Gopala Sathya Sai Gopala
Meaning: Chant the names of Infant Gopala and Sai Gopala. Gopala is the dear son of Mother Devaki and Vasudeva, Mother Yashoda and Nanda and who confers bliss.
Songglossary: anand, bala, devaki, gopal, nanda, sai, sathya, vasudeva, yashoda

Title: Bandho Shri Guru Sadguru Charanam
Lyrics:
Bandho Shri Guru Sadguru Charanam
Shri Guru Charanam Sadguru Charanam [ Bandho Shri ... ]
Shri Sai Charanam Sadguru Charanam
Sab Dukha Haranam Sadguru Charanam
Meaning: Bow down at the feet of Sai, our true guru, who removes all sorrows and takes us across the ocean of worldly existence.
Songglossary: bandho, chara, dukh, guru, harana, sab, sadguru, sai, sri

Title: Bansidhara Kanhaiya
Lyrics:
Bansidhara Kanhaiya Ghana Shyama Sundara
Giridhari Gopa Bala Brindavana Vihara [ Bansidhara ... ]
Govinda Madhava Harey Madhusudhana Mukunda
Radhey ( Sai ) Govinda Radhey ( Sai ) Gopala Radhey ( Sai ) Govinda Radhey ( Sai )
Meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna - Govinda, Madhava, Madhusudhana, Mukunda, Sai Gopala, the one who plays the enchanting flute and who resides in Brindavan.
Songglossary: bala, bansi, brinda, ghana, giridhar, gopa, gopal, govinda, hari, kanha, madhava, madhu, mukunda, radha, sai, sham, sundara, vihar

Title: Bansidhari Krishna Murari
Lyrics:
Bansidhari Krishna Murari
Govardhana Giridhari Shourie
Patithodhari Paapa Viduri
Leela Nataka Sutradhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Meaning: Oh Krishna Murari, you are so enchanting with your flute. You saved your devotees by lifting the entire Govardhana Mountain. You are the redeemer of the down trodden and remover of their sins. You are the director of your divine play and who resides in Parthi.
Songglossary: bansi, giridhar, govardhan, krishna, leela, murare, nataka, paapa, patithodhara, puttaparthi, sai, shouri, sutra, vidhura, vihar

Title: Bar Bar Idhar Aao Sai
Lyrics:
Bar Bar Idhar Aao Sai
Darshana Do Bhagawan Darshana Do Bhagawan
Deena Dayala Param Krupala [ Darshana Do ... ]
Nithya Nirmala Nithyananda
Satchidananda Prabho Darshana Do Bhagawan
Meaning: Sai, please come here again and again. Let us see you, the all-merciful, ever-blissful, and eternal. Lord You are truth, consciousness, and bliss.
Songglossary: aao, bar, bhagawan, darsh, dayal, deen, do, idhar, krupalu, nirmala, nithya, param, prabhu, sai, satchidananda

Title: Be happy, I’m happy
Lyrics:
Be happy, I'm happy
 That's what our Lord says, this is what He says
 Don't worry, don't hurry
 Have no fear, 'cause Sathya Sai is here
 Pray that the whole world prospers
 Let all mankind be happy
 This is our Lord's special message
 (so) Be happy, I'm happy
 That's what our Lord says, this is what He says
 Don't worry, don't hurry
 Have no fear, 'cause Sathya Sai is here
 Pray that the whole world prospers
 Let all mankind be happy
 This is our Lord's special message
 
 Sung to the tune of Baba Aavo Merey Kirtan Mein

Title: Beautiful God Alleluia (3)
Lyrics:
Beautiful God, Hallelujah (3)
O-o-o-o-om
Perfect Love, Hallelujah
Divine Mother, Hallelujah
Heavenly Father, Hallelujah
O-o-o-om
Sweet Jesus, Hallelujah
Lord Buddha, Hallelujah
Beloved Satsang, Hallelujah
O-o-o-om
Sathya Sai Baba, Hallelujah (3)
Songglossary: baba, buddha, hallelujah, sai, sathya

Title: Beautiful Rama, beautiful Krishna
Lyrics:
Beautiful Rama, beautiful Krishna
 You've stolen this heart of mine
 Your will is the song of creation, Sai
 Teach us Your love song divine

Title: Beda Paar Karo Merey Sai
Lyrics:
Beda Paar Karo Merey Sai
Uddhar Karo Merey Baba [ Beda Paar ... ]
Allah Eshwar Sai Baba
Shirdi Baba Parthi Baba
Reham Nazar Karo Sai Baba
Daya Karo Sai Krupa Karo
Meaning: O Lord Sai! Uplift and help me to cross the ocean of life and death. You are Allah, Eshwar and Shirdi Baba. Shower your mercy, Compassion and Grace on us.
Songglossary: allah, baba, beda, daya, eshwar, karo, krupa, mera, nazar, paar, puttaparthi, reham, sai, shirdi, uddhaar

Title: Believe In Me
Lyrics:
Believe In Me I Will Never Leave You
Have Faith In Me I Am Always With You
Now Eternally
Love Is All That Is You
And You Are God, God Is You
You Are Me, And I Am You
Think Of Me, Think With Love
Love Is All That We Are Made Of
Focus On Me, Dont Let Your Mind Wander
Draw Strength From Me, I Am The Heart Within You
Now Eternally Love Is Flowing In You

Title: Beloved Baba Help me
Lyrics:
Beloved Baba, Help me be, Your perfect devotee
 Teach me to love all living things, and grant me sight to see,
 The Universe is one with You, all is Divinity
 There is no 'I', There is No 'You', There isn't even we
 There's only one, the holy one, of blessed Divinity
 Beloved Baba, Help me be, Your perfect devotee
 Be my food, Be my drink, Walk this life with me
 On the path to merge with You, Detachment is the Key
 When all of these, I have learned, forever will I be
 One with You, for all of time, the perfect devotee

Title: Beloved Baba, Thou hast come
Lyrics:
Beloved Baba, Thou hast come
 For the Celestial Light to shine
 In darkest corners of our hearts
 And fill us with Thy Love divine
 When ignorance, jealously, hate and pride
 Dissolve away into the air
 Then free at last we learn to see that
 God alone was ever there.
 So open now our sleeping eyes that
 Through these windows of the soul,
 Thy love may flow to show the way
 We all must go to reach the goal

Title: Bhagavaan Sathya Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Bhagavaan Sathya Sai Baba
 You are is this Presence in my heart
 You are this Light so shining, You are this Peace so silent
 (Sai) You are the One Who sets us free
 Baba, You open up the heart
 Baba, You purify the mind
 Bhagavaan Sathya Sai Baba
 You are the reason for this life
 You are this Love so soothing, You are this Bliss so gentle
 (Sai) You are the one who sets us free

Title: Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai let me be your message
Lyrics:
Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai let me be your message
 The time has come, two into one, let me become Your beautiful Light
 Sathya Sai I give to You, I give to You my essence
 Now give to me, let me be free, let my eyes see Your beautiful light
 Let me become Your beautiful light
 Give to me the deepest sight
 Banish darkness with your Might
 Unify Duality
 Sathya Sai let me be free
 Let me become your beautiful light

Title: Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai, my Lord Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai, my Lord Sathya Sai
 The light of my heart, Bhagavaan
 Creator and Preserver, blessed Mother, blessed Father
 The Light of heart, Sai Ram

Title: Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai, Poorna Avathaar
Lyrics:
Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai-- Poorna Avathaar
 Helping us awaken to the truth that we are
 God is all--surrounding, in every heart He dwells
 As Sathya Sai He comes to us, our darkness He dispels
 Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai--Poorna Avathaar
 I Am You and You are I--I and You are one
 This truth is lived and spoken to us by our Bhagavaan
 Sai Naatha Gurudeva, Parameshwara(3X)

Title: Bhagavaan, Lord of all creation
Lyrics:
Bhagavaan, Lord of all creation, Sundaram, beauteous Incarnation, Sai
 Ram divine love of my heart, come to me, come to me, be with me, my
 Lord Bhagavaan, Sri Sathya Sai Baba, Bhagavaan, Kali Yuga Avathaar,
 Bhagavaan, divine love of my heart, come to me.
 Hey Ghanashayam, hey Sai Ram, chant the names of the Lord.
 Sai, hold me in love, lift me above, bring me home to Thee
 Bhagavaan, Sai Ram, come to me, my Lord
 Hey Seetha Ram, hey Radhey Shyam, chant the names of the Lord.
 Swami, fill me with peace, grant me release, make me one with Thee
 Bhagavaan, Sai Ram, be with me, my Lord

Title: Bhagavaan, may we awaken to Thee
Lyrics:
Bhagavaan, may we awaken to Thee, O Love Divine
 The heart does not live for this world, it lives for Love
 So Bhagavaan may we awaken to Thee, O Love Divine
 Bhagavaan, what can we do on our own? Thy will alone is done
 So Bhagavaan, if we surrender to Thee, then our awakening comes
 Our mind have wandered so long without peace
 And peace will only come when we rest in Sai
 Precious Love from Sathya Sai
 Let us grow in this Love Divine

Title: Bhagavaan, You love us so
Lyrics:
Bhagavaan, You love us so,
 Much more than we can ever really know
 Bhagavaan, You're with us here and now
 To this wondrous Presence let us bow
 Sathya Sai is calling us today
 To live as God, and Love is the Way(2X)

Title: Bhagawan Baba Lord And Protector
Lyrics:
Bhagawan Baba, Lord And Protector
Grant Me Your Grace, Swami Show Me The Way [ Bhagawan ... ]
Mother And Father, You Are Everyting To Me [ Bhagawan ... ]
Grant That I Serve You In Everyone I See
May Your Holy Life Shine Forth Through Me (And)
Songglossary: baba, bhagawan, swami

Title: Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan
Sai Pran Sakha Bhagawan
Puttaparthipuri Bhagawan
Baba Bhakto Ke Bhagawan [ Bhagawan Bhagawan ... ]
Joota Jata Me Sab Jag Dhari
Nayan Vachan Me Premamrutha Dhari
Karacharano Me Kaivalya Dhari
Bhagawan Bhagawan
Meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is our friend for life. The Lord of His devotees, His speech and glance convey divine love and his hands bestow liberation.
Songglossary: baba, bhagawan, bhakthon, dhari, jagat, jata, joota, kaivalya, karacharano, ke, nayan, pran, premamrutha, puttaparthi, sab, sai, sakha, vachan

Title: Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhagawan Bhagawan [ Bhagawan Bhagawan ... ]
Aparadha Kshama Karo Sai Bhagawan
Araj Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhagawan
Meaning: We chant your name Bhagawan. Kindly listen to our earnest prayer and pardon us for our misdeeds.
Songglossary: aparadha, araj, bhagawan, karo, kshama, mera, ram, sai, suno

Title: Bhagawan Bhagawan Patitha Pavana Ram
Lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan Patitha Pavana Ram
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhagawan
Patitha Pavana Ram ( Sai )
Deena Dayalu Parama Krupalu
Raksha Karo Bhagawan
Sai Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Meaning: Oh Lord! Chanting Your name purifies the downtrodden. Oh Ever Merciful and Compassionate Lord! Kindly shower Your grace and protect us.
Songglossary: bhagawan, daya, dayal, deen, karo, krupa, param, patitha, pavan, raksha, ram, sai

Title: Bhagawan Bhagawan You’re The Moon
Lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan You're The Moon And The Stars And The Sun (2)
And On The Earth In Heaven And Beyond, Shines The Kingdom Of ...
... Sri Bhagawan
Bhagawan Ram Ram Bhagawan Ram Ram, Bolo Sri Sathya ...
... Sai Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan You're The Light Within Every One
And We All Shine Bright As The Sun, In The Kingdom Of Sai Bhagawan
Songglossary: bhagawan, bolo, ram, sai, sathya, sri, sun

Title: Bhagawan Krishna Namo
Lyrics:
Bhagawan Krishna Namo Bhagawan Krishna Namo
Patitha Pavana Patithodharana
Ramachandra Namo Bhagawan [ Bhagawan Krishna ]
Vishwadhara Jagat Pala Shiva Paramatma Namo
Kaalatheethaya Siddhi Roopaya Sathya Sai Namo
Antaryami Namo Bhagawan
Antaryami Namo (Sarva)
Meaning: Bow to Lord Krishna. Bow to Lord Rama, who is the saviour and uplifter of the afflicted and miserable. Bow to Sathya Sai who is above and beyond time and is the very embodiment of all Virtues and success. Bow to Lord Shiva who sustains the entire creation. Bow to Omniscient Lord.
Songglossary: antar, bhagawan, jagat, kaala, krishna, namo, pala, param, patitha, patithodhara, pavan, ramachandra, roopa, sai, sarva, sathya, shiva, siddhi, vishwa

Title: Bhagawan Sai Baba Tero Naam
Lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Baba Tero Naam
Koi Kahath Hai Allah Ho Akbar
Koi Kahath Hai Yesu Sai Shankara
Nanak Buddha Mahavir Digambara
Premavatara Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Baba Tero Naam
Meaning: O Lord, O Lord, You are Sai Baba, some call you Allah, Yesu, Shankara, Nanak, Buddha, Mahavir, Digambara. The avatar of God filled with love has the name of Sai Baba.
Songglossary: akbar, allah, baba, bhagawan, buddha, digambara, hai, ho, kahath, koi, mahavir, naam, nanak, premavatara, ram, sai, shankara, tera, yesu

Title: Bhagawan Shri Sathya Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Bhagawan, Shri Sathya Sai Baba Bhagawan, Kali Yuga Avatar ...
... Bhagawan Divine Love Of My Heart, Come To Me
Hey Ghana Shyam Hey Sai Ram Chant The Names Of The Lord
Sai Hold Me In Love, Lift Me Above, Bring Me Home To Thee
Bhagawan, Sai Ram, Come To Me My Lord
Hey Sita Ram, Hey Radhey Shyam, Chant The Names Of The Lord
Swami Fill Me With Peace, Grant Me Release, Make Me One With Thee
Bhagawan, Sai Ram, Be With Me My Lord
Songglossary: avatar, baba, bhagawan, ghana, hey, kali, make, radha, ram, sai, sathya, sham, sita, sri, swami, yuga

Title: Bhagawan Take Our Love
Lyrics:
Bhagawan, Take Our Love, Let It Flow To Thee
Take Our Hands Let Them Do Thy Work Constantly
Take Our Souls Let Them Merge In Thy Holy Light
Take Our Minds, Make Them Pure Perfect In They Sight
May Our Thoughts, Born Of Thee, Guided From Above
Make Us All, Bhagawan, Instruments Of Love
Songglossary: bhagawan, do, make

Title: Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Gopalam
Lyrics:
Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Gopalam
Paramanandam Shyama Bhajo
Nithyanandam Brahmanandam
Satchidanandam Shyama Bhajo
Prema Swaroopam Deena Dayalam
Poorna Avataram Sai Bhajo
Meaning: Oh Eternally blissful Lord Shyam, we sing and dwell on your divine names of Govinda and Gopala. You are the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss. You are the embodiment of love and compassion. We adore you as the Poorna Avatar.
Songglossary: avatar, bhaja, brahma, dayal, deen, gopal, govinda, nithya, param, poorna, prem, sai, satchidananda, sham, swaroopa

Title: Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam
Lyrics:
Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam
Govindam Bhajarey Manasa
Patitha Pavana Naama Partheesha Rama
Satatam Bhaja Bhajarey Manasa
Meaning: Oh mind! Chant the divine name of Govinda, Partheesha Rama incessantly, which redeems the down trodden.
Songglossary: bhaja, govinda, manasa, naam, partheeshwara, patitha, pavan, ram, satatam

Title: Bhaja Mana Dasharatha Baalam
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Dasharatha Baalam
Bhaja Mana Sita Manasa Lolam [ Bhaja Mana ]
Bhaja Mana Megha Shyamala Ramam
Bhaja Mana Pavana Taraka Naamam
Meaning: Oh mind, chant the name of Rama, the son of Dasharatha, which delights the mind of Sita. Also chant Rama's name whose complexion is like dark cloud and whose name when chanted protects us.
Songglossary: baala, bhaja, dasha, mana, manasa, megha, naam, pavan, ram, sham, sita, taraka

Title: Bhaja Mana Govinda Gopala
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Govinda Gopala
Govinda Gopala Gopala [ Bhaja Mana Govinda ]
Govinda Bolo Hari Gopala Bolo (2)
Govinda Gopala Gopala
Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship & chant the name of Govinda and Gopala.
Songglossary: bhaja, bolo, gopal, govinda, hari, mana

Title: Bhaja Mana Krishna Gopal
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Krishna Gopal
Bhaja Krishna Gopal Bhajo Bhajorey [ Bhaja Mana Krishna ]
Yadu Nanda Gopal Bhajorey
Mukunda Gopal Bhajorey
Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam Bhajarey (2)
Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship the name Krishna & Gopal. The son of Yadu dynasty bestows liberation to devotees. Chant the name Govinda.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, gopal, govinda, krishna, mana, mukunda, nanda, yadu

Title: Bhaja Mana Narayana Narayana Narayan
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Narayana Narayana Narayan
Lakshmi Narayana Narayana Narayan
Sathya Narayana Narayana Narayan
Sai Narayana Narayana Narayan
Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship Lord addressed as Narayana, Lakshmi Narayana, Sathya Narayana, Sai Narayana.
Songglossary: bhaja, lakshmi, mana, narayana, sai, sathya

Title: Bhaja Mana Panduranga Vittala
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Panduranga Vittala Jai Vittala
Purandara Vittala Vittala Jai Vittala [ Bhaja Mana Panduranga ... ]
Bhaja Mana Panduranga Vittala Jai Vittala
Purandara Vittala Vittala Jai Vittala
Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship Lord Panduranga Vittala, Lord Purandara Vittala. Victory to Vittala.
Songglossary: bhaja, jai, mana, panduranga, purandara, vittala

Title: Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyama Gopala
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyama Gopala
Murali Manohara Radhey Gopala [ Bhaja Mana Radhey ... ]
Nanda Kishora Natavara Lala (2)
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala
Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship Lord Radhey Shyam, beautiful with his flute, son of Nanda who resides in Parthi as Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, kishora, lal, mana, manohar, murali, nanda, natavara, puttaparthi, radha, sai, sham, vihar

Title: Bhaja Mana Ramam Sri Ramam
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Ramam Sri Ramam
Sundara Shyamala Komala Ramam [ Bhaja Mana Ramam ]
Bharata Lakshmana Pramudita Ramam
Maruti Sevitha Manobhi Ramam
Pankaja Lochana Pattabhi (Prabhu Sai) Ramam
Meaning: Oh Mind Chant Sri Rama, the Lord Rama whose servants were Bharata and Lakshmana, whose abode was Bhadrachala and who was the life of mother Janaki.
Songglossary: bhaja, bharata, komala, lakshmana, lochana, mana, manobhi, maruthi, pankaja, pattabhi, prabhu, pramudita, ram, sai, sevita, sham, sri, sundara

Title: Bhaja Mana Sai Gopalam
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Sai Gopalam
Bhaja Bhaja Goparipalam Varam [ Bhajo Mana Sai ... ]
Bhaja Mana Gopi Manasa Chandram
Bhaja Bhaja Brindavana Sancharam [ Bhaja Mana Sai ]
Bhaja Mana Gaana Kalaa Priya Devam
Bhaja Bhaja Partheeshwara Sayeesham
Meaning: Oh mind! chant Sai Gopalam who foster the cow herds and who grants boons and who delights Gopis mind. Chant the name Partheeshwara Sai Shyam who moves about in Brindavan and he is a Lord who loves art and music.
Songglossary: bhaja, brinda, chand, devam, gaan, gopal, goparipala, gopi, kala, mana, manasa, partheeshwara, priya, sai, sanchara, sayee, varam

Title: Bhaja Mana Shyama Sundara Giridhari
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Shyama Sundara Giridhari
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Dhaari [ Bhaja Mana Shyam ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Giridhara Naagara Giridhara Naagara [ Meera Ke ]
Murali Manohara Shyama Murari
Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the name of Shyama Sundar, the Lord who lifted the Govardhana mountain in his little finger, who wore the crown of peacock feather and ochre cloth. The Lord of Meera who played the enchanting Divine Flute Shyama Murari.
Songglossary: bhaja, dhaari, giridhar, ke, mana, manohar, meera, mora, mukuta, murali, murare, naagar, peetambara, prabhu, sham, sundara

Title: Bhaja Mana Shyama Sundara Giridhari
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Shyama Sundara Giridhari
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Dhari
Madhura Madhura Hey Muralidhari
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Govardhanadhara Shyama ( Sai ) Murari
Meaning: Oh Mind! chant Shyam Sundara Giridhari the Lord who lifted the Govardhana mountain and who wore the crown of peacock feather and ochre cloth and you are the Lord of Meera who played enchanting divine flute.
Songglossary: bhaja, dhari, giridhar, govardhan, hey, ke, madhu, mana, meera, mora, mukuta, murali, murare, naagar, peetambara, prabhu, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Bhaja Mana Sita Rama Harey
Lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Sita Rama Harey
Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyam Harey [ Bhaja Mana Sita Rama ... ]
Bhaja Mana Sai Rama Harey
Bhaja Mana Sai Krishna Harey
Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the name of Sita Ram, Radhey Shyam, Sai Ram and Sai Krishna, which gives immense happiness.
Songglossary: bhaja, hari, krishna, mana, radha, ram, sai, sham, sita

Title: Bhaja Manuva Bhaja Manuva Govinda
Lyrics:
Bhaja Manuva Bhaja Manuva Govinda Narayana
Govinda Narayana Gopala Narayana
Sai Govinda (Gopala) Narayana
Ramaya Narayana
Krishnaya Narayana
Sri Sai Narayana
Sai Govinda (Gopala) Narayana
Meaning: Oh mind! Chant the divine name of Gopala, Sai Govinda, Rama & Krishna - forms of Narayana.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, govinda, krishna, manuva, narayana, ramaya, sai, sri

Title: Bhaja Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Lyrics:
Bhaja Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Bhajorey Manasa Bhaja Ramam [ Bhaja Ramam ]
Kalyana Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Kodanda Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Pattabhi Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Pavana (Taraka) Naamam Bhaja Ramam
Meaning: Oh mind! Chant the name Rama, also the names Kalyana Ramam (auspiciousness), Kodanda Rama (Rama with bow), Pattabhi Rama (coronated). All the names makes us to cross the ocean of Samsara.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, kalyan, kodanda, manasa, naam, pattabhi, pavan, ram, taraka

Title: Bhaja Sai Natham Bhaja Sai
Lyrics:
Bhaja Sai Natham Bhaja Sai Natham Sai Natham Bhajarey Manasa
Parthi Pureesham Prashanthi Nilayam Parama Pavitram Paramatma Roopam
Shirdi Nivasam Shiva Sayeesham
Shantha Swabhavam Shankara Roopam [ Bhaja Sai Natham ]
Chinmayanandam Chithravathi Teeram Chitha Pariharam Chinni Sai Natham
Neela Mandaram Divya Swabhavam 
Dattatreyam Deiva Swaroopam [ Bhaja Sai Natham ]
Sathya Swaroopam Sadguru Charanam Samba Shivoham Sarthaka Namam
Jyothi Swaroopam Preeti Swabhavam Parthi Nivasam Paapa Vinasham
Meaning: O mind! Chant the name of Sai Natham who is the sacred form of supreme Lord residing at Prashanthi Nilayam. Also he resides in Shirdi as Shiva Sai. He is the embodiment of peace, auspiciousness and bliss, dwelling at the shores of Chitravathi river sanctifying us. He is Lord Dattatreya. His form is Truth and the Sadguru under whose lotus feet let us reside. Being Resident of Parthi his form is effulgent, lovable and, which destroys sins.
Songglossary: bhaja, chara, chinmaya, chinni, chitha, chithravathi, datta, divya, jyoth, manasa, manda, namam, natha, neela, nilaya, nivasa, paapa, param, pariharam, pavitra, prashanthi, prem, pureesha, puttaparthi, roopa, sadguru, sai, samba, sathya, sayee, shankara, shantha, shirdi, shiva, shivoham, swabhavam, swaroopa, teera, vinasha

Title: Bhaja Sai Natham Devadi Devam
Lyrics:
Bhaja Sai Natham Devadi Devam
Devadi Devam Shritha Jana Paalam [ Bhaja Sai ]
Parama Pavitram Pavana Roopam
Mangala Dayaka Murthy Swaroopam
Janana Marana Vimochaka Roopam
Sri Sai Sai Natham Ananda Roopam
Sathya Sai Natham Sadananda Roopam
Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Natham who is God of gods protecting his devotees. His form is highly sacred and divine granting auspiciousness. His form redeems one from the cycle of birth and death. Chant again the blissful form of Sai.
Songglossary: anand, bhaja, dayaka, devadi, devam, jana, janam, mangal, maran, murthy, natha, paalam, param, pavan, pavitra, roopa, sadana, sai, sathya, shritha, sri, swaroopa, vimochaka

Title: Bhaja Sri Krishnam
Lyrics:
Bhaja Sri Krishnam Bhaja Sri Krishnam
Sri Krishnam Bhaja Paramodharam
Vasudeva Sutham Devaki Vinutam
Naaga Alankruta Yamuna Salilam
Gaana Vilolam Yadu Kula Baalam
Govardhanadhara Tulasi Maalam
Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Krishna, the supreme redeemer, the son of Devaki and Vasudeva dancing on the head of Kalinga serpent at Yamuna river playing the enchanting flute. He is the star of Yadu dynasty who lifted the Govardhana mountain who is adorned with the garland of Tulasi.
Songglossary: alankruta, baala, bhaja, devaki, gaan, govardhan, krishna, kula, naga, param, salilam, sri, sutha, tulasi, vasudeva, vilola, vinuta, yadu, yamuna

Title: Bhajan Karo Manuva Govinda Harey
Lyrics:
Bhajan Karo Manuva Govinda Harey
Govinda Murari Gopala Murari [ Bhajan Karo ... ]
Mathura Natha Hey Giridhari
Radha Madhava Hey Giridhari (2)
Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship Lord Govinda, Murari, Gopala, the Lord of Mathura, Giridhari, the Lord of Radha.
Songglossary: bhaja, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, hey, karo, madhava, manuva, mathura, murare, natha, radha

Title: Bhajarey Guru Natham Manasa Bhajorey
Lyrics:
Bhajarey Guru Natham Manasa Bhajorey Sai Natham
Bhajo Sayeesham Parthi Nivasam
Bhajo Brindavana Gokula Baalam
Meaning: Oh Mind worship Guru Natham who is also Sai Natham the supreme Lord of Parthi. Chant the name of Gokulabala of Brindavan.
Songglossary: baala, bhaja, bhajao, brinda, gokul, guru, manasa, natha, nivasa, puttaparthi, sai, sayee

Title: Bhajo Badri Narayanam
Lyrics:
Bhajo Badri Narayanam
Bhajo Parthi Narayanam
Bhajo Shirdi Narayanam
Bhajo Sai Narayanam
Sathya Sai Narayanam
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Badri Narayana, Parthi Narayana, Shirdi Narayana, Sai Narayana and Sathya Sai Narayana.
Songglossary: badri, bhaja, narayana, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, shirdi

Title: Bhajo Bhajo Ram Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Bhajo Bhajo Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Bhajo Bhajo Shyam Sai Ghana Shyam [ Bhajo Bhajo ... ]
Kali Yug Ke Avatar
Jagadodhara Sai Bhagawan
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram ( Sai Ram )
Meaning: Worship Lord Sai Bhagawan, Who has incarnated in the Kali Age to uplift humanity and lead the fallen to deliverance.
Songglossary: avatar, bhagawan, bhaja, ghana, jagadodhara, kali, ke, patitha, pavan, ram, sai, sathya, sham, sita, yuga

Title: Bhajo Bhajo Sita Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajo Bhajo Sita Ram
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Ram [ Bhajo Bhajo ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Kausalya Tanaya Ram
Janaki Jeevana Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram [ Sita Ram Sita Ram ]
Meaning: Worship Lord Sita Ram, Lord Rama the son of Dasharatha, Lord Rama who killed the ten headed Ravana, uplifted humanity and lead the fallen to deliverance.
Songglossary: bhaja, dasha, janaki, jeeva, kausalya, nanda, patitha, pavan, ram, sita, tanaya

Title: Bhajo Bhajo Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Lyrics:
Bhajo Bhajo Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Pandari Natha Panduranga Bhajo Mana Vittala [ Bhajo Bhajo ... ]
Partheeshwara Sai Natha Vittala
Parameshwara Sathya Sai Vittala
Rakumayi Vittala Ranga Sai Vittala
Meaning: Worship Lord Vittala of Pandharpur, Sai Vittala of Parthi who is the supreme Lord of the Universe and Lord of Rakumayi.
Songglossary: bhaja, mana, natha, pandari, pandu, param, partheeshwara, rakumayi, ranga, sai, sathya, vittala

Title: Bhajo Gananayaka Gajavadana
Lyrics:
Bhajo Gananayaka Gajavadana
Mangala Dayaka Shubha Charana [ Bhajo Gananayaka ... ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Shiva Nandana
Ananda Dayaka Chitha Chandana
Buddhi Pradayaka Jaga Vandana
Meaning: Worship the Elephant-faced Lord Ganesh, Son of Lord Shiva. He confers auspiciousness, liberation, bliss and Intelligence.
Songglossary: anand, bhaja, buddhi, chand, chara, chitha, dayaka, gajamukha, gananayaka, jagat, mangal, nandana, pradayaka, shiva, shubh, siddhi, vandana, vinayaka

Title: Bhajo Ghana Shyam Bhajo Sita Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajo Ghana Shyam Bhajo Sita Ram Bhajo Sathya Sai Ram
Bhajo Ghana Shyam Bhajo Radhey Radhey Shyama Bhajo
Murali Manohara Sai Ghana Shyam
Mata Pitha Guru Deva Brahma Vishnu Mahadeva
Mata Pitha Guru Deva Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Meaning: Worship Lord Krishna, Lord Sai Ram, Lord Ram the Lord of Sita. O Lord Sai, Oh Enchanting Divine Flute Player! You are Father, Mother, Guru, Brahma Vishnu and Lord of Lords.
Songglossary: bhaja, brahma, deva, ghana, guru, mahadev, manohar, mata, murali, pitha, radha, ram, sai, sathya, sham, sita, vishnu

Title: Bhajo Ghana Shyama Bhajo Murali
Lyrics:
Bhajo Ghana Shyama Bhajo Murali Gopala Bhajo
Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Radhey
Giridhara Gopala Mathura Natha
Kamala Nayana Hey Kaivalya Dhama [ Nanda Ke ]
Meaning: Worship Ghana Shyam, Gopala the enchanting Divine Flute Player, the son of Nanda, the Gopala who lifted the mountain and who is the Lord of Mathura the lotus eyed Gopala.
Songglossary: bhaja, dhama, ghana, giridhar, gopal, hey, kaivalya, kamala, ke, lal, mathura, murali, nanda, natha, nayan, radha, sham

Title: Bhajo Ghana Shyama Radhey Shyam
Lyrics:
Bhajo Ghana Shyama Radhey Shyam
Nayanabhi Ram Natavara Shyam [ Bhajo Ghana ]
Mukunda Madhava Murahara Shyam
Govinda Gopala Giridhara Shyam
Kunja Vihari Sundara Shyam
Sai Murari Sundara Shyam
Meaning: Worship Ghana Shyam, Radhey Shyam, Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda, Gopala, Giridhara, Sai Murari.
Songglossary: bhaja, ghana, giridhar, gopal, govinda, kunja, madhava, mukunda, murahara, murare, natavara, nayan, radha, ram, sai, sham, sundara, vihar

Title: Bhajo Madhura Hari Naam Nirantara
Lyrics:
Bhajo Madhura Hari Naam Nirantara Bhajo Madhura Hari Naam
Sarala Bhaav Se Sai Bhajo
Madhura Bhaav Se Baba Bhajo
Hari Hi Sukh Hai Hari Hi Shanthi
Hari Prashanthi Nivasi Ram
Meaning: Worship and recite forever the enchanting and sweet name of Lord Hari. There is no Happiness and peace without chanting the sweet name of the Lord Sai, the resident of Prashanthi Nilayam, the abode of everlasting peace.
Songglossary: baba, bhaav, bhaja, hai, hari, madhu, naam, nirantara, nivasi, prashanthi, ram, sai, sarala, se, shanthi, sukh

Title: Bhajo Mana Bhajo Rama Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajo Mana Bhajo Rama Ram
Sri Ram Sri Rama Ram [ Bhajo Mana Bhajo ... ]
Bhajo Bhajo Mana Baba Naam
Bhajo Bhajo Sathya Sai Naam
Rama Rama Rama Ram ( Sai )
Meaning: O Lord! Chant the name of the Lord Rama and worship Lord Sai.
Songglossary: baba, bhaja, mana, naam, ram, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Bhajo Mana Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajo Mana Ram Bhajo Mana Ram
Panduranga Sri Ranga Bhajo Mana Ram
Bhajo Mana Madhava Bhajo Mana Keshava
Bhajo Mana Yadava Bhajo Mana Ram [ Panduranga Sri ]
Bhajo Mana Mukunda Bhajo Mana Govinda
Bhajo Mana Ananda Bhajo Mana Ram [ Panduranga Sri ]
Meaning: Worship and Chant Ram, Panduranga, Madhava, Keshava, Mukunda, Govinda.
Songglossary: anand, bhaja, govinda, kesha, madhava, mana, mukunda, pandu, ram, ranga, sri, yadava

Title: Bhajo Mana Ram Bhajo Mana
Lyrics:
Bhajo Mana Ram Bhajo Mana Ram
Bhajorey Sai Ram Ram Ram
Mangala Naama Bhajorey Manuva
Mayi Sita Ram Ram Ram
Meaning: O Mind! Chant the auspiciousness name of Lord Ram and Lord Sai Ram. Worship Lord Ram, the Lord of Mother Sita.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, ma, mana, mangal, manuva, naam, ram, sai, sita

Title: Bhajo Mana Sita Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajo Mana Sita Ram
Bhajo Mana Sri Raghu Rama Sai Ram [ Bhajo Mana Sita ... ]
Bhajorey Manasa Bhajo Sai Ram
Bhajo Bhajo Parthi (Shirdi) Baba Naam (Bhajo)
Meaning: Oh Mind! Meditate & sing the Glory of Sita & Rama, Sing the name of Rama who is from the Raghu dynasty & verily Sairam, O mind repeat the name Of Sai ram, O mind sing the Name who is the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: baba, bhaja, bhajao, mana, manasa, naam, puttaparthi, raghu, ram, sai, shirdi, sita, sri

Title: Bhajo Manuva Bhajo Manuva Govinda
Lyrics:
Bhajo Manuva Bhajo Manuva Govinda Narayana
Govinda Narayana Gopala Narayana
Sai Gopala Narayana [ Bhajo Manuva ... ]
Ramaya Narayana
Krishnaya Narayana
Shri Sai Narayana [ Sai Gopala ... ]
Meaning: O mind, chant the different names of lord Sai: Govinda, Narayana, Rama and Krishna.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, govinda, krishna, manuva, narayana, ramaya, sai, sri

Title: Bhajo Radhey Govinda Bhajo Shyama
Lyrics:
Bhajo Radhey Govinda Bhajo Shyama Gopal
Shyama Gopal Bhajo Murali Gopal [ Bhajo Radhey ]
Keshava Narahari Shyama Gopal
Madhava Murahara Murali Gopal
Meaning: Worship by chanting the many names of the Lord Radhey Govinda, Gopala, Murahara, Shyama, Keshava and Madhava.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, govinda, kesha, madhava, murahara, murali, narahari, radha, sham

Title: Bhajo Sita Ram Bhajo Radhey Shyam
Lyrics:
Bhajo Sita Ram Bhajo Radhey Shyam
Govinda Gopala Sai Harey Ram [ Bhajo Sita Ram ... ]
Keshava Madhava Radha Vallabha
Varada Narayana Nayanabhi Ram [ Govinda Gopala ]
Meaning: Worship the Lord of Sita, Lord Rama. Worship the Lord of Radha, Lord Shyama. Chant the names of the Lord Govinda, Gopala, Sai, Keshava Madhava and Narayana who confers boons.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, govinda, hari, kesha, madhava, narayana, nayan, radha, ram, sai, sham, sita, vallabha, varada

Title: Bhajore Manasa Sai Charanam
Lyrics:
Bhajore Manasa Sai Charanam
Pavana Taraka Sai Charanam
Nirmala Nishchala Nirupama Charanam
Adi Ananta Sai Charanam
Bhakthi Mukti Pradayaka Charanam
Meaning: Chant Sai's name and contemplate on Sai's feet that save and protect the afflicted. The incomparable, pure, unchanging and the eternal feet of Sai endow one with devotion and help attain liberation.
Songglossary: adi, ananta, bhajao, bhakthi, chara, manasa, mukti, nirmala, nirupama, nischala, pavan, pradayaka, sai, taraka

Title: Bhajore Manuva Bhajo Hari Nam
Lyrics:
Bhajore Manuva Bhajo Hari Nam
Bhajo Ghana Shyam Nam Bhajo Radhey Shyam [ Bhajore Manuva.. ]
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Bolo Sai Raja Ram
Govinda Gopala Bolo Bhajo Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the names of Hari, the dark-complexioned Krishna, Rama, Govinda, Gopala and Sai Ram.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, bolo, ghana, gopal, govinda, hari, krishna, manuva, nam, radha, raja, ram, sai, sham

Title: Bhajorey Bhai Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhai Sai Ram
Sai Sab Ka Hai Bhagawan [ Bhajorey Bhai ... ]
Ram Hi Sai Krishna Hi Sai
Yuga Avatara Narayana Sai [ Sai Sab Ka ]
Meaning: O Mankind! Chant the name Sai Ram who is the Lord of all. He is Sai Ram, Sai Krishna, Sai Narayana descended in Kali Yuga for the good.
Songglossary: avatar, bhagawan, bhai, bhajao, hai, ka, krishna, narayana, ram, sab, sai, yuga

Title: Bhajorey Bhai Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhai Sai Ram
Parthi Pureesha Sai Ram [ Bhajorey Bhai ... ]
Dwarakamayi Sai Ram
Sada Sukha Dayi Sai Ram
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureesha Sai Ram
Meaning: Worship Lord Sai Ram, the Lord of Puttaparthi, Dwaraka and Shirdi. He is always granting happiness to all.
Songglossary: bhai, bhajao, dayi, dwaraka, pureesha, puttaparthi, ram, sada, sai, shirdi, sukh

Title: Bhajorey Bhajo Sada Durga Bhavani
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhajo Sada Durga Bhavani
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjani Sai Bhavani [ Bhajorey Bhajo ... ]
Mahishasura Mardhini Bhavani
Daya Sagari Hey Jagat Janani
Meaning: Always worship Mother Durga, Bhavani. She is the destroyer of the fear of the cycle of birth and death. She is the slayer of the demon Mahishasura. O Mother of the Universe! You are full of mercy.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, daya, durga, hey, jagat, janani, mahishasura, mardini, sada, sagar, sai

Title: Bhajorey Bhajo Sai Harey Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhajo Sai Harey Ram
Govinda Gopala Sai Harey Ram
Madhava Mohana Sai Harey Ram (Hey) [ Bhajorey Bhajo ... ]
Sri Madhusudhana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Har Ek Prem Anand Se Bolo Ram Harey Ram
Govinda Gopala Sai Harey Ram [ Madhava Mohana ]
Meaning: O Mind, Chant Sai Ram protect and save us, Lord Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Mohana, Madhusudhana, destroyer of fear and bestower of Love and Joy, protect and save us.
Songglossary: anand, bhaja, bhajao, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, bolo, ek, gopal, govinda, hara, hari, hey, madhava, madhu, mohan, prem, ram, sai, se, sri

Title: Bhajorey Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
Buddhi Pradayaka Paapa Vinashaka
Vighnesham Bhajorey
Abhaya Pradayaka Ananda Dayaka
Shiva Nandanam Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
Meaning: Chant the name Gananatham (elephant headed god) the son of Shiva who bestows intellect, destroys sins and removes obstacles, protects from fear and grants joy and happiness.
Songglossary: abhaya, anand, bhajao, buddhi, dayaka, gananatha, nanda, paapa, pradayaka, shiva, vighnesha, vinasha

Title: Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Sri Guru Charanam Pranamamyaham
Sadguru Charanam Pranamamyaham [ Bhajorey ]
Sri Guru Charanam Sada Smarami
Sadguru Charanam Sada Bhajami
Sai Guru Charanam Sada Namami [ Sri Guru ]
Meaning: I worship and bow at the lotus feet of Sai Sadguru and always repeat his name mentally.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, chara, guru, namam, pranamamyaham, sada, sadguru, sai, smaran, sri

Title: Bhajorey Manasa Gananatham
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manasa Gananatham
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayakam [ Bhajorey Manasa ... ]
Buddhi Pradayaka Gajananam
Bhava Bhaya Nashaka Vinayakam
Meaning: O mind! adore Ganapathi (elephant headed god) who is leaderless, who bestows intellect, destroys the fear of worldly miseries.
Songglossary: bhajao, bhava, bhaya, buddhi, gajamukha, gananatha, manasa, nasha, pradayaka, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Bhajorey Manasa Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manasa Sai Ram
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Bhagawan
Eshwar Allah Terey Naam
Yesu Buddha Bhi Terey Naam
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwara Sai Ram
Meaning: O mind! worship and chant Sai Ram the Lord of Parthi Puri and Shirdi and chant his other divine names Eshwar, Allah, Yesu, Buddha.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, bhajao, bhi, buddha, eshwar, ke, manasa, naam, puri, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai, shirdi, tera, yesu

Title: Bhajorey Manuva Baba Naam
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Baba Naam
Bhaktha Janon Ke Bhagawan [ Bhajorey Manuva ... ]
Prema Pradayaka Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan [ Prema Pradayaka ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Bhagawan
Meaning: O Mind! Worship and chant the name of Lord Sai baba, the Beloved Lord of devotees and the Lord of Parthi. He always showers love on all.
Songglossary: baba, bhagawan, bhajao, bhaktha, jana, ke, manuva, naam, pradayaka, prem, purishwara, puttaparthi

Title: Bhajorey Manuva Sadguru Deva
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Sadguru Deva
Parama Krupalu Sai Mahadeva
Nis Din Dhyaan Karoon Main Tera
Janam Janam Ka Mitey Andhera
Parabrahma Parameshwara Roopa (Deva) [ Parama Krupalu ]
Meaning: O mind chant and worship Sai Mahadeva who is supreme God and preceptor. From the day I started meditating on you the ignorance accumulated since several birth is vanished. Also you are the supreme God with form and formless.
Songglossary: andhera, bhajao, deva, dhyaan, din, janam, ka, karoon, krupa, mahadev, manuva, mitey, nis, parabrahma, param, roopa, sadguru, sai, tera

Title: Bhajorey Manuva Sai Gopala
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Sai Gopala
Sai Gopala Radhey Nandalala [ Bhajorey ... ]
Akhileshwara Ko Abhinandana Hai
Sai Natha Morey Tana Mana Dhana Hai
Meaning: Oh mind adore Sai Gopala who is dearest to Radhey. You are the Sai Natha the supreme God of universe. Salutation unto you and my body, mind and money is entirely yours.
Songglossary: abhinandana, akhileshwara, bhajao, dhana, gopal, hai, mana, manuva, morey, nanda, natha, radha, sai, tanaya

Title: Bhajorey Manuva Sai Naamam
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Sai Naamam
Parthi Nivasam Pankaja Netram [ Bhajorey ... ]
Prema Swaroopam Sayeeshwaram
Hrudaya Nivasam Sayeeshwaram
Shirdi Pureesham Sayeeshwaram
Poornavataram Sayeeshwaram (Pari)
Meaning: Oh mind! chant the divine name Sai having eyes like lotus residing in Parthi. He is Sayeeshwara the embodiment of love reveling in our hearts and resident of Shirdi. He has descended in Parthi with full power of Godhead.
Songglossary: bhajao, hrudaya, manuva, naam, netram, nivasa, pankaja, poorna, prem, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai, sayee, shirdi, swaroopa

Title: Bhajorey Manuva Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Manuva Sai Ram
Bhaktha Janon Ke Bhagawan Bhagawan [ Bhajorey Manuva ... ]
Paapa Vinashaka Sai Naam
Pavana Naam Sai Naam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram [ Pavana Naam ]
Shirdi Parthi Shiva Naam Hari Naam
Meaning: Oh mind! Chant the name Sai Ram the supreme God dear to his devotees. The sacred name Sai Ram destroys sins of devotees and elevates them to divinity. Also you are Shiva, Hari of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhajao, bhaktha, hari, jana, ke, manuva, naam, paapa, pavan, puttaparthi, ram, sai, shirdi, shiva, vinasha

Title: Bhajorey Rama Charan Satatam Bhajorey
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Rama Charan Satatam Bhajorey Rama Charan
Bhajorey Janaki Jeevana Ramam
Bhajorey Ramam Bhadrachala Ramam
Bhajorey Pavana Taraka Naamam
Bhajorey Sri Rama Ramethi Ramam
Meaning: Constantly chant and pray to the Lotus feet of Lord Rama. Pray to the Lord of Janaki, the resident of Bhadrachala, the sacred and pious name of Lord Rama.
Songglossary: bhadrachala, bhajao, chara, janaki, jeeva, naam, pavan, ram, ramethi, satatam, sri, taraka

Title: Bhajorey Sada Bhajo Rama Krishna
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Sada Bhajo Rama Krishna Govinda
Bhajo Hari Deena Bandhu Krishna Rama Govinda
Bhajorey Anatha Natha Sai Rama Govinda [ Bhajo Hari ]
Meaning: Always chant the name of Lord Ram, Krishna Govinda and Sai Ram. The Lord's name support and shelter the meek and he is the friend of the weak.
Songglossary: anath, bandhava, bhaja, bhajao, deen, govinda, hari, krishna, natha, ram, sada, sai

Title: Bhajorey Sada Sai Naamam
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Sada Sai Naamam
Pavana Naamam Partheeshwara Naamam
Ishta Pradayaka Naamam
Mruthyu Sanjeevana Naamam
Sathya Sayeeshwara Naamam (Bhajorey)
Meaning: Chant all the time the name of Sai the Lord of Parthi who sanctifies us and whose name works as medicine to cross the cycle of Birth the death. Chant the name Sathya Sayeeshwara.
Songglossary: bhajao, ishta, mruthyu, naam, partheeshwara, pavan, pradayaka, sada, sai, sanjeevana, sathya, sayee

Title: Bhajorey Sadguru Sai Charanam
Lyrics:
Bhajorey Sadguru Sai Charanam
Pavana Charanam Padmadala Charanam [ Bhajorey Sadguru ... ]
Mukti Dayaka Mohana Charanam
Paapa Vinashaka Partheesha Charanam
Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship the Lotus Feet of Sadguru Sai, the sacred and beautiful Feet of Lord Sai, which takes you to liberation and destroys all sin.
Songglossary: bhajao, chara, dayaka, mohan, mukti, paapa, padma, partheeshwara, pavan, sadguru, sai, vinasha

Title: Bhaktha Jana Lola Sharanam Ayyappa
Lyrics:
Bhaktha Jana Lola Sharanam Ayyappa
Mohini Bala Sharanam Ayyappa [ Bhaktha Jana ]
Pampa Teera Vasa Sharanam Ayyappa
Parthi Puri Vasa Sharanam Ayyappa
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa
Meaning: I surrender to you Ayyappa the beloved of devotees and son of Mohini dwelling at shores of Pampa river. You are also Sai Baba of Parthi. O lord, I bow to you.
Songglossary: ayyappa, bala, bhaktha, jana, lola, mohan, pampa, puri, puttaparthi, sharan, swami, teera, vasa

Title: Bhaktha Vatsala Tero Naam O
Lyrics:
Bhaktha Vatsala Tero Naam O Sai
Dukha Bhanjana Tero Naam O Sai
Tum Sangh Baandhi Prem Ki Dori
Sumiran Karoon Tero Naam O Sai
Patithodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Partheeshwara Sai Ram
Meaning: Oh Sai the Lord of Parthi we chant your name, which is loved by your devotees, destroys their miseries. You bind everything in universe by chord of love. We chant your name mentally all the time and you are up lifter of downtrodden and praised (through bhajans) by your devotees.
Songglossary: baandhi, bhaktha, bhanjana, dori, dukh, karoon, naam, parayana, partheeshwara, patithodhara, prem, ram, sai, sangh, sumira, tera, tum, vatsala

Title: Bhakthon Ne Hai Aaj Pukara
Lyrics:
Bhakthon Ne Hai Aaj Pukara
Hum Ne Pukara Baba Sab Ne Pukara
Deejo Deejo Hum Ko Sahara
Aana Hi Padega Baba Aana Hi Padega
Shirdi Se Aao Ya Parthi Se Aao
Mathura Se Aao Ya Ayodhya Se Aao
Mecca Se Aao Ya Madina Se Aao
O Merey Maulah O Merey Sai Tu Kahin Se Bhi Aao [ Aana Hi ]
Meaning: Oh Baba I personally appeal and all devotees also appeal you earnestly to grant us your company and all the good things you have. You have to come necessarily from wherever you are from Shirdi, Parthi, Mathura, Ayodhya, Mecca and Medina.
Songglossary: aaj, aana, aao, ayodhya, baba, bhakthon, bhi, deejo, hai, hum, kahin, madina, mathura, maulah, mecca, mera, padega, pukar, puttaparthi, sab, sahara, sai, se, shirdi, tum, ya

Title: Bhasma Bhooshitanga Sai Chandrashekara
Lyrics:
Bhasma Bhooshitanga Sai Chandrashekara
Phaala Netra Shooladhari Sai Shankara [ Bhasma Bhooshitanga ... ]
Saama Gaana Priyakara Sai Shankara
Hara Hara Hara Shiva Shambho Natana Shekara
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Sai Shankara
Sai Shankara Sathya Sai Shankara
Meaning: The charming Lord Sai who wears sacred ashes all over his body and decorates the moon on his head. Sai Shankara who has a third spiritual eye on his forehead and who holds the Trident. O Lover of the Saama Gaana! O charming One! O King among the dancers, Virtuous persons adore and worship thee O Parthi Sai Shankara.
Songglossary: bhasma, bhooshita, chand, deva, gaan, hara, natana, nethra, paalaya, priya, puttaparthi, sai, sama, sathya, shambho, shankara, shekara, shiva, shoola, vasa

Title: Bhasma Vibhushitha Bhavani Shankara
Lyrics:
Bhasma Vibhushitha Bhavani Shankara
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Bhola Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Samba Shiva
Hara Hara Shankara Sai Shiva
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
Meaning: Worship Lord Shankara, the Lord of Bhavani, who has sacred ashes smeared all over the body. The easy to please Lord Shankara destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death. Chant the mantra, Hara Hara Shankara Sai Shiva, Om Namah Shivaya.
Songglossary: bhasma, bhava, bhaya, bhola, bushan, hara, namah, nasha, om, sai, samba, shankara, shiva

Title: Bhasmabhisheka Maheshwara
Lyrics:
Bhasmabhisheka Maheshwara
Bhasma Vibhushitha Sundara
Hara Om Hara Om Haalaahala Dhara
Hara Hara Hara Hara Hey Shiva Shankara
Natavara Shashi Dhara Gowri Manohara
Chandrashekara Jatadhara
Meaning: Worship the Lord Maheshwara who is bathed and smeared with sacred ashes all over the body looking beautiful. Oh Shiva Shankara you drank Haalaa-hala (poison) to save troubled world. You are the consort of Gowri who danced decorating with moon on head with huge flock of hair.
Songglossary: bhasma, bushan, chand, dhara, gowri, haalaahala, hara, hey, jatadhara, maheshwara, manohar, natavara, om, shankara, shashi, shiva, sundara

Title: Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Paapa Nikhandana
Lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Paapa Nikhandana
Sai Tero Naam
Sai Pavana Naam
Puttaparthi Pavana Triveni
Sai Darsha Snan
Sai Pavana Naam
Bhajana Keertana Naama Smarana
Sai Pavana Naam
Pranava Swaroopa Sai Narayana
Sai Ko Pehchaan
Sai Pavana Naam
Meaning: Oh Sai your sacred name when chanted redeems one from fear of worldly miseries and destroys the sins. Your abode Puttaparthi is sacred. Also your darshan, worship, bhajan everything is sacred. Sai Narayana you are the embodiment of Primordial sound (Pranava). So know the Sai as supreme god.
Songglossary: akhanda, bhaja, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, darsh, keertan, naam, narayana, paapa, pavan, pehchaan, pranava, puttaparthi, sai, smaran, snan, swaroopa, tera, triveni

Title: Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Shesha Shayana
Lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Shesha Shayana Hari
Pranava Swaroopa Narayana
Rajeeva Lochana Adi Sanathana
Bandha Vimochana Narayana
Padmanabha Prabhu Kamala Manohara
Vaikunta Pathey Narayana (2) [ Pranava Swaroopa ]
Meaning: Oh Hari you reclining on seven headed serpent removed the fear of worldly sorrows. You are Narayana the embodiment of Primordial sound (Om) having eyes resembling lotus, eternal from beginning, one who frees from cycle of birth and death. You are captivating Lord Narayana having navel resembling lotus and your abode is Vaikunta.
Songglossary: adi, bandha, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, hari, kamala, lochana, manohar, narayana, padma, pathey, prabhu, pranava, rajeeva, sanatana, shayana, shesha, swaroopa, vaikunta, vimochana

Title: Bhava Bhaya Harana Vanditha Charana
Lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Harana Vanditha Charana
Jaya Radha Jaya Madhava (Shourie)
Mangala Charana Kalimala Dahana
Narayana Keshava ( Sai ) [ Jaya Radha ]
Meaning: Oh Lord, your adorable (worship able) holy feet frees us from the continuous cycle of birth and death Glory to Radha, Victory to Lord Krishna, the slayer of the demon Madhu and sustainer of the Universe. Your holy feet dispels the sins of the kali age Oh Lord Narayana, the eternal guardian, Oh Keshava, the slayer of demon Kesi. Glory to Radha, Victory to Lord Krishna, the slayer of the demon Madhu and sustainer of the Universe.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, chara, dahana, harana, jay, kalimala, kesha, madhava, mangal, narayana, radha, sai, shouri, vanditha

Title: Bhava Bhayankara Girija Shankara
Lyrics:
Bhava Bhayankara Girija Shankara
Nacho Nacho Prabho Hey Nataraj
Tandaveshwara Hey Nataraj
Nacho Hey Nataraj Nacho Nacho Hey Nataraj (3)
Meaning: Dance, dance Nataraja also Shankara the consort of Girija (Parvathi) who removes fear and frees one from cycle of birth and death. Also hey, Nataraja you are cosmic dancer during creation.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, girija, hey, nacho, nataraj, prabhu, shankara, tandaveshwara

Title: Bhava Nasha Puttaparthi Pureesha
Lyrics:
Bhava Nasha Puttaparthi Pureesha
Jaya Shiva Shankara Hey Jagadeesha [ Bhava Nasha ... ]
Mruthyunjaya Hima Shaila Girisha
Mohana Kara Mana Moha Vinasha
Jyothi Prakasha Sathya Sayeesha [ Jaya Shiva ]
Meaning: Lord of Puttaparthi, You destroy the cycle of birth and death. Glory to Shiva Shankara and Glory to the Lord of the Universe You are the conqueror of Death/time and you reside on the snow clad mountain. O enchanting one, you are the remover of the mind's attachment O Sathya Sai, You are effulgence and luster.
Songglossary: bhava, girisha, hey, hima, jagadeesha, jay, jyoth, kara, mana, moh, mohan, mruthyu, nasha, prakasha, pureesha, puttaparthi, sathya, sayee, shaila, shankara, shiva, vinasha

Title: Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
Lyrics:
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
Sai Nath Bhagawan [ Bhava Sagar ... ]
Allah Yesu Buddha Mahavira
Sab Naamon Ki Ek Hai Mahima
Sarva Dharma Ke Palanhaarey [ Sai Nath Bhagawan ]
Meaning: Oh Sainath Bhagawan! Help me to cross the ocean of continuous passage of life and death. (Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahavira- All these names have the same magnitude of power) You are the sustainer of all the various faiths/religions, Oh Sainath Bhagawan and you are the sustainer of all these names, Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahavira, all of, which are equal in their magnitude/potency.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, bhava, buddha, dharma, ek, hai, ke, mahavir, mahima, naam, natha, paar, palanhaar, sab, sagar, sai, sarva, se, utharo, yesu

Title: Bhava Tharini Parthishwari
Lyrics:
Bhava Tharini Parthishwari
Sukha Dayini Saishwari [ Bhava Tharini ... ]
Bandha Mochani Prashanti Eshwari
Janani Devi Leela Vinodini
Shiva Vama Bhage Saishwari
Charanam Sharanam Samrajya Dayini
Meaning: Mother Goddess of Parthi, Sai, bestows happiness and helps us cross the ocean of life to attain liberation. We take refuge at the feet of mother of creation who frees us from the bonds of our illusory existence. She sits on the left side of lord Shiva and bestows the boons of the world.
Songglossary: bandha, bhage, bhava, chara, dayini, devi, eshwar, janani, leela, parteeshwari, prasanthi, saiyeeshwara, samrajya, sharan, shiva, sukh, tharini, vama, vimochana, vinodini

Title: Bhavani Amba Shiva Ranjani
Lyrics:
Bhavani Amba Shiva Ranjani
Sai Maheshwari Vighna Vinashini [ Bhavani Amba ... ]
Lalitha Madhavi Jai Shri Ranjani
Mangala Karini Lakshmi Narayani
Naada Svarupini Vina Vadini
Devi Saraswathi Vidya Dayini
Meaning: Mother Goddess, delight of Lord Shiva and the mother of creation, removes all obstacles. Glory to the Mother, grantor of good fortune and personification of sound (music). She plays the Veena and bestows knowledge.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, dayini, devi, jai, kaarini, lakshmi, lalita, madhavi, maheshwari, mangal, naada, narayani, ranjani, sai, saraswathi, shiva, sri, swaroopa, vadini, veena, vidya, vighna, vinashana

Title: Bhavani Nandana Bala Gajanana
Lyrics:
Bhavani Nandana Bala Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi
Hey Parthi Pureeshwara Sai
Meaning: Oh young Gajanana (elephant headed god) Son of Bhavani (Parvathi), embodiment of primordial sound (Pranava) protect us. Also you are Lord Sai of Parthi Puri.
Songglossary: bala, bhava, gajamukha, hey, nanda, paahi, pranava, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, swaroopa

Title: Bhavatharini Partheeshwari
Lyrics:
Bhavatharini Partheeshwari
Sukha Dayini Sayeeshwari [ Bhavatharini ... ]
Bandha Mochani Prashanthi Eshwari
Janani Devi Leela Vinodini
Shiva Vama Bhage Sayeeshwari
Charanam Sharanam Samrajya Dayini
Meaning: Oh Mother, residing in Parthi, You help us cross the worldly existence O Sai Mother, you grant us all the pleasures and comfort O Mother, Goddess of Parthi, you free us from bondage O Mother, you bestow joy upon us O Sai Eshwari, the consort of Lord Shiva We surrender at Your feet, O the one capable of bestowing kingdom.
Songglossary: bandha, bhage, bhava, chara, dayini, devi, eshwar, janani, leela, partheeshwari, prashanthi, samrajya, sayee, sharan, shiva, sukh, vama, vimochana, vinodini

Title: Bhola Bhandari Baba
Lyrics:
Bhola Bhandari Baba Shiva Shiva Shiva Sai Baba
Anatha Rakshaka Deena Dayala Patitha Pavana Sai Baba [ Bhola Bhandari ... ]
Yogeshwara Sai Murari Yogeshwara Hey Tripurari
Nithyananda Brahmananda Premananda Sai Baba
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba, you are the Lord who can be pleased easily (The easy-to-please-Lord) and You are the treasure of mercy and prosperity. Oh Sai Baba, You are the supporter of the orphans, protector and the refuge to the destitute and you uplift them and make them sacred. Oh Lord of the Yogis, Oh Sai Murari, Tripurari, the destroyer of three worlds Oh Sai Baba, you are eternally blissful, Brahmananda and Premananda.
Songglossary: anath, baba, bhandari, bhola, brahma, dayal, deen, hey, murare, nithya, patitha, pavan, premananda, raksha, sai, shiva, tripura, yogi

Title: Bhola Jai Bhola Jai
Lyrics:
Bhola Jai Bhola Jai Sathya Sai Ki Jai Bolo Sathya Sai Ki Jai
Rama Krishna Ki Jai Pavana Purusha Jai Narayana Ki Jai (Bolo) [ Bhola Jai ]
Sanathana Dharma Uddharaka Sai
Apad Bandhava Govinda Sai
Eshwaramba Priya Sutha Sai
Sathya Sai Ki Jai Sathya Sai Ki Jai (Bolo) Sathya Sai Ki Jai Sathya Sai Ki Jai
Meaning: Victory to Sathya Sai who can be pleased easily. Also victory to Rama, Krishna, Supreme Lord and Narayana. Oh Sai you the upholder of ancient dharma (faith). Govinda Sai you are the caretaker of the afflicted. You are lovable son of Eshwaramba. Chant victory to Sri Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: apad, bandha, bhola, bolo, dharma, eshwar, govinda, jai, krishna, narayana, pavan, priya, purusha, ram, sai, sanatana, sathya, sutha, uddhara

Title: Bhola Nath Harey Jagadeesha
Lyrics:
Bhola Nath Harey Jagadeesha
Shaileshwara Hara Uma Mahesha [ Bhola Nath Harey ... ]
Bhava Bhaya Haari Hey Tripurari
Shiva Gangadhara Sai Murari
Bhola Nath Bhola Nath
Sai Nath Sai Nath
Meaning: Chant the name of the easy to please Lord of the Universe, who grants all that is asked for without any question. The Lord who resides on the Mountain, The Lord of Mother Uma. The one who destroys the cycle of birth and death and the Lord of the three worlds Lord Sai Murari, The auspicious one, who has the Holy Ganga (in his matted hair). The easy to be pleased Lord, Sai nath.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, bhola, ganga, hara, harana, hari, hey, jagadeesha, mahesha, murare, natha, sai, shaileshwara, shiva, tripura, uma

Title: Bhola Nath Shambho Shankara
Lyrics:
Bhola Nath Shambho Shankara
Sai Nath Bhola Maheshwara
Dama Dama Damaru Bholey Shankara
Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Natana Manohara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Shankara [ Sai Nath ]
Meaning: Chant the name of the Easy-to-please Lord Sai Shankara, the conferrer of all prosperity. Lord Sainath, is the incarnate of Lord Maheshwara, the destroyer of all that is transient. He is the enchanting dancer to the rhythmic beats of damaru (kettle-drum). He has won over death, the eternal one, is Sai Shankara, bestower of all auspiciousness and prosperity.
Songglossary: bhola, bhole, dama, damaru, dhimi, maheshwara, manohar, natana, natha, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, shambho, shankara

Title: Bhola Shankara Bhola
Lyrics:
Bhola Shankara Bhola ( Hara )
Shaileshwara Hara Vishwambharadhara [ Hara Bhola Shankara ... ]
Surya Chandra Pralayagni Netra Dhara
Shakthi Sahita Shiva Natana Manohara
Meaning: Oh Shankara, The giver of prosperity, You are easily pleased. The one who resides on the snow clad mountain, you pervade the entire universe. Your three eyes denote, The Sun, The Moon and the pralaya Agni (the fire of deluge) Oh Lord, the Enchanter, who dances with his concert Shakthi.
Songglossary: bhola, chand, dhara, hara, manohar, natana, nethra, pralayagni, sahita, shaileshwara, shakthi, shankara, shiva, surya, vishwa

Title: Bhujanga Bhooshana Devadi Deva
Lyrics:
Bhujanga Bhooshana Devadi Deva
Mrityunjaya Mahadev
Shiva Gangadhara Hara Sai Mahadev
Pinaka Pani Shankara Dev
Rajarajeswara Srikanta Dev
Maha Yogeswara Maha Visweswara
Gangadhara Shiva Sai Mahadev

Title: Bhuvana Bandhava Sai Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Bhuvana Bandhava Sai Bhagawan
Mata Pitha Bandhu Sakha Tum Ho Bhagawan
Eshwar Bhi Tum Ho Allah Nanak Tum Ho
Prabhu Yesu Tum Ho Mahavir Tum Ho
Buddha Deva Tum Ho Merey Pran ( Sai ) Nath Tum Ho
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: You are also Eshwar, Nanak, Yesu, Mahavir and Buddha. O Sai ram you are my life force. Worship and chant Sai Bhagawan the supporter of this universe. You are my mother, father, relative and friend.
Songglossary: allah, bandha, bandhava, bhagawan, bhi, bhuvana, buddha, deva, eshwar, ho, mahavir, mata, mera, nanak, natha, pitha, prabhu, pran, ram, sai, sakha, tum, yesu

Title: Bhuvana Mohini Sri Varalakshmi
Lyrics:
Bhuvana Mohini Sri Varalakshmi
Mangala Dayini Mukti Pradayini
Vishnu Mohini Shakthi Swaroopini
Ksheerabdhi Tanaye Sai Narayani
Ananda Roopini Sowbhagya Dayini (Parama)
Meaning: Captivating goddess of universe Sri Varalakshmi (Goddess Lakshmi who grants boons) bestows auspiciousness and liberation. You are embodiment of creative power and consort of Vishnu. You are Sai Narayani dwelling on ocean of the milk, blissful one.
Songglossary: anand, bhuvana, dayini, ksheerabdhi, mangal, mohan, mukti, narayani, param, sai, shakthi, sowbhagya, sri, swaroopa, tanaya, varalakshmi, vishnu

Title: Bismillah Alhamdullila, La Illaha Illalah
Lyrics:
Bismillah Alhamdullila, La Illaha Illalah (x 4)
 Oh Seigneur, mon seul Ami ! Mon Amour, le plus fidele! (x 2)
 Tu es la, dans mon coeur, depuis toujours et pour toujours (x 2)
 Bismillah Alhamdullila, La Illaha Illalah (x 4)
Meaning:
[We start] In the name of God; All Glory to God and His Splendor; There is no God except God [No-one
 exists except him]
 Oh Lord, my only friend! My love, the most faithful
 You are there, in my heart, since always and forever
 [We start] In the name of God; All Glory to God and His Splendor; There is no God except God [No-one exists
 except him]

Title: Bismillah, Bismillah
Lyrics:
Bismillah, Bismillah
Erachman Erahim
Bismillah, Bismillah
Hu Allahu
We begin in the Name
Of the One who is Love
Who is Mercy, Mercy and Compassion
Mercy, Mercy, and Compassion
Shalom
De lAmour, de la Paix, dans le Monde (4x)
Meaning: Send Love and Peace to the world

Title: Bolo Bolo Jai Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bolo Bolo Jai Sai Ram
Jai Bolo Bolo Sai Ram [ Bolo Bolo ]
Deena Bandhu Deena Dayala
Karuna Sindhu Sai Krupala
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama Gopala
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the name Jai Sai Ram who is support and compassionate to meek, embodiment of kindness and merci. You are Shyam Gopala the Lord of Meera. Also you are Sai Ram of Parthi Puri.
Songglossary: bandhava, bolo, dayal, deen, gopal, jai, karuna, ke, krupalu, meera, prabhu, puri, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sham, sindhu

Title: Bolo Bolo Sab Mil Bolo
Lyrics:
Bolo Bolo Sab Mil Bolo Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya [ Bolo Bolo ... ]
Joota Jata Mey Gangadhari
Trishoola Dhari Damaru Bhajavey
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhaja
Goonj Utao Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya (3)
Meaning: Let us all chant together, " Om Namah Shivaya" and bow down to Lord Shiva, the bestower of all prosperity. He holds the Holy Ganges in His matted locks of hair. He holds the Trishoola (the trident) and plays on the Damaru (kettle-drum). Let us all play the Damaru in a rhythmic fashion. Let the chanting "Om Namah Shivaya" resonate.
GeneralComments: English version : "Call Upon The Lord Of All".
Songglossary: bhajave, bolo, dama, damaru, dhari, ganga, goonj, jata, joota, milo, namah, om, sab, shiva, trishoola, utao

Title: Bolo Jai Jai Kaar Bolo
Lyrics:
Bolo Jai Jai Kaar Bolo Jai Jai Kaar
Bolo Jai Jai Kaar Sai Baba Ki
Patitha Pavana Hey Ghana Shyama
Sai Gopala Hey Ghana Shyama
Prema Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: Chant victory to Sai Baba who is also Ghana Shyama the saviour of afflicted. Chant Sai Gopala, Prem Bhagawan (Lord whose form is love) and Sai Bhagawan.
Songglossary: baba, bhagawan, bolo, ghana, gopal, hey, jai, kaar, patitha, pavan, prem, ram, sai, sham

Title: Bolo Jai Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bolo Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram
Bolo Jai Sathya Sai Ram (2)
Mandir Mey Sai Ram
Masjid Mey Sai Ram
Gurudware Mey Sai Ram
Girjaghar Mey Sai Ram [ Bolo Jai Sathya ... ]

Bolo Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (5)
Meaning: Chant victory to Lord Sai Rama whose form is Truth and who is the dweller of Temples (for Hindus), Masjids (for Muslims), Gurudwaras (for Sikhs) and Girjaghars (Churches for Christians or Synagogues for Jews).
Songglossary: bolo, girjaghar, gurudware, jai, mandir, masjid, mey, ram, sai, sathya

Title: Bolo Krishna Jai Bolo Krishna
Lyrics:
Bolo Krishna Jai Bolo Krishna Jai
Bolo Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Jai
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Krishna Jai Jai
Mayi Meera Mana Vihari Krishna Jai Jai
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Jai (Bolo)
Meaning: Chant the name of Krishna, Sai Krishna who is the foster of truth, righteousness, peace and love. The charmer of Meera's mind.
Songglossary: bolo, dharma, jai, krishna, ma, mana, meera, prem, sai, sathya, shanthi, vihar

Title: Bolo Narayana Jai Jai Vittala
Lyrics:
Bolo Narayana Jai Jai Vittala
Sai Narayana Ranga Ranga Vittala [ Bolo Narayana ... ]
Govinda Krishna Naam Rakumayi Vittala
Gopala Krishna Naam Panduranga Vittala
Sri Ranga Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala
Meaning: Let us all chant the many names of the Lord. Glory to Lord Narayana, Vittala, Govinda, Gopala, Panduranga, Shri Ranga and Sai Ranga.
Songglossary: bolo, gopal, govinda, jai, krishna, naam, narayana, pandu, rakumayi, ranga, sai, sri, vittala

Title: Bolo Ram Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bolo Ram Sai Ram
Bolo Shyam Sai Shyam [ Bolo Ram ... ]
Bolo Ram Sai Ram
Bolo Shyam Sai Shyam
Bolo Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the name of Sairam, Chant the name of Sai Shyam Sai, The one who is mother and father. Shyam, The one with a dark blue complexion, Lord Krishna.
Songglossary: bolo, ram, sai, sham

Title: Bolo Ram, Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bolo Ram, Sai Ram, Sathya Sai Ram
Sathya Naam, Sai Naam, Hari Ka Naam
Sri Hari Hari Bol, Hari Narayana
Bhajo Manuva Tu, Sathya Narayana
Merey Ram, Hey Ghana Shyam, Sathya Sai Ram [ Sathya Naam ... ]
Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Sathya Sai Ram, The Lord's name is Sathya, The eternal changeless truth. Chant the name of Lord Hari and Lord Narayana. Oh Mind, You chant the name of Sathya Narayana Oh my Lord Rama, my Ghana Shyama, my Sathya Sai Rama The Lord's name is Sathya, The eternal changeless truth.
Songglossary: bhaja, bol, bolo, ghana, hari, hey, ka, manuva, mera, naam, narayana, ram, sai, sathya, sham, sri, tum

Title: Bolo Rey Hari Naam
Lyrics:
Bolo Rey Hari Naam
Bolo Rey Shiva Naam [ Bolo Rey ... ]
Bhaktha Janon Ke Baba Naam
Sai Naam Sai Baba Naam [ Bhaktha Janon ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the name of Hari, Lord Vishnu and Chant the name of Lord Shiva, the bestower of prosperity. Chant the name of Sai Baba, who belongs to the devotees, the Lord Sairam, who resides in the abode of Parthi.
Songglossary: baba, bhaktha, bolo, hari, jana, ke, naam, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai, shiva

Title: Bolo Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Bolo Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Prashanthi Vasa Sathya Sai Ram [ Bolo Sai Ram ... ] 1
Tan Man Lekey Man Mey Basaakey
Sai Ram Bolo Sathya Sai Rama
Meaning: Let us chant the name Sai Ram whose form is truth dwelling in Prashanthi Nilaya. Install his form in the heart after surrendering physically and mentally.
Songglossary: basayi, bolo, ley, mana, prashanthi, ram, sai, sathya, tan, vasa

Title: Bow To The Light Within
Lyrics:
Bow To The Light Within To The Omnipresent Light Of God
Bow To The Endless Light The Light That Is Our Very Life
Bow To The Indwelling Lord Our True Guru Shri Sathya Sai
Songglossary: guru, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Brahma Guru Sai Narayana Guru
Lyrics:
Brahma Guru Sai Narayana Guru
Brahma Guru Mahadeva
Sadguru Sai Dhyana Karey Nithya
Atma Linga Guru Deva ( Sai )
Parama Guru Sathya Sai Guru
Nithyananda Guru Deva
Rama Guru Shri Krishna Guru Jaya [ Atma Linga ... ]
Meaning: Always worship the true guru Satya Sai, who is also Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Rama, Krishna.
Songglossary: atma, brahma, deva, dhyaan, guru, jay, karo, krishna, linga, mahadev, narayana, nithya, param, ram, sadguru, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Brahma Murari Sada Poojita Namah
Lyrics:
Brahma Murari Sada Poojita Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Bilvarchana Priya Bhavani Shankara Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Mruthyunjaya Mahadeva Maheshwara Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Bhasmoddhoolita Tejo Vigraha Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Maheshwara Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya (Om)
Meaning: Lord Shiva is fond of being worshipped by Bilva leaves. He is the Lord of Lords and the conqueror of death. We bow to the Lord who manifests the Lingam, brings forth from within himself. We bow to the Lord, who is the conqueror of death and who is the supreme Lord We bow to Lord Sai, Who has sacred ashes emanating from Him and His Light illumines the Universe. We bow to the Lord Sai Maheshwara, the Supreme Lord, who is fond of the 8 versed hymn, Lingashtakam Chant the mantra, "Om Namah Shivaya". We bow to Thee, Oh Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: bhasmoddhoolita, bhava, bilva, brahma, lingodbhava, mahadev, maheshwara, mruthyu, murare, namah, om, poojita, priya, sada, sai, shankara, shiva, teja, vigraha

Title: Brahma Parathpara Poorna Maheshwara
Lyrics:
Brahma Parathpara Poorna Maheshwara
Adi ( Sai ) Natha Sri Kedareshwara
Bilva Dala Priya Chandrakaladhara
Dhimi Dhimi Damaru Ninaada Kara (3)
Meaning: Worship the supreme Brahman who has taken the form of Maheshwara with full divine qualities. He is the eternal Lord from beginning resident of Kedareshwara, who loves worship with Bilva leaves, adorn with moon on the head and who dances to the rhythm of Damaru.
Songglossary: adi, bilva, brahma, chand, dala, damaru, dhimi, kara, kedareshwara, maheshwara, naada, natha, parathpara, poorna, priya, sai, sri

Title: Brahma Swaroopa Naada Swaroopa
Lyrics:
Brahma Swaroopa Naada Swaroopa
Bhajore Bhajo Sada Sathya Sai Deva
Jyothi Swaroopa Divya Swaroopa
Bhajore Bhajo Sada Sathya Sai Deva (2)
Meaning: Lord Sai is the personification of creation, sound, truth, righteousness, illumination(knowledge), divinity, peace, and love.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, brahma, deva, divya, jyoth, naada, sada, sai, sathya, swaroopa

Title: Brahma Swaroopa Naada Swaroopa
Lyrics:
Brahma Swaroopa Naada Swaroopa
Sathya Swaroopa Dharma Swaroopa [ Brahma Swaroopa ]
Jyothi Swaroopa Divya Swaroopa
Shanthi Swaroopa Prema Swaroopa
Shirdi Swaroopa Parthi Swaroopa
Deva Deva Deva Sathya Sai Deva
Meaning: O God Sathya Sai you are supreme Brahman (Universal God) embodiment of primordial sound, truth, righteousness, effulgence, peace and divine love who is resident of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: brahma, deva, dharma, divya, jyoth, naada, prem, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, shanthi, shirdi, swaroopa

Title: Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
Lyrics:
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
Shirdi Sai Shankara
Parti Baba Shankara
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Namah Shivaya Namo Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya
Shirdi Sai Shankara
Parti Baba Shankara
Meaning: Pay homage to Brahma, Vishnu, Lord of Lords Shiva, Sai of Shirdi, and Baba of Parthi.
Songglossary: baba, brahma, maheshwara, namah, namo, om, puttaparthi, sai, shankara, shirdi, shiva, vishnu

Title: Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Sayeeshwara (Hey)
Lyrics:
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Sayeeshwara (Hey)
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Parameshwara
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Parama Dayala Paapa Vinasha
Raksha Karo Raksha Karo Sayeeshwara [ Daya Karo ]
Meaning: Oh Sayeeshwara, You are the incarnate of Trinity, Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara (Creator, Sustainer and Annihilator) ; Bestow on us your compassion and grace, Oh Parameshwara.
Songglossary: brahma, daya, dayal, hey, karo, krupa, maheshwara, paapa, param, raksha, ram, sai, sayee, vinasha, vishnu

Title: Brahmananda Guru Premananda Guru
Lyrics:
Brahmananda Guru Premananda Guru
Sai Guru Deva Sharanam
Bhaja Shankara Hari Hara Sharanam
Vishva Natha Deva Gowri Manohara
Sai Natha Baba Parameshwara (Bhajo)
Shiva Shambho Shiva Sharanam
Meaning: Surrender to the guru, Lord Sai, Who is the embodiment of love and bliss. Chant the name of Shiva, consort of Gowri and lord of the universe, Sai Baba.
Songglossary: baba, bhaja, brahma, deva, gowri, guru, hara, hari, manohar, natha, param, premananda, sai, shambho, shankara, sharan, shiva, vishwa
