Title: Brahmananda Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Lyrics:
Brahmananda Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Brinda Vihara Ananda Chanda [ Brahmananda Roopa ... ]
Nithyananda Atmananda Keshava Govinda
Govinda Gopala Jaya Ananda Mukunda
Govinda Gopala Jaya Ananda Mukunda (4)
Meaning: Lord Sri Sais form gives supreme bliss. He is the charmer of Brindavan. Chant his name (Keshava Govinda) which gives everlasting happiness and bliss. Victory to Govinda, Gopala, Mukunda.
Songglossary: anand, atmananda, brahma, brinda, chand, deva, gopal, govinda, jay, kesha, mukunda, nithya, roopa, sai, sri, vihar

Title: Brahmanandam Swami Naamam
Lyrics:
Brahmanandam Swami Naamam
Netranandam Swami Roopam [ Brahmanandam ]
Nithyanandam Swami Geetam
Hrudayanandam Swami Roopam
Atmanandam Swami Dhyanam
Anandam Paramanandam
Swami ( Sai ) Sevanam Anandam
Meaning: We derive supreme bliss by chanting Swami's ( Sai ) name. His form is delightful to the eyes. Singing his glory gives us everlasting peace. His form his charming to our hearts. One gets Atmic bliss by meditating on his form.
Songglossary: anand, atmananda, brahma, dhyaan, geeta, hrudaya, naam, netranandam, nithya, param, roopa, sai, sevanam, swami

Title: Brahmanda Nayaka Baba
Lyrics:
Brahmanda Nayaka Baba Parthi Pureeshwara Baba
Chand Aur Suraj Tum Ne Banayey
Nadiya Sagar Tum Ne Banayey (2) [ Brahmanda ... ]
Ayodhya Nagari Tum Ne Banayey Dwaraka Nagari Tum Ne Banayey
Shirdi Parthi Tum Ne Basayi
Meaning: Oh Baba, Creator of the entire Universe! You reside in Parthi (Prashanthi Nilayam). You created the sun and the moon You made the rivers and oceans You made the city of Ayodhya and situated the city of Dwaraka. You created the holy cities of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: aur, ayodhya, baba, banaye, basayi, brahma, chand, dwaraka, nadiya, nagari, nayaka, purishwara, puttaparthi, sagar, shirdi, suraj, tum

Title: Brindavan Ke Sundara Sai
Lyrics:
Brindavan Ke Sundara Sai
Parthi Puri Ke Pavana Sai
Bhaktha Janon Ke Leela Sai
Madhava Sai Mathura Sai
Mangala Dayi Baba Sai
Baba Sai Leela Sai (2)
Meaning: O Beautiful Sai of Brindavan O Sai, who is all sacredness and has Parthi as his abode You are the saviour of the devotees O Lord Madhava, The dweller of Mathura (You are verily the embodiment of sweetness) O Sai bestower of auspiciousness O Sai Baba, O Sai Baba.
Songglossary: baba, bhaktha, brinda, dayi, jana, ke, leela, madhava, mangal, mathura, pavan, puri, puttaparthi, sai, sundara

Title: Brindavan Mey Radhey Shyam
Lyrics:
Brindavan Mey Radhey Shyam
Avadh Puri Mey Jai Siya Ram
Vindhya Himachala Mey Shiva Shankar
Parthi Puri Mey Sai Ram
Rama Krishna Shiva Govinda Narahari
Narayana Sai Narayana
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana, you are Lord Krishna of Brindavan, Lord Rama of Ayodhya, Lord Shiva residing in Himalaya mountains and you are Lord Sai Rama of Parthi.
Songglossary: ayodhya, brinda, govinda, himachala, jai, krishna, narahari, narayana, puri, puttaparthi, radha, ram, sai, sham, shankara, shiva, sita, vindhya

Title: Brindavana Ghana Shyama Murari
Lyrics:
Brindavana Ghana Shyama Murari
Madhura Manohara Muralidhari [ Brindavana Ghana ... ]
Radha Madhava Kunja Vihari
Rasa Vilola He Giridhari
Rajeeva Lochana Parti Vihari
Meaning: Lord Krishna, slayer of the demon Mura, is Radha's Lord and moves about in the gardens of Brindavan. The lotus -eyed Lord who lifted the mountain Govardhan to protect his devotees is Lord Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: brinda, ghana, giridhar, kunja, lochana, madhava, madhu, manohar, murali, murare, puttaparthi, radha, rajeeva, rasa, sham, vihar, vilola

Title: Bring love of God here
Lyrics:
Bring love of God here, and take with you divine Power
 Bring what you have, your sorrows, grief worries and (your) fears
 And take from me joy
 And take from me peace
 And take from me courage and confidence

Title: Brothers, Sisters, All God’s Children
Lyrics:
Brothers, sisters, all God's children, let us live in peace as One
Let us share the universal blessings of the Earth and Sun
Walk together, talk together, may love let us fill all day to come
Let Divine light shine within us, let us live in peace as One
Songglossary: sun

Title: Buddha Mahavir Yesu Sai
Lyrics:
Buddha Mahavir Yesu Sai
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Bol Manuva
Allah Yesu Sath Guru Sai
Geeta Veda Quran Ho Sai
Tan Mey Sai Man Mey Sai
Rom Rom Mey Sai Sai [ Vahey Guru ]
Meaning: Oh mind chant Vahey Guru, Vahey Guru. Chant the name Buddha, Mahavir, Yesu and, Sadguru Sai who are the essence of scriptures Geeta, Quran and Bible. O Sai you are the indweller of body and mind and every atom of body is filled by you.
Songglossary: allah, bol, buddha, geeta, guru, ho, mahavir, mana, manuva, quran, rom, sai, sat, tan, vahey, veda, yesu

Title: Buddham Sharanam Gatchami
Lyrics:
Buddham Sharanam Gatchami
 Sangam Sharanam Gatchami (2X)
 Dharmam Sharanam Gatchami
 Surrender to the Consiousness of Lord Buddha
 Surrender to the holy ones of the world
 Surrender to the dharma of righteousness
 You will find the Truth of the Universe
 Lord Buddha, You came to this world
 To show man the path
 The path of Truth, the path of Peace
 The path Eternal that man does seek

Title: By devotion He knows me
Lyrics:
By devotion He knows me in Truth what and who I am
 And as He knows Me in Truth He enters into the happiness that I am

Title: Call On The Lord You Love Unceasingly
Lyrics:
Call On The Lord You Love Unceasingly
He Will Be Listening, Shri Sathya Sai
He Understands The Call Of Your Heart
Wanting Him, Needing Him, Shri Sathya Sai
There Is A Love He Cant Resistconstantly Calling Him, Shri Sathya Sai
Offer Your Love To The Lord Of The Universe
He Will Be Listening, He Always Is
Songglossary: sai, sathya, sri

Title: Call Upon The Lord Of All
Lyrics:
Call Upon The Lord Of All, Call Upon Sai Baba
Call Upon Sai Baba Call Upon Sai Baba [ Call Upon The Lord ... ]
Sai Is The Avatar Of Kaliyuga
Come To Our Rescue, We Are Lost Without You
Time And Time Again We Sing Your Name Oh Sai Ram
You Are Our Refuge, Free Us From Bondage
Oh, The Love Of Baba (4)
GeneralComments: The tune is similar to the bhajan "Bolo Bolo Sab Mil Bolo".
Songglossary: avatar, baba, kali, ram, sai

Title: Calling God by any name
Lyrics:
Calling God by any name
Every prayer's heard just the same
All are equal in His eyes
Who are we to criticize
Unity must be our aim
Loving God by any name

God is here within us all
And we only have to call
We must listen carefully
He will give us what we need
Each of us He hears the same
Calling God by any name

Sai Baba, Jesus Christ, Sai Ram, Alleluia
He hears how ever called Brahma, Krishna, Buddha

Title: Can’t get Enough of Your Love my Lord
Lyrics:
Can't get Enough of Your Love my Lord (2X)
 I want more and more and more and more
 And Can't get enough of Your Love (2X)
 Can't get Enough of Your Peace my Lord (2X)
 I want more and more and more and more
 And Can't get enough of Your Peace (2X)
 Can't get Enough of Your Joy my Lord (2X)
 I want more and more and more and more
 And Can't get enough of Your Joy (2X)
 Can't get Enough of Your Truth my Lord (2X)
 I want more and more and more and more
 And Can't get enough of Your Truth (2X)

Title: Chanda Kirana kula Mandana Ram
Lyrics:
Chanda Kirana Kula Mandana Ram
Srimad Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Kausalya Sukha Vardhana Ram
Vishwamitra Priya Dhana Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sai Ram
Meaning: Oh Beloved Prince of King Dasharatha, Lord Rama! You are the adoration of the noble lineage of the Raghu Dynasty, radiating bliss and Happiness, like the cooling rays of the moon. You are the cause of Mother Kausalya's happiness.
Songglossary: chand, dasha, dhana, jay, kausalya, kirana, kula, manda, nanda, priya, raja, ram, sai, sita, sriman, sukh, vardhana, vishwa

Title: Chanda Kirana Kula Mandana Ram
Lyrics:
Chanda Kirana Kula Mandana Ram
Srimad Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Kausalya Sukha Vardhana Ram
Vishwamitra Priya Dhana Ram
Sri Ram Jai Ram Jaya Jaya ( Sai ) Ram (6)
Meaning: O Rama you are the beloved Prince of King Dasharatha and star of noble lineage of Raghu Dynasty. You are the cause of mother Kausalya's happiness and the cherished treasure. You are beloved treasure of Vishwamitra. Victory to Ram, Sai Ram.
Songglossary: chand, dasha, dhana, jai, jay, kausalya, kirana, kula, manda, nanda, priya, ram, sai, sri, sriman, sukh, vardhana, vishwa

Title: Chandi Chamundi Jaya Vaishnavi Devi
Lyrics:
Chandi Chamundi Jaya Vaishnavi Devi Ma
Mahisha Samharini Mangal Roopini Jaya Maha Kali Ma
Chandi Chamundi Jaya Mangala Gowri Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Pashupathi Mohini Jaya Jaya Lalite Ma
Jagadodharini Jaya Bhavadharini Jaya Jaya Devi Ma
Trishoola Dharini Trinetra Dharini Jaya Jaya Durge Ma
Meaning: Mother Goddess Durga, Mother of the Universe bestows auspiciousness and removes all fears of worldly existence. She is also Mother Kali(Devi) who slew the demon Mahisa.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, chamundeshwari, chamundi, devi, dhari, durge, gowri, haarini, jagadodhara, jay, kali, lalita, ma, maha, mahishasura, mangal, mohan, pashu, samhari, swaroopa, trinetra, trishoola, vaishnavi

Title: Chandra Chuda Mahadeva Shiva
Lyrics:
Chandra Chuda Mahadeva Shiva Shiva Shambho Deva
Hara Hara Mahadeva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sai Deva
Sathya Nam Sathya Sai Deva Mruthyunjaya Mahadeva
Om Namah Shivaya Hari Om Namah Shivaya
Meaning: Salutations to the Lord of the Lords, Shiva, who wears the moon on his head and who has conquered death.
Songglossary: chand, chuda, deva, hara, hari, mahadev, mruthyu, nam, namah, om, sai, sathya, shambho, shiva

Title: Chandra Kaladhara Samba Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Chandra Kaladhara Samba Sadashiva
Shambho Mahadeva (Shiva) (3)
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Meaning: Lord Shiva, who is eternal and unchanging, wears the moon on His head as a decoration. The Lord of the Lords is the bestower of good. Let us chant the mantra that means, I bow to Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: chand, kaladhara, mahadev, namah, om, sadashiva, samba, shambho, shiva

Title: Chandra Kaladhara Shambho Deva
Lyrics:
Chandra Kaladhara Shambho Deva
Partheesha Sai Jagadeesha [ Chandra Kaladhara ... ]
Akhilandeshwara Paramesha
Karunakara Sayeesha
Trinetra Dhari Shiva Shankara [ Partheesha Sai ... ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva, who is the Lord of the Universe adorning the crescent moon on His head, with the third eye in the forehead and who is the most compassionate one.
Songglossary: akhila, chand, deva, dhari, jagadeesha, kaladhara, karuna, param, partheeshwara, sai, sayee, shambho, shankara, shiva, trinetra

Title: Chandra Shekhara Shiva Shankara Gangadharaya Namah Om
Lyrics:
Chandra Shekhara Shiva Shankara Gangadharaya Namah Om
Namah Om Namah Om
Garala Kanthadhara Vibhuti Sundara Saishwara Namah Om
Bhavani Shankara Uma Maheshwara Parthishwara Namah Om
Meaning: Praise be to Lord Shiva, who holds the crescent moon in His hair locks. He holds poison in His throat to save the world from destruction. He is clad in holy ash. He is the beloved of Mother Parvati. He is our Lord Sri Sathya Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi.

Title: Chandra Vadana Kamala Nayana
Lyrics:
Chandra Vadana Kamala Nayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Anantha Shayana Deena Sharanya [ Narayana Sai ]
Meaning: Lord Narayana has a face pleasing like the moon and his eyes are like lotus. He is reclining eternally on the serpent and is the refuge to the weak and meek.
Songglossary: ananta, chand, deen, hari, kamala, narayana, nayan, sai, sharan, shayana, vadana

Title: Chandramouleeshwari Shankari Shankari
Lyrics:
Chandramouleeshwari Shankari Shankari
Mangala Pradayini Madana Koti Sundari
Madhava Hari Sodari Sai Jaganmohini
Meaning: The consort of Shiva - Parvathi is adorned with crescent moon on her matted hair. The goddess Shankari bestows auspiciousness having beauty equivalent to crores of Madanas. The sister of Madhava is captivating goddess to the whole world.
Songglossary: chand, dayini, hari, jagan, koti, madana, madhava, mangal, sai, shankari, sodari, soundari

Title: Chandramouli Shankara Chandrashekhara
Lyrics:
Chandramouli Shankara Chandrashekhara
Neelakantha Shooladhari Ambikeshwara
He Vibhuti Sundara Tribhuvaneshwara
Sainatha Sainatha Jai Maheshwara
Jai Mahesha Jai Umesha Jai Sureshwara
Constantly Calling Him, Shri Sathya Sai
Offer Your Love To The Lord Of The Universe
He Will Be Listening, He Always Is
Meaning: Salutations to the Lord Sai, Lord of the Lords, and the Lord of Eternity. He is Lord Shiva, Lord if Uma, the blue-necked bearer of the trident. His body is decorated with holy ash and He wears the crescent moon on his forehead.
Songglossary: ambikeshwara, chand, jai, mahesha, maheshwara, neela, sai, sainatha, sathya, shankara, shoola, sri, sundara, suresham, tribhuvan, umesha, vibhuti

Title: Chandrashekara Indushekara
Lyrics:
Chandrashekara Indushekara
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sai Shankara
Hara Hara Mahadeva Hara Hara Mahadeva (2)
Janana Marana Shoka Bhava Klesha Vidhura
Chandra Chooda Chandra Vadana Chandrashekara [ Hara Hara ]
Meaning: Chant the name Hara Mahadeva (Shiva), one who frees us from the cycle of birth and death and the one who adorns the moon on His head and whose face is serene like the moon rays. He is Sai Shankara who fosters truth, righteousness, peace and love.
Songglossary: bhava, chand, chooda, dharma, hara, indushekara, janam, klesha, mahadev, maran, prem, sai, sathya, shankara, shanthi, shoka, vadana, vidhura

Title: Chandrashekara Sai Sundara
Lyrics:
Chandrashekara Sai Sundara
Devadi Deva Maheshwara
Vyagrambaradhara Hey Shiva Shankara
Vibhuti Sundara Amaradeeshwara
Chidambaresha Sayeeshwara [ Devadi Deva ]
Meaning: Glory be to the beautiful Sai Shiva, who adorns the moon on His head, who is the God of Gods, Maheshwara. You are Lord Shankara who is clothed in tiger skin and besmeared with sacred ash. You are Lord Sayeeshwara who resides in Amarnath and Chidambaram.
Songglossary: amara, chand, chidambara, deva, devadi, hey, maheshwara, sai, sayee, shankara, shiva, sundara, vibhuti, vyagrambara

Title: Chandrashekara Sayeeshwara
Lyrics:
Chandrashekara Sayeeshwara
Chandrakaladhara Hrudayeshwara [ Chandrashekara ... ]
Prema Pradayaka Parameshwara
Parameshwara Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara [ Prema Pradayaka ]
Prashanthi Nilaya Hara Shankara
Meaning: Our Lord Sai, is none other than Lord Shiva, who wears the crescent moon on His head. He is also the Lord who resides in the Heart. Lord Parameshwara, the greatest Lord, grants love to all. The greatest Lord is our Lord Sathya Sai, whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam.
Songglossary: chandrakala, chandrashekaraya, dhara, hara, hrudayeshwara, nilaya, paramesha, pradayaka, prashanthi, prem, sathya, sayee, shankara

Title: Chandrashekaraya Namah Om
Lyrics:
Chandrashekaraya Namah Om
Gangadharaya Namah Om [ Chandrashekaraya ... ]
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om (Sathya)
Meaning: Obeisance to Lord Shiva, who is decorated with the crescent-moon on his head, who makes the Holy Ganges flow through his matted hair. I bow to Lord Shiva, who destroys the illusion and all that is transient. Chant the mantra " Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om, Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om, Sayeeshwarya Namah Om."
Songglossary: chand, ganga, hara, namah, om, sathya, sayee, shiva

Title: Chant the name of God
Lyrics:
Chant the name of God, Sing the Glory of the Lord
 Hare Ram Hare Ram Hare Krishna Sai Ram
 Call Him Allah or Buddha Jesus Zohrashtra
 Say Ram Rahim Mahaveer Sai Natha
 He is All names and All forms for everyone
 He is All names and All forms Almighty One
 He is All names and All forms Almighty One (variation)

Title: Chant The Name Of Lord Ganesha
Lyrics:
Chant The Name Of Lord Ganesha, Sai Ganesh We Pray To Thee (2)
Give Us Wisdom, Give Us Grace
Remove The Obstacles We Face
We Bow To Thee, Lord Shivas Son
Please Bless These Songs Weve Just Begun
Songglossary: ganesha, sai, shiva

Title: Charana Kamala Bandho
Lyrics:
Charana Kamala Bandho Sai Nath Ke
Charana Kamala Bandho Charana Kamala Bandho
Akarshan Ke Kendra Sai Hai
Krupa Sarovar Charana Sai Hai
Shanthi Pradayaka Guru Sai Hai
Charana Kamala Bandho
Mai Hoon Das Sai Karuna Maya
Bar Bar Bandho (2)
Meaning: Hold on to the lotus feet of Lord Sai. Sai is the focus of our attraction. His feet are verily the ocean of blessing. He is the divine preceptor who grants peace. I am the servant of Sai, the essence of compassion. I pay homage to Sai over and over again.
Songglossary: akarshan, bandho, bar, chara, dasa, guru, hai, hoon, kamala, karuna, ke, kendra, krupa, mai, maya, natha, pradayaka, sai, sarovar, shanthi

Title: Charana Kamala Bhajore Manasa
Lyrics:
Charana Kamala Bhajore Manasa
Sai Janani Nalina Mrudula Dala [ Charana Kamala ... ]
Tirtha Triveni Sangama Charanam
Tribhuvana Sai Mangala Charanam
Sanchitha Paapa Vinashaka Charanam
Sharanagatha Paripalita Charanam
Meaning: The lotus feet of Mother Goddess Sai, who sits on the soft petalled lotus flower, are as holy as the meeting of the three holy rivers(Ganga, Yamuna, Sarasvati) and bestow good fortune to all the three worlds. Total surrender at those feet will protect us and destroy all of our sins.
Songglossary: bhajao, chara, dala, janani, kamala, manasa, mangal, mrudu, nalina, paapa, paripala, sai, sanchitha, sangama, sharan, tiratha, tribhuvan, triveni, vinasha

Title: Charana Kamala Deejo (Mujhey)
Lyrics:
Charana Kamala Deejo (Mujhey)
Aao Aao [ Charana Kamala ... ]
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
Meaning: Welcome to Hari Narayana who is also Sai Narayana and Sathya Narayana. Show us your adorable lotus feet.
Songglossary: aao, chara, deejo, hari, kamala, mujhe, narayana, sai, sathya

Title: Charana Kamala Vando
Lyrics:
Charana Kamala Vando Sai Nath Ke Charana Kamala Vando (2)
Jo Trishavanto Piyo Charanamrutha Jeevan Mey Paavey Anando
Jeevan Mey Paavey Anando
Meaning: We should consider Lord Sai's Lotus feet as our closest companion. (His lotus feet is the only true companion) Whoever pines for his nectar-like lotus feet will be filled with bliss throughout his entire lifetime.
Songglossary: anand, chara, jeeva, jo, kamala, ke, natha, paavey, piyo, sai, trishavanto, vando

Title: Chaturmukha Bhaaryey Maam Paahi
Lyrics:
Chaturmukha Bhaaryey Maam Paahi
Vaagdevi Vani Saraswathi
Amaley Kamalasana Sahitey
Adbhuta Charithey Saraswathi
Jaya Jaya Sai Dayalakari
Vidya Vijaya Saraswathi
Shruthi Laya Gaananaya Veena Pusthaka
Paani Geervani Saraswathi
Meaning: O Saraswathi the consort of Chaturmukha (Brahma) protect us. You are the goddess of speech and sound seated in the posture of lotus, one with extraordinary character. You are the embodiment of highest knowledge holding book as its symbol, Veena on other hand. Your music is synchronized with shruthi and your arrow is speech (Geervani).
Songglossary: adbhuta, amaley, bhaarye, charitha, chaturmukha, dayal, gaana, geervani, jay, kamala, laya, maam, paahi, paani, pusthaka, sahita, sai, saraswathi, shruthi, vaagdevi, vani, veena, vidya, vijaya

Title: Chitha Chora Eshwaramba Bala
Lyrics:
Chitha Chora Eshwaramba Bala
Sathya Sai Shyama Gopala [ Chitha Chora ... ]
Jagadodhara Sai Gopala
Brahmananda Swaroopa Gopala
Meaning: Oh Beloved Son of Mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sathya Sai, you are the stealer of our Chitta, the spiritual Heart.
Songglossary: bala, brahma, chitha, chora, eshwar, gopal, jagadodhara, sai, sathya, sham, swaroopa

Title: Chitha Chora Muraliwala
Lyrics:
Chitha Chora Muraliwala
Nandalala Nanda Gopala
Nandalala Nandalala
Brindavana Shyama Gopala
Mathura Vraja Gokula Bala
Mana Mohana Madana Gopala
Nandalala Nandalala
Nandalala Nanda Gopala
Nandalala Nandalala
Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Chitta Chora, the stealer of the Chitta, the spiritual Heart, the seat of consciousness. Murali Vala, the enchanting Flute Player; Brindavan Shyama Gopala, the dark-blue complexioned Lord Gopala moving about in the Brindavan.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, chitha, chora, gokul, gopal, madana, mana, mathura, mohan, murali, nanda, sham, vraja

Title: Chitha Chora Yashoda Ke Bal
Lyrics:
Chitha Chora Yashoda Ke Bal Navaneetha Chora Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gopal Govardhanadhara Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gopal Gopal Govardhanadhara Gopal
Meaning: O Lord Gopala! Beloved Prince of Mother Yashoda! You are the captivator/stealer of the Hearts of devotees, their Chitta, the spiritual Heart, the seat of consciousness. You are the stealer of butter, I. e. Hearts of the Gopis (devotees). Chant the name of Gopala, the one who protects the cows or tends the cows as a cowherd Chant the name of the Govardhanadhara Gopal, who held aloft the mountain Govardhana to protect the villagers against the torrential rain.
Songglossary: bala, chitha, chora, gopal, govardhan, ke, navaneetha, yashoda

Title: Chitha Raja Chitha Raja
Lyrics:
Chitha Raja Chitha Raja
Brindavana Ghana Mangala Charana
Savari Surath Prema Bharana [ Chitha Raja ... ]
Roopa Manohara Murali Madhuvana
Parthi Pureeshwara Chitha Raja Chitha Raja
Meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi, You are the king of my mind/ Chitta, the spiritual Heart Your auspicious feet rambled the thick forests of Brindavan and made them auspicious. Your beautiful complexion captivates us and fills us with Love. O Lord of Parthi and King of my mind! You have a charming beautiful loving Lotus face. Oh Holder of the Flute! You are the bestower of auspiciousness.
Songglossary: bharana, brinda, chara, chitha, ghana, madhu, mangal, manohar, murali, prem, purishwara, puttaparthi, raja, roopa, savari, surath

Title: Chithachora Nandalala
Lyrics:
Chithachora Nandalala
Nanda Gopala Govinda Lala
Devaki Nandana Gopala
Murali Manohara Nandalala
Madhusudhana Yashoda Bala
Madhava Mohana Shyama Gopal
Meaning: Chant the many names of Krishna. He is the captivator of the hearts and mind, a charming cowherd and flute player as well as destroyer of the demon Madhu. He is the child of Nandalala (Nandagopal) and Devaki as well as Yashoda. He is the ever sweet and enchanting dark-complexioned Gopal.

Title: Come let us chant
Lyrics:
Come let us chant the name of Sathya Sai Baba
 You are my Mother, you are my Father
 You are my Teacher, you are my Protector
 Come let us chant the name of Sathya Sai Baba
 You are my Rama, you are my Krishna
 You are my Allah, you are my Jesus
 Come let us chant the name of Sathya Sai Baba
 We call on You dear Baba to give us Your darshan
 You take away our troubles and give us compassion
 Patricia Buehler
 St. Louis, Missouri, USA.

Title: Come Sai Lord Incarnate
Lyrics:
Come Sai Lord Incarnate Give Us Your Darshan
You Are The Lord Of Creation (2)
You Are That Rama You Are That Krishna
You Are Our Lord And Provider (2)
You Are Creator You Are Protector
You Are Destroyer Of Darkness (2)
Songglossary: darsh, krishna, ram, sai

Title: Come surrender and you’ll see
Lyrics:
Come surrender and you'll see
 come and lift your burdens free
 Can't you see brothers we are one
 Yes we're one, yes we're one with you
 Come with me my brothers free
 Serving all in my reigns of love
 Yes we're one, yes we're one with you
 Jesus helped us to be free
 Come and lift your burdens free
 Serving all in your reign of love
 Yes we're one, yes we're one with you

Title: Daasharathey Ram Jaya Jaya Jaya
Lyrics:
Daasharathey Ram Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya (2)
Pavana Naama Megha Shyama
Manmata Shata Guna Dhama Rama
Meaning: Victory unto you Oh Rama the son of Dasharatha. You liberate the sufferings of your devotees and your complexion is blue like the clouds. You are verily beautiful with reserve of abundant virtues.
Songglossary: daasharathe, dhama, guna, jay, manmata, megha, naam, pavan, ram, sham, shata

Title: Daasharathey Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Lyrics:
Daasharathey Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Raja Rama [ Dasharathey ... ]
Sita Vallabha Sundara Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Sathya Sai Rama
Meaning: Victory to Lord Ram, the Prince of King Dasharatha Lord Rama is the Jewel of the Raghu Dynasty. Chant the name of Lord Ram, Glory to Lord Rama. The beautiful Rama is Goddess Sita's beloved. Chant the name of Lord Rama, Our Sathya Sai Rama.
Songglossary: bhooshan, daasharathe, dasha, jay, raghu, raja, ram, sai, sathya, sita, sri, sundara, vallabha

Title: Daasharathey Rama Kalyana Guna Dhama
Lyrics:
Daasharathey Rama Kalyana Guna Dhama
Rama Sri Rama Rameshwara Rama [ Dasharathey Rama ]
Bhadrachala Rama Patitha Pavana Rama
Ahalyodharaka Rama Puttaparthi Sai Rama
Meaning: Oh Rama, Sai Rama son of Dasharatha you are abode of all virtues and auspiciousness, saviour and up-lifter of afflicted, freed Ahalya from her curse. You reside in Rameshwara, Bhadrachala and Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, bhadrachala, daasharathe, dasha, dhama, guna, kalyan, patitha, pavan, puttaparthi, ram, rameshwara, sai, sri

Title: Dakshina Murthim Sai Mahesham
Lyrics:
Dakshina Murthim Sai Mahesham
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram
Sundaram Sundaram
Chinmaya Mudram Chidananda Roopam
Sanakaadi Yogi Jana Vanditha Sri Gurum
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram [ Sundaram Sundaram ]
Meaning: Oh Sai Mahesha you are Dakshinamurthy (God of silence) the embodiment of truth, awareness, beauty. The Lord with blissful form sitting in the posture Chinmudra facing south. You are worshipped by yogis like Sanaka etc.
Songglossary: chidananda, chinmaya, dakshina, gurum, jana, mahesha, mudram, murthy, roopa, sai, sanakaadi, sathya, shiva, sri, sundara, vanditha, yogi

Title: Dam Dam Dam Dam suena el tambor
Lyrics:
Dam Dam Dam Dam suena el tambor
 En las manos del Shiva nuestra Senor
 Da me da me da me da me tu corazon
 Toma toma toma toma mi corazon
 Con tus manos Santas llename de amor

Title: Dam Dam Dam Dam toca tu tambor
Lyrics:
Dam Dam Dam Dam toca tu tambor
Porque ha nacido en Puttaparthi el seor
Sathya Sai Baba se llama el avatar
Y ha venido al mundo a ensearnos a amar
Y ha venido al mundo a traernos la paz
Meaning:
Dam Dam Dam Dam play your drum, 

because the Lord has been born in Puttaparthi.

The avatar is called Sathya Sai Baba, 

And he has come to the world to teach us to love, 

And he has come to the world to bring us peace.
GeneralComments: This is set to the tune of "Dam Dam Dam Dam Damaru Bhaje" Shiva bhajan: http://sairegion3.org/songs/Dum-Dum-Dum-Dum-Damaru/
Songglossary: amara, avatar, baba, dam, ensearnos, llama, mundo, nacido, paz, porque, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, se, seor, tambor, toca, traernos, tum, venido

Title: Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru
Lyrics:
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey
Nachey Shankara Nachey Rey [ Dama Dama ]
Tunga Himachala Shringa Nivasita
Nachey Pralayankara Nachey Rey
Srishti Shankara Laya Pralayankara
Nachey Rey Shiva ( Sai ) Nachey Rey
Meaning: Oh Shankara dance in rhythm with Damaru (drum) the one who dwells at the peak of highest ice laden mountain Himachala, plays the cosmic dance of creation, sustenance and destruction.
Songglossary: bhaja, dama, damaru, himachala, laya, nach, nivasi, pralayankara, sai, shankara, shiva, shringa, srishti, tunga

Title: Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru
Lyrics:
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bhajey
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shambho Bhajey
Shiva Sai Shankara Sada Bhajey
Meaning: Worship and chant the divine name Shiva, Sai Shankara the embodiment of auspiciousness who dance to the rhythm of Damaru (drum sounding dama dama) and Ghanta (bell sounding ghana ghana).
Songglossary: bhaja, dama, damaru, ghana, ghanta, sada, sai, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Dama Dama Damaru Bhajavey Shankara
Lyrics:
Dama Dama Damaru Bhajavey Shankara
Mahadeva Hey Bhola Shankara [ Dama Dama ]
Gowri Natha Sadashiva Shankara
Neelakanta Gangadhara Shankara
Vama Deva Pashupathi Shiva ( Sai ) Shankara
Sharanagatha Abhayankara Shankara
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Meaning: Oh Shankara beat the Damaru (drum) dama, dama. Oh Mahadeva who is easy- to- please, you are the consort of Gowri (Parvathi) granting always auspiciousness whose throat is blue (due to Haalaa-hala poison), one who holds Ganga in his matted locked hair, the Lord of Pashupathi. Blessed devotees will free from fear who takes refuge in him. Chant the mantra Om Namah Shivaya.
Songglossary: abhaya, bhaja, bhola, dama, damaru, deva, ganga, gowri, hey, mahadev, namah, natha, neela, om, pashu, sadashiva, sai, shankara, sharan, shiva, vama

Title: Dama Dama Damaru Damaru Natha
Lyrics:
Dama Dama Damaru Damaru Natha Shiva
Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhimi Gowri Natha Shiva [ Dama Dama ... ]
Natana Manohara Nataraja Shiva
Bham Bham Hara Hara Bholey Nath Shiva
Shambho Shankara Vishwanath Shiva
Shivaya Namah Shiva Sai Nath Shiva
Meaning: Lord Shiva, loves the sound of the Damaru (Drum) "Dum Dum Dum", "Dhim Dhim Dhim"" and ""Bhum Bhum Bhum". Chant the name of Bholey Nath, the easy-to-please Lord Shiva, Lord Gowri Natha, the Lord of Goddess Parvathi, Lord Nataraja, The Lord of dance, Lord Shankara, the one who gives happiness, Lord Shambho, the bestower of good and Lord Sai Natha.
Songglossary: bham, bhole, dama, damaru, dhimi, gowri, hara, manohar, namah, natana, nataraj, natha, sai, shambho, shankara, shiva, vishwa

Title: Danava Bhanjana Rama Sai Shyamala
Lyrics:
Danava Bhanjana Rama Sai Shyamala Komala Ram
Hey Rama Rama Jaya Rama Sai Rama Rama Ram [ Danava Bhanjana ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Sai Daya Sagara Ram
Deenon Ke Prabhu Rama Sai Rama Rama Ram
Meaning: Oh Charming and sweet Rama, you annihilated the demons (Danavas) Victory to Lord Rama, Our Sai Rama O Son of Dasharatha, you are an ocean of compassion You are the refuge to the destitute, O Rama, You are our Sai Rama.
Songglossary: bhanjana, danava, dasha, daya, deenon, hey, jay, ke, komala, nanda, prabhu, ram, sagar, sai, sham

Title: Dance Shiva Dance
Lyrics:
Dance Shiva Dance In Our Hearts (2)
Blow Out The Winds Of Desire ( Sai )
Purify Our Hearts Purify
Let Our Sins Die In Your Fire
Dance Shiva Dance In Our Hearts (3)
And Love Will Flow Like A River
Songglossary: sai, shiva

Title: Dancing Ganesh, Playful Ganesh
Lyrics:
Dancing Ganesh, Playful Ganesh,
 Dance with me, Play with me, be my Ganesh,
 Be my Ganesh, be my Ganesh,
 Teach me how to dance with my fears, Ganesh
 
 Sung to the tune of Gauri Ganesh Uma Ganesh

Title: Darsha Dikhao Bhagawan (Mujhe)
Lyrics:
Darsha Dikhao Bhagawan (Mujhe)
He Sai Natha Bhagawan [ Darsha Dikhao ... ]
Tum Janat Sab Antaryami
Deejo Merey Prabhu Amrutha Vani
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram Baba
Puran Karo Merey Man Ki Kamna
Meaning: Lord Sai the all-Knowing indweller, please grant me your divine vision and sweet speech. Sai, my Rama, please fulfill my heart's desires.
Songglossary: amrutha, antar, atma, baba, bhagawan, darsh, deejo, dikhao, ho, jaanat, kamna, karo, mana, mera, mujhe, natha, prabhu, puran, ram, sab, sai, tum, vani

Title: Darsha Dikhao Merey Sai Nandalala
Lyrics:
Darsha Dikhao Merey Sai Nandalala
Daya Karo Mujhey Krishna ( Sai ) Gopala [ Darsha Dikhao ... ]
Devaki Nandana Deena Dayala
Mathura Natha Madana Gopala
Sai Narayana Sada Krupala [ Daya Karo ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Gopala, the beloved prince of Nanda! Grant me Darshan Shower Your compassion on me. Oh Lord Krishna Gopala! Loving son of Mother Devaki and the compassionate Lord of meek and weak. Oh Lord of Mathura and the most beautiful one. Oh Ever-compassionate Lord Sai Narayana! Shower Your mercy and grace on me.
Songglossary: darsh, daya, dayal, deen, devaki, dikhao, gopal, karo, krishna, krupalu, madana, mathura, mera, mujhe, nanda, narayana, natha, sada, sai

Title: Darshan Do Deva Deva
Lyrics:
Darshan Do Deva Deva
Dasharathey Dayabhi Rama [ Darshan Do ... ]
Dharma Uddhara Daya Nidhey
Dasa Paripala Krupa Nidhey
Meaning: Oh Lord Rama, bless us with your Darshan. You are the Son of Dasharatha, the compassionate one, upholder of righteousness, the reserve of kindness. You are protector and sustainer of your devotees who take refuge in you.
Songglossary: darsh, dasa, dasha, daya, dayabhi, deva, dharma, do, krupa, nidhey, paripala, ram, uddhara

Title: Darshan Do Ghana Shyama Shyama
Lyrics:
Darshan Do Ghana Shyama Shyama
Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala [ Darshan Do ... ]
Mathura Natha Deena Dayala
Parthi Puri Ghana Shyama Shyama
Meaning: Oh Ghana Shyama bless us with your vision, the Lord of Radhey Gopala. You are the Lord of Mathura compassionate towards weak and meek and also you are Shyama of Parthi.
Songglossary: darsh, dayal, deen, do, ghana, gopal, govinda, mathura, natha, puri, puttaparthi, radha, sham

Title: Darshan Do Prabhu Sai Natha
Lyrics:
Darshan Do Prabhu Sai Natha
Darsha Dikhao Sai Natha [ Darshan Do ]
Araj Suno Merey Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala (2) [ Araj Suno ]
Brindavan Ke Nandalala
Meaning: Sai Nath bless us with the vision of your divine form, listen to our earnest prayer. Oh Shyam Gopal beloved of Gopi and Gopas of Brindavan.
Songglossary: araj, brinda, darsh, dikhao, do, gopal, ke, mera, nanda, natha, prabhu, sai, sham, suno

Title: Darshana Deejo Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Darshana Deejo Bhagawan
Parama Dayalu Bhagawan [ Darshana Deejo ]
Adi Anantha Adbhuta Roopa
Ananda Daata Aashritha Vatsala
Prema Swaroopa Shanthi Pradatha
Satchidananda Sri Sathya Sayeesha
Meaning: Grant me the vision of Your Divine Form Oh Lord, the Supremely Merciful Bhagawan! You are Infinite and Your Form is unsurpassingly beautiful and indescribable. Thou art the Grantor of Joy and happiness to those who have come to Thee for refuge. Your Form is Love and You are the bestower of Peace. Oh Most Supreme Lord Sri Sathya Sai! You are the embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.
Songglossary: aashritha, adbhuta, adi, anand, ananta, bhagawan, daata, darsh, dayal, deejo, param, pradatha, prem, roopa, satchidananda, sathya, sayee, shanthi, sri, swaroopa, vatsala

Title: Darshana Do Darshana Do
Lyrics:
Darshana Do Darshana Do
Darshana Do Sai Bhagawan [ Darshana Do ... ]
Tum Ho Baba Natavara Lala
Tum Ho Baba Deena Dayala
Tum Ho Baba Parama Krupala
Tum Ho Karuna Nidhan (Baba) [ Darshana Do Sai ]
Meaning: Oh Sai Bhagawan, Grant me Darshan, Vision of your holy form. You are the sustainer of the entire world Lord, you have Shirdi as your holy abode Oh Lord, with your Love and supreme compassion, you destroy the ill-effects of kali Oh Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, you are the treasure house of Compassion Oh Supreme Lord of Parthi, you are the refuge to the destitute Oh Lord, who resides in Shirdi, please grant me your vision.
Songglossary: baba, bhagawan, darsh, dayal, deen, do, ho, karuna, krupalu, lal, natavara, nidhan, param, sai, tum

Title: Darshana Do Ghana Shyama Shyama
Lyrics:
Darshana Do Ghana Shyama Shyama
Radhey Govinda Radhey Govinda [ Darshana Do ... ]
Mathura Natha Deena Dayala
Parthipuri Ghana Shyama Shyama
Meaning: Lord Sai the dark-complexioned Krishna(Lord of Radha), Lord of Mathura and resident of Parthi, please grant us your divine vision.
Songglossary: darsh, dayal, deen, do, ghana, govinda, mathura, natha, puttaparthi, radha, sham

Title: Darshana Do Prabhu Darshana Do
Lyrics:
Darshana Do Prabhu Darshana Do
Darshana Do Mujhey Sai Bhagawan
Vinati Karoon Mai Bar Bar [ Darshana Do Prabhu ... ]
Hrdaya Me Aao Sai Bhagawan
Bhajan Me Aao Sai Bhagawan
Nayana Me Aao Sai Bhagawan
Dhyan Me Aao Sai Bhagawan
Sai Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan
Parthipuri Ke Sai Bhagawan [ Darshana Do Mujhey ... ]
Meaning: Lord Sai, the resident of Parthi, grant us Your divine vision. Please come in our hearts, in our prayers, and in our meditation.
Songglossary: aao, bar, bhagawan, bhaja, darsh, dhyaan, do, hrudaya, karoon, ke, mai, mujhe, nayan, prabhu, puttaparthi, sai, vinati

Title: Darshana Do Sai Mata
Lyrics:
Darshana Do Sai Mata
Aao Aao Sai Mata [ Darshana Do ... ]
Tribhuvana Dharini Parthi Nivasini
Prema Swaroopini Sai Mata [ Aao Aao ]
Meaning: Sai Nath bless us with the vision of your divine form, listen to our earnest prayer. O Shyam Gopal beloved of Gopi and Gopas of Brindavan.
Songglossary: aao, darsh, dhari, do, mata, nivasi, prem, puttaparthi, sai, swaroopa, tribhuvan

Title: Dasharatha Nandana Dayabhi Rama
Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Dayabhi Rama
Dharani Pala Shiromani Rama [ Dasharatha Nandana ]
Deena Dayala Ravikula Rama
Daasharathey Sri Raghu Rama (2)
Meaning: O the Son of Dasharatha the compassionate Rama, the supreme ruler and sustainer of the earth who is compassionate to weak and meek, the star of Surya clan, the prince of Dasharatha Oh Raghu Rama.
Songglossary: daasharathe, dasha, dayabhi, dayal, deen, dhara, nanda, pala, raghu, ram, ravikula, shiromani, sri

Title: Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama
Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama
Janaki Jeevana Sri Raghu Rama [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
Rama Rama Ravikula Soma
Ravikula Soma Ravikula Soma [ Rama Rama ]
Danava Samhara Kodanda Rama
Meaning: Oh King Rama you are the Son of Dasharatha, the consort and life of Janaki, star of Sun clan, annihilator of demons, wielder of bow Kodanda.
Songglossary: danava, dasha, janaki, jeeva, kodanda, nanda, raghu, raja, ram, ravikula, samhara, soma, sri

Title: Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara
Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara Rama
Raghukula Tilaka Rama Sathya Sai Sri Parandhama [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
Ahalyodharaka Rama Shaapa Vimochana Rama
Shirdi Pureesha Rama Puttaparthi Puri Parandhama
Meaning: Lord Rama, the darling son of King Dasharatha, You are an ocean of compassion and the Crown Jewel of the Raghu Dynasty. You are indweller of hearts - Sathya Sai. You are the saviour of Ahalya from the curse that had turned her into a stone; with Shirdi and Parthi your supreme abodes.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, dasha, daya, nanda, parandhama, pureesha, puri, puttaparthi, raghu, ram, sagar, sai, sathya, shaapa, shirdi, sri, tilaka, vimochana

Title: Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara
Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara Rama
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Daithya Kulaantaka Rama [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
Lakshmana Sevitha Rama Lakshmi Manohara Rama
Sookshma Swaroopa Rama Sundara Vadana Rama
Meaning: O Merciful Lord Ram! O Prince of King Dasharatha! You are an ocean of mercy. You slayed the ten headed evil Ravana thereby putting an end to the clan of demons. You are worshipped and attended by Brother Lakshmana and you are the enchanter of Goddess Lakshmi. O beautiful faced Rama, You are the formless one.
Songglossary: daithya, dasha, daya, kulaantaka, lakshmana, lakshmi, manohar, mardana, mukha, nanda, ram, sagar, sevita, sookshma, sundara, swaroopa, vadana

Title: Dasharatha Nandana Ramachandra Prabhu Janaki
Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Ramachandra Prabhu Janaki Jeevana Jaya Jaya Ram
Raghukula Bhooshana Deena Janavana
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Meaning: Oh Rama, you are the darling son of King Dasharatha and you are life to Janaki, Janaka's daughter (Goddess Sita) You are the crown jewel of the Raghu Clan and are the saviour of the destitute. Oh Lord of Sita, you are the uplifter of the fallen (destitute) Oh Raja Rama, King Rama, you are the Lord of the Raghu's of the Raghu lineage or clan.
Songglossary: bhooshan, dasha, deen, janaki, janavana, jay, jeeva, nanda, patitha, pavan, prabhu, raghava, raghu, raja, ram, ramachandra, sita

Title: Dasharatha Nandana Sri Ramachandra Dharma
Lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Ramachandra Dharma Samrakshaka Ram
Devaki Nandana Murali Dhara Ananda Dayaka Shyam
Eshwaramba Sutha Sri Sathya Sai Premamrutha Bhagawan
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa Mangala Dayaka Naam
Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Ananda Dayaka Shyam
Premamrutha Bhagawan
Jai Jai Jai Sai Ram (Bolo)
Meaning: Darling Son of Dasharatha Oh Rama having blissful and serene face and who upholds righteousness. You are Shyama (Krishna) the darling Son of Devaki holding the enchanting flute, bestowing happiness. You are Lord Sathya Sai, Son of Eshwaramba who is the embodiment of love. Victory to Shiva the all powerful whose name bestows auspiciousness. Chant victory to Sai Ram.
Songglossary: anand, bhagawan, bolo, dasha, dayaka, devaki, dhara, dharma, eshwar, jai, jay, mangal, murali, naam, nanda, premamrutha, ram, ramachandra, sai, samraksha, sathya, shakthi, sham, shiva, sri, sutha, swaroopa

Title: Dasharatha Ram Janaki Ram
Lyrics:
Dasharatha Ram Janaki Ram
Maruti Sevitha Manobhi Ram
Sita Ram Shri Raghu Ram
Parthipurishwara Shri Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Janaki Ram
Ahalyodharaka Ananda Ram
Meaning: Salutations to Rama who is the son of King Dasharatha. Rama is the consort of Mother Janaki (Sita). Rama was served faithfully by Maruti (Hanuman) and Rama resides in our heart. Victory be to the Rama who verily resides in Puttaparthi as Sai, and who emancipated Ahalya from her curse.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, anand, dasha, jai, janaki, manobhi, maruthi, partheeshwara, raghu, ram, sai, sevita, sita, sri

Title: Dasharatha Ram Janaki Ram
Lyrics:
Dasharatha Ram Janaki Ram
Maruti Sevitha Manobhi Ram
Sita Ram Sri Raghu Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Janaki Ram
Ahalyodharaka Ananda Ram
Meaning: Oh Prince of King Dasharatha! Oh Lord of Sita! You are constantly worshipped by Maruti (Hanuman, a monkey devotee of Lord Rama), Chant the name of the Lord of Parthi Puri, Lord Sai Ram. Victory to Lord Rama, Lord of Janaki (Sita) The blissful Rama, The saviour of Ahalya.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, anand, dasha, janaki, jay, manobhi, maruthi, purishwara, puttaparthi, raghu, ram, sai, sevita, sita, sri

Title: Dasharatha Rama Dayabhi Rama
Lyrics:
Dasharatha Rama Dayabhi Rama
Danava Bhanjana Karunabhi Rama [ Dasharatha Rama ]
Deenodharana Manobhi Rama
Taraka Naama Sugunabhi Rama (2)
Meaning: Oh Rama Son of Dasharatha you are merciful and compassionate, annihilator of demons, up lifter of destitute, embodiment of noble virtues and your name when chanted releases one from the miseries of the world.
Songglossary: bhanjana, danava, dasha, dayabhi, deenodharana, karuna, manobhi, naam, ram, suguna, taraka

Title: Datta Guru Datta Guru Dattatreya
Lyrics:
Datta Guru Datta Guru Dattatreya Guru
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Roopa Guru
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Dattatreya Guru
Dattatreya Guru
Sai Nath Guru [ Deena Natha ]
Meaning: Chant the Holy names of the Noble Teacher Dattatreya and Lord Sai Natha, Reciting ever pure and spotless names of the Noble Teacher Lord Dattatreya and Lord Sai Nath, destroys the fear of the bondage of birth and death.
Songglossary: alakh, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, brahma, datta, deen, guru, natha, niranjan, roopa, sai

Title: Datta Guru Datta Guru Dattatreya Guru
Lyrics:
Datta Guru Datta Guru Dattatreya Guru
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Roopa Guru [ Datta Guru ... ]
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Dattatreya Guru
Dattatreya Guru
Sai Nath Guru
Meaning: Chant the Holy names of the Noble Teacher Dattatreya and Lord Sai. Reciting the ever pure and spotless names of the Noble Teacher Lord Dattatreya and Lord Sainath, destroys the fear of the bondage of birth and death.

Title: Dattatreya Sadguru Deva
Lyrics:
Dattatreya Sadguru Deva
Dehi Dehi Tava Sri Paada Seva
Tum Hi Brahma Sanathana Deva
Vishnu Narayana Sri Vasudeva
Pannaga Bhooshana Shiva Mahadeva
Dehi Dehi Tava Sri Paada Seva (2)
Meaning: Oh God and Noble teacher Dattatreya grant us to serve your feet. You are Brahma the eternal God, Vishnu, Narayana who is indweller in all. You are Shiva, Mahadeva adorn with serpent as ornament.
Songglossary: bhooshan, brahma, datta, dehi, deva, hai, mahadev, narayana, paada, pannaga, sadguru, sanatana, seva, shiva, sri, tava, tum, vasudeva, vishnu

Title: Day By Day
Lyrics:
Day By Day, Day By Day Oh Lord, The Three Things I Pray
To See Thee More Clearly, Love Thee More Dearly
Follow Thee More Nearly, Day By Day
Songglossary: more

Title: Daya Karo Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Bhagawan Sai Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Terey Dwarey Jhol Philaye Krupa Karo Bhagawan [ Daya Karo ... ]
Daya Karo He Sai Baba Gaan Tumhare Gaun
Man Ki Asha Paun
Jo Bhi Dhyaye Tujhe Ko Paye
Parthipuri Bhagawan Sai Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Meaning: Please bestow mercy on those of us at Your doorstep, with outstretched arms, singing Your glory. Please appear in our meditation and prayers to fulfill our desire to see You, Lord Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: asha, baba, bhagawan, bhi, daya, dhyaan, dwarey, gaan, gao, jhol, jo, karo, krupa, mana, paave, philaye, puttaparthi, sai, tera, tum, tumhara

Title: Daya Karo Bhagawan Krupa Karo
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Bhagawan Krupa Karo Bhagawan (2)
Bhagawan Bhagawan
Hey Sai Nath Bhagawan
Hey Krupa Nidhey Bhagawan
Meaning: Oh Lord, bestow on us your compassion and mercy, Oh Lord Sai, who is the treasure house of compassion.
Songglossary: bhagawan, daya, hey, karo, krupa, natha, nidhey, sai

Title: Daya Karo Bhagawan Shankara Daya
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Bhagawan Shankara Daya Karo Bhagawan
Parvathi Ramana Pannaga Bhooshana Neelakanta Daya Karo [ Daya Karo ]
Chandrashekara Chandrakaladhara Vibhuti Sundara Daya Karo [ Daya Karo ... ]
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Dhari Ganga Dhari Daya Karo
Meaning: Show us Your compassion, O Lord Shankara, the blue-throated one who adorns the snake and who is the consort of Goddess Parvathi. You are beautiful with Vibhuthi (holy ash) besmeared all over Your body and the moon adorned on Your head. Be merciful towards us O Lord, who has the third eye, possesses the trident and holds the river Ganga in Your matted hair.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhooshan, chand, daya, dhari, ganga, karo, neela, pannaga, parvathi, ramana, shankara, sundara, trinetra, trishoola, vibhuti

Title: Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Ma
Raksha Karo Raksha Karo Sathya Sai Ma
Hey Ma Hey Ma
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Sathya Sai Ma
Sathya Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma
Meaning: Oh Universal mother Sathya Sai Ma show us your mercy and kindness.
Songglossary: daya, hey, karo, krupa, ma, raksha, sai, sathya

Title: Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Karuna Sagara Narayana
Pankaja Nayana Pannaga Shayana
Sri Vasudeva Narayana
Paapa Vinashaka Prashanthi Vasa
Parthi Pureeshwara Narayana
Paramananda Narayana
Meaning: Oh Hari Narayana bestow us your mercy who is the ocean of compassion reclining on the five headed serpent (Adi esha) whose eyes resembling lotus. Oh God Narayana you are the indweller of all the beings, presently in the Kali Yuga you are Sai the resident of Prashanthi at Parthi who destroys the sins and you are supreme bliss personified.
Songglossary: daya, hari, karo, karuna, narayana, nayan, paapa, pankaja, pannaga, param, prashanthi, purishwara, puttaparthi, sagar, shayana, sri, vasa, vasudeva, vinasha

Title: Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Krupa Karo Hey Jaga Vandana [ Daya Karo ]
Bhavatheetha Bhagya Vidhata
Deena Natha Anatha Ke Natha
Meaning: Oh Lord Hari Narayana, bestow on us your mercy, you are worshipped by the whole world. You are the Lord of destitute and the helpless; you are the saviour from worldly miseries and bestower of auspiciousness.
Songglossary: anath, bhagya, bhava, daya, deen, hari, hey, jagat, karo, ke, krupa, narayana, natha, vandana, vidhata

Title: Daya Karo Hey Daya Nidhey
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Daya Nidhey Hey Bhagawan
Tan Man Dhan Sab Sharana Tumharey [ Daya Karo ... ]
Adi Anantha Hari Avinashi
Sada Nirantara Ghat Ghat Vasi
Deena Dayala Sada Krupala (2)
Meaning: Oh Bhagawan, the treasure house of mercy, have mercy on us. This body, mind and money (all the material possessions) are all Yours. Oh infinite and the primal one, You are all pervading; Oh the saviour of destitute, You are ever compassionate.
Songglossary: adi, ananta, avinashi, bhagawan, daya, dayal, deen, dhan, ghat, hari, hey, karo, krupalu, mana, nidhey, nirantara, sab, sada, sharan, tan, tumhara, vasi

Title: Daya Karo Hey Jaya Jagat
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Jaya Jagat Janani
Krupa Karo Hey Durga Bhavani [ Daya Karo ... ]
Pranava Swaroopini Hey Kalyani
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani
Sharanam Sharanam Sharanam Bhavani
Meaning: Oh mother of the Universe Bhavani, show compassion and mercy on us. You are the personification of the primordial sound "OM", Oh mother Durga we surrender at your feet.
Songglossary: bhava, daya, durga, hey, jagat, janani, jay, kalyan, karo, krupa, maheshwari, mata, pranava, sharan, swaroopa

Title: Daya Karo Hey Karuna Murthy
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Karuna Murthy Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Tum Bin Koi Aur Na Dooja
Tum Ho Hamarey Pran
Tum Ho Anatha Natha Deena Bandhu
Tum Bin Kaun Sahara
Tum Bin Kaun Sahara Prabhuji
Meaning: Show mercy on us Oh compassionate Lord, no one but you care for us, you are our life, you are the saviour of the downtrodden, Oh Lord who else other than you can help us.
Songglossary: anath, aur, bandhava, bhagawan, bin, daya, deen, hamarey, hey, ho, karo, karuna, kaun, koi, krupa, murthy, na, natha, prabhu, pran, sahara, tum

Title: Daya Karo Hey Karuna Nidhan
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Karuna Nidhan Sai
Tum Ho Daata Daya Karo
Tum Ho Sai Krupa Karo
Prabhu Tum Sai Antaryami
Parthi Puri Bhagawan (2)
Tum Ho Daata Daya Karo [ Tum Ho... ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, the treasure house of Grace and compassion, kindly bless us with Your mercy. You are the ever-giver, please bestow on us Your mercy. Oh Lord Sai, You are the indweller of hearts. Oh resident of Parthi, bestow on us Your grace and mercy.
Songglossary: antarayami, bhagawan, daata, daya, hey, ho, karo, karuna, krupa, nidhan, prabhu, puri, puttaparthi, sai, tum

Title: Daya Karo Krupa Karo Partheeshwara
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Partheeshwara Sai Deva
Janam Janam Tum Saath Raho
Sai Nath Mahadeva
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Partheeshwara Sai Deva
Shirdeeshwara Sai Deva Partheeshwara Sai Deva
Meaning: Oh Sai deva the Lord of Parthi be compassionate and merciful towards us and accompany us from birth to birth. Oh Sai Mahadeva the resident of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: daya, deva, janam, karo, krupa, mahadev, natha, partheeshwara, raho, saath, sai, shirdeesha, tum

Title: Daya Karo Sadguru Sai Daya
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Sadguru Sai Daya Karo
Shirdi Nivasa Sai Daya Karo
Parthi Nivasa Sai Daya Karo [ Daya Karo ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Tum Ho Brahma Eshwara
Radha Kantha Parvathi Ramana
Deena Bandhava Sai Daya Karo [ Parthi Nivasa ]
Meaning: Oh True Guru, (the dispeller of the darkness of ignorance), Oh Lord Sai, the resident of Shirdi and Parthi, please shower your mercy. O Lord Giridhari, The one who held aloft the mountain to save the devotees, you are the Lord of Meera You are Brahma (creator) and Eshwara (destroyer) Oh Radha's beloved and the enchanter of Goddess Parvathi Saviour of helpless and the destitute, Oh Lord Sai, the dweller of Parthi, shower your compassion on us.
Songglossary: bandha, brahma, daya, deen, eshwar, giridhar, ho, kantha, karo, ke, meera, naagar, nivasa, parvathi, prabhu, puttaparthi, radha, ramana, sadguru, sai, shirdi, tum

Title: Daya Karo Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Sai Narayana
Daya Karo Hey Krupa Karo
Krupa Karo Baba Daya Karo
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Narayana ( Sai )
Deena Ke Bandho Deena Sharana Sai Narayana
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Narayana ( Sai )
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana, please shower your mercy on us. Show your mercy on us show your compassion on us. Oh Baba, please confer your compassion on us. Oh Lord, the companion of the Forlorn and the refuge to the destitute, Oh Sai Narayana, grant us mercy and compassion.
Songglossary: baba, bandho, daya, deen, hey, karo, ke, krupa, narayana, sai, sharan

Title: Daya Karo Shiva Gangadhari
Lyrics:
Daya Karo Shiva Gangadhari
Krupa Karo Shiva Hey Tripurari [ Daya Karo ... ]
Naama Madhura Shubha Mangala Kaari
Alakh Niranjan Trishoola Dhari
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhola Bhandari
Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva, The one who holds the Holy Ganges in your locks of hair, shower your compassion on us. Oh Lord Shiva, who destroyed the city of Tripura, shower your mercy on us. Your sweet name bestows all auspiciousness. Oh imperceptible and Faultless one, Oh the Holder of Trishul, the trident, Oh Easy-to-please Lord, shower your mercy on us.
Songglossary: alakh, bhandari, bhola, daya, dhari, ganga, hey, kaari, karo, krupa, madhu, mangal, naam, niranjan, shiva, shubh, tripura, trishoola

Title: Daya Sagara Karunakara
Lyrics:
Daya Sagara Karunakara
Jagadeeshwara Sayeeshwara [ Daya Sagara ]
Bhuvaneshwara Akhileshwara
Guna Gambhira Sayeeshwara (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, you are the ocean of compassion and mercy. Oh Lord of the entire creation, Oh Sai eshwara You are the Lord of the entire world, You are the master of the entire world and the entire Universe Oh Lord Sai, You are the embodiment of all virtues qualities.
Songglossary: akhileshwara, bhuvaneshwara, daya, gambhira, guna, jagadeesha, karuna, sagar, sayee

Title: Daya Sudha Barsao Mata Jaya
Lyrics:
Daya Sudha Barsao Mata Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambe
Prema Sudha Barsao Mata Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambe
Devi Niranjani Sai Bhavani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambe (2)
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambe (3)
Meaning: Victory to Mother Ambe! Oh Ocean of mercy and love! Shower Your grace. Oh Purest One! (Mother Sai). You are the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death.
Songglossary: amba, baraso, bhava, daya, devi, jay, mata, niranjan, prem, sai, sudha

Title: Dayabhi Rama Janaki Rama
Lyrics:
Dayabhi Rama Janaki Rama
Madhura Manohara Prabhu Sai Rama
Atma Rama Nayanabhi Rama
Kodanda Rama Pattabhi Rama
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Rama [ Madhura Manohara ]
Meaning: Oh Resident of the Heart of devotees and holder of the Kodanda bow! You are merciful and beautiful to behold. Chant the name of the King Rama of the Raghukula dynasty and the beautiful and enchanting Sai Ram.
Songglossary: atma, dayabhi, janaki, kodanda, madhu, manohar, nayan, pattabhi, prabhu, raghava, raghu, raja, ram, sai

Title: Dayamaya Hey Maheshwara
Lyrics:
Dayamaya Hey Maheshwara
Krupamaya Hey Sadashiva
Dama Dama Damaru Maheshwara
Damaruka Natha Sadashiva
Hari Om Hari Om Sadashiva
Meaning: Hey Maheshwara (Shiva) you are full of compassion. You are also Shiva the embodiment of auspiciousness show us your kindness who loves the sound of damaru (drum) dama, dama. . chant Hari Om.
Songglossary: dama, damaru, dayamayi, hari, hey, krupa, maheshwara, natha, om, sadashiva

Title: Dayamaya Sri Rama Harey
Lyrics:
Dayamaya Sri Rama Harey
Krupamaya Sri Sai Harey
Dharma Swaroopa Rama Harey
Prema Swaroopa Sai Harey
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Daata Sathya Sai Baba Harey
Meaning: Chant the name of Rama, the compassionate one and Sai, who is highly merciful. Rama is the embodiment of righteousness. Sai is the embodiment of love and the one who bestows truth, righteousness and peace.
Songglossary: baba, daata, dayamayi, dharma, hari, krupalu, prem, ram, sai, sathya, shanthi, sri, swaroopa

Title: Dear Allah, dear Baba, dear Lord
Lyrics:
Dear Allah, dear Baba, dear Lord
 There is one God in this world
 Truth's His Name, Sweet's His word, Loving's His act
 Guru Allah, Guru Baba, Guru Lord
 Your are justice, You are fairness, You are love
 You are my heart, You are my mind, You are all
 Sweet Allah, sweet Baba, sweet Lord
 You are everything that we are asking for

Title: Dear Ganesh, Great Ganesh
Lyrics:
Dear Ganesh, Great Ganesh, clear the path, light the way
 Remove all obstacles, awaken us from ego's dream,
 open us to the arms of our love
 Who patiently awaits our awakening
 Who lovingly awaits our awakening
 Dear Ganesha, Great Ganesha, clear the path, light the way
 Let nothing hinder our journey, open our hearts
 Hasten us to the arms of our love
 Who patiently awaits our awakening
 Who lovingly awaits our awakening
 Help us to surrender, restore our faith
 Guide us to the arms of our Sai
 Who patiently awaits our awakening

Title: Dear Lord Sai
Lyrics:
Dear Lord Sai, so radiant You have come
 Melting every heart into the one
 So gloriously You live the divine way
 Showing that the world is all God's Play
 Bhagavaan, You are the Light, endless rays of Love so bright
 You shine within the sun--You shine within us everyone
 Please let these lives reflect Thee, Bhagavaan
 Dissolve these hearts into Thee, Bhagavaan

Title: Dear Lord, sweet Lord
Lyrics:
Dear Lord, sweet Lord, let us tell You how we feel
 You have filled us with Your riches---we love you so

Title: Dear Sathya Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Dear Sathya Sai Baba how I do love Thee!
 Dear Sathya Sai Baba I know You love me;
 Awake or asleep there is nothing to fear,
 I'm never alone for Sai Baba is here!

Title: Dearest Jesus, You are my friend
Lyrics:
Dearest Jesus, You are my friend
 Dearest Jesus, over and over again
 I look in my heart and what do I see?
 Dearest Jesus, smiling at me
 Dearest Jesus, always with me.

Title: Deena Bandhava Baba Daya Sagara
Lyrics:
Deena Bandhava Baba Daya Sagara
Patitha Pavana Sai Karunakara [ Deena Bandhava ]
Sathya Sai Prema Sai Shanthi Dharma Sindhu Sai
Jeevan Ka Aadhaar Sai Janam Janam Bandhu Sai [ Patitha Pavana ]
Meaning: Oh Baba the ocean of compassion you are the kinsman to destitute, up-lifter of afflicted. You are Sathya Sai whose form is truth and righteousness, refuge of all lives, father, mother and perpetual companion from birth to birth.
Songglossary: aadhaar, baba, bandha, bandhava, daya, deen, dharma, janam, jeeva, ka, karuna, patitha, pavan, prem, sagar, sai, sathya, shanthi, sindhu

Title: Deena Bandhava Sri Sai Deva
Lyrics:
Deena Bandhava Sri Sai Deva
Daya Sagara Devadi Deva [ Deena Bandhava ... ]
Paahi Prabho Sayeeshwara
Dehi Vibho Jagadeeshwara
Sharanam Prabho Sathya Sai Deva
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are the kinsman of the destitute and the afflicted. Oh Lord of Lords, you are a ocean of compassion. Oh Lord Sayeeshwara, kindly protect me. O Lord of the universe, grant yourself to me Oh Sai deva, I surrender to thee.
Songglossary: bandha, daya, deen, dehi, deva, devadi, jagadeesha, paahi, prabhu, sagar, sai, sathya, sayee, sharan, sri, vibho

Title: Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Pahi
Lyrics:
Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Pahi Sai Shankara
He Trinetra He Pavitra Vimala Charitha Raksha Mam
Parama Purusha Parti Nivasa Sathya Sai Shankara
Meaning: Lord Sai Shankar is the Lord and kinsman of the downtrodden. Kindly protect me, the purest and spotless three eyed Lord of Parthi!
Songglossary: bandhava, charitha, deen, mam, natha, nivasa, paahi, param, pavitra, purusha, puttaparthi, raksha, sai, sathya, shankara, trinetra, vimala

Title: Deena Bandhu Vittala Jai
Lyrics:
Deena Bandhu Vittala Jai Karuna Sindho Vittala Jai
Apad Bandhava Vittala Jai Anatha Rakshaka Vittala Jai
Pandari Natha Vittala Jai Panduranga Vittala Jai
Parthi Pureesha Vittala Jai Prashanthi Nilaya Vittala Jai
Meaning: Victory to Lord Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur, who is the refuge of the downtrodden and reservoir of compassion. He is none other than our Sai who resides at Prashanthi Nilayam in Puttaparthi.
GeneralComments: The line "Apad Bandhava" is usually omitted but can be sung in extended bhajan sessions.
Songglossary: anath, apad, bandhava, deen, jai, karuna, natha, nilaya, pandari, panduranga, prashanthi, pureesha, puttaparthi, rakshaka, sindhu, vittala

Title: Deena Dayala Hari Parama Dayala
Lyrics:
Deena Dayala Hari Parama Dayala
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Gopala
Madhura Manohara Krishna Gopala
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Brindavana Ghana Madana Gopala
Meaning: Chant the many names of the supremely merciful, sweet and beautiful Lord Krishna, Hari, Govinda, Gopala, The Lord of Meera and Giridhara.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, dayal, deen, ghana, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, ke, krishna, madana, madhu, manohar, meera, param, prabhu, radha, ramana

Title: Deena Dayala Parama Krupala
Lyrics:
Deena Dayala Parama Krupala
Darshana Deejo Sai Gopala [ Deena Dayala ... ]
Parthipurishwara Sai Nanda Lala
Bhaktha Paripala Sai Gopala
Meaning: Please let us have the vision of Your divine form, Sai Gopala, son of Nanda. Your are the Lord is extremely compassionate towards the downtrodden and protects His devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktha, darsh, dayal, deejo, deen, gopal, krupalu, lal, nanda, param, paripala, partheeshwara, sai

Title: Deena Dayala Sri Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Deena Dayala Sri Sai Rama
Jagadodhara Prashanthi Rama
Anatha Rakshaka Ananda Rama
Ananda Rama Sadananda Rama [ Anatha Rakshaka ]
Atmabhi Rama Prabhu Sai Rama
Meaning: Oh Lord Sri Rama, Sai Rama, You are merciful and kind towards the weak and the meek. Oh Lord of Prashanthi, You have come for the upliftment of mankind. Oh Rama, the always blissful one, You are the protector of those who are orphaned. Oh Lord Sai Rama, You are the indweller of our hearts.
Songglossary: anand, anath, atmabhi, dayal, deen, jagadodhara, prabhu, prashanthi, raksha, ram, sada, sai, sri

Title: Deena Dayala Tribhuvana Pala Giridhara
Lyrics:
Deena Dayala Tribhuvana Pala Giridhara Bala Nandalala
Murali Manohara Maya Vilola
Natavara Sundara Shyama Gopala
Radha Madhava Sai Gopala
Meaning: Oh Giridhara (Krishna) darling of Nanda, you are the protector of three worlds, compassionate towards weak and meek, captivating figure with enchanting flute in your hands. You play with the illusion created by you. You are Shyam Gopala and the Lord of Radha who danced on the Kalinga serpent. You are also Sai Gopal.
Songglossary: bala, dayal, deen, giridhar, gopal, madhava, manohar, maya, murali, nanda, natavara, pala, radha, sai, sham, sundara, tribhuvan, vilola

Title: Deena Dukha Bhanjana Alakh Niranjan
Lyrics:
Deena Dukha Bhanjana Alakh Niranjan
Karunamaya Sai Deva
Rajeeva Lochana Ayodhya Rama
Dasharatha Nandana Ananda Dhama
Raghupathi Raghava Kalyana Rama
Ayodhya Jana Priya Rama [ Karunamaya ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are destroyer of miseries of weak and meek. You are pure and spotless with full of kindness. You are Rama the consort of Janaki (Sita) resident of Ayodhya and darling of Dasharatha. You are the abode of the supreme bliss, star of Raghu clan who bestows joy and happiness to devotees and you are lovable to the people of Ayodhya.
Songglossary: alakh, anand, ayodhya, bhanjana, dasha, deen, deva, dhama, dukh, jana, kalyan, karuna, lochana, nanda, niranjan, priya, raghava, raghu, rajeeva, ram, sai

Title: Deena Dukhiyon Ke Taarana Kaarana
Lyrics:
Deena Dukhiyon Ke Taarana Kaarana
Tu Hey Eesa Masiha O Sai Baba [ Deena Dukhiyon ... ]
Dharma Uddharana Bhaktha Parayana
Adi Narayana Sai
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Parthi Narayana Sai (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba, You are the destroyer of the miseries and pain of the destitute Oh Lord Sai Baba, You are the Supreme Lord You have descended for the revival or upliftment of righteousness and for guiding the devotees. Oh Lord Sai, you are the Imperceptible and faultless and are the destroyer of the fear of the cycle of birth and death. Oh Sai, resident of Parthi, You are the Lord Narayana.
Songglossary: adi, alakh, baba, bhaktha, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, deen, dharma, eesa, hey, kaara, ke, masiha, narayana, niranjan, parayana, puttaparthi, sai, taarana, tum, uddhara

Title: Deena Dukhiyon Se Prem Karo
Lyrics:
Deena Dukhiyon Se Prem Karo Mera Sai Prasanna Hoga
Sai Mera Main Tera Yeh Prem Ki Beheti Dhaara
Yeh Prem Ki Beheti Dhaara
Mera Sai Prasanna Hoga
Meaning: My Lord Sai will be very happy, if you love and serve those afflicted with misery and pain. The flow of love binds us to Sai and binds Sai to us. This is the Stream of Love that flows amongst us.
Songglossary: beheti, deen, dhaara, hoga, karo, mera, prasanna, prem, sai, se, tera, yeh

Title: Deena Janavana Deena Samrakshaka
Lyrics:
Deena Janavana Deena Samrakshaka
Sanathana Sarathey Devadi Deva
Adi Sanathana Nithya Niranjana
Jagadodharana Sai Narayana
Jyothi Swaroopa Prema Swaroopa
Prashanthi Swaroopa Devadi Deva
Meaning: Oh God of Gods, Sai Narayana, You are the protector and refuge of the destitute. You are the eternal charioteer. Your supreme state is eternal. You are spotless and unaffected by the world. You are the upholder and sustainer of the universe, the embodiment of effulgence, love and Supreme Peace.
Songglossary: adi, deen, deva, devadi, jagadodhara, janavana, jyoth, narayana, niranjan, nithya, prashanthi, prem, sai, samraksha, sanatana, sarathey, swaroopa

Title: Deena Janavani Vara Dayini
Lyrics:
Deena Janavani Vara Dayini
Gnana Swaroopini Narayani
Sayeeshwari Amba Jagadeeshwari
Veda (Swa)Roopini Vageshwari
Prema Pradayini Partheeshwari
Mata Maheshwari Mana Mohini [ Sayeeshwari Amba ]
Meaning: Oh mother Sayeeshwari, the goddess of the universe. You are the refuge to the destitute. You bestow boons and who loves the divine music. You are the essence of the Vedas and goddess of speech who bestows love. You are Partheeshwari and Maheshwari, the one who delights the mind.
Songglossary: amba, dayini, deen, gnana, jagadeeshwari, janavana, maheshwari, mana, mata, mohan, narayani, partheeshwari, prem, sayee, swaroopa, vageshwari, vara, veda

Title: Deena Natha Sai Guru Natha
Lyrics:
Deena Natha Sai Guru Natha
Prema Swaroopa Shanthi Pradatha [ Deena Natha ]
Jaya Jaya Guru Deva Satchidananda
Shashi Vadana Alankruta Kesha
Sundara Sai Ananda Dayi
Daya Sagara Karunakara Sai Guru Deva
Meaning: Oh Sai Gurunatha, the Lord of the destitute, love is your form. You grant peace to the devotees. Victory unto you Oh lord, who is the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss, who has a face like the moon, decorated with a crown of hair. Oh Sai, you are the ocean of compassion and kindness.
Songglossary: alankruta, anand, daya, dayi, deen, deva, guru, jay, karuna, kesha, natha, pradatha, prem, sagar, sai, satchidananda, shanthi, shashi, sundara, swaroopa, vadana

Title: Deena Natha Shankara
Lyrics:
Deena Natha Shankara
Karuna Sagara Shankara
Parthi Pureeshwara Shankara
Bhola Natha Kailasa Vasa
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Paramesha
Sayeeshwara Deva
Meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, the bestower of happiness, you are the Lord of the destitute Oh Lord Shankara, who resides in Parthi, You are an ocean of compassion. Oh Easy-to-please Lord, you have the mount Kailasa as your abode. Oh Lord of Parthi, You are the greatest Lord, Oh Sayeeshwara.
Songglossary: bhola, deen, deva, hey, kailasa, karuna, natha, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, sagar, sayee, shankara, vasa

Title: Deena Sharanya Deena Natha
Lyrics:
Deena Sharanya Deena Natha
Karuna Sagara Sai Baba
Karuna Sagara Sai
Sita Rama Radhey Shyama
Sai Sundara Rama
Maya Manusha Vesha Dharey Tum
Jaya Leeladhara Sai Baba
Jaya Leeladhara Sai
Meaning: Oh radiant Lord Sai Krishna, you are the protector of needy and downtrodden, the ocean of compassion, you are Lord Rama, the consort of mother Sita and also Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha. You have attired the beautiful human form to be among your devotees.
Songglossary: baba, deen, dhari, jay, karuna, leela, manusha, maya, natha, radha, ram, sagar, sai, sham, sharan, sita, sundara, tum, vesha

Title: Deenodharana Rama Harey
Lyrics:
Deenodharana Rama Harey
Deena Dayala Krishna Harey
Raghukula Tilaka Rama Harey
Yadu Kula Nandana Krishna Harey
Meaning: Oh Rama, you are the saviour of the meek and week. You are also Krishna who is compassionate to the meek and week. You are the star of the Raghu clan and as Krishna, the darling of Nanda and the star of the Yadu clan.
Songglossary: dayal, deen, deenodharana, hari, krishna, kula, nanda, raghu, ram, tilaka, yadu

Title: Deenodharana Yadu Veera
Lyrics:
Deenodharana Yadu Veera
Gopi Sanchitha Krutha Chora
Danava Samhara Ranadheera
Janaki Jeevana Aadhara
Meaning: Oh Krishna, you are the star and courageous one of the Yadu clan, who is the upholder of the meek and week. You are the mischievous thief who stole butter from the Gopikas. You are the great warrior who annihilates demons. You are also the refuge and life of Janaki (Sita).
Songglossary: aadhaar, chora, danava, deenodharana, gopi, janaki, jeeva, ranadheera, samhara, sanchitha, veera, yadu

Title: Dehi Sharanam Simha Vahini
Lyrics:
Dehi Sharanam Simha Vahini
Dehi Sharanam Asura Vinashini
Dehi Sharanam Bhava Bhaya Haarini
Dehi Sharanam Hari Narayani
Dehi Sharanam Brahma Sanathani
Dehi Sharanam Sai Narayani
Meaning: Grant me protection of Goddess Durga, whose vehicle is a Lion. Oh Destroyer of demons, Oh Destroyer of the fear of the cycle of birth and death, Oh Consort of Lord Narayana, Oh the eternal infinite one, Oh Sai Narayani, Grant me protection.
Songglossary: asura, bhava, bhaya, brahma, dehi, haarini, hari, narayani, sai, sanatana, sharan, simha, vahini, vinashana

Title: Destroyer Of All Worldly Ties
Lyrics:
Destroyer Of All Worldly Ties, I Drink Bliss From Your Lotus Eyes
You Wear The Ganga As Your Crown
Burn Lust And Greed Right To The Ground
Songglossary: ganga

Title: Deva Deva Daya Karo
Lyrics:
Deva Deva
Daya Karo Sai Deva
Krupa Karo Sai Deva
Antaryami Sai Natha
Parthipurisha He Paramesha
Deena Dayala Sai Natha
Prema Swaroopa Paramananda
Jai Jai Jai Jai Sadguru Deva
Karuna Sagara Sathya Sai Deva
Meaning:
O Lord! O Lord Sai! O Indweller of Heart! Have mercy and shower Thy grace. 
O Embodiment of Love and Bliss! O Resident of Parthi! 
Thou art extremely kind to the miserable, afflicted and dejected.
Songglossary: antar, daya, dayal, deen, deva, jai, karo, karuna, krupa, natha, param, partheeshwara, prem, sadguru, sagar, sai, sathya, swaroopa

Title: Deva Deva Giri Deva Dalarchita
Lyrics:
Deva Deva Giri Deva Dalarchita
Deva Sura Paripalaya Mamkita
Chandrachuda Shiva Tejovilarchita
Rundamala Dhara Trishoola Shobhita
Meaning: Oh Shiva, the great God, the resident of Ice Mountain, who is worshipped with the petals of flowers and leaves. You are the protector of the Gods. We adore you Oh Shiva, the effulgent one, adorned with the crescent moon on the head, garland of skulls of evil doers and who holds the Trident.
Songglossary: chand, dalarchita, deva, dhara, giri, paripala, rundamala, shiva, shobhita, sura, tejovilarchita, trishoola

Title: Deva Deva Mahadeva Sai Shankara
Lyrics:
Deva Deva Mahadeva Sai Shankara
Sai Shankara Shirdeeshwara
Bhasmodbhavakara Partheeshwara
Swara Varna Tejonmaya Jagadeeshwara
Sarva Mantra Swaroopa Sayeeshwara
Vamadeva Virupaksha Vishweshwara
Meaning: God of gods Oh Mahadeva, who is also Sai Shankara, the resident of Shirdi. You are Partheeshwara, who creates sacred and divine ash. You are the effulgent God of the universe from whom emanates musical notes and alphabets. You are Sayeeshwara, Vama Deva, Virupaksha and Vishveshwara who are the embodiment of all mantras.
Songglossary: bhasmodbhavakara, deva, jagadeesha, mahadev, mantra, partheeshwara, sai, sarva, sayee, shankara, shirdeesha, swara, swaroopa, tejonmaya, vamadeva, varna, virupaksha, vishweshwara

Title: Deva Devothama Deena Samrakshaka
Lyrics:
Deva Devothama Deena Samrakshaka
Devadi Deva Dayamaya
Sri Sai Deva Krupamaya [ Deva Devothama ... ]
Patithodhara Paapa Vidhura
Parthi Vihara Parameshwara
Bhasmodbhavakara Bhava Bhaya Nashana [ Sri Sai Deva ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sri Sai! You are Supreme among Gods, the Protector of the afflicted. Oh Lord of all Lords, you are the embodiment of compassion. Oh Lord Sai, you are the embodiment of mercy. Oh Lord, the up-lifter of the fallen and the destitute, Oh Supreme Lord, the one who moves about in Parthi Oh Creator of Bhasma, the sacred ash and the remover of the fear of the bondage of cycle of birth and death. Oh Lord Sai deva, the embodiment of mercy.
Songglossary: bhasmodbhavakara, bhava, bhaya, dayamayi, deen, deva, devadi, devothama, krupa, nasha, paapa, param, patithodhara, puttaparthi, sai, samraksha, sri, vidhura, vihar

Title: Deva Senapathey Skanda Subrahmanya Paahi
Lyrics:
Deva Senapathey Skanda Subrahmanya Paahi Maam
Paahi Parameshwara Skanda Subrahmanya Paahi Maam
Subrahmanya Shanmukha Natha
Sai Natha Karuna Sindho [ Paahi Parameshwara ]
Meaning: Oh Subrahmanya (son of Shiva) the chief of the battalion of Gods, who destroys demons, protect us. Oh Skanda, the supreme God, protect us. Protect us, Oh Shanmukha Natha (six faces God) and Sai Natha who is the embodiment of kindness.
Songglossary: deva, karuna, maam, natha, paahi, param, sai, senapathey, shanmukha, sindhu, skanda, subramanya

Title: Devadi Deva Vinayaka
Lyrics:
Devadi Deva Vinayaka
Pranava Swaroopa Suramuni Vanditha [ Devadi Deva ]
Mangala Charana Paahi Gajanana
Hey Shubha Dayaka Vighna Vinashaka
Sri Charanam Bhava Dukha Haranam (2)
Meaning: God of Gods Vinayaka (elephant headed God) you are the embodiment of Pranava, the primordial sound. Worshipped by Gods and saints, having an auspicious feet, protect us. Hey, Gajanana, who bestows goodness and frees us from the miseries of the world.
Songglossary: bhava, chara, dayaka, deva, devadi, dukh, gajamukha, harana, hey, mangal, paahi, pranava, shubh, sri, suramuni, swaroopa, vanditha, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Devaki Nandana Gopala (Vasu)
Lyrics:
Devaki Nandana Gopala (Vasu)
Shyama Mukunda Gopala [ Devaki Nandana ... ]
Radha Madhava Raasa Vilola
Leela Manusha Natavara Lala
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala, the beloved son of Mother Devaki Chant the name of Lord Gopala, who is also known as Shyama, the one who is beautiful because of the color black and the conferrer of Liberation. Chant the name of the one who is as sweet as honey and who delights in participating in folk dances with Radha. Chant the name of the Lord, who is a supreme dancer.
Songglossary: devaki, gopal, lal, leela, madhava, manusha, mukunda, nanda, natavara, raasa, radha, sham, vasudeva, vilola

Title: Devaki Nandana Krishna (Vasu)
Lyrics:
Devaki Nandana Krishna (Vasu)
Shyama Sundara Krishna Krishna [ Devaki Nandana ... ]
Madhava Govinda Krishna
Neela Megha Krishna
Jaya Shri Krishna Sai Krishna Govinda Gopala Krishna
Hari Govinda Gopala Krishna
Meaning: Chant the different names (Madhava, Govinda, Gopala) of blue-complexioned Lord Krishna, son of Devaki.
Songglossary: devaki, gopal, govinda, hari, jay, krishna, madhava, megha, nanda, neela, sai, sham, sri, sundara, vasudeva

Title: Devaki Tanaya Daya Nidhey
Lyrics:
Devaki Tanaya Daya Nidhey
Daya Nidhey Krupa Nidhey [ Devaki Tanaya ... ]
Darshan Deejo Deva ( Sai ) Deva
Deena Natha Sai Natha
Meaning: Worship the merciful and compassionate Son of Mother Devaki, Lord Krishna. Oh the treasure house of compassion and mercy. Oh Lord of Lords, Sai Deva, please grant us your Darshan, view of your Divine Form. Oh Sai Natha, the up-lifter of the forlorn.
Songglossary: darsh, daya, deejo, deen, deva, devaki, krupa, natha, nidhey, sai, tanaya

Title: Devi Bhavani Jagat Janani
Lyrics:
Devi Bhavani Jagat Janani
Manda Haasini Ananda Dayini [ Devi Bhavani ... ]
Mangala Kaarini Karunya Roopini
Narayani Devi Narayani
Mahishasura Mardhini Ambe Bhavani
Meaning: Oh Goddess Bhavani, the mother of Universe and the destroyer of cycle of birth and death. She has a bewitching smile and she confers bliss. She confers auspiciousness and is the embodiment of mercy. Worship Goddess Narayani. She is the annihilator of the demon Mahisha, Goddess Amba.
Songglossary: amba, anand, bhavani, dayini, devi, jagat, janani, kaarini, karuna, mahishasura, manda, mangal, mardini, narayani, roop, roopa, suhaasini, swaroopa

Title: Devi Bhavani Ma Jaya Sai
Lyrics:
Devi Bhavani Ma Jaya Sai Bhavani Ma
Daya Karo Sai Ma Krupa Karo Sai Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Devi Bhavani Ma
Jaya Parthi Nivasini Ma Jaya Sai Bhavani Ma
Meaning: Victory to the Mother Sai Bhavani, the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death. Oh Sai Ma, bestow on us Your mercy and compassion. Oh Mother, resident of Parthi, Victory and Glory to Thee.
Songglossary: bhavani, daya, devi, jay, karo, krupa, ma, nivasi, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Devi Durga Kalyani
Lyrics:
Devi Durga Kalyani
Maha Shakthi Bhavani Shivani [ Devi Durga ]
Suguna Manohari Sai Bhavani
Devi Jagadambe Janani Dayamayi
Vande Bhagawathi Mata Bhavani
Meaning: Oh goddess Durga, who confers auspiciousness. You are Bhavani with tremendous power, who is the consort of Shiva. You are the captivating Sai Bhavani with virtuous qualities. Oh divine mother of the universe, who is highly compassionate. Oh mother who is adored as Bhagawathi and Bhavani, we bow to you.
Songglossary: bhagavathi, bhava, dayamayi, devi, durga, jagadamba, janani, kalyan, maha, manohar, mata, sai, shakthi, shiva, suguna, vande

Title: Devi Durga Sashabhuja Dharini
Lyrics:
Devi Durga Dasha Bhuja Dharini
Danava Daitya Dukha Samharini [ Devi Durga ... ]
Bhagavathi Bharati Bhava Bhaya Harini
Mata Maheshwari Mangala Karini
Raja Rajeshwari Durga Bhavani
Bhaktha Janashraya Sai Bhavani
Meaning: Chant the name of Goddess Durga with ten arms. She is the destroyer of evil demonic qualities and destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death. She confers auspiciousness, and protects Her devotees.
Songglossary: bhagavathi, bhaktha, bharati, bhava, bhaya, bhuja, daithya, danava, dasha, devi, dhari, dukh, durga, haarini, janashraya, kaarini, maheshwari, mangal, mata, raja, rajeshwari, sai, samhari

Title: Devi Jagat Janani Sai Mata
Lyrics:
Devi Jagat Janani Sai Mata
Pranava Swaroopini Praneshwari [ Devi Jagat ... ]
Gnana Pradayini Gnaneshwari
Tripura Sundari Daakshayini
Bhagawathi Bharati Narayani
Jagadeeshwari Jaganmohini
Karunamayi Sathya Sayeeshwari
Meaning: O Sai Mother, You are the mother to the entire world, You are the form of Pranava (Primordial Sound, Om) and You are the very life. O Embodiment of wisdom, You grant us the knowledge and wisdom. O Daughter of Dhaksha (Goddess Parvathi), You are the most beautiful one in all the three worlds. You are Bhagawathi, Bharati and Narayani. O Goddess of the entire world, You enchant the whole world. O Sai Mother, You are the embodiment of compassion.
Songglossary: bhagavathi, bharati, daakshayini, dayini, devi, gnana, gnaneshwari, jagadeeshwari, jagan, jagat, janani, karuna, mata, narayani, pranava, praneshwari, sai, sathya, sayee, soundari, swaroopa, tripura

Title: Devi Janani Sai Janani Darshana
Lyrics:
Devi Janani Sai Janani Darshana Do Mata
Danava Mardhini Dharma Swaroopini Darshan Do Mata
Sathya Sanathani Shanthi Pradayini Darshan Do Mata
Parthi Pureeshwari Prema Pradayini Darshan Do Mata
Darshan Do Mata (4)
Meaning: Oh universal mother, Sai Janani, bestow on us the vision of your divine form. You are the destroyer of demons, embodiment of righteousness. You are the eternal truth and the goddess of Parthi who bestows peace and love.
Songglossary: danava, darsh, dayini, devi, dharma, do, janani, mardini, mata, prem, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sanatana, sathya, shanthi, swaroopa

Title: Devi Lakshmi Maam Paahi
Lyrics:
Devi Lakshmi Maam Paahi
Deena Daya Kari Maam Paahi [ Devi Lakshmi ]
Ksheerabdhi Tanaye Maam Paahi
Sarva Mangaley Maam Paahi
Meaning: Oh goddess Lakshmi, protect us. You are compassionate towards the meek and week. You are the consort of Narayana, reclining on the ocean of milk. Protect us, Oh goddess of auspiciousness.
Songglossary: daya, deen, devi, kari, ksheerabdhi, lakshmi, maam, mangal, paahi, sarva, tanaya

Title: Devi Sai Ma Devi Saraswathi
Lyrics:
Devi Sai Ma Devi Saraswathi Ma
Durga Bhavani Ma Kaali Kapalini Ma
Jagadodharini Ma
Sai Daya Karo Ma (Sathya)
Meaning: Worship Mother Sai, Mother Saraswathi (Goddess of knowledge and wisdom), Mother Durga Bhavani (Destroyer of the cycle of birth and death) and Mother Kaali (Destroyer of demonic qualities and the One holding a skull as a symbol). O uplifter of the entire universe, please be compassionate towards us.
Songglossary: bhavani, daya, devi, durga, jagadodhara, kaali, kapalini, karo, ma, sai, saraswathi, sathya

Title: Devi Saraswathi Ma Jaya Sai
Lyrics:
Devi Saraswathi Ma Jaya Sai Saraswathi Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jagadodharini Ma
Dasha Bhujadharini Ma [ Jaya Ma ... ]
Meaning: Victory to the Mother, Devi, Saraswathi. Victory to the One who sustains the Universe, the One who with 10 hands.
Songglossary: bhuja, dasha, devi, jagadodhara, jay, ma, sai, saraswathi

Title: Devotees have called on Baba
Lyrics:
Devotees have called on Baba
 I have called You Baba everyone has called You
 Give us something to lean on
 You have come to Baba, You have to come You have to come
 Please come from Shiridi or come from Parthi
 Come from Mathura or come from Ayodhya
 You may come from Mecca or Medina
 O my Baba, O my Sai Ram, You really have to come
