 You have to come Baba, You have to come You have to Come
 
 Sung to the tune of Bhakthoney Hai Aaj Pukara

Title: Dhanya Ho Eshwaramba
Lyrics:
Dhanya Ho Eshwaramba
Jag Ko Deejo Lal Baba
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho
Kali Yug Mey Avatar Liye
Sakala Charachara Hey Bhagawan
Jagadodhara Sai Narayana
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho
Dhanya Ho Eshwaramba (2)
Meaning: Glory to Thee, Oh! Auspicious Mother Eshwaramba! You have gifted Lord Sai Gopal to the world in the present Kali age. Lord Sai Narayana is Omnipresent and has come for the deliverance of mankind.
Songglossary: avatar, baba, bhagawan, chara, deejo, dhanya, eshwar, hey, ho, jagadodhara, jagat, kali, lal, liye, narayana, sai, sakala, yuga

Title: Dharani Nayaka Govinda
Lyrics:
Dharani Nayaka Govinda
Dinakara Teja Govinda
Venu Gaana Priya Govinda
Venkata Ramana Govinda
Geeta Dayaka Govinda
Sukha Paripalaka Govinda
Meaning: O Lord Krishna (Govinda), who loves to play beautiful music on His flute and who gave us the Bhagawad Geeta and who protects and sustains His devotees. He is the Lord of the Universe who lights up our lives everyday.
Songglossary: dayaka, dhara, dinakara, gaan, geeta, govinda, nayaka, paripala, priya, ramana, sukh, teja, venkatesha, venu

Title: Dhim Dhim Dhimi Dhimi Natana
Lyrics:
Dhim Dhim Dhimi Dhimi Natana Shiva
Tandava Keli Vilasa Shiva
Leela Manusha Vesha Shiva
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Shiva (Atma)
Sai Shiva Hara Bala Shiva
Meaning: Lord Shiva's rhythmical dance is referred to here as Dhim Dhim Dhimi. Lord Shiva delights in the rhythmical dance and he performs the cosmic dance, Tandavam. (also referred to as Shiva Tandavam) Lord Shiva, has taken the human form, which is like a sport (leela) for him. Sai Shiva, is our Young Shiva, who brings out the Lingam from within, by His Divine Will.
Songglossary: atma, bala, dhim, dhimi, hara, keli, leela, lingodbhava, manusha, natana, sai, shiva, tandava, vesha, vilasa

Title: Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim Dhimitha Dhimitha
Lyrics:
Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim Nachey Bhola Nath
Nachey Bhola Nath (4)
Mrudanga Bholey Shiva Shiva Shiva Om
Damaru Bholey Hara Hara Hara Om
Veena Bholey Sai Ram Sai Ram
Nachey Bhola Nath (4)
Meaning: Lord Shiva dances in ecstacy with the tune, "Dhimita Dhimita Dhim". Along with it the drum vibrates with the sound, "Hara Hara Hara Om". The mrudanga (musical instrumental) chants the auspicious name of, "Shiva Shiva Shiva" and the Veena (musical instruments)
Songglossary: bhola, bhole, damaru, dhim, dhimi, hara, mrudanga, nach, natha, om, ram, sai, shiva, veena

Title: Dhina Dhinama Obe
Lyrics:
Dhina Dhinama Obe, Sama Thanema Lovee
 Shubha Sarana Soya Ava
 Sathya Sai Thumani Shirdi Sai Thumani
 Obe Sarana Soya Ava
 Obe Pada Kamal Puda Suvandha Malin
 Bathi Gee Gayamin Namadhimu Samagin
 Yadhumata Api Ava Sai Ram, Pidhumata Apa Ava Sai Ram

Title: Divine Mother Parvathi Blissful Mother
Lyrics:
Divine Mother Parvathi, Blissful Mother Sai
Lead Us From Harm, Lead Us From Fear, Grant Us Eternal Happiness
Mother Of The Universe, Charming And Holy
Overwhelming In Compassion, Blissful Mother Sai
Songglossary: parvathi, sai

Title: Divine mother Sai
Lyrics:
Divine mother Sai, please come and be with me
Divine mother Sai, be as a mother to me
Divine mother Sai, please come and be with me
I call You in weakness
That's when I long for Your sweetness
Your tender loving, care and giving, takes care of troubles for me (2x)
I cry to You in sickness
That's when I long for Your sweetness
Your tender loving, care and giving, (Sai) takes care of troubles for me (2x)
Songglossary: sai

Title: Divine Mother Soham
Lyrics:
Divine Mother Soham You And I Are One
Shirdi Baba Soham You And I Are One
Jesus Christ Soham You And I Are One
Divine Father Soham You And I Are One
Brahma Brahma Soham You And I Are One
Allah Allah Soham You And I Are One
Buddha Buddha Soham You And I Are One
Sathya Sai Soham You And I Are One
Songglossary: allah, baba, brahma, buddha, sai, sathya, shirdi, soham

Title: Dont Worry Be Happy
Lyrics:
Dont Worry, Be Happy For Baba Loves Us So
Illusions Are Many But Underneath Them All
There Is One Reality That You And I Are One
That God Is Love And Love Is God And God And Man Are One
Songglossary: baba, mana, so

Title: Door Of My Heart
Lyrics:
Door Of My Heart Open Wide I Keep For Thee
Wilt Thou Come (2), Precious Baba, Come To Me [ Door Of ... ]
Will My Days Fly Away Without Seeing Thee My Lord
Night And Day, Night And Day, I Look For Thee Night And Day
Songglossary: baba, door

Title: Dum Dum Dum Dum Damaru
Lyrics:
Dum Dum Dum Dum Damaru Bhajey
Bhola Nath Shiva Shambho Bhajey ( Hara )
Hara Sai Nath Shiva Shambho Bhajey
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bhajey
Gowri Nath Shiva Shambho Bhajey [ Hara Sai Nath ]
Meaning: In ecstacy, the drum (Damaru) beats "Dum Dum Dum". It plays in the worship of Sai and Shiva, the easy-to-be-pleased Lord and the destroyer of ignorance. The gong rings out the sounds "Ghan Ghan Ghan". Worship the Lord of Goddess Parvathi (the consort of Lord Shiva).
GeneralComments: This song has a Spanish version as well: http://sairegion3.org/songs/dam-dam-dam-dam-toca-tu-tambor/
Songglossary: bhaja, bhola, damaru, dum, ghana, ghanta, gowri, hara, natha, sai, shambho, shiva

Title: Durga Amba Bhavani Jai Jai
Lyrics:
Durga Amba Bhavani Jai Jai Durge Amba Bhavani
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini (2)
Pranava Swaroopini Mata Jai Jai
Durga Amba Bhavani
Meaning: Victory to goddess Durga Amba Bhavani, the annihilator of miseries, bestower of auspiciousness and the embodiment of primordial sound.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, durga, durge, haarini, jai, kaarini, mangal, mata, pranava, sankata, swaroopa

Title: Durga Bhavani Ma Jaya Jaya
Lyrics:
Durga Bhavani Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
Kaali Kapalini Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma [ Durga Bhavani ... ]
Parama Shivani Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
Jagadodharini Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
Meaning: Victory to Mother Durga, Bhavani, Kaali and Sai. Victory to Mother Sai, Who is the Supreme Shivani (Power). Victory to Mother Sai, Who has come to save and deliver mankind.
Songglossary: bhava, durga, jagadodhara, jay, kaali, kapalini, ma, param, sai, shiva

Title: Durga Durga Devi Durgati Nashini
Lyrics:
Durga Durga Devi Durgati Nashini
Kaali Kaali Maha Kaali Kapalini [ Durga Durga ... ]
Bhagawathi Bharati Devi Saraswathi
Ambe Bhavani Lakshmi Narayani
Parthi Nivasini Sai Janani
Meaning: Chant the name of Durga, the goddess who removes poverty. Chant the name of Kaali, the goddess who adorns the garland of skulls (of evil doers). Oh mother Sai you are also adored as Bhagawathi, Bharati, Saraswathi, Bhavani and Lakshmi.
Songglossary: amba, bhagavathi, bharati, bhava, devi, durga, janani, kaali, kapalini, lakshmi, maha, narayani, nivasi, puttaparthi, sai, saraswathi, vinashana

Title: Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Hey Sai
Lyrics:
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Hey Sai Jaganmata
Sai Jaganmata Mata Sai Jaganmata [ Durga Lakshmi ... ]
Veena Vadini Saraswathi Hey Sai Jaganmata
Durga Lakshmi Amba Bhavani Sai Jaganmata [ Sai Jaganmata ]
Meaning: Hey Sai, the universal mother. You are goddess Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi who plays the divine Veena.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, durga, hey, jagan, lakshmi, mata, sai, saraswathi, vadini, veena

Title: Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Ma
Lyrics:
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Ma
Dukha Nivarini Jagat Janani
Janani Janani Janani [ Durga Lakshmi ... ]
Janma Vimochani Jagadambe
Paapa Vinashini Parama Shivey
Para Sukha Dayini Sai Shivey
Parthi Nivasini Sada Shivey [ Janani Janani ]
Meaning: Adore the universal mother, who is worshipped as Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi. You are the remover of sorrows and one who frees us from the cycle of birth and death by washing away our sins. You are the supreme Goddess of Parthi who is compassionate and bestows bliss to all.
Songglossary: dayini, dukh, durga, jagadamba, jagat, janam, janani, lakshmi, ma, nivarana, nivasi, paapa, para, param, puttaparthi, sada, sai, saraswathi, shiva, sukh, vimochana, vinashana

Title: Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Sai Jaganmata
Lyrics:
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Sai Jaganmata (Jai)
Sai Jaganmata Maam Paahi Jaganmata (Sathya) (2)
Meaning: Glory to Durga, Lakshmi, Saraswathi and mother Sai. Divine Mother of the Universe Oh Sai, protect me.
Songglossary: durga, jagan, jai, lakshmi, maam, paahi, sai, saraswathi, sathya

Title: Durgati Nashini Durge Jaya Jaya
Lyrics:
Durgati Nashini Durge Jaya Jaya
Kaala Vinashini Kaali Jaya Jaya [ Durgati Nashini ... ]
Uma Rama Brahmani Jaya Jaya (2)
Sita Radha Rukmini Jaya Jaya
Meaning: Victory to Goddess Durga, who destroys misfortunes and distress. Victory to Goddess Kali, Who is the destroyer of demonic qualities. Victory to Goddess Uma, Sita, Radha and Rukmini. Victory to Lord Sai Natha, Who is affectionate, tender and loving towards us.
Songglossary: brahma, durga, durge, jay, kaala, kaali, radha, ram, rukmini, sita, uma, vinashana

Title: Durge Durge Durge Jai Jai
Lyrics:
Durge Durge Durge Jai Jai Ma (2)
Karuna Sagari Ma
Kaali Kapalini Ma
Jagadodharini Ma
(Amba) Durge Jai Jai (Sai) Ma
Meaning: Victory to Mother Durga, the ocean of compassion. Glory be to Mother Kaali, who is adorned with a garland of human skulls (represents the destruction of our ego) and who uplifts the whole world. Victory to Mother Durga who is none other than our dear Mother Sai.
Songglossary: amba, durge, jagadodhara, jai, kaali, kapalini, karuna, ma, sagar, sai

Title: Durgeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari (Amba)
Lyrics:
Durgeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari (Amba)
Paramesha Jagadeesha Partheeshwari [ Durgeshwari ... ]
Karunya Lavanya Kamaleshwari
Sathya Sai Jaganmata Parameshwari
Meaning: Oh universal mother Durga, you are Sayeeshwari, the embodiment of truth and infinity. You are also adored as Kamaleshwari, with elegant beauty and compassion.
Songglossary: amba, durge, jagadeesha, jagan, kamale, karuna, lavanya, param, partheeshwari, sai, sathya, sayee

Title: Dwaraka Natha Madhusudhana Ghana Shyam
Lyrics:
Dwaraka Natha Madhusudhana Ghana Shyam
Gokula Nandana Devaki Nandana
Sai Sundara Shyama [ Dwaraka Natha ... ]
Mandara Giridhara Venu Vilolana
Kamala Vadana Ghana Shyam
Parthi Vihari Krishna Murari
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyama Shyama
Meaning: We adore you as Madhusudhana and Ghana Shyama, the Lord of Dwaraka, the darling of Gokula and Nanda. You are none other than our beautiful Sai Shyama, who enchants us with his divine flute playing in the woods of Mandara Mountain. Your face is like the lotus flower and has a dark complexion.
Songglossary: devaki, dwaraka, ghana, giridhar, gokul, kamala, krishna, madhu, manda, murare, nanda, natha, puttaparthi, sai, sham, sundara, vadana, venu, vihar, vilola

Title: Ek Baar Kshama Karo Sai
Lyrics:
Ek Baar Kshama Karo Sai Merey Baba Sri Sathya Sai
Kshama Murthy Sai Baba Prema Murthy Sathya Sai [ Ek Baar ... ]
Shirdi Ke Sai Terey Dwarakamayi
Parthi Ke Sai Teri Yaad Mujhey Aayi [ Kshama Murthy ]
Meaning: Merciful One! Sri Sathya Sai Baba, please forgive me I am standing in front of You, thinking about You. Oh! Shirdi Sai residing in Dwarakamayi, I remember Sai the dweller of Parthi, who is full of Love.
Songglossary: aana, baar-baar, baba, dwaraka, ek, karo, ke, kshama, mera, mujhe, murthy, prem, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, shirdi, sri, tera, yaad

Title: Eka Dantham Sai Gajananam
Lyrics:
Eka Dantham Sai Gajananam
Ganapathi Vara Siddhi Vinayakam [ Eka Dantham ]
Gananatham Shiva Gowri Sutham
Gajamukham Sai Gajananam (2)
Gajamukham Sai Gajananam (3)
Meaning: We adore you Sai Gajanana (elephant headed god), who has a single tusk. Head of Ganaas (demigods) and bestower of boons O Vinayaka (leaderless), you are the son of mother Gowri and Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: dantha, eka, gajamukha, gananatha, gananayaka, gowri, sai, shiva, siddhi, sutha, vara, vinayaka

Title: Ekadanta Shri Gananatha
Lyrics:
Ekadanta Shri Gananatha
Eshwara Priya Sutha Vinayaka
Pranava Swaroopa Gananatha [ Ekadanta Shri ... ]
Adi Poojya Shri Gananatha
Parvathi Tanaya Vinayaka
Pahi Pahi He Gananatha
Lambodhara Ganadhipa
Vighna Harana Sai Vinayaka
Meaning:
Pray to Gananaatha, Lord Ganesh, who has one tooth in His elephant head. 
Pray to Him who removes obstacles, the beloved son of Shiva. 
Pray to Him who is the embodiment of the life giving force, Pranava. 
Pray to Him, with Whom all poojas begin. Pray to the son of Parvathi, the pot bellied One who removes obstacles.
Songglossary: adi, ekadanta, eshwar, ganadhipa, gananatha, harana, lambodhara, paahi, parvathi, poojya, pranava, priya, sai, sri, sutha, swaroopa, tanaya, vighna, vinayaka

Title: El Seor es mi pastor
Lyrics:
El Seor es mi pastor, y nada me faltar.
El Seor, aqu lleg a darnos libertad
Loemos a nuestro Seor, cantando con mucho fervor.
Loemos a nuestro Seor, cantando con mucho amor.
Jai Rama, Jai Rama, Jai Rama Jai (2x)
Jai Krishna, Jai Krishna, Jai Krishna Jai (2x)
Jai Buddha, Jai Buddha, Jai Buddha Jai (2x)
Jai Cristo, Jai Cristo, Jai Cristo Jai (2x)
Por qu temer si estoy aqu?
Solo llamar y yo estoy ah
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba Jai (2x)
(accompaniment stops)
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba Jai (2x)
(Accompaniment reenters, speed increases)
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba Jai (2x)
(speed increases)
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba Jai
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai (pause)
(sing slowly)
Sai Baba Jai

Title: En la tierra estas
Lyrics:
En La Tierra Estas
Caminando En Paz
Mia Es Tu Verdad
Hombre Avatar
Pues Mi Corazon
Te Robaste Ya
Om Baba Baba Om, Om Baba Om
En Tu Nilayam
Quema Mi Temor
Swami Sathya Sai
Mi Amo Y Senor Madre, Padre, Y Dios
Om Baba Om
Om Baba Baba Om, Om Baba Om
Meaning: Your are an Avatar on earth, walking in peace; Your truth is mine because You stole my heart. Burn my fear in your Nilayam; Swami Sathya Sai; my Lord; Mother, Father, and God.
Songglossary: avatar, baba, nilaya, om, paz, sai, sathya, swami, tum, ya

Title: Engrossed is the bee of my mind
Lyrics:
Engrossed is the bee of my mind
 On the Blue Lotus Feet of my Divine Mother
 Divine Mother, my Divine Mother (2X)

Title: Es el que invade el corazon
Lyrics:
Es el que invade el corazon
Es el que nos llena de Amor 
Residente de Parthi, fuente de Amor
Residente de Parthi te canto a Vos. 
Maestro de la Cancion. 
Baname de Paz con tu voz
Baname de Paz con el Om
Meaning:
Is the One who conquer the heart. 

Is the One who fulfill us with Love. 

Parthi's Divine resident, 

Love's Source, 

I sing to You, 

Master of the Divine Song. 

Shower Peace over me with your divine voice.

Shower Peace over me with The Om.
Songglossary: om, paz, puttaparthi, tum

Title: Eshwar Allah Ek Tum Hi
Lyrics:
Eshwar Allah Ek Tum Hi Ho
Karuna Sindho Ram
Deena (Bhaktha) Janon Ke Jeevan Saharey
Daya (Mujhey Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Karuna Sagara Dayabhi Rama
Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: Eshwara (refers to God in Hinduism) and Allah (God in Islam) are both one and the same. The name refers to the same Almighty. Oh Rama, You shower on us the compassion You are the refuge to the destitute You are the refuge and saviour to the devotees Oh Bhagawan, Shower Your compassion on me Oh Merciful Rama, You are the ocean of Compassion.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, bhaktha, bolo, daya, dayabhi, deen, ek, eshwar, hai, ho, jai, jana, jeeva, karo, karuna, ke, krupa, mujhe, ram, sagar, saharey, sai, sindhu, tum

Title: Eshwar Allah Terey Naam Sai
Lyrics:
Eshwar Allah Terey Naam Sai Terey Naam
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Allah Sai Maulah Sai
Yesu Buddha Sai Hey Mahavir Sai
Govinda Sai Gopala Sai Nanak Sai [ Sarva Dharma ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, Eshwara is your name, so is the name Allah, yours. (The names Eshwar and Allah, both reach you Oh Lord Sai) Oh Sathya Sai Rama, you are fond of all the faiths You are Allah and You are Maulah. Oh Sai, You are Jesus Christ, Buddha, Mahavir. Oh Sai, You are Govinda, Gopala, Guru Nanak. Oh Sathya Sai, you are fond of all the faiths. (All the Faiths lead to you)
Songglossary: allah, buddha, dharma, eshwar, gopal, govinda, hey, mahavir, maulah, naam, nanak, priya, ram, sai, sarva, sathya, tera, yesu

Title: Eshwara Allah Tero Naam Eshwari
Lyrics:
Eshwara Allah Tero Naam Eshwari Nandana Sai Ram
Krishna Christhu Tero Naam Karuna Sagara Sai Ram
Rama Raghava Terey Naam Shirdi Pureeshwara Sai Ram
Krishna Keshava Tero Naam Karuna Sagara Sai Shyam
Meaning: You are adored as Eshwar and Allah. You are Sai Ram the son of mother Eshwaramba, the ocean of compassion. You are also worshipped as Krishna, Christ, Sai Baba (resident of Shirdi), Shyama and Keshava.
Songglossary: allah, christhu, eshwar, karuna, kesha, krishna, naam, nanda, purishwara, raghava, ram, sagar, sai, sham, shirdi, tera

Title: Eshwaramba Nandana Jagat Vidhata
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Jagat Vidhata
Parthi Nivasa Sai Deva Daya Karo Guru Deva (Hey)
Kamala Nayana Hey Hrudaya Vihari
Ananda Dayaka Hey Giridhari
Charan Sharan Mey Lelo Hum Ko
Yuga Avatara Sai Murari [ Parthi Nivasa ]
Meaning: Son of Eshwaramba, Sai Baba, creator of the universe, dweller of Puttaparthi, noble Lord and Teacher, Oh lotus-eyed One, indweller of devotees' hearts, Oh Sai Krishna, incarnation of this age, bestow Thy Grace on us, make us merge in You.
Songglossary: anand, avatar, chara, daya, dayaka, deva, eshwar, giridhar, guru, hey, hrudaya, hum, jagat, kamala, karo, lelo, murare, nanda, nayan, nivasa, puttaparthi, sai, sharan, vidhata, vihar, yuga

Title: Eshwaramba Nandana Niranjana Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Niranjana Namo Namo
Sarva Devatha Athitha Swaroopa Namo Namo [ Eshwaramba ]
Bhaktha Hrudaya Vasa Bhaktha Chintana Namo Namo
Sarva Loka Nayaka Sanathana Namo Namo
Sayeeshwara Namo Namo Sarveshwara Namo Namo (3)
Meaning: Salutation to thee Oh Sayeeshwara, the son of mother Eshwaramba, who is pure and spotless. You are the embodiment of all forms of Gods, the indweller of the heart, brooding always the welfare of devotees. O supreme Lord of all worlds, we bow unto you.
Songglossary: athitha, bhaktha, chintana, devatha, eshwar, hrudaya, loka, namo, nanda, nayaka, niranjan, sanatana, sarva, sarvesha, sayee, swaroopa, vasa

Title: Eshwaramba Nandana Sai
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai
Shirdi Parthi Prema Sai
Vishwa Kalyana Karana Sai
Shashwata Ananda Dayi Sai
Meaning: Oh Sai, you are the darling of Eshwaramba. You are the beloved of the people of Shirdi and Parthi. You are the cause of universal welfare and goodness. You are the bestower of perpetual bliss.
Songglossary: anand, dayi, eshwar, kaarana, kalyan, nanda, prem, puttaparthi, sai, shashwat, shirdi, vishwa

Title: Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Janardhana
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Janardhana
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Guru Deva
Sai Guru Deva Sai Guru Deva
Mangala Dayaka Sai Guru Deva
Munijana Mohana Madhava Sai
Prashanthi Nilaya Deva [ Parthi Pureeshwara ... ]
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai, residing in Prashanthi Nilayam, Oh son of Eshwaramba, you bestow auspiciousness and you are worshipped by sages.
Songglossary: dayaka, deva, eshwar, guru, janardhana, madhava, mangal, mohan, munijana, nanda, nilaya, prashanthi, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Rama
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sardhaka Rama
Prema Swaroopa Ananda Swaroopa
Jai Jai Sathya Sai Jai Divya Swaroopa
Meaning:
Oh Lord the son of Eshwaramba, Sai Ram, The Lord of Prasanthi Nilayam, 
You are the very embodiment of all the supreme virtues that enable man to become God. You are the Embodiment of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.
You are the form of Love, You are the form of Bliss. Victory to the Lord Sathya Sai, Victory to the Lord of Divine Form.
Songglossary: anand, dharma, divya, eshwar, jai, nanda, prem, ram, sai, saramu, sathya, shanthi, swaroopa

Title: Eshwaramba Priya Nandana
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Priya Nandana
Sai Jaya Jaga Vandana (2) [ Eshwaramba ]
Ratnakara Kula Bhooshana
Rajeeva Nayana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (3) (Narayana Sai Narayana)
Meaning: You are the beloved Son of Eshwaramba. You are worshipped by the whole world. You are the jewel of the Ratnakara clan. You have beautiful eyes. Oh Sai you are Hari, Narayana.
Songglossary: bhooshan, eshwar, hari, jagat, jay, kula, nanda, narayana, nayan, priya, rajeeva, ratnakara, sai, vandana

Title: Eshwaramba Priya Nandana He Sai
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Priya Nandana He Sai Rama
Ikshvaku Vamsha Dipa He Sai Rama
Devagiri Sutha Sai Shirdi Sai Rama
Godavari Tata Vasi He Sai Rama
Prema Sai Natha Avatara Sai Rama
Sarvatma Swaroopa Sathya Sai Rama
Meaning:
The darling Son of mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sai Rama.
Radiant Lamp of Ishvaku family / lineage, O Lord Sai Rama.
The son of Devagiri, O Lord Shirdi Sai Rama.
Lord Sairam who resides on the banks of river Godavari.
Master of Love Sai and Incarnation Sai Rama.
You are the Form of all Spirits Lord Sathya Sai Rama.
Songglossary: avatar, deep, devagiri, eshwar, godavari, ikshvaku, nanda, natha, prem, priya, ram, sai, sarva, sathya, shirdi, sutha, swaroopa, tata, vamsha, vasi

Title: Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya Shri Sathya Sai (2)
Ni Divya Charithamu Chadivina Vinina (2)
Vinina Chadivina Anandamu
Dayamaya Sai Karunamaya (2)
Karunamaya Karunincha Vayya
Satatamu Ni Nama Smaranamu Make (2)
Meaning:
The darling Son of mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sri Sathya Sai.
Your Divine Story, the one who reads or listens.
the one who listens or reads is blissful.
He is full of compassion and merciful.
Oh Lord with Compassion, show the mercy.
We need the chanting of your name always.
Songglossary: anand, chadivina, charitha, dayamayi, divya, eshwar, karuna, karunincha, make, naam, ni, priya, sai, satatam, sathya, smaran, sri, tanaya, vayya, vinina

Title: Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya
Esha Mahesha Sri Sayeesha
Yuga Avatara Sayeesha
Leelavatara Sayeesha
Poornavatara Sayeesha (Pari)
Meaning: Loving son of Eshwaramba, Lord Mahesha, Sri Sai! The Avatar of the Kali Age, the Avatar who is full of play (Leela), the Avatar in His complete glory!
Songglossary: avatar, esha, eshwar, leela, mahesha, poorna, priya, sayee, sri, tanaya, yuga

Title: Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya Sai Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana [ Eshwaramba ... ]
Kali Yug Mey Avatar Liye
Kan Kan Mey Tera Naam (O Sai) (2)
Meaning: O Lord Narayana, You are the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba, to whom You are Sai Narayana. You have incarnated in this present Kali Age as our Lord Sathya Narayana. You are all pervading and Your name is present in every atom.
Songglossary: avatar, eshwar, kali, kan, liye, naam, narayana, priya, sai, sathya, tanaya, tera, yuga

Title: Eshwaramba Tanaya Sai Dayachupumu
Lyrics:
Eshwaramba Tanaya Sai Dayachupumu Nive Sai
Karunakara Sindho Sai Mamora Vinuma Sai [ Eshwaramba ... ]
Prema Swaroopamu Nivu Sathya Dharma Sandeshamu Nivu
Jagat Rakshaka Sathya Sai Talliyu Tandriyu Nive [ Eshwaramba ... ]
Sarvantaryami Sai Ma Sarvamu Nive Sai
Kanakambaradhara Sai Kaliyuga Daivamu Nive
Meaning:
The son of Eshwaramba Sai, Show Mercy Sai.
One with ocean of compassion, listen to our outcry Sai.
You are the Form of Love and message of Truth and Righteousness.
Protector of the Universe Sathya Sai, you are the mother and father.
Omnipresent Sai, Oh Mother, You are everything Sai.
Oh Lord Sai with Orange Robe, Lord of Kali Age
Songglossary: daiva, dayachupumu, dharma, eshwar, jagat, kali, kanaka, karuna, ma, mamora, nive, nivu, prem, raksha, sai, sandeshamu, sarva, sathya, sindhu, swaroopa, talli, tanaya, tandriyu, vinuma

Title: Eshwari Nandana Parthi Gajanana
Lyrics:
Eshwari Nandana Parthi Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi Prabho
Omkareshwara Uma Maheshwara
Parthi Pureeshwara Palaya Maam
Meaning: Oh Gajanana of Parthi, the son of mother Eshwaramba and embodiment of primordial sound, protect us. You are adored as Maheshwara, the consort of Uma and the resident of Omkareshwara and Parthi. Please protect and sustain us.
Songglossary: eshwar, gajamukha, maam, maheshwara, nanda, omkareshwara, paahi, paalaya, prabhu, pranava, purishwara, puttaparthi, swaroopa, uma

Title: Eshwari Nandana Sai Gopala
Lyrics:
Eshwari Nandana Sai Gopala
Hey ( Sai ) Madhusudhana Krishna Krishna
Jagadodhara Parthi Vihara
Prema Swaroopa Prem Avatara
Dwarakamayi Sri Sathya Sai
Hey ( Sai ) Madhusudhana Krishna Krishna
Meaning: Oh Sai, Son of Eshwaramba, Our Sai Gopala Oh Lord Krishna, the destroyer of the demon Madhu Oh Lord who resides in Parthi, you have come to uplift the whole world You are the very embodiment of Love and the incarnation of Love. Oh Lord Sai, who was the Lord Krishna of Dwaraka You enchant the entire world and you are loved by the entire world.
Songglossary: avatar, dwaraka, eshwar, gopal, hey, jagadodhara, krishna, madhu, nanda, prem, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, sri, swaroopa, vihar

Title: Eshwari Nandana Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Eshwari Nandana Sai Narayana Narayana
Narayana Sathya Narayana
Kaliyug Me Avatar Liye
Kana Kana Me Tera Nam (3)
Meaning:
Hey, the son of Eshwari, O Lord Sai! You are the embodiment of Truth and the One who pervades this Universe.
O Lord Sai! You are the Supreme One, who has donned a Human Frame in this age of Kali for all of us.
O Lord Sai! Every little particle of this creation reverberates with Your Divine Name
Songglossary: avatar, eshwar, kali, kan, liye, nam, nanda, narayana, sai, sathya, tera

Title: Eshwari Tanaya Esha Mahesha
Lyrics:
Eshwari Tanaya Esha Mahesha
Shambho Shankara Sadashiva
Parthi Pureesha Hey Paramesha
Sharanam Sharanam Partheeshwara
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeeshwara (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Mahesha (Shiva), who has incarnated as the son of mother Eshwaramba, the embodiment of bliss and auspiciousness. You are the supreme Lord of Parthi. We surrender unto your lotus feet, Oh Sayeeshwara.
Songglossary: esha, eshwar, hey, mahesha, param, partheeshwara, pureesha, puttaparthi, sadashiva, sayee, shambho, shankara, sharan, tanaya

Title: Every Day And Every Night
Lyrics:
Every Day And Every Night
Illumine Us With Perfect Light
From The Altar Of Our Heart Let Our True Perfection Start
Help Us Lord In Conquering This Monkey Mind
Help Us Stay Detached From All The Things That Bind

Title: Every day is a blissful journey
Lyrics:
Every day is a blissful journey when Sai is by your side
 Every day our prayers are answered when in Sai we confide
 Every day the heart grows with devotionwhen
 the love of God expands within
 Every day can be pure and sweet when the thought of Sai is all
 Every day He guides our footsteps when we answer to His call

Title: Every man is Your son divine
Lyrics:
Every man is Your son divine,
 every woman is Your daughter divine
 We are one with you, kiche maney tu (2x)
 Kuwatey Leno Leno Mahotey
 Hiyano Hiyano Hiyano
 We are at One, with the infinite Sun, forever forever forever

Title: Every Moment Of My Life
Lyrics:
Every Moment Of My Life Please Be With Me
In Every Single Act Of Mine Be Thou My Guide
Baba Sai Baba
When I Slip When I Fall Lend Me A Hand
When I Stray Far Away Bring Me Back Again
Baba Sai Baba
From The Darkness Into The Light Lead Me, Father
From The Unreal Into The Real
Baba Sai Baba (2)
Songglossary: baba, sai

Title: Every step I take
Lyrics:
Every step I take along the way
 You are there to guide me
 Every step I take along the way
 You are there beside me.
 O Lord please take my hand
 Sweet Sai please smile at me
 O Lord fill my thoughts with Thee
 Clouds above are very quickly passing
 Only You are everlasting
 Clouds above are very quickly passing
 You are Lord and everlasting
 O Sai please hear this prayer
 Dear Lord please speak to me
 Sweet Lord please sing to me.
 May I hear Your guiding words within me
 Sathya Dharma Shaanthi Prema
 May I hear Your gentle voice within me
 Holy words of sweetest love.

Title: Everybody Loves Sai Sai Loves
Lyrics:
Everybody Loves Sai Sai Loves Everybody Sai Ram (6) Sai
Be Good, See Good, Do Good Says Sai
This Is The Way To God So Says Sai (3) [ Everybody Loves ... ]
I Am Yours And You Are Mine
So Says Baba Words Divine (3)
GeneralComments: This is the English version of the Hindi song "Pyaar Karen Sab Sai Se, Sai Sabse Pyaar Karen".
Songglossary: baba, do, ram, sai, so

Title: Everyone Is My Brother
Lyrics:
Everyone Is My Brother When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
No More Difference Between Us When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Baba Help Me Always Say Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Everyday Please Help Me Say Sai Ram
Only Light Is Around Me When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
No More Darkness Around Me When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Baba Help Me Always Say Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Everyday Please Help Me Say Sai Ram

Lyrics:

Title: Fill me Fill me Fill me
Lyrics:
Fill me Fill me Fill me
 With your love Swami
 Bless me Bless me Bless me
 With your Grace Swami
 Show me Show me Show me
 The path of Truth
 Swami Swami Swami
 You are my Lord, Swami

Title: Follow, Follow, Follow The Lord
Lyrics:
Follow, Follow, Follow The Lord
Open, Open, Open The Door
Open The Door To Truth And Love
Let In The Light And Follow The Lord
Love Is The Key, So Open The Door
Truth Is The Key, So Open The Door
Baba Is The Key, So Open The Door
Shiva Is The Key, So Open The Door
Songglossary: baba, door, shiva, so

Title: Food Prayer
Lyrics:
Discourse Snippet 1:
Why Should We Offer Food To God Before Partaking?
Discourse Snippet 2:
Effect of Food On The Mind
Prayer Meaning
Brahmarpanam Brahmahavir
Brahmagnou Brahmanahutam
Brahmaivatena Gantavyam
Brahmakarma Samadhina
The act of offering is God. The offering is God. By God it is offered into the Fire of God. God is That which is to be attained by him who performs action pertaining to God. - Bhagavad Gita, Chapter 4, Verse 24
Aham Vaishvanaro Bhutva
Praninam Dehamashritaha
Pranapana Samayuktaha
Pachamyannam Chaturvidham
 I reside as Vaishvanaro, the digestive power, in every living being. I keep in balance the Prana (exhalation) and Apana (Inhalation). I digest and assimilate the four types of food partaken by every living being. - Bhagavad Gita, Chapter 15, Verse 14
Swami Chanting Both Prayers:

Title: For protection of the righteous
Lyrics:
For protection of the righteous, destruction of evil-
 I will come, says the Lord
 Protection of the righteous, destruction of evil is My mission, says the Lord
 Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaar
 Buddha has said that there will come a Teacher of gods and men
 In the Bible it is said that He will come to guard and guide, Amen.
 Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaar

Title: For The Beauty Of The Earth
Lyrics:
For The Beauty Of The Earth, For The Beauty Of The Skies
For The Love Which From Our Birth
Ever And Around Us Lies
Lord Of All To Thee We Rise
This Our Hymn Of Grateful Praise
For The Joys Of Human Love, Brother, Sister, Parents, Child
Friends On Earth And Friends Above
And All Mercies Tender, Mild
For Gods Omnipresent Love, Freely Givn To You And Me
Forming Links Throughout All Worries
Reaching Out Oer Land And Sea

Title: From the heavens He came
Lyrics:
From the heavens He came to meet us
 With a charm, fiery eyes and sweet smile
 For they say He is born of Divine Birth
 To enlighten our lives all the while
 And His name is Sathya Sai Baba
 He is Mother, He is Father, He is our Friend
 He is Rama, He is Krishna, He is Allah
 He is all that we have to the end
 Sai Ram, Sai Krishna, Sai Baba
 Make us pure like the lotus You adore
 May we love, live in truth and share Your Bliss
 And in troubles, give us courage to endure
 Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Sai Baba
 Hear our prayers, heed our cries and our plea
 Only You can lift us up to heaven
 Only You can take us home to Thee

Title: Gaana Lola Gopala
Lyrics:
Gaana Lola Gopala
Sai Manohara Gopala [ Gaana ]
Jagadodhara Parthi Vihara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Meaning: Chant the name Gopala, who is engrossed in divine music. You are Sai having captivating form, who sustains the universe and who rambles in Parthi. You are Meera's little Krishna, who lifted the mighty mountain on your finger tips.
Songglossary: bala, gaan, giridhar, gopal, jagadodhara, ke, lola, manohar, meera, prabhu, puttaparthi, sai, vihar

Title: Gaana Priyey Sai Karunamayi
Lyrics:
Gaana Priyey Sai Karunamayi
Kadambari Amba Katyayani [ Gaana Priyey ... ]
Hari Vallabhey Sukha Dayini
Omkara Roopini Narayani
Bhuvaneshwari (Amba) Jaganmohini
Sri Chakra Vasini Sayeeshwari
Meaning: The Merciful Mother Sai is delighted by Music Chant the names of the Deities Kadambari, Amba and Katyayani (different names of Goddess Parvathi) Oh Goddess Lakshmi, the beloved of Lord Hari (Vishnu), you are the bestower of happiness and all comforts Oh Goddess Narayani, You are the primal form of Om You are the Goddess of the entire world and the one who beautifies the world. Oh Sayeeshwari, the one living in Sri Chakra.
Songglossary: amba, bhuvaneshwari, chakra, dayini, gaan, hari, jagan, kadamba, karuna, katyayani, narayani, om, priye, sai, sayee, sri, sukh, swaroopa, vallabha, vasini

Title: Gajamukha Deva Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gajamukha Deva Gajanana
Gananatha Gajanana
Karna Chamara Bhushita Natha
Naga Yagnopadhara Lambodhara
Vamana Roopa Varana Deva
Vighna Harana Deva Gajanana
Meaning: Glory to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, of short stature, leader of the Ganaas, with fan-like ears wearing a serpent for a sacred thread, who protects His devotees and removes obstacles.
Songglossary: bhushan, chamara, deva, gajamukha, gananatha, harana, karna, lambodhara, naga, natha, roopa, vamana, varada, vighna, yagnopadhara

Title: Gajamukha Gajamukha Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gajamukha Gajamukha Gajanana
Gowri Nandana Gajanana [ Gajamukha ... ]
Girija Nandana Gajanana
Girisha Nandana Gajanana
Meaning: Sing the glory of Gajamukha (elephant headed) god, the son of Gowri, the beloved of Girija and Shiva who is the Lord of the mountains.
Songglossary: gajamukha, girija, girisha, gowri, nanda

Title: Gajamukha Gajamukha Gananatha
Lyrics:
Gajamukha Gajamukha Gananatha
Suramuni Vanditha Guna Sheela [ Gajamukha ... ]
Suramuni Vanditha Guna Sheela
Gajamukha Gajamukha Gananatha [ Suramuni ]
Meaning: We chant the glory of Gajamukha, who is the leader of Ganaas (demigods) and who is worshipped by Lords and Saints. You are the embodiment of virtues.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gananatha, guna, sheela, suramuni, vanditha

Title: Gajamukha Hey Gajamukha Hey
Lyrics:
Gajamukha Hey Gajamukha Hey Gajamukha Natha
Vinayaka
Gowriputra Modaka Hasta Gajamukha Natha
Vinayaka
Santha Kara Vighna Vinasha Gajamukha Natha
Parthi Purisa Sai Ganesha Gajamukha Natha Vinayaka
[ Gajamukha Natha Vinayaka ]
Meaning:
The elephant-faced Lord Vinayaka is the master.
Son of Goddess Gowri and who has modaka (an universal sweet produced out of coconut jaggery and rice that is mixed into a ball) in his hand - the elephant-faced Master Vinayaka.
Who has a Serene Appearance and destroys hurdles.
Supreme among men, Lord of Puttaparthi, the Lord Sai Ganesha - the elephant-faced Master Vinayaka
Songglossary: gajamukha, ganesha, gowri, hasta, hey, kara, modaka, natha, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, santha, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Gajanana Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gajanana Gajanana
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gajanana [ Gajanana ... ]
Parvathi Nandana Varada Gajanana
Parama Dayakara Sai Gajanana
Meaning: Oh Ganesha, The Lord with Elephant-face Oh Sai Gajanana, you are the Lord of Parthi. Oh Son of Mother Parvathi, You are the conferrer of boons Oh Sai Gajanana, you are supreme compassionate.
Songglossary: dayaka, gajamukha, param, parvathi, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, varada

Title: Gajanana Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gajanana Gajanana
Prathama Poojana Ganaraya [ Gajanana ... ]
Prathama Prarthana Sri Ganaraya
Lambodhara Ganaraya
Meaning: Oh Lord Gajanana! You are the One whom all worship and pray. You are the one to whom the first prostrations should be offered. Oh Ganaraya, the controller of all the Ganaas (the Demigods), we offer you our first obeisance Oh Mighty One! You are King of the Divine Forces.
Songglossary: gajamukha, ganaraya, lambodhara, pooja, prarthana, prathama, sri

Title: Gajanana Hey Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gajanana Hey Gajanana
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana [ Gajanana ]
Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Jaga Vandana
Vidya Buddhi Pradayaka
Parama Niranjana Mooshika Vahana
Parthi Pureeshwara Gajanana
Meaning: Gajanana (Ganesha), son of Gowri (Parvathi) ; Oh Son of Shiva, Victory to the One who is revered by the whole world; You are the one who bestows knowledge and intelligence; Hey Gajanana, You are the supreme one who has mouse as his vehicle and you are the Lord of Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: buddhi, gajamukha, gowri, hey, jagat, jay, mooshika, nanda, niranjan, param, pradayaka, purishwara, puttaparthi, shiva, tanaya, vahana, vandana, vidya

Title: Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
Lyrics:
Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
Gowri Manohara Priya Nandana
Pashupathi Tanaya Gajanana
Parama Niranjana Shubhanana (Hey)
Meaning: Oh Auspicious Elephant -Faced Lord! You are loving son of Mother Gowri Thou art the beloved son of Lord Shiva, who is the Lord of all creatures. You are supreme, pure and free of all blemishes Oh Lord Ganesha.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gowri, hey, manohar, nanda, niranjan, param, pashu, priya, shubh, tanaya

Title: Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
Lyrics:
Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
Parama Niranjana Gajavadana
Vakratunda Dhara Vighna Vinasha
Pranava Swaroopa Parthi Pureesha
Siddhi Vinayaka Paahi Gajanana [ Parama Niranjana ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Gajanana! You confer auspiciousness. Oh Elephant -Faced Lord! You are supremely pure. Oh One with a curved trunk! You are the destroyer of all the obstacles and grant us victory Oh Lord, your form is that of the primordial Om (Pranava) and you are the Lord of Parthi. Oh Lord Ganesha, you are all powerful and can confer Siddhi to your devotees Oh Elephant -Faced Lord! You are supremely pure.
Songglossary: dhara, gajamukha, hey, niranjan, paahi, param, pranava, pureesha, puttaparthi, shubh, siddhi, swaroopa, vakratunda, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Gajananam Girija Tanayam
Lyrics:
Gajananam Girija Tanayam
Gangadhara Shiva Kumaram Devam [ Gajananam ... ]
Suramuni Sevitha Charanam Sharanam
Sada Smarami Sai Sharanam
Meaning: We adore the Lord Gajanana (elephant headed god), the loving son of Girija and Shiva (who adorns the Ganges). We bow to your feet, which is worshipped by Gods and saints. We dwell on your divine form always.
Songglossary: chara, devam, gajamukha, ganga, girija, kumara, sada, sai, sevita, sharan, shiva, smaran, suramuni, tanaya

Title: Gajavadana Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gajanana
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana [ Gajavadana ... ]
Jai Jai Jai Jai Gajanana (3)
Devadi Deva Gajanana [ Gowri Tanaya ]
Meaning: Victory to the Lords of Lords, Lord Gajanana, The Elephant faced Lord, The beloved son of Mother Gowri. Chant the name of the Elephant -Faced Lord, Gajanana.
Songglossary: deva, devadi, gajamukha, gowri, jai, tanaya

Title: Gajavadana Gananatha
Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha
Gowri Tanaya Dayamaya [ Gajavadana ... ]
Bhuvana Dhara Pranava Swaroopa
Paalaya Paalaya Parthi Pureesha
Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesha, the Elephant-faced Lord O Son of Mother Parvathi, You are extremely compassionate Oh The one whose form is the Pranava and who is the sustainer of the entire creation, Protect us Oh Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhuvana, dayamayi, dhara, gajamukha, gananatha, gowri, paalaya, pranava, pureesha, puttaparthi, swaroopa, tanaya

Title: Gajavadana Gananatha Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha Gajanana
He Shiva Nandana Pahi Gajanana
Gajavadana He Gajanana
Muktipradata Shakthi Pradatha
Sharanam Sharanam Gajanana (2)
Meaning: I take refuge in Lord Ganesha with the elephant-face. The son of Lord Shiva, He bestows strength and liberation.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gananatha, mukti, nanda, paahi, pradatha, shakthi, sharan, shiva

Title: Gajavadana Gananatha Gajavadana Vinayaka
Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha Gajavadana Vinayaka
Siddhi Vidhata Shiva Tanaya
Buddhi Pradayaka Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Jaya Sri Ganesha
Meaning: Worship the elephant-faced Gajanana, the Lord of the Demigods, the Prince of Lord Shiva who can bestow all the Siddhis and the intellectual prowess. O Son of Mother Parvathi, you remove the fear of the cycle of birth and death and help cross it. Victory to Lord Ganesha, who is worshipped in all ages (yugas).
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, buddhi, gajamukha, gananatha, ganesha, jay, nandana, natha, parvathi, pradayaka, shiva, siddhi, sri, tanaya, vanditha, vidhata, vinayaka, yuga

Title: Gajavadana Gananatha Natha
Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha Natha
Gowri Vara Tanaya Gunaalaya [ Gajavadana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Shubha Dayaka
Meaning: O Elephant -Faced Lord! You are the Lord of the Divine Forces O Beloved son of Mother Gowri. You are full of Virtues O Lord who grants us knowledge, intelligence and wisdom O Lord of all Siddhis, you are the conferrer of all auspiciousness.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gajamukha, gananatha, gowri, gunaalaya, hey, natha, pradayaka, shubh, siddhi, tanaya, vara, vidya, vinayaka

Title: Gajavadana Gananatha Natha
Lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha Natha
Gowri Vara Tanaya Gunaalaya
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Shubha Dayaka
Meaning: Elephant-faced Lord! Lord of Demigods and beloved Son of Mother Gowri; Thou art extremely merciful. You grant auspiciousness and gifts.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gajamukha, gananatha, gowri, gunaalaya, hey, natha, pradayaka, shubh, siddhi, tanaya, vara, vidya, vinayaka

Title: Gajavadana He Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gajavadana He Gajanana
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana
Gangadhara Shiva Nandana
Girija Priya Nandana
Meaning: Lord Ganesha is the beloved elephant-faced son of Mother Goddess Gowri (Parvathi, Girija) and Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: gajamukha, ganga, girija, gowri, nanda, priya, shiva, tanaya

Title: Gajavadana He Gananatha
Lyrics:
Gajavadana He Gananatha
Shiva Nandana Vighna Vinasha [ Gajavadana He ... ]
Karunakara Prashanti Nilaya
Lambodhara Mooshika  Vahana
Girija Sutha Sankata Harana
He Siddhi Vinayaka Data
Meaning: The elephant-faced Lord, Lord of the Ganaas, son of Lord Shiva, and resident of Parthi, is compassionate, and removes obstacles. The pot bellied son of Mother Girija, removes grief, confers boons and uses a mouse as a conveyance.
Songglossary: daata, gajamukha, gananatha, girija, harana, karuna, lambodhara, mooshika, nanda, nilaya, prasanthi, sankata, shiva, siddhi, sutha, vahana, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Gajavadana Sai Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gajavadana Sai Gajanana
Gajanana He Shubhanana [ Gajavadana ... ]
Buddhi Pradayaka Gajanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajanana
Moksha Pradayaka Gajanana
Mangala Dayaka Shubhanana
Gajanana Shubhanana [ Gajanana He ... ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesha, You, who bestow auspiciousness, intellect and liberation, please fulfill our wishes.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gajamukha, mangal, moksha, pradayaka, sai, shubh, siddhi, vinayaka

Title: Gana Natha Gana Natha
Lyrics:
Gana Natha Gana Natha
Mooshika  Vahana Jaya Gana Natha
Mangala Dayaka Gana Natha (Shubha) [ Gana Natha ... ]
Parvathi Putra Shri Gana Natha
Jagadodhara Jaya Gana Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Gana Natha
Meaning: O lord of the Ganaas, the one who rides the mushika (mouse), gives us all types of auspiciousness. He is son of goddess Parvathi . He uplifts the whole world. We pray that we are under his guidance.
Songglossary: dayaka, gana, jagadodhara, jay, mangal, mooshika, natha, parvathi, putra, sharan, shubh, sri, vahana

Title: Gana Natha Omkara Roopa
Lyrics:
Gana Natha Omkara Roopa
Shri Gananatha Gnana Roopa [ Gana Natha ... ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Heyramba
Shri Gananatha Gnana Roopa
Meaning: The lord of the Ganaas, the one who has the form of Aum symbol, he is the giver of accomplishments. He is the five-headed form of Ganesha. He is the leader of the Ganaas (who are attendants of the lord Shiva)
Songglossary: gana, gananatha, gnana, heyramba, natha, om, roopa, siddhi, sri, vinayaka

Title: Gananatha Gananatha
Lyrics:
Gananatha Gananatha
Mooshika Vahana Jaya Gananatha
Sharanam Sharanam Gajanana [ Gananatha ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Gananatha
Buddhi Pradayaka Gananatha
Jagadodhara Jaya Gananatha [ Sharanam ]
Meaning: Oh Lord of Lords, Oh Ganesha Victory to the Lord whose vehicle is a mouse (Symbolizes Cleverness) We surrender to the Lotus feet of Gajanana You are the bestower of all siddhis and success and intellectual prowess Oh Lord Gananatha, who is the sustainer of the entire creation, we surrender at your Lotus Feet.
Songglossary: buddhi, gajamukha, gananatha, jagadodhara, jay, mooshika, pradayaka, sharan, siddhi, vahana, vinayaka

Title: Gananatha Sai Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gananatha Sai Gajanana
Partheeshwara Dukha Bhanjana [ Gananatha ... ]
Kailasa Pathey Shiva Nandana Deena Natha Harey Hey Niranjana
Siddhi Pradatha Shubhanana Jagadeeshwara Shanthi Niketana
Jagadeeshwara Shanthi Niketana
Meaning: O Lord Ganesha, the Lord of all Ganaas (Demigods), O Lord of Parthi, You relieve us of all anxieties and sadness. O the Son of Shiva (the Lord of Kailasa), who is the embodiment of purity and the Lord of the destitute, O bestower of all the siddhis and prowess, the one whose face radiates goodness, O sustainer of the whole world and the abode of all peace, glory be to Thee.
Songglossary: bhanjana, deen, dukh, gajamukha, gananatha, hey, jagadeesha, kailasa, nandana, natha, niketana, niranjan, partheeshwara, pathey, pradatha, sai, shanthi, shiva, shubh, siddhi

Title: Gananatha Vighna Vinashaka Gananatha
Lyrics:
Gananatha Vighna Vinashaka Gananatha
Gananatha Gananatha
Bhaktha Pala Vara Dayaka
Karunakara Shubha Dayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Chandana Tilaka
Sharanam Sharanam Bhaktha Rakshaka
Meaning: Oh Gananatha, you are the destroyer of all obstacles, protector and sustainer of your devotees, bestower of boons. Oh compassionate one, you are the bestower of auspiciousness. You are the almighty with supreme powers adorned with a symbol made of Sandal paste. We bow to you. Oh protector of devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktha, chand, dayaka, gananatha, karuna, pala, raksha, sharan, shubh, siddhi, tilaka, vara, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Gananayakam Ganeshwaram ( Sai )
Lyrics:
Gananayakam Ganeshwaram ( Sai )
Gowri Tanaya Gajananam [ Gananayakam ... ]
Mooshika Vahana Sri Gananatham
Paashankushadhara Bala Gajananam
Ananda Tandava Narthana Ganapathim
Vinayakam Vimalacharam Vighneshwaram
Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesh, you are the leader of demigods, beloved son of Gowri who rides the mouse. You hold the noose and hook in your hands and is the delightful cosmic dancer having a spotless form. You are all supreme Lord who removes all our obstacles
Songglossary: anand, bala, gajamukha, gananatha, gananayaka, gowri, mooshika, narthana, paasha, sai, sri, tanaya, tandava, vahana, vighnesha, vimala, vinayaka

Title: Gananayakam Sai Gananayakam
Lyrics:
Gananayakam Sai Gananayakam
Sadananda Sundara Gananayakam
Vara Dayakam Sai Shubha Dayakam
Parthi Pureeshwara Gananayakam
Meaning: Oh Ganesha, The Lord of the Ganaas, the Demigods You are eternally blissful and most beautiful. You bestow various boons and confer all auspiciousness. O Lord of Lords, you have Parthi as your residence.
Songglossary: dayaka, gananayaka, purishwara, puttaparthi, sadana, sai, shubh, sundara, vara

Title: Ganapathey Paahi Maha Mathey
Lyrics:
Ganapathey Paahi Maha Mathey
Gnana Swaroopa Namostuthey
Pankaja Charana Daya Nidhey
Mangala Kara Hey Krupa Nidhey
Sapta Swarapathi Vidya Pathey
Sayeeshwara Twam Suguna Nidhey
Meaning: Lord Ganapathi, the highly intellectual one, protect us. Salutations to thee, the embodiment of knowledge. You are the treasure house of compassion with a lotus feet. You are the master of all forms of knowledge and music. Oh Sayeeshwara you are the reserve of divine qualities.
Songglossary: chara, daya, gananatha, gnana, hey, kara, krupa, maha, mangal, matha, namostuthey, nidhey, paahi, pankaja, pathey, sapta, sayee, suguna, swara, swaroopa, twam, vidya

Title: Ganapathi Om Jaya Ganapathi Om
Lyrics:
Ganapathi Om Jaya Ganapathi Om
Gajamukha Varada Ganapathi Om
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
Parama Niranjana Gajanana
Paada Namasthey Gajanana
Meaning: Glory to thee, O Ganesha, the elephant faced one, the bestower of boons, the one who has the mouse as His vehicle, the one who has Modaka (a sweet preparation) in His hand, the one who is supremely pure, O Gajanana, I offer obeisance at Your Lotus feet.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gananayaka, hasta, jay, modaka, mooshika, namostuthey, niranjan, om, paada, param, vahana, varada

Title: Ganesha Bhaja Mana Ganesha Bhaja
Lyrics:
Ganesha Bhaja Mana Ganesha Bhaja Mana Ganesha Bhaja Mana Rey
Parvathi Nandana Pashupathi Ranjana
Deva Ganesha Bhaja Mana Rey (2)
Meaning: Oh mind, pray to the name of lord Ganesha. He is the son of goddess Parvathi and pleasing to the lord of beings, lord Shiva.
Songglossary: bhaja, deva, ganesha, mana, nanda, parvathi, pashu, ranjana

Title: Ganesha Charanam Parama Pavanam
Lyrics:
Ganesha Charanam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Nithya Smaranam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Sadguru Charanam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Bhava Bhaya Haranam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Meaning: Let us bow in reverence to Lord Ganesha, Lets bow in absolute purity to the name of Sai, to the elephant faced Ganesha Constantly remember the purifying name of Sai, Remember Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one. The sacred feet of Sadguru are purifying, so is the name of Sai and Ganesha All the fears of the cycle of birth and death are removed by the remembrance of the name of Sai and Ganesha, the elephant faced Lord.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, chara, gajamukha, ganesha, harana, nithya, param, pavan, sadguru, sainam, sathya, smaran

Title: Ganesha Charanam Sharanam Ganesha (4)
Lyrics:
Ganesha Charanam Sharanam Ganesha (4)
Sayeesha Charanam Sharanam Sayeesha (4)
Meaning: Surrender to the Lotus Feet of Lord Ganesh. Surrender to the Lotus Feet of Lord Sayeesha.
Songglossary: charanam, ganesha, sayee, sharan

Title: Ganesha Ganesha guide me
Lyrics:
Ganesha Ganesha guide me all the way
 Ganesha Ganesha protect me all the day
 Ganesha Ganesha teach me how to pray

Title: Ganesha Ganesha sweet Lord Ganesha
Lyrics:
Ganesha Ganesha sweet Lord Ganesha (2x)
 Please bless our prayers we offer to You
 Please bless our prayers, may they please You
 Ganesha Ganesha (3x)

Title: Ganesha Sharanam Ganesha Sharanam (2)
Lyrics:
Ganesha Sharanam, Ganesha Sharanam (2)
You Are Always Protecting Me
You Are Always Guiding Me ... Om

Saiesha Sharanam, Saiesha Sharanam (2)
You Are Always Protecting Me
You Are Always Guiding Me ... Om
Songglossary: ganesha, om, sharan

Title: Ganesha Shiva’s Son
Lyrics:
Ganesha Shivas Son Humbly I Implore Thee
Ganesha Youre The One To Clear The Path Before Me
Ganesha Shivas Son Humbly I Implore Thee
Ganesha Youre The One To Clear The Path Before Me
Lord Sai Within My Heart Humbly I Adore Thee
Lord Sai I Pray Thou Art Kept In Mind Before Me
Lord Sai Within My Heart Humbly I Adore Thee
Lord Sai I Pray Thou Art Kept In Mind Before Me
Songglossary: ganesha, sai, shiva

Title: Ganesha Son Of Shiva
Lyrics:
Ganesha Son Of Shiva
Ganesha Charanam Sharanam
Warrior Of Our Hearts
Ganesha Son Of Shiva
Remove All Fear And Trepidation
Warrior Of Our Hearts
Remove All Fear And Trepidation
Lead Us Out Of The Darkness

Title: Ganeshwara Gaja Mukeshwara
Lyrics:
Ganeshwara Gaja Mukeshwara
Karunya Lavanya Vighneshwara (2) [ Ganeshwara Gaja ... ]
Sankata Harana Gajanana
Shankari Putra Shubhanana (Shiva) (2)
Meaning: Lord of the Ganaas, attendants of lord Shiva, the one who has the face of an elephant. Full of compassion, beautiful, destroyer of impediments. Remover of obstacles he is the elephant headed lord. Son of goddess Shankari, he is the one with the auspicious face. He is lord Gajanana.
Songglossary: gaja, gajamukha, gananatha, harana, karuna, lavanya, putra, sankata, shankari, shiva, shubh, vighnesha

Title: Ganeshwara Ganadhipa
Lyrics:
Ganeshwara Ganadhipa
Vighneshwara Vinayaka [ Ganeshwara ... ]
Nirvikalpa Niramaya
Gunaatheetha Niranjana
Bhava Bhanjana Manoranjana
Meaning: Oh Ganesh (elephant headed god) you are the Lord and chief of Ganaas (demigods), remover of obstacles, all supreme. You exist in the thoughtless and pure mind. You are attribute less and spotless who delights the mind and destroys the worldly miseries.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, ganadhipa, gananatha, gunaatheetha, manoranjana, niramaya, niranjan, nirvikalpa, vighnesha, vinayaka

Title: Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara Girija
Lyrics:
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara Girija Mano Ramana
Jaya Mruthyunjaya Mahadeva Maheshwara Mangala Shubha Charana
Nandi Vahana Naga Bhooshana
Nirupama Guna Sadana
Natana Manohara Neelakanta Sai
Neeraja Dala Nayana
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shankara, who bears the Holy Ganges in His hair and whose consort is Goddess Girija, born of the mountains. Glory to the One, who is the Lord of Lords and who has conquered death and whose Feet confer auspiciousness. Glory to the One who rides the bull, Nandi. Glory to the One who has a cobra around His neck. Glory to the One who is the embodiment of unparalleled virtues; Hail the enchanting dancer, the blue-throated Sai, whose eyes are like the petals of a Lotus flower.
Songglossary: bhooshan, charan, dala, ganga, girija, gowri, guna, jatadhara, jay, mahadev, maheshwara, mangal, mano, manohar, mruthyu, naga, nandi, natana, nayan, neela, neeraja, nirupama, ramana, sadana, sai, shankara, shubh, vahana

Title: Gangadhara Girija Ramana
Lyrics:
Gangadhara Girija Ramana
Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva [ Gangadhara ... ]
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Sai Shankara
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shirdi Pureeshwara
Meaning: Chant the holy name of Shiva who adorns the Ganges in his matted flock of hair, who is the beloved of Girija. Chant the holy names Shambho, Shankara, Samba Sadashiva (one who bestows auspiciousness and happiness) who is also the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: ganga, girija, hara, purishwara, ramana, sadashiva, sai, samba, shambho, shankara, shirdi, shiva

Title: Gangadhara Gowri Mahesha
Lyrics:
Gangadhara Gowri Mahesha
Tripurantaka Jyothi Prakasha
Haalaahala Dhara Paramesha
Chandrashekara Sai Mahesha
Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva, the consort of Gowri and the one who bears the Ganges and the moon on His head. He is the destroyer of the demon "Tripura" who symbolizes the darkness within us and illuminates us. He is the ultimate Lord who drank the deadly poison of "Haalaa-hala" for the welfare of the world during the churning of the ocean. He is also our Lord Sai Mahesha.
GeneralComments: This bhajan is also sung in raga Mayamalavagowla / Bhairav as demostrated in the tutorial.
Songglossary: chandrashekaraya, dhara, gangadhara, gowri, haalaahala, jyothi, mahesha, paramesha, prakasha, sai, tripurantaka

Title: Gangadhara Hara Gangadhara Hara Kailasa
Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Gangadhara Hara Kailasa Natha Prabhu Shankara
Bhava Nasha Bhava Bandha Vimochana
Sathya Sai Shiva Shankara
Meaning: We praise the Lord Sathya Sai Shiva Shankara-The One who is Auspicious, Captivating - The One who bears the Ganges on his head, One who is the Lord of the mountain 'Kailasa' and the One who liberates us from the bondage of the world and prevents us from taking birth again and again.
Songglossary: bandha, bhava, ganga, hara, kailasa, nasha, natha, prabhu, sai, sathya, shankara, shiva, vimochana

Title: Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Shambho Shankara Samba Shiva
Brahma Vishnu Parameshwara Roopa
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sai Krupala
Samba Shiva Sai Shiva (2)
Meaning: Glory to the Lord Sathya Sai Shiva, who is the very form and embodiment of the Trinity - Brahma, Vishnu and Parameshwara He bears the Ganges on his head, is very attractive and compassionate, confers happiness and prosperity and is very dear to all his devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktha, brahma, ganga, gowri, hara, jana, krupalu, param, priya, roopa, sai, samba, shambho, shankara, shiva, vishnu

Title: Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Shambho Shankara Samba Shiva
Jaya Jagadeeshwara Jaya Parameshwara
Shirdi Nivasa Sayeeshwara
Parthi Pureesha Sayeeshwara
Jagadodhara Sayeeshwara [ Shambho Shankara ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva, the beloved of Gowri, The One who is very attractive and has the Ganges on his head, The Lord Sai Shiva who is Auspicious and confers happiness and prosperity. Glory be to You The Lord of the World, The Greatest Lord The One who resided in Shirdi and is now residing in Parthi The Lord Sayeeshwara who liberates the world The Auspicious Sai who grants happiness and prosperity.
Songglossary: ganga, gowri, hara, jagadeesha, jagadodhara, jay, nivasa, param, pureesha, puttaparthi, samba, sayee, shambho, shankara, shirdi, shiva

Title: Gangadhara Hara Samba Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Samba Sadashiva
Sai Naam Sukha Dayi Naam
Aao Aao Hey Bhagawan
Prakat Huvey The Tum Shirdi Mey
Prakat Huvey Ho Ab Parthi Mey
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Ram [ Aao Aao ]
Meaning: Here we are calling on the Divine, Effulgent Lord to give his Darshan The Lord who is the Eternal Lord of the Divine Cosmos, One who has the Ganges on his head One whose name itself gives so much happiness Oh Lord You appeared in Shirdi Now You have appeared in Parthi O Divinely beautiful Lord Sairam, come, come Oh Effulgent Lord.
Songglossary: aao, ab, bhagawan, dayi, ganga, hara, hey, ho, hoga, naam, prakat, puttaparthi, ram, sadashiva, sai, samba, shirdi, sukh, sundara, tum, vibhuti

Title: Gangadhara Hara Shiva Shambho
Lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Shiva Shambho
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Shambho
Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Shambho
Haalaahala Dhara Shiva Sai Shambho
Meaning: This is a prayer to Lord Shiva who Has the river Ganges on His head; Who has Vibhuti all over His body; Who swallowed the deadly poison (Haalaa-hala) ; Who is also our Lord Sai.
Songglossary: dhara, ganga, haalaahala, hara, om, sai, shambho, shiva, sundara, vibhuti

Title: Gangadhara Pahi Mam
Lyrics:
Gangadhara Pahi Mam
Sainatha Guru Satchidananda Guru [ Gangadhara Pahi ... ]
Neelakantha Shiva Gangadhara
Neelakantha Shiva Neelakantha Shiva Neelakantha Shiva Gangadhara Neelakantha Shiva Gangadhara
Bhasma Vibushita Gangadhara
Meaning: The Lord Shiva, who is has the Ganga in his mated locks (Gangadhara) please protect me! Sainatha Guru, you are being, awareness and bliss, please protect me. Lord Shiva, your throat(kantha) is blue (neel) because he drank the haalaa-hala poison, Lord Gangadhara you are adorned with holy ash please protect me!
Songglossary: bhasma, bushan, ganga, guru, mam, neela, paahi, sainatha, satchidananda, shiva

Title: Gangajatadhara Gowri Mahesha
Lyrics:
Gangajatadhara Gowri Mahesha
Shiva Shiva Shankara Shaila Girisha [ Gangajatadhara Gowri ... ]
Parvathi Ramana Pahi Mahesha
Pahi Mahesha He Paramesha
Parthipurishwara Sai Mahesha
Parthipurishwara Sai Sarvesha
Meaning: The one who is holding goddess Ganga in his matted locks, please protect us. Lord Mahesha, who is the lord of goddess Gowri, please protect us. The one residing in the Shaila mountain, having goddess Ganga in his matted hair, lord Shiva, who is the beloved of goddess Parvathi please protect us. O supreme lord Eshwara, who lives in Puttaparthi, please protect us. Lord residing in Puttaparthi is lord Sai, who is everywhere.
Songglossary: ganga, girisha, gowri, mahesha, paahi, param, partheeshwara, parvathi, ramana, sai, sarvesha, shaila, shankara, shiva

Title: Gangotri Natha Ganga Shiva
Lyrics:
Gangotri Natha Ganga Shiva
Shambho Mahadeva Samba Shiva
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shiva
Sugandha Kuntalamba Sametha Shiva
Matrubhuteshwara Mahadeva
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Jeeveshwara
Shiva Shakthi Roopa Sayeeshwara
Gangotri Natha Ganga Shiva (3)
Meaning: Chant the name of Shiva who adorns the Ganges, who is also the Lord of Gangotri and whose other names are Shambho, Mahadeva and Samba Shiva. You are the consort of Gowri or Kuntalamba (one who has naturally fragrant hair). You are the Lord of mighty earth, protecting indweller of devotees. You are Sayeeshwara who is the embodiment of Shiva and Parvathi.
Songglossary: bhaktha, ganga, gangotri, gowri, jatadhara, jeeveshwara, kuntala, mahadev, matru, natha, roopa, samba, sametha, samraksha, sayee, shakthi, shambho, shiva, sugandha

Title: Garuda Vahana Narayana
Lyrics:
Garuda Vahana Narayana
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana [ Garuda Vahana ... ]
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Hari Om Hari Om Narayana
Meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, who is the beloved of His consort, Goddess Lakshmi, whose vehicle is Garuda, who sleeps on the serpent (also known as "Adi Sesha"- who incarnated as Lakshmana - Lord Rama's brother) and who is also known as Hari.
Songglossary: garuda, hari, hey, lakshmi, narayana, om, ramana, shayana, shesha, sri, vahana

Title: Gentle Lord We Crave The Bliss
Lyrics:
Gentle Lord We Crave The Bliss Of Your Darshan
Swami Come Let Your Radiance Surround Us Touching Everyone
You Are The Path And The Goal
Teach Us To Follow You Faithfully
You Give The Life To The Soul
May We Be Blessed With The Grace Of Sai Fully Immersed In Him
Songglossary: darsh, sai, swami

Title: Gently Smiling Sai
Lyrics:
Gently Smiling Sai Residing In The Temple Of My Heart
Sometimes Krishna Playing The Flute
Sometimes Shiva Dancing To The Tune [ Gently Smiling ... ]
Enlightening And Inspiring Me
When There Are Dark Clouds O'er Me
Full Of Joy Full Of Peace
I Adore You Swami With All My Heart
Songglossary: krishna, sai, shiva, swami, tum

Title: Ghana Ghana Neela Bansi Adhariya
Lyrics:
Ghana Ghana Neela Bansi Adhariya
Madhura Madhura Smitha Vadana Savariya
Ghana Ghana Neela
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Gatiya
Jhumaka Jhumaka Jhuma Bhaja Ghungharia
Meaning: We are here worshipping Lord Krishna and describing His beautiful form He has the body of thick blue color, with the flute on His lips, gentle smile on His bluish face, peacock feather as his crown, the yellow cloth on his hip and his anklets making pleasant sound.
Songglossary: adhar, bansi, bhaja, ghana, ghungaroo, madhu, mora, mukuta, neela, peetambara, rhuma-jhuma, savari, smitha, vadana

Title: Ghana Ghana Neela Om Shivaya
Lyrics:
Ghana Ghana Neela Om Shivaya
Om Shivaya Om Shivaya [ Ghana Ghana ... ]
Shivaya Namah Om Sai Shiva
Sai Shiva Sai Shiva [ Shivaya Namah ]
Sai Shiva Hara Sai Shiva
Meaning: Chant the divine name Om Shivaya, whose throat is dark blue in color (due to consumption of deadly poison). And obeisance to Lord Sai Shiva.
Songglossary: ghana, hara, namah, neela, om, sai, shiva

Title: Ghana Ghana Neela Vadana Ati
Lyrics:
Ghana Ghana Neela Vadana Ati Sundara
Megha Shyamala Madhava Murahara [ Ghana Ghana ... ]
Mandasmitha Mukha Nayana Manohara
Govinda Gopala Natavara Giridhara [ Megha Shyamala ]
Meaning: Krishna is described as having a face of thick blue color He is also described as one who has the color of black clouds, who is very sweet in nature and one who killed the demon Mura He has a gentle smile on his face and beautiful eyes He is the Supreme Cowherd looking after his cows (mankind), He is the Supreme Dancer and Actor, the one who lifted the mountain of Govardhana for protecting the people of Gokula from the wrath of Indra.
Songglossary: ati, ghana, giridhar, gopal, govinda, madhava, manda, manohar, megha, mukha, murahara, natavara, nayan, neela, sham, sundara, vadana

Title: Ghana Ghana Neela Yadu Nandana
Lyrics:
Ghana Ghana Neela Yadu Nandana
Ghana Shyama Sundara Mana Mohana
Natavara Giridhara Gopalana
Murali Manohara Madhusudhana
Meaning: Description of Krishna as Nanda's foster son of the Yadu dynasty having thick blue color Very attractive to the mind having beautiful color of blue/black The Supreme Dancer and Actor, The One who lifted the mountain (Govardhana), The cowherd The One with the beautiful form with the flute and the slayer of the demon 'Madhu'
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, gopal, madhu, mana, manohar, mohan, murali, nanda, natavara, neela, sham, sundara, yadu

Title: Ghana Shyama Gopala Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Ghana Shyama Gopala Ghana Shyama Gopala
Mana Mohana Jaganmohana
Yadu Nandana Gopal [ Ghana Shyama ]
Gopala Gopala Shyama Gopala
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
Meaning: The Lord with dark blue complexion One, Gopala, the One who captivates the mind, The One who captivates the whole Universe, You are the little child in the Yadava clan; Oh Gopala, the enchanting blue colored Gopala.
Songglossary: ghana, gopal, jagan, mana, mohan, nanda, sai, sham, yadu

Title: Ghana Shyama Sundara
Lyrics:
Ghana Shyama Sundara
Bansidhara Prabhu Krishna Kanhaiya
Tum Hi Merey Ma Baap Bhaiyya [ Ghana Shyama ]
Devaki Tanaya Hey Nandalala
Deena Bandhava Dwarakanatha
Radha Hrudaya Nivasa Harey Krishna
Madhusudhana Muralidhara
Partheeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Meaning: O beautiful Lord Krishna Kanhaiya with the flute and of blue color, You only are my mother, father and brother O son of Devaki and the foster son of Nanda O relative of the downtrodden and orphans and the Lord of Dwaraka O Lord Krishna/Hari who wanders in the heart of Radha O slayer of the demon Madhu, with the flute on your lips O Sathya Sayeeshwara the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: baap, bandha, bansi, bhai, deen, devaki, dwaraka, ghana, hai, hari, hey, hrudaya, kanha, krishna, ma, madhu, mera, murali, nanda, nivasa, partheeshwara, prabhu, radha, sathya, sayee, sham, sundara, tanaya, tum

Title: Giri Raja Tanaya Jaya Ma
Lyrics:
Giri Raja Tanaya Jaya Ma
Hey Durgati Nashini Ma [ Giri Raja ... ]
Maha Jyothirmayi Shiva Shakthimayi
Asura Vinashini Ma
Jaya Devi Durge Jaya Ma [ Hey Durgati ]
Meaning: Victory to the daughter of the King of Mountains O Mother, the destroyer of our bad condition in the world The most effulgent and the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi, The mother who is the destroyer of demons (all evils) Victory to the mother Durga.
Songglossary: asura, devi, durga, durge, giri, hey, jay, jyoth, ma, maha, raja, shakthi, shiva, tanaya, vinashana

Title: Giridhara Bala Gopala (Harey)
Lyrics:
Giridhara Bala Gopala (Harey)
Govinda Govinda Gopala (Hey) [ Giridhara Bala ... ]
Gopi Lola Gopala
Govardhanodhari Gopala
Meaning: Oh cowherd boy who danced with the Gopis and One who lifted the Govardhana.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gopal, gopi, govinda, hari, hey, lola

Title: Giridhara Bala Hey Nandalala
Lyrics:
Giridhara Bala Hey Nandalala
Devaki Nandana Shyama Gopala [ Giridhara ... ]
Keshava Madhava Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Shyama Gopala [ Keshava ]
Bansidhara Hey Shyama ( Sai ) Gopala
Meaning: Krishna is extolled with different names as the One who lifted the mountain, The son of Devaki, The Lord of Radha, The One who danced with the Gopikas, The One with the flute and He is also our Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: bala, bansi, devaki, giridhar, gopal, hey, kesha, madhava, nanda, sai, sham

Title: Giridhara Bala Shyama Gopala
Lyrics:
Giridhara Bala Shyama Gopala
Eshwari Tanaya Sai Gopala
Gaana Vilola Murali Gopala
Govinda Madhava Goparipala (2)
Meaning: We chant the name of Shyama Gopala who is little Krishna lifted the mountain in his fingertips. He is also Sai Gopala son of Eshwaramba the enchanting flute player who loves music. He is Govinda protector of cow herds (people) and in whose chest revels Mother Lakshmi.
Songglossary: bala, eshwar, gaan, giridhar, gopal, goparipala, govinda, madhava, murali, sai, sham, tanaya, vilola

Title: Giridhara Gopala Gopala
Lyrics:
Giridhara Gopala Gopala
Sai Gopala Sai Gopala [ Giridhara ... ]
Shirdi Pureeshwara (Parthi Pureeshwara) Sai Shankara
Sai Shankara Sai Shankara
Meaning: Chant the divine names Giridhara Gopala, Sai Gopala the resident of Shirdi and Parthi. He is also Sai Shankara who also bestows auspiciousness.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, shankara, shirdi

Title: Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Lyrics:
Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Surdas Ke Shyama Manohara
Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Manohara
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala, One who lifted the mountain The Lord of Meera and Surdas and the beautiful Lord Sathya Sai the beloved of his devotees.
Songglossary: bhakthon, giridhar, gopal, hey, ke, manohar, meera, naagar, prabhu, sai, sathya, sham, surdas

Title: Giridhara Gopala Muralidhara Harey
Lyrics:
Giridhara Gopala Muralidhara Harey
Govinda Gopala Damodara
Giridhara Gopala Muralidhara Harey [ Govinda Gopala ]
Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Gopala, Giridhara, The One with the flute who is also called Damodara.
Songglossary: damodara, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, murali

Title: Giridhara Gopala Sai Giridhara Gopala
Lyrics:
Giridhara Gopala Sai Giridhara Gopala
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopala [ Giridhara Gopala ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Paahi Maam Ghana Shyam O Shyama (2)
Meaning: O Lord Sai Gopala, the lifter of mountain, the Lord of Meera The Lord of Parthi kindly protect me.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, gopal, ke, maam, meera, naagar, paahi, prabhu, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sham

Title: Giridhara Govinda Gopala Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Giridhara Govinda Gopala Ghana Shyama Nandalala
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana Hey Madhava [ Giridhara Govinda ... ]
Damodara Janardhana Muralidhara Mana Mohana
Namo Sai Narayanaya Namo Sathya Narayanaya
Namo Sai Narayanaya
Meaning: Chant the various names of Gopala, Govinda, Giridhara The beautiful son of Nanda with thick bluish color, the slayer of the demon Madhu Damodara, Janardhana, Muralidhara, Salutations to the Lord Sai Narayana, Sathya Narayana.
Songglossary: damodara, ghana, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hey, janardhana, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, murali, namo, nanda, narayana, sai, sathya, sham

Title: Giridhara Merey Gopala
Lyrics:
Giridhara Merey Gopala
Radhey Gopala Radhey ( Sai ) Gopala [ Giridhara Merey ... ]
Nanda Kishora Maakhan Chora
Yashoda Bala Gopala [ Radhey Gopala ]
Meaning: Chant the name my Lord Sai Gopala the Giridhara The Lord of Radha The son of Nanda and Yashoda The One who steals the butter.
Songglossary: bala, chora, giridhar, gopal, kishora, maakhan, mera, nanda, radha, sai, yashoda

Title: Giridhara Merey Shyama Gopal
Lyrics:
Giridhara Merey Shyama Gopal
Shyama Gopal Sai Gopal [ Giridhara Merey ... ]
Govinda Govinda Gopi Gopal
Govardhanodhari Gokula Gopal
Shyama Gopal Sai Gopal [ Giridhara Merey ... ]
Mukunda Murahara Mohana Gopal
Murali Manohara Madhava Gopal [ Shyama Gopal ]
Meaning: Chant the various names of My Lord Gopal, the Giridhara, The one who lifted Govardhana mountain, the cowherd of Gokula The enchanting Lord Mukunda, Madhava, with the flute, the slayer of Mura, the Lord Sai Gopal.
Songglossary: giridhar, gokul, gopal, gopi, govinda, madhava, manohar, mera, mohan, mukunda, murahara, murali, sai, sham

Title: Giridhara Muralidhara Sai Gopala
Lyrics:
Giridhara Muralidhara Sai Gopala
Radha Madhava Gopi Lola [ Giridhara Muralidhara ... ]
Maakhan Chora Nanda Kishora
Madhusudhana Sai Mohana Krishna
Karunapaara Sai Avatara
Meaning: O Sai Gopala you are little Krishna who lifted the mountain, enchanting flute player, beloved of Gopis and Lord of Radha. You are the stealer of butter the beloved of Nanda, destroyer of Madhu Demon. You have descended in the form of Sai with reserve of compassion.
Songglossary: avatar, chora, giridhar, gopal, gopi, karuna, kishora, krishna, lola, maakhan, madhava, madhu, mohan, murali, nanda, radha, sai

Title: Giridhara Naagara Kunja Vihari
Lyrics:
Giridhara Naagara Kunja Vihari
Madhuvana Sanchari Parthi Vihari [ Giridhara Naagara ... ]
Shyamala Sundara Mayura Mukutadhara
Pankaja Lochana Madhava Mohana
Madhuvana Sanchari Parthi Vihari (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Giridhara who roams in the garden and in the forest of Madhu. He is very beautiful with the peacock feather as His crown and lotus eyes. He is none other than our Sai who resides in Parthi.
Songglossary: giridhar, kunja, lochana, madhava, madhu, mayur, mohan, mukuta, naagar, pankaja, puttaparthi, sanchari, sham, sundara, vihar

Title: Giridhari Giridhari Gopala
Lyrics:
Giridhari Giridhari Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala [ Giridhari ... ]
Goparipala Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala [ Goparipala. ]
Govinda Govinda Gopala
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala, one who lifted the Govardhana mountain the protector of the cows. Chant the name of the Lord Govinda and our Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, goparipala, govinda, sai

Title: Giridhari Giridhari Murali Shyam Murari
Lyrics:
Giridhari Giridhari Murali Shyam Murari
Radha Ramana Veda Bharana
Pavana Charana Karuna Bharana
Meaning: We chant your name Giridhari the enchanting flute player having dark blue complexion, beloved of Radha, embodiment of Vedas and kindness having divine lotus feet.
Songglossary: bharana, chara, giridhar, karuna, murali, murare, pavan, radha, ramana, sham, veda

Title: Giridhari Giridhari Radhey Gopala Jaya
Lyrics:
Giridhari Giridhari Radhey Gopala Jaya Giridhari
(Aa)Shritha Jana Vihari Giridhari
Meera Ke Nath Prabho Giridhari (Mayi)
Meaning: Victory to Giridhari (who lifted the mountain) the Lord of Radha. You are the refuge and delightful to your devotees and you are the Lord of Mother Meera.
Songglossary: aashritha, giridhar, gopal, jana, jay, ke, ma, meera, natha, prabhu, radha, vihar

Title: Giridhari Hey Nandalala
Lyrics:
Giridhari Hey Nandalala
Yashoda Ke Bala Tribhuvana Pala
Jagata Uddhara Gokula Bala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala
Meaning: Oh Giridhari, the son of Nanda and Yashoda The protector and sustainer of all the three worlds The liberator of the world and the boy of Gokula The player of flute and the protector of the Saints and Rishis Oh Lord Sai Gopala who wanders in Parthi.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gokul, gopal, hey, jagat, ke, lola, munijana, murali, nanda, pala, puttaparthi, sai, tribhuvan, uddhara, vihar, yashoda

Title: Giridhari Jaya Giridhari
Lyrics:
Giridhari Jaya Giridhari
Sugandha Tulasi Dala Vanamali [ Giridhari ... ]
Munijana Sevitha Madhava Murahara
Murali (Gopa Gopi) Manohara Giridhari
Meaning: Victory to Giridhari The One who wears the garland of fragrant basil leaves and the garland made of jungle flowers Chant the name of Lord Madhava who is worshipped by Saints and who destroyed the demon 'Mura' The beautiful flute player and the beloved of the Gopalakas and Gopikas.
Songglossary: dala, giridhar, gopa, gopi, jay, madhava, manohar, munijana, murahara, murali, sevita, sugandha, tulasi, vanamali

Title: Giridhari Lal Shyama Gopal
Lyrics:
Giridhari Lal Shyama Gopal
Natavara Lal Madana Gopal
Mathura Natha Krishna Gopal
Sri Madhusudhana Murali Gopal
Yashoda Ke Bal Nanda Gopal
Eshwaramba Priya Sai Gopal
Meaning: Chant the name of the handsome boy Gopala who is the supreme dancer and actor who is the Lord of Mathura the slayer of Madhu and the player of flute the son of Yashoda and Nanda the Sai Gopal whom Eshwaramba is very fond of.
Songglossary: bala, eshwar, giridhar, gopal, ke, krishna, lal, madana, madhu, mathura, murali, nanda, natavara, natha, priya, sai, sham, sri, yashoda

Title: Giridhari Murari Govinda
Lyrics:
Giridhari Murari Govinda
Ghana Shyama Murari Gopala [ Giridhari ... ]
Radhey Krishna Murari Govinda
Sathya Sai Murari Gopala
Meaning: Chant the name of Giridhari Govinda who is the destroyer of the demon 'Mura' chant the name of Radha Krishna and Sathya Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, gopal, govinda, krishna, murare, radha, sai, sathya, sham

Title: Giridhari Nandakumar Kanhaiya
Lyrics:
Giridhari Nandakumar Kanhaiya
Madhuvan Ki Mohana Murali Bajaiya
Ananda Dhama Balaramji Ke Bhaiyya (2) [ Giridhari Nandakumar ... ]
Gopi Manohara Rasa Rachaiya
Giridhari Nandakumar Kanhaiya (2)
Meaning: The one who held the mountain on his little finger! Son of the chieftain Nanda, lord who was called Kanhaiya, the one who played the flute, beloved of the gardens, brother of Balarama, abode of ananda, the beloved of the Gopis, the one who created the rasa, you are the lord who lifted the mountain to protect his devotees and people, O son of Nanda, Kanhaiya (Krishna)!
Songglossary: anand, bajao, balaram, bhai, dhama, giridhar, gopi, kanha, ke, madhu, manohar, mohan, murali, nanda, rachaiya, rasa

Title: Giridhari Shyama Mukunda Murari
Lyrics:
Giridhari Shyama Mukunda Murari
Madhura Madhura Hey Muralidhari [ Giridhari Shyama ... ]
Mathuradhipathey Madhava Shourie
Sri Madhusudhana Mayura Mukutadhara
Madana Mohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
Giridhari Shyam Giridhari Shyam
Meaning: Oh Giridhari (Krishna who lifted the mountain) with dark blue complexion who redeems us from miseries and gives liberation, you are the sweet enchanting flute player Lord of Mathura and valorous Madhava, destroyer of Demon Madhu and the one who adorn with crown of peacock feather, strolls the grooves and garden of Brindavan captivating the dear ones.
Songglossary: giridhar, hey, krishna, kunja, madana, madhava, madhu, mathura, mayur, mohan, mukunda, mukuta, murali, murare, sham, shouri, sri, vihar

Title: Girija Bhavani Shivaranjani
Lyrics:
Girija Bhavani Shivaranjani
Mata Bhavani Jagat Karini [ Girija Bhavani ]
Shakthi Swaroopini Bhaya Harini
Sowbhagya Dayini Sukha Dayini
Meaning: Chant the names of Girija and Bhavani who pleases and makes Shiva happy. Chant the name of Mother Bhavani who liberates the world. She is the embodiment of power and destroys all our fears. She gives happiness and good luck.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, dayini, girija, haarini, jagat, kaarini, mata, shakthi, shiva, sowbhagya, sukh, swaroopa

Title: Girija Nandana (Hey)
Lyrics:
Girija Nandana (Hey)
Hey Shiva Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana [ Girija ... ]
Gaana Vilolana Danava Mardhana
Palita Deenavana Gajanana
Meaning: Oh Gajanana (elephant headed god) you are the beloved of Girija and Shiva who protects us from fear and redeems one from cycle of birth and death. Lover of music and destroyer of demons and protector of weak and meek.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, danava, deenavana, gaan, gajamukha, girija, hey, mardana, nanda, palita, shiva, vilola

Title: Giriraja Tanaye Jaya Ma
Lyrics:
Giriraja Tanaye Jaya Ma
He Durgati Nashini Ma [ Giriraja Tanaye ... ]
Maha Jyothirmayi Shiva Shakti Mayi
Asura Vimardini Ma
Jaya Devi Durge Jaya Ma
He Dukha Vinashini Ma [ He Durgati ... ]
Meaning: Oh mother Durga! you are the daughter of lord of the mountains(Himalayas). Mother Durga you are the destroyer of misfortune. The great, light filled, energy filled goddess, you are the destroyer of the demons. Hail to you O mother, you are the destroyer of sorrow!
Songglossary: asura, devi, dukh, durga, durge, giriraja, jay, jyoth, ma, maha, mardini, shakthi, shiva, tanaya, vinashana

Title: Gita Dayaka He Giridhari
Lyrics:
Gita Dayaka He Giridhari
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Pitambaradhara Parti Vihari
Patitodhari Sai Murari
Meaning: The one who gave the knowledge of the Bhagavat Gita to the world, the one who lifted mountain 'Govardhana', the one who is dressed in yellow silk robes, the person who helps the downtrodden, that lord is called by many names such as Govinda, Narayana, Murari, Puttaparthi Sai.
Songglossary: dayaka, giridhar, gita, govinda, murare, narayana, patithodhara, pithambaradhari, puttaparthi, sai, vihar

Title: Give Thanks with a grateful heart
Lyrics:
Give Thanks with a grateful heart
Give thanks to the Holy One
Give thanks because He's given Jesus Christ, His Son
And now let the weak say, "I am strong"
Let the poor say, "I am rich
Because of what the Lord has done for us, Give Thanks!
GeneralComments: This song is best sung in unison with harmonies.

Title: Give us the power
Lyrics:
Give us the power, give us the light
 Let it shine, Let it shine, give us the light
 You're the river, You're the sea, You're the power inside of me
 Let it shine, let it shine, let it shine (2X)
