 Give us the power, give us the light, let it shine

Title: Giving And Forgiving
Lyrics:
Giving And Forgiving
Loving All The Living
Helping All The Helpless
Never With A Selfish Heart
Giving And Forgiving Giving Only Love
Loving All The Living Living Only Love
Giving And Forgiving Giving Only Love
Loving All The Living Living Only Love

Title: Glory to Sri Ganesha
Lyrics:
Glory to Sri Ganesha
 Victory to Ganesha, Lord Ganesha
 Your Mother is the origin of all, Mother Sakthi
 And your Father is Shiva, Lord of all Lords
 Your Mother is Parvathi, Shiva's consort
 And your Father is the great Shankara
 Lord of all, the Destroyer of evil

Title: Glory to the Lord
Lyrics:
Glory to the Lord, Sathya Sai Baba
 All bow before our beloved Lord, Sathya Sai
 All bow before our beloved Lord Sai
 Very form of Omkar, Lord of God of Gods, Sai
 Grantor of wisdom, Lord of all the Universe
 All bow before our beloved Lord, Sathya Sai
 All bow before our beloved Lord Sai

Title: Gnana Bhaskara Kumara Dayapara
Lyrics:
Gnana Bhaskara Kumara Dayapara
Omkara Roopa Shiva Shakthi Bala
Shanmukha Natha Parama Daya Ghana
Meaning: O Shanmukha (six headed god) the son of Shiva and Parvathi. You are compassionate to the needy and the embodiment of primordial sound (Om) and the treasure house of supreme kindness.
Songglossary: bala, bhaskara, daya, dayapara, ghana, gnana, kumara, natha, om, param, roopa, shakthi, shanmukha, shiva

Title: God here, God there
Lyrics:
God here, God there, God God everywhere
 God is one, God is one, God is one for everyone
 Shiva here, Shiva there, Shiva, Shiva everywhere
 God is one God is one, God is one for everyone
 Allah here, Allah there, Allah Allah everywhere
 God is one, God is one, God is one for everyone
 Sai here, Sai there, Sai, Sai everywhere
 God is one, God is one, God is one for everyone.

Title: God in human form
Lyrics:
God in human form, relieve us of our worldly ties
 Come as beauty, come as peace, take away all sorrow,
 Your are my heart's desire, my Lord Sai Narayana.

Title: God Is All There Is
Lyrics:
God Is All, God Is All, God Is All There Is
God Is All There Is
God Is All There Is (Jai) (2)
Sai Is All ...
Love Is All ...
Songglossary: jai, sai

Title: God is my Guru
Lyrics:
God is my Guru, Sathya Sai is my Lord
 Omnipresent master in my heart shall reside
 Inspiration of my life, Lord of my soul
 May I receive the gift of His Grace (1X)
 May I behold the love in His Face (1X)
 To the will of the Lord may I surrender

Title: God is my strength
Lyrics:
God is my strength and God is my protection
 God opens a path for me and God is my protection
 God is my strength and God is my protection
 God opens a path for me and God is my protection
 Daily He teaches me, Sai is my Father
 Nurtures and cares for me, Sai is my Mother
 Teaches us all we must serve one another
 Love friend and enemy, Sai is my Brother

Title: God Of Love
Lyrics:
God Of Love, God Of Love, Fill My Heart With Your Treasure
Let Me Share, Let Me Care, Let Me Love Without Measure
Father Of Love, Let Me Be Like You, Kind And True Forever
God Of Love, God Of Love, Love Me Now And Forever
God Of Light, God Of Light, Hold My Life In Your Keeping
Let Me Find Peace Of Mind, Guard Me In Waking Or Sleeping
Father Of Light, Guide Me Every Day, All The Way Forever
God Of Light, God Of Light, Lead Me Onward Forever

Title: God’s Love Is So Wonderful
Lyrics:
God's Love Is So Wonderful, So Wonderful, So Wonderful
God's Love Is So Wonderful, God's Wonderful Love
Its So High You Cant Climb Over It
Its So Low You Cant Get Under It
Its So Wide You Cant Get Around It, God's Wonderful Love
Songglossary: so

Title: Goddess of Love, Goddess of Mercy
Lyrics:
Goddess of Love, Goddess of Mercy, I pray to You come to me
 Goddess of Love, Goddess of Mercy, I pray to You, set me free
 Free from the ups and downs of life, free from sorrow and pain
 Free from the bondage of my soul that causes birth and pain
 Make my heart an Ocean of Love that makes me one with all
 Let mercy be the flower of love that blooms in one and all

Title: Goddess of Mercy, O Bodhisattva
Lyrics:
Goddess of Mercy, O Bodhisattva, we bow at Thy Lotus Feet
 Goddess of Mercy, Divine Mother, we pray for Thy Grace each day
 So sweet, so kind and gentle, overflowing with Compassion
 Bringing relief to the suffering mass, showering Joy and Wonder

Title: Gokula Bala Gopala Krishna
Lyrics:
Gokula Bala Gopala Krishna
Govardhanodhara Govinda Krishna
Meera Ke Prabhu Mohana Krishna
Parthipurishwara Shri Sai Krishna
Meaning: In Gokula, you were Gopala Krishna. For Mira, you were Lord Mohana Krishna, the captivating Lord playing your flute. You lifted the Govardhana mountain. In Puttaparthi, you are Lord Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: bala, gokul, gopal, govinda, ke, krishna, meera, mohan, partheeshwara, prabhu, sai, sri

Title: Gokula Nandana Shyama Murari
Lyrics:
Gokula Nandana Shyama Murari
Maakhan Chora Gopala Sai
Mathura Natha Madana Murari
Shyama Sundara Sai Gokula Bala
Surdas Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Natavara Shyama Gopala Sai [ Maakhan Chora ]
Meaning: O Shyama Murari (Krishna) you are the beloved of Gokula who is the stealer of butter, Lord of Mathura, the blue complexioned one and beautiful, the Lord of Surdas Hey! Giridhari who is the delightful dancer. You are also Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: bala, chora, giridhar, gokul, gopal, hey, maakhan, madana, mathura, murare, nanda, natavara, natha, prabhu, sai, sham, sundara, surdas

Title: Gonna fly on the wings of my heart
Lyrics:
Gonna fly on the wings of my heart
 Gonna carry me across the sea
 Gonna fly on the wings of my love
 And sit at Sai Baba's feet.
 (repeat first 4 lines)
 Well I love my Baba, yes I love Him so
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 And I know He's with me wherever I go
 Wings of my love gonna set me free
 He loves all the creatures both great and small
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 He says I love everybody, one and all
 Wings of my love gonna set me free
 Gonna fly on the wings of my heart
 Gonna carry me across the sea
 Gonna fly on the wings of my love
 And sit at Sai Baba's feet.
 He's bringin' righteousness to the earth
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 That's why He's taken this human birth
 Wings of my love gonna set me free
 He's bringin' liberation for you and me
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 My Baba is here to set us free
 Wings of my love gonna set me free
 Gonna fly on the wings of my heart
 Gonna carry me across the sea
 Gonna fly on the wings of my love
 And sit at Sai Baba's feet.
 He helps the helpless, and He feeds the poor
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 Compassion, service what life is for
 Wings of my love gonna set me free
 Well, I'm goin' to Prashanti, and I haven't a care
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 'Cause I know Baba is everywhere
 Wings of my love gonna set me free
 Gonna fly on the wings of my heart
 Gonna carry me across the sea
 Gonna fly on the wings of my love
 And sit at Sai Baba's feet.

Title: Gopal Gopal Brindavana Gopal
Lyrics:
Gopal Gopal Brindavana Gopal
Hey Nanda Ananda Mukunda Gopal [ Gopal Gopal ... ]
Govardhanodhara Gopalana
Gopi Janodhara Niranjana [ Hey Nanda ]
Meaning: Chant Gopala, Gopala the unstained God of Brindavan, one who delighted Nanda and liberated the devotees. Uplifted the Govardhana mountain to save the people, you are protector of cows and Gopis.
Songglossary: anand, brinda, gopal, gopi, hey, janodhara, mukunda, nanda, niranjan

Title: Gopala Baba Sai
Lyrics:
Gopala Baba Sai
Gokula Nandana Go Samrakshaka [ Gopala Baba ... ]
Govardhanodharana Baba
Gopika Ramana Baba (2)
Meaning: O Lord Sai, you are Lord Gopala. In the town of Gokula, you gave protection to the cows and their calves. O Lord, you saved the mountain Govardhana, as per your promise and the devotees from the anger of Lord Indra. Lord Sai, as Gopala, was also the beloved of the Gopikas.
Songglossary: baba, go, gokul, gopal, gopi, govardhan, nanda, ramana, sai, samraksha

Title: Gopala Brindavana Pala
Lyrics:
Gopala Brindavana Pala
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Suramuni Vanditha Gopala Bala
Meaning: Sing the glory of Gopala of Brindavan beloved of Gopis (cow herd women) you are little Krishna of Gokula the enchanting flute player. Worshipped by saints and gods and you are the protector of them.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, gokul, gopal, gopi, lola, munijana, murali, pala, suramuni, vanditha

Title: Gopala Darshan Dey Nandalala
Lyrics:
Gopala Darshan Dey Nandalala
Madhusudhana Neela Bala Govinda
Muralidhara Hari Nanda Mukunda [ Gopala ... ]
Radha Madhava Shyama Gopala
Darshan Dey Dey Madana Gopala
Meaning: Oh Gopala, the son of Nanda give us your Darshan The bluish color boy who destroyed Madhu. The Lord addressed as Muralidhara, Hari, Mukunda, the son of Nanda, Radha Madhava, Shyama Gopala. Please give us your Darshan O extraordinarily handsome Gopala.
Songglossary: bala, darsh, dey, gopal, govinda, hari, madana, madhava, madhu, mukunda, murali, nanda, neela, radha, sham

Title: Gopala Giridhara Bala
Lyrics:
Gopala Giridhara Bala
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala [ Gopala ... ]
Goparipala Narayana (2)
Narayana Narayana [ Goparipala ]
Govinda Govinda Narayana ( Sai )
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, who lifted the mountain, who is the boy of Gokula and who gave happiness to the Gopis. Chant the name of Lord Narayana, Govinda - the protector of cows.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gokul, gopal, goparipala, gopi, govinda, lola, narayana, sai

Title: Gopala Gokula Bala
Lyrics:
Gopala Gokula Bala
Nandalala Goparipala [ Gopala Gokula ]
Shyama Govinda Krishna Gopala
Raasa Vilola Venu Gopala
Nanda Nanda Ke Mukunda Bala
Kamala Vadana Sai Krishna Gopala
Meaning: Chant the various names of Krishna - Gopala, Gokula Bala, Nandalala, Shyama Gopala, Krishna Gopala, Raasavilola, Venu Gopala. The boy Mukunda of Nanda & the lotus faced Sai Krishna Gopala.
Songglossary: bala, gokul, gopal, goparipala, govinda, kamala, ke, krishna, mukunda, nanda, raasa, sai, sham, vadana, venu, vilola

Title: Gopala Gopala
Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala
Giridhara Bala Gopala [ Gopala ... ]
Murali Lola Gopala
Murahara Sai Gopala
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala - one who lifted the mountain, the player of the flute, the slayer of the demon Mura and who is our Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gopal, lola, murahara, murali, sai

Title: Gopala Gopala Gokula Nandana Gopala
Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Gokula Nandana Gopala (3)
Nanda Kishora Gopala
Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Yashoda Bala Gopala
Yadu Kula Tilaka Gopala
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, who is the darling of Gokul and Nanda. The One who stole butter, son of Yashoda and star of Yadu clan.
Songglossary: bala, chora, gokul, gopal, kishora, kula, nanda, navaneetha, tilaka, yadu, yashoda

Title: Gopala Gopala Hrdaya Vihara
Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Hrdaya Vihara Giridhara Gopala
Shyama Mukunda Gopala
Krishna Mukunda Sai Gopala
Nanda Kishora Natavara Lala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala Gopala Gopala Gopala Gopala (2)
Meaning: Lord Sai is a protector of cows (Gopala), the one who lives in the hearts of devotees, the dark hued one (Shyama), the attractive one (Krishna), the expert dancer ( Natavara ).
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, hrudaya, kishora, krishna, lal, mukunda, nanda, natavara, sai, sham, vihar

Title: Gopala Gopala Nacho Gopala
Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Nacho Gopala
Nacho Nacho Sai Nandalala
Rhuma Jhuma Rhuma Jhuma Nacho Gopala
Nacho Nacho Sai Nandalala
Meaning: Please dance and give us the enjoyment of seeing you dance - Gopala and son of Nanda. While you dance, let us hear the sound of your anklets "Rhuma Jhuma".
Songglossary: gopal, nacho, nanda, rhuma-jhuma, sai

Title: Gopala Gopala Radhey Gopala
Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Radhey Gopala
Radhey Shyam Sri Ranga Sai Gopala
Madhava Hey Yadava Pandari Natha Vittala
Hey Deena Natha Vittala
Hey Sai Natha Vittala
Radhey Shyam Sri Ranga Sai Gopala
Meaning: Oh Gopala, the beloved of Radha, also you are Shyama and Sai Gopala the resident of Srirangam. You are the star of Yadu dynasty and you are the Lord Vittala of Pandari, who gives refuge to meek and weak devotees. Also you are Sai Natha Vittala.
Songglossary: deen, gopal, hey, madhava, natha, pandari, radha, ranga, sai, sham, sri, vittala, yadava

Title: Gopala Gopala Radhey Nandalala
Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Radhey Nandalala
Govinda Gopala Radhey Nandalala [ Gopala ... ]
Brindavana Sanchara Radhey Nandalala
Murali Manohara Radhey Nandalala
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, the one who is also the beloved of Radha and darling of Nanda, One who wanders in Brindavan and who holds the flute and the one who is attractive to look at too.
Songglossary: brinda, gopal, govinda, manohar, murali, nanda, radha, sanchara

Title: Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
Lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
Radha Hrudaya Vihara Bala [ Gopala Gopala ]
Nanda Kishora Gopala
Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Kaliya Mardhana Gopala
Govardhana Dhara Gopala
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala also Sai Gopala who resides in the heart of Radha, the son of Nanda, stealer of butter and the one who subdued the Kaliya serpent dancing over its head and the one who also lifted the Govardhana mountain.
Songglossary: bala, chora, dhara, gopal, govardhan, hrudaya, kaliya, kishora, mardana, nanda, navaneetha, radha, sai, vihar

Title: Gopala Govinda Govinda Harey Murarey
Lyrics:
Gopala Govinda Govinda Harey Murarey
Mayura Mukuta Peetambara Dhari
Brindavana Sanchari [ Gopala Govinda ... ]
Shankha Chakra Gadha Padmadhari
Krishna Mukunda Murari ( Sai )
Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala, Govinda, Hari and Murari, you are the one who wears the peacock crown and the yellow cloth, you are the one who wanders in Brindavan, you are the one who bears the Conch, Disc, Mace and Lotus in his hands. You are Lord Krishna, Mukunda and Murari.
Songglossary: brinda, chakra, dhari, gadha, gopal, govinda, hari, krishna, mayur, mukunda, mukuta, murare, padma, peetambara, sai, sanchari, shankha

Title: Gopala Govinda Narayana Hari
Lyrics:
Gopala Govinda Narayana Hari
Nandalala Mukunda Narayana Hari [ Gopala Govinda ... ]
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari
Narayana Hari Veda Parayana Hari
Narayana Hari Jai Jai Narayana Hari (5)
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Gopala. Govinda and Narayana who is beloved of Nanda and the one who bestows liberation to the devotees. Your glory has been extolled in the Vedas. Victory to you oh Narayana Hari.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, jai, mukunda, nanda, narayana, parayana, veda

Title: Gopala Krishna Madhava Krishna
Lyrics:
Gopala Krishna Madhava Krishna
Govinda Madhava Gopala Krishna [ Gopala Madhava ... ]
Madhava Murali Gopala Krishna
Mukunda Madhava Gopala Krishna
Meaning: Let us chant the divine names of Krishna, Gopala, Madhava, Murali and Govinda.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, krishna, madhava, mukunda, murali

Title: Gopala Radha Lola
Lyrics:
Gopala Radha Lola
Murali Lola Nandalala [ Gopala ... ]
Keshava Madhava Janardhana
Vanamala Brindavana Pala [ Murali Lola ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, who gives joy to Radha, The son of Nanda who played his flute. The Lord Keshava, Madhava and Janardhana The one who takes care of Brindavan and the one who wears the garland made of jungle flowers.
Songglossary: brinda, gopal, janardhana, kesha, lola, madhava, murali, nanda, pala, radha, vanamala

Title: Gopala Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda
Lyrics:
Gopala Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gopal [ Gopala Radhey ... ]
Govinda Govinda Gopala Radhey Krishna
Govinda Govinda Gopala Sai Krishna
Govinda Govinda Gopal
Meaning: Chant the names of Gopala, Radha Krishna, Govinda and Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, krishna, radha, sai

Title: Gopala Sai Gopala
Lyrics:
Gopala Sai Gopala
Parthipurishwara Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala Sai Gopala [ Gopala Sai ... ]
Rhuma Jhuma Rhuma Jhuma Nacho Gopala [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
Meaning: Lord Sai is a protector of cows (Gopala), the Lord who lives in Puttaparthi, O protector of cows, Lord Govinda, please dance to the tune of rhuma jhuma like little Lord Gopala.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, nacho, partheeshwara, rhuma-jhuma, sai

Title: Gopala, Hijo De Nanda
Lyrics:
Gopala, Hijo De Nanda
 Dulce Es Tu Flauta Hazla Cantar
 Keshava, Libranos De La Maldad
 Santo Eres Senor De Brindavan
 Toca Tu Flauta, Hazme Sonar
Meaning:
Gopala, son of Nanda! So sweet is Your flute, I pray that You make it sing. O Keshava, free us from evil.
 O Holy Lord of Brindavan, play Your flute and fill my dreams.
GeneralComments: Sung to the tune of Gopala Radha Lola

Title: Gopi Govinda Ghana Shyam Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Gopi Govinda Ghana Shyam Sai Ram Sai Ram
Parthipurishwara He Nandalala
Shirdipurishwara He Sai Bala
Karuna Sindhu He Sai Krupala
Deena Bandhu He Deena Dayala
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: The Lord has many forms like Govinda, to the Gopi ladies of Brindavan who is also Shyam, the one who is dark complexioned God, Sri Sai Ram to the devotees of Nanda's son (Lord Krishna). He is the Sai Baba who resides in Shirdi. Sai is the friend to all those in trouble Sai is all merciful, He is full of compassion.
Songglossary: bala, bandhava, dayal, deen, ghana, gopi, govinda, karuna, krupalu, nanda, partheeshwara, ram, sai, sham, shirdi, sindhu

Title: Gopi Ramana Gokula Nandana
Lyrics:
Gopi Ramana Gokula Nandana
Shritha Jana Palana Narayana
Lakshmi Ramana Aganita Guna Gana
Sai Narayana Namo Namo
Sathya (Parthi) Narayana Namo Namo
Meaning: Oh the beloved of Gopis and Gokula you are the protector of sacred people, You are the consort of Lakshmi, the immeasurable treasure house of virtuous qualities. Salutations to thee Oh Sai Narayana residing in Parthi.
Songglossary: aganita, gana, gokul, gopi, guna, jana, lakshmi, namo, nanda, narayana, paalaya, puttaparthi, ramana, sai, sathya, shritha

Title: Gopi Ramana Gopala
Lyrics:
Gopi Ramana Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Goparipala Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala the beloved of the Gopikas Chant the name of Sai Gopala who is the protector of cows. Chant the name of Govinda.
Songglossary: gopal, goparipala, gopi, govinda, ramana, sai

Title: Govardhana Giridhara Gopika Manohara
Lyrics:
Govardhana Giridhara Gopika Manohara
Mohana Muralidhara Sathya Sai Natavara [ Govardhana Giridhara ... ]
Vasudeva Giridhara Brindavana Sanchara
Keshava Damodara Sathya Sai Natavara
Meaning: Oh Govardhana Giridhari (Krishna who lifted the mountain to save people of Gokula) you are the beloved of Gopikas, the enchanting flute player and a delightful dancer. You are the one wandering in Brindavan. You are also known as Keshava (destroyer of demon Keshi) and Damodara (one who is having rope around the waist). You are also the Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: brinda, damodara, giridhar, gopi, govardhan, kesha, manohar, mohan, murali, natavara, sai, sanchara, sathya, vasudeva

Title: Govardhana Giridhari Murari
Lyrics:
Govardhana Giridhari Murari
Hey Vraja Bala Hey Vanamali
Gokula Brindavana Sanchari
Meera Ke Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Meaning: Oh Govardhana Giridhari Murari (the little mischievous Krishna who lifted the mountain to save the people of Gokula). You are the one who is from Mathura and you are the one who is wearing a garland made of jungle flowers. You are the one from Gokula and wanderer of Brindavan forest. You are the Lord of Meera also presently you are Sai rambling in Parthi.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, giridhar, gokul, govardhan, hey, ke, meera, murare, prabhu, puttaparthi, sai, sanchari, vanamali, vihar, vraja

Title: Govinda Bhajo Sri Hari Gopala
Lyrics:
Govinda Bhajo Sri Hari Gopala Bhajo
Gopi Gopala Bhajo Shyama Bhajo
Govinda Giridhari Gopala Bhajo
Rakumayi Panduranga Vittala Bhajo
Sri Sai Parabrahma Ananda Bhajo (Hey)
Meaning: Chant and worship the various names of Krishna, Govinda, Hari, Gopala, Shyama Giridhari. Also chant the names of Rakumayi Panduranga Vittala (the beloved of Rakumayi and the Lord of Pandharpur) who is also presently Sai of Parthi who is ever supreme and blissful.
Songglossary: anand, bhaja, giridhar, gopal, gopi, govinda, hari, hey, pandu, parabrahma, rakumayi, sai, sham, sri, vittala

Title: Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo
Lyrics:
Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo
Ram Ram Bolo Hari Naam Bolo
Allah Sai Yesu Nanak
Zohrashtra Mahavira Buddha Naam Bolo [ Govinda ]
Yeh Naam Saarey Hai Jeevan Saharey
Paramananda Ke Yeh Kholtey Hai Dwarey
Jo Naam Chaho Woh Naam Bolo
Prem Se Bolo Bhaav Se Bolo
Meaning: Sing the glorious names of Govinda, Gopala, Rama, Hari, Allah, Sai, Yesu, Nanak, Zohrashtra, Mahavira and Buddha. As you Chant the names you choose with Love and devotion, they sustain you through the journey of life.
Songglossary: allah, bhaav, bolo, buddha, chaho, dwarey, gopal, govinda, hai, hari, jeeva, jo, ke, kholtey, mahavir, naam, nanak, param, prem, ram, saarey, saharey, sai, se, woh, yeh, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Govinda Bolo Guru Sai Bolo
Lyrics:
Govinda Bolo Guru Sai Bolo
Gopala Bolo Guru Sai Bolo [ Govinda Bolo ... ]
Shirdi Sai Bolo Shiva Guru Naam Bolo
Sathya Sai Bolo Sadguru Naam Bolo
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Prema Sai Bolo Parabrahma Bolo
Parthi Baba Bolo Paramatma Bolo
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the names of Guru, Govinda, Gopala, Shiva Sai of Shirdi and Parthi who are all the embodiments of Love.
Songglossary: baba, bolo, gopal, govinda, guru, naam, parabrahma, param, prem, puttaparthi, ram, sadguru, sai, sathya, shirdi, shiva

Title: Govinda Gopal Jai Jai Narayan
Lyrics:
Govinda Gopal Jai Jai Narayan Gopal
Madhava Gopal Madhusudhana Gopal
Keshava Gopal Mukunda Gopal
Meaning: Victory to you Oh Narayana, Gopal and Govinda. You are the slayer of demon Madhu and Keshi the one who gives liberation to the deserved.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jai, kesha, madhava, madhu, mukunda, narayana

Title: Govinda Gopala
Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala
Jaya Madhava Gopala
Mukunda Murali Gopala
Madhusudhana Gopala [ Govinda Gopala ]
Yashoda Nanda Gopala
Yadu Nandana Gopala
Jaya Muralidhara Gopala [ Madhusudhana Gopala ]
Meaning: Chant Govinda Gopala (God who fosters cowherds and people) and victory to Madhava Gopala the enchanting flute player who bestows liberation to devotees. You are the destroyer of demon Madhu and beloved of Yashoda, Nanda and Yadu clan. Victory to the God who holds the flute.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jay, madhava, madhu, mukunda, murali, nanda, yadu, yashoda

Title: Govinda Gopala Bolo Radhey Shyam
Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Bolo Radhey Shyam
Bolo Radhey Shyam Bolo Sai Ghana Shyam [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Govinda Gopala Bolo Radhey Shyam (2) [ Bolo Radhey ]
Meaning: Chant the glorious names of Govinda, Radhey Shyam and Sai Ghana Shyam.
Songglossary: bolo, ghana, gopal, govinda, radha, sai, sham

Title: Govinda Gopala Hey Nandalala
Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Hey Nandalala
Radhey Gopala Gopi Gopala
Meera Ke Natha Prabhu Murali Gopala
Govardhanodhara Gopala Bala [ Radhey Gopala ]
Meaning: Glory to Govinda, Gopala, Nandalala (Krishna) the Lord of Radha, Meera and the Gopis The one who plays the flute and the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain - Glory to Him.
Songglossary: bala, gopal, gopi, govinda, hey, ke, meera, murali, nanda, natha, prabhu, radha

Title: Govinda Gopala Narayana
Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Govinda Madhava Narayana [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Govinda Madhava Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana (2)
Narayana Hari Narayana (4)
Meaning: Hail to you Lord Govinda, the finder of cows(Vedas), Gopala, the protector of the cows(Vedas), Narayana, the infinite, auspicious one, Madhava, the one whose is as sweet as Madhu or honey, Hari also means Lord Vishnu!
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, madhava, narayana

Title: Govinda Gopala Narayana (Bhaja Mana)
Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Narayana (Bhaja Mana)
Govinda Madhava Narayana [ Bhaja Mana Govinda ... ]
Govinda Madhava Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (7)
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Madhava and Narayana.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, govinda, madhava, mana, narayana, sai

Title: Govinda Gopala Narayana Hari
Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Narayana Hari
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari (2) [ Govinda Gopala ]
Jagadodhara Narayana Hari
Bhaktha Uddhara Narayana Hari
Parthi Pureesha Narayana Hari
Narayana Hari Jai Jai Narayana Hari (2)
Narayana Hari (2)
Meaning: Chant the names of Govinda Gopala and Narayana. The one who is the sustainer of the universe, the one who is the redeemer of his devotees sufferings, Glory to you Oh Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhaktha, gopal, govinda, hari, jagadodhara, jai, narayana, pureesha, puttaparthi, uddhara

Title: Govinda Gopala Prabhu Giridhari
Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Prabhu Giridhari
Govinda Gopala Hrudaya Vihari [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Parthi (Hrudaya) Vihara Bada Chitha Chora
Meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, who is the protector of cows, the one who lifted the Govardhana hill and the one who is the indweller of our hearts. The one who is the son of Nanda and the one who stole butter in Gokula, is verily Sai, the Lord of Parthi who steals our hearts.
Songglossary: bada, chitha, chora, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hrudaya, kumara, nanda, navaneetha, prabhu, puttaparthi, vihara

Title: Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
Lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
Govinda Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
Govinda Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
Meaning: Chant the name Govinda Gopala the beloved of Radha.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, radha, ramana

Title: Govinda Govinda
Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda
Mukunda Madhava Govinda
Gopala Sai Gopala [ Mukunda Madhava ]
Jai Jai Govinda Jai Jai Gopala (3)
Meaning: Chant the name Govinda (foster of cow herd) who gives liberation to devotees. Victory to Govinda who is also Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jai, madhava, mukunda, sai

Title: Govinda Govinda Bhaja Mana Radhey
Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
Radha Lola Govinda Raasa Vilola Gopala
Krishna Keshava Harey Madhava Govinda Jaya Govinda
Harey Murarey Sai Murarey Govinda Jaya Govinda
Govinda Jaya Govinda Govinda Jaya Govinda (2)
Meaning: Lets chant the divine name of Govinda reverberating in the mind of Radha the beloved of Krishna who is engrossed in the divine sports with Gopala. Also you are the destroyer of demon Keshi. Victory to you Oh Sai Murari and Govinda.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, govinda, hari, jay, kesha, krishna, lola, madhava, mana, murare, raasa, radha, sai, vilola

Title: Govinda Govinda Gayiyere Bhajo Radhey
Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Gayiyere Bhajo Radhey Gopala Krishna Gayiye
Murali Manohara Gayiyere Bhajo Nanda Ke Lal Prabhu Gayiye
Giridhari Giridhari Gayiyere Maayi Meera Ke Nath Prabhu Gayiye (2)
Meaning: Sing the name of Govinda and worship the Lord of Radha - Krishna and Gopala Sing the name of the handsome flute player and worship the Lord, the son of Nanda, Sing the name of the Lord of Mother Meera.
Songglossary: bhaja, gaayen, giridhar, gopal, govinda, ke, krishna, lal, manohar, matha, meera, murali, nanda, natha, prabhu, radha

Title: Govinda Govinda Gokula Brinda
Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Gokula Brinda
Govinda Govinda Satchidananda [ Govinda Govinda ]
Sri Ranga Ranga Hrudayanta Ranga
Bhaktha Vatsala Sai Ranga
Govinda Govinda (4)
Meaning: We chant the name of Govinda of Brindavan at Gokula, who is the existence, awareness and bliss. He is also God residing in Srirangam who revels in our hearts and he is the beloved of devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktha, brinda, gokul, govinda, hrudaya, ranga, sai, satchidananda, sri, vatsala

Title: Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo
Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo
Shyama Sundara Venu Gopala Bolo [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
Parthasarathi Keshava Bolo
Sanathana Sarathi Partheesha Bolo
Meaning: Sing the name of Govinda The handsome bluish boy Gopala with the flute Sing the name of Keshava, the charioteer of Partha I. e. , Arjuna Sing the name of the eternal charioteer the King of Parthi - Sai - who guides us all in the right path towards liberation.
Songglossary: bolo, gopal, govinda, kesha, parthasarathey, partheeshwara, sanatana, sarathi, sham, sundara, venu

Title: Govinda Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Gopala Govinda Narayana [ Govinda ]
Govinda Narayana Hari Hari Gopala Narayana [ Gopala Govinda ]
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Narayana and Gopala, which remove our miseries.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, narayana

Title: Govinda Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Gopala Gopala Narayana [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
Sundara Mukha Sayeeshwara Narayana
Jaya Parthi Jaya Shirdi Narayana
Narayana Veda Parayana
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Narayana and Gopala having beautiful face. You are also Sayeeshwara residing in Shirdi and Parthi and who is extolled in Vedas. Victory to you. .
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jay, mukha, narayana, parayana, puttaparthi, sayee, shirdi, sundara, veda

Title: Govinda Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Narayana
Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava
Govinda Narayana Hari Hari
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana [ Govinda Narayana Hari Hari ]
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Narayana, Madhava, Keshava, Gopala, Hari who protects us from all troubles and miseries.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, kesha, madhava, narayana

Title: Govinda Govinda Radhey Gopal
Lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Radhey Gopal
Govinda Govinda Murali Gopal [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
Shyam Shyam Shyam Shyam Radhey Gopal
Govinda Govinda Murali Gopal
Shyam Shyam Shyam Shyam Radhey Gopal [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
Meaning: O Lord, (Govinda) the finder of the cows (Vedas), (Radhe), the supremely charming, beautiful . O mind! sing the glorious names of Lord Murali, the one who is holding the flute, Lord Shyam the one who has a dark blue complexion, Radhey Gopala, the beloved of goddess Radhe.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, murali, radha, sham

Title: Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
Lyrics:
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
Muralidhara Hey Ghana Shyama Harey [ Govinda ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara (3)
Giridhara Naagara
Charana Kamala Balihaari Rey
Meaning: Chant the name of Govinda, who is of dark blue complexion, holding the enchanting flute in his hand. Oh Lord of Meera who is adored as Giridhara Naagara, we salute at your divine lotus feet.
Songglossary: balihaari, chara, ghana, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, hey, kamala, ke, meera, murali, naagar, prabhu, sham

Title: Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
Lyrics:
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
Govinda Govinda Gopala [ Govinda ... ]
Govardhanodhari Gopala
Gopala Gopala [ Govardhana ]
Gopi Manohara Gopala
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey (3)
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Gopala, who lifted Govardhana mountain on his finger tips to save Gopis and Gopas of Gokula. He is the captivating Lord of them.
Songglossary: gopal, gopi, govardhan, govinda, hari, manohar

Title: Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
Lyrics:
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
Govinda Harey Avatar Harey [ Govinda ... ]
Treta Mey Sita Rama Baney
Dwapara Mey Radhey Shyama Baney
Kali Yug Mey Sai Naam Liye
Sai Naam Liye Sarva Naam Liye
Meaning: Glory to Govinda, Gopala, the one who plays the flute and the one is dark complexioned. The One who was Rama in Treta yuga, and the one who was Lord Shyama the consort of Radha. In the Kali Yuga, We chant the name of Sai and Surrender to His Lotus Feet.
Songglossary: avatar, baney, dwapara, gopal, govinda, hari, kali, liye, naam, radha, ram, sai, sarva, sham, sita, treta, yuga

Title: Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey
Lyrics:
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Gopi Gopa Bala
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Murali Gaana Lola
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Radha Ramana Lola
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Nanda Gopa Bala
Meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda and Gopala The one who enchants with his flute The one who is the consort of Radha and the one who is the son of Nanda.
Songglossary: bala, gaan, gopa, gopal, gopi, govinda, hari, hey, lola, murali, nanda, radha, ramana

Title: Govinda Hey Nandalal Bhajo
Lyrics:
Govinda Hey Nandalal Bhajo
Shyam Brindavana Bal Bhajo [ Govinda Hey ... ]
Shyama Gopala Radhey ( Sai ) Gopal
Radhey Jai Radhey Jai Radhey Gopal (Jai Jai Sai Gopal)
Meaning: Chant and glorify the beloved of Nanda, who is the little Shyam of Brindavan and the beloved of Radha. Victory to the Lord of Radha who is none other than our beloved Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bala, bhaja, brinda, gopal, govinda, hey, jai, nanda, radha, sai, sham

Title: Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai
Lyrics:
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai (3)
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai (2)
Meaning: Victory and salutations to Govinda Gopala who is the Lord of Radha.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, jai, radha, ramana

Title: Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai
Lyrics:
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
Radha Madhava Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Mukunda Jai Jai Murari Jai Jai
Madhusudhana Murali Krishna Jai Jai
Keshava Jai Jai Madhava Jai Jai
Narayana Hari Sri Krishna Jai Jai (Sriman)
Meaning: Victory to Govinda, the beloved of Radha, one who gives liberation and is the annihilator of the demon Mura. Chant His divine names Krishna, Keshava and Narayana.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, jai, kesha, krishna, madhava, madhu, mukunda, murali, murare, narayana, radha, sri, sriman

Title: Govinda Jaya Govinda
Lyrics:
Govinda Jaya Govinda
Gokula Nandana Govinda
Ghana Ghana Neela Govinda
Bala Mukunda Govinda
Hey Ghana Shyama Govinda [ Gokula Nandana ]
Meaning: Glory to Govinda, the beloved child of Gokula whose complexion is dark like the cloud Glory to child Mukunda and Govinda.
Songglossary: bala, ghana, gokul, govinda, hey, jay, mukunda, nanda, neela, sham

Title: Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna
Lyrics:
Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna Jai Gopala Pala Bala Radha Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai [ Govinda ... ]
Gopi Kamala Haari Pyaari Maayi Meera Man Vihari Madana Mohana Muralidhari Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Rama Krishna Jai Radha Krishna Jai Bala Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai
Meaning: Glory to Krishna; Glory to the child Krishna, who is the Lord of Radha; Glory to the beloved Lord who wears the garland of the Gopis; Glory to one who dwells in the heart of Meera; Glory to the Lord of Love who enchants our hearts; Glory to the Lord who plays flute; Glory to Thee.
Songglossary: bala, gopal, gopi, govinda, harana, jai, kamala, krishna, madana, mana, matha, meera, mohan, murali, pala, pyaara, radha, ram, vihar

Title: Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna
Lyrics:
Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna Jai Govinda Govinda Govinda Gopala Jai
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Govinda Krishna Gopala Krishna [ Govinda ... ]
Keshava Madhava Sai Narayana Govinda Govinda Narayana
Nandalala Vraja Bala Hey Sai Narayana Krishna Krishna
Meaning: Victory to Lord Govinda, Gopala, Krishna, Madhava, Keshava, Narayana The son of Nanda and the darling child of Vraja.
Songglossary: bala, gopal, govinda, hey, jai, kesha, krishna, madhava, nanda, narayana, sai, vraja

Title: Govinda Krishna Vittala Venu Gopala
Lyrics:
Govinda Krishna Vittala Venu Gopala Krishna Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Jaya Pandari Natha Vittala
Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga (4)
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Govinda, Lord Krishna with the flute, Lord Vittala and Panduranga who is the Lord of Pandharpur.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jay, krishna, natha, pandari, pandu, venu, vittala

Title: Govinda Krishna Vittaley Venu Gopala
Lyrics:
Govinda Krishna Vittaley Venu Gopala Krishna Vittaley
Ranga Ranga Vittaley Sri Panduranga Vittaley
Govinda Krishna Vittaley Venu Gopala Krishna Vittaley [ Ranga Ranga ]
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Krishna, Vittala. Sing the Glory of Venugopala the one plays the flute. You are Panduranga who is the Lord of Pandari.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, krishna, pandu, ranga, sri, venu, vittala

Title: Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava
Lyrics:
Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava
Jaya Nanda Mukunda Nanda Govinda Radhey Gopala [ Govinda Madhava ... ]
Giridhari Giridhari Jaya Radhey Gopala
Ghana Shyama Shyama Shyama Jaya Jaya Radhey ( Sai ) Gopala [ Jaya Nanda ]
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda and Madhava who protects cowherds and slays demon Keshi. Victory to the beloved of Nanda, who confers liberation to the devotees. We also adore you as the beloved of Radha, Giridhari, (the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain) Ghana Shyama and Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, gopal, govinda, jay, kesha, madhava, mukunda, nanda, radha, sai, sham

Title: Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava (3)
Lyrics:
Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava (3)
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna
Krishna Krishna Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopi Ramana
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana Jaya Madhava Jaya Keshava
Meaning: Glory to you Oh Lord Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava Krishna The adorable child of Gokula, the Lord of Gopi The one who enchants and attracts, slayer of demon Madhu, Victory to Lord Madhava Keshava.
Songglossary: bala, gokul, gopal, gopi, govinda, jay, kesha, krishna, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, ramana, sai

Title: Govinda Murahari Madhava
Lyrics:
Govinda Murahari Madhava
Govinda Gopala Keshava [ Govinda Murahari ... ]
Janardhana Sai Parthi Vihari
Govardhanodhari Madhava
Madhava Keshava Hari Narayana
Meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Keshava, Janardhana, Hari, Narayana Glory to Lord Sai who is the indweller of Parthi.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, janardhana, kesha, madhava, murahara, narayana, puttaparthi, sai, vihar

Title: Govinda Muralidhara Murahara
Lyrics:
Govinda Muralidhara Murahara
Govinda Ghana Shyama Harey [ Govinda Muralidhara ]
Govinda Govardhana Giridhara
Govinda Parandhama Harey [ Govinda Ghana ]
Meaning: Chant the divine names of the Lord Govinda, Muralidhara, Murahara, Ghana Shyama, Giridhari and Sai.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, govardhan, govinda, hari, murahara, murali, parandhama, sham

Title: Govinda Murarey Gopala Murarey
Lyrics:
Govinda Murarey Gopala Murarey
Vittala Shri Hari Panduranga
Hrdaya Vihari Jai Giridhari
Narahari Shauri Panduranga
Panduranga Hari Jai Jai Panduranga Hari
Meaning: Govinda, the protector of cow (Veda, senses), Lord who is Murare, who slaid the demon Mura. Sri Hari (Lord Vishnu with his consort goddess Lakshmi), O Lord Vittala of Pandari, Vittala, the Lord who stands on a brick or the idol of knowledge in the city of Pandharpur, Giridhari, Lord Krishna who lifted the mountain in His little finger, Pure Lord (Shauri), Narahari, half man and half lion please reside in my heart. Victory be to you !
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, hrudaya, jai, murare, narahari, pandu, shauri, sri, vihar, vittala

Title: Govinda Murari Gopala Murari
Lyrics:
Govinda Murari Gopala Murari
Vittala Sri Hari Panduranga
Hrudaya Vihari Jaya Giridhari
Murahara Shourie Panduranga
Meaning: Chant the names of Govinda, Murari Gopala, Vittala Hari and Panduranga. Chant the divine name of Giridhari who resides in all our Hearts.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, hrudaya, jay, murahara, murare, pandu, shouri, sri, vihar, vittala

Title: Govinda Narayana Gopala Narayana
Lyrics:
Govinda Narayana Gopala Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Govinda, Narayana, Gopala.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, narayana

Title: Govinda Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda
Lyrics:
Govinda Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda
Gopala Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda
Mohana Bala Krishna Govinda Govinda
Parthi Nivasa Krishna Govinda Govinda
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Govinda, the Lord of Radha (Lord Krishna) ; Gopala, the handsome boy Krishna and the Lord who resides in Parthi, Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bala, gopal, govinda, krishna, mohan, nivasa, puttaparthi, radha

Title: Govinda Rama Gopala Rama
Lyrics:
Govinda Rama Gopala Rama
Keshava Madhava Sai Rama
Janaki Jeevana Sita Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Meaning: Sing the glory of Rama the consort of Sita, Gopala, Keshava, Madhava and Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, janaki, jay, jeeva, kesha, madhava, ram, sai, sita, sri

Title: Govinda Rama Jai Jai Gopala
Lyrics:
Govinda Rama Jai Jai Gopala Rama
Madhava Rama Jai Jai Keshava Rama [ Govinda Rama ... ]
Durlabha Rama Jai Jai Sulabha Rama
Ek Tu Rama Jai Jai Anek Tu Rama
Meaning: Glory to Rama Who is difficult to attain when sought externally, easily attained when sought within. Victory to Lord Rama, You are the One Lord who has manifested in many forms.
Songglossary: anek, durlabha, ek, gopal, govinda, jai, kesha, madhava, ram, sulabha, tum

Title: Govinda Sadguru Krishna Govinda (3)
Lyrics:
Govinda Sadguru Krishna Govinda (3)
Vahey Guru Sathya Nam Sai Govinda
Sai Govinda (2) [ Vahey Guru ... ]
Krishna Krishna Harey Harey Radhey Govinda (4)
Meaning: Sadguru, Sai, you are the God with the attractive form (Krishna), the finder of the cows (Vedas), (Govinda). You are Vahey Guru, truth (Satya). Sing the names of Krishna, Hari, Radhey and Govinda.
Songglossary: govinda, guru, hari, krishna, nam, radha, sadguru, sai, sathya, vahey

Title: Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala (3)
Lyrics:
Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala (3)
Sri Sai Vittala Shirdi Sai Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Sri Ranga Shirdi Ranga Parthi Ranga Vittala (2)
Meaning: Chant the glorious names, of Govinda, Vittala, Gopala (names of Lord Vishnu) who protects cowherds and all beings. He is the Lord of Shirdi, Parthi and Pandharpur.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, pandu, puttaparthi, ranga, sai, shirdi, sri, vittala

Title: Govinda Yadu Kula Madhava Ananda
Lyrics:
Govinda Yadu Kula Madhava Ananda Paahi Keshava
Navarasa Yugadhara Muralidhara Nava Mohanaanga Hey Sridhara
Madhava Keshava
Sridhara Damodara
Gaana Lola Nija Bhaktha Paripala
Brindavana Sayeeshwara
Meaning: Chant the names of Govinda, Madhava and Keshava, who is from Yadu dynasty. You exhibit 9 modes of melodies and postures while you play your enchanting flute. Your other names are Sridhara and Damodara. You are Lord Sayeeshwara of Brindavan, who is the lover of music and the divine protector of His true devotees.
Songglossary: anand, bhaktha, brinda, damodara, gaan, govinda, hey, kesha, kula, lola, madhava, mohan, murali, nava, navarasa, nija, paahi, paripala, sayee, sridhara, yadu, yugadhara

Title: Govindam Bhaja Mooda Mathey (Bhaja)
Lyrics:
Govindam Bhaja Mooda Mathey (Bhaja)
Samprapte Sannihite Kale
Nahi Nahi Rakshati Dukrin Karane [ Govindam Bhaja ... ]
Punarapi Jananam Punarapi Maranam
Punarapi Janani Jathare Shayanam
Meaning: O mind pray to Govinda, protector of cows, O mind, when the time comes the grammar and recitation of grammar will not help. Again and again we have to take births in the mother's womb, and die, so please remember the name of the Lord Govinda!
Songglossary: bhaja, dukrin, govinda, janam, janani, jathare, kaala, karo, maran, matha, mooda, nahi, punarapi, raksha, samprapte, sannihite, shayana

Title: Govindethi Sada Snanam
Lyrics:
Govindethi Sada Snanam
Govindethi Sada Japam
Govindethi Sada Dhyanam
Sada Govinda Keertanam
Meaning: Always immerse (wash sins away) yourself in the name of Lord Govinda. Always chant and meditate and sing on the name of Govinda.
Songglossary: dhyaan, govinda, japam, keertan, sada, snanam

Title: Gowri Ganesh Uma Ganesh
Lyrics:
Gowri Ganesh Uma Ganesh
Parvathi Nandana Sri Ganesh
Sharanam Ganesh Sharanam Ganesh
Shiva Nandana Ganapathi Ganesh
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Ganesh, beloved son of Mother Gowri, I surrender to Thee, Lord of all Demigods, beloved child of Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvathi.
Songglossary: gananayaka, ganesha, gowri, nanda, parvathi, sharan, shiva, sri, uma

Title: Gowri Ganesha Vinayaka (3)
Lyrics:
Gowri Ganesha Vinayaka (3)
Shuklambara Dhara Natha Gajanana
Sri Ganaraya Gajanana
Gajavadana Jaya Ganapathi Vandana
Mangala Murthy Gajanana (2)
Meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, Vinayaka, the son of Gowri who is adorned with white garment and who bestows auspiciousness We offers our obeisance to you.
Songglossary: dhara, gajamukha, gananayaka, ganaraya, ganesha, gowri, jay, mangal, murthy, natha, shuklam, sri, vandana, vinayaka

Title: Gowri Manohara Hey Nataraja
Lyrics:
Gowri Manohara Hey Nataraja
Shiva Shiva Shankara Hey Shiva Raja
Pavana Charitha Paahi Mahesha
Paahi Mahesha Hey Jagadeesha
Karunamaya Prabho Hey Jagadeesha
Meaning: Hey Nataraja (dancing Shiva), the beloved of Gowri, you are the supreme God who grants us auspiciousness. One who extols you merges in divinity. Protect us oh Mahesha, the compassionate Lord of the universe.
Songglossary: charitha, gowri, hey, jagadeesha, karuna, mahesha, manohar, nataraj, paahi, pavan, prabhu, raja, shankara, shiva

Title: Gowri Nandana Bala Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Bala Gajanana
Gajavadana Gananatha Gajanana [ Gowri Nandana ]
Maha Ganapathey Paahi Gajanana
Gajanana Paahi Gajanana (2)
Meaning: Victory to Gowri's son little Gajanana who has the face of an elephant. I bow down to you. .
Songglossary: bala, gajamukha, gananatha, gowri, maha, nanda, paahi

Title: Gowri Nandana Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Gajanana
Gangadhara Hara Shambho Nandana
Parama Niranjana Mooshika Vahana
Gaana Vilolana Gajanana
Meaning: Oh Gajanana, you are the beloved of Gowri and Shiva, who adorns the Ganges on His head blissfully. You are supremely unstained from the world, who rides the mouse as his vehicle and who is the lover of music.
Songglossary: gaan, gajamukha, gangadhara, gowri, hara, mooshika, nandana, niranjan, param, shambho, vahana, vilola

Title: Gowri Nandana Gajanana
Lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Gajanana
He Dukha Bhanjana Gajanana [ Gowri Nandana ... ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajanana
Shankara Putra Gajanana (Shiva) (2)
Meaning: Son of Gowri, Elephant faced Lord (Gajanana), you are the Lord who removes all sadness. Lord, you are the giver of accomplishments. You are son of the Lord Shankara.
Songglossary: bhanjana, dukh, gajamukha, gowri, nanda, putra, shankara, shiva, siddhi, vinayaka

Title: Gowri Nandana Gajanana (Hey)
Lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Gajanana (Hey)
Girija Nandana Niranjana [ Hey Gowri Nandana ]
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Prasanna
Meaning: Oh Lord Ganesh, son of Mother Gowri who is blemishless and whose countenance is most auspicious. O Lord protect us.
Songglossary: gajamukha, girija, gowri, hey, maam, nanda, niranjan, paahi, parvathi, prabhu, prasanna, shubh

Title: Gowri Nandana Sri Ganesha
Lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Sri Ganesha
Parvathi Nandana Parthi Ganesha [ Gowri Nandana ... ]
Adi Poojita Vijaya Ganesha
Pashankusha Dhara Varada Ganesha
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Paahi Ganesha
Meaning: Oh Sri Ganesha (lord of demigods), you are the beloved of Gowri and the resident of Parthi. Victory unto you, oh Ganesha, who is always invoked first. One who holds the noose and hook, bestowing boons; you are worshipped from age to age. Protect us, Oh lord.
Songglossary: adi, dhara, ganesha, gowri, nanda, paahi, parvathi, pashankusha, poojita, puttaparthi, sri, vanditha, varada, vijaya, yuga

Title: Gowri Nathaya Vishwanathaya
Lyrics:
Gowri Nathaya Vishwanathaya
Sai Nathaya Namah Shivaya
Gunatheethaya Gunadharaya [ Sai Nathaya ]
Kaala Kaalaya Kaalatheethaya
Kaala Roopaya Namah Shivaya
Prema Roopaya Parthi Vasaya [ Sai Nathaya ]
Om Namah Shivaya Sai Shivaya (4)
Meaning: Obeisance to Shiva, who is the consort of Gowri and the Lord of the universe. You are Sai Natha who is with all attributes and also attribute less. You are the embodiment of time, beyond time and the Lord of time. You are the resident of Parthi whose form is Love.
Songglossary: gowri, gunaatheetha, gunadharaya, kaala, namah, natha, om, prem, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, shiva, vasa, vishwa

Title: Gowri Shankara Parvathi Shankara
Lyrics:
Gowri Shankara Parvathi Shankara
Chandra Kaladhara Haalaahala Dhara [ Gowri Shankara ... ]
Trinetradhari Gangajatadhara
Hara Hara Shankara Sai Shankara
Meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, Lord of Gowri (Parvathi)! Oh the One who wears moon in His head! The One who drank the deadly haalaa-hala poison! The One having three eyes, the One having Ganga in His head! Oh Lord, Hara Hara Shankara (Shiva), Oh Lord Sai Shiva)
Songglossary: chand, dhara, ganga, gowri, haalaahala, hara, kaladhara, parvathi, sai, shankara, trinetra

Title: Gowri Shankara Uma Vara
Lyrics:
Gowri Shankara Uma Vara
Girija Shankara Prabho Hara [ Gowri Shankara ... ]
Parvathi Shankara Uma Vara
Neelakanta Manohara
Meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, you are the consort of Shakthi called by many names like Gowri, Uma, Girija and Parvathi. You are Loving and having a captivating form with a blue throat (due to consumption of poison to save the world).
Songglossary: girija, gowri, hara, manohar, neela, parvathi, prabhu, shankara, uma, vara

Title: Gowri Suthaya Om Namah Om
Lyrics:
Gowri Suthaya Om Namah Om
Lambodharaya Om Namah Om [ Gowri Suthaya ... ]
Vighneshwaraya Om Namah Om
Bhava Dukha Bhanjana Om Namah Om
Meaning: We bow to Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Gowri, remover of obstacles and destroyer of sorrows.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, dukh, gowri, lambodhara, namah, om, sutha, vighnesha

Title: Gowri Vara Gangadhara
Lyrics:
Gowri Vara Gangadhara
Shambho Shiva Bimbadhara [ Gowri Vara ... ]
Vyagrambaradhara Jyothi Prakasha
Pavana Naama Harey Paramesha
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
Meaning: Salutation to Shiva, the embodiment of Aum, who is the consort of Gowri. You are adorned with the Ganges on the head and the crescent moon, wearing the tiger skin as your attire. You are the supreme God of effulgence and the saviour of all.
Songglossary: bimbadhara, ganga, gowri, hari, jyoth, naam, namah, om, param, pavan, prakasha, shambho, shiva, vara, vyagrambara

Title: Guru Baba Guru Baba
Lyrics:
Guru Baba Guru Baba
Charana Namostuthey Guru Baba
Vidya Dayaka Guru Baba
(Pra)Shantha Swaroopa Guru Baba
Guruvara Guruvara Guru Baba
Meaning: Worship and pay obeisance at the lotus feet of the most supreme, noble teacher, Lord Sai Baba. He is the embodiment of truth, love and peace. He grants spiritual knowledge.
Songglossary: baba, chara, dayaka, guru, namostuthey, prasanthi, swaroopa, vidya

Title: Guru Baba Guru Baba tienes
Lyrics:
Guru Baba, Guru Baba Tienes La Forma Del Amor,
Con Tu Vida Nos Ensenas Que Camino Es El Major.
Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Te Cantamos Con Devocion
Y Nosostros Aprendemos, A Vivir Siempre En El Amor.
La Misma Melodia:
Harey Rama, Harey Rama, Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna, Harey Krishna, Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Meaning: Our teacher Baba comes in the form of love. With your life, You teach us the best path. Sai Baba we sing to You with devotion and learn to live always in love.
Songglossary: baba, guru, hari, krishna, ram, sai, tum

Title: Guru Bhagavaan Sai
Lyrics:
Guru Bhagavaan Sai, sweet Lord of Love
 Dancing in our hearts, O Playful Sai
 Brightening our lives with Your Blissful Smile
 Awakening our minds with Your radiant Light
 Sweet Guru sai, You are dearest of all
 Guru Sai Baba, Guru Sai Baba
 Sathya, Dharma, Shanthi, Prema, Sai Baba
 Guru Sai Baba, take this heart and fill it with Your Love

Title: Guru Bhagawan Sai Guru Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Guru Bhagawan Sai Guru Bhagawan
Prashanti Vasa Sai Bhagawan [ Guru Bhagawan ... ]
Dharma Uddharaka Sai Bhagawan
Mama Guru Natha Sai Bhagawan (2)
Meaning: Lord Sai living in Prasanthi Nilayam is our guru who upholds all religions. .
Songglossary: bhagawan, dharma, guru, mama, natha, prasanthi, sai, uddhara, vasa

Title: Guru Bhagawan Sai Ram Sadguru
Lyrics:
Guru Bhagawan Sai Ram Sadguru Natha Sai Bhagawan
Dayamaya Deena Dayala
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Prema Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Dharma Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Tina Loka Shri Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: Lord Sai, the Supreme Guru, is extremely compassionate and merciful to the downtrodden. He is the personification of Truth, and the Lord of the three Worlds.
Songglossary: bhagawan, dayal, dayamayi, deen, dharma, guru, loka, natha, prem, ram, sadguru, sai, sathya, sri, swaroopa, tina

Title: Guru Bhagawan Sai Ram Sadguru
Lyrics:
Guru Bhagawan Sai Ram Sadguru Natha Sri Bhagawan
Dayamaya Deena Dayalu
Chinmaya Roopa Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Nithya Lola Sri Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: Worship and pay obeisance at the lotus feet of the most supreme, noble teacher, Lord Sai Baba. He is the embodiment of truth, love and peace. He grants spiritual knowledge.
Songglossary: bhagawan, chinmaya, dayal, dayamayi, deen, guru, lola, natha, nithya, ram, roopa, sadguru, sai, sathya, sri, swaroopa

Title: Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru
Lyrics:
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara
Guru Sai Guru Baba
Guru Sai Maheshwara [ Guru Brahma ]
Guru Padukaa Sai Charanam
Sai Charanam Maheshwara
Meaning: Worship the Sai Guru, who is Brahma (creator), Vishnu (sustainer) and Maheshwara (destroyer). Adore His lotus feet, which redeems all from miseries.
Songglossary: baba, brahma, chara, devo, guru, maheshwara, padukaa, sai, vishnu

Title: Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru
Lyrics:
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara
Jaya Deva Guru Deva Jaya Sathya Sayeeshwara
Jai Jai Jai Karunakara
Jai Jai Jai Akhileshwara
Jai Jai Jai Shirdeeshwara
Jai Jai Jai Partheeshwara
Meaning: Oh Divine preceptors in the form of Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva, Victory to Thee Divine preceptor, Victory to Lord Sai, Victory to the merciful One, Victory to the Lord of the Universe, Victory to the Lord of Shirdi, Victory to the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: akhileshwara, brahma, deva, devo, guru, jai, jay, karuna, maheshwara, partheeshwara, sathya, sayee, shirdeesha, vishnu

Title: Guru Charanam Sharanam Sharanam
Lyrics:
Guru Charanam Sharanam Sharanam
Sadguru Charanam Mama Sharanam [ Guru Charanam ... ]
Nithya Nirmala Guru Charanam
Bhaktha Janashraya Guru Charanam
Bhakthi Mukti Pradayaka Charanam
Bhaktha Sannuta Sathya Sai Charanam
Meaning: Surrender and take refuge at the ever pure feet of Lord Sai, the Supreme Guru. His holy feet provide devotion, protection and liberation to all devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktha, bhakthi, chara, guru, janashraya, mama, mukti, nirmala, nithya, pradayaka, sadguru, sai, sannuta, sathya, sharan

Title: Guru Dev Guru Dev
Lyrics:
Guru Dev Guru Dev
Sathya Sai Natha Sadguru Dev
Sharanam Sharanam Guru Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Brahma Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Vishnu Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Shiva Charanam
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Meaning: We chant and worship the divine preceptor who is presently Sathya Sai Natha, who is Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara. We bow to thy lotus feet and our obeisance to Lord Shiva who is the embodiment of primordial sound.
Songglossary: brahma, chara, dev, guru, namah, natha, om, sadguru, sai, sathya, sharan, shiva, vishnu

Title: Guru Deva Guru Deva
Lyrics:
Guru Deva Guru Deva
Guruvayur Pura Hari Deva
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Deva
Meaning: O Lord Sai Narayana! Lord of Guruvayur (a place in Kerala)! You are the destroyer of demon Mura. Please protect me, I have come to Your refuge.
Songglossary: deva, guru, guruvayur, hari, narayana, pura, sai, sharan

Title: Guru Deva Guru Govinda
Lyrics:
Guru Deva Guru Govinda
Mandara Giridhara Shirdi Pureeshwara
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Shiva [ Guru Deva ... ]
Sundara Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana (2)
Meaning: Glory to the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi Glory to Lord Vishnu, the benevolent teacher whose beautiful form enchanted Vaidehi (Lakshmi)
Songglossary: deva, giridhar, govinda, guru, jay, manda, mohan, narayana, partheeshwara, purishwara, roopa, sai, shirdi, shiva, sri, sundara, vaidehi

Title: Guru Deva Jaya Deva
Lyrics:
Guru Deva Jaya Deva
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Deva Deva [ Guru Deva ... ]
Pranava Swaroopa Devadi Deva
Gnana Pradayaka Sadguru Deva [ Sharanam Sharanam ]
Meaning: Glory to our guru, our God of Gods, Surrender to Lord Sai, embodiment of Om, Lord of the Universe, supreme granter of wisdom.
Songglossary: deva, devadi, gnana, guru, jay, pradayaka, pranava, sadguru, sai, sharan, swaroopa

Title: Guru Deva Priya Deva Sai
Lyrics:
Guru Deva Priya Deva Sai Deva Dayamaya
Vibhuti Sundara Shashankha Shekara
Sai Shankara Daya Karo (2) [ Guru Deva ]
Gokula Ranjana Sai Gopala
Raghukula Bhooshana Sai Rama
Hey Madanaantaka Daya Karo (2)
Meaning: Sai is the merciful and enchanting Guru who is also Shiva, adorned with Vibhuti and crescent moon on the head. Also you are the Sai Shankara who is merciful. You are the Sai Gopala who delights people of Gokula, you are Rama the jewel of Raghu dynasty.
Songglossary: bhooshan, daya, dayamayi, deva, gokul, gopal, guru, hey, karo, madana, priya, raghu, ram, ranjana, sai, shankara, shashankha, shekara, sundara, vibhuti

Title: Guru Deva Sharanam Deva
Lyrics:
Guru Deva Sharanam Deva
Paahi Prabho Sharanam Deva [ Guru Deva ... ]
Sundara Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Sharanam Sharanam Sadguru Deva
Meaning: We surrender to our Guru and God, Protect us Lord, Lord Sai, your form is beauty itself, We surrender to our true guru, God.
Songglossary: deva, guru, paahi, prabhu, roopa, sadguru, sai, sharan, sri, sundara

Title: Guru Devaya Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Guru Devaya Namo Namo
Hey Parameshwara Namo Namo [ Guru Devaya ... ]
Omkaraya Namo Namo
Parthi Pureeshwara Namo Namo
Jagadeeshwaraya Namo Namo
Prashanthi Eshwara Namo Namo
Meaning: Bow again and again to Supreme Noble Teacher, Supreme Lord, Lord whose form is Om, Lord of Parthi, Lord of the Universe and Lord of Prashanthi Nilayam, Lord Sai.
Songglossary: devaya, eshwar, guru, hey, jagadeesha, namo, omkaraya, param, prashanthi, purishwara, puttaparthi

Title: Guru Guru Deva
Lyrics:
Guru Guru Deva, Guru Guru Deva,
 Guru Guru Deva, Guru Guru Deva
 Teacher of all Gods and man
 Master of the ancient Dharma
 Paving the way for one and all, to the Godward path
 Kali Yuga Avathaar, Sathya Sai Baba
 Kali Yuga Avathaar, Guru Deva
 We Clap our hands in ecstacy
 Singing in Joy and harmony
 In presence of our Lord, Sathya Sai Baba

Title: Guru Hamarey Man Mandir Mey
Lyrics:
Guru Hamarey Man Mandir Mey Guru Hamarey Pran
Sathya Prem Ke Tum Ho Daata Sai Nath Bhagawan
Jai Jai Sai Nath Bhagawan
Gnana Bhakthi Ke Tum Ho Daata Sai Nath Bhagawan
Jai Jai Sai Nath Bhagawan
Jaya Guru Deva Sri Guru Deva Sai Nath Bhagawan [ Jai Jai Sai Nath ]
Meaning: Salutations to my Guru who is the remover of ignorance who stays in my heart, who is the giver of truth and love. Victory to Lord Sai who gives peace and devotion. Victory to you Oh Guru Deva who is none other than our Sainath.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhakthi, daata, deva, gnana, guru, hamarey, ho, jai, jay, ke, mana, mandir, natha, pran, prem, sai, sathya, sri, tum

Title: Guru Hara Guru Hari Guru
Lyrics:
Guru Hara Guru Hari Guru Brahma
Guravey Sakshath Parabrahma
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Guru
Jagadidam Akhilam Tava Roopam
Jaya (4) Hara (4) Shiva (4) Jagat Guru
Jagat Guru Sai Guru
Meaning: Guru who removes ignorance is compared to Hara that is Shiva, Hari, Vishnu and Brahma. He is verily the Parabrahma who is formless. Victory to the Guru of whole world whose beauty is supreme and who is auspicious, who is the divine Guru.
Songglossary: akhila, brahma, guru, hara, hari, jagadidam, jagat, jay, parabrahma, roopa, sai, sakshat, shiva, tava

Title: Guru Maharaj Guru Sathya Sai
Lyrics: Guru Maharaj Guru Sathya Sai Natha Sadguru (3)
Meaning: Chant the name of Sathya Sainath, who is our great guru (preceptor), who blesses all.
Songglossary: guru, maharaj, natha, sadguru, sai, sathya

Title: Guru Mahima Gao (3)
Lyrics:
Guru Mahima Gao (3)
Sadguru Sai Anantha Guru
Brahmananda Ananda Guru
Sarva Dharma Sathya Sai Guru
Sai Guru Sathya Sai Guru [ Sarva Dharma ]
Guru Ke Vani Gao
Meaning: Sing about the greatness of the eternal, universal and ever-blissful teacher, Sathya Sai who loves all the religions; He is the truth, knowledge and bliss.
Songglossary: anand, ananta, brahma, dharma, gao, guru, ke, mahima, sadguru, sai, sarva, sathya, vani

Title: Guru Nanak Ji Ki Jai
Lyrics:
Guru Nanak Ji Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Jo Bholey So Hovey Nihaal
Allah (Maulah) Sai Lelo Salaam
Salaam Salaam Lakhon (Mera) Salaam
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Sai Ram
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavira Naam [ Salaam Salaam ... ]
Meaning: Glory to Guru Nanak; Whoever sings thus, that person becomes liberated; Accept my salutations, Sai Baba, who is Allah; Ten million salutations; Accept these salutations of mine; Sai Baba, you are father Jesus, our Lord; You are Buddha, Zohrashtra and Mahavira. Accept my Salutations.
Songglossary: allah, bhole, buddha, guru, hoga, jai, ji, jo, kaar, lakh, lelo, mahavir, maulah, mera, naam, nanak, nihaal, pitha, prabhu, ram, sai, salaam, so, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Guru Pada Ranjana Rama Jaya
Lyrics:
Guru Pada Ranjana Rama Jaya Jaya
Bandha Vimochana Rajeeva Lochana
Abhaya Karambhuja Rama Jaya Jaya
Jai Jai Ram Sita Ram (4)
Meaning: Victory to pleasing Noble Teacher - Lotus-Eyed Lord Rama, who unties the knots and tangles of life - thereby leading to liberation. Victory to charming Supreme Guide - Lord Rama, worship of whose Lotus Feet removes fear. Victory to Lord of Sita - Lord Rama and Lord Sai Ram.
Songglossary: abhaya, bandha, guru, jai, jay, karambhuja, lochana, paada, rajeeva, ram, ranjana, sita, vimochana

Title: Guru Pada Vandana Guru Vandana
Lyrics:
Guru Pada Vandana Guru Vandana
Guru Natha Sai Natha Jaga Vandana [ Guru Pada ]
Shiva Rama Krishna Roopa Jagannatha Sai Deva
Shirdi Prashanthi Vasi Sukha Shanthi Daata
Meaning: Worship and bow to the lotus feet of Guru Sainath whom the people from all over the world worship. He is Shiva, Rama, Krishna and the Lord of the world. He is the resident of Shirdi and Parthi who bestows happiness and peace.
Songglossary: daata, deva, guru, jagan, jagat, krishna, natha, paada, prashanthi, ram, roopa, sai, shanthi, shirdi, shiva, sukh, vandana, vasi

Title: Guru Sai Maheshwara
Lyrics:
Guru Sai Maheshwara
Karunakara Karunamaya
Prashanthi Sai Sundara
Parabrahma Roopa Parathpara
Trivikrama Narayana
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
Meaning: Worship Sai Maheshwara, the guru who is the embodiment of kindness and mercy and who is the resident of Prashanthi having a delightful form. He is the embodiment of supreme Lord and He is Narayana, treading three worlds (in the Vamana avatar). He is the creator, sustainer and the destroyer of the universe.
Songglossary: brahma, guru, karuna, maheshwara, narayana, parabrahma, parathpara, prashanthi, roopa, sai, sundara, trivikrama, vishnu

Title: Gurudev Gurudev Sathya Sai Gurudev
Lyrics:
Gurudev Gurudev Sathya Sai Gurudev Gurudev Jai
Gurudev Gurudev Bhagawan, You are the light in everyone
Take my Hands and take my Love, lead me and guide me from above
Twirl me around in Your dance of light, destroy the darkness of the night
Gurudev Gurudev Jai Gurudev Gurudev Jai
Gurudev Gurudev Bhagawan, You are the light in everyone
Songglossary: bhagawan, gurudev, jai, sai, sathya

Title: Guruvara Guruvara Sai Namo
Lyrics:
Guruvara Guruvara Sai Namo
Sadguru Satchidananda Namo
Veda Gamanutha Sai Namo
Naada Priya Shiva Sai Namo
Meaning: Salutations to Sai, our guru who grants us boons. He is the embodiment of existence, awareness and bliss, the essence of Vedas, lover of divine music and the primordial sound Om.
Songglossary: gamanutha, guru, naada, namo, priya, sadguru, sai, satchidananda, shiva, veda

Title: Guruvara Naam Pavana Naam
Lyrics:
Guruvara Naam Pavana Naam
Sadguru Naam Guru Nanak Naam
Guruvara Naam Pavana Naam
Sadguru Sai Baba Naam
Jai Guru Sadguru Nanak Naam Jai Bolo Sai Baba Naam
Meaning: Sing/repeat the names of the Guru - Guru Nanak and Sai Baba; these names purify one's heart.
Songglossary: baba, bolo, guru, jai, naam, nanak, pavan, sadguru, sai

Title: Guruvayurappa Shri Hari Guruvayurappa
Lyrics:
Guruvayurappa Shri Hari Guruvayurappa
Kunchita Pada Kuvalaya Nayana Guruvayurappa
Krishna Rama Govinda Hari Guruvayurappa
Rama Krishna Govinda Hari Guruvayurappa
Achyutha Keshava Hari Narayana Guruvayurappa
Madhava Mohana Murali Manohara Guruvayurappa
Pankaja Netra Parama Pavitra Guruvayurappa
Parti Purisha Parama Dayala Guruvayurappa
Meaning: Sing the names of Lord Guruvayur(Krishna): Atchyuta, Keshava, Govinda. He is one with the lotus shaped eyes and dainty feet.
Songglossary: achyutha, dayal, govinda, guruvayur, hari, kesha, krishna, kunchita, kuvalaya, madhava, manohar, mohan, murali, narayana, nayan, nethra, paada, pankaja, param, pavitra, pureesha, puttaparthi, ram, sri

Title: Guruvayurpura Sri Hari Krishna Narayana
Lyrics:
Guruvayurpura Sri Hari Krishna Narayana Gopal
Mukunda Madhava Muralidhari Narayana Gopal
Narayana Gopal Sai Narayana Gopal (2)
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Narayana Gopal [ Mukunda Madhava ]
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord of Guruvayur, Lord Hari, Krishna, Narayana, Gopal, Madhava, Muralidhara, Mukunda and Sai Narayana. Chant the name of Krishna who lifted the  Govardhana mountain.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, govardhana, guruvayur, hari, krishna, madhava, mukunda, muralidhaari, murare, narayana, pura, sai, sri

Title: Halleluiah, Halleluiah, Halleluiah, Halleluiah
Lyrics:
Halleluiah, Halleluiah, Halleluiah, Halleluiah
 Halleluiah Sai Baba, Halleluiah Sai Baba
 Halleluiah Sai Has Come, Halleluiah Sai has Come
 Halleluiah Sai Has Come, Halleluiah Sai is Here
 Sai Baba, How We Love You,
 Sai Baba How we Love You

Title: Hamsa Vahini Devi Narayani
Lyrics:
Hamsa Vahini Devi Narayani
Jaya Jaganmohini Tribhuvana Palini [ Hamsa Vahini ]
Jaya Mrudu Bhaashini Mata Bhavani
Bhava Bhaya Harini (Tribhuvana Palini) Sai Janani
Meaning: Oh goddess Lakshmi (Narayani) who has the swan as her vehicle. You are the sustainer of all the three worlds, who has a captivating form. Victory unto you Oh Mata Bhavani, who speaks softly. You are none other than our mother Sai who redeems us from fear and worldly troubles.
Songglossary: bhaashi, bhava, bhaya, devi, haarini, hamsa, jagan, janani, jay, mata, mrudu, narayani, palini, sai, tribhuvan, vahini

Title: Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey
Lyrics:
Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey, Shambho Shankara Pashupathey
Nandi Vahana Naga Bhooshana, Chandrashekara Jatadhara
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Manohara, Girija Kantha Sadashiva
Meaning: Let us chant the divine names of Shiva or Shambho who is the consort of Uma. Lord who is easy to please, who rides the Ox (Nandi), decorated with snake and the sustainer of all species adorned with the crescent moon and Ganga on his matted lock of hair. You are the beloved of Gowri and Girija.
GeneralComments: Alternative version of this song: Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey
Songglossary: bhola, bhooshan, chand, ganga, girija, gowri, hara, jatadhara, kantha, manohar, naga, nandi, natha, pashu, pathey, sadashiva, shambho, shankara, uma, vahana

Title: Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey
Lyrics:
Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey, Shambho Shankara Pashupathey
Kailasa Vasa Chithambaresha, Neelakanta Sadashiva
Bham Bham Hara Hara Bhola Maheshwara, Parvathi Ramana Sadhashiva
Meaning: Let us chant the divine names of Shiva or Shambho who is the consort of Uma, the blue-throated Lord who resides in mount Kailasa and Chidambaram, whose drum resounds Bham Bham, who is the consort of Parvathi.
GeneralComments: Alternative version of this song: Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey
Songglossary: bham, bhola, chitha, hara, kailasa, maheshwara, natha, neela, parvathi, pashu, pathey, ramana, sadashiva, shambho, shankara, uma, vasa

Title: Hara Gauri Nath Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Hara Gauri Nath Shiva Shankara
Bhola Hare Shambo Bhola Hare
Hara Gauri Nath Shiva Shankara
Shambho Shiva Shambho Deva
Kailasa Vasa Mahadeva
Bhola Hare Shambho Bhola Hare
Meaning: Chant and celebrate the many names of Lord Shiva. He is the beloved of Gauri and known as the auspicious one. He is the supreme Being who resides in Mount Kailasa and remains an abode of joy for all who seek him.

Title: Hara Hara Gangey Hara Hara
Lyrics:
Hara Hara Gangey Hara Hara Gangey
Hey Nataraja Hey Shiva Raja Hara Hara Hara Hara Gangey [ Hara Hara ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Jaya Gangadhara
Hara (4) Gangey [ Hara Hara ... ]
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Shankara Sai (2)
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Shankara Sai (2)
Meaning: Let us chant the glorious name of Shiva who adorns the Ganges in his matted hair. Oh Shankara, you are the master of the divine dance and the resident of Parthi, who bestows auspiciousness.
Songglossary: ganga, hara, hey, jay, nataraj, purishwara, puttaparthi, raja, sai, shankara, shiva

Title: Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Lyrics:
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Om Namo Namo Namah Shivaya
Brahma Vishnu Surarchitaya Om Namo Namo Namah Shivaya
Uma Ganesha Sharavana Sevitha Om Namo Namo Namah Shivaya [ Om Namo ]
Meaning: Glory to the great God Shiva! Chant the auspicious name of "Shiva" who is worshipped by the other two Gods. Brahma and Vishnu. You are served by Your consort, the Divine Mother Uma and by Your sons, Ganesha and Saravana (Subrahmanya).
Songglossary: brahma, ganesha, hara, mahadev, namah, namo, om, sadashiva, sevita, sharavana, shiva, surarchitaya, uma, vishnu

Title: Hara Hara Hara Hara Namami
Lyrics:
Hara Hara Hara Hara Namami Shankara Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Sadashiva Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Meaning: Sing (chant) the name of Shiva, the name of Sai. Sing (chant) the name of Sai Ram.
Songglossary: bhaja, hara, mana, namam, ram, sadashiva, sai, shankara, shiva

Title: Hara Hara Hara Hara Samba
Lyrics:
Hara Hara Hara Hara Samba Shiva
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Shiva
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Shiva
Parthi Puri Paramesha Shiva [ Vibhuti Sundara ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Shiva the three-eyed destroyer of evil. He bears the Ganges and the trident; chant the name of Sai Shiva of Parthi Who is adorned with holy ash.
Songglossary: dhari, ganga, gowri, hara, param, puri, puttaparthi, sai, samba, shiva, sundara, trinetra, trishoola, vibhuti

Title: Hara Hara Mahadeva Saishwara
Lyrics:
Hara Hara Mahadeva Saishwara
Namo Namami Shirdishwara [ Hara Hara ... ]
Vishweshwara Vishvambara
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (2)
Meaning: Worship, and chant the names of Lord Mahadeva (Shiva) who bears the holy Ganges; of Lord Sai and of Lord Shirdi.
Songglossary: ganga, hara, mahadev, namam, namo, saiyeeshwara, shirdi, vishwambharadhara, vishweshwara

Title: Hara Hara Shankara Namami Shankara
Lyrics:
Hara Hara Shankara Namami Shankara
Uma Pathey Kailasa Shankara
Gangadhara Hara Chandrakaladhara
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Sai Shankara
Meaning: Salutations to Shankara, consort of Uma, whose abode is Mount Kailasa. Lord Shiva has Mother Ganges and the Crescent moon over His Head, is the same Sai who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: chand, ganga, hara, kailasa, namam, pathey, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, shankara, shiva, uma

Title: Hara Hara Shankara Samba Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Hara Hara Shankara Samba Sadashiva Esha Mahesha
Tandava Priyakara Chandra Kaladhara Esha Mahesha
Amba Guha Lambodhara Vanditha Esha Mahesha
Vindhya Himachala Shringa Nivasita Esha Mahesha
Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Shankara, Samba Sadashiva and Mahesha. Oh Lord Mahesha! You are fond of Tandava Dance (cosmic dance). You are adorned with Moon as decoration on Your forehead. You are worshipped by the darling son of Mother Amba - Lord Ganesh, the one with a pot belly. You are the resident of the Himalayas. By Chanting the above divine names, the Lord destroys evil and grants protection.
Songglossary: amba, chand, esha, guha, hara, himachala, kaladhara, lambodhara, mahesha, nivasi, priya, sadashiva, samba, shankara, shringa, tandava, vanditha, vindhya

Title: Hara Hara Shankara Shiva Shiva
Lyrics:
Hara Hara Shankara Shiva Shiva Shankara Bham Bham Bholey Nath
Bham Bham Bholey Nath Sai Bham Bham Bholey Nath
Dama Dama Damaru Damaru Ka Natha Bham Bham Bholey Nath
Bham Bham Bholey Nath Sai Bham Bham Bholey Nath (2)
Meaning: Chant the divine name of Shiva, who redeems from all troubles ( Hara ), the Lord who is easy to please, whose damaru creates sounds like Bham Bham and Dama Dama during the cosmic dance.
Songglossary: bham, bhole, dama, damaru, hara, ka, natha, sai, shankara, shiva

Title: Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Ambalavana
Lyrics:
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Ambalavana
Ambalavana Ponnambalavana
Ananda Tandava Nataraja
Nataraja Nataraja
Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shivaraja Shivaraja
Shivakami Priya Shivaraja
Chidambaresha Nataraja
Meaning: Lord Shiva, the beloved of Parvathi, delights in the beautiful cosmic dance. He resides in the temple of the heart and in Chidambaram (a temple in southern India)
Songglossary: ambalavana, anand, chidambara, hara, narthana, nataraj, ponnambalavana, priya, shiva, sundara, tandava

Title: Hara Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath
Lyrics:
Hara Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath Shirdi Pureeshwara Sai Nath
Shiva Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Nath
Ahi Bhooshana Shiva Gowri Nath
Parama Sumangala Sai Nath
Girija Ramana Paramananda Samadhipriya Ganga Nath
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva and Lord of Parthi. Lord of Gowri, adorned with a cobra, always blissful is the delight of Girija. He bears the river Ganges, bestows auspiciousness and He rejoices in the bliss of meditation.
Songglossary: ahi, bhole, bhooshan, ganga, girija, gowri, hara, natha, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, ramana, sai, samadhipriya, shankara, shirdi, shiva, sumangala

Title: Hara Shiva Shankara Shashankha Shekara
Lyrics:
Hara Shiva Shankara Shashankha Shekara Hara Bham Hara Bham Bham Bham Bolo
Bhava Bhayankara Girija Shankara Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Thaka Narthana Kelo
Hara Shiva Shankara Shashankha Shekara Hara Bham Hara Bham Bham Bham Bolo [ Bhava Bhayankara ... ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva, dancing to the rhythm of drums. Shankara, Lord of Girija, destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death.
Songglossary: bham, bhava, bhayankara, bolo, dhimi, girija, hara, kelo, narthana, shankara, shashankha, shekara, shiva, thaka

Title: Hare Rama I am Om
Lyrics:
Hare Rama Ia Om - Hare Rama Ia Om - Sai Rama Ia Om
 I am Love and Love is me - That is what I choose to be
 I am Truth and Truth is me - That is what I choose to be
 I am God and God is me - That is what I choose to be

Title: Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna
Lyrics:
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna and Lord Rama.
Songglossary: hari, krishna, ram

Title: Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai
Lyrics:
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Gopal Govinda (Madhava Mukunda) Bolo Jai Sai Ram
Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara Daya Karo Hey Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram Bolo [ Jai Jai Ram ]
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Krishna, Rama, Gopala, Govinda, Madhava and Mukunda. Bless us Oh Sai the Lord of Parthi who is also Parameshwara. Victory to you Oh Sai Rama.
Songglossary: bolo, daya, gopal, govinda, hari, hey, jai, karo, krishna, madhava, mukunda, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai

Title: Harey Krishna Mukunda Murari
Lyrics:
Harey Krishna Mukunda Murari
Harey Krishna Sai Krishna [ Harey Krishna Mukunda ]
Bhajo Krishna Sunaada Murali
Bhajo Murali Madhura Murali
Mana Mohana Krishna Madhusudhana Krishna
Yadu Nandana Krishna Gopi Chandana Krishna
Meaning: Praises be to you Oh Lord Krishna! whose other names are Mukunda and Murari. Glory be to the enchanting one, slayer of demon Madhu, of Yadava lineage and the darling of Gopis who plays sweet divine music on the flute.
Songglossary: bhaja, chand, gopi, hari, krishna, madhu, mana, mohan, mukunda, murali, murare, nanda, sai, sunaada, yadu

Title: Harey Krishna Yaduvara Krishna
Lyrics:
Harey Krishna Yaduvara Krishna
Sundara Krishna Mana Mohana Krishna
Dheera Krishna Damodara Krishna
Krishna Krishna Krupa Karo Krishna
Meaning: Oh Mind! Worship and chant the name of the Lord Hari, Sai Ram, Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda and Gopala.
Songglossary: damodara, dheera, hari, karo, krishna, krupa, mana, mohan, sundara, yadu

Title: Harey Murali Manohara Shyama
Lyrics:
Harey Murali Manohara Shyama
Harey Gopi Manohara Shyama [ Harey Murali ]
Harey Devaki Nandana Shyama
Harey Vasuki Shayana Shyama
Meaning: Glory be to the Lord who has an enchanting form with the flute in His hands, dear to the Gopis, son of Devaki and the one who reclines on the serpent Vasuki.
Songglossary: devaki, gopi, hari, manohar, murali, nanda, sham, shayana, vasuki

Title: Harey Murarey Madhukaitabhaarey
Lyrics:
Harey Murarey Madhukaitabhaarey
Govinda Gopala Mukunda Shourie
Anantha Sridhara Govinda Keshava
Mukunda Madhava Narayana
Devaki Tanaya Gopika Ramana
Bhaktha Uddharana Trivikrama
Meaning: Sing the Glory of the Lord by chanting His names Govinda, Gopala, Sridhara, Keshava, Mukunda, Madhava, who is the son of Devaki, dear to the Gopikas and the one who annihilated the demons Madhu and Kaitabha.
Songglossary: ananta, bhaktha, devaki, gopal, gopi, govinda, hari, kesha, madhava, madhu, mukunda, murare, narayana, ramana, shouri, sridhara, tanaya, trivikrama, uddhara

Title: Harey Murarey Sai Ram Harey
Lyrics:
Harey Murarey Sai Ram Harey Murarey Ram
Parama Sumangala Sai Ram Parama Sumangala Ram
Allah Eshwara Sai Ram Sab Tum Ho Bhagawan [ Parama Sumangala ]
Meaning: Glory be to Sai Ram the One who is Supremely auspicious who is also addressed as Ram, Allah and Eshwara.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, eshwar, hari, ho, murare, param, ram, sab, sai, sumangala, tum

Title: Harey Murarey Shyam Bhaja Mana
Lyrics:
Harey Murarey Shyam Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
Shyam Mukunda Harey Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda [ Harey Murarey ... ]
Sai Govinda Harey Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
Radhey Jai Radhey Jai Radhey Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
Meaning: Oh Mind Sing in praise of Radhey Govinda of blue complexion whose other names are Murarey, Mukunda and also Sai.
Songglossary: bhaja, govinda, hari, jai, mana, mukunda, murare, radha, sai, sham

Title: Harey Murari Ranga Narayana Om
Lyrics:
Harey Murari Ranga Narayana Om
Peetambara Dhara Narayana Om
Mayura Mukuta Dhara Narayana Om [ Harey Murarey ]
Lakshmi Kantha Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Narayana Om
Meaning: Lord Narayana is the one who is dressed in yellow attire, with the peacock feather on His head, the one who is dear to Mother Lakshmi, who is also known as Ranga of Pandharpur.
Songglossary: dhara, hari, kantha, lakshmi, mayur, mukuta, murare, narayana, om, peetambara, ranga

Title: Harey Ram Harey Ram
Lyrics:
Harey Ram, Harey Ram,
Harey Krishna Sai Ram
Chant The Name Of God,
Sing The Glory Of The Lord
Call Him Allah Or Buddha,
Jesus, Zohrashtra
Say Ram, Rahim, Mahavir, Sainatha
He Is All Names And All Forms
Choose Anyone
He Is All Names And All Forms, Almighty One
Songglossary: allah, buddha, hari, krishna, mahavir, rahim, ram, sai, sainatha, zohrashtra

Title: Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey
Lyrics:
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Rama Krishna Harey Ram
Mukunda Madhava Sri Sai Ram [ Harey Ram ... ]
Govinda Gopala Radha Ke Shyam
Giridhara Gopala Meera Ke Shyam
Bolo Ram Bolo Shyam Bolo Sai Ghana Shyam
Meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord, Rama, Krishna, Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda, the blue complexioned Gopala who is dear to Radha and Meera.
Songglossary: bolo, ghana, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, ke, krishna, madhava, meera, mukunda, radha, ram, sai, sham, sri

Title: Harey Ram Harey Ram Krishna
Lyrics:
Harey Ram Harey Ram Krishna Krishna Ram
Radha Krishna Rama Krishna Sai Ghana Shyam
Giridhara Gopala Sai Ghana Shyam
Krishna Rama Govinda Sai Ghana Shyam
Sundara Roopa Sai Ghana Shyam [ Radha Krishna ]
