Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana, the charming Prince of Vasudeva, the Lord of Radha. Madhava, who is infinite bliss.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, krishna, radha, ram, roopa, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama
Lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Meaning: Chant the names of Rama and Krishna ceaselessly. Glory be to them.
Songglossary: hari, krishna, ram

Title: Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama
Lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Meaning: Chant the names of Rama and Krishna continuously. Glory be to them.
Songglossary: hari, krishna, ram

Title: Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama
Lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Satsangathwey Nithsangathwam Nithsangathwey Nirmohathwam
Nirmohatwey Nischala Thatwam Nischala Thatwey Jeevan Mukti
Meaning: Good company leads to blissful solitude, which further leads to freedom from infatuation, mental equanimity and finally to liberation even as one is alive. This is how an aspirant progresses by taking the Lord's name incessantly with sincere devotion.
Songglossary: hari, jeeva, krishna, mukti, nirmohathwam, nischala, nithsangathwam, ram, satsangathwe, thatwam, thatwe

Title: Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama
Lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Krishna Keshava Krishna Keshava Krishna Keshava Paahimam
Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Raksha Mam
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord: Rama, Krishna, Madhava, Raghava. The Lord's name destroys the miseries of life and grants protection.
Songglossary: hari, kesha, krishna, mam, paahi, raghava, raksha, ram

Title: Harey Sai Gopala Radhey Krishna
Lyrics:
Harey Sai Gopala Radhey Krishna
Harey Sai Govinda Panduranga [ Harey Sai Gopala. ]
Hey Prabhu Vandana Hey Yadu Nandana
Hey Nanda Nandana Dayamaya
Kunja Vihari Krishna Murari
Parthi Vihari Namo Namo
Meaning: Accept my salutations Oh Lord Sai Gopala, Sai Govinda, Panduranga the compassionate one, who dwells at Parthi, had earlier incarnated as Krishna in the Yadu lineage and moved about in Brindavan as the son of Nanda.
Songglossary: dayamayi, gopal, govinda, hari, hey, krishna, kunja, murare, namo, nanda, pandu, prabhu, puttaparthi, radha, sai, vandana, vihar, yadu

Title: Harey Sai Harey Sai Sai
Lyrics:
Harey Sai Harey Sai Sai Sai Harey Harey
Harey Baba Harey Baba Bala Baba Harey Harey [ Harey Sai ... ]
Achyutham Keshavam Rama Narayanam
Krishna Damodaram Vasudevam Bhajey
Sridharam Madhavam Gopika Vallabham
Sadgurum Nayakam Sai Ramam Bhajey
Meaning: Chant various names of the Lord Achyutha, Keshava, Rama, Narayana, Krishna, Damodara, Vasudeva, Sridhara, Madhava and the Lord of the Gopis who is none else than our sacred preceptor Sri Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: achyutha, baba, bala, bhaja, damodara, gopi, hari, kesha, krishna, madhava, narayana, nayaka, ram, sadguru, sai, sridhara, vallabha, vasudeva

Title: Hari Anandamaya Jaya Narayana ( Sai )
Lyrics:
Hari Anandamaya Jaya Narayana ( Sai )
Vasudeva Nandana Radha Jeevana
Paramananda Madhava
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana (3)
Meaning: Praises be to Lord Narayana who is Supreme Bliss personified, who incarnated as the son of Vasudeva and the very life of Radha.
Songglossary: anand, hari, jay, jeeva, madhava, nanda, narayana, param, radha, sai, vasudeva

Title: Hari Bhajana Bina Sukh Shanthi
Lyrics:
Hari Bhajana Bina Sukh Shanthi Nahin
Hari Naama Bina Ananda Nahin
Prema Bhakthi Bina Uddhar Nahin
Guru Seva Bina Nirvana Nahin [ Hari Bhajan ... ]
Jap Dhyaana Bina Sam Yoga Nahin
Prabhu Darsha Bina Pragnana Nahin
Daya Dharma Bina Sath Karma Nahin
Bhagawan Bina Koi Apna Nahin
Sai Ram Bina Paramatma Nahin
Meaning: Oh Mind Understand there is no peace without chanting the Glory of the Lord Hari, which itself is Bliss. There is no progress without loving devotion to the Lord and no liberation without service to the feet of the Guru. There is no equanimity of mind without remembering Lord's name and meditation. There is no integrated awareness without Lord's vision. Performing good deeds constitute righteousness and compassion. Understand that everything belongs to God and that Supreme Consciousness is Sai Rama Himself.
Songglossary: anand, apna, bhagawan, bhaja, bhakthi, bina, darsh, daya, dharma, dhyaan, guru, hari, japam, karma, koi, naam, nahin, nirvana, param, prabhu, pragnana, prem, ram, sai, sam, sat, seva, shanthi, sukh, uddhaar, yoga

Title: Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari Hari Bol
Mukunda Madhava Govinda Bol
Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari Hari Bol
Keshava Madhava Govinda Bol
Meaning: Contemplate on the name of the Lord Hari Meditate on the Lotus Feet of Lord Hari Worship the Divine Flute Player, Lord Madhava. Sing the glory of Lord Keshava.
Songglossary: bol, govinda, hari, kesha, madhava, mukunda

Title: Hari Bolo Harey Rama Naam
Lyrics:
Hari Bolo Harey Rama Naam
Hari Bolo Harey Krishna Naam
Hari Bolo Sathya Sai Ram
Hari Bolo Harey Rama Naam
Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Hari, Rama, Krishna and Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: bolo, hari, krishna, naam, ram, sai, sathya

Title: Hari Govinda Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Hari Govinda Govinda Narayana
Hari Gopala Gopala Narayana [ Hari Govinda ... ]
Satchidananda Ananda Narayana
Paramananda Ananda Narayana
Hari Narayana Sai Narayana (5)
Meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord Narayana, Govinda, Gopala, Hari, personification of Truth, Awareness and Supreme Bliss.
Songglossary: anand, gopal, govinda, hari, narayana, param, sai, satchidananda

Title: Hari Govinda Madhava Krishna
Lyrics:
Hari Govinda Madhava Krishna
He Panduranga Krishna
Harey Panduranga Harey Panduranga [ Hari Govinda ... ]
Hari Narayana Jaya Narayana Krishna
Hari Narayana Sai Narayana Krishna [ Harey Panduranga ... ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna who is also Hari, Govinda, Madhava, Panduranga, and Narayana.
Songglossary: govinda, hari, jay, krishna, madhava, narayana, pandu, sai

Title: Hari Govinda Nanda Mukunda
Lyrics:
Hari Govinda Nanda Mukunda
Keshava Narayana
Madhava Narayana
Sridhara Narayana
Sri Hari Narayana
Parthi Narayana Hari Narayana
Govinda Narayana Paramananda Narayana
Meaning: Chant the different names of Lord Narayana, Hari, Govinda, Madhava, Sridhara, the one of supreme Bliss who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: govinda, hari, kesha, madhava, mukunda, nanda, narayana, param, puttaparthi, sri, sridhara

Title: Hari Guna Gaana Karo Mana
Lyrics:
Hari Guna Gaana Karo Mana Mero
Sai Guna Gaana Karo Mana Mero
Harey Rama Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna
Sai Guna Gaana Karo Mana Mero (2)
Meaning: Oh Mind! Sing blissfully the divine attributes of Hari, Rama, Krishna and Sairam.
Songglossary: gaan, guna, hari, karo, krishna, mana, mera, ram, sai

Title: Hari Guna Keertana Kaliyuga Sadhana
Lyrics:
Hari Guna Keertana Kaliyuga Sadhana
Jagadodharana Krishna Janardhana
Sai Murari He Madhusudhana
Mayura Mukutadhara Murali Mohana
Neela Varna Ghana Natajana Palana [ Jagadodharana Krishna ... ]
Meaning: The spiritual practice to observe in Kali Yuga(age) is to chant different names and attributes of Lord Krishna and Sai: Lord of the universe, enchanting flute-player wearing a peacock feather, the dark complexioned savior of the humble, slayer of the demon Mura-all epithets of Krishna.
Songglossary: ghana, guna, hari, jagadodhara, janardhana, kali, keertan, krishna, madhu, mayur, mohan, mukuta, murali, murare, natajana, neela, paalaya, sadhana, sai, varna

Title: Hari Guru Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
Lyrics:
Hari Guru Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
Shri Sathya Sai Sada Shiva Shankara
Amrutha Amrutha Daan Karey
Aap Haalaahala Ban Karey
Bhava Bhaya Jaladhi Taarana He
Jagadodhara Jaya Abhayankara [ Shri Sathya ... ]
Meaning: Lord Sai, our guru is the Hindu trinity of the creator, protector and destroyer, and the basis of the universe. Sai, in his Shiva form swallowed the poison to save humanity. O Sai! Kindly protect us, help us cross the ocean of life and bestow on us the nectar of eternal life.
Songglossary: aap, abhaya, amrutha, bhava, bhaya, brahma, daan, guru, haalaahala, hari, jagadodhara, jaladharam, jay, karo, maheshwara, sada, sai, sathya, shankara, shiva, sri, taarana, vishnu

Title: Hari Guru Natha Prabhu Guru
Lyrics:
Hari Guru Natha Prabhu Guru Natha Partheesha Natha Sri Sathya Sai Guru Natha
Talli Tandriyu Neevey Kadaa
Daari Chupe Guru Devudu Kadaa
Narayana Govinda Mukunda
Maaku Prapanchamu Neevey Kadaa
Nanda Sunanda Nanda Mukunda Brindavana Chanda Sri Sathya Sai Guru Natha
Meaning: Let us worship Sri Sathya Sai as our preceptor, the one who is both Mother and Father, the Divine Master who guides on our path of Spiritual progress. There is no other world for us except You Bhagawan the dear child of Nanda. You are verily Narayana, Govinda, Mukunda, the crown head of Brindavana who is none else than Sri Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: brinda, chand, chupe, daari, devudu, govinda, guru, hari, kadaa, maaku, mukunda, nanda, narayana, natha, neeve, partheeshwara, prabhu, prapanchamu, sai, sathya, sri, sunanda, talli, tandriyu

Title: Hari Hari Bhajo Mana Sai
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Bhajo Mana Sai Ram Bhajorey
Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Sai Krishna Bhajorey [ Hari Hari ... ]
Mukunda Madhava Vittala Bhajorey
Govinda Govinda Madhava Bhajorey
Meaning: Oh Mind! Sing the Glory of the Lord Sai Rama and Sai Krishna who is none else than the re-incarnation of Madhava, Mukunda, Govinda and Vittala.
Songglossary: bhajao, govinda, hari, krishna, madhava, mana, mukunda, ram, sai, vittala

Title: Hari Hari Bol Hey Manuva
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Bol Hey Manuva
Hari Bol Hari Bol
Hari Charan Ke Dhyaan Karo
Kamal Nayana Ke Smarana Karo [ Hari Bol ... ]
Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the Name of Lord Hari and Meditate on the feet of Lord Hari while visualizing His Lotus eyes.
Songglossary: bol, chara, dhyaan, hari, hey, kamala, karo, ke, manuva, nayan, smaran

Title: Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari Giridhara Bala Hari Hari Shyama Gopala
Madhava Hari Keshava Hari
Yadava Hari Nandalala ( Sai )
Meaning: Worship Lord Hari in the form of Govinda, the dark complexioned Krishna who lifted the Govardhana hill with His little finger, Madhava, Keshava, who incarnated in the Yadava lineage as the son of Nanda.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, kesha, madhava, nanda, sai, sham, yadava

Title: Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari Om
Parthi Pureesha Panduranga
Pandari Natha Hari Hari
Parama Dayala Pannaga Sai
Paramananda Hari Hari
Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari Om
Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Hari, Govinda, the One of Supreme Bliss and Compassion who dwells at Parthi and Pandharpur.
Songglossary: dayal, govinda, hari, natha, om, pandari, pandu, pannaga, param, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Hari Hari Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Govinda Narayana
Jaya Hari Bol Sri Hari Bol [ Hari Hari ... ]
Harey Rama Harey Krishna Prashanthi Raja Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bolo
Meaning: Sing the Glory of the Lord Hari who is also known by different names Govinda, Narayana, Rama, Krishna. Sing the praises of Sai Ram who is the Crown head of Prashanthi Nilayam.
Songglossary: bol, bolo, govinda, hari, jay, krishna, narayana, prashanthi, raja, ram, sai, sri

Title: Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Bolo
Hari Hari Ke Gun Gao
Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo
Govinda Ke Gun Gao
Sai Ram Bolo Sai Shyam Bolo
Sai Ram Gun Gao
Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo [ Govinda Ke ]
Meaning: Sing the Name and Divine attributes of Lord Hari, Govinda who has incarnated again as Sai Rama.
Songglossary: bolo, gao, govinda, guna, hari, ke, ram, sai, sham

Title: Hari Hari Hari Hari Smaran
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Hari Hari Smaran Karo
Hari Charana Kamal Dhyan Karo [ Hari Hari ... ]
Murali Madhava Seva Karo
Murahara Giridhari Bhajana Karo
Meaning: Let the Mind dwell incessantly on the Lotus Feet of Hari, let the hands indulge in the service of Madhava who holds Flute in His Hands, Let the mouth sing the Glory of the One who vanquished the demon Mura and lifted the Mountain with a finger.
Songglossary: bhaja, chara, dhyaan, giridhar, hari, kamala, karo, madhava, murahara, murali, seva, smaran

Title: Hari Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Narayana
Hari Govinda Narayana
Hari Gopala Narayana
Hari Hari Narayana
Hrishikesha Narayana
Partheesha Narayana
Meaning: Worship Lord Narayana who is none else than Hari, Govinda, Gopala, the master of senses and who has incarnated in Parthi.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, hrishikesha, narayana, partheeshwara

Title: Hari Hari Om Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Om Shiva Shankara Om
Narayana Hari Om (2)
Keshava Hey Shiva Madhava Hey
Narayana Hari Om (2)
Paramatma Antaryami
Narayana Hari Om (3)
Meaning: Meditate on the primordial sound Om and chant the divine names Hari, Shiva, Shankara, Keshava, Madhava, who is the indweller, which is the Supreme Consciousness.
Songglossary: antar, hari, hey, kesha, madhava, narayana, om, param, shankara, shiva

Title: Hari Hari Om Sri Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Om Sri Hari Om
Govinda Giridhara Hari Hari Om
Mukunda Madhava Hari Hari Om
Natavara Naagara Sri Hari Om
Karuna Sagara Sri ( Sai ) Hari Om
Meaning: Sing in praises of the Lord Hari, Govinda, Mukunda, Madhava, Giridhara, the Supreme actor, the Ocean of Compassion and the Originator of the Primordial sound Om.
Songglossary: giridhar, govinda, hari, karuna, madhava, mukunda, naagar, natavara, om, sagar, sai, sri

Title: Hari Hari Sri Narayana Jai
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Sri Narayana Jai Sai Ram
Allah Ho Akbar Rahim Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Hallelujah Yesu Prabhu Jai Sai Ram
Sharanam Sharanam Buddha Jai Sai Ram
Zohrashtra Mahavir Jai Sai Ram
Satsri Akal Vahey Guru Jai Sai Ram
Sarva Devatha Athitha Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Sai Ram (3)
Meaning: Victory be to Sairam and praises be to Him who is the embodiment of all faiths Narayana, Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahavir, Zohrashtra and Guru Nanak.
Songglossary: akal, akbar, allah, athitha, buddha, devatha, guru, hallelujah, hari, ho, jai, mahavir, narayana, prabhu, rahim, ram, sai, sarva, satsri, sharan, sri, vahey, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Hari Hari Sumiran Hari Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Hari Sumiran Hari Hari Bhajo Mana
Hari Hi Tero Tan Man Aur Dhan [ Hari Hari ... ]
Tulsidas Bhajey Ramam Ramam
Meera Dasi Bhajey Govindam
Hari Bin Jeevana Kaisa Jeevan
Hari Charanan Mey Arpan Kar Man
Meaning: Meditate upon the name of Hari, who is your body, mind and wealth. His devotees Tulasidas sang Rama's name and Meera sang Govinda's name (Krishna). This life without Hari is not worth Oh Mind, surrender at the feet of Hari.
Songglossary: arpan, aur, bhaja, bin, chara, dasa, dhan, govinda, hai, hari, jeeva, kaisa, karo, mana, meera, ram, sumira, tan, tera, tulsidas

Title: Hari Naam Gaate Chalo Sai
Lyrics:
Hari Naam Gaate Chalo Sai Naam Gaate Chalo
Madhava Govinda Govinda Madhava Naam Gaate Chalo [ Hari Naam ... ]
Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala
Jaya Parthi Vittala Jaya Sai Vittala (2) [ Madhava Govinda ... ]
Meaning: Let every moment be spent in ruminating over the Lord's name Hari, Madhava, Govinda, Gopala, Vittala and Sai who dwells in Parthi.
GeneralComments: This bhajan can be sung in the 6 beat cycle (Dadra) or in the 8 beat cycle (Keherwa).
Songglossary: chalo, gaate, gopal, govinda, hari, jay, madhava, naam, puttaparthi, sai, vittala

Title: Hari Nam Sumira Hari Nam
Lyrics:
Hari Nam Sumira Hari Nam Sumira Hari Nama Sumira Bhajore
Tribhuvana Palaka Sab Sukha Dayaka
Vinati Sahayaka Nam Japore
Hari Nam Japore
Meaning: Remember the name and glory of Hari, who is the protector of the Universe and the grantor of goodness and happiness. Chant the name of the Lord who protects and helps the devotees who surrender to Him.
Songglossary: bhajao, dayaka, hari, japo, naam, nam, palaka, sab, sahayaka, sukh, sumira, tribhuvan, vinati

Title: Hari Narayana Govinda (2)
Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Govinda (2)
Hari Narayana Duritha Nivarana
Sai Narayana Govinda
Keshava Madhava Govinda
Govinda Govinda
Govinda Hari Govinda
Meaning: Contemplate on the sweet names of the Lord, Govinda, Keshava, Madhava, Narayana the One who dispels the negative consequences of our deeds.
Songglossary: duritha, govinda, hari, kesha, madhava, narayana, nivarana, sai

Title: Hari Narayana Govinda Jaya Narayana
Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Govinda Jaya Narayana Govinda
Hari Narayana Jaya Narayana
Jaya Govinda Govinda
Meaning: Chant continuously the names of Narayana, Govinda and Hari. Let victory be to them.
Songglossary: govinda, hari, jay, narayana

Title: Hari Narayana Govinda Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Govinda Sai Narayana Govinda
Murali Madhava Govinda
Govardhanadhara Govinda
Meaning: Blissfully contemplate on the names of the Lord Narayana the indweller in Man, Govinda the cowherd boy, the master of senses, Murali the one who holds flute and the one who held aloft the Govardhana mountain.
Songglossary: govardhan, govinda, hari, madhava, murali, narayana, sai

Title: Hari Narayana Hari Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Hari Hari
Sai Narayana Hari Hari
Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana [ Sai Narayana ]
Hey Keshava Hey Madhava
Govinda Rama Hari Hari
Hey Keshava Hey Madhava [ Govinda Rama ... ]
Meaning: Offer Salutations to the Lord Narayana who is otherwise known as Keshava, Govinda, Hari, Rama and Madhava.
Songglossary: bhaja, govinda, hari, hey, kesha, madhava, narayana, ram, sai

Title: Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Narayana (Om) (2)
Achyutha Keshava Madhava Govinda Hari Narayana Narayana (Om)
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Narayana (Om)
Meaning: Praises be to the Lord Narayana whose other names are Achyutha, Keshava, Madhava and Govinda. The originator of the primordial sound Om.
Songglossary: achyutha, govinda, hari, kesha, madhava, narayana, om

Title: Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajorey (2)
Shyama Sundara Madana Gopala
Satchidananda Sai Gopala
Gopalana Gopi Gopalana Gopi Gopalana Bhajorey
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajorey
Hari Narayana Bhajorey (4)
Meaning: Oh Mind! Sing the Glory of Lord Narayana also known as Hari. Who has descended on Earth as the dark complexioned and enchanting Gopala. He is the very embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss and the One who protects the cows and the Gopis.
Songglossary: bhajao, gopal, gopi, hari, madana, narayana, sai, satchidananda, sham, sundara

Title: Hari Narayana Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Sai Narayana
Naam Bina Sukha Shanthi Nahin
Naman Karo Hari Naam Hari Naam
Smarana Karo Sai Naam Sai Naam
Narayana Hari Narayana
Meaning: Understand Oh Mind! There is no peace and security bereft of the Lord's name Hari and Narayana. Bow down in reverence to the Name Hari. Keep chanting the name of Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bina, hari, karo, naam, nahin, naman, narayana, sai, shanthi, smaran, sukh

Title: Hari Narayana Srinivasa
Lyrics:
Hari Narayana Srinivasa
Jaya Govinda Sri Venkatesha
Padma Lakshmi Hrudaya Nivasa [ Hari Narayana ... ]
Dharani Nayaka Paapa Vinasha
Mangala Dayaka Manusha Vesha
Maha Teertha Sri Tirumalai Vasa
Balaji Sai Parthi Nivasa
Meaning: The bestower of Auspiciousness, the Lord of the Earth, destroyer of Sins has come down in human form as Lord Srinivasa at the Holy place Tirumala and who has Mother Lakshmi in His Heart. Lord Srinivasa is also known as Govinda, Venkatesha and Balaji has now incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai.
Songglossary: balaji, dayaka, dhara, govinda, hari, hrudaya, jay, lakshmi, maha, mangal, manusha, narayana, nayaka, nivasa, paapa, padma, puttaparthi, sai, sri, srinivasa, teertha, tirumala, vasa, venkatesha, vesha, vinasha

Title: Hari Om Ananda Narayana
Lyrics:
Hari Om Ananda Narayana
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana [ Hari Om ]
Triloka Palana Narayana
Parthi Nivasa Narayana
Meaning: Glory be to Lord Narayana, sustainer of the three worlds, embodiment of Bliss and the originator of the Primordial sound Om who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: anand, hari, narayana, nivasa, om, paalaya, puttaparthi, sai, triloka

Title: Hari Om Hari Om Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Narayana (2)
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana Padmanabha Narayana
Lakshmi Ramana Kamala Nayana Sai Natha Narayana
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Narayana
Meaning: Glory to the Lord Narayana. The one who is resting on the Serpent and the one who is the personification of serenity. He is also the one who is the beloved of Goddess of wealth (Lakshmi) and he is the Lotus eyed Sai Natha of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhuja, hari, kamala, lakshmi, narayana, natha, nayan, om, padma, ramana, sai, shantha, shayana

Title: Hari Om Hari Om Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Sai Om Sai Om Namah Shivaya
Dama Dama Damaru Mahadev Ka
Vandana Iski Kartey Hai Sab Devatha
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya
Meaning: Chant the divine mantra of Shiva " Namah Shivaya". All the Gods Pay their Obeisance to Lord Mahadev who holds the Damaru in his Hands.
Songglossary: dama, damaru, devatha, hai, hari, iski, ka, karo, mahadev, namah, om, sab, sai, shiva, vandana

Title: Hari Om Namah Shivaya
Lyrics:
Hari Om Namah Shivaya
Shiva Shiva Shankara Hara Parameshwara Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om (2)
Meaning: Chant the mantra "Hari Om Namah Shivaya". Let us offer our obeisance to Lord Shiva who bestows auspiciousness, is the Lord of the Lords, presently incarnated as Sayeeshwara.
Songglossary: hara, hari, namah, om, param, sayee, shankara, shiva

Title: Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Lyrics:
Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Meaning: Chant the Powerful mantra "Hari Om Namah Shivaya". Lord Shiva is the embodiment of auspiciousness and the origin of the primordial sound Om.
Songglossary: hari, namah, om, shiva

Title: Hari Om Namo Shiva Shakthi
Lyrics:
Hari Om Namo Shiva Shakthi Namo
Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Namo
Hari Om Namo Sita Rama Namo
Jaya Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Namo
Hari Om Namo Radhey Shyam Namo
Jaya Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Namo
Meaning: Let us offer our salutations to our sacred preceptor Sathya Sai who is none other than the incarnation of Shiva and Energy Principle Shakthi, Sita Rama as well as Radhey Shyam.
Songglossary: hari, jay, namo, om, radha, ram, sadguru, sai, sathya, shakthi, sham, shiva, sita, sri

Title: Hari Om Narayana Sathya Narayana
Lyrics:
Hari Om Narayana Sathya Narayana
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
Meaning: Let us Sing the Glory of Narayana the embodiment of Truth and chant the Mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya' the origin of the Primordial sound Om.
Songglossary: hari, namah, narayana, om, sathya, shiva

Title: Hari Om Tat Sat Hari
Lyrics:
Hari Om Tat Sat Hari Om Tat Sat Hari Om Tat Sat Hari Om
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jaya Radha Krishna
Govinda Govinda Bhajo Radhey Govinda Gopala Gopala Bhajo Krishna Mukunda
Om Hari Om Hari Om Sai Om
Meaning: Understand Oh Mind! The Primordial Sound Om is that Effulgent pure Consciousness. Chant the names of Krishna, Govinda who are also embodiments of that Supreme Consciousness.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, govinda, hari, jay, krishna, mukunda, om, radha, sai, sat, tat

Title: Hari Om Tat Sath Namah
Lyrics:
Hari Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya [ Hari Om ]
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Hari Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Hari Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Meaning: Understand Oh Mind! The Mantra 'Namah Shivaya' is the Embodiment of that Supreme Effulgent Consciousness. Shiva Himself is the Embodiment of that Supreme Effulgent Consciousness.
Songglossary: hari, namah, om, sai, sat, shiva, tat

Title: Have faith, that’s all that matters
Lyrics:
Have faith, that's all that matters
 Have faith, that's all you need
 With faith, illusion shatters
 Cultivate faith like a precious seed
 Where there is faith, then there is love
 Where there is love, there will be peace
 When there is peace, there will be truth
 When there is truth, there will be bliss
 When there is bliss, there will be God

Title: He Akhilandeshwari Ma
Lyrics:
He Akhilandeshwari Ma
Anatha Rakshaki Ma
Chamundeshwari Karuna Sagari
Palaya Mam Dehi
He Tribhuvana Palini Ma
He Trishoola Dharini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jagadishwari Sai Ma
Parthishwari Sai Ma
Meaning: Glory to Mother of the Universe, the ocean of mercy, and the savior of the unfortunate. She holds a trident and protects and preserves all the three worlds. Glory to Mother Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: akhila, anath, chamundeshwari, dehi, dhari, jagadeeshwari, jay, karuna, ma, mam, paalaya, palini, parteeshwari, raksha, sagar, sai, tribhuvan, trishoola

Title: He comes with the sun in the voice
Lyrics:
He comes with the sun in the voice, singing the light, singing the light
 Sri Bhagavaan Sathya Sai Baba Jai
 In the heart of wind He comes, singing the love, singing the love
 He comes with the sun in the voice, singing the light, singing the light

Title: He Is Lord
Lyrics:
I Got Something To Tell You
You Might Not Want To Know
But Jesus Christ Is Lord Of All
And This I'll Tell You So
He Is Lord (4x)

Got Something Else To Tell You
You Really Ought To Know
So Is Allah And Krishna Too
Sai Baba Is My Lord
He Is Lord (4x)

Choose Any Name And Any Form
He Answers To Them All
Cuz God Is Love And Love Is God
He Wants To Hear You Call
So Find The Peace And Love Inside
Indeed Its Who You Are
See The Good That's All Around
Its Really Not That Far

Got Another Thing To Tell You
Its Gonna Make You Glow
He Lives Right Down Inside Your Heart
... He's Never Gonna Go (2x)
He Is Lord (4x)

Choose Any Name And Any Form
He Answers To Them All
Cuz God Is Love And Love Is God
He Wants To Hear You Call
So Find The Peace And Love Inside
Indeed Its Who You Are
See The Good That's All Around
Its Really Not That Far
Cuz He Is Love (4x)

Got One More Thing To Tell You
You Might Not Think Its So
But He Lives Through Each One Of Us
We're Really One In All
He Is Lord (4x)
GeneralComments: Written in the 1970s but revised before recording in 2016.

Title: He Is Love, So Learn To Love
Lyrics:
He Is Love, So Learn To Love
He Is Truth, So Be True
He Is Peace, So Work For Peace
He Is Good, So Be Good
He Is Lord, His Name Is Sai
Sai Ram, Sai Ram (2)
Sai Ram Say Sai Ram
Songglossary: ram, sai

Title: He is the Lord of the Universe
Lyrics:
He is the Lord of the Universe, He is the Lord of the Self
 Open your eyes and realize the Lord is residing within you
 Dive deeper and deeper inside, fill your heart with His love's pure light
 Master your senses, give up pretenses
 Know that forever the Lord and you are one

Title: He Ma Sai Ma Sai
Lyrics:
He Ma Sai Ma Sai Ma
Vighna Vinashini Ma Mangala Karini Ma
Jagadodharini Ma Sai Ma
Parthipurishwari Ma Sai Ma
Meaning: Mother Sai of Parthi removes obstacles, grants good fortune and protects the entire Universe.
Songglossary: jagadodhara, kaarini, ma, mangal, parteeshwari, sai, vighna, vinashana

Title: He Nandalala He Brija Bala
Lyrics:
He Nandalala He Brija Bala
Makhana Chora Yashoda Ke Bala
Brindavan Ke Gokula Bala
Daya Karo He Sai Nandalala [ Makhana Chora ... ]
Meaning: O Lord Krishna (Son of Nanda) have mercy on us. The stealer of butter (our hearts) and son of Yashoda roams playfully in Brindavan.
Songglossary: bala, brija, brinda, chora, daya, gokul, karo, ke, makhan, nanda, sai, yashoda

Title: He Nataraja Shivaraja
Lyrics:
He Nataraja Shivaraja
Nata Shiva Sundara Nataraja
Ambuja Lochana Nataraja
Ananda Tandava Shivaraja
Shakti Mahesha Nataraja (Shiva)
Sai Manohara Shivaraja ( Sai )
Meaning: Lord Shiva, the divine dancer with lotus-shaped eyes who blissfully dances the cosmic dance is Lord of Shakti (Parvathi) and the captivating Lord Sai.
Songglossary: ambuja, anand, lochana, mahesha, manohar, nata, nataraj, sai, shakthi, shiva, sundara, tandava

Title: He Natavaralala Nandalala
Lyrics:
He Natavaralala Nandalala
Radha Ramana Hari Gopala [ He Natavaralala ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Goparipala Gopala Bala
Meaning: Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha and the Lord of Meera is the Son of Nanda. He is the divine dancer who protects the cows (a cowheard)
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gopal, goparipala, hari, ke, meera, nanda, natavara, prabhu, radha, ramana

Title: He Parthipuri Bhagawan Bhagawan
Lyrics:
He Parthipuri Bhagawan Bhagawan
Daya Karo Bhagawan
He Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Sathya Sai Bhagawan
He Deena Janon Ke Pran Bhagawan [ Daya Karo ... Sai Bhagawan ]
He Patitha Pavana Ram Bhagawan [ Daya Karo ... Sai Bhagawan ]
Meaning: Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi and Prasanthi Nilayam, is the Supreme Guru. He is the friend of the afflicted and forsaken ones. He is Lord or Lords and destroys sins. Glory to the Supreme Guru.
Songglossary: bhagawan, daya, deen, jana, karo, ke, krupa, patitha, pavan, pran, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sathya

Title: He Raghu Nandana Dasharatha Nandana
Lyrics:
He Raghu Nandana Dasharatha Nandana
Sita Pathey Ramachandra Parti Pathey Ramachandra
Parama Pavitra Varija Netra [ Sita Pathey ... ]
Bhaktoddhara Sabari Raghuraya
Raghu Kula Bhushana Rajeeva Lochana [ Sita Pathey ... ]
Meaning: Lord Ram of the Raghu dynasty is the beloved of Sita and is Lord Sai of Parthi. He is ever pure, has lotus shaped eyes and protects His devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktoddhara, bhushan, dasha, kula, lochana, nanda, nethra, param, pathey, pavitra, puttaparthi, raghu, rajeeva, ramachandra, sabari, sita, varija

Title: He Shiva Shankara Natana Manohara
Lyrics:
He Shiva Shankara Natana Manohara
Tandava Roopa He Parameshwara [ He Shiva ... ]
Shakti Swaroopa He Nandeeshwara
Gangadhara Triya Netra Maheshwara
Meaning: Lord Shiva, is the Lord of all who does the beautiful dance, holds the river Ganges and has three eyes(the third one, the eye of wisdom). He is the Lord of Nandi (has conveyance) and personification of divine power.
Songglossary: ganga, maheshwara, manohar, nandeeshwara, natana, nethra, param, roopa, shakthi, shankara, shiva, swaroopa, tandava, tri

Title: He Who has sent Me will come again
Lyrics:
He Who has sent Me will come again
 Sai Jesus Christ before He left the world stage, Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth
 You're here to usher in the Golden Age
 Living always in unchangeable Bliss
 You graciously personify the ultimate Sage, Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth
 You're here to usher in the Golden Age
 You have come to destroy all the evil and foster all the good
 O, we prayed, and we knew You would
 There may be some who doubt a time will come
 When Peace and Love and Righteousness will reign across the land
 But we believe Your promise to the world
 That to bring about this Age of Peace is truly what You've planned
 You are teaching us the sacred art
 Of lighting lamps of Love within the heart
 Illumminating all we see
 Every one of us can do our part
 We want to serve You in Your Task
 Of helping all to realize our godly heritage
 Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth
 Our sweet and loving divine Personage
 You are the Embodiment of Righteousness
 Our Conscience for the actions in which we engage
 Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth
 You're here to usher in the Golden Age
 Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth You're here to usher in the Golden Age

Title: He’s A River Of Light
Lyrics:
He's A River Of Light, He's An Ocean Of Love
Sail On Down The Stream Into His Heart [ He's A ... ]
Sail On Down Into His Heart On A River Of Light That Fills The Dark
See The Light And Be The Light
Sail On Down Out Of The Night
See The Light And Be The Light
Were Golden Hearts All Shining Bright

Title: He’s Got The Whole World
Lyrics:
He's Got The Whole World In His Hands (4)
He's Got You And Me Sister In His Hands (3) [ He's Got The ... ]
He's Got You And Me Brother In His Hands (3) [ He's Got The ... ]
He's Got Everybody In His Hands (3) [ He's Got The ... ]
His Name Is Sathya Sai Baba, He Is God (3) [ He's Got The ... ]
Songglossary: baba, sai, sathya

Title: Hear Me Lord Ganesha
Lyrics:
Hear Me, Lord Ganesha, Grant Me Your Protection
See Me, Lord Ganesha, Grant Me Your Protection
Know Me, Lord Ganesha, Grant Me Your Protection
Love Me, Lord Ganesha, Grant Me Your Protection
Songglossary: ganesha

Title: Heart and soul of the infinite
Lyrics:
Heart and soul of the infinite, fully alive,
He is far beyond the mind, close as we breathe.
The embodiment of Love, the light of life,
Hes the only one who is, I  Am  He.
Men:
He is Love, He is evrything,
all energy and sound,
He is guide, inspiration,
the best friend around.
Women:
He is Truth, He is beauty,
the good in evry heart,
When theres joy, bliss, compassion,
Love never will part.
Chorus:
Heart and soul of the infinite, fully alive,
He is far beyond the mind, close as we breathe.
The embodiment of Love, the light of life,
Hes the only one who is, I  Am  He.
Men:
We take refuge and comfort
when we remember Him,
Hes our Mother, our Father,
our nearest of kin.
Women:
Omnipresent, omnipotent,
the master Guru,
Hes our laughter, our sustenance,
our silence
Chorus:
Heart and soul of the infinite, fully alive,
He is far beyond the mind, close as we breathe.
The embodiment of Love, the light of life

Title: Hey Anatha Nath Sai Tum
Lyrics:
Hey Anatha Nath Sai Tum Ho Antaryami
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan
Deena Dukha Bhanjana Sahara Do Mujhey
O Merey Sai Bhagawan
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Sai Merey
Deejo Krupa Vardaan [ Tum Ho ]
Meaning: Oh Sai! You are verily my Lord, for You are the Indweller and Champion of distraught and helpless. Oh Lord! Take up my cause for You are the one who destroys the sorrows of the forlorn. Enter the temple of my heart and shower Your blessings.
Songglossary: aao, anath, antarayami, bhagawan, bhanjana, deejo, deen, do, dukha, hey, ho, hrudaya, krupa, mandir, mera, mey, mujhe, natha, sahara, sai, tum, vardaan

Title: Hey Anjaneya Hey Rama Bhaktha
Lyrics:
Hey Anjaneya Hey Rama Bhaktha He Rama Doota Namo Namo
Sita Mata Shoka Vinasha Ati Balavanta Namo Namo
Maruti Roopa Mahanubhava Anjani Putra Namo Namo
Meaning: Pay obeisance to Lord Hanuman, the son of Anjana, the mighty and great devotee of Lord Rama. Serving as His messenger, Hanuman, removed Mother Sita's sadness.
GeneralComments: Alternative version: Hey Rama Dootha
Songglossary: anjani, ati, balavanta, bhaktha, doota, hanuman, hey, mahanubhava, maruthi, mata, namo, putra, ram, roopa, shoka, sita, vinasha

Title: Hey Bhagawan Hey Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Hey Bhagawan Hey Bhagawan
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Deena Natha Anatha Ke Natha [ Hey Bhagawan ]
Janana Marana Bhava Shoka Vidhura
Niraadhaar Ke Aadhaar
Deena Dayala Parama Krupala [ Daya Karo ]
Meaning: Salutations to Bhagawan, the Lord of Puttaparthi. Have compassion on this devotee. You, who can deliver us from the fear of life and death. The all compassionate Lord who has come as a saviour of the less privileged and deprived. I bow down to you.
Songglossary: aadhaar, anath, bhagawan, bhava, daya, dayal, deen, hey, janam, karo, ke, krupalu, maran, natha, niraadhaar, param, shoka, vidhura

Title: Hey Brahma Hey Vishnu
Lyrics:
Hey Brahma Hey Vishnu
Dayamaya Hey Maheshwara
Sathya Sai Parameshwara [ Hey Brahma ... ]
Maha Shakthi Shiva Sai Shankara
Poorna Teja Sai Avatara
Meaning: Glory to Sathya Sai who is Creator, Sustainer and Destroyer and the Supreme Sovereign Lord and Compassion Personified. Sathya Sai is the Total Incarnation of that Supreme Energy.
Songglossary: avatar, brahma, dayamayi, hey, maha, maheshwara, param, poorna, sai, sathya, shakthi, shankara, shiva, teja, vishnu

Title: Hey Brij Bal Yadu Nanda
Lyrics:
Hey Brij Bal Yadu Nanda Gopal
Shyama Sundara Mohana Gopal [ He Brij ... ]
Yashoda Ke Bal Yadu Nanda Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gokula Bal
Meaning: The boy from Brij(Krishna) was the son of Nanda of the Yadava clan. This beautiful dark-complexioned charming boy was the son of Yashoda.
Songglossary: bala, brija, gokul, gopal, hey, ke, mohan, nanda, sham, sundara, yadu, yashoda

Title: Hey Chinmayi Sai Janani
Lyrics:
Hey Chinmayi Sai Janani
Mata Jaganmayi Sai Janani
Shabdha Brahmamayi Sai Janani
Parathparamayi Sai Janani
Shiva Shakthimayi Sai Janani
Nithyanandamayi Sai Janani
Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You are that Pure Consciousness, Mother of the Entire Universe and the originator of the Primordial sound by, which this Universe has come into being. Oh Mother! You are superior even to the best, the embodiment of Matter and Energy principle and the Ever Blissful.
Songglossary: brahma, chinmayi, hey, jagan, janani, mata, nithya, parathpara, sai, shabdha, shakthi, shiva

Title: Hey Chitha Chora Parthi Nivasa
Lyrics:
Hey Chitha Chora Parthi Nivasa
Indu Vadana Sri Sayeesha
Gopi Vallabha Gokula Nandana
Govardhanadhara Gopala ( Sai )
Meaning: Our Salutations to Sayeesha, the stealer of our Hearts, who has the countenance of the cool Moon. He is the same Lord Gopala who had earlier incarnated at Gokula as the Lord of the Gopis and the one who held aloft the Govardhana mountain.
Songglossary: chitha, chora, gokul, gopal, gopi, govardhan, hey, indu, nanda, nivasa, puttaparthi, sai, sayee, sri, vadana, vallabha

Title: Hey Deena Bandhu Anatha Natha
Lyrics:
Hey Deena Bandhu Anatha Natha
Hey Guru Natha Sai Natha
Parthi Pureesha Hey Paramatma
Pathitha Janavana Sai Natha
Meaning: Our Lord Sai is that Supreme Consciousness, the uplifter of the downtrodden and refuge of the forlorn. Lord Sai is also our mentor and the source of succor to the orphaned.
Songglossary: anath, bandhava, deen, guru, hey, janavana, natha, param, pathi, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Hey Deena Bandhu Deena Natha
Lyrics:
Hey Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Sai Avatara
Prem Ke Sindho Karuna Sindhu Sai Avatara
Sarva Dharma Ke Ek Swaroopa Sai Avatara
Bhajorey Sai Avatara
Meaning: Let us sing the Glory of Sai the Incarnation of the Modern Era who is the friend and Emancipator of the forlorn. Sai is the Single Godhead of all the different Faiths and the Ocean of Supreme Love and compassion.
Songglossary: avatar, bandhava, bhajao, deen, dharma, ek, hey, karuna, ke, natha, prem, sai, sarva, sindhu, swaroopa

Title: Hey Deena Dayalu Ghana Sai
Lyrics:
Hey Deena Dayalu Ghana Sai Ghana Shyam
Karuna Sindhu Karo Kalyan
Tum Ho Baba Antaryami
Tum Ho Sab Ke Jeevan Swami
Prem Baras Deejo Sai Ghana Shyam [ Karuna Sindho ]
Meaning: Shower your Love on us, Oh the dark complexioned Lord of the forlorn. Oh Sai, You are the indweller, the Ocean of Compassion and the lifeline of everyone.
Songglossary: antar, baba, baraso, dayal, deejo, deen, ghana, hey, ho, jeeva, kalyan, karo, karuna, ke, prem, sab, sai, sham, sindhu, swami, tum

Title: Hey Deena Dayalu Harey Harey
Lyrics:
Hey Deena Dayalu Harey Harey Sai Ram Harey Harey
Sai Ram Ghana Shyam Sai Ram
Hey Bandha Vimochana Rama Harey
Hey Paapa Samharaka Sai Harey
Sai Ram Harey Harey [ Sai Ram Ghana Shyam ]
Meaning: Glory be to the Lord Sai Rama who has a soft corner to the deprived ones, the One who relieves us of Bondages of the World, the annihilator of Sins.
Songglossary: bandha, dayal, deen, ghana, hari, hey, paapa, ram, sai, samhara, sham, vimochana

Title: Hey Deena Dayalu Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Hey Deena Dayalu Sai Rama Ram
Parama Krupalu Sai Rama Ram
Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram (2)
Hey Patitha Pavana Sai Rama Ram
Bhaktha Vatsala Sai Rama Ram [ Sai Rama (2) ]
Meaning: Repeat the name of Sai Rama the redeemer of the forlorn, the ever compassionate, the uplifter of the oppressed and the one who is ever endearing to His devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktha, dayal, deen, hey, krupa, param, patitha, pavan, ram, sai, vatsala

Title: Hey Eshwari
Lyrics:
Hey Eshwari
Sai Mata Eshwari
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sayeeshwari [ Hey Eshwari ]
Shankari Sambhavi Sada Shivey
Katyayani Kamalambikey
Pankaja Lochani Bhava Bhaya Nashini
Mohana Roopini Moksha Pradayini
Meaning: Oh Mother You are the consort of Eshwara, the lotus eyed and is loved by all. She is also known as Shankari Sambhavi, Sadashivey, Katyayani and Kamalambikey and has a very Pleasing form, destroys the cycle of births and the bestows Liberation.
Songglossary: bhaktha, bhava, bhaya, dayini, eshwar, hey, jana, kamala, katyayani, lochana, mata, mohan, moksha, pankaja, priya, sada, sai, sambhavi, sayee, shankari, shiva, swaroopa, vinashana

Title: Hey Gananatha Gajanana
Lyrics:
Hey Gananatha Gajanana
Heyramba Gajanana [ Hey Gananatha ... ]
Gowri Nandana Gajanana Gajanana Hey Gajanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajanana
Meaning: The Lord of the Ganaas (Shiva's army), dear son of Gowri, also known as Heyramba is the one who bestows spiritual powers and without a leader above Him.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gananatha, gowri, hey, heyramba, nanda, siddhi, vinayaka

Title: Hey Ghana Shyama Venu Gopala
Lyrics:
Hey Ghana Shyama Venu Gopala
Nanda Nandana Nanda Gopa Bala [ Hey Ghana ... ]
Nayana Manohara Navamani Mala
Aao Sundara Shyama Gopala
Aao Sundara Sai Gopala
Meaning: Lord Gopala, the dark hued, enchanting flute-player is the beloved child of Nanda. He is beautiful, adorned with a garland of nine precious gems.  O beautiful Sai Gopal, please come.
Songglossary: aao, bala, ghana, gopa, gopal, hey, mala, manohar, nanda, navamani, nayan, sai, sham, sundara, venu

Title: Hey Giridhari Gopala
Lyrics:
Hey Giridhari Gopala
Keshava Madhava Gopala [ Hey Giridhari ]
Nanda Mukunda Gopala
Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Antaryami Gopala
Hrudaya Vihari Gopala
Aao Pyaarey Muraliwale Darshan Do Prabhu Gopala
Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) also known by names like, Giridhari, Keshava, Madhava, Mukunda, you are the in dweller of our hearts, Oh Loving Lord holding the Flute give me your vision Oh Lord Gopala.
Songglossary: aao, antar, chora, darsh, do, giridhar, gopal, hey, hrudaya, kesha, madhava, mukunda, murali, nanda, navaneetha, prabhu, pyaara, vihar

Title: Hey Giridhari Hey Nandalal
Lyrics:
Hey Giridhari Hey Nandalal
Yashoda Tanaya Hey Nandalal [ Hey Giridhari ... ]
Radha Pyaarey Hey Nandalal
Nandalal Nandalal
Meaning: Praises be to the son of Nanda and Yashoda, who is dear to Radha and the One who lifted the Mountain to save his tribesmen.
Songglossary: giridhar, hey, nanda, pyaara, radha, tanaya, yashoda

Title: Hey Girija Pathi Bhavani Shankara
Lyrics:
Hey Girija Pathi Bhavani Shankara
Shambho Mahadeva Shankara
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Dhari
Hey Jaga Vanditha Bhuvaneshwara
Shiva Shakti Roopa Saishwara
Meaning: Lord Shiva, the consorts of Mother Parvathi(Girija), has three eyes and carries a trident. He is worshipped in the whole universe as Lord Sai who is the personification of Lord Shiva and Goddess Shakti(Parvathi).
Songglossary: bhava, bhuvaneshwara, dhari, girija, hey, jagat, mahadev, pathi, roopa, saiyeeshwara, shakthi, shambho, shankara, shiva, trinetra, trishoola, vanditha

Title: Hey Govinda Hey Ananda Nanda
Lyrics:
Hey Govinda Hey Ananda Nanda Gopala
Mohana Muralidhara Shyama Gopala [ Hey Govinda ... ]
Mandara Giridhari Harey Natavara Lala
Madhava Keshava Madana Gopala
Meaning: Glory be to the Lord Gopala, son of Nanda, to the one of Bliss, having an Enchanting form. Glory be to the one who holds the Flute in His hands, absolute pretender, who lifted the Mandara mountain in order to save the Yadavas from the wrath of Rain God.
Songglossary: anand, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, hey, kesha, lal, madana, madhava, manda, mohan, murali, nanda, natavara, sham

Title: Hey Govinda Hey Gopala
Lyrics:
Hey Govinda Hey Gopala
Shyama Sundara Madana Mohana
Govardhana Giridhari
Shankha Chakra Gadadhari
Meera Prabhu Giridhari
Radhey Shyam Muralidhari
Meaning: Sing the attributes of Gopala, Govinda, the one with dark complexion, having an Enchanting form, who adorns the Conch, the Disc and the Mace. Praises be to the one who is dear to Meera and Radha and who holds the Flute in His hands.
Songglossary: chakra, gadadhari, giridhar, gopal, govardhan, govinda, hey, madana, meera, mohan, murali, prabhu, radha, sham, shankha, sundara

Title: Hey Govinda Hey Gopala Hey
Lyrics:
Hey Govinda Hey Gopala Hey Madhava Madhusudhana
Aao Aao Prabhu Aao Aao
Mujhey Aakar Darsha Dikhao [ Hey Govinda ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa
Aao Prabhu Aao Aao (Aao) [ Mujhey Aakar ]
Meaning: Come Oh dear Lord Gopala, Govinda and grace us with the vision of your beautiful form. You are the very embodiment of Human values and the destroyer of the demon Madhu.
Songglossary: aakar, aao, darsh, dharma, dikhao, gopal, govinda, hey, madhava, madhu, mujhe, prabhu, prem, sathya, shanthi, swaroopa

Title: Hey Gowri Natha Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Hey Gowri Natha Shiva Shankara
Hara Bham Bham Hara Bham Bham He Digambara [ He Gowri ... ]
Dam Dama Dam Dam Dama Dam Damarudhara
Bhola Bhandari Parameshwara [ Hara Bham ... ]
Meaning: Worship the auspicious and all-pervading Lord Shiva, the beloved of Parvathi. He is full of grace, dancing to the rhythms of the drum. (Sound of Creation).
Songglossary: bham, bhandari, bhola, dam, dama, damaru, digambara, gowri, hara, hey, natha, param, shankara, shiva

Title: Hey Indushekara Raja Shiva Raja
Lyrics:
Hey Indushekara Raja Shiva Raja Shankara
Hey Indushekara Shambho Shiva Raja Shankara
Om Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Pinaka Vaibhava Raja Shankara
Shiva Raja Shankara
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Sovereign Lord Shankara who adorns the crescent moon on His head, the one of benevolence and who holds the Bow (Pinaka) in His hands.
Songglossary: hara, hey, indushekara, om, pinaka, raja, shambho, shankara, shiva, vaibhava

Title: Hey Kamala Vadana Sai Ranga
Lyrics:
Hey Kamala Vadana Sai Ranga
Kaivalya Panduranga (2)
Sai Gopala Ghana Ghana Neela
Kutila Kuntala Tribhuvana Pala
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Roopa (2)
Maheshwara Roopa [ Brahma Vishnu ... ]
Maya Lola Brahma Swaroopa
Meaning: Hail the Lotus faced Lord Ranga who is the Absolute reality. Sing in praise of Lord Gopala of the complexion of thick dark clouds, of curly hair and the sustainer of the three worlds. He is verily the Embodiment of the Trinity and who uses Illusion as His instrument to destroy the sinner.
Songglossary: brahma, ghana, gopal, hey, kaivalya, kamala, kuntala, kutila, lola, maheshwara, maya, neela, pala, pandu, ranga, roopa, sai, swaroopa, tribhuvan, vadana, vishnu

Title: Hey Krishna Hey Krishna
Lyrics:
Hey Krishna Hey Krishna
Vittala Jaya Panduranga Panduranga
Nanda Kishora Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Madana Gopala (2)
Vittala Jaya Panduranga Panduranga
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga (3) [Vittala Jaya ...]
Meaning: Chant the names of Panduranga, Vittala, and of the dark complexioned, enchanting Gopala who is the son of Nanda.
Songglossary: gopal, hey, jay, kishora, krishna, madana, nanda, panduranga, sham, vittala

Title: Hey Krishna Madhava Govinda Gopala
Lyrics:
Hey Krishna Madhava Govinda Gopala
Mathura Natha Madana Gopala
Nanda Mukunda Shyama ( Sai ) Gopala
Krishna Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Jaya Hari Govinda Krishna Harey (2)
Meaning: Chant the various names of Gopala, Govinda, Krishna, Madhava, the One who gives delight and the one who is the Lord of Mathura. Glory be to Him.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, hey, jay, krishna, madana, madhava, mathura, mukunda, nanda, natha, sai, sham

Title: Hey Ma Durga Bhavani Ma
Lyrics:
Hey Ma Durga Bhavani Ma
Hey Ma Durgati Nashini Ma
Jagadodharini Jaya Sai Ma
Jaya Parameshwari Sai Ma
Jaya Sai Ma Jaya Jaya Ma
Jaya Jaya Ma Jaya Sai Ma
Parthi Pureeshwari Sai Ma
Meaning: Victory be to Mother Durga who removes the distress of Her devotees, redeemer of the world, consort of Lord Parameshwara who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: bhava, durga, hey, jagadodhara, jay, ma, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, vinashana

Title: Hey Madhava Hey Madhusudhana
Lyrics:
Hey Madhava Hey Madhusudhana
Damodara Hey Muralidhara [ Hey Madhava ... ]
Mana Mohana Hey Yadu Nandana
Deenavana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Meaning: Glory be to the Lord Madhava, who vanquished demon Madhu and who holds the Flute in His hands. Lord Damodara removes the fear of repetitive births, has an Enchanting Form and the source of succor to the underprivileged.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, damodara, deenavana, hey, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, murali, nanda, yadu

Title: Hey Madhava Yadu Nandana
Lyrics:
Hey Madhava Yadu Nandana
Mana Mohana Hey Madhusudhana
Janardhana Radha Jeevana
Gopalana Gopi Ranjana
Meaning: Lord Krishna is the one who vanquished demon Madhu, who prompts the Mind of his devotees, is dear to Radha. He tends to the cows and is a source of delight to the Gopis.
Songglossary: gopal, gopi, hey, janardhana, jeeva, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, nanda, radha, ranjana, yadu

Title: Hey Nanda Kumara Gopala
Lyrics:
Hey Nanda Kumara Gopala
Brindavana Sanchara Gopala
Mana Mohana Murali Gopala
Mana Mohana Radhey Gopala
Meaning: Lord Gopala is a Mind charmer, who plays the Flute, consort of Radha, son of Nanda and the One who moved about Brindavana.
Songglossary: brinda, gopal, hey, kumara, mana, mohan, murali, nanda, radha, sanchara

Title: Hey Nanda Nanda Gopal Ananda
Lyrics:
Hey Nanda Nanda Gopal Ananda Nanda Gopal (2)
Hey Nanda Nanda Ananda Nanda Yadu Nanda Nanda Gopal
Meaning: The child Gopala is the One who gives delight to Nanda, belongs to the Yadava lineage and is ever blissful.
Songglossary: anand, gopal, hey, nanda, yadu

Title: Hey Nandalala Gopala
Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Gopala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopal [ Hey Nandalal ... ]
Giridhara Gopala Radhey Gopala [ Shyam Gopala ]
Meaning: Gopala is of dark complexion, dear son of Nanda and the consort of Radha, surprised everyone by holding the mountain with His little finger.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, hey, nanda, radha, sai, sham

Title: Hey Nandalala Hey Nandalala
Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Hey Nandalala
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala [ Hey Nandalala ... ]
Vishwa Vanditha Vijaya Gopala
Veda Vedantha Venu Gopala
Radha Vallabha Raasa Vilola
Meaning: Chant the name of the son of Nanda, consort of Radha, who played the celestial dance with the Gopis. Lord Gopala who holds the flute in His hand is worshipped by the entire Universe and the origin of Vedas and upanishads.
Songglossary: bala, gokul, gopal, gopi, hey, lola, nanda, raasa, radha, vallabha, vanditha, veda, vedantha, venu, vijaya, vilola, vishwa

Title: Hey Nandalala Hey Vraja Bala
Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Hey Vraja Bala
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Ke Bala
Brindavan Ke Gokula Bala
Daya Karo Hey Sai Nandalala [ Maakhan Chora. ]
Meaning: Oh! Son of Nanda and of Yashoda! Protect us! You are the One who stole butter from the houses of Gopis and moved about gardens of Brindavan.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, chora, daya, gokul, hey, karo, ke, maakhan, nanda, sai, vraja, yashoda

Title: Hey Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
Radha Ramana Hari Radhey Gopala [ Hey Nandalala ... ]
Natavara Giridhara Sai Gopala
Murali Manohara Hey Nandalala
Meaning: Victory be to You Oh son of Nanda and the consort of Radha, the One with the flute in His hands, the Supreme actor, who lifted the entire mountain with a finger.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, hari, hey, jai, manohar, murali, nanda, natavara, radha, ramana, sai

Title: Hey Nandalala Shyama Gopala
Lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Shyama Gopala
Murali Manohara Krishna Gopala
Krishna Gopala Karunakara
Hey Devaki Nandana Damodara
Sai Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala (3)
Meaning: Victory to the One who is the dear child of Devaki, of Nanda, Compassionate, the One of dark complexion and attractive with the flute in His hands and a rope around His waist.
Songglossary: damodara, devaki, gopal, hey, jai, karuna, krishna, manohar, murali, nanda, sai, sham

Title: Hey Nataraja Hey Nataraja
Lyrics:
Hey Nataraja Hey Nataraja
Nata Shiva Shankara Nataraja
Ambuja Lochana Nataraja
Ananda Tandava Shiva Raja
Shakthi Mahesha Nataraja
Sai Manohara Shiva Raja
Meaning: Hail the Lord of Dance, Lotus eyed, Lord of Mother Shakthi, who performs the celestial dance who has now come down as Lord Sai.
Songglossary: ambuja, anand, hey, lochana, mahesha, manohar, nata, nataraj, raja, sai, shakthi, shankara, shiva, tandava

Title: Hey Nirakari Allah Hey Avatari
Lyrics:
Hey Nirakari Allah Hey Avatari Prabhu Ram
Janam Janam Merey Saath Raho Tum Sathya Sai Bhagawan [ Hey Nirakari ]
Tum Hi Hamarey Mata Pitha Sai
Tum Hi Hamarey Pran (Ram) [ Janam Janam ]
Nanak Yesu Buddha Mahavir
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan [ Janam Janam ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! Be my master through many lives. You are verily our Mother, Father and our very Life itself. Lord Sai is the Formless Allah, Nanak, Yesu, Buddha, Mahavir and every other form of Divine Personages.
Songglossary: allah, avatar, bhagawan, buddha, hai, hamarey, hey, janam, mahavir, mata, mera, nanak, nirakara, pitha, prabhu, pran, raho, ram, saath, sab, sai, sathya, tum, yesu

Title: Hey Parameshwara Deena Dayalu Daya
Lyrics: Hey Parameshwara Deena Dayalu Daya Sindhu Sayeesha Krupalu (3)
Meaning: Lord Parameshwara is the refuge of the downtrodden and the Ocean of Mercy who has come down as Lord Sayeesha.
Songglossary: daya, dayal, deen, hey, krupa, param, sayee, sindhu

Title: Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara
Lyrics:
Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara
Karuna Sagara Shankara
Daya Karo Sai Shankara (3)
Meaning: Parameshwara is the Lord of Lords, the ocean of Compassion and the Lord of Parthi. Show mercy on us, Oh the bestower of Auspiciousness.
Songglossary: daya, hey, karo, karuna, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, sagar, sai, shankara

Title: Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa
Lyrics:
Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa Sadguru Sai Ram
Sadguru Sai Ram (Hey)
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram
Harey Ram Sai Ram
Hey Anatha Natha Deena Bandhu Sadguru Sai Ram
Sadguru Sai Ram (Hey)
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram
Harey Ram Sai Ram
Meaning: Lord Sai Ram is our Sacred Preceptor who dwells in Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi and the refuge of Forlorn. Repeat the Name of Ram who is none other than Lord Sai.
Songglossary: anath, bandhava, deen, hari, hey, natha, prashanthi, pureesha, puttaparthi, ram, sadguru, sai, vasa

Title: Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa
Lyrics:
Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa Sai Murari
Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari [ Hey Parthi Pureesha ]
Hey Hrishikesha Hrudaya Nivasa Hrudaya Nivasa [ Sai Murari ]
Meaning: The Lord of Parthi and the resident of Prashanthi Nilayam is the indweller of every heart. He is Lord Sai who also dwells at Hrishikesh and the One who had annihilated demon Mura.
Songglossary: hey, hrishikesha, hrudaya, murare, nivasa, prashanthi, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai, vasa

Title: Hey Ram Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Hey Ram Bhagawan
Hey Karuna Sindhu Ram
Hey Deena Bandhu Sai Ram
Bhaktha Premi O Karuna Karo
Daya (Mujhey Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Hey Janaki Jeevana Ram
Hey Parthi Pureeshwara Ram [ Hey Deena Bandhu ]
Meaning: Let Your benedictions be on us devotees Oh Lord Ram. You are the Ocean of Compassion and refuge of the Forlorn. You are the very Life of Mother Janaki and the Lord of Parthi.
GeneralComments: Japanese version: "Ai No Kami Yo".
Songglossary: bandhava, bhagawan, bhaktha, daya, deen, hey, janaki, jeeva, karo, karuna, krupa, mujhe, premi, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sindhu

Title: Hey Ram Hey Guna Dhaam
Lyrics:
Hey Ram Hey Guna Dhaam
Raghava Sundara Ram
Janaki Jeevana Ram [ Hey Ram ... ]
Kausalya Tanaya Raghukula Ram
Ayodhya Shiromani Dasharatha Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Sai Ram
Meaning: Glory be to Lord Ram, repository of Virtues and the descendant of Emperor Raghu. Lord Ram is the crest jewel of Ayodhya and the son of Mother Kausalya and King Dasharatha.
Songglossary: ayodhya, dasha, dhaam, guna, hey, janaki, jay, jeeva, kausalya, raghava, raghu, ram, sai, shiromani, sundara, tanaya

Title: Hey Ram Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Lyrics:
Hey Ram Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Hey Ram Vaidehi Priya Ram
Hey Patitha Pavana Sai Ram [ Hey Ram ... ]
Manimaya Bhooshana Ram
Kausalyatmaja Ram
Ravana Mardhana Ram
Rama Dootha Priya Ram (Hey)
Patitha Pavana Sai Ram (Hey)
Meaning: Lord Rama, you are the loving prince of Mother Kausalya and beloved Sita. You look handsome adorned with precious gems and jewels. Slayer of demon King Ravana, you are the redeemer of the downtrodden and worshipped by Hanuman.
Songglossary: bhooshan, doota, hey, kausalya, manimaya, mardana, patitha, pavan, priya, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, ravana, sai, vaidehi

Title: Hey Rama Dootha Hey Rama
Lyrics:
Hey Rama Dootha Hey Rama Bhaktha Hey Rama Daasa Namo Namo
Sita Mata Shoka Vinasha
Anatha Natha Namo Namo
Maruti Raya Mahanubhava
Ati Balavanta (Anjaneya) Namo Namo
Meaning: Salutations to the messenger, devotee and the servant of Rama. Salutations to the One who destroyed Mother Sita's agony, son of Maruti, guide to the orphaned, Supreme being and one of magnificent strength.
GeneralComments: Alternative version: Hey Anjaneya
Songglossary: anath, ati, balavanta, bhaktha, daasa, doota, hanuman, hey, mahanubhava, maruthi, mata, namo, natha, raja, ram, shoka, sita, vinasha

Title: Hey Rama Narayana
Lyrics:
Hey Rama Narayana
Harey Krishna Janardhana [ Hey Rama ... ]
Nithyananda Brahmananda
Krishna Madhusudhana [ Harey Krishna ]
Meaning: Glory to Lord Rama and Krishna who are the incarnations of Narayana. Lord Krishna is the motivator, personification of Supreme Bliss and the One who vanquished demon Madhu.
Songglossary: brahma, hari, hey, janardhana, krishna, madhu, narayana, nithya, ram

Title: Hey Ranga Panduranga
Lyrics:
Hey Ranga Panduranga
Rakumayi Ranga Vittobha Ranga [ Hey Ranga ]
Kaveri Ranga Kasturi Ranga
Karunya Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Kalyana Ranga Kamaneeya Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Sri Sai Ranga
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Ranga of Pandharpur, consort of Mother Rakumayi, who stands on a brick, the One with utmost compassion and Benevolence to all. Lord Ranga is very charming, dwells by the river Kaveri.
Songglossary: hey, kalyan, kamaneeya, karuna, kasturi, kaveri, pandu, rakumayi, ranga, sai, sri, vittala

Title: Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai
Lyrics:
Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha
Deena Bandhu Sai Natha Karuna Sindhu Jagannatha
Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha
Hey Shirdi Jagannatha Hey Parthi Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha
Meaning: Repeat the sacred name of Sai the Lord of the Universe, the refuge of the Forlorn, the Ocean of compassion and the One who dwells at Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: bandhava, deen, hey, jagan, karuna, natha, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi, sindhu

Title: Hey Sai Ranga Hey Panduranga
Lyrics:
Hey Sai Ranga Hey Panduranga
Karunanta Ranga Hrudayanta Ranga [ Hey Sai ... ]
Sri Ranga Ranga Jaya Ranga Ranga
Ananda Ranga Sadananda Ranga [ Karunanta Ranga ]
Meaning: Contemplate on the name of Lord Ranga, the One who dwells in everyone's Heart, the One of compassion and is ever blissful.
Songglossary: anand, hey, hrudaya, jay, karuna, pandu, ranga, sadana, sai, sri

Title: Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
Lyrics:
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
Veda Bharana Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Narayana
Pavana Charana Narayana
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana (3)
Meaning: Lord Narayana reclines on the serpent Adi Sesha and the One who fosters Vedas. Repeat the name of Narayana whose sacred feet dispels fear of repetitive births.
Songglossary: bharana, bhava, bhaya, chara, harana, hari, hey, narayana, pavan, sai, shayana, shesha, veda

Title: Hey Shiva Nandana Hey Shiva
Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana Paalaya Maam
Hey Girija Sutha Hey Girija Sutha
Hey Girija Sutha Raksha Maam
Meaning: Protect me Oh the son of Shiva and Mother Girija.
Songglossary: girija, hey, maam, nanda, paalaya, raksha, shiva, sutha

Title: Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Jaga
Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Jaga Vandana
Jaya Gowri Sutha Paahi Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Parama Daya Ghana
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Gajanana
Meaning: Oh the son of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri, the entire Universe bows down to you in reverence. Save me Oh Elephant faced son of Parvathi for you are the One of Supreme compassion.
Songglossary: daya, gajamukha, ghana, gowri, hey, jagat, jay, maam, nanda, paahi, param, parvathi, prabhu, shiva, sutha, vandana

Title: Hey Shiva Nandana Nandana
Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Nandana
Hey Shiva Nandana Sai Gajanana [ Hey Shiva ... ]
Mooshika Vahana Modaka Hasta
Chamara Karna Vilambita Sutra
Vamana Roopa Maheshwara Putra
Parthi Gajanana Paada Namostuthey
Meaning: I bow down to the Feet of the son of Shiva, who has the head of an Elephant. He has a short stature, having big ears, the sacred thread hanging on His body and has a mouse as His vehicle.
Songglossary: chamara, gajamukha, hasta, hey, karna, maheshwara, modaka, mooshika, namostuthey, nanda, paada, putra, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, shiva, sutra, vahana, vamana, vilambita

Title: Hey Shiva Shankara Namami Shankara
Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Shankara Namami Shankara Shiva Shankara Shambho
Hey Girijapathi Bhavani Shankara
Shiva Shankara Shambho (3)
Meaning: Prostrations to Lord Shiva or Shankara, the One who bestows auspiciousness. He is the Lord of Mother Girija who is also known as Bhavani.
Songglossary: bhavani, girijapathi, hey, namami, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Hey Shiva Shankara Nataraja
Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Shankara Nataraja
Bhavani Shankara Shiva Raja [ Hey Shiva ... ]
Natana Manohara Hey Nataraja
Sai Manohara Shiva Raja
Meaning: Lord Shiva confers Auspiciousness and is the Lord of enticing Dance and the beloved of Mother Bhavani.
Songglossary: bhava, hey, manohar, natana, nataraj, raja, sai, shankara, shiva

Title: Hey Shiva Shankara Shambho Hey
Lyrics:
Hey Shiva Shankara Shambho Hey Tripurari
Dayamaya Maheshwara Sai Shankara
Hara (4) Shambho Mahadeva Gangadhara Shankara
Shiva (4) Shambho Mahadeva Sayeeshwara Shankara
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Shiva bestower of auspiciousness and who burnt down three cities built by the demons. Shiva is the Lord of the Lords, of Supreme compassion, the One holding Mother Ganges in His matted locks.
Songglossary: dayamayi, ganga, hara, hey, mahadev, maheshwara, sai, sayee, shambho, shankara, shiva, tripura

Title: Hey Shyama Sundara Hey Sai
Lyrics:
Hey Shyama Sundara Hey Sai Sundara
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Sundara [ Hey Shyam ... ]
Neela Megha Sundara Neeraja Lochana
Brahmanda Nayaka Hey Sai Sundara
Meaning: Glory to the Lord Sai who has charming looks and is the Lord of Parthi. He has the complexion of dark blue clouds, lotus eyed and the Lord of the Entire Universe.
Songglossary: brahma, hey, lochana, megha, nayaka, neela, neeraja, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Hey Vishwa Pala Gopala
Lyrics:
Hey Vishwa Pala Gopala
Hey Deena Bandhu Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Giridhara Bala Sai Gopala
Meaning: Lord Gopala sustains the whole Universe, friend of the helpless. He held aloft the Mountain high and the Lord of Meera's devotion.
Songglossary: bala, bandhava, deen, giridhar, gopal, hey, ke, meera, pala, prabhu, sai, vishwa

Title: Hey Vishwanath Hey Gowri Nath
Lyrics:
Hey Vishwanath Hey Gowri Nath Hey Sai Nath Bhagawan
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhagawan [ Hey Vishwanath ... ]
Deena Dayala Sai Ghana Shyama
Patitha Pavana Hey Sai Rama [ Daya Karo ]
Meaning: Show mercy on us Oh Lord of the Universe and of Mother Gowri. Lord Sai is the redeemer of the downtrodden and provides succor to the weak.
Songglossary: bhagawan, daya, dayal, deen, ghana, gowri, hey, karo, natha, patitha, pavan, ram, sai, sham, vishwa

Title: Hey Vraj Bal Yadu Nanda
Lyrics:
Hey Vraj Bal Yadu Nanda Gopal
Shyama Sundara Mohana Gopal [ Hey Vraj Bal ... ]
Yashoda Ke Bal Yadu Nanda Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gokula Bal
Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala You are the son of Nanda and Yashoda and of the Yadava lineage. You are the one who moved about in the thick bushes of Brindavan, is of dark complexion and attractive to behold.
Songglossary: bala, gokul, gopal, hey, ke, mohan, nanda, sham, sundara, vraj, yadu, yashoda

Title: Heyramba Gananatha Natha
Lyrics:
Heyramba Gananatha Natha
He Gananatha Anatha Natha
Bhuvanadhara Pranava Swaroopa (3)
Siddhi Vinayaka He Gananatha (Vara)
Meaning: Ganesh, the leader of Ganaas, the Lord of the forsaken ones, is the embodiment of the vital force and supporter of the Universe. he fulfills ones wishes.
Songglossary: anath, bhuvana, gananatha, heyramba, natha, pranava, siddhi, swaroopa, vara, vinayaka

Title: Heyramba Janani Sri Sai Janani
Lyrics:
Heyramba Janani Sri Sai Janani
Bhavani Jagadambe Ma (2)
Tribhuvana Palini Hey Karunamayi
Uma Sharadamba (2)
Raksha Karo Sai Ma
Meaning: Protect us Oh Sai Ma! You are the creator of this Earth, the sustainer of the three worlds and personification of compassion. Oh Mother, you are known by the names Bhavani, Uma and Sharada.
Songglossary: bhava, hey, heyramba, jagadamba, janani, karo, karuna, ma, palini, raksha, sai, sharada, sri, tribhuvan, uma

Title: Himagiri Nandini He Jagat Janani
Lyrics:
Himagiri Nandini He Jagat Janani
Sab Dukha Bhanjani Loka Niranjani [ Himagiri Nandini ... ]
Surya Chandra Ke Koti Prakashini
Jagat Janani Mahishasura Mardhini
Meaning: Mother Goddess, With the Effulgence of a Million Suns and Moons. The Destroyer of Mahishasura And Daughter of the Himalaya Mountain, Removes Our worldly Sorrows.
Songglossary: bhanjana, chand, dukh, himagiri, jagat, janani, ke, koti, loka, mahishasura, mardini, nandi, niranjan, prakasha, sab, surya

Title: Hine ma tov
Lyrics:
Slow:
Hine ma tov uma-nayim, Shevet ach-im gam ya-chad (low 2x)
Hine ma tov, Shevet ach-im gam ya-chad (high)
Hine ma tov, Shevet ach-im gam ya-chad (low)
Happy are they who in friendship willingly work together (low 2x)
Happy are they who in peace united, work together, willingly work together (low)
Fast:
Hine ma tov uma-nayim, Shevet ach-im gam ya-chad (high 2x)
Hine ma tov, hine ma tov lai lai lai lai lai lai lai lai lai lai lai (2x)
Shalu Shalom Yerushalayim (4x)
Pray for the Peace of Israel
Pray for the Peace of Ishmael
Pray for the Peace of all the world
And all the world shall live in Peace
Shalom (6x) Shalu Shalom Yerushalayim
Shalom (6x) Shalu Shalom Yerushalayim
Hevenu shalom aleichem (3x) {faster each time}
Hevenu shalom, shalom shalom aleichem (3x, 3rd time end high)
Beat: Dadra (6 Beat) - part 1, Keherwa / Adi (8 Beat) - part 2

Title: Hine ma tov uma nayim
Lyrics:
Hine ma tov uma nayim
 Shevet achim gam yachad
 Hine ma tov
 Shevet achim gam yachad
Meaning:
How good and how pleasant it is for us all to be of one heart.
 How good it is, for us all to be of one heart.
 For there the Lord brings blessing life forevermore.
 How good it is and how pleasant for brethren to dwell together.
How good it is for brethren to dwell together.

Title: Hitomi wo Tojite Akatsuki no
Lyrics:
Hitomi wo Tojite Akatsuki no
 Usuki Hikari ni Nukazukeba
 Yasashiki Haha no Misugata ga
 Mabutani Sotto Ukabi Kuru
 Mimi wo Sumaseba Kikoe Kuru
 Puttaparthi no Utagoe ga
 Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Rama
 Mune Utsu Hibiki Kodama Suru
 Sora Yuku Kumo yo Umi wo Koe
 Haha Sumu Kuni e Tsutaete yo
 Anata no Ai no Mikokoro to
 Hitotsu no Tokete Ikitai to

Title: Holy, Lord God Almighty
Lyrics:
Holy Holy Holy, Lord God Almighty
 Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee
 Holy Holy Holy, merciful and mighty
 God in three persons, blessed trinity.

Title: How many lives have I been through
Lyrics:
How many lives have I been through, seeking your Glory forever?
 I have searched here and there and could never find You,
 I am pining for You more than ever
 I have waited so long, for You to come along
 Now You're here, please hear this devotee's song
 How many times have I lost You, yet You have brought us together?
 I want You to Know, O my dear dear Lord,
 I want You to know that I need You
 I have strayed and been lost and have hurt You so much,
 But I want to tell You I love You
 How many times have I left You, yet You have loved me forever?
 I want You to know, O my dear dear Lord,
 I want You to know that I love You
 When this body is weak and the time comes to sleep,
 Be with me, O my Lord, be with me

Title: How many past lives
Lyrics:
How many past lives have I been lost
 Trapped in your worldly web of time?
 Only You can make it seem all of this is but a dream
 Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai, make us only Thine
 How many more lives must I endure
 Seeking Your ever blissful Face?
 I'm tired of being alone, only You can take me home
 Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai, bless me with Your Grace

Title: How sweet it is
Lyrics:
How sweet it is to be in Your Presence, My Lord,
 in Your Presence My Lord, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai
 I Love You and You love me, and I always want to be at the Feet of
 My Lord Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai
 How sweet it is to live in the age of my Lord, in the age of my Lord,
 Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai

Title: Hrudayanta Ranga Sai Nandana Vana
Lyrics:
Hrudayanta Ranga Sai Nandana Vana Vihari
Jaya Yadu Nandana Jaya Ghana Shyam (2)
Meaning: Victory to the One who is the indweller of the heart, the deep blue complexioned son of Yadu lineage, the one who dwells in the Nandana Forest.
Songglossary: ghana, hrudaya, jay, nanda, ranga, sai, sham, vana, vihar, yadu

Title: Hu Allah, Allah Hu Allah
Lyrics:
Hu Allah, Allah Hu Allah, Allah Hu Allah, Allah Hu
Let my heart reflect Thy light Lord
As the moon reflects the light of the sun in love always in love
Hu Allah, Allah Hu Allah, Allah Hu Allah, Allah Hu
Songglossary: allah, sun

Title: Hum ko deejo teri duwaayein
Lyrics:
Hum Ko Deejo Teri Duwaayen
Mere Baba Mere Sai
Raat Aur Din, Din Aur Raat
Tere Sharana Mein Rahte Hain
Hum Ko Sikhaao Apaara Vidya
Apaara Prema Apaara Bhakthi
Sathya Dharma Ki Raaha Dikhaao
Karo Prabhu Jeevana Ujiyaara (x2)
Meaning:
Please give us your blessings
My Baba, My Sai
Night and Day, Day and Night
We live under your protection
Please teach us your infinite knowledge,
Infinite Love and Infinite Faith
Show us the way to Truth and Righteousness
And make our life an enlightened life
Songglossary: aur, baba, bhakthi, deejo, dharma, din, hum, jeeva, karo, mein, prabhu, prem, raha, sai, sathya, sharan, sikha, vidya

Title: Hum Sab Milkar Mangal Gaayen
Lyrics:
Hum Sab Milkar Mangal Gaayen
Sai Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan (2)
Sab Sukh Jeevana Sai Bhagawan
Sab Dukha Harana Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Hrudaya Nivasa Sai Bhagawan
Parthi Nivasa Sai Bhagawan

Sai Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan (5)
Meaning: Let us all sing together the glory of Lord Sathya Sai, the one who confers happiness to all and removes misery from everyone's life, the one who is the embodiment of Truth, the indweller of our hearts and the resident of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhagawan, dukha, gaayen, harana, hrudaya, hum, jeevan, mangal, milkar, nivasa, puttaparthi, sab, sai, sathya, sukh, swaroopa

Title: I am a circle
Lyrics:
I am a circle, I am healing you
 You are a circle, you are healing me
 Unite us, be one
 Unite us, be as one

Title: I am God and you are God
Lyrics:
I am God and you are God
 What does this mean that we are God
 I am God and you are God
 What does this mean that we are God
 It means that there is only One in everything we see
 To think that there is more than One is not reality
 We're just beads on a string
 God is everything
 We're just beads on the string of the Lord
 I am love and you are love
 What does this mean that we are love
 I am love and you are love
 What does this mean that we are love
 It means you always love yourself, no matter who you are
 And when you see there's nothing else but you, you love it all
 We're just beads on a string
 Love is everything
 We're just beads on the string of the Lord
 We're just beads on a string
 Love is everything
 We're just beads on the string of the Lord

Title: I Am God I Am God
Lyrics:
I Am God, I Am God, I Am No Different From God
I Am The Infinite Supreme, The One Reality
I Am Satchidananda Svaroopa
I Am Om Tat Sat Om
I Am Love, I Am Truth, I Am Peace Eternally
I Am Ever Pure Delight, I Am Always Full And Free
Fear Or Grief Can Never Touch Me [ I Am Om ... ]
Songglossary: om, sat, satchidananda, tat

Title: I Am In The Father
Lyrics:
I Am In The Father
The Father Is In Me
The Son And The Spirit
Are Dwelling In Me
Seva Is The Mantra
Dharma Is The Key
Peace And Fulfillment
Are Flowing To Me
I Am In Samadhi
Swami Is With Me
Sathya Sai Baba
Has Set My Heart Free
Sathya Sai Baba (2)
Ananda Swarupa
Antaryami
Songglossary: anand, antar, baba, dharma, mantra, sai, sathya, seva, swami

Title: I am never alone
Lyrics:
I am never alone, You and I are never apart
 For my soul is Your home, You live inside my heart
 Baba You are my very breath, No one will ever love me like Sai
 My Lord You are my everything, My Lord You are my life

Title: I Am One Dear Sai
Lyrics:
I Am One, Dear Sai, I Am One With Thee
I Am One In Your Light Of Divinity
I Am One With The Sky, The Earth And The Sea
I Am One With Sai For Eternity [ I Am One, Dear Sai, ... ]
I Am One In The Search Of Reality
I Am One With Your Love In The Heart Of Me
I Am One In Peace And Serenity
Songglossary: sai

Title: I Am One With The Heart Of The Mother
Lyrics:
I Am One With The Heart Of The Mother
I Am One With The Heart Of Love
I Am One With The Heart Of The Father
I Am One With God
Ave Maria Christe Eleison
Meaning: Hail Mary, Christ Have Mercy On Us.
GeneralComments: Same tune as the song: Ave Maria.

Title: I am one with the heart of the Mother
Lyrics:
I am one with the heart of the Mother
 I am one with the heart of Love
 I am one with the heart of the Father
 I am one with God
 Ave Maria Kyrie Eleison

Title: I am That I Am
Lyrics:
I am That I Am, I am, I am not only just man, I am all,
 yes all I am, forever, I am That I Am
 I'm the mountain, I'm the sea, I'm the rock and I'm the tree,
 I'm the earth and I'm the sky, forever, I am That I Am
 O He's the only One
 Soham Soham
 I am nothing, I am all, I'm the sun and I'm the stars,
 I am reason, I am Truth, forever, I am That I Am
 I am energy and will, I am fire, I am wind, I am water,
 I am wind, forever, I am That I Am
 I am heart and I am love, I am intellect and thought,
 I am real, I am dream, forever, I am That I Am
 O He's the only One
 Soham Soham

Title: I am, I am, I am divinity
Lyrics:
I am, I am, I am divinity, but to be, I must believe in me.
 I must trust in my own reality, give up all, for all is really me.

Title: I bow down at the Feet of Ganesha
Lyrics:
I bow down at the Feet of Ganesha
Ganesha Ganesha (I bow down )
Ganesha, I Pray, You will clear my way (3x) 
Ganesha Ganesha (I bow down )
Jai Ganesha, Sai Ganesha, clear my way to Baba
Jai Ganesha, Sai Ganesha, clear my way to Swami
Jai Ganesha, Sai Ganesha, clear my way to Baba
Ganesha Ganesha

Title: I feel You in my heart
Lyrics:
I feel You in my heart and I know You are there
 Say something to me
 I know You in my heart and I feel You are there
 Say something to me
 Come close so I can see You
 I know that Your love is true
 Your divine love surrounds me
 I feel a sense of peace in me
 The light shines within and I know You are there
 Say something to me
 You are all and You're everywhere
 Say something to me

Title: I have nothing to offer Thee
Lyrics:
I have nothing to offer Thee for all things are Thine
 I grieve not that I cannot give for nothing is mine, nothing is mine
 Here I lay at Thy feet, O Lord my limbs, my life, my thoughts, and my speech
 For they are Thine, for they are Thine

Title: I have travelled so far from home
Lyrics:
I have travelled so far from home, I have left loved ones behind
 As I stand so sad and lonely, O my Lord, You come to my side
 Wherever I go my Lord, I have you close to me
 In my heart I hold to you, everywhere Your form I see
 So wherever I go from home, lonely I never can be
 With the Lord by my side, I shall live in harmony

Title: I Hold On To Your Feet
Lyrics:
I Hold On To Your Feet My Dear Lord, Lord Sai
Take Me In Your Arms, Keep Me By Your Side
Bless Me With Your Love, Divine
I Surrender To You My Dear Lord, Lord Sai
Help Me Make It One, My Thoughts, Words And Deeds
Bless Me With Your Love, Divine
Songglossary: make, sai

Title: I Keep Feeling Your Love
Lyrics:
I Keep Feeling Your Love In Me Over And Over Again
And Its Sweeter And Sweeter As The Days Go By
Oh What A Love Between My Sai And I
My Sai And I, My Sai And I
Songglossary: go, sai

Title: I Know That Baba Is My Savior
Lyrics:
I Know, I Know, I Know That Baba Is My Savior
I Know, I Know, I Know That Baba Is Within Me
I Know, I Know, I Know That Baba Will Direct Me
I Know, I Know, I Know That Baba Will Protect Me
Songglossary: baba

Title: I know You can hear me
Lyrics:
I know You can hear me, O mighty Lord Shiva,
 Grant me the boon of complete devotion
 All I want to do is let You flow through,
 Zoom in on Your rhythm and dance my way to heaven
 Dance, dance, dance, sweet Lord, dance to the beat of my heart (Shiva!) (2X)
 I know You can hear me, O mighty Lord Shiva,
 Grant me the boon of complete detachment
 All I want to do is let You flow through,
 Zoom in on Your rhythm and dance my way to heaven
 Dance, dance, dance, sweet Lord, dance to the beat of my heart (Shiva!) (2X)
 I know You can hear me, O mighty Lord Shiva,
 Grant me the boon of full Self-realization
 All I want to do is let You flow through,
 Zoom in on Your rhythm and dance my way to heaven
 Dance, dance, dance, sweet Lord, dance to the beat of my heart (Shiva!) (2X)

Title: I looked over Jordan
Lyrics:
I looked over Jordan and what did I see
 Comin' for to carry me home
 A band of angels comin' after me
 Comin' for to carry me home
 Swing low, sweet chariot, comin' for to carry me home
 Swing low, sweet chariot, comin' for to carry me home
 I'm sometimes up and I'm sometimes down
 Comin' for to carry me home
 But still my soul feels heavenly bound
 Comin' for to carry me home
 Swing low, sweet chariot, comin' for to carry me home
 Swing low, sweet chariot, comin' for to carry me home
 If you get there before I do
 Comin' for to carry me home
 Tell all my friends that I'm a'comin' too
 Comin' for to carry me home
 Swing low, sweet chariot, comin' for to carry me home
 Swing low, sweet chariot, comin' for to carry me home
 This song is sung in unison.

Title: I love the Lord
Lyrics:
I love the Lord and He loves me
 I live my life for all to see
 I sing this song of praise to Thee
 I love the Lord and He loves me
 The Love of God is for you and me
 Open up your heart and you will see
 The Lord is Love and Love is He
 The Love of God is for you and me
 So look around and try to see
 The Lord in you, the Lord in me
 For we are all but a part of Thee
 Come, O my Lord, O come to me
 Show me the sight that I long to see
 Come, O my Lord, O come to me

Title: I love you father Sai Baba
Lyrics:
I love you father Sai Baba
 I need you father Sai Baba
 Hare Rama Hare Krishna Gurudeva
 You are my father Sai Baba
 You are my mother Sai Baba
 Hare Rama Hare Krishna Gurudeva
 You are my brother Sai Baba
 You are my sister Sai Baba
 Hare Rama Hare Krishna Gurudeva
 You are my guru Sai Baba
 You are my leader Sai Baba
 Hare Rame Hare Krishna Gurudeva

Title: I Love You Lord
Lyrics:
I Love You Lord, I Love You
You And I Are One
Shirdi Baba, Sri Sathya Sai, Narayana Sai Baba
Let Us Sing The Name Of Sai, Let Us Praise The Lord
He Has Come On Earth For Us, He Is Our Joy
I Love You Lord, I Love You
You And I Are One
Shirdi Baba, Sri Sathya Sai, Narayana Sai Baba
Let Us Rejoice And Follow Him, Listen To His Words
Do Not Ever Cry For Me, I Am In Your Heart
I Love You Lord, I Love You
You And I Are One
Shirdi Baba, Sri Sathya Sai, Narayana Sai Baba
Songglossary: baba, do, narayana, sai, sathya, shirdi, sri

Title: I offer myself to thee
Lyrics:
I offer myself to Thee
