That Thy will be done 
I give myself to You to find a life so true
I offer myself to Thee

Title: I prayed to God
Lyrics:
I prayed to God to send us a Savior
 I prayed to Christ for His soon return
 Out of my darkness He bloomed with great splendor
 The Lord of Puttaparthi, the Yuga Avathaar (3X)
 Om Sri Sathya Sai Baba, Om Sri Sathya Sai my Lord
 There's only one God and He is omnipresent
 There's only one Lord and He's present in all
 Om Sri Sathya Sai Baba, Om Sri Sathya Sai my Lord
 Om Sri Sathya Sai Baba, It's You that we adore

Title: I See All You See
Lyrics:
I See All You See Cause I Am You
I Feel All You Feel Cause I Am You
I Know All You Think Cause I Am You
I Hear All You Say Cause I Am You
I Guide You Each Day When You Let Me Do
I Heed When You Call It Is My Duty To
I Give You The Strength To Help You Through
I Do All Of This Cause I Love You
I Am Everything And I Am You
Your Voice When You Sing, That Is Me Too
Surrender To Me Ill Take Care Of You
Ill Always Be There Cause I Love You
Songglossary: do

Title: I shall guard you
Lyrics:
I shall guard you, I shall guard you,
 As the lid guards the eye
 I shall be beside you, behind you, before you
 (I shall be) inside and outside you,
 Now and forever

Title: I sing a song of love to You
Lyrics:
I sing a song, I sing a song, I sing a song of love to You
 A song of love, a song of love, a song of love we sing to You
 I sing a song, a song of love, a song of love I sing to You
 The flowers that I bring are my songs for You
 My songs of love will call to You
 You know my heart just yearns for You,
 You know my soul reaches out to You

Title: I sing a song of the saints of God
Lyrics:
I sing a song of the saints of God,
 Patient and brave and true,
 who toiled and fought and lived and died for the Lord they loved and knew.
 And one was a doctor, and one was a queen, and one was a shepherdess on the
 green:
 They were all of them saints of God, and I mean,
 God helping, to be one too.
 They loved their Lord so dear, so dear, and His love made them strong
 and they followed the right, for Jesus's sake, the whole of their good lives long
 And one was a soldier, and one was a priest, and one was slain by a fierce will beast,
 and there's not any reason - no not in the least,
 why I shouldn't be one too!
 They lived not only in ages past, there are hundreds of thousands still
 the world is bright with the joyous saints who love to do Jesus's will.
 You can meet them in the school, or in lanes, or at sea, in church, or in
 trains, or in shops, or at tea,
 for the saints of God are just folk like me, and I mean to be one too.

Title: I surrender to You Baba
Lyrics:
I surrender to You Baba, I surrender to You
With each passing day I love you more, I surrender to You
Sri Ram Jai Ram Bolo Sai Baba Jai Jai Jai Jai Ram
Sri Sai Baba Vitthala Sharanam Baba
Sai Avatara Bhagawan Sharanam Baba
Sri Ram Jai Ram Bolo Sai Baba Jai Jai Jai Jai Ram
Songglossary: avatar, baba, bhagavan, bolo, jai, ram, sai, sharanam, sri, vittala

Title: I walk along a path
Lyrics:
I walk a along a path, and I ask the question Why?
 I strive to know the truth, I'm drawn to Bhagavaan Sathya Sai
 I open my heart and a light begins to shine
 I share this light with all and I know it is a Light divine
 I sail a stormy sea, and I'm tossed by waves so high
 Illusion is the sea; my body is the ship, not I
 And when I see the Lord, He is brighter than the Sun
 He showers me with love, and He softly says to me, We're one.

Title: I was born to love You
Lyrics:
I was born to love You, yes I know what I must do
 I was born to love You and I do
 Sai Ram, Sai Ram
 O Your Name is all we need to chant
 You were born because You love us, and I know You do
 You were born to teach us what to do
 May we live for You, yes, may we live for only You
 Sai Ram, Sai Krishna, help us to
 May we mergee in You, yes, may we merge in only You
 Sai Baba, Sai Baba, only You

Title: I was in the darkness of illusion
Lyrics:
I was in the darkness of illusion (1x)
My mind lost in total confusion (1x)
You came to me, Baba you came to me (2x)
Lifting my spirits with your divine compassion (1x)
Showing me the way to salvation
You came to me, Baba you came to me (2x)
You are mine, I am Yours, Sai Baba (2x)
You and I are one Sai Baba (1x)
You came to me, Baba you came to me (2x)
(2nd time from "Lifting my...")
Songglossary: baba, sai

Title: I will be thine my Lord
Lyrics:
I will be thine my Lord forever thine my Lord
 Though the sky and the earth should part
 Far beyond the throng I still hear Your song
 Calling me back to the home that I love
 Calling, calling, calling me back to Your Heart

Title: I Will Love You More And More
Lyrics:
I Will Love You More And More Each Day
I Will Love You Dear Sai Forever And A Day
I Will Sing My Lord
I Will Serve my lord
I Will Call Your Name Everyday
Om Gam Ganapathi Vinayaka
Buddha Jesus Allah Allah
Guru Nanak Mahavira
Om Sri Bhagawan Sai Natha
I Will Love You More And More Each Day
I Will Love You Dear Sai Forever And A Day
In My Heart My Lord
I Will Build My Lord
Prasanthi Just For you
I Will Fill My Heart With Love My Lord
If I Love All You Know My Love is True
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, buddha, gananayaka, guru, mahavir, more, nanak, natha, om, prasanthi, sai, sri, vinayaka

Title: I will sing to the Glory
Lyrics:
I will sing to the Glory, the Glory of God
 I will sing to the Glory of Love of the Lord
 Let us sing to the Glory, the Glory of God
 Let us sing to the Glory of Love of the Lord
 Everywhere we wander, anywhere we go
 The Lord will guide us like the Shepherd of old
 We love you, O Krishna, Nanak, Jesus, Buddha
 Let us sing to the Glory of Sathya Sai Baba
 Sathya Sai Baba, we love You, Sai Ram, (3X)
 Sathya Sai Baba, Sai Ram, Sai Ram

Title: I’ve Got The Joy Of Sai
Lyrics:
I've Got The Joy Of Sai, Joy Of Sai, Down In My Heart, ...
... Down In My Heart, Down In My Heart
I've Got The Joy Of Sai, Joy Of Sai, Down In My Heart, ...
... Down In My Heart To Stay
I've Got The Love Of Sai, Love Of Sai, Down In My Heart, ...
... Down In My Heart, Down In My Heart
I've Got The Love Of Sai, Love Of Sai, Down In My Heart, ...
... Down In My Heart To Stay
Songglossary: sai

Title: I, the Lord of sea and sky
Lyrics:
I, the Lord of sea and sky
I have heard My people cry
All who dwell in dark and sin
My hand will save
I who made the stars of night
I will make their darkness bright
Who will bear My light to them?
Whom shall I send?

Chorus begin
Here I am Lord, It is I, Lord
I have heard You calling in the night
I will go Lord, if You lead me
I will hold Your people in my heart.
Chorus end

I, the Lord of snow and rain
I have borne my people's pain
I have wept for love of them
They turn away
I will break their hearts of stone
Give them hearts for love alone
I will speak My word to them
Whom shall I send?

<Chorus>

I, the Lord of wind and flame
I will tend the poor and lame
I will set a feast for them
My hand will save
Finest bread I will provide
Till their hearts be satisfied
I will give My life to them
Whom shall I send?

<Chorus>
GeneralComments: This is a classic Christian song sung in many churches and is best sung in unison with harmonies.

Title: If they say our eyes are beautiful
Lyrics:
If they say our eyes are beautiful, Lord
 It's because, they are looking at You.
 And when the whole world you know,
 They'll feel the same way too
 They can say, that we are all dreamers
 Who've had a dream come true
 And when they say our eyes are beautiful, Lord
 It's because, they are looking at You.
 If they say our eyes are beautiful, Lord
 It's because, they are looking at You.
 And our eyes are just the windows
 For our feelings to come through
 And by far You are more beautiful
 Than anyone, we ever knew
 So when they say our eyes are beautiful, Lord
 It's because they are looking at You.

Title: If You Want To Merge
Lyrics:
If You Want To Merge With Me Become Like Me
Why Do You Forget That You Are Divine
Give Up All Desires And Simply Shine
Take My Name All Day Long
Do Only Right Never Do Wrong
Take My Name All Day Long
Songglossary: do

Title: If you want your dream to be
Lyrics:
If you want your dream to be
 Build it slowly and surely
 Small beginnings, greater things
 Heartfelt work grows purely
 If you want to live life free
 Take your time, go slowly
 Do few things and do them well
 Simple joys are Holy
 Day by day, stone by stone
 Build your secret slowly
 Day by day, you'll grow too
 You'll Heaven's Glory

Title: In all that I say
Lyrics:
In all that I say, In all that I do
 In all of my feelings and all of my thoughts too
 To the indwelling Lord I surrender
 To Sai Baba the Lord of Love
 Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba
 Omnipresent, Lord of the Love Divine
 When I love all life, In all things I see
 Your leela's Baba, playing with me
 Lord of all, Take me, Shape me
 All of me I give to Thee

Title: In His eyes, compassion,
Lyrics:
In His eyes, compassion,
 On His lips, sweet words,
 On His face, a rainbow,
 Joy residing in His heart.
 That is the Sai we know and love.
 Do not lose hope, do not give up,
 For the Savior has come for us,
 Holding us gently in His hands.

Title: In my heart, O Lord, I see Your Face
Lyrics:
In my heart, O Lord, I see Your Face
 Dear Lord, I see You every place
 O my Lord, by Your Grace
 I find Your love in every face
 O my Lord, by Your Grace
 I feel Your love in every place
 
 Sung to the tune of Chandra Shekaraya Nama Om

Title: In my soul
Lyrics:
In my soul
 A lotus grows
 The gift of Love
 That Sai bestows
 Here's a song I sing for You
 It's only for You that I sing
 For the voice I raise is the gift from You
 And the words and the melody too
 Works of Love I perform for You
 It is only for You I perform
 For the works I do is the gift for You
 And the fruit of my labor is too
 I can give my love to You
 For Your love is the gift You gave me
 And the flame that burns in the heart of hearts
 Is the same flame that burns within me

Title: In parts of the world
Lyrics:
In parts of the world, He's known by other names
 Some call Him Jehovah, Its still the same
 In the East they say Krishna was His name
 To others it was Buddha, Then Jesus came
 Lord god You live within our heart
 Because You love us, we can never part
 We pray that we will always be
 Lovers of others and Lovers of Thee.

Title: In the altar in my home
Lyrics:
In the altar in my home, I light a lamp for You
 Deep in my heart, a light is burning too
 Every waking day, I pray, I yearn for You
 In my dreams, O my Lord, I will come to You
 I will walk in my dreams, I will come to You
 I will run in my dreams, I will come to You
 I will fly in my dreams, I will come to You
 When I wake, O my Lord, I will be with You
 I will call, O my Lord, You will come to me
 I will pray, O my Lord, You will come to me
 I will sing, O my Lord, You will come to me
 You will come, O my Lord, for I love Thee
 Let me hear, O my Lord, divine Melody

Title: In The Chambers Of My Heart
Lyrics:
In The Chambers Of My Heart, A Shrine I Have For Thee
Come O Lord, Come O Sai, Come Thou Dwell In Me
The Candles Of My Love, Are Burning Bright For Thee
Come O Lord, Come O Sai, Come Thou Dwell In Me
In The Silent Communion, I Watch And Wait For Thee
Come O Lord, Come O Sai, Come Thou Dwell In Me
The Blossoms Of My Soul, I Offer Unto Thee
Come O Lord, Come O Sai, Come Thou Dwell In Me
Songglossary: sai

Title: In The Chambers Of Your Heart
Lyrics:
In The Chambers Of Your Heart
Listen When The Music Starts
In The Reaches Of Your Mind
Shine The Light And You Will Find
Sai Rama, Sai Rama
Sai Krishna, Sai Rama
Parthi Krishna, Sai Rama
Sai Shankara, Sai Rama
Parthi Krishna, Parthi Rama
Satyam, Dharma, Shanthi, Prema
Satyam, Jnanam, Anantam, Bramha
(2nd time from "In the reaches...")
Songglossary: ananta, dharma, krishna, prem, puttaparthi, ram, sai, shankara, shanthi

Title: In the dark of the night
Lyrics:
In the dark of the night I saw a bright burning light before me
 In the dark of my life I saw a bright burning light above me
 Little did I know it was the Lord calling to me
 Till I realized the Light, I wandered all alone
 O my Lord, You are life! You are love! You are laughter!
 O my Lord, You are sun and the moon and the stars
 O my Lord, everything in this world is Your Glory
 And I thank You, O my Lord, for showing me the Light
 You are the light of my love! of my life! of my laughter!
 You are the light of the sun and the moon and the stars
 You are the light, O my Lord, to show man his glory
 And I thank You, O my Lord, for coming to my life

Title: In the early morning
Lyrics:
In the early morning, in the silence
 Hear eternity calling you.
 The dawn is breaking, the sun is rising
 Feel the light engulfing you
 See the light, it's spreading everywhere
 Filling you through and through
 Feel the light, it's shining in your heart
 And know that light is you.
 In the evening sunset, see Sai Baba
 The splendorous light of infinity.
 He's the joyous light of love and compassion,
 Feel His light enfolding you.
 Sense His joy, it's glowing everywhere
 Filling you through and through.
 Sense His love, it's shining in your heart
 And know that love is you.

Title: In The Heart Of My Heart
Lyrics:
In The Heart Of My Heart Is A Lovely Melody
Deep In My Soul Is A Prayer Just For Thee
Heart Of My Heart, Deep In My Soul
My Lord, A Prayer For Thee
Deep In My Soul Is A Song Just For Thee
Come, O My Lord, O My Lord, Come To Me
Heart Of Heart, Deep In My Soul
My Lord, A Song For Thee
The Songs That I Sing Are All And For Thee
But Deep In My Heart, A Divine Melody
A Song Just For You, My Lord, Just For You
A Song You Will Sing To Me
A Song You Will Sing To Me
Krishna, You Will Sing To Me
Songglossary: deep, krishna

Title: In the morning of my life
Lyrics:
In the morning of my life
 I shall look to thee sunrise
 At a moment in my life When the day is new
 And the blessing I shall ask
 Is that God will grant me
 To be brave, and strong, and true
 And to fill the world with Love my whole life through
 And to fill the world with Love (2X)
 And to fill the world with Love my whole life through
 In the evening of my life
 I shall look to the sunset
 At a moment in my life
 When the night is due
 And the question I shall ask
 Only God can answer
 Was I brave, strong, and true?
 Did I fill the world with Love my whole life through?
 Did I fill the world with Love? (5X)
 Did I fill the world with Love my whole life through?

Title: In the morning, I call your name
Lyrics:
In the morning, in the morning, I call your name, O my Lord
 I pray, O dear Lord, please guard and guide me all through the day, O my Lord
 I will love my Mother, Father, Teacher and You, O my Lord
 For I know you'll guard and guide me, all through my life, O my Lord
 I tell the truth and do what's right, Lord with peace and love in my heart
 And I know if I love and serve all, I'll win a place in your heart

Title: In the Name of the Lord we sing praises
Lyrics:
In the Name of the Lord we sing praises
 Loving, almighty, and universal
 In the name of the Lord we sing praises (1X)
 Praising all creation and awe and wonder
 Feeling His presence everywhere
 He is truth and joy
 He is peace and love
 
 Sung to the tune of Bhola Naatha Harey Jagadeesha

Title: In the ocean’s rolling waves
Lyrics:
In the ocean's rolling waves
 Hear Him calling to you
 In the golden leaves of fall
 See Him beckoning to you
 Hey Ram (Hey Ram)
 Bhagavaan (Bhagavaan)
 Sathya Sai Bhagavaan, Sai Krishna Bhagavaan
 Can't you hear Him calling to you (1X)
 Can't you see Him beckoning to you (2X)
 Don't you know that He is you (3X)
 When a cool breeze brushes your face
 Feel Him calling to You
 In the sweet smell of fresh rain
 Sense Him beckoning to you
 When tears are in your eyes
 Can't you hear Him crying for you
 When happiness enters your heart
 Can't you hear Him laughing for you

Title: In The Sound Of Silence
Lyrics:
In The Sound Of Silence Is The Voice Of God
In The Laugter Of Children Is The Voice Of God
In The Song Of Prayer Are The Sounds Of God
Listen Well And Hear The Sounds Of God
There Are Those Who See But Not The Signs Of God
See The Work Of Man, Not The Work Of God
Look Around And Recognize The Lord
The Beauty Of Nature Is The Work Of God
There Are Those Who Hear But Not The Voice Of God
Hear The Sounds Of Man, Not The Sounds Of God
Listen Well And Hear The Voice Of God
The Sounds Of Nature Are The Songs Of God
Songglossary: mana

Title: In the stillness of the morning
Lyrics:
In the stillness of the morning, I listen for Your call, Bhagavaan
Your touch upon my shoulder, Your presence in my soul, Sai
But when I turn to greet you, no other do I see, Bhagavaan
For all my endless searching, I am the one I seek, Bhagavaan

Title: Indu Vadana Yadu Nandana
Lyrics:
Indu Vadana Yadu Nandana
Eshwaramba Priya Nandana [ Indu Vadana Yadu ... ]
Mandara Giridhara Hey Madhava
Mangala Charitha Sayeeshwara
Meaning: Chant the divine name of the one who has the face that of the moon and the one who belongs to the Yadu Dynasty. Sayeeshwara is the lovely son of Mother Eshwaramba and the one who has an impeccable history.
Songglossary: charitha, eshwar, giridhar, hey, indu, madhava, manda, mangal, nanda, priya, sayee, vadana, yadu

Title: Induvadanadhara Indradri Priyakara
Lyrics:
Induvadanadhara Indradri Priyakara
Chandrakaladhara Hey Shiva Shankara
Lalita Manohara Laya Pada Mrudukara
Hey Sai Shankara Pranamamyaham
Shiva Sai Shankara Pranamamyaham
Meaning: Shankara has the face that of the Moon, dear to Lord Indra, bears the crescent Moon on His Head. My prostrations are to that Sai Shankara whose feet are soft and has a charming disposition.
Songglossary: chand, hey, indra, induvadana, lalita, laya, manohar, mrudu, paada, pranamamyaham, priya, sai, shankara, shiva

Title: Indweller Of My Heart Oh Lord
Lyrics:
Indweller Of My Heart, Oh Lord, Sai Baba
Redeemer Of Fallen, Salvation Of Trodden [ Indweller Of ... ]
Hallowed Be Thy Name, Glorious Be Thy Fame
Take Me, Oh Lord, Though The Life Into Your Realm
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Lets All Rejoice, Sing Sai Ram
Songglossary: baba, ram, sai

Title: Inochi ni Ikiyou Chichi
Lyrics:
Inochi ni Ikiyou Chichi naru Kami no Naka
 Eiei no Ai to Hikari ni Mitasarete
 Inochi ni Kaerou Omoidashite Goran
 Uchi naru Koe ni Kokoro Yasuragite
 Utyu wa Hitotsu Subete wa Kami nari
 Inochi wa Hitosu Subete wa Kami nari
 Shinri wa Hitosu Subete wa Kami nari
 Kokoro wa Hitosu Subete wa Kami nari
 Subete wa Kami nari (3X)
 Subete wa Kami nari (All)

Title: Into His Presence
Lyrics:
Into His Presence, would I enter now
 For I am surrounded by the Love of God
 Let me be still, and listen to the Truth
 Let every voice but God's be stilled in me
 Let me remember, I am one with God
 Peace to my brother, Who is one with me
 Let me remember, what my purpose is
 Let all the world, be blessed with peace through me

Title: Into Your hands I commit my spirit
Lyrics:
Into Your hands I commit my spirit
 Into Your arms, I command my soul
 For you are my rock, Jehovah provider
 You are my rock, El-Shaddai, my hiding place.

Title: Iraiva Iraiva Iraiva Nee Va
Lyrics:
Iraiva Iraiva Iraiva Nee Va (2X)
 Bhagavaan Bhagavaan Bhagavaan Aa Ja (2X)
 Devuda Devuda Devuda Nadharira (2X)
 O My Lord O My Lord O My Lord Come to Me (2X)

Title: Is there life on this earth, without You
Lyrics:
Is there life on this earth, without You, O my Lord?
 Will man know the meaning of Love, without you, O my Lord?
 Will we walk hand in hand, without You, O my Lord?
 No, my Lord, without You, not without You.
 Will the stars shine in the sky, without You, O my Lord?
 Will the flowers bloom on earth, without You, O my Lord?
 Will the blazing sun be there, without You, O my Lord?
 No, my Lord, without You, not without You.
 Can we reach for the stars, without You, O my Lord?
 Can we realize our dreams, without You, O my Lord?
 Can we see the glory of Life, without You, O my Lord?
 No, my Lord, without You, not without You.
 Will my life be so full, without You, O my Lord?
 Will I know what is bliss, without You, O my Lord?
 Will realize the Lord, without You, O my Lord?
 No, my Lord, without You, not without You.

Title: Isha Manohari Gowri
Lyrics:
Isha Manohari Gowri
Kailasadhipa Ranjani Gowri
Uma Maheshwari Mangala Gowri
Sai Janani Kedara Gowri
Meaning: Mother Gowri enchants and delights Lord Shiva, Lord of Kailas. She is Mother Uma, and Mother Sai of Kedara mountain, who grants auspiciousness.
Songglossary: esha, gowri, janani, kailasa, kedareshwara, maheshwari, mangal, manohar, ranjani, sai, uma

Title: It only takes a little love
Lyrics:
It only takes a little love to warm an aching heart
 To lift a broken spirit, to take another's part
 It only takes a little trust, a stranger to be, friend,
 But oh, it makes a difference in the end.
 It only takes a little love to smile a friendly smile,
 To touch a grieving shoulder, to walk a second mile.
 It only takes a little time, a kindness to extend,
 But oh, it makes a difference in the end.
 He taught us all about it, so many years ago,
 For Love was always with Him wherever He would go.
 He calls us now to follow, to take the time to care
 Through all the gentle loving things we share.
 Because it only takes a little love to calm another's fear,
 To bear another's burden, to weep another's tear.
 It only takes a little word to cheer a lonely friend,
 But oh, it makes a difference in the end.
 O, yes, it makes a world of difference in the end.

Title: It’s in every one of us to be wise
Lyrics:
It's in every one of us to be wise
 Find your heart, open up both your eyes
 We can all know everything without ever asking why
 It's in every one of us by and by
 When your heart is full of love, it's a simple thing to do
 Seek another heart and make it happy too
 Joy we share with others is joy that's multiplied
 It would be a perfect life if no one is left outside
 Love is in every one of us to share with all
 Cut ego out, stand up strong and tall
 We all have so much to give without needing reasons why
 Love's in every one of us, let's all try.

Title: Its A Beautiful Day In Puttaparthi
Lyrics:
Its A Beautiful Day In Puttaparthi
Lovely Day Holy Day Dharshan Day [ Its A ... ]
All Our Prayers Have Been Answered
All Our Fears Go Away
Babas Love Is Flowing Around Us
Thank You Swami For This Day [ Its A ... ]
Every Heart Is Yearning For Dharshan
Every Heart Is Full Of Praise
Babas Love Is Flowing Around Us
He Is Serving Night And Day
Songglossary: go, puttaparthi, swami

Title: Its A Gift To Be Simple
Lyrics:
Its A Gift To Be Simple,Tis A Gift To Be Free
Tis A Gift To Know Ones Own Divinity
And When Our Hearts Are Filled By The Bright Shining Sun
We Will See Gods Light Within Everyone
Songglossary: sun

Title: Its A Happy Day
Lyrics:
Its A Happy Happy Happy Day
Its A Holy Holy Holy Day
Its A Beautiful Beautiful Day
Happy Birthday Sai Baba Happy Birthday Sai Baba
Listen To The Angels Singing In The Sky
Listen To The Ocean Waves Dancing With Joy
Listen To The Birds Singing In The Trees (2)
All Of Them Singing Happy Birthday Dear Swami
Happy Birthday Dear Swami
Songglossary: baba, sai, swami

Title: Its Your Maya Surrounding Me
Lyrics:
Its Your Maya Surrounding Me (2)
Gurudeva Saideva [ Its Your Maya ... ]
Open My Eyes So I May See [ Its Your ... ]
Surrender My Lord, At Your Feet
My Every Single Thought Word And Deed
Lift Your Maya Surrounding Me (2)
Open My Eyes So I May See
My True Identity
Sai, I Am But One With Thee.
Songglossary: gurudev, maya, sai, saideva, so

Title: Itsuka Dokokade Atta Omoi
Lyrics:
Itsuka Dokokade Atta Omoi
 Tooi Kanatano Natsukashii Omoi
 Yasashii Omoini Tsutsumaretatoki
 Ookina Ookina Anatano Aioshiru
 Kamisama Kamisama Kamisama Kitekudasai Kamisama

Title: Jagad Dhrata Vishva Vidhata
Lyrics:
Jagad Dhrata Vishva Vidhata
He Sukha Shanthi Niketana He
Prem Ke Sindho Din Ke Bandho
Dukha Daridra Vinashana He (2) [ Jagad Dhrata Vishva ... ]
Nithya Akhanda Ananta Anadi
Purana Brahma Sanathana He
Prana Sakha (3)
Prana Sakha Tribhuvana Paripalaka
Jeevan Ke Avalambana He (2)
Meaning: OH Lord, You are the support of all living beings and of the entire Universe. You are the abode of peace and comfort. You are an ocean of love and the care-taker of the unfortunate ones. You destroy poverty and sadness. You are eternal and the embodiment of Creation itself.
Songglossary: akhanda, anadi, ananta, avalambana, bandho, brahma, daridra, dhrata, din, dukh, jagat, jeeva, ke, niketana, nithya, paripala, praan, prem, puran, sakha, sanatana, shanthi, sindhu, sukh, tribhuvan, vidhata, vinasha, vishwa

Title: Jagadambe Amba Bhavani
Lyrics:
Jagadambe Amba Bhavani
Jaganmata Mangala Dayini
Jagadishwari Sai Janani
Parameshwari Parti Shivani
Narayani Mangala Karini
Saishwari Sankata Harini
Sarveshwari Sai Janani (2)
Meaning: Mother of the Universe, Amba(Bhavani, Shivani) is Lord Sai of Parthi who dispels sadness and blesses all with good fortune.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, dayini, haarini, jagadamba, jagadeeshwari, jagan, janani, kaarini, mangal, narayani, param, puttaparthi, sai, saiyeeshwara, sankata, sarvesha, shiva

Title: Jagadambe Amba Bhavani
Lyrics:
Jagadambe Amba Bhavani
Jaganmata Mangala Dayini
Jagadeeshwari Sai Janani [ Jagadambe Amba ... ]
Parameshwari Parthi Shivani
Narayani Mangala Karini
Sayeeshwari Sankata Harini
Sarveshwari Sai Janani
Meaning: Amba Bhavani, Parameshwari, Jagadeeshwari, Narayani, Jagadambe, Sarveshwari are the various names of the same Mother who confers Auspiciousness, the One who removes misery is Sai Janani of Parthi.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, dayini, haarini, jagadamba, jagadeeshwari, jagan, janani, kaarini, mangal, narayani, param, puttaparthi, sai, sankata, sarvesha, sayee, shiva

Title: Jagadambe Bhavani Lalitha
Lyrics:
Jagadambe Bhavani Lalitha
Jaya Samba Sadashiva Dvaita [ Jagadambe Bhavani ... ]
Chaturanana Brahma Vanita
Jaya Vishva Priya Shri Mata
Jaya Vishnu Priya Sai Mata
Meaning: Glory to Mother Goddess, the creator and consort of Lord Shiva. The charming Mother Sai is adored by Brahma, Vishnu, and the entire Universe.
Songglossary: bhava, brahma, chaturmukha, dvaita, jagadamba, jay, lalita, mata, priya, sadashiva, sai, samba, sri, vanita, vishnu, vishwa

Title: Jagadambe Devi Bhavani
Lyrics:
Jagadambe Devi Bhavani
Jaganmatey Devi Durge (2) [ Jagadambe ]
Uma Sharadhamba Kalyani Shyamalamba
Janani Durge Sathya Sai Mata
Uma Maheshwari Kalavathi (Amba)
Meaning: Bhavani or Durga is the Goddess and Mother of the entire Universe. Chant the various names of Mother Goddess, Janani, Uma maheshwari, Sharada, Kalyani, Shyamala, Durga and Kalavathi who confer boons to the Devotees.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, devi, durge, gananatha, jagadamba, jagan, janani, kalavathi, kalyan, kumara, maheshwari, mata, sai, sathya, shakthi, shyamalamba, uma

Title: Jagadambige Jaya Jagadishwari
Lyrics:
Jagadambige Jaya Jagadishwari
Taye Parashakthi Parameshwari [ Jagadambige Jaya ... ]
Maye Maha Sayi Maheshwari
Niye Vinai Tirkkum Vishweshwari
Unaye Sharanadainden Karunakari
Arulvaye Ananda Lahari Gowri
Meaning: Glory the names of mother of the Universe: mother of Lord and Ganesh and Subrahmanya, is Uma, Durga, Shakti and the consort of Lord Shiva. Please, mother Sai, grant us as our wishes.
Songglossary: anand, arul, gowri, jagadamba, jagadeeshwari, jay, karuna, lahari, maha, maheshwari, maye, niyallavo, param, parashakthi, sai, sharan, thai, tirkkum, unaye, vinai, vishweshwari

Title: Jagadashraya Sri Raghu Rama
Lyrics:
Jagadashraya Sri Raghu Rama
Jagadodhara Sita Rama [ Jagadashraya Sri ... ]
Parama Pavana Taraka Naama
Sri Rama Shata Koti Pranama
Sai Rama Koti Pranama
Sharanam Sharanam Atma Rama
Meaning: Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, sustainer of the entire Universe. Lord Rama whose consort is Mother Sita has come to uplift the entire world. Reciting Lord's name helps to cross the vicious cycle of birth and death. We surrender ourselves at your Lotus feet with countless prostrations Oh Sai Rama who is the indweller of our Heart.
Songglossary: atma, jagadashraya, jagadodhara, koti, naam, param, pavan, pranamami, raghu, ram, sai, sharan, shata, sita, sri, taraka

Title: Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Ho
Lyrics:
Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Ho
Jagadodhara Jaya Jaya Ho [ Jagadeesha Harey ... ]
Allah Yesu Nanak Sai
Antaryami Buddha Mahavira
Zohrashtra Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
Shanthi Nivasa Sathya Sai Deva (Pra)
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho (2)
Meaning: Victory to Sai the Lord and Redeemer of the Universe. Lord Sathya Sai is the embodiment of Allah, Yesu, Nanak, Buddha, Mahavira, Zohrashtra. Sai is the indweller and embodies Supreme Peace.
Songglossary: allah, antar, buddha, deva, dharma, hari, ho, jagadeesha, jagadodhara, jay, mahavir, nanak, nivasa, priya, sai, sarva, sathya, shanthi, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Jagadeesha Harey Shiva Shambho
Lyrics:
Jagadeesha Harey Shiva Shambho
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho [ Jagadeesha Harey ... ]
Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha
Jaya Shirdeesha Shankara
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Shiva Sai Shambho [ Shiva Shambho ]
Meaning: Shiva is the Sovereign Lord of the Universe, bestows Auspiciousness and the presiding deity at Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: hara, hari, ho, jagadeesha, jay, param, partheeshwara, sai, shambho, shankara, shirdeesha, shiva

Title: Jagadeesha Harey Shiva Shambho
Lyrics:
Jagadeesha Harey Shiva Shambho
Samba Shiva Hara Sai Shiva
Hey Tripurari Bhava Bhaya Haari
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Shambho [ Samba Shiva ]
Meaning: Lord Shiva is the Lord of the Universe, whose consort is Amba, removes the fear of the cycle of Birth and Death. Lord Shiva is the One who destroyed the three cities created by the demons has come down as the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, hara, harana, hari, hey, jagadeesha, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, samba, shambho, shiva, tripura

Title: Jagadeeshwara Paahi Parameshwara Shiva Gangadhari
Lyrics:
Jagadeeshwara Paahi Parameshwara Shiva Gangadhari
Neelakanta Shiva Shambho Murari
Chandramouli Charmambaradhari
Paahi Maam Dehi Maam
Shambho Shankara Parthi Vihari
Meaning: Protect us Oh Sovereign Lord of the Universe. You have Mother Ganges in your matted locks and a deep blue throat. You are the One with the Crescent moon on your head and the skin of the Tiger round your body (which indicates the sublimation of animal qualities), who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: chand, charmambaradhari, dehi, ganga, jagadeesha, maam, murare, neela, paahi, param, puttaparthi, shambho, shankara, shiva, vihar

Title: Jagadeeshwari Daya Karo Ma
Lyrics:
Jagadeeshwari Daya Karo Ma
Shiva Shankari Krupa Karo Ma
Sayeeshwari Raksha Karo Ma
Partheeshwari Bhalaa Karo Ma [ Shiva Shankari ]
Meaning: Mercy on us, O Mother Goddess of the Universe. May Your benedictions be upon us, O Shankari, consort of Lord Shiva. Shower Your blessings and protect us O Sayeeshwari, the Goddess of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhala, daya, jagadeeshwari, karo, krupa, ma, partheeshwari, raksha, sayee, shankari, shiva

Title: Jagadeeshwari Jaya Mata Bhavani
Lyrics:
Jagadeeshwari Jaya Mata Bhavani
Karunya Lavanya Akhilandeshwari [ Jagadeeshwari Jaya ... ]
Hey Shiva Shankari Triloka Palini
Sharanagatha Paripalini Mata
Meaning: Mother Bhavani is the Goddess of the Entire Universe. She sustains the three worlds, compassionate and beautiful. She is the consort of Lord Shiva and takes complete care of the One who has surrendered to Her.
Songglossary: akhila, bhava, hey, jagadeeshwari, jay, karuna, lavanya, mata, palini, paripalini, shankari, sharan, shiva, triloka

Title: Jagadodhara Gangadhara
Lyrics:
Jagadodhara Gangadhara
Jagadodhara Saishwara
Baraso Ham Par Prem Ki Dhara
Sakala Jagat Me Nam Tumhara
Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Sahara
Meaning: Lord of the Universe, Lord Shiva, is Lord Sai. Please, Lord Sai, shower us with Your unceasing flow of love; Your name is known to everyone, and your serve Your devotees.
Songglossary: baraso, bhakthon, dhara, ganga, ham, jagadodhara, jagat, ke, nam, par, prem, sahara, sai, saiyeeshwara, sakala, sathya, tumhara

Title: Jagadodhara Sayeeshwara
Lyrics:
Jagadodhara Sayeeshwara
Baraso Hum Par Prem Ki Dhara
Sakala Jagat Mey Naam Tumhara
Bhakthon Ke Sab Sai Sahara
Meaning: Oh uplifter of the entire world, Shower us with your Love. Oh Lord Sai You are known all over the world, the support and strength of all devotees.
Songglossary: baraso, bhakthon, dhara, hum, jagadodhara, jagat, ke, naam, par, prem, sab, sahara, sai, sakala, sayee, tumhara

Title: Jagadodhara Shyama Gopala
Lyrics:
Jagadodhara Shyama Gopala
Muralilola Hrudaya Vihara [ Jagadodhara ... ]
Jaya Brindavana Madana Gopala
Madana Gopala (2) [ Jaya Brindavana ]
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Gopala
Meaning: Gopala is the Lord of the whole Universe and is the indweller of every Heart. Gopala who is dark in complexion, entices everyone with the flute in His hand and moves about in Brindavan, is presently Sai Gopala residing in Parthi.
Songglossary: brinda, gopal, hrudaya, jagadodhara, jay, madana, murali, partheeshwara, sai, sham, vihar

Title: Jagadodharaka Janaki Rama
Lyrics:
Jagadodharaka Janaki Rama
Paramodhara Pattabhi Rama
Lakshmana Sevitha Lavanya Rama
Rajeeva Nayana Ranjana Rama
Raja Rama Ravikula Soma
Ravana Mardhana Rakshaka Rama
Moksha Pradayaka Mohana Rama
Maruti Poojita Manobhi Rama
Meaning: Lord Rama is the Supreme uplifter of the world, consort of Mother Janaki and the crowned King of Ayodhya. Lord Rama is served by His younger brother Lakshmana, Handsome and lotus eyed. He is the cream of the Solar dynasty who vanquished the evil Ravana. Rama who has a pleasing personality, is worshipped by Maruti, the Guardian of His devotees and grants Liberation.
Songglossary: jagadodhara, janaki, lakshmana, lavanya, manobhi, mardana, maruthi, mohan, moksha, nayan, param, pattabhi, poojita, pradayaka, raja, rajeeva, raksha, ram, ranjana, ravana, ravikula, sevita, soma

Title: Jagadodharini Ma
Lyrics:
Jagadodharini Ma
Vishwa Vilasini Ma
Sthira Sukha Dayini Ma
Durgati Nashini Ma (Hey)
Parthi Pureeshwari Parvathi Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Bhairavi Ma
Sambhavi Ma Gowri Ma
Jaya Parameshwari Jaya Bhuvaneshwari
Jaya Partheeshwari Parvathi Ma
Meaning: Oh Mother you are the nourisher and charmer of the Universe. You are the provider of lasting happiness and destroyer of misfortune. You are known by several names, Parvathi, Bhairavi, Sambhavi, Gowri, Parameshwari and Bhuvaneshwari and presently You are known as Partheeshwari too.
Songglossary: bhairavi, bhava, bhaya, bhuvaneshwari, dayini, durga, gowri, haarini, hey, jagadodhara, jay, ma, param, partheeshwari, parvathi, purishwara, puttaparthi, sambhavi, sthira, sukh, vilasini, vinashana, vishwa

Title: Jagadodharini Mata Durga Jagadodharini Ma
Lyrics:
Jagadodharini Mata Durga Jagadodharini Ma
Jago Jago Ma Jago Jago Ma Jago Jago Ma Janani
Hey Gowri Devi Rana Chandi Devi
Hey Shiva Ramana Jago Ma (2)
Jago Jagadodharini Ma
Meaning: Oh Universal Mother Durga! Awaken us from the slumber of ignorance. You are Mother Gowri and the valiant Chandi devi. Awaken us to the inherent Atmic reality, the charmer of Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: chamundeshwari, devi, durga, gowri, hey, jagadodhara, jago, janani, ma, mata, ramana, rana, shiva

Title: Jagadodharini Mata Narayani Durga
Lyrics:
Jagadodharini Mata Narayani Durga
Durgati Nashini Dukha Vinashini Durga
Jaya Mahishasura Durga
Abhaya Pradayini Shanthi Pradayini Durga
Jaya Durga Devi Durga Mata Durga
Meaning: Salutations to Mother Durga, remover of misfortunes and sorrow, destroyer of the demon Mahishasura. She protects and bestows peace.
Songglossary: abhaya, dayini, devi, dukh, durga, jagadodhara, jay, mahishasura, mata, narayani, shanthi, vinashana

Title: Jagamey Sarvam Vishnu Mayam
Lyrics:
Jagamey Sarvam Vishnu Mayam
Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Mayam (2) [ Jagamey ... ]
Omkara Naada Mayam
Om Shiva Shakthi Mayam
Prema Mayam Sai Naama Mayam
Pranava Kaara Brahma Mayam
Meaning: Lord Vishnu, our sacred preceptor Sathya Sai, is the Supreme Principle from whom the Primordial sound Om originates and pervades the Entire Universe. The Universe is the manifestation of Matter and Energy, of Supreme Love and the name of Sai.
Songglossary: brahma, jagamey, kaara, mayam, naada, naam, om, pranava, prem, sadguru, sai, sarva, sathya, shakthi, shiva, sri, vishnu

Title: Jaganmata Jaganmata
Lyrics:
Jaganmata Jaganmata
Devi Bhavani Hey Sai Mata [ Jaganmata Jaganmata ]
Mata Maheshwari Girija Mata
Parthi Pureeshwari Parama Dayakari
Devi Bhavani Jai Sai Mata
Meaning: The Universal Mother is known by several names as Devi Bhavani, Maheshwari and Girija. She is extremely compassionate Mother Sai who dwells at Parthi.
Songglossary: bhava, dayaka, devi, girija, hey, jagan, jai, maheshwari, mata, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Jaganmatey Jagat Janani
Lyrics:
Jaganmatey Jagat Janani
Jaya Jagadambe Devi Bhavani
Devi Saraswathi Durga Lakshmi
Mahishasura Samhaarini Mata
Meaning: Victory to Goddess Mother who nourishes the entire Universe. You are verily Mother Saraswathi, Durga and Lakshmi and the One who removed demon Mahishasura from the face of the Earth.
Songglossary: bhava, devi, durga, jagadamba, jagan, jagat, janani, jay, lakshmi, mahishasura, mata, samhaarini, saraswathi

Title: Jagat Guru Sadguru Sai Guru
Lyrics:
Jagat Guru Sadguru Sai Guru Deva
Sarva Janashraya Mama Guru Deva [ Jagat Guru ... ]
Sanathana Sarathey Sayeesha Deva
Pranamamyaham Koti Pranamamyaham (2)
Meaning: Our Sacred and Universal Preceptor Sai is adored by everyone. Countless prostrations to Lord Sayeesha the Eternal charioteer.
Songglossary: deva, guru, jagat, janashraya, koti, mama, pranamamyaham, sadguru, sai, sanatana, sarathey, sarva, sayee

Title: Jagat Janani Jagadamba Jagadamba Jagadamba
Lyrics:
Jagat Janani Jagadamba Jagadamba Jagadamba Bhavani
Mahishasura Mardhini Kalyani
Shumbha Nishumbha Prana Haarini [ Jagat Janani ... ]
Sharada Sangeeta Vadini
Nava Durge Nava Roopa Dharini
Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani (2)
Meaning: Amba Bhavani is the Universal Mother who vanquished the demon Mahishasura as well as demons Shumbha and Nishumbha to promote the welfare of the world. Mother Sharada plays sublime notes on Her Veena and Mother Durga assumes nine different forms. Glory to the Divine mother.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, dhari, durge, haarini, jagadamba, jagat, janani, kalyan, mahishasura, mardini, nava, nishumbha, praan, roopa, sangeeta, sharada, shumbha, vadini

Title: Jagat Janani Jagadambe Bhavani
Lyrics:
Jagat Janani Jagadambe Bhavani
Mata Maheshwari Sai Narayani [ Jagat Janani ... ]
Tribhuvana Dharini Shakti Svarupini
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Narayani
Meaning: Mother goddess, Mother of Creation is the supreme Mother Sai. She bestows protection, is the embodiment of the Ultimate energy, and the rules of three words.
Songglossary: abhaya, bhava, dayini, dhari, jagadamba, jagat, janani, maheshwari, mata, narayani, sai, shakthi, swaroopa, tribhuvan

Title: Jagat Janani Ma Ambe Bhavani
Lyrics:
Jagat Janani Ma Ambe Bhavani
Bhava Bhaya Harini Brahma Svarupini [ Jagat Janani ... ]
Jagadambe Ananta Bhaya Harini
Sai Mata Dukha Nivarini
Meaning: Mother Goddess of the Universe, destroyer of the endless fears and sorrows of worldly existence and the embodiment of creation, is Mother Sai.
Songglossary: amba, ananta, bhava, bhaya, brahma, dukh, haarini, jagadamba, jagat, janani, ma, mata, nivarana, sai, swaroopa

Title: Jagat Janani Shiva Sai Shankari
Lyrics:
Jagat Janani Shiva Sai Shankari
Mata Maheshwari Parvathi Ma
Abhaya Pradayini Gaana Vinodini
Mata Bhavani Ma ( Jaya Ma )
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Kaali Kapalini Ma ( Jaya Ma )
Meaning: Glory be to the Mother of the Universe Shankari, Parvathi, Bhavani, the one who confers freedom from fear, delighted by music and the One wearing a garland of skulls.
Songglossary: abhaya, bhava, dayini, gaan, jagat, janani, jay, kaali, kapalini, ma, maheshwari, mata, parvathi, sai, shankari, shiva, vinodini

Title: Jagat Palana Jaganmohana
Lyrics:
Jagat Palana Jaganmohana
Sundara Sai Gopalana
Munijana Sevitha Madhusudhana [ Jagat Palana ... ]
Keshava Govinda Janardhana
Sridhara Madhava Damodara
Achyutha Anantha Narayana
Sri Sai Krishna (Deva) Narayana
Meaning: Sing the various names of the Lord Gopala, Keshava, Govinda, Janardhana, Sridhara, Madhava, Damodara, Achyutha, Anantha, Narayana, Madhusudhana who is the nourisher and captivator of the Universe, the one who is handsome and served by saints, is known as Sai Krishna now.
Songglossary: achyutha, ananta, damodara, deva, gopal, govinda, jagan, jagat, janardhana, kesha, krishna, madhava, madhu, munijana, narayana, paalaya, sai, sevita, sri, sridhara, sundara

Title: Jagata Uddharana Parthi Viharana
Lyrics:
Jagata Uddharana Parthi Viharana
Tum Ho Mangala Dhaam (Prabhu)
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Paapa Vimochana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Sundara Nayanabhi Ram [ (Baba) Tum Ho ]
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are the benefactor of the entire Universe, repository of all virtues. Victory be to You Oh the One with beautiful eyes, destroyer of sins, cycle of birth and death and the one who inhabits Parthi.
Songglossary: baba, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, dhaam, ho, jagat, jai, mangal, nayan, paapa, prabhu, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sundara, tum, uddhara, vihar, vimochana

Title: Jagatpathey Hari Sai Gopala
Lyrics:
Jagatpathey Hari Sai Gopala
Jagadodhara Sai Nandalala
Mathuradhipathey Krishna Gopala
Madhura Madhura Hey Gaana Vilola
Jagadodhara Sai Nandalala
Sai Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala (3)
Meaning: Glory to Gopala, the Lord and sustainer of the whole Universe. Victory to Gopala, the King of Mathura, the patron of sweet music and who is verily Sai.
Songglossary: gaan, gopal, hari, hey, jagadodhara, jagathpathey, jai, krishna, madhura, mathuradhipathey, nandalala, sai, vilola

Title: Jago Jago Giridhari Gopala
Lyrics:
Jago Jago Giridhari Gopala
Jago Jago Hey Gokula Bala
Darshan Deejo Deena Dayala
Prabhu Paramatma Tribhuvana Pala
Sai Narayana Natavara Lala
Meaning: Oh Gopala! Grant us with the vision of your Form. Awaken us from the slumber of Ignorance, the one who held the mountain high, the one who is the Lord of the three worlds, the one who is an absolute pretender who moved about in Gokula and the one who is the refuge of the hapless.
Songglossary: bala, darsh, dayal, deejo, deen, giridhar, gokul, gopal, hey, jago, lal, narayana, natavara, pala, param, prabhu, sai, tribhuvan

Title: Jago Jago Jago Shankara
Lyrics:
Jago Jago Jago Shankara
Jago Jago Jago Sayeeshwara [ Jago Jago ... ]
Haalaahala Dhara Hey Paramesha
Hey Tripurari Jaya Partheesha
Gangadhara Shankara
Gowri Vara Shankara
Hara Gangadhara Shankara
Sayeeshwara Shankara (Sathya)
Meaning: Awake us to the inner reality Oh bestower of Auspiciousness, the supreme Lord who has held the vicious poison in His throat. Shankara is the one who holds the sacred Ganges in His matted locks, consort of Mother Gowri, is the same Sayeeshwara who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: dhara, ganga, gowri, haalaahala, hara, hey, jago, jay, param, partheeshwara, sathya, sayee, shankara, tripura, vara

Title: Jago Jago Ma Shankari Ma
Lyrics:
Jago Jago Ma Shankari Ma
Shankari Ma Abhayankari Ma [ Jago Jago ... ]
Mata Maheshwari Parvathi Ma
Devi Daya Karo Shiva Ramana
Janani Triloka Palini
Jai Jai Bhavani Ma
Meaning: Oh Mother Shankari, wake us up to the reality of the soul, the one who assures total protection. Victory be to you Maheshwari, Bhavani, Janani, the delight of Lord Shiva and sustainer of the three worlds.
Songglossary: abhaya, bhava, daya, devi, jago, jai, janani, karo, ma, maheshwari, mata, palini, parvathi, ramana, shankari, shiva, triloka

Title: Jai Durge Durgati Pariharini
Lyrics:
Jai Durge Durgati Pariharini
Jai Jai Durge Jaya Bhava Bhaya Harini
Jaya Durge Janani Jaya Sai Janani
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Roopini
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani
Meaning: Hail Mother Durga for she absolves the misfortunes of Her devotees, releases one from the birth and death cycle. Victory be to Mother Sai who is the very manifestation of the Cardinal Values of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, dharma, durga, durge, haarini, jai, janani, jay, pariharini, prem, sai, sathya, shanthi, swaroopa

Title: Jai Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya
Lyrics:
Jai Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya
Jai Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya Mangala Murthy Moriya
Siddhi Vinayaka Mangala Daata
Ashta Vinayaka Mangala Dayaka Mangala Murthy Moriya
Sindhura Vadana Pankaja Charana
Sindhura Vadana Pankaja Charana Ganapathi Bappa Moriya
Meaning: Victory be to the leader of troops (Shiva's army), who confers and is also the personification of Auspiciousness. Salutations to the eight different forms of the One without a leader, with the vermillion on His face and Lotus feet.
Songglossary: ashta, bappa, chara, daata, dayaka, gananayaka, ganaraya, jai, mangal, moriya, murthy, pankaja, siddhi, sindhu, sri, vadana, vinayaka

Title: Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesha Deva
Lyrics:
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesha Deva
Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha Deva
[ Jai Ganesh  ]
Bhakthoddharana Bhaktha Jana Poshana
Paapa Vinashana Bhaktha Samrakshana
Omkaara Pranava Sri Roopa
Parvathi Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana
Meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, the lord of Ganas who is ever auspicious, always engaged in uplifting, nourishing, redeeming and protecting devotees. He is the source of the primordial sound, Pranava. He is the darling son of Mother Parvathi and is worshipped by the whole world.

Title: Jai Ganesha Jai Ganesha
Lyrics:
Jai Ganesha Jai Ganesha
Tu Hi Sab Ka Bhagya Vidhata
Tu Hi Riddhi Siddhi Daata
Tera Poojan Prathama Hamesha
Jai Ganesha Jai Ganesha
Meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, who confers prosperity to all and who bestows intelligence. Victory to Lord Ganesha, who is always worshipped first.
Songglossary: bhagya, daata, ganesha, hai, hamesha, jai, ka, pooja, prathama, riddhi, sab, siddhi, tera, tum, vidhata

Title: Jai Ganesha Paahi Maam Sri
Lyrics:
Jai Ganesha Paahi Maam Sri Ganesha Raksha Maam
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesha Raksha Maam
Lambodhara Gowri Sutha Jai Ganesha Paahi Maam
Mangala Kara Sankata Hara Jai Ganesha Raksha Maam [ Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh ]
Meaning: Save me Lord Ganesh, the one with a big belly and the son of Mother Gowri. Protect me O Lord Ganesh, for You destroy the plighted condition of Your devotees and confer prosperity and auspiciousness.
Songglossary: ganesha, gowri, hara, jai, lambodhara, maam, mangalakara, paahi, raksha, sankata, sri, sutha

Title: Jai Ganesha Vighna Vinashaka
Lyrics:
Jai Ganesha Vighna Vinashaka
Dukha Bhanjana Shubha Dayaka
Hey Adi Poojya Gajanana
Gajanana Shubhanana
Lambodhara Paapa Nikhandana
Vighneshwara Bhava Dukha Nashana
Dukha Bhanjana Shubha Dayaka (2)
Meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, the one who removes obstacles, destroyer of sorrows and the one who grants prosperity. The elephant-faced Lord who is offered the first prayers, has a big belly and He roots out our sins.
Songglossary: adi, bhanjana, bhava, dayaka, dukh, gajamukha, ganesha, hey, jai, lambodhara, nasha, nikhandana, paapa, poojya, shubh, vighna, vighnesha, vinasha

Title: Jai Giridhari He Nandalal
Lyrics:
Jai Giridhari He Nandalal
Yashoda Nanda He Nandalal
Radha Pyaara He Nandalal
Nandalal Nandalal
Meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, Radha's love and the darling son of Nanda and Yasoda.
Songglossary: giridhar, jai, nanda, pyaara, radha, yashoda

Title: Jai Hari Bol Jai Sita
Lyrics:
Jai Hari Bol Jai Sita Ram Gopi Gopala Bhajo Radhey Shyam
Harey Ram Ram Ram Ghana Shyam Shyam Shyam
Sri Raghu Nandana Sri Rama Dasharathey Jaya Raghu Rama
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora Brindavana Govinda Lala [ Harey Ram Ram ]
Meaning: Victory to Hari, Gopala, Sita Ram, Radhey Shyam. Lord Rama belongs to the Raghu dynasty and is the dear son of King Dasharatha. Lord Krishna is the dear son of Nanda, He is the One who stole butter from houses of Gopis and moved about amongst the thick bushes of Brindavan.
Songglossary: bhaja, bol, brinda, chora, dasha, ghana, gopal, gopi, govinda, hari, jai, jay, kishora, lal, nanda, navaneetha, radha, raghu, ram, sham, sita, sri

Title: Jai Hari Krishna Jai Hari
Lyrics:
Jai Hari Krishna Jai Hari Krishna Govardhana Giridhari
Radha Mohana Radha Jeevana
Manjula Kunja Vihari
Meaning: Praises be to the Lord Krishna who raised the Govardhana Hill on His little finger, consort and the very life of Radha, who moved about in the beautiful thickly grown bushes of Brindavan.
Songglossary: giridhar, govardhan, hari, jai, jeeva, krishna, kunja, manjula, mohan, radha, vihar

Title: Jai Hari Vittala Sai Sri
Lyrics:
Jai Hari Vittala Sai Sri Hari Vittala
Govinda Gopala Radhey Jai Hari Vittala
Baba Vittala Parthi Sai Vittala [ Govinda Gopala ]
Savari Vittala Sathya Sai Vittala [ Govinda Gopala ]
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Vittala, Hari, Govinda, Radhey, Gopala who is none else than our dear Sathya Sai Vittala.
Songglossary: baba, gopal, govinda, hari, jai, puttaparthi, radha, sai, sathya, savari, sri, vittala

Title: Jai Jagadeesha Harey Prabhuvara
Lyrics:
Jai Jagadeesha Harey Prabhuvara
Hara Hara Shambho Jagadeka Vibho [ Jai Jagadeesha ... ]
Chandrashekara Kailasadhipathey
Bhaava Gochara Bhavani Shankara
Meaning: Sing the Glory of the Sovereign Lord of the Universe, Shiva, One of Benevolence. Shankara bears the crescent moon on His head, is the Lord of Mount Kailasa, imperceptible to the senses and the consort of Mother Bhavani.
Songglossary: bhaav, bhava, chand, gochara, hara, hari, jagadeesha, jagadeka, jai, kailasa, prabhu, shambho, shankara, vibho

Title: Jai Jai Bhavani Durga Mangala
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Bhavani Durga Mangala Pradayini
Bhakthi Mukti Dayini Phanindra Mani Bhooshani [ Jai Jai ]
Kaali Mahakaali Jai Jai Shiva Shakthi Jai (2)
Meaning: Glory be to Mother Bhavani, bestower of Auspiciousness, Devotion and Liberation, adorned with precious Gems. Victory to the One who is personification of Shiva and Shakthi and Mahakaali.
Songglossary: bhakthi, bhava, bhooshan, dayini, durga, jai, kaali, mangal, mani, mukti, phani, shakthi, shiva

Title: Jai Jai Bhavani Ma Ambe
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Bhavani Ma Ambe Bhavani Ma
Ambe Bhavani Ma Sai Bhavani Ma [ Jai Jai Bhavani ... ]
Shirdi Bhavani Ma Parthi Nivasi Ma
Hrudaya Nivasi Ma Ambe ( Sai ) Bhavani Ma
Meaning: Victory to Mother Ambe Bhavani, the indweller of the Heart, who dwells in Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, hrudaya, jai, ma, nivasi, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi

Title: Jai Jai Durge Jai Bhavani
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Durge Jai Bhavani
Sambhavi Shankari Jai Bhavani
Jaya Jagadambe Jaya Mangalyey [ Sambhavi ]
Jaya Jagat Janani Maha Kaalikey [ Sambhavi ]
Meaning: Praises be to Mother and Goddess Durga, Bhavani, the origin of Auspiciousness, consort of Shankara and who is also adored as Maha Kaali.
Songglossary: bhava, durge, jagadamba, jagat, jai, janani, jay, kaali, maha, mangal, sambhavi, shankari

Title: Jai Jai Gopala
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Gopala
Sai Gopala Radhey Gopala [ Jai Jai ... ]
Hey Nandalala Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Brindavana Sanchara [ Sai Gopala ... ]
Meaning: Victory to Gopala whose consort is Radha, son of Nanda, endearing to the Gopis and who moved about in Brindavan.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, gokul, gopal, gopi, hey, jai, lola, nanda, radha, sai, sanchara

Title: Jai Jai Guru Deva Sri
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Guru Deva Sri Sai Mahadeva (3)
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Sai Mahadeva
Mata Pitha Guru Deva Sri Sai Mahadeva
Meaning: Glory to the revered preceptor Mahadeva, who is the embodiment of Mother, Father, Preceptor and the Trinity Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara.
Songglossary: brahma, deva, guru, jai, mahadev, maheshwara, mata, pitha, sai, sri, vishnu

Title: Jai Jai Hanuman Jaya Hanuman
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Hanuman Jaya Hanuman (2)
Maruti Raya Jaya Hanuman
Mahanubhava Jaya Hanuman
Vayu Kumara Jaya Hanuman
Vanara Veera Jaya Hanuman
Anjana Putra Jaya Hanuman
Ati Balavanta Jaya Hanuman
Sri Rama (Bhaktha) Dootha Jaya Hanuman
Meaning: Victory to Hanuman the son of Maruti and Anjana devi, the One who has the authority and wisdom. Hanuman is one of extraordinary strength, monkey warrior, messenger and devotee of Sri Rama.
Songglossary: anjana, ati, balavanta, bhaktha, doota, hanuman, jai, jay, kumara, mahanubhava, maruthi, putra, raja, ram, sri, vanara, vayu, veera

Title: Jai Jai Jai Devi Jagadamba
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Devi Jagadamba
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini [ Jai Jai ... ]
Gnana Shakthi Vignanamayi
Premamayi Kalyanamayi
Shubha Dey Mata Devi Jagadamba
Meaning: Glory be to Universal Mother, destroyer of sorrows and promoter of the well being of her devotees. Confer your grace upon us Oh Mother the personification of Integrated awareness, Supreme wisdom, Supreme Love and Auspiciousness.
Songglossary: devi, dey, gnana, haarini, jagadamba, jai, kaarini, kalyan, mangal, mata, premamayi, sankata, shakthi, shubh, vignanamayi

Title: Jai Jai Jai Devi Jagadamba
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Devi Jagadamba
Simha Vahini Sayeeshwari Amba [ Jai Jai ... ]
Sheetalambike Devi Parashakthi
Srikari Shankari Tripura Sundari Amba Jai
Kanchi Kamakshi Madura Meenakshi Kashi Vishalakshi Karuna Katakshi
Parthi Pureeshwari Parama Dayakari Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi (3)
Sharanam Sharanam Sharanam Jagadamba
Meaning: Sing the Glory of the Universal Mother, whose vehicle is Lion, the Energy Principle, causing Auspiciousness, the consort of Shankara and the most beautiful of all the three worlds. Oh Mother you dwell at Kanchi as Kamakshi, as Meenakshi in Madura and as Vishalakshi in Kashi. Your Eyes Oh Mother are full of compassion. We offer ourselves at your feet for You are verily Saraswathi (Knowledge), Wealth (Lakshmi) and Supreme Energy (Durga)
Songglossary: amba, dayaka, devi, durga, jagadamba, jai, kamakshi, kanchi, karuna, kashi, kataksha, lakshmi, madura, meena, param, parashakthi, purishwara, puttaparthi, saraswathi, sayee, shankari, sharan, sheetala, simha, soundari, srikari, tripura, vahini, vishala

Title: Jai Jai Jai Gananayaka Jai
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Gananayaka Jai Jai Vighna Vinashaka
Jaya Shubha Mangala Dayaka Vidya Buddhi Pradayaka
Gajavadana Gowri Nandana (2)
Gangadhara Shiva Shambho Nandana
Meaning: Let us sing the Glory of the leader of Ganaas (Shiva's army) and the destroyer of all obstacles in the path of spiritual practices. Sing the Glory of the bestower of all that is auspicious, Intelligence and Knowledge. The Elephant headed Lord is the son of Gowri and Shiva otherwise known as Gangadhara.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gajamukha, gananayaka, ganga, gowri, jai, jay, mangal, nanda, pradayaka, shambho, shiva, shubh, vidya, vighna, vinasha

Title: Jai Jai Jai Hey Gajanana
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Hey Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana [ Jai Jai ... ]
Neelakanta Sutha Gajanana
Nithya Shubhanga Gajanana
Meaning: The Elephant faced Lord is the son of Parvathi and the Blue throated Shiva and confers Grace on His devotees continuously.
Songglossary: gajamukha, hey, jai, nanda, neela, nithya, parvathi, shubh, sutha

Title: Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi Deva (3)
Mata Parvathi Pitha Mahadeva (2) [ Jai Jai ... ]
Gajanana Gajanana
Gajanana Hey Ganapathi Deva
Meaning: Glory to the Elephant faced Lord of Ganaas (Shiva's tribe) whose Mother is Parvathi and Father Mahadeva.
Songglossary: deva, gajamukha, gananayaka, hey, jai, mahadev, mata, parvathi, pitha

Title: Jai Jai Jai Mana Mohana
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Mana Mohana Jai Jai Jai Madhusudhana
Madhava Keshava
Gopala Gopalana
Meaning: Sing the various names of the Lord Gopala, Mana Mohana, Madhusudhana, Madhava and Keshava.
Songglossary: gopal, jai, kesha, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan

Title: Jai Jai Jai Narayana
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana [ Jai Jai ... ]
Mukunda Madhava Narayana
Sri Krishna Govinda Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Meaning: Lord Narayana has incarnated as Krishna and is known by various names such as Govinda, Gopala, Mukunda, Madhava and Sai.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jai, krishna, madhava, mukunda, narayana, sai, sri

Title: Jai Jai Jai Vijayee Bhava
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Vijayee Bhava
Jai Jai Jai Partheeshwara
Jaya Jaya Shiva Shaktheeshwara
Jai Jai Jai Vaidheeshwara
Jaya Jaya Haalaahala Dhara
Jai Jai Jai Vijayee Bhava (3)
Vijayee Bhava
Meaning: Victory to the Lord of Parthi, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi, to the One who holds poison in His throat (symbol of sacrifice), is also known as Vaidheeswara.
Songglossary: bhava, dhara, haalaahala, jai, jay, partheeshwara, shaktheeshwara, shiva, Vaidheeshwara, vijayee

Title: Jai Jai Jai Yadu Vamshadulari
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Yadu Vamshadulari
Leela Lalita Manohara Pyaari [ Jai Jai ]
Bhuvana Mohana Prabhu Sant Sahayaka
Gaavata Veda Puran Pukari
Nanda Ke Lal Yashoda Ke Bal
Gopi Gopal Bala Jaya Vraja Lal
Meaning: Sing in Praise of dear one of Yadu lineage, whose acrobats are lovely and enticing. Saints and Sages have sung in adoration of the Lord, who is the dear child of Nanda and Yashoda and the one whose name is chanted by the pundits who chant the Vedas and scriptures.
Songglossary: bala, bhuvana, gaavata, gopal, gopi, jai, jay, ke, lal, lalita, leela, manohar, mohan, nanda, prabhu, pukar, puran, pyaara, sahayaka, sant, vamsha, veda, vraja, yadu, yashoda

Title: Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Parthi Nivasini
Tribhuvana Sundari Alakh Niranjani
Jai Jai Janani Jai Shiva Ranjani
Sundari Guna Manjari Karunakari Gowri
Meaning: Glory be to the Mother who is most beautiful in all the three worlds, blemishless and who is a cause of delight to Shiva. Mother Gowri is ever compassionate and the storehouse of sacred attributes.
Songglossary: alakh, gowri, guna, jai, janani, karuna, manjari, niranjan, nivasi, puttaparthi, ranjani, sai, shiva, soundari, tribhuvan

Title: Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Ambe Bhavani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Sai Bhavani Ma (Sathya)
Simha Vahini Trishoola Dharini Ambe Bhavani Ma
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Parthi Nivasini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma [ Sai Bhavani ]
Meaning: Hail the Mother Amba Bhavani who has the Lion as Her vehicle, who holds the Trident in Her hands is the Sathya Sai Bhavani who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, dhari, jai, janani, jay, ma, nivasi, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, simha, trishoola, vahini

Title: Jai Jai Prabhu Giridhari Natavara
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Prabhu Giridhari Natavara Nandalala
Natavara Nandalala Hey Giridhara Gopala (Hey)
Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Meaning: Sing in praise of Gopala, the One who had lifted the mountain to save His tribesmen, the absolutely playful son of Nanda.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, hey, jai, nanda, natavara, prabhu

Title: Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari (2)
Jai Jai Ram Sai Hari [ Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai. ]
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Rama, Krishna, Hari and Sai repeatedly. Victory be to them.
Songglossary: hari, jai, krishna, ram, sai

Title: Jai Jai Rama Krishna Hari
Lyrics: Jai Jai Rama Krishna Hari (7 Times)
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Rama, Krishna and Hari incessantly.
Songglossary: hari, jai, krishna, ram

Title: Jai Jai Sai Ma Jaya
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Sai Ma Jaya Sai Saraswathi Ma
Veena Vadini Ma Vidya Daayini Ma [ Jai Jai ... ]
Mukti Pradayini Ma Shakthi Pradayini Ma [ Veena Vadini ]
Meaning: Mother Sai is Mother Saraswathi Herself, the One who bestows Knowledge and the One who plays on the Veena (stringed instrument). Mother Saraswathi gives strength and grants Liberation.
Songglossary: dayini, jai, jay, ma, mukti, sai, saraswathi, shakthi, vadini, veena, vidya

Title: Jai Jai Sri Ram Sai
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Sri Ram Sai Harey Ram
Jai Jai Sri Ram Neela Gagana Shyam [ Jai Jai ]
Raghu Nandana Bhava Bhanjana Jai Jai Sri Ram
Rajeeva Dala Lochana Jai Jai Sri Ram
Raghuveera Ranadheera Jai Jai Sri Ram
Parthi Puri Raghava Jai Jai Sai Ram
Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama who has Lotus eyes, the one who has the complexion of thick blue clouds, the one who belongs to the Raghu clan and destroys the miseries of devotees. Lord Rama is valiant warrior on the battlefield, is presently Sai Ram residing at Parthi.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, dala, gagan, hari, jai, lochana, nanda, neela, puri, puttaparthi, raghava, raghu, rajeeva, ram, ranadheera, sai, sham, sri

Title: Jai Jai Vaishnavi Devi
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Vaishnavi Devi Ma Jai Jai Vaishnavi Devi Ma
Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Sai Ma
Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma Sai Ma
Sheravali Ma, Jyota Vali Ma
Pahadavali Ma, Jai Jaga Janani Sai Ma
[Jai Ma ... ]
Meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, Mother Goddess and Mother of the Universe.
Songglossary: devi, jagat, jai, janani, jyoth, ma, pahadavali, sai, sheravali, vaishnavi, vali

Title: Jai Jai Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Lyrics:
Jai Jai Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Pundarika Varada Panduranga Vittala
Jai Jai Vittala Panduranga Vittala [ Pundarika ]
Meaning: Sing in Praise of Lord Vittala, standing on a brick. Glory be to Panduranga Vittala who blessed His devotee Pundarika.
Songglossary: jai, pandu, pundarika, varada, vittala

Title: Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai
Lyrics: Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Sai Ma [ Jai Jai Ma ... ]
Meaning: Glory be to Mother Vaishnov Devi and Victory be to Her, the One of dazzling Light, who has Lion as Her Vehicle. Victory to Her who dwells among the mountain ranges and who is the Mother of the Entire Universe.
Songglossary: jai, ma, sai

Title: Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai
Lyrics:
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram (Bolo) (2)
Anatha Rakshaka Sai Ram
Apad Bandhava Sai Ram
Prema Swaroopa Sai Ram
Premavatara Sai Ram
Poornavatara Sai Ram
Meaning: Sing the Glories of Sai Ram who protects those who have nobody to turn to and who is a real friend in times of trouble. Sai Ram is the very personification and Incarnation of Supreme Love.
Songglossary: anath, apad, bandha, bolo, jai, poornavatara, prem, premavatara, raksha, ram, sai, swaroopa

Title: Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai
Lyrics:
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Premavatara Sai Avatara [ Jai Sai Ram ... ]
Ramavatara Sai Raghurama
Krishnavatara Sai Ghana Shyama
Shivavatara Sai Shiva Naama
Sarvavatara Sathya Sai Rama
Meaning: Lord Sathya Sai is the Incarnation of Supreme Love and Manifestation of all Faiths. He was the One who had earlier Incarnated as Lord Rama, descendant of Raghu dynasty and the dark complexioned Krishna and as Shiva during the Earlier eras.
Songglossary: avatar, ghana, jai, krishna, naam, premavatara, raghu, ram, ramavatara, sai, sarva, sathya, sham, shiva

Title: Jai Santoshi Ma Jai Jai
Lyrics:
Jai Santoshi Ma Jai Jai Sai Ma (3)
Mangala Karini Ma Sai Sankata Harini Ma
Triloka Palini Ma Sai Trishoola Dharini Ma
Meaning: Glory be to Mother Santoshi, who removes misfortune of Her devotees and promotes their welfare. She holds the mighty Trident in Her hand and sustains the three worlds.
Songglossary: dhari, haarini, jai, kaarini, ma, mangal, palini, sai, sankata, santoshi, triloka, trishoola

Title: Janaki Jeevana Raghava
Lyrics:
Janaki Jeevana Raghava
Radhika Jeevana Keshava
Treta Yugadhi Sita Apaharanadhi
Ravana Mardhana Raghava
Dwaparadhi Hari Dharmapaksha Prati
Kaurava Nashana Keshava O Leela Madhava Keshava
Meaning: Lord Raghava is the life force of Mother Janaki, vanquished Ravana who abducted Mother Sita during the Treta Era. Lord Keshava is the life force of Radhika, rooted out the Kaurava race and installed Righteousness during the Dwapara Era.
Songglossary: apaharanadhi, dharma, dwapara, hari, janaki, jeeva, kaurava, kesha, leela, madhava, mardana, nasha, prati, radhika, raghava, ravana, sita, treta, yugadhi

Title: Janaki Jeevana Rama Raghuvara
Lyrics:
Janaki Jeevana Rama Raghuvara
Jaya Bhuvaneshwara Raghava Sundara [ Janaki Jeevana ]
Ravikula Mandana Asurani Khandana
Alakh Niranjan Rama [ Jaya Bhuvaneshwara.. ]
Meaning: Lord Rama belongs to the Raghu clan, who is the heart throb of Mother Janaki, who is the Lord of the Earth and ever Handsome. Rama who is the descendant of the Solar dynasty, rooted out the demonic forces to protect the devotees.
Songglossary: alakh, asura, bhuvaneshwara, janaki, jay, jeeva, khandana, manda, niranjan, raghava, raghu, ram, ravikula, sundara

Title: Janani Jagat Janani
Lyrics:
Janani Jagat Janani
Jaya Matangi Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Vani Veena Paani
Jaya Sayeeshwari Jagadeeshwari
Meaning: The Mother of Lord who has the face as that of an Elephant, is the Mother of the Universe too. She is Vani who holds the Veena (stringed instrument) and Sayeeshwari.
Songglossary: jagadeeshwari, jagat, janani, jay, matangi, paani, sayee, vani, veena

Title: Janani Jagat Janani
Lyrics:
Janani Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Janani
Jagadodharini Sai Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Bharati Ma
Janani Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Janani
Jagat Janani
Meaning: Praises be to Mother of the Universe. Mother Sai sustains and nourishes the Universe, removes the fear of successive births.
Songglossary: bharati, bhava, bhaya, haarini, jagadodhara, jagat, janani, jay, ma, sai

Title: Janani Janani Janani
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Sayeeshwari
Jaya Jagat Janani Sarveshwari
Veena Pusthaka Dharini Janani
Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhani
Omkara Roopini Hreemkara Roopini
Sreemkara Roopini Janani
Omkara Roopini Janani
Janani Janani Janani
Meaning: Sayeeshwari is Goddess of Learning who holds the Veena (stringed instrument) and the books. She is worshipped as he Goddess of wealth and beloved of Lord Madhusudhana and the Goddess of Energy principle. She is also the embodiment of Omkara, Hreemkara and Sreemkara aspects of the Primordial sound Om.
Songglossary: dhari, hey, hreemkara, jagat, janani, jay, madhu, om, pusthaka, sarvesha, sayee, sreemkara, swaroopa, veena

Title: Janani Janani Ma Shankari Durgati
Lyrics:
Janani Janani Ma Shankari Durgati Nashini Ma
Mata Uma Sai Ma
Janani Janani Ma
Dashabhujadharini Bhairavi Ma
Paapa Vinashini Parvathi Ma
Jaya Bhuvaneshwari Jaya Partheeshwari
Jagadodharini Ma
Meaning: Extol the Glories of Mother Uma, the origin of Auspiciousness and destroyer of misfortune. She is known as Bhairavi, when she bears ten Hands, negates the effects of sin and the Mother of Humanity, who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: bhairavi, bhuvaneshwari, dasha, durga, jagadodhara, janani, jay, ma, mata, paapa, partheeshwari, parvathi, sai, shankari, uma, vinashana

Title: Janani Janani Sathya Sai Shubha
Lyrics:
Janani Janani Sathya Sai Shubha Janani
Jagat Karini Paripoorani Sayeeshwari Janani
Sathya Swaroopini Janani
Dharma Samvardhini Janani
Shantha Swaroopini Janani
Prema Pradayini Janani ( Sai )
Meaning: Let us Sing the glory of Mother Sathya Sai, who is Perfect by Herself and the originator of the Universe, also known as Sayeeshwari. She is the Originator of all the Cardinal Values of human beings.
Songglossary: dayini, dharma, jagat, janani, kaarini, paripoorani, prem, sai, samvardhini, sathya, sayee, shantha, shubh, swaroopa

Title: Janani Krupa Karo Ambe
Lyrics:
Janani Krupa Karo Ambe
Sai Janani Jaya Jagadambe
Janani Janani Janani Janani [ Janani Krupa ... ]
Mata Maheshwari Mangala Karini Ambe
Mangala Karini Tripureshwari Jagadambe
Abhaya Dayini Amrutha Bhaashini Ambe
Sai Janani Jaya Jagadambe [ Janani Janani ]
Meaning: Shower your choicest blessings on us Oh Mother Amba. You are the Sovereign Mother of the three worlds, who blesses all with good fortune. Oh Mother Sai you are the One of nectarine words and grants freedom from fear.
Songglossary: abhaya, amba, amrutha, bhaashi, dayini, jagadamba, janani, jay, kaarini, karo, krupa, maheshwari, mangal, mata, sai, tripureshwari

Title: Janani Ma Sai Janani Ma
Lyrics:
Janani Ma Sai Janani Ma (3)
Prema Vahini Ma Gnana Vahini Ma
Dharma Vahini Ma Dhyana Vahini Ma
Prashanthi Vahini Chira Sukha Dayini
Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
Meaning: Oh Mother Sai, You are verily the free flowing rivers of Love, Wisdom, Righteousness, Meditation and Supreme Peace reaching out to the far corners of the world and conferring long lasting Happiness on Everyone. Glory to you.
Songglossary: chira, dayini, dharma, dhyaan, gnana, janani, jay, ma, prashanthi, prem, sai, sukh, vahini

Title: Janani Sai Devi Dayamayi
Lyrics:
Janani Sai Devi Dayamayi
Janani Ma Krupalini Ma
Tum Ho Prema Swaroopini Ma
Daya Karo Sathya Sai Ma
Janani Prema Dayini Ma
Meaning: Oh Mother Sathya Sai You are the One of compassion and personification of Love. Shower your Grace on us.
Songglossary: daya, dayamayi, dayini, devi, ho, janani, karo, krupa, ma, prem, sai, sathya, swaroopa, tum

Title: Janardhana Jagannatha
Lyrics:
Janardhana Jagannatha
Jaya Jaya Deva Jagadeesha
Sadguru Brahma Sanathana
Sadashiva Sai Narayana
Meaning: Victory to the Lord of the Universe and loved by people. You are our sacred Preceptor who is Eternal. You are Shiva as well as Narayana.
Songglossary: brahma, deva, jagadeesha, jagan, janardhana, jay, narayana, sadashiva, sadguru, sai, sanatana

Title: Janardhana Nanda Bala Govinda Gopala
Lyrics:
Janardhana Nanda Bala Govinda Gopala
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna
Krishna ( Sai ) Krishna Gopala
Meaning: Chant the Names of the Lord Govinda, Gopala, Krishna and Sai. You are the son of Nanda and the One who induces people to do good actions.
Songglossary: bala, gopal, govinda, hari, janardhana, krishna, nanda, sai

Title: Jaya Ambe Jaya Ambe
Lyrics:
Jaya Ambe Jaya Ambe
Jaya Jaya Ma Jagadambe ( Jaya Ambe ... )
Adi Shakti Ma Jagadambe
Sai Bhavani Jagadambe
Mata Pitha Guru Jagadambe ( Jaya Jaya ... )
Meaning: Hail! Mother Goddess, the primal force who is Sai, mother, father, teacher and Mother of the Universe.
Songglossary: adi, amba, bhava, guru, jagadamba, jay, ma, mata, pitha, sai, shakthi

Title: Jaya Bajrang Jaya Balabheem Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Bajrang Jaya Balabheem Jaya Hanuman Jaya Bolo (2)
Jaya Bajrang Jai Jai Jaya Balabheem Jai Jai Jaya Hanuman Jaya Bolo (2)
Meaning: Sing the Praises of Bajrang, Balabheem and Hanuman. Victory be to them.
Songglossary: bajrang, balabheem, bolo, hanuman, jai, jay

Title: Jaya Bhagavad Gite Maathey
Lyrics:
Jaya Bhagavad Gite Maathey
Jaya Jaya Gite Jaya Vyasa Jate
Jaya Jaya Iha Para Kalyana Date
Tattvignane Shanthi Nidhare
Bhava Bhaya Harini Sarva Guna Gaane ( Jaya Bhagavad ... )
Mukti Dayini Shakti Karini
Bhakthi Prachodini Janani Janani ( Jaya Bhagavad ... )
Asha Maha Svartha Samharini
Dasa Keshava Nuta Hrdaya Viharini
Meaning: Glory to Mother Bhagavad-Gita documented by sage Vyasa. Gita, whose true nature is peace and truth, bestows good luck and fortune in this, and the next life; She is full of good qualities, removes fears, grants strength and liberation, destroys desires of the senses and ego, and extols the Lord, the indweller.
Songglossary: asha, bhagavad, bhakthi, bhava, bhaya, dasa, dayini, gite, guna, haarini, hrudaya, iha, janani, jay, kaarini, kalyan, kesha, maha, matha, mukti, para, samhari, sarva, shakthi, shanthi, svartha, vihar, vyasa

Title: Jaya Bolo Jaya Nandalala
Lyrics:
Jaya Bolo Jaya Nandalala
Jaya Bolo Jaya Murali Gopala [ Jaya Bolo ... ]
Nanda Kishora Shyama Gopala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Dwarakanatha Deena Dayala
Meaning: Victory to the son of Nanda, the one who plays the Flute, the one who is dark complexioned, the one who is the Lord of Dwaraka, the one who encourages saints and sages and source of succor to the helpless.
Songglossary: bolo, dayal, deen, dwaraka, gopal, jay, kishora, lola, munijana, murali, nanda, pala, sham

Title: Jaya Deva Jaya Deva Jai
Lyrics:
Jaya Deva Jaya Deva Jai Jai Ganapathi Deva
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Siddhi Kara Deva ( Jaya Deva ... )
Girija Nandana Bala Gajanana
Jaya Lambodhara Mooshika  Vahana
Vighna Vinashaka Deva
Meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the leader of "Ganas"(volunteers of Lord Shiva), who gives knowledge, promotes intellect, and bestows success. Salutations to the young son of Mother Parvathi.
Songglossary: bala, buddhi, dayaka, deva, gajamukha, gananayaka, girija, jai, jay, kara, lambodhara, mooshika, nanda, pradayaka, siddhi, vahana, vidya, vighna, vinasha

Title: Jaya Deva Jaya Deva Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Deva Jaya Deva Jaya Guru Deva
Jaya Sai Deva
Satchidananda Sai Guru Deva
Parabrahma Paramananda
Guru Nanak Guru Govinda
Atma Swaroopa Sai Guru Deva
Meaning: Sing praises of the Sacred preceptor, who is the Embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss, who was born as Guru Nanak and personification of the Higher Self.
Songglossary: atma, deva, govinda, guru, jay, nanak, parabrahma, param, sai, satchidananda, swaroopa

Title: Jaya Devi Deena Dayamayi
Lyrics:
Jaya Devi Deena Dayamayi
Jagat Janani Durga Bhavani [ Jaya Devi ... ]
Jai Jai Sai Sangeeta Vinodini
Janani (San)Geeta Vinodini [ Jai Jai Sai Sangeeta ]
Jaya Partheeshwari Jaya Bhuvaneshwari
Meaning: Glory to Durga Bhavani who is the Mother of the Universe, compassionate towards the needy. Glory be to Mother Partheeshwari who is the Sovereign Mother who revels in soulful and classical Music.
Songglossary: bhava, bhuvaneshwari, dayamayi, deen, devi, durga, jagat, jai, janani, jay, partheeshwari, sai, sangeeta, vinodini

Title: Jaya Devi Durge Gowri Shankari
Lyrics:
Jaya Devi Durge Gowri Shankari Parvathi
Bhuvana Mohini Lalitha Lakshmi Kalavathi [ Jaya Devi ... ]
Kamala Kamini Hari Narayani Bhagawathi
Veda Mata Vidya Dayini Bharati
Hamsa Vahini Veena Paani Saraswathi
Meaning: Mother Gowri is also known as Shankari and Parvathi and Bhagawathi. She is Lakshmi the Goddess of wealth, also known as Kamala and Narayani. She is also Mother Saraswathi the Goddess of Knowledge and Mother of Vedas too. She holds the Veena and has the Swan as her Vehicle, is also known as Bharati.
Songglossary: bhagavathi, bharati, bhuvana, dayini, devi, durge, gowri, hamsa, hari, jay, kalavathi, kamala, kamini, lakshmi, lalita, mata, mohan, narayani, paani, parvathi, saraswathi, shankari, vahini, veda, veena, vidya

Title: Jaya Gajavadana Gananatha
Lyrics:
Jaya Gajavadana Gananatha
Parvathi Nandana Gananatha
Pashupathi Nandana Gananatha ( Jaya Gajavadana ... )
Vighneshwara He Gana Nayaka
Dukha Hara He Shubhadayaka
Lambodhara He Phala Dayaka
Jaya Prasanthi Vasa Shubha Charana
Meaning: Victory to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, son of Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvathi. The pot bellied Lord removes obstacles and grief and grants one's wishes and gives bliss. Taking refuge at His holy feet confers good luck.
Songglossary: chara, dayaka, dukh, gajamukha, gana, gananatha, hara, jay, lambodhara, nanda, nayaka, parvathi, pashu, phala, prasanthi, shubh, vasa, vighnesha

Title: Jaya Gananayaka Bala Gajanana
Lyrics:
Jaya Gananayaka Bala Gajanana
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Gajanana [ Jaya Gananayaka ... ]
Prathama Poojya Sri Natha Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Hey Shubhanana
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Paahi Gajanana
Meaning: Protect us Oh Lord Gajanana, the son of Lord Shiva. Riding on the Mouse, you are the auspicious one whom the Universe worships and you have been worshipped for eons.
Songglossary: bala, gajamukha, gananayaka, hey, jay, mooshika, nanda, natha, paahi, poojya, prathama, shiva, shubh, sri, vahana, vanditha, yuga

Title: Jaya Ganesha Gajanana Daya Nidhey
Lyrics:
Jaya Ganesha Gajanana Daya Nidhey
Mangala Dayaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Lambodhara Gajavadana Manohara
Parvathi Nandana Siddhi Vinayaka
Meaning: Victory to the Elephant faced Lord, compassion personified, who grants auspiciousness and Occult powers. Lord Ganesha has an enormous belly, son of Parvathi and is also known as Vinayaka (the remover of obstacles).
Songglossary: daya, dayaka, gajamukha, ganesha, jay, lambodhara, mangal, manohar, nanda, nidhey, parvathi, siddhi, vinayaka

Title: Jaya Ganesha Jaya Mangala Daata
Lyrics:
Jaya Ganesha Jaya Mangala Daata
Vande Saraswathi Sai Mata [ Jaya Ganesha ]
Mooshika Vahana Sri Gananatha
Vighna Vinashaka Bhagya Vidhata
Vande Saraswathi Sai Mata
Meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha who confers prosperity and welfare, the one who has a Mouse as His Vehicle, the one who is the leader of Shiva's army of Ganaas and destroys impediments. Salutations to Mother Saraswathi.
Songglossary: bhagya, daata, gananatha, ganesha, jay, mangal, mata, mooshika, sai, saraswathi, sri, vahana, vande, vidhata, vighna, vinasha

Title: Jaya Gopala Jaya Gopala
Lyrics:
Jaya Gopala Jaya Gopala
Jaya Radhey Govinda Gopala [ Jaya Gopala ... ]
Chinmayananda Hey Sai Gopala
Nithyananda Roopa Sai Gopala [ Jaya Radhey ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, the consort of Radha and Sai Gopala who is ever in the Bliss of Pure Consciousness.
Songglossary: chinmaya, gopal, govinda, hey, jay, nithya, radha, roopa, sai

Title: Jaya Govardhana Dhari Gopala
Lyrics:
Jaya Govardhana Dhari Gopala
Radha Hrudaya Vihari Gopala [ Jaya Govardhana ]
Janam Maran Bhaya Haari Gopala
Meera Prabhu Giridhari Gopala
Parthi Vihari Sai Gopala
Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) also known by names like, Giridhari, Keshava, Madhava, Mukunda, you are the in dweller of our hearts, Oh Loving Lord holding the Flute give me your vision Oh Lord Gopala.
Songglossary: bhaya, dhari, giridhar, gopal, govardhan, harana, hrudaya, janam, jay, maran, meera, prabhu, puttaparthi, radha, sai, vihar

Title: Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
Lyrics:
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
Radha Vallabha Rasa Vilola [ Jaya Govinda ... ]
Nanda Mukunda Goparipala
Munijana Vanditha Murali Gopala
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, the consort of Radha, who is fond of the Raasa leela (divine folk dance with Gopis). He is the son of Nanda and the protector of cows, who is worshipped by sages and who plays the flute.
Songglossary: gopal, goparipala, govinda, jay, mukunda, munijana, murali, nanda, radha, rasa, vallabha, vanditha, vilola

Title: Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
Lyrics:
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
Hey Parameshwara Harey Mukunda [ Jaya Govinda ... ]
Shirdipureeshwara Sayeeshwara
Parthi Nivasa Parameshwara
Parama Pavitra Sayeeshwara
Prema Swaroopa Sayeeshwara
Meaning: Sayeeshwara is the Ever sublime, embodiment of Love. He is also the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi. He is the Supreme Lord Govinda, Gopala and Mukunda.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, hey, jay, mukunda, nivasa, param, pavitra, prem, puttaparthi, sayee, shirdi, swaroopa

Title: Jaya Gowri Vara Sugunalaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Gowri Vara Sugunalaya
Jaya Jagadeeshwara Niramaya [ Jaya Gowri ... ]
Jaya Partheeshwara Premalaya (2)
Karunalaya Sathya Dharmalaya
Prashanthi Nilaya Dayamaya
Meaning: The Lord of the Universe, the beloved of Mother Gowri is a paragon of virtues, blemishless, one of compassion, embodiment of Truth and Righteousness has Prashanthi Nilayam as His Abode.
Songglossary: dayamayi, dharma, gowri, jagadeesha, jay, karuna, nilaya, niramaya, partheeshwara, prashanthi, premalaya, sathya, suguna, vara

Title: Jaya Guru Deva Prabhu Sai
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Deva Prabhu Sai Deva
Devadi Deva Pranamamyaham
Shiva Shiva Shambho Kailasa Pathey
Parthi Pureeshwara Paalaya Maam [ Devadi Deva ]
Meaning: Our Salutations to the Preceptor and Lord of Lords Sai Deva. Protect me Oh Shiva, the originator of Auspiciousness, Lord of Mount Kailasa and Parthi.
Songglossary: deva, devadi, guru, jay, kailasa, maam, paalaya, pathey, prabhu, pranamamyaham, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, shambho, shiva

Title: Jaya Guru Govinda Sadguru Govinda
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Govinda Sadguru Govinda
Madhava Govinda Paahi Maam
Deena Dayala Baba Deena Natha
Parama Dayala Hari Prashanthi Vasa
Meaning: Protect us Oh Sacred Preceptor, You are Madhava and Govinda as well. Our Salutations to Baba, the Sacred preceptor Sai who is the refuge of the forlorn and extremely merciful.
Songglossary: baba, dayal, deen, govinda, guru, hari, jay, maam, madhava, natha, paahi, param, prashanthi, sadguru, vasa

Title: Jaya Guru Jaya Guru Sai
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Jaya Guru Sai Ram
Jagat Guru Sathya Sai Ram [ Jaya Guru ... ]
Brahma Vishnu Shiva Sai Ram
Parabrahma Roopa Sai Ram
Mata Pitha Guru Sai Ram [ Jagat Guru ]
Meaning: Prostrations to Sathya Sai Rama, the Universal Guru. He is the Mother, Father, Preceptor as well as Creator, Sustainer, Destroyer and personification of Absolute Godhead.
