Songglossary: brahma, guru, jagat, jay, mata, parabrahma, pitha, ram, roopa, sai, sathya, shiva, vishnu

Title: Jaya Guru Natha Shiva Guru
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Natha Shiva Guru Natha
Parthi Pureesha Harey Paramesha [ Jaya Guru Natha ... ]
Parama Dayala Paahi Mahesha
Jaya Jaya Sathya Sayeesha
Meaning: Salutations to the venerable Preceptor Sathya Sai, who is the Sovereign Lord, the one who is extremely compassionate and the one who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: dayal, guru, hari, jay, mahesha, natha, paahi, param, pureesha, puttaparthi, sathya, sayee, shiva

Title: Jaya Guru Omkara
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Jaya Sadguru Omkara Om
Brahma Vishnu Sadashiva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Meaning: Venerable salutations to our Preceptor who is the form of Primordial sound Om and Creator, protector and destroyer. He is also Mahadeva and Sadashiva.
Songglossary: brahma, guru, hara, jay, mahadev, om, sadashiva, sadguru, vishnu

Title: Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Guru
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Guru Omkara
Sadguru Deva Sai Mahadeva [ Jaya Guru ]
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Mahadeva
Dharma Bodhaka Sai Guru Deva
Shantha Swaroopa Prema Swaroopa (Pra) [ Sadguru Deva ]
Meaning: Prostrations to the venerable preceptor Sai Mahadeva, the very form of the Primordial sound Om. Sai Guru deva is the direct manifestation of Truth, Peace and Supreme Love and preacher of Righteousness.
Songglossary: bodha, deva, dharma, guru, jay, mahadev, om, prem, sadguru, sai, sathya, shantha, swaroopa

Title: Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Jaya Sadguru Omkara Om Om
Brahma Vishnu Sadashiva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Meaning: Glory to the Guru who is the embodiment of the sacred Om, the true Guru Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva.
Songglossary: brahma, guru, hara, jay, mahadev, om, sadashiva, sadguru, shiva, vishnu

Title: Jaya Guru Sadguru Shri Sai
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Sadguru Shri Sai Deva
Shri Guru Govinda Sadguru Deva
Krupahi Kevalam Krupahi Kevalam
Guru Deva Sai Mahadeva
Mahadeva Sai Gurudeva
Meaning: Salutations to the true Guru Sathya Sai. Please bestow us with your kindness and compassion.
Songglossary: deva, govinda, guru, gurudev, jay, krupa, mahadev, sadguru, sai, sri

Title: Jaya Guru Shankara Girija Ramana
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Shankara Girija Ramana
Jaya Jaya Mangala Divya Charana [ Jaya Guru ... ]
Jaya Muni Vanditha Nagabharana
Jaya Sarveshwara (Sayeeshwara) Saroja Nayana
Meaning: Victory to the beloved of Mother Girija whose Divine feet confers all that is auspicious, who adorns snakes on His body and meditated upon by the Sages and who is none other than the lotus eyed Sayeeshwara.
Songglossary: chara, divya, girija, guru, jay, mangal, muni, nagabharana, nayan, ramana, saroja, sarvesha, sayee, shankara, vanditha

Title: Jaya Guru Shri Guru Sadguru
Lyrics:
Jaya Guru Shri Guru Sadguru Sai
Satchidananda Sada Sukha Dayi ( Jaya Guru ... )
Prashanti Nilaya Dwarakamayi
Jaya Guru Shri Guru Sadguru Sai(2)
Meaning: Glory be to the true Guru, Lord Sai of Prashanti and Dvarakamayi, the one who always bestows happiness, and is truth, knowledge, and bliss.
Songglossary: dayi, dwaraka, guru, jay, nilaya, prasanthi, sada, sadguru, sai, satchidananda, sri, sukh

Title: Jaya Hari Govinda Jaya Hari
Lyrics:
Jaya Hari Govinda Jaya Hari Gopala
Madhava Mohana Mayura Mukutadhara
Giridhara Gopala [ Jaya Hari ... ]
Surdasa Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Sri Hari Jaya Hari Sai Giridhari
Meaning: Chant the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Hari, the One who has the peacock feather on His Head, who lifted Govardhana Mountain on His finger and throne who is the dear Lord of Surdas.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, hey, jay, madhava, mayur, mohan, mukuta, prabhu, sai, sri, surdas

Title: Jaya Hari Govinda Jaya Narayana
Lyrics:
Jaya Hari Govinda Jaya Narayana
Vasudeva Nandana Shri Madhusudhana ( Jaya Hari ... )
Karunanidhe He Madhava Mohana
Parama Niranjana Yashoda Nandana
Jaya Narayana Jaya Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
Meaning: Hail! Lord Sai( or Vishnu, Krishna). He is a treasure of compassion and is ever pleasing to His devotees.
Songglossary: govinda, hari, jay, karuna, madhava, madhu, mohan, nanda, narayana, niranjan, param, sai, sathya, sri, vasudeva, yashoda

Title: Jaya Hari Govinda Radhey Gopala
Lyrics:
Jaya Hari Govinda Radhey Gopala
Madhura Madhura Muralidhara [ Jaya Hari ... ]
Brinda Vihari Krishna Murari
Meera Ke Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Radha Madhava Damodara
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Damodara, playing lilting tunes on His Flute. Sing the Glory of the Dearest Lord of Radha and Meera who moved about in Brindavan.
Songglossary: brinda, damodara, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, hey, jay, ke, krishna, madhava, madhu, meera, murali, murare, prabhu, radha, vihar

Title: Jaya Hey Shankara Jaya Hey
Lyrics:
Jaya Hey Shankara Jaya Hey
Pavana Para Shiva Jaya Hey [ Jaya Hey Shankara ... ]
Atmodharaka Ananda Dayaka
Adi Mahadeva Jaya Hey [ Pavana Para ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, Victory be to you. You are Purity personified. You are the one who causes emancipation of souls and confers Bliss.
Songglossary: adi, anand, atmodharaka, dayaka, hey, jay, mahadev, para, pavan, shankara, shiva

Title: Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Gopalana
Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Gopalana
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Narayana
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Janardhana
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Niranjana
Meaning: Praise the Lord who fosters cowherds, the one who is present in man, victory to the one who uplifts humanity and the one who is faultless and pure.
Songglossary: gopal, ho, janardhana, jay, narayana, niranjan

Title: Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Lingeshwara
Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Lingeshwara
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Partheeshwara
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Mruthyunjaya
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Sayeeshwara
Meaning: Victory be to Sayeeshwara, who is in the Form of a Linga (denotes without beginning or end), the One who has conquered Death and the One who resides in Parthi
Songglossary: ho, jay, lingeshwara, mruthyu, partheeshwara, sayee

Title: Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Mooshika
Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Mooshika Vahana
Hey Shiva Nandana Prathama Vandana
Parvathi Tanaya Siddhi Vinayaka
Sharanam Sharanam Vighna Haranam [ Hey Shiva Nandana ]
Meaning: Victory to the son of Shiva and Parvathi who moves on a mouse and the one who is offered the first prayers. Let us surrender to the one who removes obstacles and grants us spiritual powers.
Songglossary: harana, hey, ho, jay, mooshika, nanda, parvathi, prathama, sharan, shiva, siddhi, tanaya, vahana, vandana, vighna, vinayaka

Title: Jaya Ho Nataraj (2)
Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Nataraj (2)
Gangadhara Shambho Hey Nataraj [ Jaya Ho ... ]
Phaala Lochana Paahi Murari
Haalaahala Dhara Hey Tripurari
Jaya Ho Nataraj
Jaya Ho Nataraj (2)
Meaning: Victory to the Lord of dance, who holds Mother Ganges in his matted locks, the one who has the third eye of wisdom. Protect me Oh Lord who destroyed the three cities created by the demons and holds the poison in His throat.
Songglossary: dhara, ganga, haalaahala, hey, ho, jay, lochana, murare, nataraj, paahi, paalaya, shambho, tripura

Title: Jaya Ho Sai Ram Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Ho Sai Ram Jaya Ho Sai Ram
Karuna Sindhu Ram Sai Parthi Pureeshwara Ram [ Jaya Ho Sai Ram ... ]
Treta Yug Mey Ram Sai Dwapara Yug Mey Shyam
Ram Tum Hi Rehman Sai Sab Ka Hey Bhagawan
Kali Yug Ke Avatar Sai Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Meaning: Glory to Sai Ram who is an ocean of compassion and Lord of Parthi. He had incarnated as Lord Ram in the Treta age and Shyam in the Dwapara age, has come down as Sai in this Kali age. Oh Lord! You are worshipped by people of all faiths.
Songglossary: avatar, bhagawan, dwapara, hai, hey, ho, jay, ka, kali, karuna, ke, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, rehman, sab, sai, sham, sindhu, treta, tum, yuga

Title: Jaya Jagadambe Gowri Mata
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadambe Gowri Mata
Gowri Mata Sai Mata [ Jaya Jagadambe ... ]
Kaala Vinashini Jagadodharini
Parthi Nivasini Sai Mata
Meaning: Hail Gowri the Universal Mother, who swallows time and resurrects the world is presently Sai Mata who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: gowri, jagadamba, jagadodhara, jay, kaala, mata, nivasi, puttaparthi, sai, vinashana

Title: Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Govinda
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Govinda Harey
Nithyananda Brahmananda Jaya Gopala Harey
Arunachala Shiva Om Trishoola Dhari Shiva Om
Hari Narayana Om Sai Narayana Om
Jaya Devi Bharati Vidya Dayini Annapoorna Mata Om
Meaning: Glory to the Lord of the Universe, Govinda, Gopala who is the personification of Eternal Bliss. He is Lord Shiva who holds the Trident and has made the Mountains of Arunachala as His Abode. Lord Sai is the embodiment of Narayana, Mother Bharati who gives Knowledge and Mother Annapurna who provides food for everyone.
Songglossary: annapoorna, aruna, bharati, brahma, dayini, devi, dhari, gopal, govinda, hari, jagadeesha, jay, mata, narayana, nithya, om, sai, shiva, trishoola, vidya

Title: Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Murare
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Murarey
Jaya Jagannatha Janardhana [ Jaya Jagadeesha ... ]
Jaya Vanamali Jaya Giridhari
Jaya Jaya Sri Hari Sai Murari
Meaning: Victory to the Lord of the Universe who is the inner motivator of all, wears a garland of jungle flowers and annihilated demon Mura.
Songglossary: giridhar, hari, jagadeesha, jagan, janardhana, jay, murare, sai, sri, vanamali

Title: Jaya Jagadeesha Jaya Paramesha
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Jaya Paramesha
Neelakanta Sadashiva
Om Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om
Devadi Deva Deena Dayala
Chandrashekara Shambho (2) [ Neelakanta Sadashiva ]
Meaning: Victory to Lord Shiva who is Supreme, Lord of Lords, Origin of all that is Auspicious and Primordial sound Om, who is blue throated and bears the crescent moon on His head.
Songglossary: chand, dayal, deen, deva, devadi, hari, jagadeesha, jay, neela, om, param, sadashiva, shambho

Title: Jaya Jagadeesha Jaya Paramesha
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Jaya Paramesha
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey
Keshava Roopa Sai Shareera Jaya Jagadeesha Harey
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey (2)
Meaning: Victory to the Sovereign Lord and Lord of the Universe Esha (Shiva) who Himself is Keshava and Sai.
Songglossary: hari, jagadeesha, jay, kesha, param, roopa, sai, shareera

Title: Jaya Jagadeeshwara Paahi Maam Dehi
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeeshwara Paahi Maam Dehi Maam
Anga Vibhuti Harey Shiva Shankara
Amaradeeshwara Hara Hara Shankara
Meaning: Protect me Oh Lord of the Universe, Shankara, who has smeared Vibhuti (Sacred ash) on His Body and who is the Lord of the immortals.
Songglossary: amara, anga, dehi, hara, hari, jagadeesha, jay, maam, paahi, shankara, shiva, vibhuti

Title: Jaya Jagadishwari Akhilandeshwari
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadishwari Akhilandeshwari
Parthipurishwari Palaya Mam
Jaya Bhuvaneshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Vara Dayini Amba Palaya Mam
Meaning: Glory to Mother Goddess of the Universe. O Mother, resident of Puttaparthi and grantor of wishes, kindly protect me.
Songglossary: akhila, amba, bhuvaneshwari, dayini, jagadeeshwari, jay, mam, paalaya, parteeshwari, raja, rajeshwari, vara

Title: Jaya Jagadishwari Jaya Parameshwari
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagadishwari Jaya Parameshwari
Jaya Parthishwari Aya Bhuvaneshwari
Jaya Shaktheeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Vijaya Saishwari
Meaning: Glory to Mother Goddess of the Universe. Lord Sai, resident of Puttaparthi, is the supreme powerful Goddess.
Songglossary: aya, bhuvaneshwari, jagadeeshwari, jay, ma, param, parteeshwari, raja, rajeshwari, saiyeeshwara, shaktheeshwari, vijaya

Title: Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadambe
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadambe
Mata Bhavani Mata Ambe(2)
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Jagadambe
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Mata Ambe
Mata Ambe ( Jaya Jagat ... )
Vaishnavi Mata Mata Ambe
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Jagadambe
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Mata Ambe
Mata Ambe(3)
Vaishnavi Mata Mata Ambe
Meaning: Salutations to the Mother of the Universe, Mother Bhavani, the divine consort of Lord Shiva, and to Mother Vaishnavi, the consort of Lord Vishnu.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, jagadamba, jagat, jai, janani, jay, mata, vaishnavi

Title: Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadambe
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadambe
Mata Bhavani Mata Ambe
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai (Mata) Jagadambe [ Jaya Jagat ... ]
Vaishnavi Mata Mata Ambe
Mata Ambe (3) [ Vaishnavi Mata ]
Meaning: Victory to the Mother of the Universe, Ambe, who is also known as Vaishnavi Devi.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, jagadamba, jagat, jai, janani, jay, mata, vaishnavi

Title: Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadeeshwari
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadeeshwari
Parthi Puri Parameshwari
Anantha Koti Brahmanda Nayaki
Dasha Maha Vidya Veda Vilasini
Mukti Pradayini Bhava Bhaya Haarini
Sathya Sai Bhuvaneshwari
Meaning: Hail the Universal Sovereign Mother Sathya Sai Bhuvaneshwari, who dwells in Parthi, Goddess of innumerable Galaxies that exist, an Exponent of all Ten Texts (4 Vedas and the 6 Scriptures), confers Liberation and negates the vicious cycle of Birth and Death.
Songglossary: ananta, bhava, bhaya, bhuvaneshwari, brahma, dasha, dayini, haarini, jagadeeshwari, jagat, janani, jay, koti, maha, mukti, nayaka, param, puri, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, veda, vidya, vilasini

Title: Jaya Jagat Janani Jagat palini
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Jagat Palini
Sai Bhavani Ma (Sathya)
Paapa Vinashini Parthi Nivasini
Suramuni Vandini Ma (3) [ Sai Bhavani Ma ]
Meaning: Salutations to the Mother Sai Bhavani, who is ever compassionate, the one who destroys Sins, One who dwells in Parthi and worshipped by divine sages.
Songglossary: bhava, jagat, janani, jay, ma, nivasi, paapa, palini, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, suramuni, vandini, vinashana

Title: Jaya Jagat Janani Ma
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Sai Shiva Shankari Sai Parameshwari
Ambe Bhavani Ma (Jagad)
Meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, the One who confers all that is Auspicious, Supreme, the one who is also known as Amba Bhavani.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, jagat, janani, jay, ma, param, sai, shankari, shiva

Title: Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Devi
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Devi Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Ma Sai Ma
Tribhuvana Palini Ma Sai Ma [ Shiva Shakthi ]
Moksha Pradayini Ma Janani Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma
Janani Ma ( Sai ) Janani Ma (2)
Meaning: Glory to the Mother of Universe Sathya Sai, who is the Personification of Lord Shiva and Shakthi, who sustains the Three worlds and confers Liberation.
Songglossary: dayini, devi, jagat, janani, jay, ma, moksha, palini, sai, sathya, shakthi, shiva, swaroopa, tribhuvan

Title: Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Jaya Ma
Ma Jaya Ma [ Jaya Jagat ]
Jagadodharini Ma Jaya Ma
Hey Shiva Shankari Hey Parameshwari
Sai Bhavani Ma Jaya Ma [ Jagadodharini Ma ]
Meaning: Hail the Mother Sathya Sai, the Mother who sustains the Entire Universe, who is Supreme, also known as Sai Bhavani, Shiva Shankari and Parameshwari.
Songglossary: bhava, hey, jagadodhara, jagat, janani, jay, ma, param, sai, shankari, shiva

Title: Jaya Jagat Janani Mata
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Mata
Parthi Nivasini Trishoola Dharini [ Jaya Jagat ... ]
Shwetambarini Ambe Bhavani
Shakthi Roopa Durga Mata (2) [ Parthi Nivasini ]
Meaning: Victory to the Mother of the Universe, who holds the Trident, dwells in Parthi. She is dressed in white as Saraswathi also known as Ambe, Bhavani, Durga and the personification of Energy.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, dhari, durga, jagat, janani, jay, mata, nivasi, puttaparthi, roopa, shakthi, shwetambari, trishoola

Title: Jaya Jagat Janani Sayeeshwari
Lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Sayeeshwari
Jaya Jagat Janani Sarveshwari
Veena Pusthaka Dharini Janani
Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhani
Omkara Roopini Hreemkara Roopini
Sreemkara Roopini Janani
Omkara Roopini Janani
Janani Janani Janani
Meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, Goddess of the universe. She is verily Saraswathi, Goddess of learning, the one who holds the Veena and the Holy scriptures. Victory to the Goddess of wealth, Lakshmi, the consort of Lord Madhusudhana (Krishna). Mother Sai is the very embodiment of the Primordial sound 'Om' and the sounds 'Hreem' and 'Sreem'.

Title: Jaya Janardhana Krishna Radhika
Lyrics:
Jaya Janardhana Krishna Radhika Pathe
Nanda Nandana Krishna Rukmini Pathe
Garuda Vahana Krishna Gopika Pathe
Saranu Mohana Krishna Prabho Sadgate
Paahi Keshava Krishna Paahi Madhava
Paahi Mukunda Krishna Paahi Govinda
Paahi Suresha Krishna Paahi Mahesha
Paahi Srivishnu Krishna Paahi Vaikunta
Paahi Paresha Krishna Paahimam Parch
Paahi Pavana Krishna Rakshamam Vibho
Paahi Sridhara Krishna Paahimam Prabho
Guruvayur Pathey Krishna Paahimam Vibho
Meaning: Victory be to the Krishna, who is the consort of Radhika. Krishna is also called Janardhana, son of Nanda, consort of Rukmini. As Lord Narayana, His vehicle is Garuda. Protect us oh Krishna who is also known by various names such as Keshava, Mukunda, Suresha, Mahesha, Sridhara, and Govinda. Master of Guruvayur, and Vaikunta, please protect us.
Songglossary: garuda, gopi, govinda, guruvayur, janardhana, jay, kesha, krishna, madhava, mahesha, mohan, mukunda, nanda, paahi, paresha, pathey, pathi, pavan, prabhu, radhika, raksha, rukmini, sadgate, sridhara, suresham, vahana, vaikunta, vibho

Title: Jaya Jaya Ananda Amrutha Varshini
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ananda Amrutha Varshini
Parthi Nivasini Paalaya Maam
Jaya Jaya Hey Himadri Suthey
Paalaya Maam Amba Rakshaya Maam
Meaning: Protect me Oh the dweller at Parthi who confers Grace and Bliss in a downpour. Confer your Grace Oh Amba the daughter of Himalaya mountain.
Songglossary: amba, amrutha, anand, hey, himagiri, jay, maam, nivasi, paalaya, puttaparthi, raksha, sutha, varshini

Title: Jaya Jaya Ananda Amruthavarshini
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ananda Amruthavarshini
Raja Rajeshwari Rakshaya Maam
Durga Saraswathi Lakshmi Narayani
Brahma Sanathani Paalaya Maam
Parthi Nivasini Rakshaya Maam
Meaning: Sing the Glory of the One who sheds Love in the form of a downpour. Protect me the Queen of Goddesses. You are the incarnation of the three energy principles, the Eternal and the one who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: amrutha, anand, brahma, durga, jay, lakshmi, maam, narayani, nivasi, paalaya, puttaparthi, raja, rajeshwari, raksha, sanatana, saraswathi

Title: Jaya Jaya Deva Jagadeesha Deva
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Deva Jagadeesha Deva
Daya Sagara Sai Deva [ Jaya Jaya Deva ]
Neeraja Nayana Ksheerabdhi Shayana
Neela Megha Shyama
Saama Gaana Priya Sarva Dharma Priya Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Meaning: Oh Sai Deva you are the ocean of compassion. Oh Sai, You are the One having Lotus eyes, whose abode is that of the Ocean, the one whose complexion is deep blue. Sai Mahadeva Loves the music of Veda and loves all religions equally.
Songglossary: daya, deva, dharma, gaan, jagadeesha, jay, ksheerabdhi, mahadev, megha, nayan, neela, neeraja, priya, sagar, sai, sama, sarva, sathya, sham, shayana

Title: Jaya Jaya Devi Ambe Bhavani
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Devi Ambe Bhavani
Durga Saraswathi Lakshmi Narayani [ Jaya Jaya Devi ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Tribhuvana Dharini
Parthi Nivasini Sai Janani
Meaning: Victory to Mother Amba Bhavani the personification of Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi and Narayani. She is verily Mother Sai, who dwells in Parthi, confers freedom from fear and the One who bears the three worlds.
Songglossary: abhaya, amba, bhava, dayini, devi, dhari, durga, janani, jay, lakshmi, narayani, nivasi, puttaparthi, sai, saraswathi, tribhuvan

Title: Jaya Jaya Devi Girija Mata
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Devi Girija Mata
Jaya Jagadambe Pranava Swaroopini
Ashtabhujankita Akhila Dharini
Jaya Yogeshwara Hrudaya Nivasini
Meaning: Praises be to the Universal Mother Girija, the embodiment of the Primordial Sound Om. She is the one who has eight arms and the one who bears the universe. She is the one who resides in the heart of Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: akhila, ashta, devi, dhari, girija, hrudaya, jagadamba, jay, mata, nivasi, pranava, swaroopa, yogi

Title: Jaya Jaya Gajanana Gananatha
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Gajanana Gananatha
Gowri Nandana Hey Gananatha [ Jaya Jaya ]
Buddhi Pradayaka Hey Gananatha
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Gananatha
Jaya Gananatha Sai Gananatha (4)
Meaning: Sing the praises of the elephant-faced Lord, the Leader of the demigod troops, son of Gowri, who confers Intelligence and spiritual powers.
Songglossary: buddhi, gajamukha, gananatha, gowri, hey, jay, nandana, pradayaka, sai, siddhi, vinayaka

Title: Jaya Jaya Gananatha Deva Shambho
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Gananatha Deva Shambho Kumara
Jaya Jaya Partheesha Prabho Sai Ganesha
Jaya Jaya Hey Adi Deva Deena Sharanya
Jaya Jaya Hey Abhaya Daata Parthi Ganesha
Meaning: Glory to the son of Shambho, leader of Shiva's troops and the Lord of Parthi. Glory to the refuge of the Forlorn, the First Lord, who grants protection from fear.
Songglossary: abhaya, adi, daata, deen, deva, gananatha, ganesha, hey, jay, kumara, partheeshwara, prabhu, puttaparthi, sai, shambho, sharan

Title: Jaya Jaya Gangadhara Shankara
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Gangadhara Shankara
Jaya Jaya Gowri Vara Shankara [ Jaya Jaya Gangadhara ... ]
Ardha Shareera Alankruta Girija
Parthi Pureeshwara Pavana Charitha
Palita Bhuvana Aashritha Phalada
Meaning: Sing the Glory of the One who holds Mother Ganges on His Head, beloved of Mother Gowri. Lord Shiva whose half body is adorned by Mother Girija, the Lord of Parthi, nourishes the world, grants welfare and has a sacred history.
Songglossary: aashritha, alankruta, ardha, bhuvana, charitha, ganga, girija, gowri, jay, palita, pavan, phala, purishwara, puttaparthi, shankara, shareera, vara

Title: Jaya Jaya Girija Bala Gajanana
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Girija Bala Gajanana
Jaya Shiva Shankara Parvathi Nandana [ Jaya Jaya Girija ... ]
Vighna Vinashaka Vijaya Gajanana
Sharavana Sevitha Sumukha Gajanana
Tava Pada Sharanam Sharanam Gajanana
Meaning: Victory to the son of Girija otherwise known as Parvathi and Lord Shankara. We surrender at your feet Oh the Elephant faced Lord you are the one who removes obstacles in the spiritual Path and served by His brother Sharavana.
Songglossary: bala, gajamukha, girija, jay, nanda, paada, parvathi, sevita, shankara, sharan, sharavana, shiva, sumukha, tava, vighna, vijaya, vinasha

Title: Jaya Jaya Govinda Jaya Nandalala
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Govinda Jaya Nandalala
Radha Lola Raasa Vilola
Tribhuvana Paripala Deena Dayala [ Jaya Jaya Govinda ... ]
Surdas Prabhu Karuna Sagara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Bhaktha Sakha Bhagawan Gopala
Meaning: Prostrations to Govinda, the son of Nanda, dear to Radha, who did the celestial dance with the Gopis, nurtures the three worlds and compassionate towards the helpless. Gopala is a friend to His devotees and Lord of devotees Surdas and Meera.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhaktha, dayal, deen, giridhar, gopal, govinda, jay, karuna, ke, lola, meera, naagar, nanda, paripala, prabhu, raasa, radha, sagar, sakha, surdas, tribhuvan, vilola

Title: Jaya Jaya Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Govinda Narayana
Jaya Hari Govinda Narayana [ Jaya Jaya ]
Mathuradhipathey Mandara Giridhara
Murali Manohara Narayana
Narayana Namo ( Sai ) Narayana (3)
Meaning: Prostrations to Lord Narayana, who incarnated as Govinda who is the Lord of Mathura and the One who lifted the Mandara mountain and played soulful music with His Flute.
Songglossary: giridhar, govinda, hari, jay, manda, manohar, mathura, murali, namo, narayana, sai

Title: Jaya Jaya Hey Jagadeesha Mahesha
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Hey Jagadeesha Mahesha
Jaya Jaya Hey Kailasa Vasa [ Jaya Jaya Hey Jagadeesha ... ]
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Sai Mahesha
Jaya Hey Shambho Sai Natha
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Anatha Natha
Meaning: Victory to the Universal Lord Mahesha, who dwells at Mountain Kailasa, beloved Lord of Gowri and the navigator of the Orphaned is the same Lord Sai.
Songglossary: anath, hey, jagadeesha, jay, kailasa, mahesha, natha, sai, shambho, shiva, vasa

Title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Narayani
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Narayani
Janana Marana Bhaya Harini [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Dukha Vinashini Jagat Paripalini
Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Jagat Janani
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini
Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Jagat Janani
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Mother Narayani, who removes the fear of birth and death, destroys sorrow and fosters the world. She is the Goddess of the Universe and confers welfare to all.
Songglossary: bhaya, devi, dukh, haarini, jagat, janam, janani, jay, kaarini, maran, narayani, paripalini, shubh, vinashana

Title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Jaya Gananatha Sri Gananatha
Heyramba Gananatha Natha
Hey Shiva Nandana Parvathi Nandana
Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha Natha
Meaning: Let us Sing the Glories of the leader of Shankara's army, who is the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi whose other name is Heyramba.
Songglossary: gananatha, hey, heyramba, jay, nanda, natha, parvathi, shiva, sri

Title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Gajanana
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Gajanana
Gajanana Hey Gajavadana [ Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey ... ]
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Pashupathi Tanaya Gajanana
Adi Poojya Deva Gajanana
Meaning: Glory to the Elephant faced son of Parvathi and Pashupathi, who is offered the First Prayers.
Songglossary: adi, deva, gajamukha, hey, jay, nanda, parvathi, pashu, poojya, tanaya

Title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhana
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhana
Jaya Brindavana Mana Mohana [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Sundara Sai Shirdi (Parthi) Vihari
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram [ Radhey Shyam ... ]
Meaning: Glory be to the One who vanquished the demon Madhu, the charmer who moves about in Brindavan. Praise the One who dwells in Shirdi and Parthi. Repeat the names of Radhey Shyam and Sairam.
Songglossary: brinda, hey, jay, madhu, mana, mohan, puttaparthi, radha, ram, sai, sham, shirdi, sundara, vihar

Title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sri
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sri Guru Natha
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sadguru Natha
Sadguru Natha Sadguru Natha
Sathya Swaroopa Shiva Guru Natha
Antaryami Vishwa Vidhata
Mukti Pradatha Sai Guru Natha
Meaning: Let us Sing in praise of our Sacred preceptor Shiva, the embodiment of Truth. Our Preceptor Sai, is the indweller, the Creator of the Universe, who grants Liberation.
Songglossary: antar, guru, hey, jay, mukti, natha, pradatha, sadguru, sai, sathya, shiva, sri, swaroopa, vidhata, vishwa

Title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sai
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sai Natha
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Jagannatha [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Shirdi Pureeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Parthi Pureeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sathya Sayeeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Jagadeeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sayeeshwara
Meaning: Glory to our Universal Lord Sayeeshwara who dwells in Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: ho, jagadeesha, jagan, jay, natha, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, sayee, shirdi

Title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaga Vandini
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaga Vandini Ma
Jaya Paramesha Hrudvasini Ma [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Adi Shakthi Parabrahma Swaroopini
Jagat Janani Chathur Veda Vilasini
Samba Vinodini Mata Bhavani
Sambhavi Shankari Moksha Pradayini
Meaning: Salutations to the One who is adored by the Entire Universe, the indweller and Embodiment of Supreme Energy. Whom the Four Vedas describe, is a delight to Lord Shiva, One who confers Liberation is also known by the names Bhavani, Shankari and Sambhavi.
Songglossary: adi, bhava, chathur, dayini, hrudvasini, jagat, janani, jay, ma, mata, moksha, parabrahma, param, samba, sambhavi, shakthi, shankari, swaroopa, vandini, veda, vilasini, vinodini

Title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini [ (Ma) Jaya Jaya ... ]
Jagadodharini Sai Ma
Jagat Paripalini Parvathi Ma
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini
Meaning: We offer our obeisance to our Universal Mother who confers all that is Sublime and Auspicious. The Uplifter, the Administrator and the Mother of the Universe that is Parvathi, is also Sai Ma.
Songglossary: jagadodhara, jagat, janani, jay, kaarini, ma, paripalini, parvathi, sai, shubh

Title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma Jaya Sai Ma
Janana Marana Bhaya Harini Ma [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Sundara Vadani Suhaasini Ma
Mangala Karini Maheshwari Ma
Mahadeva Mana Mohini Ma
Maya Nashini Sri Sai Ma
Meaning: Let us sing in Glory of Mother Sai, who negates the fear of the cycle of birth and death. The consort of Maheshwara, has a Beautiful smiling countenance, the One who charms Mahadeva and offsets the effects of Illusion.
Songglossary: bhaya, haarini, janam, jay, kaarini, ma, mahadev, maheshwari, mana, mangal, maran, maya, mohan, sai, sri, suhaasini, sundara, vadana, vinashana

Title: Jaya Jaya Krishna Yadu Nandana
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Krishna Yadu Nandana
Jaya Jaya Brindavana Chandana [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Jaya Jaya Krishna Mana Mohana
Jaya Jaya Sai Gopalana (2)
Meaning: Victory to Krishna who belongs to Yadu lineage, the shining star of Brindavan, the charmer of Mind, who is none other than our Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: brinda, chand, gopal, jay, krishna, mana, mohan, nanda, sai, yadu

Title: Jaya Jaya Mangala Sai Namo
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Mangala Sai Namo
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Namo
Shiva Shaktheeshwara Sai Namo
Sri Shaileshwara Sai Namo
Meaning: Prostrations to Sai, the Lord of Parthi, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi (Matter and Energy) who also dwells at Shaila Mountains.
Songglossary: jay, mangal, namo, partheeshwara, sai, shaileshwara, shaktheeshwara, shiva, sri

Title: Jaya Jaya Mohana Murali Gopala
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Mohana Murali Gopala
Jaya Giridhara Brindavana Pala [ Jaya Jaya Mohana ... ]
Jaya Hey Madhava Ghana Ghana Neela (2)
Jaya Meera Prabhu Radhey Gopala
Meaning: Chant the names of the charming Gopala who plays on the Flute, the lad of Brindavan who surprised everyone by lifting the Mountain on His little finger. Sing in Praise of Madhava of the complexion of deep blue clouds and dear Lord of Meera.
Songglossary: brinda, ghana, giridhar, gopal, hey, jay, madhava, meera, mohan, murali, neela, pala, prabhu, radha

Title: Jaya Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Janaki Jeevana
Sharanagatha Palana Jaya Jagadodharana [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Rajeeva Dala Lochana Jaya Jagadanandana
Rajadhi Raja Ramachandra Sai Jaga Vandana
Meaning: Extol the son of Raghu, the very life of Mother Janaki, the sustainer of Universe and protector of those who surrender to Him. The One who is worshipped and source of delight to the Universe, is Emperor Ramachandra.
Songglossary: dala, jagadanandana, jagadodhara, jagat, janaki, jay, jeeva, lochana, nanda, paalaya, raghu, raja, rajeeva, ramachandra, sai, sharan, vandana

Title: Jaya Jaya Raghuvara Sri Rama
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Raghuvara Sri Rama
Hara Brahmarchitha Prarthitha Rama
Kaalaathmaka Parameshwara Rama
Janani Janaki Manobhi Rama (2)
Meaning: Sri Rama belongs to the Raghu dynasty is adored by both Shiva and Brahma (the God of Creation) and Parameshwara Rama who swallows Time and who is the beloved of Mother Janaki.
Songglossary: brahma, hara, janaki, janani, jay, kaala, manobhi, param, prarthitha, raghu, ram, sri

Title: Jaya Jaya Ram Jagadabhi Ram
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ram Jagadabhi Ram
Deena Bandhu Sai Ram (Hey)
Jai Jai Ram Jaya Ram Sai Ram
Danava Bhanjana Dayamaya
Dayamaya Krupamaya
Alakh Niranjana Asurani Khandana
Deena Bandhu Sai Ram (Hey) [ Jai Jai Ram ]
Meaning: Sing in Praise of Rama, the friend of the afflicted and the Lord of the World. Victory to Lord Rama who rooted out demonic forces from the face of the Earth who is blemishless and extremely compassionate.
Songglossary: alakh, asura, bandhava, bhanjana, danava, dayamayi, deen, hey, jagadabhi, jai, jay, khandana, krupa, niranjan, ram, sai

Title: Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Megha
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Megha Shyam
Dasharatha Nandana Danava Bheema
Jagadabhi Ram Janaki Ram
Suramuni Vanditha Sundara Ram
Meaning: Victory to Rama, the One who is deep Blue in complexion, son of Dasharatha and the uprooter of the Demonic clan. The Beloved of Mother Janaki, the Lord of the world, is worshipped by the divine sages.
Songglossary: bheema, danava, dasha, jagadabhi, janaki, jay, megha, nanda, ram, sham, sundara, suramuni, vanditha

Title: Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Raghu
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Raghu Ram Ravikulabdhi Soma
Sita Ram Sri Raghuram Sathya Sai Bhagawan [ Jaya Jaya Ram ]
Sita Kantha Ram Jaya Janaki Jeevana Ram
Meaning: Glory to Rama Scion of the Solar race, is beloved and life of Mother Sita, has come presently in the form of Sathya Sai Bhagawan.
Songglossary: bhagawan, janaki, jay, jeeva, kantha, raghu, ram, ravikula, sai, sathya, sita, soma, sri

Title: Jaya Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
Sri Raghu Nandana Rama Rama
Kausalyatmaja Taraka Naama
Sada Smarami Rama
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Rama
Shritha Jana Palita Rama Rama
Ahalyodharaka Deena Daya Ghana
Sada Smarami Rama
Meaning: Always remember the name of Rama who is the beloved of Mother Janaki belongs to the Raghu dynasty, son of Kausalya, whose name liberates from the cycle of birth and death. Rama fulfills the desires of devotees, who is all mercy for the hapless and got Ahalya liberated from the curse.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, daya, deen, ghana, jana, janaki, jay, kausalya, naam, nanda, palita, purishwara, puttaparthi, raghu, ram, sada, sai, shritha, smaran, sri, taraka

Title: Jaya Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Raja Rama [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Tapasa Ranjana Taraka Naama
Danava Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Meaning: Praise be to Rama who is the consort of Mother Janaki and the Gem of Raghu dynasty. Chant Rama whose name liberates one from the mundane cycle and is a source of Delight for the Sages and saints, the wielder of the Bow and vanquisher of the demonic race.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhooshan, danava, janaki, jay, kodanda, naam, raghu, raja, ram, ranjana, tapasa, taraka

Title: Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu Rama Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama
Abhaya Pradayaka Ananda Dayaka
Tribhuvana Mohana Sita Rama
Danava Bhanjana Deenodharana
Prema Sagara Sai Rama
Meaning: Lord Rama was the descendant of the Raghu clan, the son of Dasharatha, who confers Bliss and fearlessness. Rama was the most Handsome of all the three worlds, beloved of Mother Sita, Annihilator of the Demon clan and emancipator of the downtrodden.
Songglossary: abhaya, anand, bhanjana, danava, dasha, dayaka, deenodharana, jay, mohan, nanda, pradayaka, prem, raghu, raja, ram, sagar, sai, sita, tribhuvan

Title: Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu Rama (3)
Deena Bandho Sathya Sai Ram
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Dayabhi Ram
Pankaja Lochana Nayanabhi Ram
Daya Sagara Karuna Sagara
Deena Bandho Sathya Sai Ram
Daya Sagara Sai Ram
Karuna Sagara Sai Ram
Prema Sagara Sai Ram
Deena Bandho Sathya Sai Ram
Meaning: Rama is the friend of the Forlorn, takes care of his devotees, Lotus eyed, Ocean of compassion is also true of Sathya Sai who is Ocean of Supreme Love.
Songglossary: bandho, bhaktha, daya, dayabhi, deen, jay, karuna, lochana, nayan, pankaja, prem, raghu, ram, sagar, sai, samraksha, sathya

Title: Jaya Jaya Rama Krishna Hari
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Krishna Hari
Sai Rama Krishna Hari [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Ayodhya Rama Krishna Hari
Dwaraka Krishna Rama Hari
Shirdi Rama Krishna Hari
Parthi Krishna Rama Hari
Sathya Sai Narayana Krishna (Vittala) Hari
Meaning: Chant the names of Rama of Ayodhya, Krishna of Dwaraka, Hari, Vittala and Sai of Shirdi and Sathya Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: ayodhya, dwaraka, hari, jay, krishna, narayana, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sathya, shirdi, vittala

Title: Jaya Jaya Rama Sita Rama
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Sita Rama
Bandha Vimochana Jaya Raghurama [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Ravikula Mandana Atma Rama
Asurani Khandana Kodanda Rama
Meaning: Victory to Rama beloved of Sita, of Raghu clan who releases One from bondage, the Indweller Rama, the jewel of Solar race, the Bow wielding Rama who wiped out the demonic clan.
Songglossary: asura, atma, bandha, jay, khandana, kodanda, manda, raghu, ram, ravikula, sita, vimochana

Title: Jaya Jaya Sadguru Sai Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Sadguru Sai Sadashiva
Hara Hara Shankara Shambho Mahadeva [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Neelakanta Sai Bhasma Vibhushitha [ Hara Hara ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Maheshwara [ Hara Hara ]
Meaning: Let us bow down in reverence to the Sacred Preceptor Sai Sadashiva, the one who confers auspiciousness, Mahadeva, the blue-throated one, who has smeared Sacred Ash all over His Body and Maheshwara, who is none other than Sai, the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhasma, hara, jay, mahadeva, maheshwara, neelakanta, purishwara, puttaparthi, sadashiva, sadguru, sai, shambho, shankara, vibhushitha

Title: Jaya Jaya Sai Mahesha
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Sai Mahesha
Jaya Jaya Gowri Gangadhara
Jaya Jaya Samba Sadashiva
Jaya Jaya Parthi Lingeshwara
Meaning: Victory to Sai Mahesha, Gangadhara consort of Mother Gowri, Sadashiva the consort of Mother Amba and the Lord of Linga whose abode is Parthi.
Songglossary: ganga, gowri, jay, lingeshwara, mahesha, puttaparthi, sadashiva, sai, samba

Title: Jaya Jaya Sai Namo Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Sai Namo Jaya Shubha Dayi Namo
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala Jaya Mahadeva Namo [ Jaya Jaya Sai ]
Abhaya Pradatha Vishwa Vidhata
Jagadodhara Namo
Jaya Shirdeesha Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha Namo
Meaning: Prostrations to Sai who confers all that is auspicious, to Govinda, Gopala and Mahadeva. Salutations to the one who grants freedom from fear and who is the Lord of the Universe. Prostrations to the Supreme consciousness who is the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: abhaya, dayi, gopal, govinda, jagadodhara, jay, mahadeva, namo, paramesha, partheeshwara, pradatha, sai, shirdeesha, shubh, vidhata, vishwa

Title: Jaya Jaya Shankara Hara Hara
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankara Hara Hara Shankara
Jaya Jaya Shankara Mahadeva
Hara Om Hara Om Hara Om Hara Om
Hara Om Hara Om Sadashiva
Adi Karana Ananda Lola
Meaning: Chant the name of Shankara, Mahadeva and Sadashiva. Chant the mantra 'Hara Om', Primary Source of everything and relishes to be in Bliss.
Songglossary: adi, anand, hara, jay, kaarana, lola, mahadev, om, sadashiva, shankara

Title: Jaya Jaya Shankara Jaya Abhayankara
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankara Jaya Abhayankara
Parvathi Shankara Sri Sai Shankara
Srishti Sthithi Laya Karana Karana
Mruthyunjaya Gananayaka Nayaka
Uma Pathey Shiva Shankara Shankara
Gangadhara Jagadeeshwara Eshwara
Meaning: Glory to Shankara, who protects One from fear, beloved of Parvathi. Shankara is responsible for creation, sustenance and destruction of the Universe, has won over Death, Lord of Durga and Uma, holds Mother Ganges on His head and who is the Lord of the Universe.
Songglossary: abhaya, eshwar, gananayaka, ganga, jagadeesha, jay, kaarana, laya, mruthyu, nayaka, parvathi, pathey, sai, shankara, shiva, sri, srishti, sthithi, uma

Title: Jaya Jaya Shankara Samba Shiva
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankara Samba Shiva
Tribhuvana Dharaka Maheshwara [ Jaya Jaya ]
Ganga Dhari Kailasa Vasi
Vibhuti Sundara Parthi Nivasi
Meaning: Victory to Shankara, Consort of Amba, one who bears Ganges on His head, dwells in Kailasa, has smeared Holy Ash all over His body and who is the resident of Parthi.
Songglossary: dhara, dhari, ganga, jay, kailasa, maheshwara, nivasi, puttaparthi, samba, shankara, shiva, sundara, tribhuvan, vasi, vibhuti

Title: Jaya Jaya Shankari Jaya Parameshwari
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankari Jaya Parameshwari
Jaya Shiva Shankari Ma
Jaya Vishweshwari Jaya Sarveshwari
Vibhuti Sundari Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Puttaparthi Pureeshwari Ma [ Vibhuti ]
Meaning: Victory to Mother Shiva Shankari, Goddess of the Universe, who has Vibhuti allover Herself, has presently incarnated in Parthi.
Songglossary: jay, ma, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, sarvesha, shankari, shiva, soundari, vibhuti, vishweshwari

Title: Jaya Jaya Vani Pranamamyaham
Lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Vani Pranamamyaham
Manjula Bhaashini Veda Vilasini [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Bhava Bhaya Nashini Abhaya Pradayini
Parthi Nivasini Mukti Pradayini
Meaning: Prostrations to Goddess of Knowledge Vani, Mother of Vedas and of soft speech. She destroys fear of cycle of Births, bestows protection and Liberation, dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: abhaya, bhaashi, bhava, bhaya, dayini, jay, manjula, mukti, nivasi, pranamamyaham, puttaparthi, vani, veda, vilasini, vinashana

Title: Jaya Kailasa Pathey Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Jaya Kailasa Pathey Shiva Shankara
Samba Sadashiva Shambho
Partheeshwara Sai Shiva Shambho
Shaileshwara Karunamaya Shankara
Lingodhbhavakara Shiva Shambho
Trishoola Jatadhara Gangadhari
Haalaahala Dhara Shambho
Samba Sadashiva Shambho [ Partheeshwara Sai ]
Partheeshwara Sai Shiva Shambho (2)
Meaning: Glory be to the Lord of Kailasa Mountains, Shiva Shankara, who is Shiva and Shakthi. Salutations to the Lord of Shaila mountains, who is full of compassion, the One who creates Lingam (symbol of infinite proportions). Shankara has the Trident and holds Mother Ganges in His matted locks.
Songglossary: dhara, ganga, haalaahala, jatadhara, jay, kailasa, karuna, lingodbhava, partheeshwara, pathey, sadashiva, sai, samba, shaileshwara, shambho, shankara, shiva, trishoola

Title: Jaya Kali Ma Kali
Lyrics:
Jaya Kali Ma Kali Jaya Kali Ma, Kali Ma
 Thou art My Lord in Mother Form
 My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 Jaya Kali Ma Kali Jaya Kali Ma, Kali Ma
 Loving Your aspect dissolves all fear
 And to Your children, You are so dear
 My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 Mother, Mother
 My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 I'm so weary, Kali Ma
 My feet are worn, Kali Ma
 And I am longing, Kali Ma
 For reunion, Kali Ma
 With My blue Jewel Kali Ma
 So take me home, Kali Ma
 To My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 Mother, Mother
 My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 Jaya Kali Ma Kali Jaya Kali Ma, Kali Ma
 My blue Jewel (3X)

Title: Jaya Kausalya Nandana Ram Paramananda
Lyrics:
Jaya Kausalya Nandana Ram Paramananda Ananda Ram
Jaya Shirdeesha Partheesha Ram Jaya Prashanthi Sayeesha Ram [ Jaya Kausalya ... ]
Mangala Pavana Naam Jaya Sundara Vaidehi Ram
Sundara Sayeesha Ram ( Jaya )
Meaning: Glory to the son of Kausalya, One of Supreme Bliss, who dwells in Shirdi and Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi. The Name 'Ram' is potentially Auspicious and He is the beloved of Mother Vaidehi.
Songglossary: anand, jay, kausalya, mangal, naam, nandana, param, partheeshwara, pavan, prashanthi, ram, sayee, shirdeesha, sundara, vaidehi

Title: Jaya Krishna Kunja Vihari
Lyrics:
Jaya Krishna Kunja Vihari
Jaya Radha Hrudaya Vihari
Jaya Yamuna Teera Vihari
Jaya Gopi Ke Hrudaya Vihari
Jaya Madhava Raasa Vihari
Jaya Sai Parthi Vihari
Meaning: Victory to the One who moves about through thick shrubs, on the banks of Yamuna river, the One who dwells in Radha's and Gopis Hearts and performed the celestial dance with them and Sai who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: gopi, hrudaya, jay, ke, krishna, kunja, madhava, puttaparthi, raasa, radha, sai, teera, vihar, yamuna

Title: Jaya Krishna Madhusudhana Jaya Radha
Lyrics:
Jaya Krishna Madhusudhana Jaya Radha Mana Mohana
Brindavana Sanchari Govardhana Giridhari
Jaya Parthi Vihari Sai Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Meaning: Victory to the One who vanquished demon Madhu and who charms Radha. Lord Narayana who has come down as Krishna moved about in Brindavan and held aloft the Govardhana mountains, now dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: brinda, giridhar, govardhan, jay, krishna, madhu, mana, mohan, narayana, puttaparthi, radha, sai, sanchari, vihar

Title: Jaya Krishna Mukunda Murarey
Lyrics:
Jaya Krishna Mukunda Murarey
Jaya Govinda Brinda Vihari [ Jaya Krishna ... ]
Mana Mohana Madhava Shourie
Hara Meera Prabho Giridhari
Meaning: Victory to Krishna, Mukunda, Govinda, Madhava, Murarey, the One who moves about in Brindavan and entices the Mind, the Valorous, is the Lord of Meera's Devotion.
Songglossary: brinda, giridhar, govinda, hara, jay, krishna, madhava, mana, meera, mohan, mukunda, murare, prabhu, shouri, vihar

Title: Jaya Lambodhara Paahi Maam
Lyrics:
Jaya Lambodhara Paahi Maam
Jagadamba Sutha Raksha Maam [ Jaya Lambodhara ... ]
Sharanagatha Raksha Maam
Hey Karuna Nidhey Paahi Maam
Sri Gananatha Samraksha Maam
Nija Bhakthi Mudam Dehimey
Meaning: Protect me Oh son of Universal Mother Amba, with a big belly. Protect me for I have surrendered to You, Oh the ocean of Mercy. Give me true devotion to thee, Oh Lord of Shiva's forces who looks after my welfare.
Songglossary: bhakthi, dehimey, gananatha, hey, jagadamba, jay, karuna, lambodhara, maam, mudam, nidhey, nija, paahi, raksha, samraksha, sharan, sri, sutha

Title: Jaya Ma Anandamayi Janani
Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Anandamayi Janani
Sab Ko Krupa Karo Janani
Bhaktha Janon Ke Mangala Karini
Mangala Karo Janani (Ma)
Tum Ho Prema Dayini (Ma) [ Sab Ko Krupa ]
Meaning: Bless everyone of us, Oh Mother who is Bliss personified. You confer great boons and Supreme Love for your devotees.
Songglossary: anand, bhaktha, dayini, ho, jana, janani, jay, kaarini, karo, ke, krupa, ma, mangal, prem, sab, tum

Title: Jaya Ma Jagan Ma Sathya
Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jagan Ma Sathya Sai Ma
Jagadodharini Prem Sai Ma [ Jaya Ma ... ]
Sankata Harini Santoshi Ma
Shashwata Ananda Dayini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma [ Jaya Jagat ]
Meaning: Bless everyone Oh Universal Mother and Redeemer of the Universe. You are Mother Santoshi who destroys sorrow and grant permanent Bliss.
Songglossary: anand, dayini, haarini, jagadodhara, jagan, jagat, janani, jay, ma, prem, sai, sankata, santoshi, sathya, shashwat

Title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jaya Shirdi Shankari Ma
Jaya Parthi Eshwari Ma
Shiva Shakthi Sai Ma
Jagat Janani Jaya Jaya Ma
Meaning: Hail Praises on Mother who is Shankari at Shirdi and Eshwari at Parthi. Victory to the Universal Mother who is Shiva and Shakthi in One.
Songglossary: eshwar, jagat, janani, jay, ma, puttaparthi, sai, shakthi, shankari, shirdi, shiva

Title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Daya
Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Daya Karo Sai Ma
Krupa Karo Sai Ma (Sab Ko)
Mukti Pradayini Prema Pradayini Shanthi Pradayini Ma
Janani Ma Janani Jagat Janani Sai Ma
Daya Karo Sai Ma Jaya Ma [ (Sab Ko) Krupa ]
Meaning: Glory to Mother who confers Love and Peace and grants Liberation. Shower your mercy on us Oh Mother of the Universe.
Songglossary: daya, dayini, jagat, janani, jay, karo, krupa, ma, mukti, prem, sab, sai, shanthi

Title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jagadeeshwari
Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jagadeeshwari Sai Ma
Jagadeeshwari Maheshwari Sayeeshwari Sai Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma, Jagadeeshwari Sai Ma 
Jagadeeshwari Maheshwari Sayeeshwari Sai Ma (2)
Meaning: Victory to Mother Sai who is the Goddess of the Universe, Supreme and known as Mother Sayeeshwari.
Songglossary: jagadeeshwari, jay, ma, maheshwari, sai, sayee

Title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Sunaada Vinodini Ma [ Jaya Ma ... ]
Sathya Sai Saraswathi Ma
Sunaada Vinodini Ma [ Jaya Ma ... ]
Sadashiva Ranjani Ma
Sada Bhava Bhanjani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma [ Sunaada Vinodini ]
Meaning: O Mother Sathya Sai, You are Saraswathi who rejoice in soulful music set to proper tune. You are ever a source of Delight to Lord Shiva and the destroyer of the cycle of Births.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, jay, ma, ranjani, sada, sadashiva, sai, saraswathi, sathya, sunaada, vinodini

Title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma
Prema Sai Ma Ananda Sai Ma
Krupa Sai Ma Tum Hi Daya Sai Ma
Meaning: Praises be to Mother Sai who is the very personification of Supreme Love and Bliss, the One of Compassion and Mercy.
Songglossary: anand, daya, hai, jay, krupa, ma, prem, sai, tum

Title: Jaya Mana Mohana Krishna Murari
Lyrics:
Jaya Mana Mohana Krishna Murari
Jaya Nandalala Kalimala Hari [ Jaya Mana Mohana ... ]
Jaya Jaya Giridhara Parthi Vihari
Deena Bandhu Karunakara Sharana Tumhari
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Giridhari
Meaning: Victory to Krishna the vanquisher of demon Mura, the son of Nanda who removes blemishes of the present Kali age. You are the One who held aloft the mountain, to protect devotees from Torrential rain. I surrender to you Oh Lord of Parthi, a source of succor to the helpless.
Songglossary: bandhava, deen, giridhar, hari, jay, kalimala, karuna, krishna, mana, mohan, murare, nanda, partheeshwara, puttaparthi, sai, sharan, tumhara, vihar

Title: Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Rama Dootha
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Vayu Putra
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Mangala Daata
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Mahanubhava
Meaning: Victory to Maruti to the messenger of Rama, son of Wind God, Supreme Being and the One who confers Auspiciousness.
Songglossary: daata, doota, jay, mahanubhava, mangal, maruthi, putra, ram, vayu

Title: Jaya Meera Prabho Giridhari
Lyrics:
Jaya Meera Prabho Giridhari
Jaya Govinda Gopala Krishna Murari
Madhura Madhura Muralidhari
Ananda Ananda Sai Murari
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Krishna, Lord of Meera's Devotion, who held the Mountain High, the one who holds the Flute in His Hand. He is the Sweetness and Bliss personified.
Songglossary: anand, giridhar, gopal, govinda, jay, krishna, madhu, meera, murali, murare, prabhu, sai

Title: Jaya Murali Madhava Shourie
Lyrics:
Jaya Murali Madhava Shourie
Parama Pavana Pandari Natha
Paramatma Hey Purandara Vittala
Sri Ranganatha Hrudayanta Ranga
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Madhava the Valorous One, Murali with the Flute in his Hand, Pandari Natha the Lord of Pandharpur. He is Vittala the Supreme Consciousness and the Highly Sacred One and Lord of Purandara and Ranga Natha the indweller of the Heart.
Songglossary: hey, hrudaya, jay, madhava, murali, natha, pandari, param, pavan, puran, ranga, shouri, sri, vittala

Title: Jaya Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
Lyrics:
Jaya Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
Mohana Moorat Sai Gopala [ Jaya Nandalala ... ]
Jaya Brindavana Madana Gopala
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Nandalala [ Mohana Moorat ]
Meaning: Praises be to Gopala the Son of Nanda, the most Charming and the one who moves about in Brindavan. Sai Gopala has a captivating Form and is the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: brinda, gopal, jai, jay, madana, mohan, moorat, nanda, partheeshwara, sai

Title: Jaya Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
Lyrics:
Jaya Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
Raasa Vilola Radhey Gopala [ Jaya Nandalala ... ]
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Gopi Lola Gopala Bala
Meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, the son of Nanda, who performed the Celestial dance with Radha and other Gopis, delights in playing lilting tunes with the Flute and motivator of Sages and Saints.
Songglossary: bala, gopal, gopi, jai, jay, lola, munijana, murali, nanda, pala, raasa, radha, vilola

Title: Jaya Nandalala Jaya Nandalala
Lyrics:
Jaya Nandalala Jaya Nandalala
Gopi Lola Gokula Lola ( Jaya Nandalala ... )
Vishva Vanditha Vijaya Gopala
Veda Vedantha Venu Gopala
Radha Vallabha Rasa Vilola
Meaning: Lord Krishna, the beloved of Gopis, revered by the whole Universe and the great teacher of the universal reality, is Radha's Lord.
Songglossary: gokul, gopal, gopi, jay, lola, nanda, radha, rasa, vallabha, vanditha, veda, vedantha, venu, vijaya, vilola, vishwa

Title: Jaya Narayana Jaya Hari Om
Lyrics:
Jaya Narayana Jaya Hari Om ( Sai )
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Sai Om
Paramatma Sai Hari Om
Parabrahma Sai Hari Om
Hari Om Hari Om Jaya ( Sai ) Hari Om
Meaning: Chant the powerful mantra Hari Om along with the divine names Narayana, Shiva, Parabrahma, Shiva and Sai.
Songglossary: hari, jay, narayana, om, parabrahma, param, sai

Title: Jaya Narayana Jaya Hari Om
Lyrics:
Jaya Narayana Jaya Hari Om
Sai Narayana Jaya Hari Om [ Jaya Narayana ... ]
Brahma Shivaarchita Jaya Hari Om
Paapa Vinashaka Jaya Hari Om
Jaya Hari Om (Om) Jaya Hari Om
Meaning: Glory be to the Mantra 'Hari Om', which is chanted with the Name of Narayana by even the Lord of creation Brahma and the Lord of dissolution Shiva. Chanting of 'Hari Om' destroys Sins.
Songglossary: brahma, hari, jay, narayana, om, paapa, sai, shiva, vinasha

Title: Jaya Narayana Sadguru Deva
Lyrics:
Jaya Narayana Sadguru Deva
Gayana Narthana Priya Mahadeva ( Sai Deva ) [ Jaya Narayana ... ]
Nirakara Saakara Tum Hi Ho
Poorna Brahma Avatara Tum Hi Ho
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Mahadeva
Meaning: Glory to the Sacred Preceptor Narayana and Mahadeva who delights in soulful Music and Dance. Oh Sai Mahadeva! You are both the Form and Formless divinity and Incarnation of God in its Totality, who presently dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: avatar, brahma, deva, gayana, hai, ho, jay, mahadev, narayana, narthana, nirakara, poorna, priya, purishwara, puttaparthi, saakara, sadguru, sai, tum

Title: Jaya Narayana Sathya Narayana
Lyrics:
Jaya Narayana Sathya Narayana
Keshava Madhava Sai Narayana [ Jaya Narayana ... ]
Sri Krishna Govinda Sai Narayana
Mukunda Madhava Sathya Narayana
Meaning: Chant the divine Names of the Lord Keshava, Madhava, Krishna, Govinda, Mukunda, Narayana, Sathya and Sai. .
Songglossary: govinda, jay, kesha, krishna, madhava, mukunda, narayana, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Jaya Narayani Durga Lakshmi
Lyrics:
Jaya Narayani Durga Lakshmi
Jaya Jagadambe Ambe Bhavani
Jaya Jaya Shirdi Sai Bhavani
Kamale Kamini Hari Narayani
Parti Nivasini Sai Narayani
Meaning: Victory to Mother Goddess Durga, mother of the Universe, and to Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi; to the consort of Vishnu who loves lotus flowers.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, durga, hari, jagadamba, jay, kamale, kamini, lakshmi, narayani, nivasi, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi

Title: Jaya Panduranga Jaya Vittala
Lyrics:
Jaya Panduranga Jaya Vittala
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala
Pandari Natha Jaya Hari Vittala
Purandara Vittala Parama Dayala
Meaning: Glory to Vittala, the One standing on a brick, Hari, Panduranga the redeemer of the Universe, Lord of Pandharpur and Purandara (Saint Composer) and the One who is Supremely compassionate.
Songglossary: dayal, hari, jagadodhara, jay, natha, pandari, pandu, param, puran, vittala

Title: Jaya Panduranga Prabho Vittala
Lyrics:
Jaya Panduranga Prabho Vittala
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Sri Ramani Hrudayanta Ranga
Mangala Kara Karunanta Ranga
Aashritha Deena Janavana Ranga
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala [ Panduranga Vittala ]
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala (4)
Meaning: Chant and Glorify the name of the Lord Panduranga Vittala, the Lord of Pandharpur. Lord Ranga causes delight to Mother Lakshmi His consort and bestows Benevolence and Compassion to the destitute.
Songglossary: aashritha, deen, hari, hrudaya, jagadodhara, janavana, jay, kara, karuna, mangal, natha, pandari, pandu, prabhu, ramaneeya, ranga, sri, vittala

Title: Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha
Lyrics:
Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha
Jaya Gowreesha Jaya Gangadhara
Jatadhara Jaya Sai Shankara
Vijayee Bhava Tava Sharanam Dehi
Sharanam Dehi
Meaning: The Lord of Gowri, who bears Mother Ganges in His matted locks, personification of Supreme Consciousness, is Sai Shankara, the Lord of Parthi. Oh Lord I sing your Praises and seek your Protection.
Songglossary: bhava, dehi, ganga, gowrinath, jatadhara, jay, param, partheeshwara, sai, shankara, sharan, tava, vijayee

Title: Jaya Partheeshwari Jaya Parameshwari Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Partheeshwari Jaya Parameshwari Jaya Sarveshwari Mata
Mangala Dayini Moksha Pradayini Parthi Pureeshwari Mata [ Jaya Partheeshwari ]
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Ma
Ananda Dayini Sai Ma
Akhilandeshwari Sai Ma
Ananda Roopini Mata
Meaning: Glory be to the Supreme Mother of all, who confers Benevolence and Liberation and dwells in Parthi. Mother Sai bestows Freedom from fear and Bliss. She is the Mother of the Universe and Personification of Bliss.
Songglossary: abhaya, akhila, anand, dayini, jay, ma, mangal, mata, moksha, param, partheeshwari, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sarvesha, swaroopa

Title: Jaya Radha Manohara Nandalala
Lyrics:
Jaya Radha Manohara Nandalala
Jaya Geeta Vinodana Shubha Lola
Jaya Shyama Murari Goparipala (3)
Jaya Sai Murari Parthi Gopala
Meaning: Victory to the son of Nanda, charmer of Radha, who delights in sacred Music. Gopala the dark colored, slayer of demon Mura, takes care of Gopis and is Sai Murari of Parthi.
Songglossary: geeta, gopal, goparipala, jay, lola, manohar, murare, nanda, puttaparthi, radha, sai, sham, shubh, vinodana

Title: Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Jaya Rama
Jaya Jagat Janani Janaki Rama [ Jaya Raghu Nandana ... ]
Nava Nava Komala Megha Shyama
Bhava Harana Bhadrachala Rama
Meaning: Victory to Rama whose consort is Janaki, Mother of Universe, the One who is Ever new and fresh. Rama is of deep blue complexion, Lord of Bhadrachala (pilgrim center in Andhra Pradesh) destroys the cycle of Birth.
Songglossary: bhadrachala, bhava, harana, jagat, janaki, janani, jay, komala, megha, nanda, nava, raghu, ram, sham

Title: Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Jaya Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Sai Ram [ Jaya Raghu Nandana ... ]
Janaki Vallabha Sita Ram
Bhaktha Uddharana Sai Ram [ Jaya Raghu Nandana ... ]
Mayi Meera Prabhu Radhey Shyam
Mandara Giridhari Hey Ghana Shyam
Mandasmitha Mukha Radhey Shyam
Mahima Avatara Sai Ram
Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama who belongs to the Raghu clan and who is the consort of Mother Janaki and who redeems devotees. Radhey Shyam always has a smiling countenance and is also the Lord of Meera and the One who held high Mountain Mandara to protect tribesmen from the wrath of Torrential rain. He is our own Sai Rama of untainted reputation.
Songglossary: avatar, bhaktha, ghana, giridhar, hey, janaki, jay, ma, mahima, manda, meera, mukha, nanda, prabhu, radha, raghu, ram, sai, sham, sita, uddhara, vallabha

Title: Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Krishna
Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Parthi Puri Sai Ram
Jaya Sai Harey Jaya Baba Harey Jaya Brindavana Ghana Shyam
Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Parthi Puri Sai Ram [ Jaya Sai Harey ]
Meaning: Sing in Praise of Rama, Krishna the dark colored One who moves about in Brindavan, Sai Baba otherwise known as Sai Rama who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: baba, brinda, ghana, hari, jay, krishna, puri, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sham

Title: Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Rama
Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Sita Rama Harey
Jaya Krishna Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Jaya Radha Krishna Harey
Jaya Sai Harey Jaya Sai Harey Jaya Sai Baba Harey
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Rama whose consort is Mother Sita, Krishna whose consort is Radha and Sai who is also known as Sai Baba.
Songglossary: baba, hari, jay, krishna, radha, ram, sai, sita

Title: Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Jaya Rama Sri Raghu Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Jaya Rama Sita Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Meaning: Victory to Rama of Raghu Clan, whose beloved is Janaki otherwise known as Sita has now incarnated as Sai Rama.
Songglossary: janaki, jay, raghu, ram, sai, sita, sri

Title: Jaya Rama Raghu Rama
Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Raghu Rama
Ranadheera Sukumara [ Jaya Rama ]
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Rama
Rajeeva Lochana Rama Rama
Meaning: Rama the Lotus eyed, is a mighty warrior on the battlefield, the One who added reputation to His Clan.
Songglossary: jay, lochana, raghava, raghu, raja, rajeeva, ram, ranadheera, sukumara

Title: Jaya Rama Rama Rama Harey
Lyrics:
Jaya Rama Rama Rama Harey
Ghana Shyama Shyama Shyama Harey
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey
Ghana Shyama Sundara Sai Krishna Harey
Rama Harey Krishna Harey
Meaning: Repeat the name of Rama, Lord of the Raghu dynasty and Shyama the Dark complexioned Lord who has compelling looks.
Songglossary: ghana, hari, jay, krishna, raghava, raghu, ram, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Jaya Sadguru Sai Ram Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Sadguru Sai Ram Jaya Sai Mahadeva
Jaya Parthi Puri Ke Ram Jaya Shirdi Puri Ke Shyam
Lohitambara Dhara Parthi Pureeshwara
Jaya Sadguru Sai Ram
Jaya Sai Mahadeva
Meaning: Victory to the Sacred preceptor Sai Ram and Sai Mahadeva. Victory to Ram who has incarnated as the Lord of Parthi and Shyam who had incarnated as the Lord of Shirdi. Glory to the Sacred Preceptor Sai Ram and Sai Mahadeva who wears a red robe.
Songglossary: dhara, jay, ke, lohitambara, mahadev, puri, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sadguru, sai, sham, shirdi

Title: Jaya Sai Gopala Jaya Nandalala
Lyrics:
Jaya Sai Gopala Jaya Nandalala
Madhusudhana Krishna Jaya Mana Mohana
Shyamala Komala Jaya Parthi Krishna [ Jaya Sai ... ]
Hrudaya Vihara Hey Chitha Chora
Hey Chitha Chora Hey Chitha Chora
Bhakthon Ke Pyaarey Krishna Pyaarey Bal Sai Krishna
Meaning: This bhajan extols the virtues of Lord Sai Krishna as, the one who enchants and steals the hearts of devotees who love Him.
Songglossary: bala, bhakthon, chitha, chora, gopal, hey, hrudaya, jay, ke, komala, krishna, madhu, mana, mohan, nanda, puttaparthi, pyaara, sai, sham, vihar

Title: Jaya Sai Guru Deva Sai
Lyrics:
Jaya Sai Guru Deva Sai Guru Deva
Guru Seva Bina Nirvana Nahin Jaya Sai Guru Deva [ Jaya Sai ... ]
Tum Hi Ho Mata Pitha Tum Hi Ho Sai Guru Deva
Sathya Swaroopa Raaha Dikhao Sai Guru Deva [ Guru Seva ]
Meaning: There is no salvation without Your Service Oh Preceptor Sai! Grace me with your advice for you are the Embodiment of Truth, My Mother, Father and Preceptor.
Songglossary: bina, deva, dikhao, guru, hai, ho, jay, mata, nahin, nirvana, pitha, raha, sai, sathya, seva, swaroopa, tum

Title: Jaya Sai Maharaj Dayalu
Lyrics:
Jaya Sai Maharaj Dayalu
Jaya Shiva Shankara Parthipurishwara( Jaya Sai ... )
Pranavakara Sundara Sundara
Natana Manohara Nata Shiva Shankara
Puttapartheeshwara Daya Krupalu
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the compassionate one of Puttaparthi; to Lord Sai Shiva, the beautiful dancer and creator of the life force.
Songglossary: daya, dayal, jay, krupa, maharaj, manohar, nata, natana, partheeshwara, pranava, puttapartheeshwara, sai, shankara, shiva, sundara

Title: Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Raghu
Lyrics:
Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Raghu Rama (3)
Hey Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Raghu Rama [ Jaya Sai ]
Dukhiyon Ke Daata Sai Rama
Premavatara Sai Rama
Shantha Swaroopa Sai Rama [ Hey Jaya ]
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Sai Rama and Scion of Raghu Clan, Raghu Rama. Sai Rama is a champion of the downtrodden, the incarnation of Supreme Love and is the Embodiment of Peace.
Songglossary: avatar, daata, hey, jay, ke, prem, raghu, ram, sai, shantha, swaroopa

Title: Jaya Sai Ranga Jaya Panduranga
Lyrics:
Jaya Sai Ranga Jaya Panduranga
Karunanta Ranga Hrdayanta Ranga
Shri Ranga Ranga Jaya Ranga Ranga
Ananda Ranga Sadananda Ranga [ Karunanta Ranga ... ]
Meaning: O Lord Sai Ranga! You are infinitely merciful and reciting Your name creates waves of sublime feelings and emotions in the heart. Glory to Lord Sai Ranga, who is all bliss and ever in bliss.
Songglossary: anand, hrudaya, jay, karuna, pandu, ranga, sadana, sai, sri

Title: Jaya Sai Shankara Jaya Abhayankara
Lyrics:
Jaya Sai Shankara Jaya Abhayankara
Samba Sadashiva Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey [ Jaya Sai ... ]
Jaya Gangadhara Jaya Bimbadhara
Vyagrambaradhara Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey
Meaning: Glory to Sai who is Shankara and bestows freedom from fear, the one whose other half is 'Amba' who is known as 'Shiva and Hara, one who has Mother Ganga and crescent moon on his head and sits on the Tiger's skin.
Songglossary: abhaya, bimbadhara, ganga, hara, hey, jay, sadashiva, sai, samba, shankara, shiva, vyagrambara

Title: Jaya Sayeesha Jaya Sayeesha
Lyrics:
Jaya Sayeesha Jaya Sayeesha
Radha Madhava Jaya Partheesha [ Jaya Sayeesha ... ]
Hrudaya Sarathi Sai Kanhaiya
Radhey Govinda Prashanthi Nilaya
Meaning: Radha Madhava otherwise known as Radhey Govinda has incarnated again on Earth as Sayeesha, the charioteer of the Spiritual Heart and dwells at Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi.
Songglossary: govinda, hrudaya, jay, kanha, madhava, nilaya, partheeshwara, prashanthi, radha, sai, sarathi, sayee

Title: Jaya Shankara Bhaava Gochara Shiva
Lyrics:
Jaya Shankara Bhaava Gochara Shiva Chidambara Omkara
Parthi Vihara Paapa Vidhura
Jagadodhara Brahmapara (3)
Meaning: Glory to Shankara who is beyond senses, Lord of Chidambaram (Holy place in India), personified as Omkara, the Supreme Brahman, the Lord of Parthi who removes sin and uplifts the world.
Songglossary: bhaav, chidambara, gochara, jagadodhara, jay, om, paapa, parabrahma, puttaparthi, shankara, shiva, vidhura, vihara

Title: Jaya Shiva Shankara Kailasa Vasi
Lyrics:
Jaya Shiva Shankara Kailasa Vasi
Jaya Jaya Ramachandra Ayodhya Vasi [ Jaya Shiva ... ]
Jaya Jaya Sri Krishna Dwaraka Vasi
Jaya Jaya Ram Krishna Dakshina Vasi
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Shirdi Nivasi
Jaya Jaya Jaya Puttaparthi Nivasi
Meaning: Victory to Shiva Shankara who has His Abode at Kailasa, Ramachandra at Ayodhya, Sri Krishna at Dwaraka, Ramakrishna at Dakshineshwar and to the One who dwells at Shirdi and Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: ayodhya, dakshina, dwaraka, jay, kailasa, krishna, nivasi, puttaparthi, ram, ramachandra, shankara, shirdi, shiva, sri, vasi

Title: Jaya Shri Madhava Jaya Radhe
Lyrics:
Jaya Shri Madhava Jaya Radhey Govinda
Mukunda Murahara Murali Govinda
Aao Jaya Murali Govinda
Deena Bandhu Deena Nath Radhey Govinda
Prema Sindhu Prema Natha Sai Govinda
Meaning: Salutations to Radha's Lord, Govinda(Krishna), the charming flute-player and slayer of demon Mura. He is an ocean of love and the kinsman and Lord of those who are less fortunate.
Songglossary: aao, bandhava, deen, govinda, jay, madhava, mukunda, murahara, murali, natha, prem, radha, sai, sindhu, sri

Title: Jaya Sri Ganesha Vighna Nasha
Lyrics:
Jaya Sri Ganesha Vighna Nasha Gajanana
Vidya Buddhi Sarva Siddhi Sunandana [ Jaya Sri ... ]
Jaya Heyramba Sri Jagadamba Nandana
Eka Dantha Dayavantha Shubhanana
Mangala Dayaka Sri Vinayaka Vandana
Meaning: Glory to the Lord of Ganaas destroyer of obstacles who has the head of an Elephant who confers scholarship, intelligence, power. Glory to the son of Jagadamba, single tusked, compassionate bestower of auspiciousness. I bow to thee who has no leader.
Songglossary: buddhi, dantha, dayaka, dayavantha, eka, gajamukha, ganesha, heyramba, jagadamba, jay, mangal, nanda, nasha, sarva, shubh, siddhi, sri, sunanda, vandana, vidya, vighna, vinayaka

Title: Jaya Vallabha Gananayaka
Lyrics:
Jaya Vallabha Gananayaka
Jaya Guha Sodara Shubha Daata
Jaya Hey Eshwari Nandana
Jaya Vara Dayaka Namostuthey
Jaya Partheeshwara Namostuthey
Meaning: Glory to the Lord of ganaas, the brother of Guha (Lord Subrahmanya), who bestows auspiciousness, son of Eshwari, Pranaams to one who confers boons and the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: daata, dayaka, eshwar, gananayaka, guha, hey, jay, namostuthey, nanda, partheeshwara, shubh, sodara, vallabha, vara

Title: Jaya Vijayee Bhava Jaya Vijayee
Lyrics:
Jaya Vijayee Bhava Jaya Vijayee Bhava
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Hanumantha
Pavana Kumara Vanara Veera
Ati Balavanta Hanumantha
Anjani Putra Veeranjaneya
Niranjana Vijayee Bhava (Bolo) (2)
Meaning: Victory to the One who removes fear of repetitive Births. The son of Pavana and Anjana is blemishless and one of extraordinary strength.
Songglossary: anjani, ati, balavanta, bhava, bhaya, bolo, hanuman, jay, kumara, nasha, niranjan, pavan, putra, vanara, veera, vijayee

Title: Jaya Vijayee Bhava Parthi Pureeshwara
Lyrics:
Jaya Vijayee Bhava Parthi Pureeshwara
Jaya Bhakthashraya Krupa Maya
Jaya Jaya Jaya Sarva Jagat Rakshaka
Jaya Jaya Jaya Janardhana
Jaya Jaya Jaya Sayeeshwara
Meaning: Let us a song of Victory to Sayeeshwara, who dwells at Parthi, has utmost compassion for His devotees, Protector of the whole Universe and to the Motivator of His followers.
Songglossary: bhaktha, bhava, jagat, janardhana, jay, krupa, maya, purishwara, puttaparthi, raksha, sarva, sayee, vijayee

Title: Jaya Vittala Vittala Vittala Jaya
Lyrics:
Jaya Vittala Vittala Vittala Jaya Vittala Panduranga
Jaya Vittala Panduranga (3)
Meaning: Chant the name of Vittala, the One standing on a brick and of Panduranga incessantly.
Songglossary: jay, pandu, vittala

Title: Jayatu Jayatu Rama
Lyrics:
Jayatu Jayatu Rama
Janani Janaki Rama
Janana Marana Bhaya Klesha Vinasha
Raghupathi Sita Rama Rama Ramethi Rama
Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, consort of Mother Janaki, the one who destroys fear of birth and death, the Emperor of Raghu dynasty.
Songglossary: bhaya, janaki, janam, janani, jay, klesha, maran, raghu, ram, ramethi, sita, vinasha

Title: Jayatu Shiva Natana Shiva
Lyrics:
Jayatu Shiva Natana Shiva
Jaya Jagadeesha Mahesha Shiva [ Jayatu Shiva ... ]
Bhasma Vibhushitha Phaala Shashidhara
Pingala Lochana Ganga Mohana
Pinaka Vaibhava Sai Shankara
Meaning: Sing the Glories of the Lord of Dance Shiva, the Universal and Sovereign Lord. Shiva has the Sacred Ash smeared all over His body, the Crescent Moon on His forehead, has brown-colored eyes, charms Mother Ganges and holds the Bow (Pinaka) in His hand who is also Sai Shankara.
Songglossary: bhasma, bushan, ganga, jagadeesha, jay, lochana, mahesha, mohan, natana, paalaya, pinaka, pingala, sai, shankara, shashi, shiva, vaibhava

Title: Jayatu Shiva Shiva Janaki Rama
Lyrics:
Jayatu Shiva Shiva Janaki Rama
Jaya Raghu Nandana Radhey Shyama
Tyaga Karo Abhimaan
Dhyan Karo Hari Naam [ Jayatu Shiva ... ]
Taraka Naama Smaranam
Tapatraya Samharanam
Meaning: Chant the Glory of Lord Shiva, Janaki Rama, Raghu Nandana, Radhey Shyam. Shed your Ego and Chant Hari's Name, which destroys our Sin and helps us to cross the cycle of Births.
Songglossary: abhimaan, dhyaan, hari, janaki, jay, karo, naam, nanda, radha, raghu, ram, samhara, sham, shiva, smaran, tapatraya, taraka, tyaga

Title: Jayatu Vittala Jaya Vittala
Lyrics:
Jayatu Vittala Jaya Vittala
Rakumayi Vittala Ranga Vittala [ Jayatu Vittala ... ]
Jayatu Vittala Jaya Vittala [ Rakumayi Vittala ]
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Vittala, Ranga Vittala and His consort Rakumayi continuously.
Songglossary: jay, rakumayi, ranga, vittala

Title: Jeevan Ki Naiya Mori Paar
Lyrics:
Jeevan Ki Naiya Mori Paar Karo Sai Nath
Sai Nath Sai Nath Parthi Puri Sai Nath
Prem Sudha Sagar Tu(M) Sai Bhagawan
Deena Bandhu Deena Sakha Sai Bhagawan
Madad Karo Raksha Karo Sai Natha Hey [ Sai Nath ]
Meaning: Oh Sai Nath, Help me to reach the other end through the boat of Life, the Lord of Parthi. Oh Sai Bhagawan, protect me for you are verily the Ocean of Supreme Love, the refuge of the Forlorn and the deserted.
Songglossary: bandhava, bhagawan, deen, hey, jeeva, karo, madad, mori, naiya, natha, paar, prem, puri, puttaparthi, raksha, sagar, sai, sakha, sudha, tum

Title: Jeevana Jyothi Jalao Kanhaiya
Lyrics:
Jeevana Jyothi Jalao Kanhaiya
Jo Kuch Mera Sab Hai Tera [ Jeevana Jyothi ... ]
Daya Karo Mujhey Hey Sai Shyama
Sharan Lagalo Mujhey Krishna Kanhaiya
Hey Anatha Natha Sri Sai Natha
Meaning: Light the Lamp of my Life Oh Young Krishna, I owe everything to You Oh Lord. Accept me into your fold Oh Child Krishna Bless me with your Grace, Oh Sai Natha the refuge of the Forlorn.
Songglossary: anath, daya, hai, hey, jalao, jeeva, jo, jyoth, kanha, karo, krishna, kuch, lagalo, mera, mujhe, natha, sab, sai, sham, sharan, sri, tera

Title: Jeevana Jyothi Tum Ho Sai
Lyrics:
Jeevana Jyothi Tum Ho Sai
Prem Ki Jyothi Jalao Sai Prem Ki Jyothi Jalao
Jeevan Ke In Andhiyaron Mey Sai Deep Jalao
Sai Deep Jalao Sai Deep Jalao [ Prem Ki Jyothi ]
Meaning: Light the Lamp of Love of Life Oh Sai, to cross the dark crevices of this Turbulent world.
Songglossary: andhera, deep, ho, jalao, jeeva, jyoth, ke, prem, sai, tum

Title: Jesus, Jesus, Son of the Lord
Lyrics:
Jesus, Jesus, Son of the Lord
 Jesus, Jesus, dear Son of God
 Let me call your Name, let man cry in shame
 That the love You taught, my Lord, is lost again
 Love was Your Life, love was Your call
 Love was the reason why You gave Your life, my Lord
 Love God and most of all, those who hate you, love them all
 Love your neighbor as yourself was Your Call

Title: Jhulana Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
Lyrics:
Jhulana Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
Sai Nandalala He Brija Bala [ Jhulane Jhule ... ]
Murali Lola Gokula Bala
Rasa Manohar Gana Vilola [ Jhulane Jhule ... ]
Dheere Dheere Hauley Hauley
Meaning: Ride the swing, my Sai, darling son of Nanda; You are the boy from Vraja and Gokul, who plays the flute, likes to perform the folk dance, Rasa, and You enchant Radha's mind.
Songglossary: bala, brija, dheere, gana, gokul, hauley, jhulana, lola, manohar, mera, murali, nanda, rasa, sai, vilola

Title: Jhulana Jhule Sai Gopala
Lyrics:
Jhulana Jhule Sai Gopala
Krishna Natavara Nandalala [ Jhulana Jhule ... ]
Govinda Giridhara Gokula Bala
Shyama Manohara Muraliwala
Shobhita Sundara Prem Hindola
Meaning: Oh Gopala rock in the Swing of my Heart, the mischievous son of Nanda. Govinda the dark complexioned boy of Gokul who held the mountain high, has the Flute in Hand and a bewitching smile on His face.
GeneralComments: Shruthi should be set to Shuddh Nishad
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gokul, gopal, govinda, hindola, jhulana, krishna, manohar, murali, nanda, natavara, prem, sai, sham, shobhita, sundara

Title: Jhulana Jhule Sai Jhulana Jhule
Lyrics:
Jhulana Jhule Sai Jhulana Jhule
Jhulana Jhule ( Sai ) Jhulana Jhule [ Jhulana Jhule ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanty Prema Jhulana Jhule
Sarva Dharma Aikya Roopa Jhulana Jhule [ Jhulana Jhule ... ]
Meaning: Ride the swing, O Lord Sai; You are truth, righteousness, peace, and love, and You personify the unity of all faiths.
Songglossary: aikya, dharma, jhulana, prem, roopa, sai, sarva, sathya

Title: Jhulana Jhule Sai Jhulana Jhule
Lyrics:
Jhulana Jhule Sai Jhulana Jhule (2)
Nandana Nandana Ananda Chandana
Madhava Mana Mohana Sai Narayana
Meaning: Rock the Swing of My Heart Oh son of Nanda who is Bliss Supreme, Oh Madhava who draws everyone's Mind, Oh Sai Narayana.
Songglossary: anand, chand, jhulana, madhava, mana, mohan, nanda, narayana, sai

Title: Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai
Lyrics:
Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai Ram
Sathya Sai Ram Hey Bhagawan [ Jhulana Jhule ]
Eshwaramba Nandana Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram [ Eshwaramba Nandana ]
Man Mandir Mey Jai Sai Ram
Jai Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Jai Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Jai Sai Ram (3)
Meaning: Rock the Swing of our Heart to the tune of this bhajan Oh Sathya Sairam, son of Eshwaramba. Sai ram in our minds and Sai ram in our hearts. Victory to Sai Ram.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bolo, eshwar, hey, jai, jhulana, mana, mandir, mera, nanda, ram, sai, sathya

Title: Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai
Lyrics:
Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
Sai Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala [ Jhulana Mey ]
Murali Lola Gokula Bala
Radha Manohara Raasa Vilola
Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
Dheere Dheere Hauley Hauley
Meaning: Rock the swing of my heart slowly, Oh son of Nanda, Gopala, Young Krishna who plays the Flute and moves around Gokul.
Songglossary: bala, dheere, gokul, gopal, hauley, jai, jhulana, lola, manohar, mera, murali, nanda, raasa, radha, sai, vilola

Title: Jingle Bells
Lyrics:
1. Dashing Through The Snow
In A One-horse Open Sleigh
O'er The Fields We Go
Laughing All The Way
Bells On Bobtail Ring
Making Spirits Bright
What Fun It Is To Ride And Sing
A Sleighing Song Tonight!

2. Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells,
Jingle All The Way.
Oh! What Fun It Is To Ride
In A One-horse Open Sleigh.
Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells,
Jingle All The Way;
Oh! What Fun It Is To Ride
In A One-horse Open Sleigh.

3. A Day Or Two Ago
I Thought I'd Take A Ride
And Soon, Miss Fanny Bright
Was Seated By My Side,
The Horse Was Lean And Lank
Misfortune Seemed His Lot
He Got Into A Drifted Bank
And Then We Got Upset.

4. Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells,
Jingle All The Way.
Oh! What Fun It Is To Ride
In A One-horse Open Sleigh.
Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells,
Jingle All The Way;
Oh! What Fun It Is To Ride
In A One-horse Open Sleigh
Songglossary: go

Title: Jo Bhi Hari Ka Bhajan
Lyrics:
Jo Bhi Hari Ka Bhajan Karey
Woh Hi Brahma Hari Pad Paavey
Sai Nath Jo Bhajana Karey
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Karey
Meaning: Those who chant the name of Hari alone reach the position of Brahman (Lord of Universe). Those who chant the name of Sai is sure to cross the cycle of birth and death.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhava, bhi, brahma, hai, hari, jo, ka, karo, natha, paada, paar, paavey, sagar, sai, se, woh

Title: Joota Jatadhara Gangadhari
Lyrics:
Joota Jatadhara Gangadhari
Shivaya Namah Shiva Om
Shiva Shiva Om Hara Hara Om [ Shivaya Namah ]
Gangadhara Gowri Shiva
Shivaya Namah Shiva Om
Meaning: Prostrations to Shiva who has Ganges on His matted Locks of Hair on His Head and consort of Gowri.
Songglossary: ganga, gowri, hara, jatadhara, joota, namah, om, shiva

Title: Joy To The World
Lyrics:
1. Joy To The World, The Lord Has Come!
Let Earth Receive Her King;
Let Every Heart Prepare Him Room,
And Heaven And Nature Sing,
And Heaven And Nature Sing,
And Heaven, And Heaven, And Nature Sing.

2. Joy To The World, The Savior Reigns!
Let Men Their Songs Employ;
While Fields And Floods, Rocks, Hills And Plains
Repeat The Sounding Joy,
Repeat The Sounding Joy,
Repeat, Repeat, The Sounding Joy.

3. No More Let Sins And Sorrows Grow,
Nor Thorns Infest The Ground;
He Comes To Make His Blessings Flow
Far As The Curse Is Found,
Far As The Curse Is Found,
Far As, Far As, The Curse Is Found.

4. He Rules The World With Truth And Grace,
And Makes The Nations Prove
The Glories Of His Righteousness,
And Wonders Of His Love,
And Wonders Of His Love,
And Wonders, Wonders, Of His Love
Songglossary: make, more

Title: Joyful Lord we adore Thee
Kaalatheethaya Siddhi Roopaya Yogeshwaraya Namo
Lyrics:
Kaalatheethaya Siddhi Roopaya Yogeshwaraya Namo
Jagat Hithaya Vishwa Roopaya
Sayeeshwaraya Namo
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (5)
Meaning: We bow to the Lord of Yogis, to the one who is beyond time and considerate. We bow to Lord Sai who has the Universe as his form, to Lord Sathya Sai who is Shiva the embodiment of Om.
Songglossary: hithaya, jagat, kaala, namah, namo, om, roopa, sayee, shiva, siddhi, vishwa, yogi

Title: Kaali Kaali Maha Kaali Kapalini
Lyrics:
Kaali Kaali Maha Kaali Kapalini
Durga Durga Devi Durga Bhavani
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari
Raja Rajeshwari Lakshmi ( Sai ) Narayani
Meaning: Salutations to Mother Kaali, the dark complexioned, ferocious, wearing a garland of skulls. She is Durga Bhavani the destroyer of evil. She is the Lord of Emperors also known as Maheshwari, Gowri, Lakshmi and Narayani the bestower of Auspiciousness.
Songglossary: bhava, devi, durga, gowri, kaali, kapalini, lakshmi, maha, maheshwari, mangal, mata, narayani, raja, rajeshwari, sai

Title: Kaali Kapalini Jagat Janani
Lyrics:
Kaali Kapalini Jagat Janani
Lakshmi Narayani Jagat Janani
Parthi Nivasini Jagat Janani
Triloka Palini Jagat Janani
Trinetra Dharini Jagat Janani
Brahma Sanathani Jagat Janani
Jayatu Sai Janani Janani
Meaning: Mother of the Universe Kaali wears a garland of Skulls, Lakshmi Consort of Lord Narayana, Guardian of the Three worlds, the One who bears three eyes and the Ancient Godhead who has Her Abode in Parthi.
Songglossary: brahma, dhari, jagat, janani, jay, kaali, kapalini, lakshmi, narayani, nivasi, palini, puttaparthi, sai, sanatana, triloka, trinetra

Title: Kab Logey Khabar Morey Ram
Lyrics:
Kab Logey Khabar Morey Ram
Mujhey Apna Banalo Ghana Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam
Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram [ Ghana Shyam ]
Meaning: When will you take notice of me Oh Lord Ram? Let me merge in you Oh dark complexioned Shyam. Chant repeatedly the name of Lord Sai Ram, Ghana Shyam.
Songglossary: apna, banalo, ghana, kab, khabar, logey, morey, mujhe, ram, sai, sham

Title: Kahan Main Dhoondoon Hey Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Kahan Main Dhoondoon Hey Bhagawan
Darshan Do Darshan Do
Darsha Dikhao Merey Sai Bhagawan
Kabhi Mandir Mey Kabhi Masjid Mey
Apna Hrudaya Mey Hai Bhagawan
Teerath Mey Kabhi Murath Mey (Kabhi)
Parthi Puri Ke Prabhu Sai Bhagawan
Darshan Do Darshan Do [ Darsha Dikhao ]
Meaning: Where shall I search for you Oh Sai Bhagawan? Grant us your Divine Darshan. The Lord is not to be found in the deities of temples, mosques or holy places but is present within our hearts. Grant such a Darshan Oh Sai Bhagawan.
Songglossary: apna, bhagawan, darsh, dhoondoon, dikhao, do, hai, hey, hrudaya, kabhi, kahan, ke, mandir, masjid, mera, murthy, prabhu, puri, puttaparthi, sai, teera

Title: Kailasa Pathey Bhagawan Shankara
Lyrics:
Kailasa Pathey Bhagawan Shankara
Ayodhya Pathi Sri Rama Raghuvara
Mathura Pathey Sri Krishna Natavara
Parthi Pathey Sai Ram Shankara
