Meaning: Shankara is the Lord of Kailasa. Sri Rama belongs to Raghu lineage and is the Lord of Ayodhya. Krishna the supreme actor is the Lord of Mathura and Sai Shankara is the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: ayodhya, bhagawan, kailasa, krishna, mathura, natavara, pathey, pathi, puttaparthi, raghu, ram, sai, shankara, sri

Title: Kailasa Pathey Karuna Nidhey
Lyrics:
Kailasa Pathey Karuna Nidhey
Karuna Nidhey Sharanam Prabho [ Kailasa Pathey ... ]
Ganga Jatadhara Girija Pathey
Shambho Shankara Sai Prabho
Meaning: I surrender to the Lord of Kailasa who is an Ocean of compassion. The One with matted locks and Ganges on His Head is the origin of all that is well.
Songglossary: ganga, girija, jatadhara, kailasa, karuna, nidhey, pathey, prabhu, sai, shambho, shankara, sharan

Title: Kailasa Pathey Mahadeva Shambho
Lyrics:
Kailasa Pathey Mahadeva Shambho
Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Hey Shiva Shankara Sai Shankara Om Namah Shivaya
Hey Tripurari Bhava Bhaya Haari Om Namah Shivaya
Hey Pralayankara Hara Hara Shankara Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Sai Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya
Meaning: Oh Lord of Lords, dweller of Mount Kailasa, is the bestower of auspiciousness. Chant the mantra 'Om Nama Shivaya' repeatedly. Shankara who is also Sai Shankara bestows welfare of the world, the destroyer of Tripura and who negates the fear of rebirth, the one who causes the final delusion.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, hara, harana, hari, hey, kailasa, mahadev, namah, om, pathey, pralayankara, sai, shambho, shankara, shiva, tripura

Title: Kailasa Pathey Sai Karuna Nidhey
Lyrics:
Kailasa Pathey Sai Karuna Nidhey
Parvathi Pathey Pashupathey [ Kailasa Pathey ... ]
Shambho Shankara Shirdi (Parthi) Pathey
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Pathey
Sathya Sai Shiva Vishwa Pathey (Sri)
Meaning: Parvathi's Consort is Lord of Animals and Lord of Kailasa and Ocean of compassion. Shambho Shankara is the Lord of Shirdi, the One who has Ganges on His head is the consort of Gowri and Sathya Sai is the Lord of the Universe.
Songglossary: ganga, gowri, jatadhara, kailasa, karuna, nidhey, parvathi, pashu, pathey, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, shambho, shankara, shirdi, shiva, sri, vishwa

Title: Kailasa Vasa Gangadhara
Lyrics:
Kailasa Vasa Gangadhara
Ananda Tandava Sadashiva
Himagiri Vasa Samba Shiva [ Kailasa Vasa ... ]
Ganapathi Sevitha Hey Jagadeesha
Sharavana Sevitha Hey Paramesha
Shaila Girishwara Uma Maheshwara
Neela Lochana Natana Natesha
Ananda Tandava Sadashiva [ Himagiri Vasa ]
Meaning: The Lord of the Mother Ganges dwells in Kailasa in the Himalayan ranges, whose consort is Amba, performs the celestial dance of Bliss. The Lord of Universe is served by His sons Ganapathi and Sharavana. Shiva is the consort of Uma resides in the Shaila Mountains and Lord of Dance has Blue eyes.
Songglossary: anand, gananayaka, ganga, girisha, hey, himagiri, jagadeesha, kailasa, lochana, maheshwara, natana, natesha, neela, param, sadashiva, samba, sevita, shaila, sharavana, shiva, tandava, uma, vasa

Title: Kailasa Vasa Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Kailasa Vasa Shiva Shankara
Kanaka Sabesha Nateshwara
Akasha Lingam Digambara
Shivakami Sundara Chidambara
Shiva Shakti Roopa Vishvambara
Meaning: Lord Shiva, Lord of Chidambaram, resident of Kailasa and of the golden(grandiose)assembly of the Universe, is the embodiment of Shiva-Shakti(energy). He represents the energy(lingam), with neither a beginning nor an end that pervades everywhere.
Songglossary: akasha, chidambara, digambara, kailasa, kanaka, kanaka-sabesha, linga, nataneshwara, roopa, shakthi, shankara, shiva, sundara, vasa, vishwambharadhara

Title: Kala Roopini Kadambari
Lyrics:
Kala Roopini Kadambari
Naada Roopini Narayani
Sathya Dharma Roopini Sayeeshwari
Mangala Roopini Maheshwari (Sarva)
Kadambari Narayani (Amba)
Sayeeshwari Maheshwari (Sathya)
Meaning: Kadambari is the personification of Fine arts, Narayani is the personification of Sound, Sayeeshwari is the embodiment of Truth and righteousness, Maheshwari is the embodiment of Auspiciousness.
Songglossary: amba, dharma, kadamba, kala, maheshwari, mangal, naada, narayani, sarva, sathya, sayee, swaroopa

Title: Kalavathi Amba Saraswathi
Lyrics:
Kalavathi Amba Saraswathi
Naada Brahmamayi Vedavathi
Ananda Roopini Vidyavathi
Veda Brahmamayi Sai Bhagawathi
Parthi Pureeshwari Amba Saraswathi [ Naada Brahma ]
Meaning: Salutations to Mother Saraswathi the mother of all arts. She is also the Mother of Vedas, Brahman in the form of sound. Saraswathi is the mother of all knowledge and has bliss as her form, residing at Parthi.
Songglossary: amba, anand, bhagavathi, brahma, kalavathi, naada, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, saraswathi, swaroopa, veda, vedavathi, vidya

Title: Kalavathi Kali Kapalini
Lyrics:
Kalavathi Kali Kapalini
Devi Saraswathi Veda Narayani [ Kalavathi Kali ... ]
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari
Jagadodharini Durga Bhavani
Meaning: Worship Mother Kali, who destroys evil and wears a garland of skulls; Mother Saraswathi, Goddess of knowledge and wisdom, from whom the Vedas emanated; Supreme Mother Gowri, who confers auspiciousness and is the savior of the Universe.
Songglossary: bhava, devi, durga, gowri, jagadodhara, kalavathi, kali, kapalini, maheshwari, mangal, mata, narayani, saraswathi, veda

Title: Kali Yug Ke Avatar Ho
Lyrics:
Kali Yug Ke Avatar Ho Sai Baba
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Eswaramma
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Hey Parameshwara
Dukhiyon Ke Dukh Door Karo Tum
Sai Hey Parameshwara
Bolo Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Eswaramma
Meaning: Blessed was Mother Eswaramma Oh Lord Sai of this Kali age, you are none other than Brahma, Vishnu and Parameshwara, the one who drives away the miseries of the downtrodden, Oh Lord Parameshwara, Oh Lord Sai Ram, Blessed was Mother Eswaramma.
Songglossary: avatar, baba, bolo, brahma, dhanya, door, dukh, eswar, hey, ho, kali, karo, ke, param, ram, sai, tum, vishnu, yuga

Title: Kali Yug Ke Avatara Sai
Lyrics:
Kali Yug Ke Avatara Sai Baba
Araj Suno Parthi Baba
Daya Ke Sagara Sai Baba
Karunamaya Sai Prema Pradatha
Deena Janon Ke Sai Baba
Bhaktha Janon Ke Sai Baba
Sathya Sanathana Sai Baba
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are the incarnation of this Kali age, please listen to my appeal, Oh Lord of Compassion, the bestower of Love, the kin of your devotees, the needy and the downtrodden. You are Eternal.
Songglossary: araj, avatar, baba, bhaktha, daya, deen, jana, kali, karuna, ke, pradatha, prem, puttaparthi, sagar, sai, sanatana, sathya, suno, yuga

Title: Kali Yuga Avatara Sai Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Kali Yuga Avatara Sai Bhagawan
Krupa Nidhey Deenon Ke Pran [ Kali Yuga Avatara ... ]
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Bhagawan
Antaryami Sai Bhagawan
Karuna Sindhu Sai Bhagawan
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: Sai Bhagawan is the Incarnation of the Kali Age, son of Mother Eshwaramba, the indweller of every being, the ocean of compassion and the Life of the underprivileged is the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: antar, avatar, bhagawan, deenon, eshwar, kali, karuna, ke, krupa, nanda, nidhey, pran, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sindhu, yuga

Title: Kalimala Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Lyrics:
Kalimala Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Karunanta Ranga Kaivalya Dhama [ Kalimala Bhanjana ... ]
Maya Manusha Munijana Prema
Madhura Manohara Mangala Naama
Parthi Pureesha Prabhu Paramatma
Patitha Pavana Pattabhi Rama
Meaning: The bow wielding Rama destroys the evil effects of the Kali age, is compassionate and grants liberation. Rama who loves sages has an elusive form of a human being whose name is sweet, enchanting and confers Auspiciousness. The emancipator of the downtrodden, the cosmic consciousness is presently dwelling at Parthi.
Songglossary: bhanjana, dhama, kaivalya, kalimala, karuna, kodanda, madhu, mangal, manohar, manusha, maya, munijana, naam, param, patitha, pattabhi, pavan, prabhu, prem, pureesha, puttaparthi, ram, ranga

Title: Kalyana Krishna Kamaneeya Krishna
Lyrics:
Kalyana Krishna Kamaneeya Krishna
Kalinga Narthana Sri Krishna
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Gopi Mana Sanchari
Murari Gopi Mana Sanchari
Brindavan Ke Tulasi Mala
Peetambara Dhari Murari
Meaning: We bow to the enchanting form of Krishna born to redeem the world of its negative afflictions, who subdued the poisonous serpent Kalinga by dancing on it. Krishna lifted the Govardhan mountains to protect the devotees from the wrath of Indra, has captured the hearts of Gopis, the slayer of demon Mura. Our Salutations to the One who adorns the Tulasi garland and the Yellow cloth.
Songglossary: brinda, dhari, giridhar, gopi, govardhan, kalinga, kalyan, kamaneeya, ke, krishna, mala, mana, murare, narthana, peetambara, sanchari, sri, tulasi

Title: Kalyana Rama Ananda Rama
Lyrics:
Kalyana Rama Ananda Rama
Rama Sri Rama Jaya Rama [ Kalyana Rama ... ]
Avatara Sai Avatara Rama
Poorna Avatara Sathya Sai Rama
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Rama, who confers bliss and causes the welfare of the world. Salutations to Lord Rama the incarnation and Sathya Sai Rama who has come down with all the facets of an incarnation.
Songglossary: anand, avatar, jay, kalyan, poorna, ram, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Kalyana Ranga Kamaneeya Ranga
Lyrics:
Kalyana Ranga Kamaneeya Ranga
Ananda Ranga Sadananda Ranga
Hrudayanta Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Rakumayi Ranga Sayeesha Ranga
Shirdeesha Ranga Partheesha Ranga [ Ananda Ranga ]
Meaning: Lord Ranga is One who bestows welfare. One of Everlasting Bliss, of compassion, Lord of Rakumayi, is Sayeesha the One who dwells at Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: anand, hrudaya, kalyan, kamaneeya, karuna, partheeshwara, rakumayi, ranga, sadana, sayee, shirdeesha

Title: Kamakshi Kalyani Kadambari
Lyrics:
Kamakshi Kalyani Kadambari
Katyayani Gowri Kanakambari
Vagesri Nithyeshwari Panchakshari
Vamesri Poorneshri Parameshwari [ Kamakshi Kalyani ]
Maadhasthi Matangi Maheshwari
Jagadamba Bhagawathi Rageshwari (Sayeeshwari)
Meaning: This Bhajan extols the Goddess Parvathi with several of her other names.
Songglossary: bhagavathi, gowri, jagadamba, kadamba, kalyan, kamakshi, kanaka, katyayani, maheshwari, matangi, nithyeshwari, pancha, param, poorna, rageshwari, sayee, vageshwari, vamesri

Title: Kamala Manohari Shiva Sai Shankari
Lyrics:
Kamala Manohari Shiva Sai Shankari
Kali Kapalini Kadambari [ Kamala Manohari ... ]
Jaya Katyayani Parama Krupakari
Kanchi Nivasini Kamakshi Sundari
Parti Nivasini Parvathi Sundari
Parti Nivasini Sathya Sai Sundari
Meaning: As enchanting as the lotus flower is Mother Goddess Sai Shankari, consort of Lord Shiva. She is also known as Kali, Kapalini, Kadambari and Katyayani. Beautiful Mother Parvathi, with loving eyes resides in Kanchi and Parthi.
Songglossary: jay, kadamba, kali, kamakshi, kamala, kanchi, kapalini, katyayani, krupa, manohar, nivasi, param, parvathi, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, shankari, shiva, soundari

Title: Kamala Manohari Shiva Sai Shankari
Lyrics:
Kamala Manohari Shiva Sai Shankari
Kaali Kapalini Kadambari [ Kamala Manohari ... ]
Jaya Katyayani Bhagawathi Bharati
Kanchi Nivasini Kamakshi Sundari
Meaning: Salutations to the enchanting form of the Mother Lakshmi seated on the Lotus, Shankari consort of Lord Shankara, Kamakshi the presiding deity at Kanchi, Mother Kaali adorning the garland made of skulls and Mother Saraswathi also known as Kadambari and Bharati.
Songglossary: bhagavathi, bharati, jay, kaali, kadamba, kamakshi, kamala, kanchi, kapalini, katyayani, manohar, nivasi, sai, shankari, shiva, soundari

Title: Kamala Nayana Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Bhagawan
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Hey Deena Janon Ke Pran
Hey Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram
Sri Sai Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram [ Hey Deena ]
Meaning: Pranaams to the lotus eyed Lord Sathya Sai who dwells at Parthi the refuge of the forlorn, emancipator of the downtrodden, the Lord of Mother Sita.
Songglossary: bhagawan, deen, hey, jana, jay, kamala, ke, nayan, patitha, pavan, pran, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sathya, sita, sri

Title: Kamala Nayana Prabhu Kamala Pathey
Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Prabhu Kamala Pathey
Kamalasana Prabhu Kamala Kantha [ Kamala Nayana ... ]
Kamalanabha Prabhu Kamala Ramana
Kamaleshwara Prabhu Kamala Kantha
Meaning: Our salutations to the lotus eyed Lord who is the consort of Kamala (Goddess Lakshmi). The Lord who is the enchanter of Kamala, seated on the lotus from whose navel arises the lotus, is the Lord of Kamala (Goddess Kamala).
Songglossary: kamala, kamale, kantha, nayan, pathey, prabhu, ramana

Title: Kamala Nayana Ram Vimala Charana
Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Ram Vimala Charana Ram
Kamala Nayana Vimala Charana Patitha Pavana Ram
Patitha Pavana Ram Janaki Jeevan Ram
Patitha Pavana Janaki Jeevana Paapa Vimochana Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ananda Chanda Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Ananda Chanda Patitha Pavana Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Ram Dasha Mukha Mardhana Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Dasha Mukha Mardhana Patitha Pavana Ram
Meaning: We offer our salutations to the Lotus eyed Rama whose feet are pure and blemishless, the uplifter of the underprivileged, the remover of sins and the very life of Mother Janaki. Lord Rama is the King of Ayodhya and confers Bliss, is the son of King Dasharatha and the One who vanquished the ten headed Ravana.
Songglossary: anand, ayodhya, chand, chara, dasha, janaki, jeeva, kamala, mardana, mukha, nanda, nayan, paapa, patitha, pavan, ram, vasi, vimala, vimochana

Title: Kamala Nayana Sri Rama
Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Sri Rama
Karuna Sindho Sita Rama [ Kamala Nayana ... ]
Kalimala Bhanjana Rama Rama
Rama Rama (2) [ Kalimala ]
Karunya Lavanya Kodanda Rama
Meaning: Our salutations to Lord Rama the lotus eyed one, destroyer of the evil effects of Kali age, the compassionate who has a compelling form, who wields the bow.
Songglossary: bhanjana, kalimala, kamala, karuna, kodanda, lavanya, nayan, ram, sindhu, sita, sri

Title: Kamala Nayana Sri Sai Jaya
Lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Sri Sai Jaya Jaya
Karunakara Narayana Jaya Jaya
Sri Raghu Nandana Rama Jaya Jaya
Yadu Kula Bhooshana Shyama Jaya Jaya
Esha Manusha Vesha Jaya Jaya
Meera Ke Prabhu Natha Jaya Jaya
Meaning: Victory to Sri Sai whose eyes resembles the lotus. Victory to compassionate Narayana, Rama the beloved of Raghu clan, Shyama (Krishna) the jewel of Yadu clan, the Supreme Lord who is in the human form and Lord of Meera.
Songglossary: bhooshan, esha, jay, kamala, karuna, ke, kula, manusha, meera, nanda, narayana, natha, nayan, prabhu, raghu, ram, sai, sham, sri, vesha, yadu

Title: Kamala Netra Sayeeshwara
Lyrics:
Kamala Netra Sayeeshwara
Kaivalya Teja Sureshwara [ Kamala Netra ... ]
Megha Shyama Ghana Gagana Shareera
Shantha Brahmamaya Abhayakara
Megha Shyama Ghana Gagana Shareera [ Shantha Brahmamaya ]
Meaning: Salutations to Sayeeshwara the Lotus eyed One who confers Liberation, whose complexion is that of thick clouds in the sky, guards against fear and embodiment of Peace.
Songglossary: abhaya, brahma, gagan, ghana, kaivalya, kamala, megha, nethra, sayee, sham, shantha, shareera, suresham, teja

Title: Kamisama Kamisama
Lyrics:
Kamisama Kamisama
Hathono Uchinaru Kamisama
Kagirinai Ainohikaride
Miteshite Kudasai Kamisama
GeneralComments: Tune is similar to the bhajan "Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey".

Title: Kanaka Sabesha Kailasa Shiva
Lyrics:
Kanaka Sabesha Kailasa Shiva
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Manohara [ Kanaka Sabesha ... ]
Gnana Pradayaka Samba Shiva
Narthana Sundara Natana Manohara
Paahi Prabho Maam Parthi Pureeshwara
Meaning: The Lord of Kailasa mountains, One who holds the Ganges on His Head, delight of Mother Gowri. Protect me O Lord the One who confers Wisdom, whose dance is thrilling, is the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: ganga, gnana, gowri, hara, kailasa, kanaka, kanaka-sabesha, maam, manohar, narthana, natana, paahi, prabhu, pradayaka, purishwara, puttaparthi, samba, shiva, sundara

Title: Kanda Kumara Kadirvela
Lyrics:
Kanda Kumara Kadirvela
Karunakarane Shiva Bala
Varuvai Arulvai Azhaga Muruga
Mayon Muruga Mayil Vaganane
Muruga Muruga Muruga Muruga
Varuvai Muruga Muruga Muruga
Arulvai Muruga Muruga Muruga
Azhaga Muruga Muruga Muruga
Meaning: Lord Skanda, the compassionate Lord Subrahmanya, son of Shiva please come to bless us, riding on the divine peacock, O beautiful One.
Songglossary: arul, azhaga, bala, kadirvela, kanda, karuna, kumara, mayil, mayon, shiva, subramanya, vaganane, varum

Title: Kanda Kumara Vadivela
Lyrics:
Kanda Kumara Vadivela
Gowri Putra Vadivela [ Kanda Kumara ... ]
Karthikeya Karuna Sagara
Deena Sharanya Vadivela
Sri Sai Natha Vadivela
Meaning: Kanda, Kumara and Karthikeya are the names of Lord Subrahmanya, the son of Shiva and Gowri. He is an Ocean of Compassion and friend of the Forlorn, is verily Sai Natha.
Songglossary: deen, gowri, kanda, karthikeya, karuna, kumara, natha, putra, sagar, sai, sharan, sri, vadivel

Title: Kanha Kanhaiya Bansi Adhariya Brindavan
Lyrics:
Kanha Kanhaiya Bansi Adhariya Brindavan Ghana Raasa Rachaiya
Gokula Nandana Hey Chitha Mohana
Radha Manohara Shyama
Manasa Chora Nanda Kishora
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala Sai Gopala
Meaning: Lord Krishna also known as Kanha and Kanhaiya performed the Raasa Leela Dance in Brindavan with the flute on his lips. He is the boy of Gokula who enchants everybody's mind, the son of Nanda and the delight of Radha who stole the butter, is none other than Sai Gopala of Parthi.
Songglossary: adhar, bansi, brinda, chitha, chora, ghana, gokul, gopal, hey, kanha, kishora, manasa, manohar, mohan, nanda, puttaparthi, raasa, rachaiya, radha, sai, sham, vihar

Title: Kanhaiya Teri Bansi Bhajey Merey
Lyrics:
Kanhaiya Teri Bansi Bhajey Merey Lal
Nis Din Mey Bhajo Tero Naam [ Kanhaiya Teri ... ]
Hey Nandalala Gopala
Gopala Gopala
Govinda Govinda Govinda Gopala
Sai Krishna Sai Ram
Meaning: The day I chant your name Krishna my beloved, play with your enchanting flute. Hey Gopala! The beloved of Nanda, you are Govinda (foster of cows), Sai Krishna and Sai Rama.
Songglossary: bansi, bhaja, din, gopal, govinda, hey, kanha, krishna, lal, mera, naam, nanda, nis, ram, sai, tera

Title: Kari Mukha Varada Maam Paahi
Lyrics:
Kari Mukha Varada Maam Paahi
Gajamukha Natha Maam Paahi
Gajanana Maam Paahi
Gananatha Maam Paahi
Lambodhara Maam Paahi ( Jaya )
Meaning: Oh elephant headed God the bestower of boons (Gajanana) protect me. I chant your other names Gajamukha, Gananatha (God of Demigods) and Lambodhara. Protect me.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gananatha, jay, kari, lambodhara, maam, mukha, natha, paahi, varada

Title: Karthikeya Karunakara
Lyrics:
Karthikeya Karunakara
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeeshwara [ Karthikeya ... ]
Gowri Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Pashupathi Ranjana Parathpara
Meaning: I surrender to You Oh Karthikeya, the compassionate One, the son of Mother Gowri, who destroys the cycle of Birth and death, is a source of delight for Pashupathi.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, gowri, karthikeya, karuna, nanda, parathpara, pashu, ranjana, sayee, sharan

Title: Karuna Jalathey Dasharathey
Lyrics:
Karuna Jalathey Dasharathey
Kamaneeyanana Krupa Nidhey
Sri Raghu Nandana Sita Pathey
Shritha Jana Palana Suguna Nidhey
Dasharathey Daya Nidhey
Meaning: The son of Dasharatha, the scion of Raghu dynasty has a pleasing form, is an ocean of compassion. The Lord of Mother Sita, one who fulfills the desires of His devotees, is a paragon of virtues.
Songglossary: dasha, daya, jaladharam, jana, kamaneeya, karuna, krupa, nanda, nidhey, paalaya, pathey, raghu, shritha, sita, sri, suguna

Title: Karuna Karo Sai Deva
Lyrics:
Karuna Karo Sai Deva
Kalyana Karo Sai Deva
Sri Guru Jaya Guru Sathya Sai Deva [ Karuna Karo ... ]
Tum Matrumayi Sai Deva
Tum Shakthimayi Sai Deva
Tum Premamayi Sai Deva
Tum Krupamayi Sai Deva
Sri Guru Jaya Guru Sathya Sai Deva
Meaning: Victory be to you Oh Sathya Sai deva! Show mercy and let your benedictions be upon us. You are verily our Mother and embodiment of Energy, Love and Compassion.
Songglossary: deva, guru, jay, kalyan, karo, karuna, krupa, matru, premamayi, sai, sathya, shakthi, sri, tum

Title: Karuna Nidhey Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Karuna Nidhey Bhagawan
Gopala Brindavana Sai Bhagawan
Mana Mohana Madhava Sai Bhagawan [ Karuna Nidhey ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Parama Dayala Sai Krupala
Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Mana Mohana Madhava Sai Bhagawan
Karuna Nidhey Bhagawan (3)
Meaning: Gopala is enchanting, Lord of Meera, who moves about in Brindavan, is extremely compassionate. Sai Bhagawan is an Ocean of absolute Mercy whose Abode is at Parthi.
Songglossary: bala, bhagawan, brinda, dayal, giridhar, gopal, karuna, ke, krupalu, madhava, mana, meera, mohan, nidhey, param, prabhu, puri, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Karuna Nidhey Kamala Manohara
Lyrics:
Karuna Nidhey Kamala Manohara
Karivarada Sai Karunya Natha [ Kamala ... ]
Tejonmaya Divya Naama Roopa
Naama Roopa Naama Roopa [ Tejonmaya ]
Tribhuvana Vanditha Hari Hara Roopa
Meaning: We adore you Hari the consort of Lakshmi. You are also Sai the compassionate bestower of boons. Your name and form are divine and effulgent. You are the Hari worshipped by all the three worlds.
Songglossary: divya, hara, hari, kamala, karivarada, karuna, manohar, naam, natha, nidhey, roopa, sai, tejonmaya, tribhuvan, vanditha

Title: Karuna Niketana Bhaktha Sakha Prabho
Lyrics:
Karuna Niketana Bhaktha Sakha Prabho
Sharan Mey Lo Bhagawan
Dukha Bhanjana Sri Ram
Tribhuvana Sanchari Jyothi Swaroopa
Nithya Niranjana Ram
Adi Ananth Hey Prema Swaroopa [ Dukha Bhanjana ]
Meaning: Oh Rama the ever Compassionate one, the real friend of the devotee and destroyer of sorrow, I seek refuge in you. You move around the three worlds, ever pure, you are both the beginning and the end. You are also the embodiment of love.
Songglossary: adi, ananta, bhagawan, bhaktha, bhanjana, dukh, hey, jyoth, karuna, ley, niketana, niranjan, nithya, prabhu, prem, ram, sakha, sanchari, sharan, sri, swaroopa, tribhuvan

Title: Karuna Sadani Ma Sai Karuna
Lyrics:
Karuna Sadani Ma Sai Karuna Sagari Ma
Kanchana Abharani Ma Sai Karunya Roopini Ma
Kamala Manohari Ma Sai Kalyana Dayini Ma
Kalusha Vidhurini Ma Sai Kali Avatarini Ma
Kali Avatarini Ma
Meaning: Mother Sai is another name for absolute Compassion, is an enchanting Goddess of Wealth bedecked with Gold jewels. She confers benevolence, removes impurity and is an Incarnation of the present Kali age.
Songglossary: abharani, avatar, dayini, kali, kalusha, kalyan, kamala, kanchana, karuna, ma, manohar, sadana, sagar, sai, swaroopa, vidhura

Title: Karuna Sagara Hey Bhagawan Jagadeeshwara
Lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Hey Bhagawan Jagadeeshwara Jagannatha
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Parameshwara Hrudaya Vihari Gopala [ Karuna Sagara ]
Dwaraka Natha Sri Madhusudhana Meera Natha Gopala
Bhaktha Janashraya Deenodharana Sai Yuga Avatara
Meaning: We adore you Sai the descent of Kali age, who is refuge of devotees and uplifter of weak and meek. You are the Lord of universe with an Ocean of compassion. You are Gopala who revels in our hearts, slayer of demon Madhu, the Lord of Meera, resident of Dwaraka and at present you are the resident of Parthi.
Songglossary: avatar, bhagawan, bhaktha, deenodharana, dwaraka, gopal, hey, hrudaya, jagadeesha, jagan, janashraya, karuna, madhu, meera, natha, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, sagar, sai, sri, vihar, yuga

Title: Karuna Sagara Hey Nandalala
Lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Hey Nandalala
Murali Manohara Shyama Gopala [ Karuna Sagara ... ]
Giridhara Naagara Sai Gopala
Sai Gopala Sai Gopala [ Giridhara Naagara ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama Gopala
Meaning: The Son of Nanda, Gopala is an Ocean of Mercy, plays lilting tunes with Flute, dark complexioned, the One who lifted the Mountain and Meera's inspiration.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, hey, karuna, ke, manohar, meera, murali, naagar, nanda, prabhu, sagar, sai, sham

Title: Karuna Sagara Krishna Murari Radhey
Lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Krishna Murari Radhey Govinda
Madhava Mohana Mangala Roopa Radhey Govinda Jaya Radhey Gopala [ Karuna ]
Shankha Chakra Dhara Chinmaya Roopa Radhey Govinda Jaya Radhey Gopala
Bhaktha Jana Priya Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Govinda
Jaya Sai Govinda
Meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Govinda who is also Krishna, Murari the ocean of compassion. Victory to Radhey Govinda who has an Auspicious and captivating form. He has a blissful form, who holds the conch and wheel in His Hands. You are the Beloved of devotees and you are Sai the resident of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhaktha, chakra, chinmaya, dhara, gopal, govinda, jana, jay, karuna, krishna, madhava, mangal, mohan, murare, priya, purishwara, puttaparthi, radha, roopa, sagar, sai, shankha

Title: Karuna Sagara Prema Swaroopa
Lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Prema Swaroopa
Paapa Vimochana Ram
Dukha Bhanjana Sri Ram
Allah Eshwar Terey Naam
Nanak Yesu Terey Naam
Parthi Pureeshwara Deena Daya Ghana [ Dukha Bhanjana ]
Meaning: Lord Sai is an embodiment of Divinity, Ocean of compassion, removes Sin and destroys sorrow. Allah, Eshwar, Nanak and Yesu are your names Oh Lord. He is highly compassionate towards the distressed and the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: allah, bhanjana, daya, deen, dukh, eshwar, ghana, karuna, naam, nanak, paapa, prem, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sagar, sri, swaroopa, tera, vimochana, yesu

Title: Karuna Samudra Sri Rama
Lyrics:
Karuna Samudra Sri Rama
Kausalya Tanaya Sri Rama
Sharanagatha Priya Sai Rama
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Rama
Meaning: Oh Rama the son of Kausalya, you are verily the ocean of compassion. Oh Sai Rama, you love those who have surrendered to you and hence I thus surrender myself.
Songglossary: karuna, kausalya, priya, ram, sai, samudra, sharan, sri, tanaya

Title: Karuna Sindho Shiva Shambho
Lyrics:
Karuna Sindho Shiva Shambho
Kamala Nayana Sai Shiva Shambho
Kali Yuga Deva Deena Bandho
Kalimala Bhanjana Sai Shambho
Shambho Shiva Shambho (3)
Meaning: The eternally Auspicious Shiva with Mother Amba, is the same Sai Shambho the lotus eyed, embodiment of compassion, is verily the Lord of the Kali age who destroys its evil effects. Chant 'Shiva Shambho' repeatedly.
Songglossary: bandho, bhanjana, deen, deva, kali, kalimala, kamala, karuna, nayan, sai, shambho, shiva, sindhu, yuga

Title: Karuna Sindhu Dasharatha Nandana Parthi
Lyrics:
Karuna Sindhu Dasharatha Nandana Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Prema Swaroopa Prashanthi Niketana Maruti Sevitha Ram
Ahalyodharaka Rajeeva Lochana Raghukula Bhooshana Ram
Meaning: The compassionate lotus eyed Lord Rama, the son of Dasharatha, was served by Maruti. Lord Rama is the redeemer of Ahalya of her curse, is verily the Lord of Parthi the embodiment of Love who resides at Prashanthi Nilayam.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, bhooshan, dasha, karuna, lochana, maruthi, nanda, niketana, prashanthi, prem, purishwara, puttaparthi, raghu, rajeeva, ram, sevita, sindhu, swaroopa

Title: Karuna Sindhu Rama Kaivalya Shanthi
Lyrics:
Karuna Sindhu Rama Kaivalya Shanthi Dhama
Neeraja Netra Parama Pavitra Paramananda Rama [ Karuna Sindhu ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara Rama
Danava Mardhana Rama Daasa Samrakshaka Rama [ Karuna Sindhu ]
Karuna Sindhu Rama Kaivalya Shanthi Dhama (2)
Meaning: Rama bestows liberation and the abode of peace and compassion. Your lotus eyes are highly sacred and blissful. You are the slayer of demons, protector of devotees who surrender to you.
Songglossary: daasa, danava, dasha, daya, dhama, kaivalya, karuna, mardana, nanda, neeraja, nethra, param, pavitra, ram, sagar, samraksha, shanthi, sindhu

Title: Karuna Swaroopini Raja Rajeshwari
Lyrics:
Karuna Swaroopini Raja Rajeshwari
Tribhuvana Palini Parthi Pureeshwari
Hrudaya Nivasini Akhilandeshwari
Tripura Sundari Veena Vadini
Dasha Bhuja Dhaarini Asura Vinashini [ Tribhuvana Palini ... ]
Meaning: Salutations to mother Sai residing in Parthi, who is the embodiment of compassion, the one who is ruler of the three worlds, the one residing in every one's hearts, the one who is the most beautiful in all the three worlds and the one who annihilated demons.
Songglossary: akhila, asura, bhuja, dasha, dhaari, hrudaya, karuna, nivasi, palini, purishwara, puttaparthi, raja, rajeshwari, soundari, swaroopa, tribhuvan, tripura, vadini, veena, vinashana

Title: Karunakara Narayana
Lyrics:
Karunakara Narayana
Kamala Charana Sharanam Sharanam [ Karunakara ... ]
Kamala Netra Kamalasana
Kamala Vallabha Kamala Nabha
Narayana Narayana (5)
Meaning: I surrender myself to Lord Narayana, the compassionate One, with the Lotus Feet. He is Lotus eyed, stationed on a Lotus, consort of Kamala (Lakshmi) and from whose Navel arises a Lotus.
Songglossary: chara, kamala, karuna, nabha, narayana, nethra, sharan, vallabha

Title: Karunalavala He Nandalala
Lyrics:
Karunalavala He Nandalala
Ravela Ravela Rave Gopala
Brindavana Bala He Gopi Lola
Manamohana He Shyama Gopala
Madhusudhana He Sai Gopala [ Ravela Ravela ... ]
Meaning: O Compassionate son of Nanda, Gopala, residing in Brindavan, enchanter of Gopis and destroyer of demon Madhu, Sai Gopala, please come.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, gopal, gopi, karuna, lola, madhu, manamohana, nanda, ravo, sai, sham

Title: Karunamaya Deva Krupamaya Deva
Lyrics:
Karunamaya Deva Krupamaya Deva
Hari Om Hari Om
Hari Mera Jeevan Ka Sahara
Hari Mera Aadhaar
Krupamaya Deva
Meaning: We chant your Glory Oh compassionate Lord Hari. You are merciful and the embodiment of Primordial sound, the very life and refuge of Meera.
Songglossary: aadhaar, deva, hari, jeeva, ka, karuna, krupa, mera, om, sahara

Title: Karunamaya Karthikeya
Lyrics:
Karunamaya Karthikeya
Kaivalya Daata Sri Sai Natha [ Karunamaya ... ]
Himagiri Nandini Priya Kumara
Iha Para Sukha Dayi Bhava Bhaya Hara
Sharanagatha Priya Shanmukha Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Shambhu Kumara
Sharanam Sharanam Shambhu Kumara (3)
Meaning: Karthikeya is epitome of compassion and the One who grants Liberation. The dear son of Himavan's daughter, confers welfare here and hereafter, destroys the vicious cycle of Births. Oh son of Shambho, I surrender myself to thee.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, daata, dayi, hara, himagiri, iha, kaivalya, karthikeya, karuna, kumara, nandi, natha, para, priya, sai, shambho, shanmukha, sharan, sri, sukh

Title: Karunamayi Janani Ma
Lyrics:
Karunamayi Janani Ma
Hey Prema Swaroopini Ma [ Karunamayi Janani ]
Hrudaya Nivasini Sai Ma
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Ma
Gaana Vinodini Ma Sai Ma Sai Ma
Meaning: Oh mother Sai, you are the most compassionate one, personification of Love, the one residing in our hearts. Oh mother, you enjoy music and are the protector of this world.
Songglossary: abhaya, dayini, gaan, hey, hrudaya, janani, karuna, ma, nivasi, prem, sai, swaroopa, vinodini

Title: Karunanidhe Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Karunanidhe Bhagawan
Gopala Brindavana Sai Bhagawan
Man Mohana Madhava Sai Bhagawan
Karunanidhe Bhagawan
Meerake Prabhu Giridhar Bala
Parama Dayaalaaa Sai Krupala
Parthipuri Bhagawan Mana Mohana Madhava Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: Lord, your compassion is boundless. Lord Sai, you reside in Brindavan as the cowherd (Gopala). You reside in our hearts and are verily Madhava. Meera was your devotee, and you shower supreme mercy. You reside in Puttaparthi, the charmer of my heart, Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bala, bhagawan, brinda, dayaa, giridhar, gopal, karuna, krupalu, madhava, mana, meera, mohan, param, prabhu, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Karunanta Ranga Kariraja Varada Kamalesha
Lyrics:
Karunanta Ranga Kariraja Varada Kamalesha Sri Sai Rama
Omkara Rama Prashanthi Rama
Parabrahma Sathya Sai Rama
Kamalesha Sri Sai Rama
Meaning: The lotus eyed and compassionate Sai Rama, the one who saved the elephant king is verily the cosmic soul Sathya Sai Rama, the embodiment of Om residing at Parthi.
Songglossary: kamale, kariraja, karuna, om, parabrahma, prashanthi, ram, ranga, sai, sathya, sri, varada

Title: Karunya Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Lyrics:
Karunya Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Jaya Deva Prabhu Deva
Nayana Manohara Sai Sundara
Devadi Deva Sri Sathya Sai Deva
Guru Deva Sai Deva
Meaning: Oh Lord! You are Our Divine preceptor Shri Sathya Sai, the embodiment of love and compassion, the One with a captivating form. You are a treat to the eyes Oh Lord of Lords.
Songglossary: deva, devadi, guru, jay, karuna, manohar, nayan, prabhu, roopa, sai, sathya, sri, sundara

Title: Kashaya Vesha Dharana
Lyrics:
Kashaya Vesha Dharana
Kali Yuga Avatara Radha Ramana [ Kashaya Vesha ... ]
Kunja Vihari Sri Sathya Sai
Dwarakamayi Narayana
Chithravathi Teera Narayana Hari
Meaning: Glory be to the incarnations of Kali Age, Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai who has donned the ochre robe. Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha and who resides in the gardens has reincarnated as Sai. Dwarakamayi was Shirdi Sai's abode while Sathya Sai has chosen the banks of Chitravathi.
GeneralComments: The third line is also sung as "Shirdi Sai Sri Sathya Sai".
Songglossary: avatar, chithravathi, dharini, dwarakamayi, hari, kali, kashaya, kunja, narayana, radha, ramana, sai, sathya, shirdi, sri, teera, vesha, vihara, yuga

Title: Kashi Pathey Varanasi Pathey
Lyrics:
Kashi Pathey Varanasi Pathey
Ganga Jata Joota Gowri Pathey
Shirdi Pathey Puttaparthi Pathey
Chinni Sai Krishna Shreya Pathey (2)
Meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Kashi or Varanasi (Shiva) holding Ganges in the matted locked hair, the resident of Shirdi and presently Parthi as little Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: chinni, ganga, gowri, jata, joota, kashi, krishna, pathey, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi, shreya, varanasi

Title: Kasturi Ranga Kaveri Ranga Sri
Lyrics:
Kasturi Ranga Kaveri Ranga Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga
Kalyana Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga
Garuda Gamana Ranga Shesha Shayana Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga
Meaning: Sing the name of Ranga with the scented vermillion on his forehead, having an enchanting form. The Lord has Garuda as his chariot and who reclines in serpent Adi Sesha.
Songglossary: gamana, garuda, kalyan, karuna, kasturi, kaveri, ranga, shayana, shesha, sri

Title: Kasturi Tilakam Narayanam
Lyrics:
Kasturi Tilakam Narayanam
Kamala Nayanam Narayanam [ Kasturi ... ]
Guruvayur Pura Narayanam
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayanam
Govinda Govinda Narayanam (2)
Meaning: The Lotus eyed Narayana adorning the scented vermillion is the presiding deity at Guruvayur is also the cowherd boy who has incarnated in this Kali age.
Songglossary: avatar, govinda, guruvayur, kali, kamala, kasturi, narayana, nayan, pura, tilaka, yuga

Title: Katateni Kin no Murali
Lyrics:
Katateni Kin no Murali
 Koyubi de Yama wo Sasagete
 Kibishiki Ame yori Ware wo Mamoru
 Ai no Kimi Sri Krishna
 Eien no Ai no Keshin yo

Title: Kausalya Nandana Vaidehi Mohana
Lyrics:
Kausalya Nandana Vaidehi Mohana
Rajeeva Lochana Rama
Yuga Avatara Parameshwara Rama
Asurani Khandana Kodanda Rama
Bharatarchita Sri Rama Parthi Pureeshwara Rama
Meaning: The Lotus eyed Rama, the son of Kausalya, enchanter of Vaidehi is the incarnation of the age. Salutations to the bow wielding Rama who was worshipped by his brother Bharata, uprooter of the demon clan, now dwells at Parthi.
Songglossary: asura, avatar, bharata, kausalya, khandana, kodanda, lochana, mohan, nanda, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, rajeeva, ram, sri, vaidehi, yuga

Title: Kausalya Rama Karunya Dhama
Lyrics:
Kausalya Rama Karunya Dhama
Ravana Mardhana Rama Sri Rama [ Kausalya ... ]
Ahalyodharaka Rama Sri Rama
Maruti Sevitha Rama Sri Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama (3)
Meaning: Oh Rama! the abode of compassion, you are the beloved of Kausalya, slayer of Ravana, redeemer of Ahalya from her curse. Victory to you Rama who is served by Maruti (monkey God).
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, dhama, jay, karuna, kausalya, mardana, maruthi, ram, ravana, sevita, sri

Title: Kausalya Sutha Ram Rama Ram
Lyrics:
Kausalya Sutha Ram Rama Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Danava Bhanjana Dasha Mukha Mardhana Ram [ Kausalya ... ]
Karuna Samudra Ram Rama Ram
Krupa Sagara Ram Rama Ram [ Dasharatha Nandana ]
Meaning: We adore you Rama the son of Kausalya and Dasharatha. You are the annihilator of demons and ten headed demon Ravana. You are the ocean of compassion and kindness.
Songglossary: bhanjana, danava, dasha, karuna, kausalya, krupa, mardana, mukha, nanda, ram, sagar, samudra, sutha

Title: Kausalyatmaja Rama Charan
Lyrics:
Kausalyatmaja Rama Charan
Vaidehi Priya Rama Charan
Maruti Sevitha Rama Charan
Bharatarchita Sri Rama Charan
Ahalyodharaka Rama Charan
Shanthi Niketana Rama Charan (Pra)
Rama Charan Sada Bhajo
Meaning: Adhere to the feet of Rama Oh mind, the son of Kausalya, enchanter of Vaidehi, one who was served by Maruti, worshipped by Bharata and to the one who confers supreme peace.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, bhaja, bharata, chara, kausalya, maruthi, niketana, priya, ram, sada, sevita, shanthi, sri, vaidehi

Title: Keshava Madhava
Lyrics:
Keshava Madhava
Govinda Gopala
Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari Hari Bol
Keshava Madhava Govinda Bol
Meaning: Oh mind chant the name of Hari, Keshava, Madhava, Govinda and Gopala incessantly.
Songglossary: bol, gopal, govinda, hari, kesha, madhava

Title: Keshava Madhava Jaya Deva Madhusudhana
Lyrics:
Keshava Madhava Jaya Deva Madhusudhana
Netra Kamala Dala Athiva Manohara
Antaryami Prabhu Parameshwara
Maya Manusha Vesha Leeladhara (2)
Maya Manusha Vesha Leeladhara (2)
Meaning: Chant the names of the lotus eyed, the indweller and supremely enchanting Lord Keshava, Madhava, Madhusudhana who has taken the deluding human form as a sport.
Songglossary: antar, athiva, dala, deva, jay, kamala, kesha, leela, madhava, madhu, manohar, manusha, maya, nethra, param, prabhu, vesha

Title: Keshava Madhava Madhusudhana
Lyrics:
Keshava Madhava Madhusudhana
Sridhara Sundara Narayana [ Keshava Madhava ... ]
Murali Manohara Janardhana
Achyutha Anantha Narayana (3)
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai (4)
Meaning: Chant the various names of the same Lord Narayana. Keshava, Madhava, Madhusudhana, Sridhara, Murali Mohana, Janardhana, Achyutha, Govinda and Gopala.
Songglossary: achyutha, ananta, gopal, govinda, jai, janardhana, kesha, madhava, madhu, manohar, murali, narayana, sridhara, sundara

Title: Keshava Narayana Govinda Murari
Lyrics:
Keshava Narayana Govinda Murari
Madhava Madhusudhana Damodara Shourie
Keshava Narayana Govinda Murari
Madhava Madhusudhana Damodara Shourie
Meaning: Chant the names of Keshava, Narayana, Govinda, Murari, Madhava, Madhusudhana, Damodara and Shauri.
Songglossary: damodara, govinda, kesha, madhava, madhu, murare, narayana, shouri

Title: Khagapati Vahana Jagat Paripalana
Lyrics:
Khagapati Vahana Jagat Paripalana
Garuda Gamana Hari Narayana (2)
Nigamagama Nutha Nirupama Sannuta
Nirupama Guna Sathya Narayana (2)
Meaning: Our Salutations to you Oh Lord Narayana, you are the ruler of this Universe riding on Garuda (The king of Birds), the one who is praised by Vedas, the one who is supreme in virtues, Oh Lord Sathya Narayana.
Songglossary: gamana, garuda, guna, hari, jagat, khagapat, narayana, nigamagama, nirupama, nutha, paripala, sannuta, sathya, vahana

Title: Know That The Lord Is Sweetness
Lyrics:
Know That The Lord Is Sweetness Itself
Everything Is A Sign Of His Grace
He is The Nearest, He is The Dearest, Born In The World Now ...
... As Sri Sathya Sai
Hold On To Him As Close As You Can
Knowing Him As An Intimate Friend
Songglossary: sai, sathya, sri

Title: Kodanda Ram Kalyana Ram
Lyrics:
Kodanda Ram Kalyana Ram
Janaki Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Ananda Ram Ayodhya Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: Victory to Rama wielder of Kodanda (bow), bestower of auspiciousness. You are the life of Janaki (Sita). You are the blissful Rama of Ayodhya and at present Parthi as Shri Sai.
Songglossary: anand, ayodhya, janaki, jay, kalyan, kodanda, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sri

Title: Kodanda Rama Kalyana Rama
Lyrics:
Kodanda Rama Kalyana Rama
Janaki Rama Jaya Rama
Karunya Rama Lavanya Rama
Palita Sundara Sri Sai Rama
Meaning: Victory to the bow wielding Rama, one who fosters, compassionate and charming and consort of Janaki is full of sacred attributes.
Songglossary: janaki, jay, kalyan, karuna, kodanda, lavanya, palita, ram, sai, sri, sundara

Title: Koham Soham, Koham Soham
Lyrics:
Koham Soham, Koham Soham
 Who am I, I am He
 I'm the Sun and the Moon and the Stars in the sky
 I'm the Earth and the Sea and the Fire and the Wind
 I am God
 Om .... Om ....
 Koham Soham, Koham Soham
 Who am I, I am He
 I'm not the stars 'n the earth 'n the sea
 But the Aathma wisphers inside of me
 Om .... Om ....

Title: Koi Bholey Hari Hari Koi
Lyrics:
Koi Bholey Hari Hari Koi Bholey Ram Ram
Koi Bholey Durga Kaali Koi Bholey Sai Ma
Koi Bholey Narayana Allah Bismillah
Koi Bholey Nanak Yesu Buddha Mahavira
Sadhu Sant Fakira Jaane Sab Hai Tero Naam
Bol Man Allah Malik Bol Man Sai Ram
Meaning: Some may call God as Hari while some others may call Ram. Some may say Durga Kaali but some others Sai Ma. If Hindus call him Narayana, Muslims call Allah Bismillah and yet some others Nanak, Yesu, Buddha and Mahavir. Saints, Sages and Fakirs (Muslim Saints) know that One Same God is known by different names.
Songglossary: allah, bhole, bismillah, bol, buddha, durga, fakira, hai, hari, jaanat, kaali, koi, ma, mahavir, malik, mana, naam, nanak, narayana, ram, sab, sadhu, sai, sant, tera, yesu

Title: Koi Kahey Tujhe Ram Koi
Lyrics:
Koi Kahey Tujhe Ram Koi Kahey Tujhe Shyam
Koi Kahey Tujhe Yeshu Bhagawan
Koi Kahey Allah Tero Nam
Sai Baba Sai Baba Parthipuri Sai Baba
Meaning: People say You are Ram, Shyam, (Krishna) Sai, Jesus and Allah, and you reside in Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: allah, baba, bhagawan, kahey, koi, nam, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sham, tera, tum, yesu

Title: Kokoro Shizukani Sumasutoki
Lyrics:
Kokoro Shizukani Sumasutoki
 Anatano Egaoga Ukabimasu
 Itsumo Kokoroni Heiano Motarasu ai no Manazashi
 Baba Baba Sai Baba
 Baba Baba Sai Baba
 Yozorano Gingano Mathatakimo
 Kurayami Michibiku Hikaridesu
 Anatano Oshiewa Hikaritonatte
 Aino Sekaio Tsukurimasu
 Baba Baba Sai Baba
 Baba Baba Sai Baba
GeneralComments: Sung to the tune of Rama came, Krishna came

Title: Koti Pranam Shata Koti Pranam
Lyrics:
Koti Pranam Shata Koti Pranam
Hey Deena Natha Sai Ram (3)
Tum Ho Bhakthon Ke Yuga Avatar
Tum Ho Ananda Nanda Ke Lal
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Gopal [ Hey Deena Natha ]
Meaning: Many repeated Pranaams to you the refuge of the forlorn, Sai Rama. You were born as the son of Nanda and presently the incarnation of our age, Sai Gopala residing at Parthi.
Songglossary: anand, avatar, bhakthon, deen, gopal, hey, ho, ke, koti, lal, nanda, natha, pranamami, puri, puttaparthi, ram, sai, shata, tum, yuga

Title: Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali
Lyrics:
Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali Govinda Bhajo
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala Bhajo [ Krishna Bhajo ... ]
Giridhari Shyama Bhajo Gopi Gopala Bhajo
Murali Madhava Nanda Mukunda Bhajo
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Gopala Bhajo (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of Krishna, the one holding the flute the one with consort Radha, dark complexioned who held aloft the Govardhan mountain, dear Gopala of the Gopis who moved about the forest inhabited by demon Madhu.
Songglossary: bhaja, giridhar, gopal, gopi, govinda, krishna, madhava, madhu, mukunda, murali, nanda, radha, sanchari, sham

Title: Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali
Lyrics:
Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali Gopal
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopal
Nandatmaja Nanda Navaneetha Chora
Ghana Shyama Radha Karuna Kataksha [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Meaning: Chant the name Krishna who is having enchanting flute fostering cows and people, is Govinda with dark blue complexion compassionate beloved of Radhey, son of Nanda stealer of butter.
Songglossary: bhaja, chora, ghana, gopal, govinda, karuna, kataksha, krishna, murali, nanda, navaneetha, radha, sham

Title: Krishna Gopal Krishna Gopal
Lyrics:
Krishna Gopal Krishna Gopal
Darshan Do Merey Sai Nandalal
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bal
Radha Madhava Shyama Gopal
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Gopal [ Darshana Do ]
Meaning: Grant me darshan Oh son of Nanda and the Lord of Meera, the dark complexioned consort of Radha you are Sai Gopal the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: bala, darsh, do, giridhar, gopal, ke, krishna, madhava, meera, mera, nanda, prabhu, puri, puttaparthi, radha, sai, sham

Title: Krishna Gopala Yadu Nandana
Lyrics:
Krishna Gopala Yadu Nandana
Venu Vilolana Mana Mohana [ Krishna Gopala ]
Mora Mukuta Gokula Ramana
Ghana Shyama Ananda Govinda
Krishna Murari Madhusudhana
Meaning: Sing the Glory of God by chanting His various names. Krishna, Gopala, Yadu Nandana, Ghana Shyama, Govinda, Ananda, Murari. Krishna delights in Playing Flute, is enchanting in form with a peacock plumage on His head and chieftain of Gokul.
Songglossary: anand, ghana, gokul, gopal, govinda, krishna, madhu, mana, mohan, mora, mukuta, murare, nanda, ramana, sham, venu, vilola, yadu

Title: Krishna Hari Keshava Narayana
Lyrics:
Krishna Hari Keshava Narayana
Krishna Hari Madhava Narayana
Krishna Madhusudhana Narayana
Krishna Mana Mohana Narayana
Krishna Krishna Jai Jai Govinda Krishna Jai Jai (2)
Meaning: Chant the glorious names of Krishna that is Hari, Keshava, Narayana, Madhava, Madhusudhana (slayer of demon Madhu) having a charming form. Victory unto Govinda Krishna.
Songglossary: govinda, hari, jai, kesha, krishna, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, narayana

Title: Krishna in Mathura
Lyrics:
Krishna in Mathura, Krishna in Dvaraka
Sri Hari Krishna I call Your name
Far away in Mathura, Far away in Dvaraka
Sri Hari Krishna I call Your name
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna
Why dont You come to me, why dont You answer me
Why don't You rescue me and ease my pain
Jai Jai Krishna, Jai Madhava
Here in my heart, Hridaya Krishna
Far away in Mathura, Far away in Dvaraka
Here in my heart, Hridaya Krishna

Title: Krishna Kanhaiya Bansi Bhajaiyya
Lyrics:
Krishna Kanhaiya Bansi Bhajaiyya
Paar Karo Merey Jeevana Naiya
Nanda Ji Ke Bala Murali Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala [ Paar Karo ]
Meaning: Oh Play boy Krishna! Carry the boat of my Life across to the other side. You are the son of Nanda, who played the Flute, lifted the Mountain and the Lord of Meera.
Songglossary: bala, bansi, bhaja, giridhar, gopal, jeeva, ji, kanha, karo, ke, krishna, meera, mera, murali, naiya, nanda, paar, prabhu

Title: Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
Lyrics:
Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
Natavara Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Brindavan Ke Bansi Adhariya
Radha Manohara Raasa Rachaiya
Giridhara Naagara Shyama Kanhaiya
Sri Madhusudhana Sai Kanhaiya
Meaning: Child Krishna is the supreme actor, son of Nanda holding the flute, who enacted the Raasa leela (Celestial dance) with Radha and Gopikas and the One who held the mountain high and slayed demon Madhu.
Songglossary: adhar, bansi, brinda, giridhar, kanha, ke, krishna, kumara, madhu, manohar, naagar, nanda, natavara, raasa, rachaiya, radha, sai, sham, sri

Title: Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
Lyrics:
Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
Jaya Jaya Gopala Bhaiyya [ Krishna Kanhaiya ... ]
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Avatara Sai [ Krishna Kanhaiya ... ]
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Govardhanodhara Krishna Gopala
Meaning: Chant the name of Krishna and Gopala son of Nanda, who stole butter. He is the Incarnation of Narayana, beloved of Gopis and who lifted Govardhana mountain on the finger tips.
Songglossary: avatar, bala, bhai, chora, gokul, gopal, gopi, jay, kanha, krishna, kumara, lola, nanda, narayana, navaneetha, sai

Title: Krishna Krishna Bala Krishna Nanda
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Bala Krishna Nanda Nanda Gopi Krishna ...
... Govardhanodhara Gopalana
Navanita Chora Neela Megha Shyama
Karunakara Krishna Muralidhara
Madhusudhana Mohana Narayana Keshava
Natavaralal Giridhara Bal [ Karunakara Krishna ... ]
Meaning: Lord Krishna(Madhusudhana), with the complexion of dark clouds who stole butter is the merciful boy who lifted a mountain to protect His devotees. He likes to dance and play the flute and is the beautiful Lord Narayana.
Songglossary: bala, chora, giridhar, gopal, gopi, karuna, kesha, krishna, madhu, megha, mohan, murali, nanda, narayana, natavara, navaneetha, neela, sham

Title: Krishna Krishna Gopala Krishna
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Gopala Krishna
Mukunda Madhava Gopala Krishna [ Krishna Krishna ... ]
Nanda Ananda Gopala Krishna
Satchidananda Sri Sayeesha Krishna
Meaning: Chant the glorious name Krishna whose other names are Govinda, Mukunda (one who liberates), Madhava (one who is having Lakshmi on the chest), beloved of Nanda of Gokula and embodiment of existence- awareness-bliss.
Songglossary: anand, gopal, krishna, madhava, mukunda, nanda, satchidananda, sayee, sri

Title: Krishna Krishna Govinda Krishna Gopala
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Govinda Krishna Gopala Bala Krishna
Nanda Nandana Bhaktha Chandana Gaana Lola Krishna
Sundara Vadana Saroja Nayana Radha Priya Krishna
Yadava Krishna Yashoda Krishna Sathya Sai Krishna
Meaning: Krishna is the son of Nanda, who is dear to His devotees and delights in Music. He is Lotus eyed, with a charming countenance and dear to Radha. He belongs to the Yadava clan, son of Yashoda who has presently incarnated as Sathya Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: bala, bhaktha, chand, gaan, gopal, govinda, krishna, lola, nanda, nayan, priya, radha, sai, saroja, sathya, sundara, vadana, yadava, yashoda

Title: Krishna Krishna Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Govinda Narayana
Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana
Sai Rama Govinda Sai Shyama Gopala
Sai Krishna Govinda Narayana (Harey)
Meaning: Chant the Name of Krishna, Govinda, Narayana, Sai Rama, Sai Shyama and Sai Krishna to the delight of everyone.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, krishna, narayana, ram, sai, sham

Title: Krishna Krishna Jaya Gopi Ramana
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Jaya Gopi Ramana
Bhaktha Vatsala Jeevana
Radha Madhava Mohana (3)
Meaning: Glory to Krishna the Lord of the Gopis, the life of His devotees. Radha and Madhava lure everyone around.
Songglossary: bhaktha, gopi, jay, jeeva, krishna, madhava, mohan, radha, ramana, vatsala

Title: Krishna Krishna Krishna Radhey Radhey
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Krishna Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Krishna
Govinda Gopala Krishna Narayana ( Sai ) (3)
Meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna namely Radhey, Govinda, Gopala, Narayana and Sai.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, krishna, narayana, radha, sai

Title: Krishna Krishna Madhava Madhusudhana
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Madhava Madhusudhana
Yadava Yadu Kula Yadu Nandana
Govardhanodhara Gopi Ramana
Bhaktha Janodhara Bhava Bhaya Harana
Meaning: Sing the Glories of Krishna, Madhava, the slayer of demon Madhu, one of Yadava lineage. Krishna held aloft the Govardhana Hill with His little finger in order to save Gopis and Gopas. He is the redeemer of His devotees and destroys the fear of rebirth.
Songglossary: bhaktha, bhava, bhaya, gopi, harana, janodhara, krishna, kula, madhava, madhu, nanda, ramana, yadava, yadu

Title: Krishna Krishna Mana Mohana
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Mana Mohana
Chitha Chora Radha Jeevana
Megha Shyama Madhusudhana
Radha Kantha Yadu Nandana
Meaning: Oh Krishna! You have an enchanting form, dear to Radha, dark in complexion and slayer of demon Madhu. You belong to the Yadu clan and have stolen our hearts.
Songglossary: chitha, chora, jeeva, kantha, krishna, madhu, mana, megha, mohan, nanda, radha, sham, yadu

Title: Krishna Krishna Mukunda Janardhana
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Mukunda Janardhana
Krishna Govinda Narayana Hari
Achyuthananda Govinda Madhava
Satchidananda Narayana Hari
Achyuthananda Govinda Madhava [ Satchidananda ]
Meaning: Chant the different names of the imperishable Lord Krishna, Mukunda, Janardhana, Govinda, Narayana and Hari who is verily Truth, Awareness and Bliss.
Songglossary: achyutha, govinda, hari, janardhana, krishna, madhava, mukunda, narayana, satchidananda

Title: Krishna Krishna Mukunda Murari
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Mukunda Murari
Gopi Gopi Jana Giridhari [ Krishna Krishna ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Muralidhari
Radha Mohana Shyama Murari [ Gopi Gopi Jana ]
Meaning: Glory to Krishna, Mukunda and Murari, the One who lifted the Mountain for sake of Gopis. The Lord of Meera's devotion, one with the Flute, the dark colored charmer of Radha.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopi, jana, ke, krishna, meera, mohan, mukunda, murali, murare, prabhu, radha, sham

Title: Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna
Govinda Gopala Venu Krishna
Mohana Krishna Madhusudhana Krishna
Murari Krishna Mukunda Krishna
Meaning: Chant the names of various forms of Krishna, the one with flute, with his consort Radha, the Charmer, who slayed demon Madhu, Mura, Krishna as Vishnu Himself.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, krishna, madhu, mohan, mukunda, murare, radha, venu

Title: Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna He
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna He Gokula Bala
He Gopi Lola
Nanda Kumara Navanita Chora He Nandalala
Rama Rama Dasharatha Rama He Raja Rama
He Sai Rama
Raghu Kula Bhushana Rajeeva Nayana He Sai Rama
Meaning: Worship, Lord Krishna, the beloved of the Gopis of Gokula, the son of Nanda, and the stealer of butter (our hearts). Worship the lotus-eyed Lord Rama, the jewel of the Raghu dynasty, and the son of King Dasharatha. He is Lord Sai Ram.
Songglossary: bala, bhushan, chora, dasha, gokul, gopi, krishna, kula, kumara, lola, nanda, navaneetha, nayan, radha, raghu, raja, rajeeva, ram, sai

Title: Krishna Krishna Yaduvara Krishna
Lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Yaduvara Krishna
Murahara Keshava Yadava Madhava [ Krishna Krishna ... ]
Murali Manohara Krishna Murari
Krishna Murari Shyama Murari [ Murahara Keshava ]
Meaning: Lord Krishna was born of Yadava clan, dark complexioned, slayer of demon Madhu and Mura having an enchanting form with the flute.
Songglossary: kesha, krishna, madhava, manohar, murahara, murali, murare, sham, yadava, yadu

Title: Krishna Madhava Madhava Krishna
Lyrics:
Krishna Madhava Madhava Krishna
Krishna Madhava Sai Harey
Brindavana Sanchari Shyama Gopala
Jaya Madhusudhana Jaya Nandalala
Jhulana Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
Meaning: Oh Krishna of the Madhu lineage, the dark complexioned son of Nanda, one who moved about in Brindavan, please swing in our hearts O Sai Nanda.
Songglossary: brinda, gopal, hari, jay, jhulana, krishna, madhava, madhu, mera, nanda, sai, sanchari, sham

Title: Krishna Mukunda Govinda Giridhara
Lyrics:
Krishna Mukunda Govinda Giridhara
Murali Mohana Narayana
Parthi Purandara Narayana (2)
Madhava Sri Hari Mandara Giridhari
Govinda Murahara Narayana (Harey) [ Parthi Purandara Narayana (2) ]
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord, Krishna, Mukunda, Govinda, Giridhara, Murali Mohana, Narayana, Madhava, Srihari, Murahara and the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: giridhar, govinda, hari, krishna, madhava, manda, mohan, mukunda, murahara, murali, narayana, puran, puttaparthi, sri

Title: Krishna Murari Bhava Bhaya Haari
Lyrics:
Krishna Murari Bhava Bhaya Haari Hey Giridhari Gopal
Parthi Vihari Hrudaya Vihari Bhaktha Sakha Bhagawan
Bhaktha Sakha Bhagawan ( Sai ) (2)
Meaning: The slayer of demon Murari also destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death, the resident of Parthi is the true friend of his devotees.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhaktha, bhava, bhaya, giridhar, gopal, harana, hey, hrudaya, krishna, murare, puttaparthi, sai, sakha, vihar

Title: Krishna Murari Muralidhari
Lyrics:
Krishna Murari Muralidhari
Gopi Vallabha Giridhari
Hrudaya Vihari Leeladhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Meaning: Lord Krishna who holds the flute in hand, held the mountain high, is dear to the Gopikas. Krishna who is ever playful, resides in the hearts of beings, is Sai Murari residing at Parthi.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopi, hrudaya, krishna, leela, murali, murare, puttaparthi, sai, vallabha, vihar

Title: Krishna Murari Muralidhari
Lyrics:
Krishna Murari Muralidhari
Radha Madhava Giridhari
Kunja Vihari Raasa Vihari
Gokula Brindavana Sanchari
Sai Mukunda Parthi Vihari
Radha Madhava Giridhari
Meaning: Muralidhara is the one who holds the flute in his hands who performs Raasa leela with Radha, who moves around Gokula is the same Lord who has come as Sai Mukunda at Parthi.
Songglossary: brinda, giridhar, gokul, krishna, kunja, madhava, mukunda, murali, murare, puttaparthi, raasa, radha, sai, sanchari, vihar

Title: Krishna O Krishna Mujhey Darshan Do Krishna
Lyrics:
Krishna O Krishna Mujhey Darshan Do Krishna
Krishna Sai Krishna Mujhey Darshan Do Krishna [ Krishna O Krishna ... ]
Giridhari Murari Krishna Ghana Shyama Murari Krishna
Sri Krishna Krishna Krishna Ghana Shyama Murari Krishna
Ab Aajaavo Krishna Mujhey Darshan Do Krishna
Meaning: Hey Krishna! Please grant Your Divine vision (darshan) to me. O blue-complexioned Lord Krishna, the Destroyer of the demon Mura, You lifted the mountain and enchanted everyone with Your Flute music. O Lord Sathya Sai, You are my beloved Lord Krishna, please listen to my hearts yearnings. Come O Krishna, please come now and grant me Your darshan; I am longing for Your Divine Presence.

Title: Krishna Radha Jaya Krishna Radha
Lyrics:
Krishna Radha Jaya Krishna Radha
Nanda Gopa Bala Navaneetha Chora [ Krishna Radha ... ]
Krishna Radha Jaya Krishna Radha (3) [ Nanda Gopa ]
Meaning: Chant the Name of Krishna who is dear to Radha, the son of Nanda and the One who stole Butter (worldly desires of devotees).
Songglossary: bala, chora, gopa, jay, krishna, nanda, navaneetha, radha

Title: Krishna Rama Govinda Gokula Nandana
Lyrics:
Krishna Rama Govinda Gokula Nandana Gopala
Rama Krishna Govinda Trayee Brindavana Gopala
Sai Krishna Govinda Parthi Pureeshwara Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Gopi Manohara Gokula Bala Sai Murari
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna, Rama and Govinda. Chant the name of Gopala, the charming child of Gokula and Brindavan. Gopala, the favourite of the Gopikas, and the one who slayed the demon Mura, is the same as our Sai at Trayee.
Songglossary: bala, brindavana, gokul, gopal, gopi, govinda, krishna, manohar, murare, nandana, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sham, trayee

Title: Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana
Madhava Keshava Hari Narayana [ Krishna Rama ... ]
Sri Venu Gopala Krishna
Madhava Madhusudhana Narayana
Meaning: Narayana is the one who resides in the heart of Nara (man) is also Rama, Govinda the one bearing the flute in His Hands, slayer of demon Madhu.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, kesha, krishna, madhava, madhu, narayana, ram, sri, venu

Title: Krishna Sri Hari Krishna
Lyrics:
Krishna Sri Hari Krishna
Govinda Gopala Krishna Krishna
Nanda Mukunda Govinda Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Govinda Gopala Gokula Nandana Gopala
Krishna Sri Hari Krishna
Krishna Sri Sai Krishna
Meaning: Chant the Various names of the Lord, Krishna, Hari, Govinda, Gopala, Mukunda, of the son of Nanda and the One who steals butter and Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: chora, gokul, gopal, govinda, hari, krishna, mukunda, nanda, navaneetha, sai, sri

Title: Krishna, my lord, I adore thee
Lyrics:
Krishna, my lord, I adore thee
 Song of your flute flows so sweetly
 Blissfully dancing for me
 Until I surrender completely
 Until I surrender completely
 You're luring me away from every worldly joy
 With such an ecstasy divine
 With you I want to stay, enchanting, dark-skinned boy
 Now that I know that you are mine
 Now that I know that you are mine
 Krishna, my lord, come to me
 Dance through the forest of my heart
 Make me your flute, breathe through me
 That we may never be apart
 That we may never be apart
 Oh, make me straight and true along the path that you have shown
 In all I think and do and say
 Of hollowest bamboo, with no desires of my own
 For any tune you wish to play
 For any tune you wish to play
 Krishna, my love, come to me
 Dance through the forest of my heart
 Make me your flute, breathe through me
 That we may never be apart
 That we may never be apart

Title: Krishnam Vande Nanda Kumaram
Lyrics:
Krishnam Vande Nanda Kumaram
Radha Vallabha Navaneetha Choram
Ramam Vande Dasharatha Tanayam
Sita Vallabha Raghukula Tilakam
Meaning: I bow to the little Krishna, the son of Nanda, consort of Radha, who stole butter. I bow to Rama, the son of Dasharatha, consort of Sita and the shining star of Raghu dynasty.
Songglossary: chora, dasha, krishna, kumara, nanda, navaneetha, radha, raghu, ram, sita, tanaya, tilaka, vallabha, vande

Title: Krishnam Vande Nanda Kumaram
Lyrics:
Krishnam Vande Nanda Kumaram
Radha Vallabha Navaneetha Choram
Ramam Vande Dasharatha Tanayam
Sita Vallabha Raghukula Tilakam
Muralidhara Sukumara Sharanam
Gopi Vallabha Nanda Kishoram
Meaning: I bow to the little Krishna, the son of Nanda, consort of Radha, the one who stole butter and had a tender body, was the beloved guardian of Gopikas. I bow to Rama, the son of Dasharatha, consort of Sita and the crown of the Raghu dynasty.
Songglossary: chora, dasha, gopi, kishora, krishna, kumara, murali, nanda, navaneetha, radha, raghu, ram, sharan, sita, sukumara, tanaya, tilaka, vallabha, vande

Title: Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya
Lyrics:
Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya Charanam Namo Namo
Krishnaya Charanam Namo Namo (2)
Sayeesha Charanam Sayeesha Charanam Sayeesha Charanam Namo Namo
Sayeesha Charanam Namo Namo (2)
Meaning: Many prostrations at the Feet of Lord Krishna and Sayeesha.
Songglossary: chara, krishna, namo, sayee

Title: Krupa Karo Hey Krupa Nidhey
Lyrics:
Krupa Karo Hey Krupa Nidhey
Daya Karo Hey Daya Nidhey
Paapa Mitao Parthi Pathey
Raksha Karo Dharma Kshetra Pathey
Meaning: Show mercy on us, Oh the ocean of compassion and the Lord of Parthi. Protect us by removing the sins committed by us, Oh the Lord of Dharmakshetra.
Songglossary: daya, dharma, hey, karo, krupa, kshetra, mitey, nidhey, paapa, pathey, puttaparthi, raksha

Title: Krupa Karo Mujhey Sai Murari
Lyrics:
Krupa Karo Mujhey Sai Murari
Dukhiyan Hoon Main Darsha Bhikhari [ Krupa ]
Tum Ho Merey Nayanon Ke Pyarey
Darshan Do Mujhey Prabhu Giridhari
Krupa Karo Mujhey Sai Murari
Meaning: Show mercy on me Oh Sai Murari, I feel depressed without your vision. Grant me your Vision Oh Lord, the One who lifted the Govardhana Mountain. You are the Star of my Eyes.
Songglossary: bhikhari, darsh, do, dukhiya, giridhar, ho, hoon, karo, ke, krupa, mera, mujhe, murare, nayan, prabhu, sai, tum

Title: Ksheerabdhi Shayana Narayana
Lyrics:
Ksheerabdhi Shayana Narayana
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Vaikunta Vasa Narayana
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Natajana Paripala Narayana
Meaning: Chant the Name Lord Narayana who reclines on the Ocean of Milk, consort of Sri Lakshmi and who Incarnated as Narasimha (half Man half Lion). Narayana who has Vaikunta as His Abode, is the charmer of Vaidehi, the One who takes complete care of those who have surrendered to Him.
Songglossary: hari, ksheerabdhi, lakshmi, mohan, narahari, narayana, natajana, paripala, ramana, roopa, shayana, sri, vaidehi, vaikunta, vasa

Title: Kumbaya My Lord Kumbaya (3)
Lyrics:
Kumbaya, My Lord Kumbaya (3)
O Lord, Kumbaya
Someoneis Singing, Lord, Kumbaya
Someoneis Praying, Lord, Kumbaya
Someoneis Sleeping, Lord, Kumbaya
Someoneis Happy, Lord, Kumbaya

Title: Kuzhaludi Gitai Pozhiyum Deva
Lyrics:
Kuzhaludi Gitai Pozhiyum Deva
Gopiya Ullam Pugunda Deva
Partiyil Padam Vaitta Sayi Krishna
Shirdi Krishna Parti Krishna (2)
Meaning: You are Lord Krishna, the flute-player who blessed us with the Gita, the one who entered the hearts of Gopis, and the Lord who graces Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: deva, gita, gopi, krishna, kuzhaludi, paada, pozhiyum, pugunda, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi, ullam, vaitta

Title: Kya Karu Mai Kya Karu
Lyrics:
Kya Karu Mai Kya Karu
Koi Nahi Mera Terey Bina
Shirdi Vasa He Prabho
Parti Vasa Daya Karo
Mangala Arati Kab Logey
Mangala Guna Gau Mai
Meaning: What will I do, Lord of Shirdi, Lord of Parthi? Kindly have mercy on me. I have no one but You. While I sing Thy glory, please accept the auspicious waving of the flame.
Songglossary: arati, bina, daya, gao, guna, kab, karo, karoon, koi, kya, logey, mai, mangal, mera, nahi, prabhu, puttaparthi, shirdi, tera, vasa

Title: La ilaha il-Allah
Lyrics: La ilaha il-Allah Allah Allah (4x)
Meaning: There is nothing but God.

Title: Lagaley Man Sai Bhajan Se
Lyrics:
Lagaley Man Sai Bhajan Se Preet
Mata Pitha Sutha Bandhava Naari
Sab Do Din Ke Meet Samajh Man
Sai Bhajan Se Preet
Sai Prabho Nija Bandhu Tumharo
Sada Rahey Tero Meet Samajh Man
Bolo Ram Ghana Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai Ram, who is the real friend and kin, who will always be with you. Hook your mind to the loving Sai Bhajans. All your kith and kin, like, mother, father, children and spouse are just friends for few moments only.
Songglossary: bandha, bandhava, bhaja, bolo, din, do, ghana, ke, lagaley, mana, mata, naari, nija, pitha, prabhu, prem, rahey, ram, sab, sada, sai, samajh, se, sham, sutha, tera, tumhara

Title: Lakshmi Saranga Dhara Sita Pathi
Lyrics:
Lakshmi Saranga Dhara Sita Pathi Raghuveera Radhey Govinda
Rakumayi Panduranga
Sathya Sai Panduranga
Meaning: The Valiant one of Raghu dynasty who holds the arrows is the Lord of Sita, Incarnation of Lakshmi. Chant the names of Govinda the Lord of Radha and Panduranga the Lord of Rakumayi.
Songglossary: dhara, govinda, lakshmi, pandu, pathi, radha, raghu, rakumayi, sai, saranga, sathya, sita

Title: Lambodhara Gananatha Gajanana
Lyrics:
Lambodhara Gananatha Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Pashupathi Tanaya Siddhi Vinayaka
Pranavakara Shambho Nandana
Parthi Pureesha Paahi Gajanana
Hey Shiva Nandana Shubhanana
Meaning: Protect me Oh the Lord of ganaas, having an elephant head and the big bellied son of Parvathi and Shiva who embodies the sacred Pranava and is the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gananatha, hey, lambodhara, nanda, paahi, parvathi, pashu, pranava, pureesha, puttaparthi, shambho, shiva, shubh, siddhi, tanaya, vinayaka

Title: Lambodhara Hey Gowri Nandana
Lyrics:
Lambodhara Hey Gowri Nandana
Vighna Vinashaka Shubhanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Dukha Bhanjana
Asura Vinashaka Shubhanana
Gowri Nandana Mooshika Vahana [ Vighna Vinashaka ]
Meaning: Vinayaka is the son of Gowri who removes obstacles, destroys worry and grants spiritual powers, bestows Auspiciousness and uproots the demon clan.
Songglossary: asura, bhanjana, dukh, gowri, hey, lambodhara, mooshika, nanda, shubh, siddhi, vahana, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Lambodhara Hey Vighneshwara
Lyrics:
Lambodhara Hey Vighneshwara
Shambhu Kumara Siddeshwara
Ambika Tanaya Omkareshwara
Heyramba Sai Shirdeeshwara (Partheeshwara)
Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord who removes obstacles, the son of Shambhu and Ambika, who has a big stomach. He is he Lord of Yogis, the embodiment of Omkara, also known as Heyramba, is also the Eshwar of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: amba, hey, heyramba, kumara, lambodhara, omkareshwara, partheeshwara, sai, shambho, shirdeesha, siddeshwara, tanaya, vighnesha

Title: Lambodhara Jaya Gajanana
Lyrics:
Lambodhara Jaya Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Parama Daya Ghana [ Lambodhara ... ]
Bandha Vimochana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Pranava Swaroopa Hey Shiva Nandana
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Gajanana
Meaning: Protect me the elephant headed and the big bellied Lord, son of Mother Parvathi and Shiva, the remover of bondage and fear of birth and death, the very form of the sacred Om.
Songglossary: bandha, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, daya, gajamukha, ghana, hey, jay, lambodhara, maam, nanda, paahi, param, parvathi, prabhu, pranava, shiva, swaroopa, vimochana

Title: Lambodhara Jaya Gowri Sutha
Lyrics:
Lambodhara Jaya Gowri Sutha
Ganadhipa Jaya Gajanana [ Lambodhara ... ]
Phaalachandra Dhara Gaja Karneshwara
Partheeshwara Maam (Sayeeshwara Maam) Paahi Prabho
Meaning: The Lord of ganaas and the son of Mother Gowri, who has an elephant head, is the one who holds the crescent moon, has big ears as that of an elephant. Protect me the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: dhara, gaja, gajamukha, ganadhipa, gowri, jay, karneshwara, lambodhara, maam, paahi, partheeshwara, phaalachandra, prabhu, sayee, sutha

Title: Lambodhara Jaya Mooshika  Vahana
Lyrics:
Lambodhara Jaya Mooshika  Vahana
Pashupathi Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana [ Lambodhara Jaya ... ]
Vighna Vinasha Vijaya Vijaya Gajanana
He Gananatha Gowri Nandana
Parama Niranjana Pahi Gajanana
Pahi Gajanana Parama Niranjana
Meaning: Glory to the pot-bellied son of Lord Shiva, who removes the fear of our worldly existence and life's obstacles, and bestows successes. The son of Mother Gowri, Lord Ganesha, is supremely pure and merciful.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, gajamukha, gananatha, gowri, jay, lambodhara, mooshika, nanda, niranjan, paahi, param, pashu, vahana, vighna, vijaya, vinasha

Title: Lambodhara Shiva Gowri Sutha
Lyrics:
Lambodhara Shiva Gowri Sutha
He Shiva Nandana Bala Gajanana
Gajanana Shubanana [ Lambodhara Shiva ... ]
He Shiva Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Shambhu Kumara Gajanana (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of pot-bellied son of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri, Lord Gajanana, who destroys the fears of worldly existence and bestows good fortune and auspiciousness.
Songglossary: bala, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, gajamukha, gowri, kumara, lambodhara, nanda, shambho, shiva, shuba, sutha

Title: Lavanya Roopa Lambodhara
Lyrics:
Lavanya Roopa Lambodhara
Shambho Kumara Shankari Bala [ Lavanya Roopa ]
Pranava Kaara Prasanna Roopa
Paalaya Maam Prabhu Partheeshwara
Eka Dantha Jai Jai Ganesha
Meaning: Victory to Lord of ganaas, who has a charming form, a Pleasant face, a Big belly, son of Shambho and Shankari. Protect me Oh Lord with a single tusk, the source of the Primordial sound, the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: bala, dantha, eka, ganesha, jai, kaara, kumara, lambodhara, lavanya, maam, paalaya, partheeshwara, prabhu, pranava, prasanna, roopa, shambho, shankari

Title: Lead kindly light
Lyrics:
Lead kindly light, lead me on
Through the dark night, to a bright dawn
Lead kindly light, lead me on
Lead me from unreal into the real
Lead me from darkness to divine light
Lead me from death to life eternal (2x)
Lead me, guide me, Oh love divine
Asato Maa Sadgamaya
Tamaso Maa Jyotir Gamaya |
Mrtyor Maa Amrtam Gamaya
Hari Om, Hari Om, Om Sai Ram (2x)
(2nd time to "Asato Maa...")
Songglossary: hari, maa, om, ram, sadgamaya, sai

Title: Leela Manusha Vesha
Lyrics:
Leela Manusha Vesha ( Sai )
Haalaahala Dhara Sai Shiva [ Leela Manusha ... ]
Tala Mrudanga Damaru Ka Natha
Phaala Lochana Parama Dayaghana
Parthipurishwara Sai Maheshwara
Meaning: Lord Sai is the Lord in human form. He is Lord Shiva who swallowed the poison (to protect the devotees), the compassionate one with the third eye on His forehead, who performs the cosmic dance to the rhythm of the musical instruments. Lord Sai residing at Parthi is the embodiment of Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: damaru, dayaghana, dhara, haalaahala, ka, leela, lochana, maheshwara, manusha, mrudanga, natha, parama, partheeshwara, phaala, sai, shiva, tala, vesha

Title: Let me be one with the Infinite Son
Lyrics:
Let me be one with the Infinite Son, forever, forever, forever (3x)
 Lu wate leno leno Ma Ote, Hi ya no, Hi ya no, Hi ya no (3X)

Title: Let me touch Your feet
Lyrics:
Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami (2X)
 Padnamaskar Padnamaskar
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami
 You are everything, with your breath I sing
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami
 It's for you I long as I sing this song
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami
 Grant my highest goal, please receive my soul
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami
 Padnamaskar, from near or far
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami

Title: Let the sun shine
Lyrics:
Let the sun shine bright in the sky
 Let the sun shine bright in your life
 Let the darkness in your life disappear with the Light
 Let the sun shine bright in your life
 Call the Name of the Lord every day
 Let the Light of God show the way
 When in darkness you do fall, remember the Lord
 Let the Light of God light your day

Title: Let the Truth
Lyrics:
Let the Truth that we are one live in us and be revealed, In Sri Sathya Sai we pray
Give the earth Dharmic Leaders and let Your love heal the world, In Sri Sathya Sai we pray
Send Your peace, light and love to those suffering everywhere, In Sri Sathya Sai we pray
Hear this prayer to You Lord, from our hearts filled with hope, In Sri Sathya Sai we pray
GeneralComments: This song is best sung in unison with harmonies.

Title: Let There Be Peace On Earth
Lyrics:
Let There Be Peace On Earth, And Let It Begin With Me
Let There Be Peace On Earth, The Peace That Was Meant To Be
With God As Our Father, Brothers All Are We
Let Me Walk With My Brother In Perfect Harmony
Let Peace Begin With Me, Let This Be The Moment In Peace Eternally
Let There Be Peace On Earth, And Let It Begin With Me

Title: Let your whole life be a song
Lyrics:
Let your whole life be a song
 Believe that God is everywhere at all times
 And derive strength, comfort and joy
 Singing in your heart - and in His presence - the glory of God
 Let melody and harmony surge up from your hearts
 And let all take delight in the love
 That you express through that song

Title: Light In Me A Flame
Lyrics:
Light In Me A Flame To Love You, My Lord
To Find You In Each Heart
Where Your Love Has Poured
Light In Me A Flame (2)
Light In Me A Flame To Know You, My Lord
To Hear Your Voice Within
To Know That We Are Akin
Light In Me A Flame (2)
Light In Me A Flame To Trust You, My Lord
To Give To You My Life
With All Of Its Stride
Light In Me A Flame (2)
Light In Me A Flame To Serve You, My Lord
To Give To Fellow Friends
The Kindness That You Send
Light In Me A Flame (2)
Light In Me A Flame To Worship You, My Lord
To Sing Your Wondrous Praise
Through All Of My Days
Light In Me A Flame (2)

Title: Like The Sunlight
Lyrics:
Like The Sunlight, Like The Moon Bright, Always Always I Am With You
Like The Ocean, Like The River, Always I Am Flowing Towards You
Like The Sky Above, So Is Divine Love, Always Always Surrounding You
Like The Earth So Fair, Like The Birds Of The Air
Always I Am Caring For You
Songglossary: so

Title: Lingodhbhavakara Lingeshwara
Lyrics:
Lingodhbhavakara Lingeshwara
Partheeshwara Maam Paahi Prabho
Paahi Prabho Maam Dehi Vibho
Meaning: Protect us the Lord of Parthi, You are Lingeshwara and the one who creates Lingam out of his own self.
Songglossary: dehi, lingeshwara, lingodbhava, maam, paahi, partheeshwara, prabhu, vibho

Title: Lingodhbhavakara Sai Shivom (2)
Lyrics:
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Shivom (2)
Gangadharaya Sai Shivom [ Lingodhbhavakara Sai ... ]
Prema Swaroopaya Bhuvaneshwaraya
Pranavakaaraaya Sai Shivom
Parameshwaraya Parama Pavitraya [ Gangadharaya Sai ... ]
Meaning: Lord Sai is Lord Shiva, supporting the Ganges, and the source of the Lingam(creative power). He is the Lord of the Universe, personification of love and the source of creation.
Songglossary: bhuvaneshwara, ganga, lingodbhava, param, pavitra, pranavakaara, prem, sai, shiva, swaroopa

Title: Listen To My Heart Voice
Lyrics:
Listen To My Heart Voice Waiting For My Calling
Longing For My Hearing Loving And Endearing
Listen To Heart Voice Never Ever Dying
Never Ever Judging Giving And Forgiving
Love In My Heart Love In My Soul
Light In My Heart Light In My Soul
I Am The Light I Am The Love
Listen To My Heart Voice Never Ever Worried
Never Ever Hurried Always Kind And Happy
Listen To My Heart Voice Let It Be My Sole Choice
Inner Light Enfolds Me Divinitys Within Me

Title: Listen To My Hearts Song
Lyrics:
Listen, Listen, Listen To My Hearts Song
I Will Never Forget You, I Will Never Forsake You
Hearken, Hearken, Hearken To Whisper Of My Soul [ I Will ... ]
Take Me, Take Me, Take Me, My Lord In Thy Love [ I Will ... ]

Title: Listen, Listen
Lyrics:
Listen, Listen
Listen to the beat of divinity
So Hum So Hum strumming as we breathe
The universal OM whistling through the trees
Listen, Listen
Krishna's flute playing on the breeze
Om Sai Ram crashing on the seas
Listen, Listen
Listen to the beat of divinity
Clap your hands let your hearts fly
Living in the rhythm of Sri Sathya Sai
Listen, Listen

Title: Lord Almighty Sai
Lyrics:
Lord Almighty, Lord Almighty, Lord Almighty Sai
 Lord Almighty Sai
 Won't You lift me, won't You lift me, won't You lift me high?
 Won't You lift me high?
 Take me home to Puttaparthi, let me see Your eyes
 Let me see Your eyes
 Let me see Your Light and let me feel Your Love inside
 Let me feel Your Love inside

Title: Lord Dear God Pour Your Love
Lyrics:
Lord, Dear God, Pour Your Love Into My Heart
Pour Your Love From Today, Pour Your Love On The Way
From My Heart Let It Flow, Fill The World With Its Glow
Lord, Dear God, Pour Your Love Into My Heart (2)

Title: Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba
 Remover of all obstacles that stand in our way
 Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba
 Giver of prosperity, Easwaramma's son
 Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba
 Bless us Sai Baba, guide us through each day
 Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba

Title: Lord God Within My Heart
Lyrics:
Lord God Within My Heart, Lord God Within
Lord In The Form Of Man I Bow Within To Thee
Lord God Within My Heart, Lord God Within
Lord With Lotus Eyes, On The Sea Of Change Reclines
I Offer All To Thee, Lord God Within My Heart
Songglossary: mana

Title: Lord I Am Thine
Lyrics:
Lord I Am Thine I Am Thine I Am Thine
Lord I Am Thine I Am Thine
Be Thou Mine Oh Be Thou Mine (2)
I Am Thine I Am Thine

Title: Lord Krishna guide us on our way
Lyrics:
Lord Krishna guide us on our way
 Let us be the flute on which You play
 Play on us divine melody
 That we may grasp Your Love Reality

Title: Lord of all
Lyrics:
Lord of all, Lord of us all
 Rama Allah Harey Krishna Buddha Hara Shiva Jesus Sathya Sai
 All names are Yours, beloved Sai
 Your form is in my heart, Your name is on my lips
 Shirdi Sathya Prema Baba, Shirdi Sathya Prema Baba

Title: Lord of all the worlds
Lyrics:
Lord of all the worlds
 Draw us to Your Heart
 (Lord) Draw us to Your Heart
 Through Your Grace we open our hearts
 May we now receive You
 We surrender all
 As we breathe Your Light
 And we feel Your loving heart
 And receive Your Grace
 And submit to this

Title: Lord of beauty, Lord of mercy
Lyrics:
Lord of beauty, Lord of mercy, Lord of gentle might
 Thy Name is Truth, Sai (Sathya), Thy Form is Light
 Lord of beauty, Lord of mercy, Lord of gentle might
 Stay ever in my heart, ever in my sight
 Endless Wonder, Lord of pure delight
 Endless Wonder, Lord of gentle might
 Stay within my heart, guide me through the night
 Endless Wonder, Lord of pure delight
 Sathya Sai Baba, Lord of pure delight

Title: Lord of Compassion
Lyrics:
Lord of Compassion, You sing this song now,
 the world resounds with Your praises,
 And Your Name is my Salvation
 Your sweet Name is my Foundation
 Sathya Sai, my Inspiration
 You are the Geetha, You are Ramaayana, You are the Vedas Incarnate
 And Your Name is my Salvation
 Your sweet Name is my Foundation
 Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai
 
 Sung to the tune of Rama Rahim Ko Bhajanevale

Title: Lord of Heaven and Lord of Earth
Lyrics:
Lord of Heaven and Lord of Earth
 Lord as man has taken birth
 Sing with love, love in your hearts
 Sing with love to our Lord Sathya Sai

Title: Lord of Mercy Lord of the World
Lyrics:
Lord of Mercy Lord of the World
 Infinite compassion loving all
 Showering grace everywhere
 Sairam Sairam Om Sai Baba
 Saying that which cannot be said
 Teaching that which cannot be taught
 Knowing that which cannot be known
 Sai Ram Sai Ram Om Sai Baba

Title: Lord of the dance
Lyrics:
Lord of the dance
 You danced into Shirdi and we sat at Your feet
 You cured our ills with Vibhuthi
 You thrilled us with wonders and You showed us the way
 And said You would return one day.
 Dance dance where ever You may be
 Sai is the Lord of the Dance and He
