 Bestows His grace so we may know the bliss
 Of sharing in this dance of His
 You dance into Parthi and You teach us to sing
 You give us all there's nothing we can bring
 You take our hearts and You fill our hands
 We clasp Your feet to learn Your dance

Title: Lord Sathya Sai Bhagavaan
Lyrics:
Lord Sathya Sai Bhagavaan Sathya Sai
 Bless Us, Protect us, Sri Sathya Sai
 Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Prema Sai Jai Jai
 Puttaparthi Sai Jai Jai Brindavan Sai Jai Jai
 Ram Sai Krishna Sai Yesu Sai Jai Jai

Title: Lord who is Light
Lyrics:
Lord who is Light, the ocean of Light
 Lord who is Love, the fountain of Love
 Compassionate Savior, Helper and Friend
 Who leads me out of this darkness I am in
 Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai Om
 Star of heaven, Lord of all
 Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai Om

Title: Lotus blooming in my heart
Lyrics:
Lotus blooming in my heart
 flower of love, Baba's love
 waters flowing through the heart
 streams of love, Baba's love
 Father, thank you for the heart
 made with love, Baba's love.

Title: Love all serve all
Lyrics:
Love all serve all, listen to the call of the Lord
 Love all serve all, this is the call of the Lord
 If you love the lord, then you must love all
 If you serve the lord, then you must serve all
 Love all, serve all, listen to the call of the Lord
 Love all, serve all, this is the call of the Lord
 See no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil, says the Lord
 Think no evil, do no evil, love all serve all, says the Lord

Title: Love In My Heart
Lyrics:
Love in my heart, love in my home, love in my life, Sai is Love
Sai is my heart, Sai is my home, Sai is my life, Sai my own
Love, love, love is God, live, live, live in Love (2x)
Allelujah, Allelu Allelujah, Alleluia, Allelujah (2x)
Allelujah, Alleujah (2x)
 (next two lines sung in rounds)
Allelujah, Allelu Allelujah, Alleluia, Allelujah
Allelujah, Alleujah
GeneralComments: Shared by Berniece Mead
Songglossary: sai

Title: Love is all I see
Lyrics:
Love is all I see - Love is all I do
 Love is all that's Me - Love is all that's You
 Love is all I feel - Love is all I am
 Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram - Om
 Love is all I say - Love is all I know
 Love is all I hear - Love is all I show
 Love is all My Heart - Love is all My Soul
 Love is all I sing - Love is all I bring

Title: Love is flowing like a river
Lyrics:
Love is flowing like a river flowing out from you and me
 Flowing out into the desert setting all the captives free
 Peace is flowing like a river...
 Truth is flowing like a river...
 Bliss is flowing like a river...
 Halleluiah Halleluiah Halleluiah Halleluiah

Title: Love is God
Lyrics:
Love, Love, Love, Love is God
Live, Live, Live, Live in Love
Expand your heart to encompass all
Live, Live, Live in Love
Your master is your heart
Your heart where God resides
God is in you, with you, above you around you and behind you
God is in you, with you, above you around you and behind you
Men: Love, Love is God
Women: Love, Love is God
Men: Live, Live in Love
Women: Live, Live in Love
Women:
Love, Love is God
Live, Live in Love
Love, Love is God
Live, Live in Love
(Until the END)
Men:
Loooove, Loooove is Gooood,
Liiiiiiiive, Liiiiiiiive in Love
Loooove, Loooove is Gooood,
Liiiiiiiive, Liiiiiiiive in Love
(Until the END)
God is in you, with you, above you around you and behind you (3x)

Title: Love is God
Lyrics:
Love, Love, Love, Love is God
 Live, Live, Live, Live in Love
 Expand your heart to encompass all
 Live, Live in Love
 Your master is your heart
 Your heart where God resides
 God is in you, with you, above you around you and behind you
 Love, Love, Love is God, Live, Live, Live in Love
 God is in you, with you, above you around you and behind you

Title: Love is God, God is Love
Lyrics:
Love is God, God is Love
 Love all serve all says the Lord
 He is good, so be good
 Love all serve all says the Lord
 Live in love, Love all beings
 Love all serve all says the Lord

Title: Love Is His Form
Lyrics:
Love Is His Form, Says Sai, Sai Baba Is Love, Divine Love
He Is In Our Every Breath, Sathya Sai Is Love, Divine Love
Love Is His Form, Says Sai, Sai Baba Is Love, Divine Love
Ram Rahim Krishna Karim
Zohrashtra Yeshu Nanak
Sing Any Name To Adore Him, Sai Baba Is Love, Divine Love
Songglossary: baba, karim, krishna, nanak, rahim, ram, sai, sathya, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Love Is My Form
Lyrics:
Love Is My Form, Truth Is My Breath, Bliss Is My Food
My Life Is My Message Expansion Is My Life
No Reason For Love, No Season For Love, No Birth, No Death
Prema Sathya Ananda, Dharma Shanthi Ananda
Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Sai Jai Jai
Shirdi Baba, Sathya Baba, Prema Baba Jai Jai
Songglossary: anand, baba, dharma, jai, prem, sai, sathya, shanthi, shirdi

Title: Love Is The Way Love
Lyrics:
Love Is The Way Love Is The Only Way
Love Is The Road Love Is A Golden Road
Follow The Road Love Is A Golden Road
Step By Step We Will Walk Toward The Lord (2)
Step By Step We Will Reach The Light

Title: Love is You, Love is Me
Lyrics:
Love is You - Love is Me
 Love is We - together kindness and generosity
 Sincerity together
 Love Love Love - Love Love Love
 Love is Light - Light within
 Shining bright forever
 Cleansing, everlasting - Glowing forever
 Love is One - We are One
 Everyone - together
 Patience, inner happiness - Peacefulness together
 Love is God - God is Love
 We are Love - together
 Giving and forgiving
 Loving forever

Title: Love peace righteousness and truth
Lyrics:
Love, peace, righteousness and truth
 Holy spirit dwelling in us all
 Father in Heaven
 Give us Your love
 Father in Heaven
 Give us Your peace
 Love in every heart
 Peace in every mind
 Love here and now Sweet Jesus Christ, our Lord
 Love here and now Sri Sathya Sai Baba

Title: Ma Daya Nidhe Shiva Shankari
Lyrics:
Ma Daya Nidhe Shiva Shankari
Karunakari Kadambari [ Ma Daya ... ]
Maatheshwari Yogeshwari Jagadishwari Amba
Saishwari Sarveshwari Shwetambari Amba
Meaning: Merciful Mother Goddess Shankari who drapes Herself in white is Amba, the Mother of the Universe, Lord of all and is Mother Sai.
Songglossary: amba, daya, jagadeeshwari, kadamba, karuna, ma, maatheshwari, nidhey, saiyeeshwara, sarvesha, shankari, shiva, shwetambari, yogi

Title: Ma Hey Ma
Lyrics:
Ma Hey Ma
Hey Ma Hey Ma
Sai Mata Jagat Janani [ Ma Hey Ma ... ]
Veena Vadini Saraswathi Mata
Jagat Palini Gowri Mata
Ambe Bhavani Lakshmi Mata [ Sai Mata ]
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Universal Mother Sai, Saraswathi who plays on the Veena (a stringed instrument), Gowri who sustains the Universe, Lakshmi and Ambe Bhavani.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, gowri, hey, jagat, janani, lakshmi, ma, mata, palini, sai, saraswathi, vadini, veena

Title: Ma Saraswathi Gyaan Do
Lyrics:
Ma Saraswathi Gyaan Do
Vidya Buddhi Daan Do [ Ma Saraswathi ]
Prema Daayini Shanthi Daayini
Bhakthi Mukti Pradayini
Sai Mata Taar Do
Meaning: Oh mother Sai, bestow us the spiritual knowledge, the education and the intelligence. Oh mother, you are personification of Love and Peace, Devotion and Liberation.
Songglossary: bhakthi, buddhi, daan, daayi, dayini, do, gnana, ma, mata, mukti, prem, sai, saraswathi, shanthi, vidya

Title: Maathey Jaganmatey
Lyrics:
Maathey Jaganmatey
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini
Manasa Bhavani Maathey [ Maathey Jaganmatey ]
Shiva Mana Mohini Sumadhura Bhaashini
Jaya Jaya Ananda Amrutha Varshini
Parthi Nivasini Paapa Vinashini
Patithodharini Maathey
Meaning: Salutations to mother of the Universe, Mother Bhavani who is the remover of distress and bestower of auspiciousness, enchanter of Lord Shiva, with beauty in speech. Victory to the one who showers bliss and nectar, to the one who resides in Parthi, the destroyer of sins, the liberator of the downtrodden.
Songglossary: amrutha, anand, bhaashi, bhava, haarini, jagan, jay, kaarini, mana, manasa, mangal, matha, mohan, nivasi, paapa, patithodharini, puttaparthi, sankata, shiva, sumadhura, varshini, vinashana

Title: Madhava Gopala
Lyrics:
Madhava Gopala
Nanda Nandana Ghana Shyama Gopala [ Madhava ... ]
Shyama Sundara Brindavana Lola
Murali Manohara Giridhara Bala
Jaya Hari Govinda Radhe Gopala (x3)
Meaning: Gopala is the dark complexioned son of Nanda, dear consort of Radha, has an enchanting form.
Songglossary: bala, brindavana, ghana, gopal, govinda, hari, jay, lola, madhava, manohar, murali, nanda, nandana, pala, radha, sham, sundara

Title: Madhava Gopala
Lyrics:
Madhava Gopala
Madhusudhana Hari Giridhara
Mukunda Madhava Parthi Vihara
Muralidhara Hari Sundara
Muralidhara Hari Sundara (2)
Meaning: Glory be to Madhava, Gopala, Madhusudhana, Hari, Giridhara, Mukunda, Muralidhara, Sundara who has Incarnated again in Parthi.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, hari, madhava, madhu, mukunda, murali, puttaparthi, sundara, vihar

Title: Madhava Harey Krishna Madhura Mohana
Lyrics:
Madhava Harey Krishna Madhura Mohana
Gokula Balana Devaki Nandana
Venu Vilolana Paapa Vinashana [ Madhava Harey ... ]
Radhika Jeevana Rajeeva Nayana
Nanda Sunandana Gopi Ramana [ Venu Vilolana ]
Meaning: Oh son of Devaki, dear child of Gokula, who bears the flute and destroys sin. He is lotus eyed, the very life of Radha, the ever joyful Lord of Gopis.
Songglossary: bala, devaki, gokul, gopi, hari, jeeva, krishna, madhava, madhu, mohan, nanda, nayan, paapa, radhika, rajeeva, ramana, sunanda, venu, vilola, vinasha

Title: Madhava Harey Madhusudhana Harey
Lyrics:
Madhava Harey Madhusudhana Harey
Yadava Harey Yadu Nandana Harey
Keshava Harey Radha Krishna Harey
Janardhana Mana Mohana Harey
Sai Satchidananda Harey
Meaning: Chant the different names of Krishna, of Yadava lineage, Madhava, Madhusudhana the charmer of the minds and hearts of men and the very embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.
Songglossary: hari, janardhana, kesha, krishna, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, nanda, radha, sai, satchidananda, yadava, yadu

Title: Madhava Jaya Keshava Jaya Govinda
Lyrics:
Madhava Jaya Keshava Jaya Govinda Sai Narayana
Govinda Sai Narayana
Gopala Sai Narayana [ Madhava Jaya ... ]
Kalimala Hari Sai Murari
Jaya Baba Jaya Narayana
Parthipurisha Pavana Purusha
Meaning: Victory to Sai Narayana, the incarnation of Madhava and Gopala. Glory to Sai, the Lord of Parthi and the Supreme being, the destroyer of evil and of the demon Mura.
Songglossary: baba, gopal, govinda, hari, jay, kalimala, kesha, madhava, murare, narayana, partheeshwara, pavan, purusha, sai

Title: Madhava Keshava Narayana
Lyrics:
Madhava Keshava Narayana
Sri Ramana Veda Parayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Narayana
Tribhuvana Bharana Narayana (Hey)
Meaning: Narayana is the one who reclines on Adi Sesha also known as Madhava and Keshava is the remover of the fear of birth and death, wholly devoted to the promotion of Vedas and the Lord of the three worlds.
Songglossary: bharana, bhava, bhaya, harana, hey, kesha, madhava, narayana, parayana, ramana, sri, tribhuvan, veda

Title: Madhava Keshava O Merey Atma
Lyrics:
Madhava Keshava O Merey Atma Ram
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan Baba Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan
Sharanam Harey Sai Ram
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhagawan
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Raksha Karo Bhagawan
Meaning: Lord Sai, You are my Lord with many names: Vishnu, Krishna and Rama. I take refuge in You Lord, please show me mercy and afford me Your protection.
Songglossary: atma, baba, bhagawan, daya, hari, ho, karo, kesha, krupa, madhava, mera, raksha, ram, sai, sharan, tum

Title: Madhava Madhava
Lyrics:
Madhava Madhava
Madhusudhana Hari Madhava
Mathuradhipathey Keshava Madhava [ Madhava ... ]
Mohana Murali Mukunda Madhava
Pavana Parthi Pura Hari Madhava
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Jaya Hari Madhava
Meaning: Victory to the descendant of King Madhu, slayer of demon Madhu, Lord of Mathura who is attractive to behold and the resident of sacred land of Parthi.
Songglossary: hari, hey, jay, kesha, madhava, madhu, mathura, mohan, mukunda, murali, pavan, pura, puttaparthi

Title: Madhava Madhusudhana (Hey)
Lyrics:
Madhava Madhusudhana (Hey)
Yadava Kula Bhooshana Harey Krishna [ (Hey) Madhava ... ]
Jagat Palana Jaganmohana Hey Nandana
Meaning: Praise the Lord the annihilator of demon Madhu, the Ornament of Yadava Clan, son of Nanda and the One who enchants and nourishes the Universe.
Songglossary: bhooshan, hari, hey, jagan, jagat, krishna, kula, madhava, madhu, nanda, paalaya, yadava

Title: Madhava Mohana Kunja Vihari
Lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Kunja Vihari
Mathuranatha Muralidhari [ Madhava Mohana ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu He Giridhari
He Giridhari Shyama Murari [ Meera Ke ... ]
Parthipurishwara Sai Murari
Meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is the enchanting Krishna roaming in the gardens. He is the Lord of Mathura, the flute-player and the destroyer of demon Mura. Lord of Meera lifted the Govardhana mountain (to protect His devotees)
Songglossary: giridhar, ke, kunja, madhava, mathura, meera, mohan, murali, murare, partheeshwara, prabhu, sai, sham, vihar

Title: Madhava Mohana Muralidhara
Lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Muralidhara
Muralidhara Muralidhara [ Madhava Mohana ]
Yadava Sai Narayana
Nanda Mukunda Narayana
Navaneetha Chora Narayana [ Nanda Mukunda ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana you have taken birth in the Yadava clan as the son of Nanda, one who steals the butter (of worldly desires) from the hearts of your devotees, holds the flute and charms everyone around.
Songglossary: chora, madhava, mohan, mukunda, murali, nanda, narayana, navaneetha, sai, yadava

Title: Madhava Mohana Murari
Lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Murari
Madhusudhana Hey Muralidhara [ Madhava Mohana ... ]
Govinda Ananda Dayaka
Gopala Giridhari Sri Hari
Sri Hari Sai Sri Hari
Meaning: Sri Hari is one of the various names of Lord Krishna the slayer of demons Mura and Madhu, holds the flute and held the mountain aloft and gives Supreme bliss.
Songglossary: anand, dayaka, giridhar, gopal, govinda, hari, hey, madhava, madhu, mohan, murali, murare, sai, sri

Title: Madhava Mohana Shyama Gopala
Lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Shyama Gopala
Muralidhara Mukunda Gopala
Dwapara Yug Mey Krishna Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Shyama Manohara Hey Nandalala
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopala
Meaning: Lord Gopala who had taken birth in the Dwapara age, Lord of Meera, son of Nanda has come again as Sai Gopala at Parthi.
Songglossary: bala, dwapara, giridhar, gopal, hey, ke, krishna, madhava, manohar, meera, mohan, mukunda, murali, nanda, prabhu, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sham, yuga

Title: Madhava Mohana Shyama Murari
Lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Shyama Murari
Radha Vallabha Hrudaya Vihari [ Madhava Mohana ]
Murali Vinodana Madhuvana Sanchari
Sai Murari Sai Murari
Sharan Mey Lelo Prabhu Charana Tumhari
Meaning: Chant the names of Krishna who is the consort of Radha and has the human Heart as His abode, He delights in Playing the Flute and moves about in the forests of Madhu. Oh Sai Murari I bow to your feet, Hence accept me into your fold.
Songglossary: chara, hrudaya, lelo, madhava, madhu, mohan, murali, murare, prabhu, radha, sai, sanchari, sham, sharan, tumhara, vallabha, vihar, vinodana

Title: Madhava Murahara Murali Gopala
Lyrics:
Madhava Murahara Murali Gopala
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
Parthi Purandara Parama Daya Ghana
Deena Janavana Sai Gopala [ Jaya Govinda ]
Meaning: Victory to Govinda and Gopala of unbounded compassion, dear to the forlorn, is the life principle at Parthi.
Songglossary: daya, deen, ghana, gopal, govinda, janavana, jay, madhava, murahara, murali, param, puran, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Madhava Murahara Murali Manohara Giridhara
Lyrics:
Madhava Murahara Murali Manohara Giridhara Gopala
Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Nanda Kumara Sundarakara Brindavana Sanchara
Murali Lola Munijana Pala Giridhara Gopala [ Hey Giridhara Gopala ]
Kaustubha Haara Mouktika Haara Radha Hrudaya Vihara
Bhakthodhara Bala Gopala Giridhara Gopala [ Hey Giridhara Gopala ]
Goparipala Gopilola Govardhanodhara
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora Giridhara Gopala [ Hey Giridhara Gopala ]
Meaning: Sing continuously the Glories of the One who lifted the Govardhan Hill to protect His tribesmen from the wrath of Lord Indra in the form of Downpour of Rain. He is the son of Nanda, with a bewitching form, who moves about in Brindavan. He loves playing the Flute and meditated upon by the Sages. He is the One who wears the Emeralds and pearls on His Bosom and the Resurrector of His devotees. He is the cowherd boy of Nanda, who stole butter(hearts) from the Gopis.
Songglossary: bala, bhaktoddhara, brinda, chora, giridhar, gopal, goparipala, gopilola, harana, hey, hrudaya, kaustubha, kumara, lola, madhava, manohar, mouktika, munijana, murahara, murali, nanda, navaneetha, pala, radha, sanchara, sundara, vihar

Title: Madhava Roopa Manusha Vesha
Lyrics:
Madhava Roopa Manusha Vesha
Sai Maharaj Sathya Sai Maharaj [ Madhava Roopa ... ]
Dattatreya Daiva Swaroopa
Devadi Deva Sai Maharaj
Meaning: Lord Madhava has taken a Human Form as the Emperor Sathya Sai, who is also Lord Dattatreya, the Divine Personality and the Lord of Lords.
Songglossary: daiva, datta, deva, devadi, madhava, maharaj, manusha, roopa, sai, sathya, swaroopa, vesha

Title: Madhava Sodari Mangala Gowri
Lyrics:
Madhava Sodari Mangala Gowri
Sundara Vadani Meena Lochani [ Madhava Sodari ... ]
Pashupathi Ranjani Parvathi Gowri
Tribhuvana Palini Devi Bhavani
Shiva Shakti Roopini Sai Narayani
Meaning: Glory to auspicious, radiant faced Mother Gowri (Parvathi), Vishnu's sister. She is the consort of Lord Shiva and protects all three worlds. Lord Sai is the embodiment of Shiva and Shakti.
Songglossary: bhava, devi, gowri, lochana, madhava, mangal, meena, narayani, palini, parvathi, pashu, ranjani, sai, shakthi, shiva, sodari, sundara, swaroopa, tribhuvan, vadana

Title: Madhura Madhura Hey Muralidhari
Lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Hey Muralidhari
Murahara Shourie Hey Giridhari
Hrudaya Vihari Parthi Vihari
Hari Hari Sri Hari Sai Murari
Meaning: Lord Hari is the one born as Krishna, the one who gives bliss, resident of every heart and resident of Parthi.
Songglossary: giridhar, hari, hey, hrudaya, madhu, murahara, murali, murare, puttaparthi, sai, shouri, sri, vihar

Title: Madhura Madhura Murali Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Murali Ghana Shyama
Mathuradhipathey Radhey Shyama
Surdas Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Meera Ke Prabhu Hrudaya Vihari
Meaning: Oh dark complexioned Shyama, Lord of Mathura one who resides in everyone's heart, is also the Lord of Surdas and Meera.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, hey, hrudaya, ke, madhu, mathura, meera, murali, prabhu, radha, sham, surdas, vihar

Title: Madhura Madhura Muralidhara Madhava Madhusudhana
Lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Muralidhara Madhava Madhusudhana Sri Krishna
Neela Bala Sri Krishna Vanamali Abharana Krishna
Vijaya Sarathi Krishna Venu Vilola Krishna
Geeta Bodhaka Krishna Parthasarathey Krishna
Sharanam Sharanam Sri Krishna Raksha Raksha Sai Krishna
Meaning: I have surrendered to You Sri Krishna, who slayed demon Madhu, the one who is sweetness personified and a delightful Flutist. Krishna, who has adorned a flower garland, is of blue complexion. He is the Successful charioteer of Partha (Arjuna) and the One who has taught Geeta (Bhagawad Geeta). Protect me Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: abharana, bala, bodha, geeta, krishna, madhava, madhu, murali, neela, parthasarathey, raksha, sai, sarathi, sharan, sri, vanamali, venu, vijaya, vilola

Title: Madhura Madhura Sai Naama
Lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Sai Naama
Madhura Madhura Sai Dhyana [ Madhura Madhura ... ]
Madhura Madhura Sai Geeta
Madhura Madhura Sai Bodha
Sundara Sundara Sai Roopa
Jayatu Jayatu Sai Krishna
Meaning: Sing the Glories of the Lord whose Name, Contemplation, Song, Teachings are all Sweetness Personified and His Form is Beauty Personified.
Songglossary: bodha, dhyaan, geeta, jay, krishna, madhu, naam, roopa, sai, sundara

Title: Madhura Manohara Madana Gopal
Lyrics:
Madhura Manohara Madana Gopal
Madhura Sudha Rasa Murali Gopal
Murali Gopal Murali Gopal
Radha Manohara Radhey Gopal
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Gopal whose vision delights everyone, who is the essence of Sweetness, one who delights Radha and the Lord with the Flute.
Songglossary: gopal, madana, madhu, manohar, murali, radha, rasa, sudha

Title: Madhuram Madhuram Madhuram (Ati)
Lyrics:
Madhuram Madhuram Madhuram (Ati)
Mangala Naamam Madhuram Madhuram
Madhava Naamam Madhuram ( Sai ) [ Ati Madhuram ... ]
Shravanam Madhuram Smaranam Madhuram
Sathyam Madhuram Sai Madhuram
Sarvam Madhuram Seva Madhuram [ ( Sai ) Madhava ]
Meaning: The Lord is sweetness personified and hence everything about Him is sweet. His name, his speech, his thought, the service done to HIM is sweet too.
Songglossary: ati, madhava, madhu, mangal, naam, sai, sarva, sathya, seva, shravan, smaran

Title: Madhuram Sai Madhuram Madhuram
Lyrics:
Madhuram Sai Madhuram Madhuram
Madhuram Sai Sarvam Madhuram [ Madhuram ... ]
Geetam Madhuram Shravanam Madhuram
Naamam Madhuram Smaranam Madhuram
Paadam Madhuram Dhyanam Madhuram
Sai Madhuram Darshana Madhuram (2)
Meaning: Sai is Sweetness personified. His Songs, Discourses, Name, Meditation, Chanting, Gift of Vision, Touching His Feet are all sweet.
Songglossary: darsh, dhyaan, geeta, madhu, naam, paada, sai, sarva, shravan, smaran

Title: Madhusudhana Harey Madhava
Lyrics:
Madhusudhana Harey Madhava
Sri Vasudeva ( Sai Deva ) Janardhana
Hari Keshava Narayana
Sri Hari Govinda Mana Mohana
Janardhana Jagat Palana
Deenavana Dukha Bhanjana
Aravinda Lochana Ananda Naam [ Sri Vasudeva ]
Meaning: Chant the names of Madhusudhana, Madhava, Vasudeva, Janardhana, Hari, Keshava, Narayana and Govinda. Chant the names of One who charms the Mind, Motivator of people, sustainer of the Universe, destroyer of sorrows, Lotus eyed, whose name itself is Bliss.
Songglossary: anand, aravinda, bhanjana, deenavana, deva, dukh, govinda, hari, jagat, janardhana, kesha, lochana, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, naam, narayana, paalaya, sai, sri, vasudeva

Title: Madhusudhana Hey Muralidhara
Lyrics:
Madhusudhana Hey Muralidhara
Madhava Keshava Devadi Deva [ Madhusudhana Hey ... ]
Mana Mohana Hey Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Mana Mohana Hey ]
Bhuvana Abharana Vanditha Charana
Meaning: Madhusudhana, Muralidhara, Madhava, Keshava, Mana Mohana are different names of the same Lord Narayana. Sai Narayana the bestower of Auspiciousness, jewel of the Earth and feet worthy of obeisance.
Songglossary: abharana, bhuvana, chara, deva, devadi, hey, kesha, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, murali, narayana, sai, vanditha

Title: Madhuvan Ke Mohana Murali Bhajaiyya
Lyrics:
Madhuvan Ke Mohana Murali Bhajaiyya
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Ananda Ram Balaram Ji Ke Bhaiyya (2)
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Gopi Manohara Raasa Rachaiya
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya (2)
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Meaning: Oh adorable Krishna, you are the son of Nanda, the brother of Balaram, the one who gives bliss and the enchanting one who dances with the Gopikas.
Songglossary: anand, balaram, bhai, bhaja, giridhar, gopi, ji, kanha, ke, kumara, madhu, manohar, mohan, murali, nanda, raasa, rachaiya, ram

Title: Madhuvana Ke Muraliwala
Lyrics:
Madhuvana Ke Muraliwala
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala [ Nacho Nacho ]
Gopi Manohara Gopala Bala
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Natha [ Nacho Nacho ]
Meaning: Dance, oh son of Nanda, dance, the one who holds the flute, moving around the forest of demon Madhu, the Gopala of Gopis, the dear Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: bala, gopal, gopi, hey, ke, madhuvana, manohar, muraliwala, nacho, nandalala, natha, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Madhuvana Murali Guna Gao
Lyrics:
Madhuvana Murali Guna Gao
Madhusudhana Hari Naam Japo [ Madhuvana Murali ... ]
Vraja Gopi Priya Radhey Shyam Naam
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Naam
Hrudaya Vihari Sri Sathya Sai Ram
Gowri Manohara Shankara Naam Bhajo
Meaning: Sing the glory of Krishna, chant the name of Madhusudhana, the beloved Radheyshyam of the Gopis of Vraj Brindavan, Sita Ram of the Raghu dynasty, Shankara who charms Gowri and of Sathya Sai Rama who resides in everyone's heart.
Songglossary: bhaja, gao, gopi, gowri, guna, hari, hrudaya, japo, madhu, manohar, murali, naam, priya, radha, raghava, raghu, raja, ram, sai, sathya, sham, shankara, sri, vihar, vraja

Title: Madhuvana Murali Shyama Bhajo
Lyrics:
Madhuvana Murali Shyama Bhajo
Madhura Manohara Krishna Bhajo
Radha Madhava Shyama Bhajo
Brindavana Gopala Bhajo
Meaning: Sing the sweet name of Krishna of enchanting beauty, consort of Radha, of Gopala who moves about in Brindavan.
Songglossary: bhaja, brinda, gopal, krishna, madhava, madhu, manohar, murali, radha, sham

Title: Madhuvana Murali Shyama Murari
Lyrics:
Madhuvana Murali Shyama Murari
Savariya Morey Raasa Vihari
Gokula Nandana Hey Giridhari
Deenan Ke Tum Bhava Bhaya Haari (2)
Meaning: Oh dear Lord Krishna who plays Raasa leela (celestial dance), dear child of Gokula, who lifted the Govardhan mountain and the one who removes the fear of birth and death.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, deenan, giridhar, gokul, harana, hey, ke, madhu, morey, murali, murare, nanda, raasa, savari, sham, tum, vihar

Title: Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murari
Lyrics:
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murari
Sri Madhusudhana Muralidhari [ Madhuvana Sanchari ... ]
Madhava Mohana Mayura Mukutadhara
Mathura Natha Prabhu ( Sai ) Giridhari
Meaning: Oh Krishna! You are the slayer of demon Mura and who moved about in the forest of demon Madhu to slay him. You have worn the feather of the Peacock on your head and is the Lord of Mathura who lifted the Govardhan mountain.
Songglossary: giridhar, madhava, madhu, mathura, mayur, mohan, mukuta, murali, murare, natha, prabhu, sai, sanchari, sham, sri

Title: Madura Puri Nilayey Meenakshi
Lyrics:
Madura Puri Nilayey Meenakshi
Kamakoti Nilayey Kamakshi
Kashi Puradheeshwari Vishweshwari
Parthi Puradheeshwari Sayeeshwari
Meaning: Goddess Meenakshi has Her Abode in Madura, Kamakshi has Abode in Kanchi Kamakoti, Vishweshwari has Her Abode in Kashi and Sayeeshwari has Her Abode in Parthi.
Songglossary: kamakoti, kamakshi, kashi, madura, meena, nilaya, puri, purishwara, puttaparthi, sayee, vishweshwari

Title: Mage Handa Ahenavado
Lyrics:
Mage Handa Ahenavado Oba Thrishula Deviyan Dho
 Sai Oba Dakinavado, Mage Geethe Ahenavado
 Dina Dina Gevi Yai, Mage Jeevithaya Sai Ama Maniyan Mage
 Davasa Devi Yai Mage, Obe Name Sihi Kara Saminde
 Nithara Devele, Obe Nama Sihikara Vandimi Obe Siripade

Title: Maha Ganapathey Gajanana
Lyrics:
Maha Ganapathey Gajanana
Uma Maheshwara Priya Nandana [ Maha Ganapathey ... ]
Gananayaka Vanditha Charana
Tava Charanam Bhava Bhaya Harana [ Uma Maheshwara ]
Meaning: The dear son of Uma Maheshwari is the Elephant faced Lord of ganaas whose feet are worshipped by everyone. Prostrations to you Oh Lord, the destroyer of cycle of Birth and death.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, charanam, gajamukha, gananatha, gananayaka, harana, maha, maheshwara, nandana, priya, tava, uma, vanditha

Title: Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
Lyrics:
Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
Matanga Vadana Namostuthey [ Maha Ganapathey ... ]
Adi Poojita Gananatha
Ananda Dayaka Gananatha
Prathama Vandana Pranavakara
Vighneshwara Vinayaka
Meaning: Pranaams to the Elephant headed Lord of ganaas who receives the first prayer, giver of bliss, the embodiment of Pranava Om and destroyer of obstacles in the path of sadhana.
Songglossary: adi, anand, dayaka, gananatha, maha, matanga, namostuthey, poojita, pranava, prathama, vadana, vandana, vighnesha, vinayaka

Title: Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
Lyrics:
Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
Matanga Mukha Namostuthey [ Maha Ganapathey ... ]
Himadrija Sutha Namostuthey
Omkareshwara Namostuthey ( Sai )
Meaning: Pranaams to the great Lord of ganaas, the elephant headed son of Parvathi, born of Himalaya mountains and the very embodiment of sacred syllable Om.
Songglossary: gananatha, himadrija, maha, matanga, mukha, namostuthey, omkareshwara, sai, sutha

Title: Mahadeva Maheshwara Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Mahadeva Maheshwara Sai Narayana
Nata Naagara Dukha Bhanjana Sai Narayana
Karunakara Akhileshwara Sai Narayana
Allah Ho Tum Mahavir Yesu Sai Narayana
Hrudayeshwara Partheeshwara Sai Narayana
Meaning: Sai Narayana is the Lord of all worlds, Epitome of compassion, Destroyer of Sin, Playful and the Lord of Lords. Sai Narayana is Allah, Mahavir and Yesu. He is the indweller and the Lord of Parthi as well.
Songglossary: akhileshwara, allah, bhanjana, dukh, ho, hrudayeshwara, karuna, mahadev, mahavir, maheshwara, naagar, narayana, nata, partheeshwara, sai, tum, yesu

Title: Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Shankara
Lyrics:
Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Shankara
Maheshwara Shiva Shambho Shankara [ Mahadeva ... ]
Mouleeshwara Shiva Shambho Shankara
Madanaantaka Shiva Shambho Shankara
Mruthyunjaya Shiva Shambho Shankara
Meaning: Shiva the Lord of Lords, Sovereign Lord, with the braided Hair on His Head, Destroyer of Ego and the Conqueror of Death, is the One who confers all that is Auspicious.
Songglossary: madana, mahadev, maheshwara, mouleeshwara, mruthyu, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Mahishasura Mardhini Mama Taapa Vimochani
Lyrics:
Mahishasura Mardhini Mama Taapa Vimochani
Madhava Sodari Mangala Kaarini [ Mahishasura Mardhini ]
Puttapartheeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari
Sangeeta Roopini Saraswathi Manohari
Meaning: Praises to the slayer of Mahisha, the remover of my sins, the sister of Lord Madhava, the bestower of auspiciousness and Saraswathi, the very form of music, is also Sathya Sayeeshwari, the dweller at Parthi.
Songglossary: kaari, madhava, mahishasura, mama, mangal, manohar, mardini, puttapartheeshwari, sangeeta, saraswathi, sathya, sayee, sodari, swaroopa, taapa, vimochana

Title: Make a home of Love
Lyrics:
Make a home of Love
 Make a home of Love
 Make the world a Happy Home of Love
 Man must have this goal
 Destroy the weeds of fear
 Destroy the weeds of fear
 Destroy the weeds of hatred and fear
 Man must have this goal
 You have to sow Love
 You have to sow Love
 You have to sow and grow Love
 Man must have this goal

Title: Make your life a rose
Lyrics:
Make your life a rose that blooms silently
 In the language of fragrance
 Each petal is a good deed you've done throughout the day
 When your heart is pure and your mind is silent
 The voice of God can be heard
 Then offer your roses to Him.

Title: Man Ek Baar Hari Bol
Lyrics:
Man Ek Baar Hari Bol
Hari Hari Bol Hari Bol [ Man Ek Baar ... ]
Hari Pitha Hari Mata
Hari Guru Gnana Daata
Chidananda Roopa Hari Patitha Pavana Man Ek Baar Hari Bol
Meaning: Oh Mind! chant the name of Lord Hari even once, who is the Mother, Father, Preceptor and the one who bestows wisdom, the very form of Awareness and Bliss, redeemer of the downtrodden.
Songglossary: baar-baar, bol, chidananda, daata, ek, gnana, guru, hari, mana, mata, patitha, pavan, pitha, roopa

Title: Man Mandir Mey Aao Giridhari
Lyrics:
Man Mandir Mey Aao Giridhari
Nis Din Barsat Nayan Hamarey [ Man Mandir ... ]
Surdas Ke Shyama Murari
Akhiyan Terey Darsha Ke Pyaasi (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord please be seated in our minds, our eyes are shedding tears of separation from you. Oh Lord of Surdas! Our eyes are pining to have your Darshan.
Songglossary: aao, akhiyan, barsat, darsh, din, giridhar, hamarey, ke, mana, mandir, murare, nayan, nis, pyaas, sham, surdas, tera

Title: Man Mandir Mey Aao Sai
Lyrics:
Man Mandir Mey Aao Sai
Sai Bhagawan Darsha Dikhao [ Man Mandir ]
Sada Nirantara Bhajo Sai Ram
Giridhara Naagara Natavara Shyam [ Sai Bhagawan ]
Meaning: Come and Grant me Your Vision in the Altar of my Mind Oh Sai Bhagawan. Chant the Name of Sai continuously, Supreme actor, who was the Lord of Meera.
Songglossary: aao, bhagawan, bhaja, darsh, dikhao, giridhar, mana, mandir, naagar, natavara, nirantara, ram, sada, sai, sham

Title: Man Mandir Mey Rajadhi Raja
Lyrics:
Man Mandir Mey Rajadhi Raja
Tum Ho Sai Maharaj
Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shivakami Priya Shiva Raja [ Tum Ho Sai ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are the king of kings enshrined in my heart, you are the Shiva Raja the beloved of Mother Shivakami and the master of dance.
Songglossary: ho, maharaj, mana, mandir, narthana, nataraj, priya, raja, sai, shiva, sundara, tum

Title: Man Mandir Mey Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Man Mandir Mey Sai Ram
Megha Shyam Radhey Shyam Sathya Sai Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram
Janam Janam Ka Tum Se Naata
Parthi Puri Parameshwara Roopa
Deena Dayala Hey Jagannatha [ Parthi Puri Parameshwara ]
Charan Mey Lelo Prabhu Sai Ram [ Megha Shyam ]
Meaning: The dark complexioned Krishna, Radha's consort is the same as Sathya Sai Ram dwelling in everyone's heart. Accept me in your fold the refuge of the forlorn. You have been my Lord since many lives.
Songglossary: chara, dayal, deen, hey, jagan, janam, jay, ka, lelo, mana, mandir, megha, naata, param, prabhu, puri, puttaparthi, radha, ram, roopa, sai, sathya, se, sham, sri, tum

Title: Man Me Smarana Karo Sai
Lyrics:
Man Me Smarana Karo Sai Ram
Man Me Japate Raho Sai Ram [ Man Me ... ]
Ram Nam Me Lele Raho Sab
Deena Dukhyo Ke Ram Baba [ Man Me ... ]
Meaning: Constantly chant and remind yourself of the name of Lord Sai. Let us all take His name, the Lord of the meek and fallen. Meditate on Lord Sai who is Love itself.
Songglossary: baba, deen, japo, karo, ke, ley, mana, nam, raho, ram, sab, sai, smaran

Title: Man Mey Merey Gopala Shyama
Lyrics:
Man Mey Merey Gopala Shyama Radhey Nandalala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala
Brindavan Ke Nandalala (2)
Yashoda Tanaya Gopala
Yadu Kula Tilaka Gopala
Radha Lola Gopala
Raasa Vilola Gopala
Meaning: Oh son of Nandalala and Yashoda you are enshrined in my heart, the star of Yadu clan, beloved of Radha, one who dances with the Gopikas at Brindavan known as Raasa Leela.
Songglossary: brinda, gopal, ke, kula, lola, mana, mera, nanda, raasa, radha, sai, sham, tanaya, tilaka, vilola, yadu, yashoda

Title: Mana Bangaru Parthi Baba
Lyrics:
Mana Bangaru Parthi Baba
Mana Shringara Vadana Sai [ Mana Bangaru ]
Antaryami Baba
Sarva Antaryami Sai (Mana)
Meaning: Our dearest Baba of Parthi, the indweller of all beings, has a charming face and a golden heart.
Songglossary: antarayami, baba, bangaru, mana, puttaparthi, sai, sarva, shringara, vadana

Title: Mana Mandir Me Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Mana Mandir Me Sai Ram
Megha Shyam Radhey Shyam Sathya Sai Ram
Sai Ram Jai Ram
Janama Janama Ka Tuma Se Natha
Parthipuri Parameshwara Data
Deena Dayala He Jagannatha
Charano Me Lelo Prabhu Sai Ram [ Megha Shyam ... Sai Ram ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sathya Sai Rama, and to Lord Krishna, residing in the temple of everybody's hearts. Supreme Lord of Parthi, from time immemorial, we have been together from birth to birth. O compassionate Lord of the Universe of infinite mercy, kindly accept me at Thy lotus feet.
Songglossary: chara, daata, dayal, deen, jagan, jai, janam, ka, lelo, mana, mandir, megha, natha, param, prabhu, puttaparthi, radha, ram, sai, sathya, se, sham, tum

Title: Mana Me Ram Tana Me
Lyrics:
Mana Me Ram Tana Me Ram Aur Sapana Me Ram
Jai Me Ram Stal Me Ram Aur Gagan Me Ram
Bolo Bolo Prem Se Bolo Jaya Jaya Ram
Jaya Jaya Sai Ram Bolo Jaya Jaya Sai Ram (2)
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradayaka Jaya Jaya Sai Ram
Bolo Bolo Prem Se Bolo Jaya Jaya Sai Ram [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Anand Mangala Dayaka Sai Jaya Jaya Sai Ram
Bolo Bolo Prem Se Bolo Jaya Jaya Sai Ram [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Meaning: Lord Sai Ram, who pervades the mind, the body, and the dreams, is present in earth, water, and sky (omnipresent). He grants virtues like truth, righteousness, peace, and love. He confers good fortune and bliss.
Songglossary: anand, aur, bolo, dayaka, dharma, gagan, jai, jay, mana, mangal, pradayaka, prem, ram, sai, sapana, sathya, se, shanthi, stal, tanaya

Title: Mana Mohana Ghana Shyama Gopala
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Ghana Shyama Gopala
Mathura Natha Venu Gopala [ Mana Mohana Ghana ... ]
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala (2) [ Mathura Natha ]
Meaning: Oh the Lord of Mathura, Gopala you lure the minds of human beings, the son of Nanda, you steal the butter of devotion from everybody's heart, Oh Sai Gopala the one dwelling at Parthi.
Songglossary: chora, ghana, gopal, kishora, mana, mathura, mohan, nanda, natha, navaneetha, puttaparthi, sai, sham, venu, vihar

Title: Mana Mohana Giridhara Shyama Harey
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Giridhara Shyama Harey
Shyama Harey Ghana Shyama Harey
Krishna Mukunda Ananda Chanda
Brindavana Ghana Shyama Mukunda
Sai Mukunda Hari Govinda [ Brindavana Ghana ]
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
Meaning: Chant the names of Giridhara, Shyama, Krishna, Mukunda, Hari, Govinda and Sai Baba. Krishna lures the mind, has the complexion that of dark blue clouds.
Songglossary: anand, baba, brinda, chand, ghana, giridhar, govinda, hari, krishna, mana, mohan, mukunda, sai, sham

Title: Mana Mohana Hey Giridhari Shyama
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Hey Giridhari Shyama
Mathura Natha Sundara Shyama
Natavara Naagara Megha Shyama
Nayana Manohara Sri Sai Rama
Meaning: Krishna otherwise known as Shyama is the charmer of Minds, the one who held aloft the mountain, is the Lord of Mathura and ever Handsome. Krishna is an absolute pretender and has dubious ways, a treat to the eyes who is none other than Sri Sai Rama.
Songglossary: giridhar, hey, mana, manohar, mathura, megha, mohan, naagar, natavara, natha, nayan, ram, sai, sham, sri, sundara

Title: Mana Mohana Hey Madhusudhana
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Hey Madhusudhana
Mano Ramana Hey Nanda Nandana
Radha Ramana Hey Jaganmohana
Govinda Govinda Sai Jaga Vandana
Meaning: Lord Krishna the cowherd boy attracts and enchants the mind, the world and Radha, slayer of demon Madhu, is the son of Nanda and worshipped by the world.
Songglossary: govinda, hey, jagan, jagat, madhu, mana, mano, mohan, nanda, radha, ramana, sai, vandana

Title: Mana Mohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
Yadava Madhava Ranga Vittala Murari
Ghana Shyama Sundara Hey Giridhari [ Yadava Madhava ]
Vittala Murari Ranga Vittala Murari (2)
Vittala Murari (2)
Meaning: Krishna attracts the mind of Human beings and moves about through the dense bushes. He belongs to Yadava clan. The one who lifted the Mountain high, is also known as Vittala and Ranga.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, hey, krishna, kunja, madhava, mana, mohan, murare, ranga, sham, sundara, vihar, vittala, yadava

Title: Mana Mohana Madhusudhana
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana
Mangala Charana Narayana
Govardhanodhara Gopalana
Govinda Gopala Narayana (3) [ Mangala Charana ]
Meaning: Narayana is the origin of Auspiciousness, slayer of demon Madhu you capture the minds of men, the cowherd Gopala who lifted the mountain Govardhan to save the devotees.
Songglossary: chara, gopal, govinda, madhu, mana, mangal, mohan, narayana

Title: Mana Mohana Murali Gopala Jaya
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Murali Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhey Gopala
Pandari Natha Jaya Hari Vittala
Govardhana Giridhari Gopala
Meaning: Gopala with the flute in His hands has a bewitching form, which lures the mind, one who lifted the Govardhan hill to save His devotees is also Lord Vittala of Pandharpur.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, govardhan, govinda, hari, jay, mana, mohan, murali, natha, pandari, radha, vittala

Title: Mana Mohana Muralidhara
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Muralidhara
Madhura Madhura Hey Giridhara Bala
Madhava Madhusudhana
Hrudayanta Ranga Sri Sai Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Puttaparthi Ranga [ Madhava ]
Meaning: The one of Madhu lineage, slayer of demon Madhu, personification of sweetness, the child who lifted the Govardhan hill, who lures the minds of everyone and who bears the flute, is also the Ranga residing in our hearts, the Lord Sai Ranga residing at Parthi.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, hey, hrudaya, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, murali, puttaparthi, ranga, sai, sri

Title: Mana Mohana Muralidhari
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Muralidhari
Krishna Krishna
Radhey Radhey
Madhusudhana Madhava Shyama Harey
Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam Jaya Sai Harey (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of Krishna and Radhey, the one who attracts the Mind and holds the Flute. Krishna's complexion is that of dark thick clouds and the One who slayed demon Madhu.
Songglossary: ghana, hari, jay, krishna, madhava, madhu, mana, mohan, murali, radha, sai, sham

Title: Mana Mohana Muralidhari Jaya Radhey
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Muralidhari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Yamuna Teera Vihari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Brindavana Sanchari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Meera Prabhu Giridhari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Brindavana Sanchari Jaya Radhey Govinda [ Jaya Yamuna ]
Meaning: Radhey Govinda is a delight to the Mind, the player of Flute, who moves about on the banks of Yamuna river and Brindavan, is the Lord of Meera.
Songglossary: brinda, giridhar, govinda, jay, mana, meera, mohan, murali, prabhu, radha, sanchari, teera, vihar, yamuna

Title: Mana Mohana Nandalal
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Nandalal
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana Brindavana Nandalal [ Mana Mohana ... ]
Mana Mohana Nandalal
Brindavana Nandalal [ Mana Mohana Madhusudhana ]
Meaning:
Oh the entrancing Lord Krishna, the Son of King Nanda; Oh Lord, the slayer of the demon Madhu, who played in the bower of Brindavan, You steal our minds!

Oh Lord, the son of King Nanda, You capture our minds.

Oh Lord, the darling of Nanda, who spent His playful and precious childhood in Brindavan.
Songglossary: brindavana, madhusudhana, manamohana, nandalal

Title: Mana Mohana Shyama Murari
Lyrics:
Mana Mohana Shyama Murari
Hey Giridhari Hrudaya Vihari
Brindavana Sanchari [ Mana Mohana ]
Gaana Vilola Murali Gopala
Sundara Shyama Gopala
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Hasita Vadana Sai Gopala
Meaning: The One who charms the Mind, who held aloft the mountain high, of dark complexion, indweller of the Heart moves about the thick bushes of Brindavan. Gopala loves music, plays the Flute, delights in playing with the Gopis and has a smiling face.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, gaan, giridhar, gokul, gopal, gopi, hasita, hey, hrudaya, lola, mana, mohan, murali, murare, sai, sanchari, sham, sundara, vadana, vihar, vilola

Title: Manamohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
Lyrics:
Manamohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
Yadava Madhava Ranga Vittala Murari
Manamohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
Ghanashyama Sundara Hey Giridhari
Yadava Madhava Ranga Vittala Murari
Vittala Murari Ranga Vittala Murari
Meaning: Krishna, you are the charmer of our heart, and you reside in a garden (Kunja means creepers and vine, and here, it is a reference to Brindavan). Madhva, you were born in the Yadava clan, and are verily the same Vittala and Ranga, and have a beautiful complexion of dark rain bearing clouds.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, hey, krishna, kunja, madhava, manamohana, murare, ranga, sundara, vihar, vittala, yadava

Title: Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Lyrics:
Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Dusthara Bhava Sagara Taranam
Guru Maharaj Guru Jai Jai
Sai Natha Sadguru Jai Jai
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Aruna Shivom
Omkaram Baba Omkaram Baba Omkaram Baba Om Namo Baba
Meaning: O mind, adhere to the feet of the Guru by singing His glory and take refuge under His feet, which enables us to cross the unconquerable ocean of life. Glory be to the venerable Guru Sainath. Chant repeatedly 'Om Nama Shivaya', 'Arunachala Shiva'. Prostrations to Baba who is the embodiment of Om.
GeneralComments:
The last line is also sung as "Omkaram Bhava Omkaram Bhava Omkaram Bhava Om Namo Baba".
 
English Version 1: "Worshipping In Your Mind At The Guru's Feet".
 
English Version 2: "Worship In Your Mind The Feet Of The Guru".
Songglossary: aruna, arunachala, baba, bhajao, bhava, charanam, dusthara, guru, jai, maharaj, manasa, namah, natha, om, sadguru, sagar, sai, shiva, taarana

Title: Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Lyrics:
Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Sai Charanam Pranamamyaham (Sathya) (2)
Nirmala Hrudaya Virajita Charanam
Sakala Charachara Vyapaka Charanam
Bhava Sagara Uddharaka Charanam [ (Sathya) Sai Charanam (2) ]
Meaning: Oh Mind, sing the glory of Guru and adhere to the feet of Sathya Sai, the one seated in the pure heart, the one who is present in both animate and inanimate objects and helps us to cross the ocean of cycle of birth and death.
Songglossary: bhajao, bhava, chara, guru, hrudaya, manasa, nirmala, pranamamyaham, sagar, sai, sakala, sathya, uddhara, virajita, vyapaka

Title: Mandara Giridhara Madana Manohara
Lyrics:
Mandara Giridhara Madana Manohara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Giridhari Giridhari Govardhanodhara Giridhari (2)
Madhava Madhusudhana
Murali Gaana Vilola
Meaning: Lord Krishna who lifted the Govardhana mountain, which was earlier known as Mandara mountains to save the people from the wrath of Indra, the Lord of Meera, slayer of demon Madhu, loves playing the flute.
Songglossary: gaan, giridhar, ke, madana, madhava, madhu, manda, manohar, meera, murali, naagar, prabhu, vilola

Title: Mandara Mala Dhara Jaya Gowri
Lyrics:
Mandara Mala Dhara Jaya Gowri Shankara
Hara Hara Paahi Trinetra
Gangadhara Bimbadhara Chandramouli Shankara [ Mandara Mala Dhara ... ]
Vamadeva Mahadeva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shankara
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Shankara
Meaning: Victory to Lord Shankara, the consort of Gowri, who adorns the garland of 'Mandara' flowers. Victory to the benevolent three-eyed one who wears the Ganga and the moon on His crown of hair. Victory to the God of Gods, Lord Shiva. He is none other than our Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.
Songglossary: bimbadhara, chandramouli, dharma, gangadhara, gowri, hara, jay, mahadeva, maladhara, mandara, paahi, prem, sai, sathya, shankara, shanthi, shiva, trinetra, vamadeva

Title: Mandasmitha Mukha Madhura Bhashana Mahadeva
Lyrics:
Mandasmitha Mukha Madhura Bhashana Mahadeva Shambho
Mangalalaya Manmata Nashana Mahadeva Shambho
Lingamanohara Nandi Vahana Mahadeva Shambho
Mahadeva Shambho Hara Hara Mahadeva Shambho (2)
Meaning: Lord of Lords, Lord Shiva with a happy and smiling face, who speaks sweet words, bestows good fortune. He, who uses the bull for a conveyance and is portrayed and worshipped in the form of a graceful Linga, burnt Manmata (God of Love) to ashes (for disturbing Lord Shiva during His penance)
Songglossary: bhashana, hara, linga, madhu, mahadev, manda, mangal, manmata, mukha, nandi, nasha, shambho, vahana

Title: Mandir Mey Aao Madhava
Lyrics:
Mandir Mey Aao Madhava
Madhava Keshava [ Mandir Mey ... ]
Adi Narayana Anantha Sai
Aao Aao Hrudaya Nivasi [ Mandir Mey ... ]
Radha Lola Rakumayi Vittala
Ranga Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala (2)
Meaning: I invite You in the temple of my heart, Oh Madhava, Keshava. The primordial, the infinite Sai, dweller of my Heart, beloved of Radha and Rakumayi.
Songglossary: aao, adi, ananta, hrudaya, kesha, lola, madhava, mandir, narayana, nivasi, pandu, radha, rakumayi, ranga, sai, vittala

Title: Mandir Mey Tum Ram Ho
Lyrics:
Mandir Mey Tum Ram Ho Sai
Masjid Mey Noor Mohammad (Allah Ho Akbar)
Gurudware Mey Tum Guru Nanak
Man Mandir Mey Sai Sai
Bolo Ram Ek Hi Naam
Sab Mil Bolo Sai Ram
Bolo Ram Ek Hi Naam [ Sab Mil ... ]
Meaning: You are adored as Ram in the Temple, as the light of Mohammad in the mosque; You are Guru Nanak in the Gurudwara; In the temple of my mind, You are Sai. Chant the name of Ram, let us chant together 'Sai Ram'.
Songglossary: akbar, allah, bolo, ek, guru, gurudware, hai, ho, mana, mandir, masjid, milo, mohammad, naam, nanak, noor, ram, sab, sai, tum

Title: Mangala Charana Gajanana
Lyrics:
Mangala Charana Gajanana
Gajavadana Shubhanana [ Mangala Charana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana
Meaning: Salutations to the Lotus Feet of the benevolent and goodness bestowing Elephant-faced Lord. He is the provider of knowledge and intelligence, the son of Gowri.
Songglossary: buddhi, chara, dayaka, gajamukha, gowri, mangal, pradayaka, shubh, tanaya, vidya

Title: Mangala Dayaka Hey Gananatha
Lyrics:
Mangala Dayaka Hey Gananatha
Pranava Swaroopa Vighna Vinasha [ Mangala Dayaka ... ]
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Dayala
Parthi Pureeshwara Jagat Paripala [ Pranava Swaroopa ]
Meaning: Bestower of Good, Lord of the ganaas, the very embodiment of Pranava (Omkar) and destroyer of obstacles. The merciful, loving son of Lord Shiva. He is also the Lord of Parthi, ruler of the Universe.
Songglossary: dayaka, dayal, gananatha, hey, jagat, mangal, nanda, paahi, paripala, pranava, purishwara, puttaparthi, shiva, swaroopa, vighna, vinasha

Title: Mangala Dayaka Matanga Mukha
Lyrics:
Mangala Dayaka Matanga Mukha
Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Mahadeva Shiva Gowri Nandana [ Jaya Jaya .. ]
Mooshika Vahana Mukti Pradayaka Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Mahadeva Shiva Gowri Nandana Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha who bestows auspiciousness, who is the beloved son of Lord Shiva and His consort Gowri. Victory to the Lord of ganaas, provider of liberation, who rides on the mouse (representing controller of the temperamental mind).
Songglossary: dayaka, gananatha, gowri, jay, mahadev, mangal, matanga, mooshika, mukha, mukti, nanda, pradayaka, shiva, vahana

Title: Mangala Kaari Ganapathi Deva
Lyrics:
Mangala Kaari Ganapathi Deva
Sankata Haari Ganapathi Deva
Peetambara Dhari Ganapathi Deva
Sanatana Sukha Kaari Ganapathi Deva
Prathama Poojana Tum Ganapathi Deva
Naman Karey Hum Ganapathi Deva
Meaning: Oh Lord Ganapathi, wearing yellow colored clothes, you are the one who is worshipped first, you bestow auspiciousness, you remove the obstacles in life and bestow eternal happiness, Oh Lord we offer our salutations.
Songglossary: deva, dhari, gananayaka, harana, hum, kaari, karo, mangal, naman, peetambara, pooja, prathama, sanatana, sankata, sukh, tum

Title: Mangala Kaarini Jai Sai Ma
Lyrics:
Mangala Kaarini Jai Sai Ma
Jai Sai Ma Jai Sai Ma [ Mangala Kaarini ... ]
Bhagya Pradayini Sai Ma
Bhava Bhaya Haarini Sai Ma
Tribhuvana Palini Jai Sai Ma
Mata Maheshwari Sai Ma
Jai Jai Jai Sai Ma (3)
Meaning: Victory to Mother Sai who bestows auspiciousness and wealth, who is the destroyer of fear (worldly attachments) and who is the ruler of the three worlds.
Songglossary: bhagya, bhava, bhaya, dayini, haarini, jai, kaarini, ma, maheshwari, mangal, mata, palini, sai, tribhuvan

Title: Mangala Kara Hey Santoshi Ma
Lyrics:
Mangala Kara Hey Santoshi Ma
Sai Mata Darshana Deejo [ Mangala Kara ... ]
Sundara Roopini Suguna Manohari
Shanthi Pradayini Santoshi Ma (2)
Meaning: Oh auspicious Mother Santoshi, Oh Mother Sai please give your vision. Oh Beautiful one full of virtues, you bestow peace to the Universe.
Songglossary: darsh, dayini, deejo, hey, kara, ma, mangal, manohar, mata, sai, santoshi, shanthi, suguna, sundara, swaroopa

Title: Mangala Karini Mahalakshmi (Shubha)
Lyrics:
Mangala Karini Mahalakshmi (Shubha)
Sankata Nashini Sri Shiva Shankari [ Mangala Karini ... ]
Vidya Dayini Veena Paani
Sathya Swaroopini Parthi Nivasini
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Goddess Mahalakshmi who bestows auspiciousness to all. You are also Parvathi, who destroys the obstacles in life. You bestow knowledge to all. Holding Veena (a stringed instrument) in hand you are embodiment of truth who reside in Parthi.
Songglossary: dayini, kaarini, mahalakshmi, mangal, nivasi, paani, puttaparthi, sankata, sathya, shankari, shiva, shubh, sri, swaroopa, veena, vidya, vinashana

Title: Mangala Karini Sai Janani
Lyrics:
Mangala Karini Sai Janani
Mata Maheshwari Veda Kalamayi
Raga Priyakari Bageshwari Ma
Jagat Janani Ma Jagat Janani Ma Jagat Janani Ma
Mata Pitha Guru Sai Janani
Meaning: Oh Mother Sai, you bestow auspiciousness to one and all. You are the embodiment of Vedas, you are the lover of music and you are the Mother, Father and Preceptor to the entire humanity.
Songglossary: bageshwari, guru, jagat, janani, kaarini, kalamayi, ma, maheshwari, mangal, mata, pitha, priya, raga, sai, veda

Title: Mangala Karini Sai Janani
Lyrics:
Mangala Karini Sai Janani
Bhuvanoddharini Bhava Bhaya Harini [ Mangala Karini ... ]
Gnana Dayini Karuna Roopini
Sai Janani Shri Sai Janani
Meaning: Mother Sai blesses and removes all fears of worldly existence. She protects all of creation, bestows spiritual wisdom and is a picture of compassion.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, bhuvanoddharini, dayini, gnana, haarini, janani, kaarini, karuna, mangal, sai, sri, swaroopa

Title: Mangala Murthy Maruti Raya Raghava
Lyrics:
Mangala Murthy Maruti Raya Raghava Priya Jaya Hanuman
Anjani Putra Anjaneya Vayu Kumara Jaya Hanuman
Sita Shoka Vinasha Karaka Rama Dootha Jaya Hanuman
Sakala Mangala Moola Kaarana Sarva Mangala Jaya Hanuman
Jai Jai Hanuman Jaya Hanuman (4)
Meaning: Victory to Hanuman, the embodiment of auspiciousness who is also known as Maruti Raya, who adores Lord Rama and is the son of Anjani and Vayu (Wind god). He is the one who removed the sorrow of Sita, the messenger of Rama and the one who bestows auspiciousness.
Songglossary: anjani, doota, hanuman, jai, jay, kaara, kaarana, kumara, mangal, maruthi, moola, murthy, priya, putra, raghava, raja, ram, sakala, sarva, shoka, sita, vayu, vinasha

Title: Mangala Naama Bhajorey Manuva
Lyrics:
Mangala Naama Bhajorey Manuva
Sankata Hara Sri Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Maruti Sevitha Manasa Ram
Mahima Avatara Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Meaning: Oh Mind, Chant the auspicious name of the Lord Sai Ram, the Lord who was served by the mighty Hanuman and the Lord who was the glorious incarnation of this Age. Chant the name, which removes obstacles in life.
Songglossary: avatar, bhajao, hara, mahima, manasa, mangal, manuva, maruthi, naam, ram, sai, sankata, sevita, sri

Title: Mangala Nama Bhajo Mana Patitha
Lyrics:
Mangala Nama Bhajo Mana Patitha Pavana
Sai Harey Shiva Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey Shiva Sai Harey [ Mangala ... ]
Shantha Brahma Mayi Parama Daya Ghana
Sai Harey Shiva Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey Shiva Sai Harey
Meaning: O Mind, chant the auspicious, purifying, and uplifting name of Lord Sathya Sai Baba who destroys sins and is the ultimate in mercy and peace.
Songglossary: bhaja, brahma, daya, ghana, hari, ma, mana, mangal, naam, param, patitha, pavan, sai, sathya, shantha, shiva

Title: Mangala Pradayini Sai Shankari
Lyrics:
Mangala Pradayini Sai Shankari
Shiva Shankari Sayeeshwari Shiva Shakthi Roopini [ Mangala Pradayini ... ]
Sri Chakra Dhari Nilayey Amba Moksha Dayini
Shiva Shankari Sayeeshwari Shiva Shakthi Roopini
Meaning: This Bhajan praises Goddess Sai Shankari who bestows auspiciousness with various names such as, Shiva Shankari, Sayeeshwari, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakti, Sri Chakra Dharini and the one who bestows liberation (Moksha Dayini).
Songglossary: amba, chakra, dayini, dhari, mangal, moksha, nilaya, sai, sayee, shakthi, shankari, shiva, sri, swaroopa

Title: Mangala Shubha Kari Mata Maheshwari
Lyrics:
Mangala Shubha Kari Mata Maheshwari
Ambe Bhavani Akhilandeshwari [ Mangala Shubha ... ]
Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Adi Parashakthi Sri Parameshwari
Ananda Roopini Hey ( Sai ) Shiva Shankari
Meaning: I propitiate Mother Maheshwari, who bestows auspiciousness, Mother Bhavani the mother of the universe, the Lotus eyed Raja Rajeshwari and Shiva Shankari who is the personification of the primordial energy and eternal of bliss.
Songglossary: adi, akhila, amba, anand, bhava, hey, kari, lochana, maheshwari, mangal, mata, param, parashakthi, raja, rajeeva, rajeshwari, sai, shankari, shiva, shubh, sri, swaroopa

Title: Mangalamaya Varadey Bhavani
Lyrics:
Mangalamaya Varadey Bhavani
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani
Ajara Amara Parabrahma Swaroopini
Nirakara Tum Hey Jagat Janani
Hey Jagat Janani (3) [ Nirakara Tum ]
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Mother Bhavani who bestows auspiciousness to all, you are the one who knows no birth or death, the embodiment of the Absolute Supreme Cosmic Spirit, you are formless one, Oh mother of the entire Universe.
Songglossary: ajara, amara, bhava, durga, hey, jagat, janani, maheshwari, mangal, mata, nirakara, parabrahma, swaroopa, tum, varada

Title: Manovanchita Pradayini
Lyrics:
Manovanchita Pradayini
Mangala Mangalya Shubhadayini [ Manovanchita ... ]
Kama Krodha Bhaya Nashini
Karunya Lavanya Gunashalini
Karunya Lavanya Parti Nivasini
Meaning: Desire-fulfilling Mother Goddess, resident of Parthi, bestows good luck and good fortune, destroys anger, lust and fear, and is full of charm and compassion.
Songglossary: bhaya, dayini, gunashalini, kama, karuna, krodha, lavanya, mangal, nivasi, puttaparthi, shubh, vanchita, vinashana

Title: Manuva Bolo Guru Charanam Manasa
Lyrics:
Manuva Bolo Guru Charanam Manasa Bhajarey Sai Charanam
Sri Guru Charanam Sadguru Charanam
Sai Charana Namo [ Manuva Bolo ]
Sadguru Charanam Prabhu Paada Charanam
Sai Charana Namo
Sri Guru Charanam Prabhu Paada Charanam [ Sai Charana Namo ... ]
Meaning: Meditate upon the divine feet of the preceptor Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bhaja, bolo, chara, guru, manasa, manuva, namo, paada, prabhu, sadguru, sai, sri

Title: Manuva Bolo Jai Sita Ram
Lyrics:
Manuva Bolo Jai Sita Ram Bolo Jai Radhey Shyam
Jai Sita Ram Bolo Jai Radhey Shyam (3)
Meaning: Let us chant and meditate on Lord Ram whose consist is Mother Sita, and Lord Shyam, the savior of Mother Radhey. May victory be to Lord Ram, who is the same as Lord Shyam.
Songglossary: bolo, jai, manuva, radha, ram, sham, sita

Title: Manuva Bolo Radhey Radhey Radhey
Lyrics:
Manuva Bolo Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam Naam
Ram Ram Ram Bolo Ram Sita Ram Naam [ Manuva Bolo ... ]
Ranga Ranga Ranga Bolo Panduranga Baba Naam
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Panduranga Baba Naam
Tukaram Namdeva Bhaktha Sakha Baba Naam
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Baba Naam
Meaning: Meditate on the various names of the Lord such as Radhey Shyam, Sita Ram, Panduranga, who is none other than our Lord of Parthi. The very same Lord was the friend of Saints like Tukaram and Namdev.
Songglossary: baba, bhaktha, bolo, deva, manuva, naam, namdeva, pandu, puttaparthi, radha, ram, ranga, sai, sakha, sham, sita, tukaram, vasa

Title: Maruti Raya Mangala Naama
Lyrics:
Maruti Raya Mangala Naama
Pavana Putra Paavana Charitha
Anjani Putra Anjaneya
Ati Balavanta Jaya Hanumantha
Meaning: Chant the auspicious name of Lord Maruti (Hanuman), the Son of the Wind God, the one with blemishless character. Salutations to the Son of Anjani, the mighty Hanumantha.
Songglossary: anjani, ati, balavanta, charitha, hanuman, jay, mangal, maruthi, naam, paavana, pavan, putra, raja

Title: Master of Light
Lyrics:
Master of Light
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Sai Baba
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Sweet Jesus
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Divine Mother
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Lord Buddha
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Mother Lakshmi
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Holy Spirit
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Shirdi Sai
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Amachi
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Lord Rama
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home

Title: Master of Maya
Lyrics:
Master of Maya, He's the Master of Maya, Universal Presence
 Creator of the Dream
 Maya is His leela
 Maya is His sport
 (and) If you will surrender
 He'll safely transport
 Your boat across the ocean
 of worldliness and grief
 He'll grant you liberation
 Your soul He'll redeem
 'Cause He's the Master of Maya, He's the Master of Maya,
 Universal Presence, Creator of the Dream
 Maya is a shadow
 That fades 'neath the sun
 When you walk Godward
 You merge in the One
 Then maya will not harm you
 It'll lie at your feet
 Where once there seemed many
 Only God will be seen
 Master of Maya, He's the Master of Maya, Universal Presence,
 Creator of the Dream

Title: Mata Annapoorneshwari
Lyrics:
Mata Annapoorneshwari
Sri Sathya Sayeeshwari [ Mata ... ]
Mata Saraswathi Mata Mahalakshmi
Mata Annapoorneshwari (Hey) (2)
Sri Shiva Shaktheeshwari [ Hey Mata ]
Sri Sathya Sayeeshwari
Meaning: Pray to Mother Annapoorneshwari, who is none other than Sathya Sayeeshwari, who is also Mother Saraswathi (who bestows knowledge) and Mother Lakshmi (who bestows wealth). Mother Sai is also the embodiment of Shiva Shakti.
Songglossary: annapoorna, hey, mahalakshmi, mata, saraswathi, sathya, sayee, shaktheeshwari, shiva, sri

Title: Mata Bhavani Maheshwari
Lyrics:
Mata Bhavani Maheshwari
Sai Mata Bhavani Parameshwari
Sai Mata Bhavani Sarveshwari
Mata Bhavani Krupa Sagari
Krupa Sagari Krupa Sagari
Kaarini Poorani Dharini Amba Mata Bhavani (2)
Durga Devi Duritha Nivarini Mata Bhavani
Hey Mata Bhavani (3) [ Durga Devi ]
Meaning: Mother Bhavani, Maheshwari is none other than our Mother Sai Parameshwari, She is the goddess of all goddesses She is the Ocean of Grace (Krupa Sagari), She is the Cause (Kaarini), She is the Fulfillment (Poorani), She is the one who sustains the Universe (Dharini), Mother Bhavani is the destroyer of evil.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, devi, dhari, durga, duritha, hey, kaari, krupa, maheshwari, mata, nivarana, param, poorna, sagar, sai, sarvesha

Title: Mata Durga Bhavani Ma
Lyrics:
Mata Durga Bhavani Ma
Jaya Jagat Vandini Mata [ Mata Durga ... ]
Mangala Gowri Sowbhagya Dayini
Pranava Svarupini Mata
Shiva Shaktheeshwari Palaya Mam
Ambe Bhavani Rakshaya Mam (Jagad)
Meaning: Glory to Mother Goddess Durga, origin of creation, bestower of good luck and good fortune, and worshipped by one and all. The consort of Lord Shiva protects and guards all an dis the personification of "om" (creation)
Songglossary: amba, bhava, dayini, durga, gowri, jagat, jay, ma, mam, mangal, mata, paalaya, pranava, raksha, shaktheeshwari, shiva, sowbhagya, swaroopa, vandini

Title: Mata Maheshwari Tribhuvana Janani
Lyrics:
Mata Maheshwari Tribhuvana Janani
Premamayi Sathya Sai Janani
Shiva Mana Mohini Paapa Vinashini
Veda Kalamayi Kalyana Dayini
Jagadodharini Parthi Narayani [ Premamayi ]
Meaning: The mother of three worlds, Maheshwari (who is Parvathi the Consort of Shiva) who is none other than Lord Sathya Sai is the personification of Love, is the enchanter of Lord Shiva. She is the destroyer of sins, the embodiment of Vedas and the one who bestows auspiciousness. The goddess Narayani of Parthi is the uplifter of the Universe.
Songglossary: dayini, jagadodhara, janani, kalamayi, kalyan, maheshwari, mana, mata, mohan, narayani, paapa, premamayi, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, shiva, tribhuvan, veda, vinashana

Title: Mata Mata Sai Mata
Lyrics:
Mata Mata Sai Mata
Jagatha Mata Sai Vishwa Mata [ Mata Mata ... ]
Durga Bhavani Kaali Kapalini
Shanthi Dayini Sai Mata
Meaning: Mother Sai is the mother of the Universe. She is also known by names like Durga, Bhavani, and Kali. She is the bestower of peace.
Songglossary: bhavani, dayini, durga, jagat, janani, kaali, kapalini, mata, sai, shanthi, vishwa

Title: Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha
Lyrics:
Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha Hari
Narayana Sai (Hari) Narayana
Janaki Jeevana Sita Mohana
Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayan ( Sai ), one who is the life of Janaki and the consort of Lakshmi, you are my Mother, Father, Preceptor, Kith and Kin.
Songglossary: bandhava, guru, hari, janaki, jeeva, lakshmi, mata, mohan, narayana, pitha, ramana, sai, sakha, sita

Title: Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha
Lyrics:
Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha Hari
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
Allah Tum Ho Yesu Tum Ho
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Tum Ho
Sab Ka Malik Ek Hai Bhagawan [ Narayana Sai ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana you are the Mother, Father, Guru, Kith and Kin. You are none other than Allah, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavir and the Lord of the entire humanity.
Songglossary: allah, bandhava, bhagawan, buddha, ek, guru, hai, hari, ho, ka, mahavir, malik, mata, narayana, pitha, sab, sai, sakha, tum, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Mata Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar
Lyrics:
Mata Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar Ambe Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar
Mata Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar Ambe Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar
Ma Sheravali Ma Jyotavali
Pahadavali Ma Lattavali
Prem Se Bolo ( Jai Matadi)
Sare Bolo (Jai Matadi)
Sab Mil Bolo (Jai Matadi)
Baar Se Bolo (Jai Matadi)
Mata Rani Jai Jai Kaar Ambe Rani Jai Jai Kaar
Meaning: Victory be to the divine mother, who rides majestically on a lion, who is effulgent, and who resides in mountainous terrain. Chant with love and jointly with everyone, victory be to the divine mother.
Songglossary: amba, baar-baar, bolo, jai, jyotavali, kaar, latta, ma, mata, mathadu, milo, pahadavali, prem, rani, saarey, sab, se, sheravali, tera

Title: Matanga Vadana Ananda Sadana
Lyrics:
Matanga Vadana Ananda Sadana
Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Nandana [ Matanga Vadana ... ]
Maya Vinashaka Mooshika Vahana
Mata Maheshwari Bhavani Nandana
Maha Ganapathey Mangala Charana (2)
Meaning: Salutations to the one with the face of elephant (Matanga), who is the abode of bliss (Ananda), the loving son of Lord Mahadeva (Shiva) the remover of Maya (illusion, ignorance), who rides on the mouse (Mooshika), the beloved son of Goddess Maheshwari (Parvathi), we bow to the Lotus Feet of the Great Lord Ganapathi.
Songglossary: anand, bhava, chara, gananatha, maha, mahadev, maheshwari, mangal, mata, matanga, maya, mooshika, nanda, sadana, shambho, shiva, vadana, vahana, vinasha

Title: Matanga Vadana Gajavadana
Lyrics:
Matanga Vadana Gajavadana
Sharanam Sharanam Gajavadana [ Matanga Vadana ... ]
Vighna Vinashaka Parvathi Nandana
Mangala Kaari Gajavadana
Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
Partheesha (Sayeesha) Sharanam Gajavadana
Meaning: We seek your shelter Oh elephant faced Lord Ganesha, we surrender to you. You are the remover of obstacles, Oh son of Parvathi, you bestow auspiciousness and well being. You are the Lord of Parthi, we surrender to you.
Songglossary: gajamukha, hey, kaari, mangal, matanga, nanda, partheeshwara, parvathi, sayee, sharan, shubh, vadana, vighna, vinasha

Title: Matanga Vadana Gowri Nandana Mooshika
Lyrics:
Matanga Vadana Gowri Nandana Mooshika  Vahana Gajanana
Pashupathi Nandana Parama Niranjana
Paapa Vinashaka Gajanana
Lambodhara Jaya Vighna Vinashaka
Parthipurishwara Gajanana
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced son of Gowri and Shiva, whose vehicle is the mouse. Supremely pure son of Shiva fulfills all wishes and removes sins and obstacles. Sai residing in Puttaparthi, is the embodiment of Lord Ganesha.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gowri, jay, lambodhara, matanga, mooshika, nanda, niranjan, paapa, param, partheeshwara, pashu, vadana, vahana, vighna, vinasha

Title: Matanga Vadana Maam Paalaya
Lyrics:
Matanga Vadana Maam Paalaya
Mouleeshwara Shiva Gowri Nandana (2)
Mangala Dayaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Meaning: Oh elephant faced Lord Ganesha, protect me, Oh beloved son of Lord Shiva and Gowri you are the one who bestows auspiciousness and success in our endeavors.
Songglossary: dayaka, gowri, maam, mangal, matanga, mouleeshwara, nanda, paalaya, shiva, siddhi, vadana, vinayaka

Title: Matha Saraswathi
Lyrics:
Matha Saraswathi
Vidya Dayini Veena Pani
(Jagan) Matha Saraswathi
Shwethamayi Sangeethamayi
Chinmayi Chiraamayi
Veda Matha Gayathri
Premamayi Sathya Sai Mayi
Meaning: O Mother Saraswathi, playing divine music with the Veena, You are the Mother of the whole world. Adorned in white, You are the embodiment of music, full of consciousness and is permanent. You are the Mother of the Vedas and the bestower of Knowledge. You are none other than Sathya Sai Who is full of Love.

Title: Mathura Natha Gopala
Lyrics:
Mathura Natha Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopala [ Mathura Natha ... ]
Goparipala Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Murali Manohara Shyama Gopala
Meaning: This Bhajan extols the attributes of Lord Krishna who is also called Gopala (Literal meaning Cowherd). He is described as the Lord of Mathura, the one who is dark complexioned, fond of flute and cares for the cows. He is none other than Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bala, gokul, gopal, goparipala, manohar, mathura, murali, natha, sai, sham

Title: Mathura Natha Krishna Murari
Lyrics:
Mathura Natha Krishna Murari
Radha Madhava He Giridhari [ Mathura Natha ... ]
Gokula Brindavana Sanchari
Kunja Vihari Rasa Vihari
Shri Sai Natha Parti Vihari
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord of Mathura, Krishna, destroyer of Mura, resident of Gokul and Brindavan who roamed the woods and liked the "Rasa" dance. He is Lord Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: brinda, giridhar, gokul, krishna, kunja, madhava, mathura, murare, natha, puttaparthi, radha, rasa, sai, sanchari, sri, vihar

Title: Mathura Puri Vasa Radhey Gopala
Lyrics:
Mathura Puri Vasa Radhey Gopala
Gopi Manohara Gopala Krishna
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Sai Narayana
Krishna Mukunda Murari Gopala
Parthi Puri Sai Narayana
Meaning: Salutations to Sai Narayana who in the form of Krishna, the beloved of Radha resides in Mathura. He is the son of Nanda and the stealer of butter. He is also called with several names like Mukunda, Murari, Gopala etc.
Songglossary: chora, gopal, gopi, krishna, kumara, manohar, mathura, mukunda, murare, nanda, narayana, navaneetha, puri, puttaparthi, radha, sai, vasa

Title: Mathuradhipathey Krishna Mukunda
Lyrics:
Mathuradhipathey Krishna Mukunda
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyama Mukunda
Venu Vilolana Parthi Ramana
Yadu Kula Bhooshana Rajeeva Lochana
Parthi Pureeshwara Jaya Mana Mohana [ Madhusudhana ]
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyama Mukunda
Meaning: The Lord of Mathura, Krishna was also known as Mukunda and Madhusudhana, with his dark complexioned body, enchanting music on flute, he is the up lifter of the Yadava clan. He is the Lotus Eyed, Lord of Parthi, who creates happiness in all our minds.
Songglossary: bhooshan, ghana, jay, krishna, kula, lochana, madhu, mana, mathura, mohan, mukunda, purishwara, puttaparthi, rajeeva, ramana, sham, venu, vilola, yadu

Title: Mathuradhipathey Nanda Mukunda
Lyrics:
Mathuradhipathey Nanda Mukunda
Brindavana Jaya Paramananda
Radha Madhava Jaya Govinda (2)
Radha Madhava Hey Nanda Nanda
Meaning: Oh Lord of Mathura, the son of Nanda, the beloved of Radha Victory to you oh the blissful Lord of Brindavan.
Songglossary: brinda, govinda, hey, jay, madhava, mathura, mukunda, nanda, param, radha

Title: May the blessings of God
Lyrics:
May the blessings of God rest upon you
 May His Peace abide with you
 May His Presence illuminate your heart
 Now and forever more

Title: May the Light of the ages
Lyrics:
May the Light of the ages shine down on me
 And the Truth that I'm feelin' fill an eternity
 May the stars above, give me Thine Light
 And when I look at You, let me know it's alright
 May I swim in the ocean of Thy divine Love
 And remember Thy Grace from the heavens above
 May I fly with Thy Shaanthi on the wings of a dove
 And know the bliss of Thy glorious Love
 May the trees of the forest sing out Thy Name
 And the people around me hear it the same
 May I remember this life's divine Game
 And allow me to feel it, be I healthy or lame
 May I be grateful and thankful to Thee
 And know that one day we'll be immersed in the sea
 May I give to others, and allow them to be
 And be sure that one day we'll all meet in Thee

Title: May The Love Were Sharing
Lyrics:
May The Love We're Sharing Spread Its Wings
Fly Across The Earth And Bring 
New Joy To Every Soul That Is Alive

Samastha Loka Sukino Bhavanthu
May All The Beings In All The Worlds Be Happy
Songglossary: bhava, loka, samastha

Title: May We All Be Flutes
Lyrics:
May We All Be Flutes Within Your Hands
Let Us Be Your Melody, We'll Sing At Your Command
Krishna's Flute We'll Be We'll Sing His Melody
When Desire's Gone We Will Finally Sing His Song
Song Of Love Song Of Truth Let The Melody Flow Through
Song Of Love Song Of Truth May Our Lives Be One With You
Songglossary: krishna

Title: May we all be flutes within your hands
Lyrics:
May we all be flutes within your hands
 Let us be your melody, we'll sing at your command
 Krishna's flute we will be, we will sing His melody
 When desire's gone, we will finally sing His song
 Song of Love, Song of Truth, let the melody flow through
 Song of Love, Song of Truth, may our lives be one with You

Title: Me Entrego A Ti
Lyrics:
Me Entrego A Ti, Senor Ganesha
 Soy Un Soldado En Tu Voluntad
 Solo Te Pido, Gananatha
 Que Nos Protejas Contra Todo Mal
Meaning:
I offer myself to You, Lord Ganesha; I am a soldier of Your Divine will. I only ask of You, Gananatha,
 to protect us from all negativity.

Title: Meera Nath Harey Giridhari
Lyrics:
Meera Nath Harey Giridhari
Radha Pyaarey Krishna Murari [ Meera Nath ... ]
Brindavana Ke Raasa Vihari
Bhakthodhari Sai Murari
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Krishna, you are the Lord of devotee Meera, the beloved of Radha, the ecstatic dancer in Brindavan with Gopikas and the liberator of your devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktoddhara, brinda, giridhar, hari, ke, krishna, meera, murare, natha, pyaara, raasa, radha, sai, vihar

Title: Mera Jeevan Terey Hawaley Prabhu
Lyrics:
Mera Jeevan Terey Hawaley Prabhu Isey Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley
Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley Isey Ho Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley [ Mera Jeevan ... ]
Bhava Sagar Mey Jeevan Naiya Dol Rahi Hai O Rakhvaiyya
Dol Rahi Hai O Rakhvaiyya
Isey Paar Tu Hi Utharey Prabhu Isey Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley
Moh Maya Ke Bandhan Todo Hey Prabhu Apni Sharan Mey Lelo
Hey Prabhu Apni Sharan Mey Lelo
Is Paapi Ko Apnalo Prabhu Isey Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley
Meaning: I submit my life in your care, Oh Lord. Please take care of it every moment. The boat of my life is wobbling in this sea of worldliness, Oh dear Caretaker only you should take it across. Oh Lord, please take care of it every moment Liberate us from the bondage of illusion, take us in your care and shelter. Please accept this sinner, Oh lord. Please take care of me at every moment.
Songglossary: apna, apnalo, bandha, bhava, dol, hai, hawaley, hey, ho, isey, jeeva, ke, lelo, maya, mera, moh, naiya, paapi, paar, pag, prabhu, rahi, rakhwaley, sagar, sambhaley, sharan, tera, todo, tum, utharo

Title: Merey Nind Tute Sapno Me
Lyrics:
Merey Nind Tute Sapno Me
Adhi Rath Prabhu Aye
Roopa Jyothir Maya Parama Dayala
Ananta Sai Tum Ho Krupala [ Adhi Rath ... ]
Meaning: In the middle of the night, Lord Sai was kind enough to interrupt my sleep by appearing in a dream in his beautiful, all-merciful and infinite form.
Songglossary: aao, adhi, ananta, dayal, ho, jyoth, krupalu, maya, mera, nind, param, prabhu, rath, roopa, sai, sapno, tum, tute

Title: Mitha Smitha Sundara Mukharavinda Nacho
Lyrics:
Mitha Smitha Sundara Mukharavinda Nacho Nandalala
Nacho Nandalala Nandalala (3)
Meera Ke Prabhu Lala Nandalala (3)
Meaning: Dance on in ecstacy, remembering the gentle, smiling, beautiful Lotus faced Lord, who is the darling son of Nanda. He is Lord of Meera, He is son of Nanda, He is Lord Krishna.
Songglossary: ke, lal, meera, mitha, mukha, nacho, nanda, prabhu, smitha, sundara

Title: Mitha Smitha Vadana Mrudu Vachana
Lyrics:
Mitha Smitha Vadana Mrudu Vachana
Mangala Charana Madhusudhana
Ravi Shata Koti Prakashana
Sai Ramana Sanathana
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna, with smiling face and soft spoken tongue. We bow to His auspicious Feet who is also called Madhusudhana (slayer of demon, Madhu). His glory is of million suns. He is the eternal Lord, Sai Ramana.
Songglossary: chara, koti, madhu, mangal, mitha, mrudu, prakasha, ramana, ravikula, sai, sanatana, shata, smitha, vachan, vadana

Title: Mitsu no youni Amai
Lyrics:
Mitsu no youni Amai Egao no Krishna
 Utyu no Odori wo Mai Odore
 Krishna Utyu no Mai Odore (3X)
 Kokoro no Butai de Mai Odore (3X)
GeneralComments: Sung to the tune of Mitha Smitha Sundara Mukaravinda

Title: Mohana Mukunda Hari Giridhara Govinda
Lyrics:
Mohana Mukunda Hari Giridhara Govinda Hari
Narayan Sai Narayan (3)
Allah Narayan Eshwara Narayan
Nanak Narayan Yesu Narayan
Buddha Narayan Mahavira Narayan
Sai Narayan Sai Narayan [ Narayan Sai ]
Meaning: Oh enchanting Lord Mukunda (Krishna) you are the one who lifted the mountain (Giridhara), you are Govinda Hari (Vishnu) you are none other than Narayana, Allah, Eshwar, Nanak, Jesus, Buddha, Mahavir, all are but emanations of the same Narayana, who is our beloved Sai Narayana.
Songglossary: allah, buddha, eshwar, giridhar, govinda, hari, mahavir, mohan, mukunda, nanak, narayana, sai, yesu

Title: Mohana Murali Gaana Vilola
Lyrics:
Mohana Murali Gaana Vilola
Jaya Brindavana Lola [ Mohana Murali ... ]
Yashoda Tanaya Nandalala
Gopi Vallabha Gopala
Gopala Gopala
Gopala Nanda Gopala
Meaning: He who enchants with his songs on the flute, victory to the regaler of Brindavan, child of Yashoda and darling of Nanda, beloved of the Gopis, He is Gopala (Krishna).
Songglossary: brinda, gaan, gopal, gopi, jay, lola, mohan, murali, nanda, tanaya, vallabha, vilola, yashoda

Title: Mohana Murali Gopala Jaya Govinda
Lyrics:
Mohana Murali Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhey Gopala (Mana)
Pandarinatha Jaya Hari Vittala
Govardhana Giridhari Gopala
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Govinda (Krishna), who delights the hearts (of devotees), and to the Lord of Pandari, Lord Vittala, who lifted the Govardhana mountain to protect the devotees.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, govardhan, govinda, hari, jay, mana, mohan, murali, pandari, radha, vittala

Title: Mohana Murali Govinda Jaya Radhey
Lyrics:
Mohana Murali Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Hey Giridhari Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Krishna Murari Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Parthi Vihari (Hrudaya Vihari) Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Meaning: Victory to the enchanter with the flute Lord Govinda who lifted the mountain to protect His devotees and who is the beloved of Radha. Victory to Krishna - slayer of demon Mura (Murari). He is the one who resides in Parthi (and in devotees hearts), He is Govinda (Vishnu).
Songglossary: giridhar, govinda, hey, hrudaya, jay, krishna, mohan, murali, murare, puttaparthi, radha, vihar

Title: Mohana Murali Sunao Giridhari
Lyrics:
Mohana Murali Sunao Giridhari
Aao Hrudaya Mey Prabhu Giridhari [ Mohana Murali ... ]
Hey Giridhari Parthi Vihari
Sri Madhusudhana Hrudaya Vihari
Meera Ke Prabhu Radha Pyaari
Meaning: Play for us the enchanting music of the flute, Oh Krishna Welcome to my heart Oh Lord Giridhari. You are the one who resides in Parthi, become the resident of my heart, Oh Madhusudhana (slayer of demon, Madhu), Lord of Meera and beloved of Radha.
Songglossary: aao, giridhar, hey, hrudaya, ke, madhu, meera, mohan, murali, prabhu, puttaparthi, pyaara, radha, sri, sunao, vihar

Title: Mohana Muralidhara Murari
Lyrics:
Mohana Muralidhara Murari
Yadava Sai Shyama Murari [ Mohana Muralidhara ... ]
Mangala Naamam Madhuram Madhuram
Mrudu Vachanam Smaranam Madhuram
Mathuradhipathey Akhilam Madhuram
Meaning: Salutations to the enchanting flute player from Yadava dynasty, the slayer of demon Mura, Sai Krishna who has an auspicious and a sweet name. He who is soft spoken sweet, ever sweet and full of sweetness is the Lord of Mathura (Krishna)
Songglossary: akhila, madhu, mangal, mathura, mohan, mrudu, murali, murare, naam, sai, sham, smaran, vachan, yadava

Title: Mohana Raghurama Ati Sundara Sri
Lyrics:
Mohana Raghurama Ati Sundara Sri Rama
Maruti Sevitha Rama
Rama Rama Jaya Rama (2)
Sri Rama Rama Sai Rama
Meaning: Chant the name of the enchanting Raghu Rama, ever beautiful Sri Rama, who is served by Maruti (Hanuman). Victory to thee Oh Rama.
Songglossary: ati, jay, maruthi, mohan, raghu, ram, sai, sevita, sri, sundara

Title: Mohana Rama Hey Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Mohana Rama Hey Sai Rama
Pavana Naama Prashanthi Rama [ Mohana Rama ... ]
Karuna Nidhey Prabhu Karunya Rama
Bhaktha Jana Priya Palita Rama
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Rama (2)
Meaning: The enchanting Rama is our Sai Rama. The blessed name of Prashanthi Rama, the Compassionate Lord full of mercy is beloved of the devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktha, hey, jana, karuna, mohan, naam, nidhey, palita, pavan, prabhu, prashanthi, priya, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai

Title: Mohana Roopa Sri Rama
Lyrics:
Mohana Roopa Sri Rama
Moksha Pradayaka Sri Rama [ Mohana Roopa ]
Moha Vinashaka Rama (Sri Rama)
Madhura Madhura Hey Taraka Naama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
