Meaning: Lord Rama with most enchanting looks, grants liberation, destroys delusion and attachment. Victory to Lord Rama whose sweet name itself liberates the humanity.
Songglossary: hey, jay, madhu, moh, mohan, moksha, naam, pradayaka, ram, roopa, sri, taraka, vinasha

Title: Mohana Sai Muralidhara
Lyrics:
Mohana Sai Muralidhara
Krishna Mukunda Madhusudhana [ Mohana Sai ... ]
Aravindaksha Alankruta Kesha
Ati Sukumara Namo
Abhaya Pradatha Jagat Paripala
Kali Yuga Varada Namo [ Krishna Mukunda ]
Meaning: Salutations to you oh enchanting Sai, with flute in hand, you are none other than Lord Krishna also called Mukunda, Madhusudhana, the Lotus eyed one with the decorated hair. Oh extremely tender and gentle one, destroyer of fear, the ruler of the Universe and the blessing of the Kaliyuga (age of Kali), our salutations to You.
Songglossary: abhaya, alankruta, aravinda, ati, jagat, kali, kesha, krishna, madhu, mohan, mukunda, murali, namo, paripala, pradatha, sai, sukumara, varada, yuga

Title: Mooshika Vahana Modaka Hasta
Lyrics:
Mooshika Vahana Modaka Hasta
Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
Pashankusha Dhara Parama Pavitra
Paalaya Paalaya Parthi Pureesha
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Ganapathi who rides the mouse and holds 'modakas' (favorite sweets of Lord Ganesha) in hand, destroyer of sins, the one who is extremely pure, protect me, Oh Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: dhara, gananatha, hasta, maha, modaka, mooshika, namostuthey, paalaya, param, pashankusha, pavitra, pureesha, puttaparthi, vahana

Title: Mother Mary, Jesus Christ
Lyrics:
Mother Mary, Jesus Christ, we raise our hands in prayer
 Mother Mary, Jesus Christ, we know that You care
 Jesus Christ, O Jesus Christ, the Lord sent You to see
 That His children on this earth live in harmony
 Jesus Christ, O Jesus Christ, O Lord with a gentle face
 With smiling eyes and words of Love, You showed the way to Grace

Title: Mother Oh Mother Sai Ma
Lyrics:
Mother Oh Mother Sai Ma
You Mean The Whole World To Me Sai Ma
Ma Sai Ma, Ma Oh Sai Ma [ Mother Oh ... ]
In Times Of Darkness And Despair
I Call Your Name, You Are Always There
How Can I Thank You Oh Dear Sai Ma
For All Your Patience And Love Sai Ma
Ma Sai Ma, Ma Oh Sai Ma (2)
Songglossary: ma, sai

Title: Mruthyunjayaya Namah Om
Lyrics:
Mruthyunjayaya Namah Om
Tryambakaya Namah Om
Lingeshwaraya Namah Om
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Meaning: Humble Salutations to Lord Sayeeshwara who is none other than Lord Shiva also known as, Mruthyunjaya (who has conquered death), Tryambakaya (with three eyes) and Lingeshwaraya (having a form, which has no beginning and end).
Songglossary: lingeshwara, mruthyunjaya, namah, om, sayee, shiva, tryambakaya

Title: Muchas gracias Senor
Lyrics:
Muchas gracias Senor, Por tu gran presencia humana
 Te alabamos Senor, Sathya Sai Narayana
 Alejanos Senor, De toda vida mundana
 Danos tu darshan Senor, Sathya Sai Narayana
Meaning:
Thank you so much Lord for Your grand human presence;
 We praise You Lord Sathya Sai Narayana.
 Keep us distant, Lord, from all worldly life,
 Give us Your Darshan Lord Sathya Sai Narayana.

Title: Mujhey Charana Kamal Se Jodo
Lyrics:
Mujhey Charana Kamal Se Jodo Mujhey Charana Kamal Se Jodo ...
... Sai Charan Kamal Se Jodo Baba Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Baba Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Teri Mahima Likhi Na Jaye
Teri Mahima Kahi Na Jaye
Mujhey Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Sai Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Baba Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Terey Dwarey Jo Bhi Aye
O Khali Kabhi Na Jaye
Mujhey Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Sai Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Baba Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Meaning: Sai, please let me merge with Your lotus feet. Your glory can neither be uttered nor written. Whoever comes to Your door, never returns empty.
Songglossary: aao, baba, bhi, chara, dwarey, jay, jo, jodo, kabhi, kahi, kamala, khali, likhi, mahima, mujhe, na, sai, se, tera

Title: Mujhey Darsha Dikhao Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Mujhey Darsha Dikhao Bhagawan
Hey Sai Natha Bhagawan [ Mujhey Darsha ... ]
Tum Jaanat Sab Antaryami
Deejo Merey Prabhu Amrutha Vani
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram Baba
Puran Karo Merey Mann Ki Kaam Baba
Meaning: Show me your Divine Form Bhagawan, Oh Sainatha, You are omniscient, you are the in dweller. Give me your nectarine message Oh my Lord. You are my Atma Ram (In dweller) and fulfill my heart's desire Oh Baba.
Songglossary: amrutha, antar, atma, baba, bhagawan, darsh, deejo, dikhao, hey, ho, jaanat, kaam, karo, mana, mera, mujhe, natha, prabhu, puran, ram, sab, sai, tum, vani

Title: Mujhey Sai Nam Jagat Se
Lyrics:
Mujhey Sai Nam Jagat Se Pyaara
Bhagawan Bhagawan [ Mujhey Sai ... ]
Nanda Ananda Sai Ananta
Nanda Ananda Nanda Ananda
Tum Ho Bhakto Ke Pran
Meaning: What I love most in this world is the name of Sai. He is ever blissful and is the life of breath of His devotees.
Songglossary: anand, ananta, bhagawan, bhakthon, ho, jagat, ke, mujhe, nam, nanda, pran, pyaara, sai, se, tum

Title: Mukunda Madhava Karivarada Sri Sathya
Lyrics:
Mukunda Madhava Karivarada Sri Sathya Sai Ram
Govinda Keshava Sri Hari Roopa Sathya Sai Ram
Mathsya Koorma Varaha Narahari Dashavathari Ram
Parthi Vasa Paalaya Maam Prabho Sathya Sai Ram
Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai, You were Kari Varada (the saviour of the Elephant from the clutches of Crocodile as Narayana), Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda, Keshava (All names of Krishna), you were none other than the Ten Incarnations of Lord Vishnu such as, Matsya (Fish), Koorma (Tortoise), Varaha (Boar), Narahari (Narasimha). I pray to you Oh Lord Sathya Sai to protect me.
Songglossary: dasha, govinda, hari, karivarada, kesha, koorma, maam, madhava, mathsya, mukunda, narahari, paalaya, prabhu, puttaparthi, ram, roopa, sai, sathya, sri, varaha, vasa

Title: Mukunda Madhava Murali Manohara Govardhana
Lyrics:
Mukunda Madhava Murali Manohara Govardhana Giridhari
Gopi Poojita Manasa Chora Peetambara Dhari [ Mukunda Madhava ... ]
Geeta Bodhaka Sai Sundara
Vanditha Hrudaya Vihari (2)
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh beautiful Lord Sai Krishna. you were worshipped by Gopikas, you stole their hearts wearing the yellow colored dress, you were called by many other names such as Mukunda, Madhava, Murali Manohara, Govardhan Giridhari (All names of Krishna), you were the preceptor for the Sacred Bhagawath Geeta and you reside in the hearts of the devotees who worship you.
Songglossary: bodha, chora, dhari, geeta, giridhar, gopi, govardhan, hrudaya, madhava, manasa, manohar, mukunda, murali, peetambara, poojita, sai, sundara, vanditha, vihar

Title: Mukunda Murari Murari Gopal
Lyrics:
Mukunda Murari Murari Gopal
Hey Gopala Sai Hey Sai Nandalal
Prashanthi Nivasi Nivasi Nandalal
Hey Antaratma Jyothi Hey Jyothi Nandalal
Sathyam Shivam Shivam Sundaram
Hey Sundara Roopa Hey Roopa Nandalal
Meaning: Oh darling son of Nanda, the slayer of demon Mura, you reside in Prashanthi, you are the effulgent light of the Atma, You are Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty. With your enchanting beauty you are none other than Lord Sai.
Songglossary: antar, gopal, hey, jyoth, mukunda, murare, nanda, nivasi, prashanthi, roopa, sai, sathya, shiva, sundara

Title: Multi-Faith Prayers
Lyrics:
• Hinduism
    Aum Bhoor Bhuvah Suvah
    Tat Savithur Varenyam
    Bhargo Devasya Dheemahi
    Dhiyo Yonah Prachodayaat

     

    http://sairegion3.org/wp-content/uploads/01-Gayathri.mp3
    Oh Mother, who subsists in all the three Kaalas (Time: Past, Present and Future), in all the three lokas (Lokas: Heaven, Earth and Lower Regions) and in all the three gunas (Gunas - Attributes: Sathwa, Rajas and Thamas) I pray to Thee, to illumine my intellect and dispel my ignorance just as the splendorous sunlight dispels all darkness. I pray to Thee to make my intellect serene and bright and enlightened.
  • Zoroastrianism
    Ashem Vohu Vahishtem Asti
    Ushta Asti Ushta Ahmai
    Hyat Ashai Vahishtai Ashem

     

    http://sairegion3.org/wp-content/uploads/MFPrayers-Zoroastrianism.mp3
    Righteousness is the best good (and it) is happiness. Happiness(is) to him, who is righteous, for the sake of the best righteousness
  • Buddhism
    Namo Tassa Bhagavato Arahato Samma Sambuddhassa
    Buddham Sharanam Gatchami
    Dhammam Sharanam Gatchami
    Sangham Sharanam Gatchami

     

    http://sairegion3.org/wp-content/uploads/MFPrayers-Buddhism.mp3
    I seek refuge in the Buddha I seek refuge in Dharma (Righteousness) I seek refuge in Sangha (Holy order/Community)
  • Judaism
    Schma Yisrael, Adonai Eloheinu, Adonai Echad Adonai Echad (2)

     

    http://sairegion3.org/wp-content/uploads/MFPrayers-Judaism.mp3
    Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God is one Lord
  • Christianity
    Our Father who Art in Heaven hallowed be Thy name
    Thy kingdom come Thy will be done on Earth as it is in Heaven
    Give us this day our daily bread and forgive us our trespasses
    As we forgive those who trespass against us
    (And) Lead us not into temptation
    But deliver us from evil
    For Thine is the Kingdom and the Power and the Glory forever and ever
    Amen

     

    http://sairegion3.org/wp-content/recordings/songs/Our_Father_Who_Art_In_Heaven.mp3
  • Islam
    Bismillah Ar-Rahman Ar-Raheem (3)
    La Ilaha illallah Allah Allah (3)

     

    http://sairegion3.org/wp-content/uploads/MFPrayers-Islam.mp3
    In the name of God, the Most Beneficent, the Most Merciful. There is no God but God.
  • Sai Gayathri
    Aum Saayeeshvaraaya Vidhmahe
    Sathya Devaaya Dheemahi
    Thannassarvah Prachodayaath

     

    http://sairegion3.org/wp-content/uploads/MFPrayers-SaiGayatri.mp3
    I know through Gurus and Shastras (and by direct experience) that Sai is God Himself: He is Bhagavan and Iswara. I meditate on this form in my heart with all my mental faculties. He is the embodiment of truth, divinity, universal consciousness and one who pervades all the worlds. I pray to such a Sai to direct our intellects to engage in auspicious and righteous activities. I meditate on this great form.
Download: Multi-Faith-Prayers.pptx (3.95MB)
Songglossary: allah, bhagavan, buddha, buddhi, dharma, gayathri, kaala, make, sai, sambuddha, sangh, sharan, shastra

Title: Murali Bajao Madhava
Lyrics:
Murali Bajao Madhava
Giridhara Bala Gopala [ Murali Bajao ... ]
Madhura Madhura Hari Naam Bajao
Mathura Natha Sai Natha
Meaning: Oh Madhava (Krishna) play the melodious flute. Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) you are the one who held the Govardhana mountain high to protect the cows. Sing the sweet name of Hari (Lord Vishnu) who is the Lord of Mathura and who is none other than our Sai Natha.
Songglossary: bajao, bala, giridhar, gopal, hari, madhava, madhu, mathura, murali, naam, natha, sai

Title: Murali Gaana Lola Krishna Madhava
Lyrics:
Murali Gaana Lola Krishna Madhava
Venu Gaana Lola Krishna Keshava
Mathuradhipathey Radha Lola
Madhura Madhura Hey Yadu Nandalala
Hey Nandalala Yadu Nandalala (3)
Meaning: Oh, Lord Krishna the player of ecstatic music on the flute, Oh Keshava (Krishna) Oh Lord of Mathura and the beloved of Radha, Oh sweet One, the son of Nanda of Yadava dynasty.
Songglossary: gaan, hey, kesha, krishna, lola, madhava, madhu, mathura, murali, nanda, radha, venu, yadu

Title: Murali Gaana Lola Nanda Gopa
Lyrics:
Murali Gaana Lola Nanda Gopa Bala Raavo Raavo Radha Lola Radha Lola
Treta Yugamuna Sita Ramudai
Dwapara Yugamuna Radha Loludai
Geetanu Drapina Taraka Naamudai
Yuga Yuga Manduna Kaguroopa Dariyai
Meaning: Welcome Oh Lord Krishna, King Nanada's Son, the beloved of Radha. In the Age of Treta you incarnated as Rama. In the Age of Dwapara you were enchanted by Radha and taught the Sacred Hymns of Geetha and you were the liberator of humanity and in every Age you were the most beautiful one to look at.
Songglossary: bala, dariyai, drapina, dwapara, gaan, geeta, gopa, kaguroopa, lola, loludai, manduna, murali, naam, nanda, raavo, radha, sita, taraka, treta, yuga

Title: Murali Gaana Vilola Merey Prana
Lyrics:
Murali Gaana Vilola Merey Prana Gopala
Murahara Madhava Maya Vesha
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Krishna who is fond of music on the flute, you are my life Oh Lord Gopala, you are the Lord of Meera.
Songglossary: gaan, giridhar, gopal, ke, madhava, maya, meera, mera, murahara, murali, naagar, praan, prabhu, vesha, vilola

Title: Murali Krishna Mukunda Krishna Mohana
Lyrics:
Murali Krishna Mukunda Krishna Mohana Krishna Krishna Krishna
Gopi Krishna Gopala Krishna Govardhanadhara Krishna Krishna
Radha Krishna Bala Krishna Raasa Vilola Krishna Krishna
Shirdi Krishna Parthi Krishna Sri Sathya Sai Krishna Krishna
Meaning: This bhajan extols Lord Krishna's beauty and glory by chanting His various synonyms and attributes.
Songglossary: bala, gopal, gopi, govardhan, krishna, mohan, mukunda, murali, puttaparthi, raasa, radha, sai, sathya, shirdi, sri, vilola

Title: Murali Madhava Sri Hari
Lyrics:
Murali Madhava Sri Hari
Mukunda Govinda Harey Giridhari [ Murali Madhava ... ]
Govardhanodhara Gopi Gopala
Radha Ke Pyaara Hey Yamuna Vihara [ Mukunda Govinda ]
Meaning: This bhajan extols Lord Krishna's beauty and glory by chanting His various synonyms and attributes.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, gopi, govinda, hari, hey, ke, madhava, mukunda, murali, pyaara, radha, sri, vihar, yamuna

Title: Murali Manohara Gopala
Lyrics:
Murali Manohara Gopala
Murahara Shourie Yadava
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Namo Namo Sai Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana who took the form of Narahari (Half man Half Lion- Lord Narasimha), He is none other than the enchanting Lord Krishna also known by names such as, Gopala, Murahara, Shauri and Yadava.
Songglossary: gopal, manohar, murahara, murali, namo, narahari, narayana, roopa, sai, shouri, yadava

Title: Murali Manohara Shyama Bhajo
Lyrics:
Murali Manohara Shyama Bhajo
Munijana Sevitha Sai Bhajo [ Murali Manohara ]
Shyama Bhajo Radhey Shyama Bhajo
Shyama Krishna Sai Krishna Bhajo
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna the one who conquers the mind with his divine music of the flute, the dark blue complexioned Lord. Sing about the one who was served by the pious sages. The dark blue Krishna is none other than my Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: bhaja, krishna, manohar, munijana, murali, radha, sai, sevita, sham

Title: Murali Manohara Shyama Murari
Lyrics:
Murali Manohara Shyama Murari
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Radha Lola Harey Giridhari
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) you are fond of the music on flute, you are the beloved of Radha.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, hari, lola, manohar, murali, murare, radha, sai, sham

Title: Murali Murali Murali Ghana Shyam
Lyrics:
Murali Murali Murali Ghana Shyam
Mohana Murali Radhey Shyama [ Murali Murali ... ]
Kanakambara Dhara Karuna Sagara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Shyam
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna (Shyam) who is fond of the enchanting music on Flute (Murali). The beloved of Radha, He adorns the yellow colored cloth, He is compassion personified, He is the Lord of His greatest devotee Meera, He saved the cowherds by deftly lifting the Govardhana Mountain. He is none other than the Sai Shyam residing in Parthi.
Songglossary: dhara, ghana, giridhar, kanaka, karuna, ke, meera, mohan, murali, naagar, prabhu, purishwara, puttaparthi, radha, sagar, sai, sham

Title: Murali Shyama Bhajo Madhava Govinda
Lyrics:
Murali Shyama Bhajo Madhava Govinda Bhajo
Radhey Shyama Bhajo Gopi Gopala Bhajo
Giridhara Bala Bhajo Sundara Gopala Bhajo
Shirdi Sai Bhajo Sathya Sai Baba Bhajo
Meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna such as Murali Shyama, Madhava, Govinda, Radhey Shyama, Gopi Gopala, Giridhara Bala, Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: baba, bala, bhaja, giridhar, gopal, gopi, govinda, madhava, murali, radha, sai, sathya, sham, shirdi, sundara

Title: Murali Vinodana Munijana Mohana
Lyrics:
Murali Vinodana Munijana Mohana
Natana Manohara Gopala
Nithya Niranjana Hrudaya Sanjeevana
Deena Janavana Gopala [ Natana Manohara ]
Meaning: Oh Krishna, You play the flute, you are charmer of the minds of sages, enchanting dancer, ever new and able to resurrect the heart, Gopala who is compassionate towards the afflicted.
Songglossary: deen, gopal, hrudaya, janavana, manohar, mohan, munijana, murali, natana, niranjan, nithya, sanjeevana, vinodana

Title: Muralidhara Gopala Madhura
Lyrics:
Muralidhara Gopala Madhura
Megha Roopa Hari Manasa Chora [ Muralidhara ... ]
Radha Madhava Kunja Vihara
Ananda Ghana Roopa Naama Madhura (3)
Meaning: Oh sweet Lord Gopala (Krishna) with the flute in your hand and with the complexion of dark clouds, you steal the hearts of devotees. You are the beloved of Radha, with the beautiful sweet name and form you stroll in Brindavan.
Songglossary: anand, chora, ghana, gopal, hari, kunja, madhava, madhu, manasa, megha, murali, naam, radha, roopa, vihar

Title: Muralidhara Hey Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Muralidhara Hey Ghana Shyama
Partheeshwara Sai Shyama
Giridhari Parthi Vihari
Meera Ke Giridhari
Surdas Ke Krishna Murari
Ghana Shyama Megha Shyama Sai Shyama [ Giridhari ]
Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Sai Shyama (Krishna) resident of Parthi. You are the Lord of Meera and Surdas, you held the Govardhan Mountain to save cowherds (Giridhari). Your complexion is that of dark clouds (Megha Shyama),
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, hey, ke, krishna, meera, megha, murali, murare, partheeshwara, puttaparthi, sai, sham, surdas, vihar

Title: Muralidhara Manamohana Madhusudhana Krishna
Lyrics:
Muralidhara Manamohana Madhusudhana Krishna
Natanagara Jaya Madhava Hey Keshava Krishna Krishna Krishna [ Muralidhara Mana Mohana ]
Bansidhara Dukha Bhanjana Yadu Nandana Krishna
Radhey Govinda Sai Mukunda Tum Hi Jana Priya Krishna
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Krishna, holding the Flute in your hand, you are also known as Madhusudhana, Keshava and adored by your devotees, whose sorrows were driven away by you, Oh son of Yadu Dynasty.
Songglossary: bansi, bhanjana, dukh, govinda, hai, hey, jana, jay, kesha, krishna, madhava, madhu, mana, manamohana, mohan, mukunda, murali, nanda, natana, priya, radha, sai, tum, yadu

Title: Muralidhara Mukunda Murari
Lyrics:
Muralidhara Mukunda Murari
Govardhana Giridhari Murari
Maya Nataka Sutradhari (2)
Maya Manusha Veshadhari
Sai Murari Sathya Sai Murari
Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna with the flute in one hand, you have lifted the Govardhana Mountain with the other, you have annihilated the demon Mura, you have assumed the illusory form of human being for directing and guiding humanity. You are none other than Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: giridhar, govardhan, manusha, maya, mukunda, murali, murare, nataka, sai, sathya, sutra, vesha

Title: Muralidhara Murahara Natavara
Lyrics:
Muralidhara Murahara Natavara
Gopi Jana Priya Giridhara
Brindavana Sanchara Jagadodhara
Yashoda Bala Nanda Kumara
Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Krishna, son of Nanda and Yashoda, holding flute in hand, you are the supreme dancer whom the Gopis adore, you stroll in Brindavan and up lift the humanity from miseries.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, giridhar, gopi, jagadodhara, jana, kumara, murahara, murali, nanda, natavara, priya, sanchara, yashoda

Title: Muruga Muruga
Lyrics:
Muruga Muruga, Muruga Muruga
Muruga Muruga Shakti Vela Muruga, You Are My Shining Star
Kartikeya Muruga Vadi Vela Muruga, Come To Me Lord Muruga
Muruga Muruga Muruga Muruga
When I Need You, Muruga, You Are There, Muruga, To Take All My Troubles Away
You're My Swami, Muruga, Give Me Life Muruga, Va Va Vadi Velava

Title: Musical Krishna, Magical Krishna
Lyrics:
Musical Krishna, Magical Krishna, flute-playing Krishna, come play for me
 Charming Krishna, Who lifted a mountain, guarding the cowmaidscome
 protect me
 Radha's Krishna, dancing Krishna, baby Krishna, come dance with me
 Krishna Who appeared in Shirdi, now lives as Sai in Puttaparthi
 
 Sung to the tune of Murali Krishna, Mukunda Krishna

Title: My eyes are forever seeing Your form
Lyrics:
My eyes are forever seeing Your form,
 My ears are forever hearing Sai Ram
 My voice is forever singing Your glories, My Lord
 Sai Natha Sai Natha, Jaya Jaya Hey Sai Natha (2x)
 Make my body Your Puttaparthi
 Make my heart Your Prashanti
 Fill my life with Love, Peace and Joy
 With the music of your glories Sai Natha,
 Sai Natha Sai Natha, Jaya Jaya Hey Sai Natha

Title: My heart is beating
Lyrics:
My heart is beating, Sai Ram, Sai Ram,
Keeps on repeating, Sai Ram, Sai Ram,
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai (2x)
With every breath of mine, soham Sai Ram
Thought, speech, and action, sarvam Sai Ram
My soul eternal atma Sai Ram (2x)
My bliss eternal ananda Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai (2x)
Songglossary: anand, atma, ram, sai, sarva, soham

Title: My heart is beating
Lyrics:
My heart is beating, my heart is pounding
 My mind is weaving and conceiving
 Something else is going on deep within
 My heart is beating, my heart is pounding
 My soul's expanding and demanding
 Perfection from the outerself to merge within
 Prema Swaroopa Prema Aanandha (2X)
 Something else is going on deep within
 My heart is beating, my heart is pounding
 My heart is beating and rebounding
 To the omnipresent Lord, God within
 My heart is beating, my heart is pounding
 With the ever-flowing love returning home

Title: My Lord My Lord My Lord
Lyrics:
My Lord My Lord My Lord
 Let me touch Thy Lotus Feet my Lord
 The kindness in Your Eyes
 The sweetness in Your Face
 I Adore I Adore I Adore
 My Lord My Lord My Lord
 The love I find in Thee
 The Peace I seek in Thee
 It's precious precious precious my Lord

Title: Mythili Pathey Raghu Nandana
Lyrics:
Mythili Pathey Raghu Nandana
Rama Raghava Rajeeva Lochana [ Mythili Pathey ... ]
Deenavana Hey Karunamaya
Kamala Nayana Kausalya Tanaya
Meaning: Oh Lord of Sita, the princess of Mithila, the descendant of the Raghu dynasty! Oh Rama! The Lotus-eyed Lord! The protector of the poor! Oh Lord filled with Compassion! The Lotus -eyed Lord who is the son of Queen Kausalya!
Songglossary: deenavana, hey, kamala, karuna, kausalya, lochana, mythili, nanda, nayan, pathey, raghava, raghu, rajeeva, ram, tanaya

Title: Naada Brahma Hari Sai Harey
Lyrics:
Naada Brahma Hari Sai Harey
Narayana Hari Sai Harey [ Naada Brahma ... ]
Natana Kalaa Dhara Sai Harey
Naga Abharana Sai Harey
Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey (3)
Meaning: Salutations to the one who exists in the form of Divine music, Oh Sai, Oh Lord Vishnu, the performer of the divine dance, one who adorns the snake as a jewel Oh Sai Shiva, Oh Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: abharana, brahma, dhara, hari, kala, naada, naga, narayana, natana, sai, sathya

Title: Naada Brahma Sayeeshwara
Lyrics:
Naada Brahma Sayeeshwara
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shankara
Gowri Ramana Sadashiva
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (2)
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (3)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! The Lord of divine Music! Oh Lord Shiva reveling in the cosmic dance! Oh Lord of Goddess Parvathi! Oh Shiva the Eternal! Oh Lord holding the Holy river Ganga in His hair locks! Oh the great Lord Shiva!
Songglossary: brahma, ganga, gowri, hara, mahadev, naada, ramana, sadashiva, sayee, shankara, shiva

Title: Naada Brahmamayi Dayamayi
Lyrics:
Naada Brahmamayi Dayamayi
Bhava Raga Laya Gaana Vinodini [ Naada Brahma ... ]
Veena Venu Mrudanga Vinodini
Aashritha Phala Dayini Kalyani (2)
Meaning: Oh Divine Mother who is the form of divine music! The embodiment of Compassion! One who enjoys the tune, the expression, the rhythm of music! One who is delighted by the string instrument Veena, the flute and the percussion instrument Mrudanga, One who grants boons to those Who surrender to Her!
Songglossary: aashritha, bhava, brahma, dayamayi, dayini, gaan, kalyan, laya, mrudanga, naada, phala, raga, veena, venu, vinodini

Title: Naada Brahmamayi Sayeeshwari
Lyrics:
Naada Brahmamayi Sayeeshwari
Bhagawathi Mata Krupa Sagari [ Naada ... ]
Varahi Vaishnavi Vageshwari
Matangi Mahamaye Mookambikey
Parameshwari Hari Sodari
Bhava Bhaya Haarini Sathya Sayeeshwari
Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! The abode of divine music! Oh Divine Mother! Oh Ocean of compassion! The Mother adored by various names, Varahi (a form of Shakthi), Vaishnavi (the sister of Vishnu), One who is the bestower of speech, The Mother who is worshipped as Meenakshi, Mahamaye and Mookambike in various forms in temples, One Who is the sister of Vishnu! One who is the Supreme Mother, One Who removes the fear of worldly existence, Oh Mother Sathya Sai!
Songglossary: bhagavathi, bhava, bhaya, brahma, haarini, hari, krupa, mahamaya, mata, matangi, mookambikey, naada, param, sagar, sathya, sayee, sodari, vageshwari, vaishnavi, varahi

Title: Naada Lola Sathya Sai Harey
Lyrics:
Naada Lola Sathya Sai Harey
Nagabharana Sai Harey [ Naada Lola ]
Nandi Vahana Sai Harey
Namo Namo Shiva (Sathya) Sai Harey
Meaning: I bow to the lover of music, Sathya Sai One who adorns the snake as an ornament The one who rides on the bull - Nandi. I bow down to that Shiva, who is none other than Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: hari, lola, naada, nagabharana, namo, nandi, sai, sathya, shiva, vahana

Title: Naada Swaroopa Namah Shivaya
Lyrics:
Naada Swaroopa Namah Shivaya
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya [ Naada Swaroopa ]
Chandrakaladhara Shashi Shekaraya
Ganga Jatadhara Trilochanaya
Bhasma Vibhushitha Sanathanaya
Natana Manohara Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Meaning: Lord Shiva! I bow to Thee! You are the form of divine music! The One who adorns the snake as an ornament! One who has the moon's crescent on His head! One whose hair locks bear the flowing river Ganga! One Who is three-eyed! One Who has the holy ash smeared His body! One Who is Eternal! One Who enchants with His cosmic dance! I bow down to that Shiva!
Songglossary: bhasma, bushan, chand, ganga, jatadhara, manohar, naada, nagabharana, namah, natana, om, sanatana, shashi, shekara, shiva, swaroopa, trilochana

Title: Naam Bhajo Hari Naam Bhajo
Lyrics:
Naam Bhajo Hari Naam Bhajo
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Naam Bhajo ... ]
Nanda Ananda Mukunda Hari (2)
Brindavana Sai Baba Hari
Baba Hari Sai Baba Hari (3)
Meaning: Chant the name of Hari the adorable son of Nanda, who is none other than Sai Narayana, He is the Sai Baba of Brindavan.
Songglossary: anand, baba, bhaja, brinda, hari, mukunda, naam, nanda, narayana, sai

Title: Naam Bina Prana Nahin
Lyrics:
Naam Bina Prana Nahin
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Sai [ Naam Bina ... ]
Gao Rey Guna Gao Rey
Ganga Yamuna Teera Chalo Rey
Meaning: There is no life without chanting the name of adorable son of Nanda, of Lord Sai Mukunda. Sing His glory and His attributes, Go to the banks of the rivers Ganga and Yamuna.
Songglossary: bina, chalo, ganga, gao, guna, mukunda, naam, nahin, nanda, praan, sai, teera, yamuna

Title: Nachey Tribhanga Krishna Murari
Lyrics:
Nachey Tribhanga Krishna Murari
Bhajey Mrudanga Manjula Bheri [ Nachey ... ]
Karunanta Ranga Yuga Avatari
Sri Sai Ranga Bhava Bhaya Haari
Meaning: The Lord Krishna dances in the pose of tribhanga (three bends), Let the percussion instrument Mrudanga and the temple drums beat, Oh Lord, The Lord of Compassion, the avatar of this age, Oh Sai Salutations to you who removes the fear of this life.
Songglossary: avatar, bhaja, bhava, bhaya, bheri, harana, karuna, krishna, manjula, mrudanga, murare, nach, ranga, sai, sri, tribhanga, yuga

Title: Nacho Hey Nataraj Shiva Shambho
Lyrics:
Nacho Hey Nataraj Shiva Shambho
Hara Bholey Nath Shiva Shambho
Shiva Shambho Shiva Shambho
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey
Hara Bholey Nath ( Sai Nath ) Shiva Shambho
Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva who performs the Celestial dance while the miniature drum "Damaru" beats.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhole, dama, damaru, hara, hey, nacho, nataraj, natha, sai, shambho, shiva

Title: Nacho Nacho Hey Nataraj
Lyrics:
Nacho Nacho Hey Nataraj
Jagadeeshwara Partheeshwara Sayeeshwara [ Nacho Nacho ... ]
Vibhuti Sundara Hey Nataraj
Bhavani Shankara Hey Shiva Raj
Sai Manohara Hey Nataraj [ Jagadeeshwara ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva, perform cosmic dance. Oh Lord of the Universe, Lord of Puttaparthi, beautifully smeared with the holy ash, consort of Bhavani (Parvathi), our Salutations to you.
Songglossary: bhava, hey, jagadeesha, manohar, nacho, nataraj, partheeshwara, raja, sai, sayee, shankara, shiva, sundara, vibhuti

Title: Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Lyrics:
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala [ Nacho Nacho ... ]
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Nandalala ]
Rhuma Jhuma Payal Ghungaroo Bhajey
Ghungaroo Bhajey Sai Murali Bhajey [ Nandalala ]
Meaning: Oh Son of Nanda, Krishna, Perform the divine dance. the one who assumed the form of Lion God Narasimha, Oh Lord Sai Narayana, Let the anklets, the musical instrument Ghunguroo play, let the flute play the glory of Lord Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: bhaja, ghungaroo, murali, nacho, nanda, narahari, narayana, payal, rhuma-jhuma, roopa, sai

Title: Naga Bhooshani Sai Narayani
Lyrics:
Naga Bhooshani Sai Narayani
Sambhavi Shankari Parama Shivani [ Naga Bhooshani ... ]
Himagiri Nandini Durga Bhavani
Bhagawathi Bharati Brahma Sanathani
Tripura Sundari Ananda Roopini
Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You are an aspect of Mother Parvathi who has the snake as an ornament! You are a form of Shakthi Who has names such as Sambhavi, the consort of Shiva, Shankari and Shivani You are the daughter of the king of Himalayas, You are Durga, You are Bhavani, You are the Divine Goddess called Bhagawathi, you are Saraswathi or the Goddess of learning, You are Eternal form of the Absolute, You are the embodiment of beauty and bliss.
Songglossary: anand, bhagavathi, bharati, bhava, bhooshan, brahma, durga, himagiri, naga, nandi, narayani, param, sai, sambhavi, sanatana, shankari, shiva, soundari, swaroopa, tripura

Title: Nagabharana Hey Nataraja
Lyrics:
Nagabharana Hey Nataraja
Naga Linga Sai Shambho Shankara [ Nagabharana ... ]
Nandi Vahana Namah Shivaya
Naada Swaroopa Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva adorning the snake as an ornament! Oh Sai Shiva in the form of a Linga beneath a snake. Oh Shiva! Who has the Nandi or the divine bull as your vehicle, Oh Shiva! Who is the form of Divine music. Oh Shiva! We worship you.
Songglossary: hey, linga, naada, naga, nagabharana, namah, nandi, nataraj, om, sai, shambho, shankara, shiva, swaroopa, vahana

Title: Nama Smarana Anandadam
Lyrics:
Nama Smarana Anandadam
Sai Namam Paramanandam [ Nama Smarana ... ]
Sadguru Namam Sadashiva Namam
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Namam
Rama Namam Krishna Namam
Allah Yeshu Nanak Namam
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Namam
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Namam [ Sai Namam ... ]
Meaning: Chanting the various names of Go fives bliss; Sai's many names provide supreme bliss.
Songglossary: allah, anand, buddha, dharma, durga, krishna, lakshmi, mahavir, naam, namam, nanak, param, priya, ram, sadashiva, sadguru, sai, saraswathi, sarva, smaran, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Namah Om Namah Om Hari
Lyrics:
Namah On Namah Om Hari Om Hara Om
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om [ Namah Om ]
Shirdipureesha Sai Shakti Maheshwara
Parthipureesha Sai Omkareshwara
Bhava Bhava Bhavaya Bhavaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Haraya Haraya Namah Om
Meaning: Bow to Lord Shiva, Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, the remover of worldly fears, and the Lord of Om.
Songglossary: bhava, hara, hari, maheshwara, namah, om, omkareshwara, partheeshwara, sai, shakthi, shirdi, shiva

Title: Namah Om Sathya Sai Krishnaya
Lyrics:
Namah Om Sathya Sai Krishnaya Namah Om
Gopi Jana Vallabhaya Govindaya Namah Om
Madhavaya Keshavaya Yadavaya Namah Om
Radha Ramana Madhusudhana Mohanaya Namah Om
Bansidhara Muralidhara Giridharaya Namah Om
Meaning: I worship Sathya Sai Who is Krishna You are the beloved One of the cowherd girls, you are the cowherd boy. Salutations to you, who are the Lord of Goddess Lakshmi, the descendant of the cowherd clan, and the slayer of the demon Kesha! You are the Lord of Radha the cowherd girl, you are the slayer of Madhu, the demon, You are the One who lifted the Govardhana mountain, we worship You, who is the player of the flute.
Songglossary: bansi, giridhar, gopi, govinda, jana, kesha, krishna, madhava, madhu, mohan, murali, namah, om, radha, ramana, sai, sathya, vallabha, yadava

Title: Namah Parvathi Pathayey Hara Hara
Lyrics:
Namah Parvathi Pathayey Hara Hara
Hara Hara Shankara Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Mahadeva Sadashiva
Sadashiva Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva (3)
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Mahadeva Sadashiva [ Sadashiva Mahadeva ]
Meaning: Salutations to Hara or Shiva, who is the Lord of Parvathi. You are Shankara or doer of good, you are the greatest Lord (Mahadeva), You are the Eternal Lord (Sadashiva).
Songglossary: hara, mahadev, namah, parvathi, pathi, sadashiva, shankara, shiva

Title: Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Lyrics:
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Samba Sadashiva Namah Shivaya
Girija Shankara Namah Shivaya
Bhavani Shankara Namah Shivaya
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Manohara
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya (2)
Meaning: Prostrations to Shiva, One who is with Divine Mother Parvathi, Who is Eternal, Who is the Lord of Parvathi, Who as Sai creates the divine Linga, who conquers the mind.
Songglossary: bhava, girija, lingodbhava, manohar, namah, sadashiva, sai, samba, shankara, shiva

Title: Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Lyrics:
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Shekaraya Namah Om (Shashi)
Tandavaya Namah Om
Lingeshwaraya Lingodhbhavakara
Sai Nathaya Namah Om (Sathya)
Vibhuti Sundara Jagadeka Esha
Esha Sayeesha Shirdeesha (2)
Meaning: Prostrations to Shiva, One who has the moon on his crown of hair, One who is the great dancer of the Tandava (cosmic dance), who as Sathya Sai creates the divine Linga, Prostrations to that Sai Natha, Smeared in beautiful vibhuti, The one and only Lord, He is Sai of Shirdi.
Songglossary: esha, jagadeka, lingeshwara, lingodbhava, namah, natha, om, sai, sathya, sayee, shashi, shekara, shirdeesha, shiva, sundara, tandava, vibhuti

Title: Namami Brahma Namami Vishnu Namami
Lyrics:
Namami Brahma Namami Vishnu Namami Maheshwara
Smarami Brahma Smarami Vishnu
Smarami Sayeeshwara (2)
Meaning: I salute Brahma, the God of Creation, prostrate to Vishnu, the God of sustenance and worship Lord Shiva, the Lord of Destruction. I meditate on Brahma, contemplate on Vishnu and dwell upon Sai.
Songglossary: brahma, maheshwara, namam, sayee, smaran, vishnu

Title: Namami Nithyam Gananatham
Lyrics:
Namami Nithyam Gananatham
Smarami Nithyam Gajavadanam
Namami Nithyam Gananatham [ Smarami ]
Meaning: I worship Lord Ganesha every moment, Who is the Lord of ganaas or the attendants of Lord Shiva. I meditate daily upon Ganapathi, who has the face of an elephant.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gananatha, namam, nithya, smaran

Title: Namami Sai Pada Pankajam
Lyrics:
Namami Sai Pada Pankajam
Smarami Sai Naamamrutham
Bhajami Sai Charanambhujam
Karomi Sai Sankeertanam
Meaning: Let us worship the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai, meditate upon the nectar of His Name, sing the glory of His Divine Lotus Feet and perform the singing of His glory.
Songglossary: bhaja, chara, karoon, naamamrutham, namam, paada, pankaja, sai, sankeertana, smaran

Title: Namami Shankara Shambho Maheshwara
Lyrics:
Namami Shankara Shambho Maheshwara
Namami Sadguru Mahadeva [ Namami Shankara ... ]
Namami Brahma Namami Vishnu
Namami Sadguru Sai Deva
Meaning: I worship Shiva, the bestower of good, the great Lord, I prostrate to Shiva who is the true preceptor. I bow down to Brahma, the Lord of creation, I salute Vishnu, the Lord of sustenance. I prostrate to the great Guru (Guru of Gurus - Sadguru), Sai.
Songglossary: brahma, deva, mahadev, maheshwara, namam, sadguru, sai, shambho, shankara, vishnu

Title: Namami Shiva Lingam Smarami Shiva
Lyrics:
Namami Shiva Lingam Smarami Shiva Lingam
Namami Satatam Smarami Satatam Namami Shiva Lingam [ Namami Shiva ... ]
Nabhi Kamala Udbhava Lingam
Loka Vipraha Karana Lingam
Shivarathri Mahotsava Atmaka Lingam
Shashwata Ananda Dayaka Lingam
Meaning: I worship the Linga, the oval symbol of Lord Shiva, I meditate upon the Linga. I worship constantly, I meditate constantly and salute Linga. The Linga that emanates from the lotus of the navel. The Linga that is the cause for the grace/wisdom in the world. The Linga that emerges on the holy Night of Shivarathri. The Linga that bestows everlasting bliss.
Songglossary: anand, atmaka, dayaka, kaarana, kamala, linga, loka, mahotsava, nabha, namam, satatam, shashwat, shiva, smaran, udbhava, vipraha

Title: Naman Karoon Main Guru Charanam
Lyrics:
Naman Karoon Main Guru Charanam
Sai Charanam Sadguru Charanam [ Naman Karoon ... ]
Sharanam Sharanam Tava Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Vishnu Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Shiva Charanam
Meaning: I bow down to the feet of the preceptor. The feet of Sai, the eternal Guru. I surrender to thy feet, I surrender to the feet of Lord Vishnu and to the feet of Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: chara, guru, karoon, naman, sadguru, sai, sharan, shiva, tava, vishnu

Title: Naman Karoon Main Guru Charanam
Lyrics:
Naman Karoon Main Guru Charanam Guru Charanam Sadguru Charanam
Pranavananda Ananda Chanda
Sai Guru Mama Guru Satchidananda [ Naman Karoon ... ]
Shanthi Vidayaka Guru Govinda
Mangala Dayaka Sadguru Natha
Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya
Meaning: I bow down to the feet of the eternal Guru, the embodiment of Om or the Pranava. The blissful Sai is my Guru and the form of Satchidananda - symbolizing Truth, Existence and Bliss. The One who bestows everlasting peace, He is Guru Govinda, the great Preceptor, He is the Real Teacher who blesses with auspiciousness. He is Sai, the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba.
Songglossary: anand, chand, chara, dayaka, eshwar, govinda, guru, karoon, mama, mangal, naman, natha, pranava, priya, sadguru, sai, satchidananda, shanthi, tanaya, vidayaka

Title: Namasmarana Namasmarana
Lyrics:
Namasmarana Namasmarana
 Singing out in loving adoration
 We are singing out in loving adoration
 Samba Siva Sai Baba Shiva Shakthi Aathma Swaroopa
 To This Name and This Form we will be born,
 Shiva Shakthi Aathma Swaroopa
 We are singing out in loving adoration
 Shiva (Mrityunjaya) Mahadeva Maheshwara
 Mangala Aathma Swaroopa
 Singing out in loving adoration
 (Sai) We-re singing out in loving adoration

Title: Namasthey Namasthey Guru Maharaj
Lyrics:
Namasthey Namasthey Guru Maharaj
Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Maharaj
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha
Sashtanga Sharanam Sarvesha (3)
Meaning: Oh King of Preceptors! I bow down to you. You are the Eternal Preceptor Sathya Sai. I surrender to you Oh Sai! I offer reverential prostration with all the eight limbs to you, Oh Lord of Lords!
Songglossary: guru, maharaj, namostuthey, sadguru, sai, sarvesha, sashtanga, sathya, sayee, sharan, sri

Title: Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya
Lyrics:
Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya
Namo Bhagawathey Rama Roopaya
Namo Bhagawathey Shyama Roopaya [ Namo Bhagawathey ]
Rama Rahim Krishna Karim Yesu Buddha Mahavir
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Devaya
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Roopaya
Meaning: I bow down to Lord who is the son of Vasudeva, I worship the Lord in the form of Rama, I prostrate the Lord in the form of Krishna or the blue-colored Lord Rama He is Rama, Krishna; Rahim and Karim, Merciful and compassionate (names of Allah), Jesus Christ, Buddha and Mahavir. I bow down to Lord Sai who is fond of all faiths.
Songglossary: bhagawathey, buddha, devaya, dharma, karim, krishna, mahavir, namo, priya, rahim, ram, roopa, sai, sarva, sham, vasudeva, yesu

Title: Namo Deenanathaya Namah Om
Lyrics:
Namo Deenanathaya Namah Om
Namo Devadi Savaya Namah Om
Namo Trishoola Dharaya Namah Om
Namo Trinetra Dharaya Namah Om
Namo Kailasa Vasaya Namah Om
Namo Shirdi Vasaya Namah Om
Namo Parti Vasaya Namah Om [ Namo Devadi ... ]
Meaning: Bow to Lord of Lords, Lord Shiva, the protector of the weak and forsaken who bears the trident and has three eyes (third eye wisdom). He resides in Kailasa, Shirdi, and Parthi.
Songglossary: deenan, devadi, dhara, kailasa, namah, namo, om, puttaparthi, shirdi, trinetra, trishoola, vasa

Title: Namo Mahadeva Samba Sadashiva Om
Lyrics:
Namo Mahadeva Samba Sadashiva Om
Jaya Bhuvaneshwara Jaya Partheeshwara
Jaya Shiva Shankara Om [ Namo Mahadeva ... ]
Bhavani Shankara Uma Maheshwara Girija Shankara Om
Hara Hara Shankara Gowri Manohara Sai Shiva Shankara Om [ Jaya Shiva ]
Meaning: I salute the great Lord Shiva, the bestower of happiness, the eternal Lord. Victory to the Supreme Lord of all worlds, who is the Lord of Puttaparthi. Victory to Shiva, the bestower of good. He is the Lord of Goddess Parvathi also referred as Bhavani, Uma, Girija and Gowri. He is Shankara, the Lord of Gowri's heart. He is Sai Shiva.
Songglossary: bhava, bhuvaneshwara, girija, gowri, hara, jay, mahadev, maheshwara, manohar, namo, om, partheeshwara, sadashiva, sai, samba, shankara, shiva, uma

Title: Namo Namastheytu Namo Namaya
Lyrics:
Namo Namastheytu Namo Namaya
Namo Namastheytu Manonmanaya
Namo Namastheytu Niramayaya
Tubhyam Sada Bhakthi Krupa Karaya
Meaning: I bow down to you, my Lord, One who is the Lord of the Mind, One who is blemishless. I constantly offer my devotion towards you, who shows me compassion.
Songglossary: bhakthi, krupa, manonmanaya, naman, namo, niramaya, sada, tubhyam

Title: Namo Namo Hari Narayana (3)
Lyrics:
Namo Namo Hari Narayana (3)
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Naada Swaroopa Narayana
Parthi Pureeshwara Narayana
Paapa Vimochana Narayana
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana
Meaning: I bow down to Sai who is the incarnation of Lord Vishnu - who is the ultimate abode of all creation. He is the form of the lion-faced Lord Narasimha. He is the form of divine music. He is the Lord of Puttaparthi. He is one who cleanses us of our sins.
Songglossary: hari, naada, namo, narahari, narayana, paapa, purishwara, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, swaroopa, vimochana

Title: Namo Namo Nataraja Namo
Lyrics:
Namo Namo Nataraja Namo
Hara Jata Jootadhara Shambho
Namo Namo Nataraja
Pavana Gangadhari
Danava Mada Samhari
Parthi Puri Vihari
Parama Daya Ghana Shourie
Namo Namo Nataraja
Namo Namo Nataraja (2)
Meaning: I bow down to Shiva who is the Lord of cosmic dance. He is the doer of good, Shambho - who has knotted hair locks on His Head. The pure one who bears the holy river Ganga on His hair. He is One who has killed the pride of the demons He is One who adorns Puttaparthi, full of infinite compassion. He is One with matted hair.
Songglossary: danava, daya, ganga, ghana, hara, jata, joota, mada, namo, nataraj, param, pavan, puri, puttaparthi, samhari, shambho, shouri, vihar

Title: Namo Namo Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Namo Namo Sai Narayana
Narayana Sathya Narayana [ Namo Namo ]
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayana
Karuna Sagara Narayana
Swagatham Sai Narayana
Swagatham Swagatham
Swagatham Sai Narayana (2)
Meaning: I bow to Lord Sai Narayana. He is our Sathya Narayana. The avatar of the Kali Age. The ocean of compassion, Narayana. I welcome (to my heart) Sai Narayana.
Songglossary: avatar, kali, karuna, namo, narayana, sagar, sai, sathya, swagatham, yuga

Title: Namo Namo Shankara Samba Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Namo Namo Shankara Samba Sadashiva
Samba Sadashiva Shankara Sadashiva [ Namo Namo ]
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Manohara
Parvathi Priyakara Sri Vishweshwara
Kailasa Vasa Kanaka Sabesha
Namo Namo Shankara Samba Sadashiva
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva who supports sacred river Ganges in His matted hair, the Lord of the Universe and the Consort of Goddess Parvathi, residing in Kailash. Salutations to Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: ganga, gowri, jatadhara, kailasa, kanaka, kanaka-sabesha, manohar, namo, parvathi, priya, sadashiva, samba, shankara, sri, vasa, vishweshwara

Title: Namo Namo Sri Devi Namo
Lyrics:
Namo Namo Sri Devi Namo
Shritha Jana Palini Sai Namo
Chinmaya Roopini Devi Namo
Sri Partheeshwari Sai Namo
Meaning: I bow down to the divine Mother, who protects all those who seek refuge in Her. She is the divine Mother Sai. She has the cosmic form and She has taken form in Parthi now, as Mother Sai.
Songglossary: chinmaya, devi, jana, namo, palini, partheeshwari, sai, shritha, sri, swaroopa

Title: Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Namo
Lyrics:
Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Mata
Hey Vidya Gnana Pradayini
Ma Veena Pusthaka Dharini
Bhava Bhanjani Manoranjani
Sathya Sayeeshwari Mata
Sathya Sayeeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari Mata
Sathya Sayeeshwari Mata
Meaning: I bow down to Mother Sharada, The One who bestows education, knowledge, The One who holds the string instrument 'Veena' and the book in her hands. She removes the fear of existence and enchants the mind. She is Mother Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, dayini, dhari, gnana, hey, ma, manoranjani, mata, namo, pusthaka, sathya, sayee, sharada, veena, vidya

Title: Namo Tassa, Namo Tassa
Lyrics:
Namo Tassa, Namo Tassa (2x)
 Namo Tassa, Gautama Buddha (2X)
 Hail to the Enlightened One
 Praises to Our Blessed Lord, showing us the righteous way
 Joyously we sing to Thee, with hearts so full of love
 O what glorious Light shines forth from Lord Buddha's calm, gentle face
 Unfolding the Middle Path for man's enlightment
 Meditate upon His Dharma, cultivate the truth within
 Buddha's radiant Light shall lead us to the abode of Niravana's Bliss

Title: Namostuthey Ganapathi Ganaraya
Lyrics:
Namostuthey Ganapathi Ganaraya
Namostuthey Namostuthey [ Namostuthey ... ]
Hey Shiva Nandana Sai Gajanana
Sai Gajanana Namostuthey [ Namostuthey Namostuthey ... ]
Meaning: I bow down to You, Lord Ganapathi, the Lord of Shiva's army. The son of Lord Shiva. The one who has the mouse as his vehicle. I repeatedly bow down to you. Please protect me, Oh elephant-faced One.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gananayaka, ganaraya, hey, namostuthey, nandana, sai, shiva

Title: Namu Amida Butsu Namu Amida
Lyrics:
Namu Amida Butsu Namu Amida
Namu Amida Butsu Namu Amida
Namu Amida Butsu (3x) Namu Amida
Namu Amida Butsu
Namu Amida Butsu Namu Amida
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Amida Buddha in which I take refuge.

Title: Namu Kanzeon Daibosatsu
Lyrics:
Namu Kanzeon Daibosatsu (3X)
 Kannon koso wa Kurushimi mo
 Namidatsu Kokoro mo Seisi no Umi mo
 Subete Torisari Sukui Ataeru
 Kagirinaki Ai de Sukui Ataeru

Title: Namuamidabutsu Namuamida
Lyrics: Namuamidabutsu Namuamida (Repeat)

Title: Nanda Ke Dularey Bhaiyya Nacho
Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Dularey Bhaiyya Nacho Nacho Nacho
Murali Ghana Shyama Mora Mukuta Dhama
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Swagatham Krishna Krishna Sharanagatham Krishna
Aao Merey Nayanon Mey Aao Merey Bhajano Mey
Sundara Sundara Gopala Shyama Sundara Sai Gopala
Antaryami Gopala Hrudaya Nivasi Gopala
Meaning: Perform the Divine dance, darling of Nanda The holder of the flute, the one as dark as the rain cloud, the one who adorns the peacock feathered crown. Perform the Divine dance. I welcome you, Lord Krishna. I surrender to you, Oh Lord Krishna. Be ever in my vision, be ever in my devotional songs. Oh beautiful Lord of the Gopas, the dark hued beautiful One. He is our Sai Gopala. He is the indweller, the dweller of our heart.
Songglossary: aao, antar, bhai, bhaja, dhama, dular, ghana, gopal, hrudaya, ke, krishna, mera, mora, mukuta, murali, nacho, nanda, nayan, nivasi, sai, sham, sharan, sundara, swagatham

Title: Nanda Ke Dularey Yashoda Ke
Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Dularey Yashoda Ke Pyaarey
Govinda Murarey Deenon Ke Saharey [ Nanda Ke ... ]
Karuna Sagara Giridhara Naagara
Murali Manohara Shyama ( Sai ) Murarey
Meaning: Oh the loved child of Nanda, the beloved son of Yashoda. Oh Protector of cows, the support of the downtrodden. You are the ocean of compassion. The One who lifted the mountain Govardhana, The One who enchants with the sweet music of the flute, the one who is blue colored and One who killed the demon Mura.
Songglossary: deenon, dular, giridhar, govinda, karuna, ke, manohar, murali, murare, naagar, nanda, pyaara, sagar, saharey, sai, sham, yashoda

Title: Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Bhajorey
Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Bhajorey Gopi Gopal Bhajo
Murali Mohana Shyama Bhajorey
Giridhari Lal Bhajo ( Sai )
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala
Meaning: Sing of the darling of Nanda, the Lord of cowherd devotees. Sing of the dark hued one with the enchanting flute. Sing of the child who lifted the mountain. The loved one of Nanda, the stealer of the hearts. The one who revels in Parthi, our Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, chora, giridhar, gopal, gopi, ke, kishora, lal, mohan, murali, nanda, navaneetha, puttaparthi, sai, sham, vihar

Title: Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Murali
Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Murali Gopal
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Giridhari Shyam Bhajo Gopi Gopal
Meera Ke Natha Prabhu Hey Nandalala [ Radhey Shyam ]
Meaning: Sing the glory of the child of Nanda, the protector of cows, Krishna, who plays the flute. We pray to you, the blue colored Lord of cowherd girl Radha; You lifted the mountain Govardhan. Sing the glory of the Lord of the cowherds, the Lord of the great devotee saint Meera and the beloved son of Nanda.
Songglossary: bhaja, giridhar, gopal, gopi, hey, ke, lal, meera, murali, nanda, natha, prabhu, radha, sham

Title: Nanda Ke Lal Murali Gopal
Lyrics:
Nanda Ke Lal Murali Gopal
Giridhari Govinda Radhey Gopal
Nanda Mukunda Radhey Gopal
Radhey Jai Radhey Jai Radhey Gopal
Radhey Radhey Radhey Gopal
Radhey Radhey Murali Gopal
Radhey Radhey Shyam Gopal
Radhey Radhey Sai Gopal
Meaning: Oh son of Nanda! Oh Lord Krishna, the player of the flute and the cowherd boy! The One who lifted the Govardhan mountain, the protector of the cows and the Lord of Radha, the cowherd girl. The son of Nanda, who grants liberation and glory to you. You are the blue colored Lord of Radha, the flute playing Lord and the Lord Sai.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, govinda, jai, ke, lal, mukunda, murali, nanda, radha, sai, sham

Title: Nanda Kishora Mana Mohana
Lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Mana Mohana
Navaneetha Chora Madhusudhana
Devaki Nandana Yadu Nandana
Devadi Deva Jagat Palana
Meaning: The son of Nanda, the One who enchants the mind, The One who steals butter, the slayer of demon, Madhu. The son of Devaki, and the child of the Yadava clan, The Lord of the Lords and the protector of the universe.
Songglossary: chora, deva, devadi, devaki, jagat, kishora, madhu, mana, mohan, nanda, navaneetha, paalaya, yadu

Title: Nanda Kishora Narayana
Lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Narayana
Navaneetha Chora Narayana [ Nanda Kishora ... ]
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Naada Swaroopa Narayana
Meaning: You are the son of Nanda and are Lord Vishnu, who is the refuge for all beings, You are Krishna who stole butter, (symbolically, devotee's heart). You are the lion God Narasimha and you are the form of divine music.
Songglossary: chora, kishora, naada, nanda, narahari, narayana, navaneetha, roopa, swaroopa

Title: Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Hari Madhava
Madhusudhana Muralidhara
Gopi Jana Chitha Chora
Brindavana Sai Kanhaiya [ Narayana Hari ]
Meaning: The son of Nanda Who stole butter, you are the Lord in whom all beings take refuge, Oh Vishnu! You are the Lord of Goddess Lakshmi. You killed the demon Madhu and you play the flute. You, who stole the hearts of the Gopis, You are the child of Brindavan, Lord Sai.
Songglossary: brinda, chitha, chora, gopi, hari, jana, kanha, kishora, madhava, madhu, murali, nanda, narayana, navaneetha, sai

Title: Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora Sai
Lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora Sai Gopala
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Hey Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala
Goparipala Gokula Bala Giridhara Gopala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala Hey Nandalala [ Nandalala ]
Meaning: The son of Nanda, the One who stole butter, Oh Lord of cowherds, You are the One who lifted the mountain Govardhana, the One who killed the demon Mura; You are the child of Nanda - You are the cowherd boy, the One who protects cows, one who revels in playing the flute. You are the One who protects the saintly persons, Oh Nandalal.
Songglossary: bala, chora, giridhar, gokul, gopal, goparipala, govardhan, hey, kishora, lola, munijana, murali, murare, nanda, navaneetha, pala, sai

Title: Nanda Kumara Govinda Navaneetha Chora
Lyrics:
Nanda Kumara Govinda Navaneetha Chora Govinda
Srinivasa Hari Govinda Shritha Jana Pala Govinda [ Nanda Kumara ... ]
Sai Rama Harey Govinda Sai Krishna Harey Govinda
Deena Dayalu Govinda Prema Swaroopa Govinda
Govinda Hari Govinda (3)
Meaning: I sing of the son of Nanda, the protector of cows; the One Who stole butter and who is the Lord of cows (all beings)! Oh Lord of Lakshmi! You are One that protects those that seek refuge in you. You are Sairam, you are Sai Krishna. You are the One that is compassionate towards the downtrodden and you are the form of Divine Love. You are the protector of cows (all beings), Lord Vishnu.
Songglossary: chora, dayal, deen, govinda, hari, jana, krishna, kumara, nanda, navaneetha, pala, prem, ram, sai, shritha, srinivasa, swaroopa

Title: Nanda Kumara Jaya Gopal
Lyrics:
Nanda Kumara Jaya Gopal
Kanhaiya Lal Jaya Gopal
Yashoda Ke Bal Jaya Gopal
Radha Ke Nath Jaya Gopal
Meaning: Victory to Gopal (Lord Krishna), son of Nanda and Yashoda and the Lord of Radha.
Songglossary: bala, gopal, jay, kanha, ke, kumara, lal, nanda, natha, radha, yashoda

Title: Nanda Kumaram Krishnam Bhajey
Lyrics:
Nanda Kumaram Krishnam Bhajey
Navaneetha Chora Krishnam Bhajey [ Nanda Kumaram ]
Natavara Naagara Krishnam Bhajey
Narahara Sundara Krishnam Bhajey
Narayana Hari Krishnam Bhajey
Meaning: Sing the glory of Krishna, the son of Nanda. The stealer of hearts, Lord Krishna. The divine dancer, Lord Krishna. The beautiful man-God Lord Krishna. He is the Lord Vishnu, Sing the glory of Krishna.
Songglossary: bhaja, chora, hari, krishna, kumara, naagar, nanda, narahari, narayana, natavara, navaneetha, sundara

Title: Nanda Mukunda Hari Gopala
Lyrics:
Nanda Mukunda Hari Gopala
Gopi Jana Priya Goparipala [ Nanda Mukunda ... ]
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Sai Gopala
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopala
Meaning: Oh Krishna! You are the cowherd boy, the one who grants liberation. You are the favorite of the cowherds and the protector of cows (all noble souls). Oh Sai Krishna you are the one who protects His devotees. You are the one who gives happiness to Nanda too.
Songglossary: bhaktha, gopal, goparipala, gopi, hari, jana, mukunda, nanda, priya, sai, samraksha

Title: Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopal
Lyrics:
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopal
Nanda Mukunda Hari Shyama Gopal
Radha Manasa Krishna Gopal
Murali Manohara Mukunda Gopal
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopal Sathya Sai Gopal
Meaning: You are the son and joy of Nanda and the bestower of liberation. You are the cowherd boy Krishna. Oh blue colored Lord! You are the One Who resides in the heart of the cowherd girl Radha (symbolizes ardent devotee). You are the One Who plays the flute and conquers the mind. You are the One Who is the Lord of Puttaparthi and also known as Lord Sathya Sai Gopal.
Songglossary: gopal, hari, krishna, manasa, manohar, mukunda, murali, nanda, purishwara, puttaparthi, radha, sai, sathya, sham

Title: Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopala
Lyrics:
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopala
Murali Mohana Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopal Ghana Shyama Gopala [ Murali Mohana ]
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Nandalala
Jai Nandalala Radhey Gopala [ Murali Mohana ]
Meaning: Oh son of Nanda! You are the cowherd boy Krishna who grants us liberation. You are the One who enchants us by playing the flute. Oh blue colored Lord resembling the dark color of the clouds, Victory be to you, the child of Nanda. Victory be to you oh Lord of Radha, the cowherd girl.
Songglossary: ghana, gopal, jai, mohan, mukunda, murali, nanda, radha, sham

Title: Nanda Nanda Mukunda Hey Sri
Lyrics:
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Hey Sri Hari
Indiresha Yadu Nandana Hari
Manda Haasa Madhusudhana Hari
Sundarakara Sayeesha Sri Hari
Meaning: Oh the son and joy of Nanda, you are the bestower of liberation, You, who art the child of the Yadavas. You are the One with a slight smile and the One who killed the demon Madhu. You are also the One with a beautiful form of Sai.
Songglossary: hari, hasita, hey, indra, madhu, manda, mukunda, nanda, sayee, sri, sundara, yadu

Title: Nanda Nandana Hari Govinda Gopala
Lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Hari Govinda Gopala
Ghana Shyama Mana Mohana (2)
Gopi Lola Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopala
Hey Nandalala Gopala [ Ghana Shyama ]
Meaning: The son of Nanda, Oh Vishnu! You are the protector of cows. You are the blue colored Lord resembling the clouds and the One who enchants the mind. You are the favorite of the devout cowherd girls. The cowherd boy who is the beloved child of the cowherd abode Gokula and the loving child of Nanda.
Songglossary: bala, ghana, gokul, gopal, gopi, govinda, hari, hey, lola, mana, mohan, nanda, sham

Title: Nanda Nandana Navaneetha Chora
Lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Navaneetha Chora
Gokula Bala Venu Gopala [ Nanda Nandana ... ]
Mathura Natha Harey Krishna Gopala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala
Vanamali Giridhari Shyama Gopala [ Gokula Bala ]
Meaning: The son of Nanda Who stole butter. The child of the cowherd land Gokula, the One playing the flute. The Lord of Mathura, Oh Lord Krishna, the protector of cows. The blue colored cowherd boy Krishna, wearing the garland (Vanamali) and the One who lifted the mountain Govardhana (Giridhari).
Songglossary: bala, chora, giridhar, gokul, gopal, hari, krishna, mathura, nanda, natha, navaneetha, sai, sham, vanamali, venu

Title: Nanda Nandana Navaneetha Chora Brindavana
Lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Navaneetha Chora Brindavana Vihari
Shyam Sundara Madana Mohana Brindavana Vihari
Karuna Sagara Kamala Nayana Brindavana Vihari [ Shyama Sundara ... ]
Padmanabha Parthi Vasa Brindavana Vihari [ Shyama Sundara ]
Meaning: Oh the son of Nanda, You are the one Who stole butter and who played in Brindavan. You are the blue colored beautiful Lord, with an enchanting form and the one who adorns Brindavan. You are the Ocean of compassion and the lotus-eyed Lord who revels in Brindavan. The One with a lotus in the navel (Vishnu) is the One who resides in Puttaparthi and also the One who adorns Brindavan.
Songglossary: brinda, chora, kamala, karuna, madana, mohan, nanda, navaneetha, nayan, padma, puttaparthi, sagar, sham, sundara, vasa, vihar

Title: Nandalal Nandalal Nandalal Yadu Nandalal
Lyrics:
Nandalal Nandalal Nandalal Yadu Nandalal
Nandalala Navaneetha Chora
Radha Pyaarey Nandalal
Mayi Meera Manasa Chora
Parthi Vihari Nandalal
Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! You are the child of Yadavas or the cowherd clan! You are the One who stole butter (devotees' hearts)! You are the loved One of Radha, the cowherd girl! You stole the heart & mind of the great saint Princess Meera You are the One who dwells in Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: chora, ma, manasa, meera, nanda, navaneetha, puttaparthi, pyaara, radha, vihar, yadu

Title: Nandalala Nandalala
Lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala
Nanda Gopa Nandana Sri Nandalala
Nanda Kumara Nandalala
Navaneetha Chora Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala [ Nanda Gopa ]
Yashoda Bala Nandalala
Yamuna Vihari Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala [ Nanda Gopa ]
Meaning: Oh child of Nanda, the cowherd chieftain! You are the One who stole butter (hearts)! You are the son of Yashoda You are the One who played on the banks of River Yamuna!
Songglossary: bala, chora, gopa, kumara, nanda, navaneetha, sri, vihar, yamuna, yashoda

Title: Nandalala Nandalala
Lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala
Nanda Mukunda Hari Nandalala
Murali Manohara Nandalala
Radha Manohara Nandalala
Meaning: Oh son of Nanda, the cowherd chieftain, You are the son who grants liberation! You enchant with your music on the flute! You are the One who adorns the mind of Radha, the cowherd girl.
Songglossary: hari, manohar, mukunda, murali, nanda, radha

Title: Nandalala Nandalala
Lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Navaneetha Chora Hey Bala Gopala
Gopi Manohara Gopala Bala
Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! Rejoice in dance, dance and dance! You are the Lord of the cowherds who stole butter! You are the beautiful child Krishna! The one who enchanted the cowherd girls! The cowherd child!
Songglossary: bala, chora, gopal, gopi, hey, manohar, nacho, nanda, navaneetha

Title: Nandalala Nandalala Daya Karo Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala Daya Karo Bhagawan
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
Daya ( Sai Krupa ) Karo Bhagawan
Tumharey Sharan Bin Anath Hai Hum
Daya ( Sai Krupa ) Karo Bhagawan
Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! Oh Lord! Have compassion on me. Help me cross this Ocean of life. Have compassion on me. Have pity on me. Without (the shelter of) your feet, we are orphans Oh Lord! Have compassion towards me. Have pity on me Oh Lord Sai!
Songglossary: anath, bhagawan, bhava, bin, daya, hai, hum, karo, krupa, nanda, paar, sagar, sai, se, sharan, tumhara, utharo

Title: Nandalala Navaneetha Chora Natavara Lala
Lyrics:
Nandalala Navaneetha Chora Natavara Lala Gopala
Devaki Vasudeva Kumara
Deva Deva Gopala [ Nandalala ... ]
Mohana Murali Gaana Vilola
Mohana Jaya Gopala (Mana)
Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! the stealer of butter! One who dances beautifully! The cowherd Lord! The son of Devaki and Vasudeva! The Lord of Lords! Oh protector of cows! One Who plays melodiously on the flute! Oh the One with an enchanting form! The victorious cowherd Lord!
Songglossary: chora, deva, devaki, gaan, gopal, jay, kumara, lal, mana, mohan, murali, nanda, natavara, navaneetha, vasudeva, vilola

Title: Nandalala Shyama Sundara Nandalala
Lyrics:
Nandalala Shyama Sundara Nandalala
Kaustubha Dhari Vanamala Dhara Shyamala Madana Gopala
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Sai Shyam Sai Shyam
Radha Madhava Madana Gopala
Mathura Natha Gopala
Parthi Nandana Hrudaya Sanjeevana
Shyamala Madana Gopala [ Radhey Shyam ... ]
Meaning: This bhajan praises Lord Sai Krishna as the one who is most charming, the one who wears the jewel Koustubha, the beloved of Radha, the Lord of Mathura and the one who resides in the hearts of His devotees.
Songglossary: dhara, dhari, gopal, hrudaya, kaustubha, madana, madhava, mathura, nandalala, nandana, natha, puttaparthi, radha, sai, sanjeevana, sham, sundara, vanamala

Title: Nandalala Yadu Nandalala
Lyrics:
Nandalala Yadu Nandalala
Brindavana Govinda Lala
Radha Lola Nandalala
Radha Madhava Nandalala (Jai)
Meaning: Oh child of Nanda! You are the darling of the Yadava (cowherd) chieftain. You are the child of Brindavan and the protector of cows! You are the favorite of Radha, the cowherd girl. Victory to you!
Songglossary: brinda, govinda, jai, lal, lola, madhava, nanda, radha, yadu

Title: Nandana Yadu Nandana Anandana Chitha
Lyrics:
Nandana Yadu Nandana Anandana Chitha Chandana
Vandana Guru Vandana Sathya Sai Satchidanandana
Sundara Mukharavindana
Govindana Gopalana
Radha Madhava Mohana
Muralidhara Madhusudhana
Meaning: Oh son of the cowherd chieftain Nanda! the source of joy! You are the sandal fragrance of the heart. Salutations to the Guru, the preceptor Who is Sai, who is the embodiment of Truth, Existence and Bliss. The One Who is beautiful with a lotus-like face, He Who is the Protector of cows, the cowherd boy Krishna. You are the one who is the Lord of the cowherd girl Radha and are the enchanting One. You are the one who holds the flute and the one who killed the demon Madhu.
Songglossary: anand, chand, chitha, gopal, govinda, guru, madhava, madhu, mohan, mukha, murali, nanda, radha, sai, satchidananda, sathya, sundara, vandana, yadu

Title: Nandeeshwara Hey Nataraja
Lyrics:
Nandeeshwara Hey Nataraja
Nandatmaja Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Nandeeshwara ... ]
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya
Naada Swaroopa Namo Namo [ Narayana Hari ( Sai ) ]
Meaning: Oh Lord of Nandi, the divine bull, You are the Lord of cosmic dance, Shiva. You are also known as the son of Nanda, Oh Vishnu, the ultimate refuge of all beings. Oh Sai Narayana, You are Shiva, who is adorned with the snake! You are the one who embodies divine music!
Songglossary: hari, hey, naada, nagabharana, namah, namo, nanda, nandeeshwara, narayana, nataraj, sai, shiva, swaroopa

Title: Nandeeshwara Om Namah Shivaya
Lyrics:
Nandeeshwara Om Namah Shivaya
Nataraja Om Namah Shivaya
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya
Nata Shiva Shankara Namah Shivaya [ Nataraja Om ... ]
Sai Raja Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord of the divine bull Nandi! Lord Shiva! Prostrations to you Oh The Lord of cosmic dance! Lord Shiva! Salutations to you Oh Lord Shiva Who adorns a snake as an ornament! I worship you! Oh Shiva, Who dances and Who bestows good! Oh Sai Shiva! Obeisance to you!
Songglossary: nagabharana, namah, nandeeshwara, nata, nataraj, om, raja, sai, shankara, shiva

Title: Nandi Vahana Nataraja Harey
Lyrics:
Nandi Vahana Nataraja Harey
Indushekara Shiva Raja Harey [ Nandi Vahana ... ]
Bandha Vimochana Hey Baba Harey
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Sai Harey
Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva Whose vehicle is the divine bull! You are the Lord of cosmic dance! Oh Lord Shiva! You are the one Who is adorned on His head with the crescent moon! Oh Lord Sai Baba you are the one Who frees us of all bondage! Oh Lord of Puttaparthi You are Sri Sathya Sai Who is also the incarnation of Lord Shiva!
Songglossary: baba, bandha, hari, hey, indushekara, nandi, nataraj, purishwara, puttaparthi, raja, sai, sathya, shiva, vahana, vimochana

Title: Nandi Vahana Nataraja Namo
Lyrics:
Nandi Vahana Nataraja Namo
Phaala Lochana Shiva Raja Namo [ Nandi Vahana ]
Parama Esha Jagadeesha Namo
Shiva Shakthi Partheesha Namo
Bholey Baba Sayeesha Namo
Meaning: Recite the name of Lord Shiva (Lord Sai) who rides on the celestial Bull Nandi, has the third eye in the forehead, consort of Goddess Shakthi (Parvathi).
Songglossary: baba, bhole, esha, jagadeesha, lochana, namo, nandi, nataraj, paalaya, param, partheeshwara, raja, sayee, shakthi, shiva, vahana

Title: Narahari Roopa Narayana
Lyrics:
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Naada Swaroopa Narayana
Parthi Pureesha Narayana
Paapa Vimochana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (4)
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You are the abode of all beings; the form of Lion-faced Lord Narasimha! Oh Lord! You are the embodiment of divine music! Oh Lord of Puttaparthi! You are the Lord Who washes away our sins! Oh Lord Narayana, You are the ultimate refuge of all beings!
Songglossary: hari, naada, narahari, narayana, paapa, pureesha, puttaparthi, roopa, swaroopa, vimochana

Title: Narayan Hari Narayan Jaya Narayan
Lyrics:
Narayan Hari Narayan Jaya Narayan Sai Narayan
Narayan Hari Narayan Narayan Sai Narayan (2)
Narayan Hari Narayan Jaya Narayan Sai Narayan
Narayan Hari Narayan Narayan Sai Narayan
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You are the refuge of all beings! Victory be to you Oh Lord Hari! Oh Lord Sai the incarnation of Lord Narayana! Victory to you Oh Hari!
Songglossary: hari, jay, narayana, sai

Title: Narayan Narayan Bhajaman Narayan
Lyrics:
Narayan Narayan Bhajaman Narayan
Sri Hari Madhava Narayan Bhajaman Narayan
Murali Shyam Mohana Shyam Murali Mohana Shyam
Merey Ram Hey Ghana Shyam Sai Sadguru Naam
Meaning: Oh mind, Sing the glory of Lord Narayan! The abode of all beings! Sing the glory of the Lord of Lakshmi! Lord Vishnu! He is Krishna who is blue colored, He is enchanting; His music on the flute is enchanting. He is my Lord Ram, He is the cloud-like blue colored Lord. Sing the name of Sai, the Ultimate preceptor of all!
Songglossary: bhaja, ghana, hari, hey, madhava, mera, mohan, murali, naam, narayana, ram, sadguru, sai, sham, sri

Title: Narayan Narayan Jaya Govinda Harey
Lyrics:
Narayan Narayan Jaya Govinda Harey
Narayan Narayan Jaya Gopala Harey
Narayan Narayan Jaya Govinda Harey
Narayan Narayan Jaya Gopala Harey
Meaning: Oh Narayana! Oh Govinda! Oh the cowherd Lord Krishna! Victory be to you.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, jay, narayana

Title: Narayana Govinda Harey
Lyrics:
Narayana Govinda Harey
Narayana Gopala Harey [ Narayana Govinda ... ]
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana
Narayana Veda Parayana
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana, the refuge of all beings! You are the protector of cows (meek)! Oh Krishna, the cowherd Lord! You are the One who is the embodiment of peace, You are the One who reclines on the serpent Adi Sesha.
Songglossary: bhuja, gopal, govinda, hari, narayana, parayana, shantha, shayana, veda

Title: Narayana Hari Naama Bhajorey Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Naama Bhajorey Narayana Veda Parayana
Karuna Bharana Bhava Bhaya Harana
Pavana Charana Patitha Janavana
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana (3)
Meaning: Sing the name of Narayana, the ultimate shelter for all creatures! He is the Lord of the Vedas! He wears compassion as an ornament and removes the fear of the mundane world, He is One with Holy feet and One who redeems the downtrodden! He is Narayana, Hari and Sai!
Songglossary: bhajao, bharana, bhava, bhaya, chara, harana, hari, janavana, karuna, naam, narayana, parayana, patitha, pavan, sai, veda

Title: Narayana Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narahari Roopa Namo Narayana [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Neeraja Nayana Neeradi Shayana
Narada Sannuta Namo Narayana
Meaning: Oh Narayana, You are the final refuge of all beings! Oh Lord Vishnu! You are the lion-faced Narasimha! Salutations to You, Oh lotus-eyed one! You are the one who reclines on the Ocean! Oh Lord praised by Sage Narada! Obeisance to You Oh Narayana!
Songglossary: hari, namo, narada, narahari, narayana, nayan, neeradi, neeraja, roopa, sannuta, shayana

Title: Narayana Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana, You are the abode of all beings. Lord Hari, You are Krishna, the son of Nanda and the Lord of the cowherds. You are the Lord of bliss!
Songglossary: anand, govinda, hari, nanda, narayana

Title: Narayana Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Vaikunta Vasa Namo Narayana
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana
Narayana Namo Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Meaning: Oh Narayana, the ultimate destination of all creation! You are the lion-faced form Narasimha! Oh resident of Vaikunta, prostrations to you. You were the favorite of Sita in the incarnation as Rama. Oh Lord Sai, you are the incarnation of Vishnu. Salutations to you.
Songglossary: hari, mohan, namo, narahari, narayana, roopa, sai, vaidehi, vaikunta, vasa

Title: Narayana Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narahari Roopa Sai Narayana [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Anantha Shayana Adi Narayana
Pankaja Nayana Parthi Narayana
Narayana Lakshmi Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Meaning: Oh Narayana, you are the resting place of all creation! Oh Hari you are the lion-faced Lord Narahari. Oh Lord! You are the one reclining on the serpent Adi Sesha. You are the primeval Lord Vishnu. You are The lotus eyed Lord! The Lord of Goddess Lakshmi and the Lord of Puttaparthi! You are the Lord Sai, Who is the incarnation of Narayana.
Songglossary: adi, ananta, hari, lakshmi, narahari, narayana, nayan, pankaja, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, shayana

Title: Narayana Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Hari Om
Narayana Hari Divya Swaroopa
Narayana Hari Jyothi Swaroopa
Sayeeshwara Hari Om [ Narayana Hari Om ]
Meaning: Oh Narayana! You are the resting place of all beings. Oh Hari! You are the form of the primordial sound Om. You are the one with a divine form. You are the form of divine light. Now incarnated as Sayeeshwara.
Songglossary: divya, hari, jyoth, narayana, om, sayee, swaroopa

Title: Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana Namo Narayana (2)
Om Om Om Om Om Om Om Om Namo Narayana (Hari)
Meaning: Let us chant and worship Lord Narayana and Hari, The Primal Force.
Songglossary: bhaja, hari, namo, narayana, om

Title: Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
Lyrics: Narayana Hari Narayana Bhaja Narayana Sai Narayana (4)
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana.
Songglossary: bhaja, hari, narayana

Title: Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Veda Parayana
Shambho Mahadeva Shambho Mahadeva Shambho Mahadeva Sadashiva
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You are the author of Vedas. You are also Lord Shiva, The doer of good.
Songglossary: hari, mahadev, narayana, parayana, sadashiva, shambho, veda

Title: Narayana Hari Om
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om
Sri Jagannatha Jyothi Swaroopa [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Dharani Dhara Hey Damodara
Vande Sri Ananda Nanda Kumara
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You are the ultimate destination for all beings. Oh Vishnu! You are the Lord of the Universe! You are the divine light who holds the earth. Oh Vishnu! I Bow down to you oh Lord of Joy who is also the son of Nanda.
Songglossary: anand, damodara, dhara, hari, hey, jagan, jyoth, kumara, nanda, narayana, om, sri, swaroopa, vande

Title: Narayana Hari Om Hari Om
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om Hari Om
Duritha Nivarana Hari Om Hari Om [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Triloka Palana Hari Om Hari Om
Parama Dayalana Hari Om Hari Om
Garuda Vahana Hari Om Hari Om
Pundarikaaksha Hari Om Hari Om
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You rescue us once we call out your name Oh Lord Hari! You are the protector of the three worlds Oh Lord Hari. You are the most compassionate one Oh Lord Hari. You have Garuda, mighty Divine Eagle as your vehicle Oh Lord Hari. Prostrations to you Oh lotus-eye done.
Songglossary: dayal, duritha, garuda, hari, narayana, nivarana, om, paalaya, param, pundarika, triloka, vahana

Title: Narayana Hari Om Hari Om
Lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om
Sai Narayana Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana
Padmanabha Hari Om
Sai Narayana Hari Om
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You are the Lord Sai Who is the incarnation of Hari. You are the embodiment of peace, you recline on the serpent Adi Sesha. You have a Lotus emerging from your navel (symbolizes creation arising from the Lord). Oh Lord Sai! Oh Lord Narayana! Salutations to you.
Songglossary: bhuja, hari, narayana, om, padma, sai, shantha, shayana

Title: Narayana Namo Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Namo Narayana
Jaya Jaya Govinda Narayana
Jaya Jaya Ananda Narayana
Shri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Shri Ranganatha Narayana
Narayana Namo Narayana
Meaning: Bow to Lord Vishnu and glory be to Him, the blissful Lord of Consort Lakshmi, Ranganatha.
Songglossary: anand, govinda, jay, lakshmi, namo, narayana, ramana, ranga, sri

Title: Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Govinda
Lyrics:
Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Govinda Harey
Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Gopala Harey
Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Govinda Harey
Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Gopala Harey
Meaning: Let us Praise Lord Narayana who is Govinda and Gopala.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, jai, narayana

Title: Narayana Narayana Mangala Dhaam
Lyrics:
Narayana Narayana Mangala Dhaam
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Parameshwara Omkara
Sai Muralidhara Vara Govinda
Sayeesha Mangala Dhaam (Sathya)
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! Oh the abode of auspiciousness! You are Brahma, the Lord of Creation, You are Vishnu, the Lord of sustenance! You are Shiva, the supreme Lord of Destruction, Oh Sai, the embodiment of Omkar You are Krishna holding the flute, bestower of boons, you are Govinda, the protector of cows. Oh Lord Sathya Sai! You are the abode of auspiciousness.
Songglossary: brahma, dhaam, govinda, mangal, murali, narayana, om, param, sai, sathya, sayee, vara, vishnu

Title: Narayana Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Sai Narayana
Narahari Roopa Namo Narayana
Shantha Swaroopa Namo Narayana
Hey Hrishikesha Hrudaya Nivasa
Deena Sharanya Narayana
Narayana Namo Narayana
Narayana Veda Parayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
Meaning: Oh Narayana! The abode of all beings! Oh Lord Sai! You are the lion-faced Lord Narahari! Prostrations to you. The form of peace oh Hari! my Obeisance! Oh Hrishikesha (Lord of the senses, Vishnu)! You are the inhabitant of the devotee's heart! Oh the refuge of the poor! Oh Lord Hari! Salutations to you. Oh Lord You are the author of Vedas. Oh Lord Sai! You are the incarnation of Lord Narayana!
Songglossary: deen, hey, hrishikesha, hrudaya, namo, narahari, narayana, nivasa, parayana, roopa, sai, shantha, sharan, swaroopa, veda

Title: Narayana Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Narayana Sathya Sai, Narayana Sathya Sai
We sing our songs at the Feet of Bhagavan
And we sing of Bhagavan, Shri Sathya Sai
Now our days will be brighter and our burdens will be lighter
Premaswarupa Sathya Sai, Premaswarupa Sathya Sai
We sing our Love at the Feet of Bhagavan
And we sing of Bhagavan, Shri Sathya Sai

Title: Narayana Veda Parayana
Lyrics:
Narayana Veda Parayana
Nava Nava Sundara Narayana [ Narayana Veda ... ]
Neeraja Shayana Narayana
Neeraja Lochana Narayana
Ghana Shyama Sundara Narayana
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayana (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! the author of Vedas! You are of ever renewing beauty Oh Narayana! You recline on the Lotus in the Ocean of milk You are lotus-eyed You have the beautiful form, with a blue color like the clouds, You are the Avatar or incarnation of this Kali age ( Sai ).
Songglossary: avatar, ghana, kali, lochana, narayana, nava, neeraja, parayana, sham, shayana, sundara, veda, yuga

Title: Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
Lyrics:
Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
Narayanam Sriman Narayanam [ Narayanam Bhaja ... ]
Tava Paada Charanam Narayanam
Shesha Shayanam Narayanam (Adi)
Narayanam Sriman Narayanam
Narayanam Sathya Narayanam
Narayanam Sai Narayanam
Meaning: Sing the glory of Narayana, the Lord of ultimate refuge He is Sathya Narayana or the Real form We surrender to your feet, Oh Narayana You recline on the cosmic serpent Adi Sesha!
Songglossary: adi, bhaja, chara, narayana, paada, sai, sathya, shayana, shesha, sriman, tava

Title: Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
Lyrics:
Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
Sathya Narayanam Shriman Narayanam
Pankaja Vilochanam Narayanam
Bhaktha Sankata Vimochanam Narayanam
Agnana Nashakam Narayanam
Sugnana Poshakam Narayanam
Karuna Payonidhi Narayanam
Bhaktha Sharanagatham Nithyam Narayanam
Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
Meaning: Chant the name of the lotus-eyed Lord Sathya Narayana (Sai, Vishnu), who dispels devotees' grief and suffering. He destroys ignorance (darkness) and bestows intelligence (knowledge). Let us devotees always surrender to this treasure house of compassion, Lord Sai.
Songglossary: agnana, bhaja, bhaktha, karuna, lochana, narayana, nasha, nithya, paave, pankaja, poshakam, sankata, sathya, sharan, sriman, sugnana, vimochana

Title: Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam (3)
Lyrics:
Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam (3)
Bhaja Mana Narayanam (3)
Bhaja Mana Bhaja Mana Narayanam
Meaning: Sing the glory of Narayana! Oh mind! Sing the name of Lord Narayana the abode of all beings.
Songglossary: bhaja, mana, narayana

Title: Narayani Namo Narayani Naada Svarupini
Lyrics:
Narayani Namo Narayani Naada Svarupini Narayani
Jagadodharini Narayani
Narayana Priya Manohari
Ambe Narayani Lakshmi Narayani
Sathya Narayani Sai Narayani
Meaning: Pay obeisance to the Mother Goddess, embodiment of sound (vibration), sustainer of the Universe, beautiful and beloved consort of Vishnu. She has presently incarnated as Sai.
Songglossary: amba, jagadodhara, lakshmi, manohar, naada, namo, narayana, narayani, priya, sai, sathya, swaroopa

Title: Narayani Veda Parayani
Lyrics:
Narayani Veda Parayani
Karunanta Ranjani Narayani [ Narayani Veda ... ]
Kamakshi Sundari Katyayani
Vani Saraswathi Vijayambikey
Vageshwari Vaagdevi Janani (2)
Karunya Lavanya Guna Shalini
Meaning: Oh Mother Parvathi! You are the sister of Narayana! You are the protector of all Vedas! You have other names like Kamakshi or the One with attractive eyes, You are Sundari or the beautiful One! You are Katyayani or the consort of Shiva! You are the Goddess of learning or Saraswathi, You are Vani the Goddess of art, You are the Mother responsible for oratory skills, You are endowed with qualities of compassion and beauty.
Songglossary: guna, janani, kamakshi, karuna, katyayani, lavanya, narayani, parayani, ranjani, saraswathi, shalini, soundari, vaagdevi, vageshwari, vani, veda, vijaya
