Title: Narthana Ganapathi Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Narthana Ganapathi Namo Namo
Naaga Bhushana Namo Namo
Yaksha Kinnara Gandharva Sevitha
Sowbhagya Dayaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Parti Vinayaka Namo Namo
Paapa Vinashaka Namo Namo (He)
Meaning: Bow to the dancing Lord Ganesha, adorned with a serpent. Worshipped by demi-Gods, He confers auspiciousness and removes sins. Lord Sai of Parthi is the embodiment of Lord Ganesha .
Songglossary: bhushan, dayaka, gananayaka, gandharva, kinnara, naga, namo, narthana, paapa, puttaparthi, sevita, siddhi, sowbhagya, vinasha, vinayaka, yaksha

Title: Nata Bhairavi Naada Svarupini
Lyrics:
Nata Bhairavi Naada Svarupini
Natajana Palini Narayani
Niraja Nayani Nikhiladharini
Nigamagama Sancharini
Neela Kantha Sai Hrdaya Nivasini [ Natajana Palini ... ]
Meaning: Mother Goddess Lakshmi, protector of the weak, and the embodiment of music (sound), is the lotus-eyed supporter of the Universe. The author of the Vedas, the Mother Goddess resides in our hearts as blue-necked Lord Sai Shiva.
Songglossary: bhairavi, hrudaya, kantha, naada, narayani, nata, natajana, nayan, neela, nigamagama, nikhiladharini, niraja, nivasi, palini, sai, sanchari, swaroopa

Title: Nata Nandana Ghana Sai Murari
Lyrics:
Nata Nandana Ghana Sai Murari
Shyama Manohara Bansi Dhari [ Nata Nandana ... ]
Mukunda Madhava Hey Giridhari
Raasa Vilola Kunja Vihari
Savari Surath Par Javun Balihaari
Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna! You are the divine dancing child! You destroyed the demon Mura You are the blue colored Lord of enchanting beauty, holding the flute You are the Lord of Liberation, the consort of Lakshmi, you lifted the mountain Govardhan You danced with the cowherd girls and played in Brindavan I am enchanted by your captivating dark colored form.
Songglossary: balihaari, bansi, dhari, ghana, giridhar, hey, javun, kunja, madhava, manohar, mukunda, murare, nanda, nata, par, raasa, sai, savari, sham, surath, vihar, vilola

Title: Natana Kaladhara Natana Manohara
Lyrics:
Natana Kaladhara Natana Manohara
Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shivakami Sundara Shiva Raja
Shiva Sai Shankara Shiva Raja
Meaning: We pray to Shiva who is the source of all dance forms, heartthrob of Parvathi. His dance form enchants one and all. Beautiful Shiva is none other than Sai who also used to dance charmingly giving joy to his devotees.
Songglossary: kaladhara, manohar, narthana, natana, nataraj, raja, sai, shankara, shiva, sundara

Title: Nataraja Hey Tripurari
Lyrics:
Nataraja Hey Tripurari
Jaya Hey Jaya Hey Shambho [ Nataraja Hey ... ]
Nandi Vahana Nagabharana
Phaala Lochana Parama Shiva
Pavana Charana Paahi Mahesha
Meaning: Hail Shiva, the destroyer of demon King Tripura. Victory to Lord Shiva who is revered as master of all dance forms, Nataraja. The celestial snakes adorn him as garlands and who rides Nandi, the great bull. We bow at his lotus feet seeking solace as he is the supreme form with the third eye who grants succor to the whole creation. We bow to Shankara who is also famously known as Mahesha.
Songglossary: chara, hey, jay, lochana, mahesha, nagabharana, nandi, nataraj, paahi, paalaya, param, pavan, shambho, shiva, tripura, vahana

Title: Nataraja Lord Of Dance Standing
Lyrics:
Nataraja, Lord Of Dance, Standing Before Us, Lord Divine
Shivaraja, King Eternally, O Cosmic Dancer Dance The Joy Of Life
Song Of Creation, Nataraja
Lord Of The Lingam, Shivaraja
Songglossary: linga, nataraj, shiva

Title: Nataraja Namami Shankara
Lyrics:
Nataraja Namami Shankara
Shiva Raja Shiva Shiva Shankara [ Nataraja Namami ... ]
Shirdi Pureeshwara Shiva Shankara
Parthi Pureeshwara Parameshwara
Hrudayeshwara Sayeeshwara
Meaning: We offer our humble salutations to Shankara who is the source of all dance forms. We pray to Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai, incarnations of Shiva. We pray to Sai who resides in the hearts of the devoted.
Songglossary: hrudayeshwara, namam, nataraj, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, raja, sayee, shankara, shirdi, shiva

Title: Nataraja Nataraja Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Lyrics:
Nataraja Nataraja Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shiva Raja Shiva Raja Shiva Tandava Priya Shiva Raja
Chidambaresha Nataraja
Parthi Pureesha Nataraja
Meaning: Salutations of the Lord of dance form, Nataraja. Lord Shiva, in his beautiful form as Nataraja, who enacts the enchanting cosmic dance known as Tandava. He thrills the whole universe. Lord Shiva who appears in his cosmic dance form at Chidambaram in Southern India. Nataraja has incarnated as our Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: chidambara, narthana, nataraj, priya, pureesha, puttaparthi, raja, shiva, sundara, tandava

Title: Nataraja Nataraja Natana Shekara Raja
Lyrics:
Nataraja Nataraja Natana Shekara Raja
Shiva Raja Shiva Raja Natana Shekara Raja
Shiva Shiva Namo Hara Hara Namo
Shankara Shiva Nataraja [ Nataraja Nataraja ... ]
Namah Parvathi Pathayey Hara (Om)
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Meaning: Glory to Shiva, the ultimate dancer, who mesmerizes one and all with his cosmic dance. Lord Shiva, who has no parallel to his dance and his dancing style. When his devotees sing his glory incessantly, he is enchanted. We bow to Shiva, the Lord of Parvathi, Hara Hara to bestow eternal bliss on his devotees.
Songglossary: hara, mahadev, namah, namo, natana, nataraj, om, parvathi, pathi, raja, shankara, shekara, shiva

Title: Nataraja Nataraja Natana Sundara Nataraja
Lyrics:
Nataraja Nataraja Natana Sundara Nataraja
Shivaraja Shivaraja Shivakami Priya Shivaraja
Chidambaresha Nataraja (Shiva)
Parti Purisha Shivaraja (Putta)
Meaning: Supreme dancer Lord Shiva, loving Lord of Parvathi, dwells in Chidambaram and in Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: chidambara, natana, nataraj, priya, pureesha, puttaparthi, shiva, sundara

Title: Natavara Giridhara Nandalala
Lyrics:
Natavara Giridhara Nandalala
Gopala Shyama Sundara [ Natavara Giridhara ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Surdas Ke Sada Krupala
Murali Manohara Radhey Gopala
Meaning: The dark-hued and beautiful Lord Krishna (Gopala), son of Nanda is the Lord of Meera and Surdas. Ever merciful, He likes to dance and play the flute.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gopal, ke, krupalu, manohar, meera, murali, nanda, natavara, prabhu, radha, sada, sham, sundara, surdas

Title: Natavara Giridhara Nandalala
Lyrics:
Natavara Giridhara Nandalala
Gopala Gopala [ Natavara ... ]
Govinda Govinda Gopala Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Nandalala Sai Nandalala
Meaning: The Lord of dance, the one who raised the mountain to protect his devotees, The darling son of Nanda, He is the protector of all beings, Gopala, also known as Govinda. Sing praises of the darling son of Nanda, who is none other than our beloved Sai.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, govinda, nanda, natavara, sai

Title: Natavara Krishna Natavara Krishna Radhey
Lyrics:
Natavara Krishna Natavara Krishna Radhey Nandalala
Harey Harey Madhava Harey Gopika Lola
Krishna Ghana Ghana Neela Krishna Gokula Bala
Harey Harey Madhava Hara Gopika Lola
Meaning: Pray to Krishna, the little prankster, who is the soul of Radha. Hey Madhava (Lord of Lakshmi)you are the enchanter of the Gopis of Brindavan. The hue of dark blue makes you the endearing child of Gokul. Hail Krishna who showered eternal bliss on the Gopis.
Songglossary: bala, ghana, gokul, gopi, hara, hari, krishna, lola, madhava, nanda, natavara, neela, radha

Title: Natavara Lal Giridhara Gopal
Lyrics:
Natavara Lal Giridhara Gopal
Meera Prabhu Ghana Shyama Gopal [ Natavara Lal ... ]
Veda Saara Jeevan Ka Aadhaar
Gopi Manohara Hrudaya Vihar
Meaning: Mischievous Krishna, the protector of Gokul, who lifted the Govardhan mountain, stole the pure hearts of Gopis. He is the Lord of Meera, whose heart was filled with pure love for the dark hued Gopala. He, whose name is the essence of all Vedas. He is also the life force (bulwark) for us. We bow to Gopal who always resides in the pure hearts of the cowherd, Gopis.
Songglossary: aadhaar, ghana, giridhar, gopal, gopi, hrudaya, jeeva, ka, lal, manohar, meera, natavara, prabhu, saara, sham, veda, vihar

Title: Natavara Naagara Hey Nandalala
Lyrics:
Natavara Naagara Hey Nandalala
Radha Lola Raasa Vilola [ Natavara Naagara ]
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Giridhara Bala Sai Gopala
Meaning: The darling son of Nanda, You are the one who enchants with his mischief. The soul of Radha, you are the one who enticed all Gopis with his dance. You are the one who enthralls with his flute, saviour of the righteous rishis. You are the Lord of Saint Meera, the child who lifted the mountain. You are Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gopal, hey, ke, lola, meera, munijana, murali, naagar, nanda, natavara, pala, prabhu, raasa, radha, sai, vilola

Title: Natavara Naagara Nanda Mukunda
Lyrics:
Natavara Naagara Nanda Mukunda
Brindavana Ghana Shyama Govinda
Radha Madhava Ananda Chanda
Sai Murari Satchidananda
Meaning: Krishna the embodiment of dance, is the darling son of Nanda, who grants liberation. The dark cloud hued protector of all beings, who lived in Brindavan. He shared the divine happiness with Radha. He is our Sai, bestowing truth, awareness and bliss and destroys any evil in us just as he annihilated Mura, the demon.
Songglossary: anand, brinda, chand, ghana, govinda, madhava, mukunda, murare, naagar, nanda, natavara, radha, sai, satchidananda, sham

Title: Natavara Natavara Nanda Kumara
Lyrics:
Natavara Natavara Nanda Kumara
Nanda Kumara Jaya Goparipala
Yaduvara Yaduvara Brinda Vihara
Brinda Vihara Jaya Parthi Vihara
Meaning: Hail the son of Nanda, who appears mischievous. Hail the son of Nanda who lovingly cares for all the cows. The jewel of the dynasty of Yadu, who strolls in Brindavan. Hail, Sai of Parthi, who also strolls as he did in Brindavan.
Songglossary: brinda, goparipala, jay, kumara, nanda, natavara, puttaparthi, vihar, yadu

Title: Navaneetha Chora Bala Gopal
Lyrics:
Navaneetha Chora Bala Gopal
Yashoda Nandana Krishna Gopal
Sai Gopal Sathya Sai Gopal
Sai Gopal Bhajo Murali Gopal
Meaning: Salutations to The Cowherd who stole butter and butter-like hearts of people of Gokul. Known as Krishna, a darling of mother Yashoda. Sing the glory of our Sai Krishna, who manifests everywhere through the music of HIS divine flute.
Songglossary: bala, bhaja, chora, gopal, krishna, murali, nanda, navaneetha, sai, sathya, yashoda

Title: Nayanon Mey Prem Dhar Vachanon
Lyrics:
Nayanon Mey Prem Dhar Vachanon Mey Amrutha Dhar
Sadguru Sai Mera Jeevan Ka Dhar
Nayanon Mey Prem Dhar Vachanon Mey Amrutha Dhar [ Sadguru Sai ]
Jeevan Ka Dhar Mera Jeevan Ka Dhar [ Sadguru Sai ]
Meaning: The embodiment of eternal and divine love, who fills our hearts with the nectarine wisdom (Amrut), showers compassionate love through merciful eyes and sweet and soothing words of wisdom. Guru of gurus Sai, You are the true support and eternal guide of my life.
Songglossary: amrutha, dhar, jeeva, ka, mera, nayan, prem, sadguru, sai, vachan

Title: Neela Megha Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Neela Megha Ghana Shyama
Murali Lola Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Shyama
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama
Sai Krishna He Giridhari
Sai Prabho He Nandalala
Surdas Ke Giridhari
Gopi Mohana Nandalala
Meaning: Sai is the dark-hued Lord Krishna, the divine flute player, Lord of Radha and Meera, the darling son of Nanda, Lord of Sudras (a devotee), and the delight of Gopis.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, gopi, ke, krishna, lola, madhava, meera, megha, mohan, murali, nanda, neela, prabhu, radha, sai, sham, surdas

Title: Neela Megha Shyama Govardhana Giridhari
Lyrics:
Neela Megha Shyama Govardhana Giridhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Brija Gopi Priya Nandana Raasa Vihari
Vana Mala Ghana Murali Bansidhari
Krishna Murari Natavara Naagara Shourie
Brindavan Sanchari Shyama ( Sai ) Murari
Meaning: Prayers to Krishna who is majestic like a dark blue cloud and could lift the Mount Govardhan, Destroyer of demon Mura to protect the saintly people. He verily resides in Parthi to uplift the mankind. In the land of Brij, he was dear to all Gopis and Gopalas. He engaged the Gopis in Raasa leela, having the garland of Tulasi, playing the divine flute, indulging in playful mischief, he made Brindavan a heaven on earth. He is none other than our beloved Sai Murari.
Songglossary: bansi, brija, brinda, ghana, giridhar, gopi, govardhan, krishna, mala, megha, murali, murare, naagar, nanda, natavara, neela, priya, puttaparthi, raasa, sai, sanchari, sham, shouri, vana, vihar

Title: Neela Megha Shyama Krishna Gopala Krishna
Lyrics:
Neela Megha Shyama Krishna Gopala Krishna
Radha Ramana Sathya Narayana
Vatapatra Shayana Sai Narayana (Neela Megha ...)

Manusha Veshadhari Sathya Narayana
Parthipuri Nayaka Sai Narayana
Meaning: Chant the name of dark-hued Lord Krishna, protector of cows and the beloved of Radha. Chant the name of Lord Sathya Narayana who reclines on the Vata leaf and who incarnated in human form. He is none other than our Sai who resides in Parthi.

Title: Neela Megha Shyamala Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Neela Megha Shyamala Ghana Shyama Sundara
Muralidhara Mana Mohana Sathya Sai Sundara
Jagat Karana Paripoorana Hey Sai Sundara
Shirdeeshwara Partheeshwara Sai Prem Mandira
Meaning: The beauty of the dark clouds reflects in immensely charming Krishna. The holder of the flute, the enchanter of the hearts, he is also our beautiful Sathya Sai. The cause and completeness of creation, is our beloved Sai. We offer our prayers to both Shirdi Sai and Parthi Sai to adorn our hearts.
Songglossary: ghana, hey, jagat, kaarana, mana, mandir, megha, mohan, murali, neela, paripoorana, partheeshwara, prem, sai, sathya, sham, shirdeesha, sundara

Title: Neela Megha Shyamala Roopa Gopala
Lyrics:
Neela Megha Shyamala Roopa Gopala
Nithyananda Swaroopa Sai Gopala
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Gopala [ Nithyananda Swaroopa.. ]
Meaning: Oh dark complexioned Lord Sai Gopala, you are the embodiment of eternal bliss, Oh son of Eshwaramba.
Songglossary: eshwar, gopal, megha, nanda, neela, nithya, roopa, sai, sham, swaroopa

Title: Neela Megha Shyamala Roopa Sai
Lyrics:
Neela Megha Shyamala Roopa Sai Gaana Lola Gokula Bala
Geeta Quran Bible Mey Tera Rang Hai
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Tera Roop Hai
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prem Sab Ko Diya
Hum Terey Charano Mey Sharan Liya (Baba)
Meaning: Sai, who loves bhajan songs, bestows the bliss as conferred upon Gopis by the dark-hued child of Gokula, Lord Krishna. All celestial books like Quran, Bible and Gita are filled with your hue. Even the trinity of Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara are your manifestations. You showered Truth, Right Conduct, Peace and Love on us to emulate by taking refuge at your lotus feet. Oh Baba, This surrender is our submission for redemption.
Songglossary: baba, bala, bible, brahma, chara, dharma, diya, gaan, geeta, gokul, hai, hum, ley, lola, maheshwara, megha, neela, prem, quran, rang, roopa, sab, sai, sathya, sham, shanthi, sharan, tera, vishnu

Title: Neela Varna Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Neela Varna Ghana Shyama
Murali Lola Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Shyama
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama
Sai Krishna Hey Giridhari
Sai Prabho Hey Nandalala
Surdas Ke Giridhari
Gopi Mohana Nandalala
Meaning: Krishna, who shines brilliantly in dark blue steals the hearts by the melodies from the divine flute, who is the dear Lord of Radha and Meera. The mighty one who lifted the Mount Govardhan has returned as Sai to redeem us as he did for the saints like Surdas and the devout Gopis. Let us pray for our redemption.
Songglossary: ghana, giridhar, gopi, hey, ke, krishna, lola, madhava, meera, mohan, murali, nanda, neela, prabhu, radha, sai, sham, surdas, varna

Title: Neelagriva Kumara
Lyrics:
Neelagriva Kumara
Bala Ganeshwara Gajanana
Mooladhara Nivasa
Paalaya Maam Prabho Partheeshwara
Meaning: Oh, Ganesha you are the son of Neelakanta, Mahadeva, You command all ganaas (army of Lord Shiva) You are the very base of the universe (also presiding deity of the Mooladhara Chakra). We offer our prayers to the Lord of Parthi to protect us at all times.
Songglossary: bala, gajamukha, gananatha, kumara, maam, moola, neela, nivasa, paalaya, partheeshwara, prabhu

Title: Neelakanta Gangadhara Hara Uma Pathey
Lyrics:
Neelakanta Gangadhara Hara Uma Pathey
Pralayankara Abhayankara Kailasapathey [ Neelakanta ... ]
Dama Dama Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey
Nataraja Manohara Tandava Nachey
Partheeshwara Parameshwara Jagadheesha Pathey
Meaning: Hail Shankara, bestower of auspiciousness, the Lord of Uma and whose abode is Kailasa. The blue-throated Lord Shiva protector of one and all, who swallowed the poison raised by the churning. Praise the Lord who took all suffering on Himself for the welfare of all beings. He helped Bhagirath to bring Ganges from heaven and in the process became Gangadhara. He grants bliss by playing the Damaru and performing the cosmic dance, Tandava. We bow to Shiva, Lord of the universe, who incarnated at Shirdi and at Parthi as our Sathya Sai. Prayers to Him to bless us all at all times.
Songglossary: abhaya, bajao, dama, damaru, ganga, hara, jagadeesha, kailasa, manohar, nach, nataraj, neela, param, partheeshwara, pathey, pralayankara, tandava, uma

Title: Neelakanta Mahadeva Gowri Vandana
Lyrics:
Neelakanta Mahadeva Gowri Vandana
Chandra Chooda Daya Natha Nandi Vahana
Samba Shiva Shooladhari Naga Bhooshana
Phaala Netra Uma Kantha Parama Pavana
Meaning: Oh, God of Gods, Mahadeva, the blue-throated one, you are worshipped by the divine mother Gowri. You are adorned with the moon on your tresses, You bless the Nandi (The great bull) as your vehicle. You are full of compassion. You carry the Trident and wear the Holy snakes as ornaments. With mother Uma as consort, adorned with the third eye, you are the purest of the Pure. Bless us all at all times.
Songglossary: bhooshan, chand, chooda, daya, gowri, kantha, mahadev, naga, nandi, natha, neela, nethra, paalaya, param, pavan, samba, shiva, shoola, uma, vahana, vandana

Title: Neeraja Shayana Narayana
Lyrics:
Neeraja Shayana Narayana
Neela Varna Hari Narayana
Shankha Chakra Hari Narayana
Padmadala Dhara Narayana
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Meaning: Offering prayers to Narayana, who reclines on the Lotus, He is Hari and Narayana with enchanting blue hue. He holds the Conch and Sudarshan (wheel of liberation) Disc to protect his devotees. Lotus garlands enhance his glory, resting on the snake Sesha. We bow to Sai, who is Narayana.
Songglossary: chakra, dhara, hari, hey, narayana, neela, neeraja, padma, sai, shankha, shayana, shesha, varna

Title: Nirakara Roopam Nirantam Ganesham
Lyrics:
Nirakara Roopam Nirantam Ganesham
Sada Sath Swaroopam Smarami Ganesham
Parabrahma Roopam Paramatma Roopam
Bhajami Mahesham Namami Suresham
Meaning: We offer prayers to the infinite, formless Lord Ganesha. We contemplate on him as he represents ultimate truth. He is the Great Brahman and the supreme soul. We pray to the master of celestial entities and sing His glory at all times.
Songglossary: bhaja, ganesha, mahesha, namam, nirakara, nirantara, parabrahma, param, roopa, sada, sat, smaran, suresham, swaroopa

Title: Niranjana Nara Roopa Dhara
Lyrics:
Niranjana Nara Roopa Dhara
Nirguna Gunamaya Sayeesha
Esha Jagadeesha Paramesha Sayeesha [ Niranjana Nara ... ]
Nirguna Gunamaya Sayeesha
Natha Jagannatha Deena Natha Sai Natha
Meaning: Blemishless Lord in human form. Lord Sai who is beyond attributes, as well as source of all attributes. He is the master of entire universe and beyond the universe. He is the refuge of downtrodden and the entire creation. We bow to Sai.
Songglossary: deen, dhara, esha, gunamaya, jagadeesha, jagan, nara, natha, niranjan, nirguna, param, roopa, sai, sayee

Title: Niranjani Sai Bhavani
Lyrics:
Niranjani Sai Bhavani
Jagat Janani Ananda Dayini [ Niranjani Sai ]
Durga Lakshmi Narayani
Sri Kamalasana Hamsa Vahini
Meaning: Salutations to the blemishless Mother Sai, the creator and bestower of life. The universal mother is the source of bliss divine. She is the combination of Durga (power) and Lakshmi (wealth), Narayani (all round welfare) and Hamsa vahini (Saraswathi - education), Kamalasana (Seated on the Lotus bloom). We bow to the mother who is everything for us.
Songglossary: anand, bhava, dayini, durga, hamsa, jagat, janani, kamala, lakshmi, narayani, niranjan, sai, sri, vahini

Title: Nirupama Guna Sadana Charana Neeraja
Lyrics:
Nirupama Guna Sadana Charana Neeraja Dala Nayana
Kashayambara Vesha Dharana Kali Yuga Avatara
Nithya Ranjana Nirmala Charitha Nirupama Yogendra
Maha Teja Nataraja Viraja Aasha Paasha Nasha Esha
Meaning: Swami has no parallel as he is the source of pure and auspicious traits. We take refuge at the lotus feet of the lotus eyed one. He represents sacrifice signified by the orange robe, which He adorns during this Kali age. Of ever-charming, blemishless character, He is the incomparable Lord of Yogis. He is Eshwara, the majestic Lord of dance, who grants us freedom from every kind of worldly attachment and desire.
Songglossary: aasha, avatar, chara, charitha, dala, dhara, esha, guna, kali, kashaya, maha, nasha, nataraj, nayan, neeraja, nirmala, nirupama, nithya, paasha, ranjana, sadana, teja, vesha, viraja, yogi, yuga

Title: Nithyanandam Satchidanandam
Lyrics:
Nithyanandam Satchidanandam
Hari Hari Hari Om Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana [ Hari Hari ]
Prema Swaroopa Premananda (2) [ Hari Hari ]
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Hari Hari ]
Meaning: The ever blissful Narayana, who is the embodiment of Truth, Awareness and bliss is also the sole source for constant integrated awareness. He is the embodiment of pure love, who alone can grant such a blissful state to His devotees when they pray to him as Hari and Narayana.
Songglossary: hari, narayana, nithya, om, prem, premananda, sai, satchidananda, swaroopa

Title: No One But You
Lyrics:
No One But You Can Fill Up My Heart with Love and Bliss
 With Love and Bliss, With Love and Bliss,
 O No One But You can Fill Up My Heart with Love and Bliss
 Sathya Sai Baba
 Dear Lord Sweet Lord, Please Do Come to Me
 Dear Lord Sweet Lord, Please Do Remember Me
 Dear Lord Sweet Lord, Please Do Set Me Free
 Dear Lord Please Come to Me

Title: No one is beyond His grace
Lyrics:
No one is beyond His grace, His divine love
 Sri Sathya Sai, Lord Sathya Sai
 Where people cry out to Him there He will be
 Sri Sathya Sai, Lord Sathya Sai
 He is the inner splendor in every living being
 Sri Sathya Sai, Lord Sathya Sai
 We are all separate beads strung on one thread
 Of Sri Sathya Sai, Lord Sathya Sai

Title: O Baba Sai Baba
Lyrics:
O Baba Sai Baba
Deenon Ke Dukha Harthey Baba [ O Baba ... ]
Ram Hi Baba Krishna Hi Baba
Nara Dehi Narayan Baba (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba! Kindly remove the miseries of the meek. You are none other than Lord Rama, Krishna and Narayana incarnated as Lord Sai Baba.
Songglossary: baba, deenon, dehi, dukh, hai, harana, ke, krishna, nara, narayana, ram, sai

Title: O Beloved Lord Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
O Beloved Lord Sathya Sai
Help Me Live In Love All My Life
In Every Single Thought, In Every Word I Speak, In Every ...
... Single Action Of My Life [ O Beloved ... ]
Let Your Love Fill My Heart And Shine On Through
Shining Brightly And True [ In Every ... ]
Songglossary: sai, sathya

Title: O Bhagavaan, hear, O Lord, my prayer
Lyrics:
O Bhagavaan, O Bhagavaan, hear, O Lord, my prayer, Sathya Sai Bhagavaan
 O glorious Lord Who dwells at Putttaparthi (1X)
 And in the heart and mind of each devotee (1X)
 Take me across this sea of illusion
 (Sathya) Sai Bhagavaan, O Sai Bhagavaan
 
 Sung to the tune of O Bhagavaan, O Bhagavaan, Araja Suno Merey Sai Bhagavaan

Title: O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Araj
Lyrics:
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Araj Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
Parthi Puri Ke Tum Ho Daata
Brindavan Ke Tum Ho Daata
Sab Bhakthon Ke Man Ko Bhata
Paar Utharo Naiya Morey
Sai Ghana Shyama Sai Ghana Shyama
Meaning: Oh Lord, hear my prayers my dear Sai. Oh Lord Sai Baba, You are the boon bestowing Lord of Parthi and Brindavan. You are the beloved of all devotees, enchanting their minds and hearts. Please help us cross this boat safely across the river of life, Oh Sai, the one having deep blue complexion.
Songglossary: araj, bhagawan, bhakthon, bhata, brindavan, daata, ghana, ho, ke, ko, man, mera, morey, naiya, paar, puri, puttaparthi, sab, sai, sham, suno, tum, utharo

Title: O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Araja
Lyrics:
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Araja Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
Parthipuri Ke Tum Ho Data
Brindavan Ke Tum Ho Data
Sab Bhakto Ke Man Ko Bhata
Par Utharo Naiya Mori
Sai Ghana Shyama Sai Ghana Shyama
Meaning: Lord Sai of Puttaparthi, is also the blue-complexioned Krishna, Lord of Brindavan, and the beloved of all devotees. I pray and urge You to help me cross the ocean of birth and death.
Songglossary: araj, bhagawan, bhakthon, bhata, brinda, daata, ghana, ho, ke, mana, mera, mori, naiya, par, puttaparthi, sab, sai, sham, suno, tum, utharo

Title: O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O
Lyrics:
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Baba Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Rama Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Krishna Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Shiva Sai Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Datta Bhagawan
Hara Bhagawan Hara Bhagawan Hara Bhagawan Hara Hara Bhagawan
Om Bhagawan Om Bhagawan Om Bhagawan Tat Sat Bhagawan
Prema Bhagawan Jyothi Bhagawan Atma Bhagawan Paramatma Bhagawan
Nanda Bhagawan Ananda Bhagawan Nithyananda Bhagawan Brahmananda Bhagawan
Ayodhya Bhagawan Dwaraka Bhagawan Shirdi Bhagawan Sri Parthi Bhagawan
Rammu Bhagawan Rammu Bhagawan Rammu Bhagawan Itu Rammu Bhagawan
Meaning: We bow to Bhagawan Baba who is the divine parent to all, who is the embodiment of truth, who grants love to one and all. Sai Rama, who pleases everyone and the saviour to the devotees and Sai Krishna who gives joy and protects all beings. We bow to Datta (the form of the Trinity). You are the Lord Shiva, You are the eternal Truth. You are the ever effulgent Atma, the Paramatma. You are the ever blissful son of Nanda, source of divine bliss. You are the Lord of Ayodhya and Dwaraka, having incarnated now at Parthi. Welcome to You, Bhagawan, hearty welcome to You, please come to me.
Songglossary: anand, atma, ayodhya, baba, bhagawan, brahma, datta, dwaraka, hara, itu, jyoth, krishna, nanda, nithya, om, param, prem, puttaparthi, ram, rammu, sai, sat, sathya, shirdi, shiva, sri, tat

Title: O Deva Deva Shri Sai
Lyrics:
O Deva Deva Shri Sai Baba
Karunintsu Mammu Kapada Vayya [ O Deva ... ]
Adharamaina Ni Pada Seva Kaligintsu Maaku O Deva Deva
Sathya Swaroopa Shri Sai Baba
Karunalavala Brovanga Rava
Meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, shower grace upon us and protect us. Give us opportunity to pray at your feet. Embodiment of Truth and Grace please come and take care of us.
Songglossary: adhar, baba, brovanga, deva, kaligintsu, kapada, karuna, maaku, mammu, ni, paada, raavo, sai, sathya, seva, sri, swaroopa, vayya

Title: O Holy Father Sai Baba
Lyrics:
O Holy Father Sai Baba
O Lord Divine Hallowed Be Thy Name
Make Us Your Childern Deserve Thy Grace
Lead Us To Thy Feet Baba O Lord [ O Holy ... ]
O Sweet Sai Gentle And So Loving
O Sweet Sai So Understanding
Lead Us Kindly Lead Us Gently
Lead Us To Thy Wonderland Of Love [ O Holy ... ]
Songglossary: baba, make, sai, so

Title: O Knowing Spirit within me
Lyrics:
O Knowing Spirit within me
 Teach me to see
 You are my own true Self for all eternity

Title: O Lord Almighty, Who is beyond time
Lyrics:
O Lord Almighty, Who is beyond time
 Supreme Teacher of all mankind
 You turn the world at Your command
 (Lord) You are the greatest Love of all
 O Lord, in my heart, Almighty Lord (5X)

Title: O Lord Purify Me
Lyrics:
O Lord, Purify Me And Make My Heart Worth Stealing
Our Precious Possession That Is Full Of Loving Feeling
Take Every Good Thought And Take Every Action
Soaked In The Sweetness Of Love And Compassion
GeneralComments: The tune is similar to the bhajan "Bada Chitha Chora".

Title: O Lord Take My Love
Lyrics:
O Lord, Take My Love, Let It Flow In Full Devotion To Thee
O Lord, Take My Hands, Let Them Work Unceasingly For Thee
O Lord, Take My Soul, Let It Merge In Perfect Oneness With Thee
O Lord, Take My Mind, Let My Thoughts Be In Tune With Thee
O Lord, Take My Everything, And Let Me Be An Instrument For Thee
Songglossary: tum

Title: O Lord, make the whole of my life
Lyrics:
O Lord, make the whole of my life
 As pure as the flame before me
 Let it consume itself in the fire
 Scattering light and the warmth of love to all around me
 At the end of it all, let there be nothing left (2X)
 To keep me from merging in You (2X)
 O Lord, make the whole of my life
 As pure as the flame before me

Title: O Loving Lord Of All
Lyrics:
O Loving Lord Of All The Worlds, Let Me Be Your Devotee
Your Divine Light Is All I Am, All I Can Ever Be
God Above Me, In And Of Me, All I Love Is Yours
Lord Above Me, In And Of Me, All I See Is Yours
Let Me Come Into Your Heart And Stay Forever More (Baba)
Songglossary: baba, more

Title: O Merey Swami Antaryami
Lyrics:
O Merey Swami Antaryami
Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai
Tu Merey Pitha Tu Hai Meri Mata
Tu Merey Bandhu Tu Merey Daata
Tu Merey Malik Main Tera Balak
Daya Karo Merey Sai Natha
Meaning: Kindle the light of wisdom in my heart. Oh indweller of hearts, Lord Sai! You are my father, mother, kith and kin and master and my sustainer. I am Thine. Oh my Lord Sai Ram.
Songglossary: antar, balak, bandhava, daata, daya, hai, jalao, jyoth, karo, malik, mata, mera, natha, pitha, sai, swami, tera, tum

Title: O My Beloved Bhagawan
Lyrics:
O My Beloved Bhagawan, O My Beloved Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan, Sathya Sai, My Bhagawan
You Are The Sky Above My Head, Your Are The Paths Where I'm Led
You Are The Beating Of My Heart, You Prevade My Every Part [ O My ... ]
You Are The Morning Sun I Greet, You Are The Food That I Eat
You Are The Water That I Drink, You Are The Holy Thoughts I Think
[ O My ... ]
You Are The Air That I Breathe, You Are My Sorrow When I Grieve
You Are The Joy That Lives Inside, You Are The Sacred Love That Hides [ O My ... ]
You Are My Ananda, You Are Prema Swarupa
You Are The Light Within My Soul, Holy Lord You Are My All [ O My ... ]
Songglossary: anand, bhagawan, prem, sai, sathya, sun

Title: O My Lord How I Look For Thee
Lyrics:
O My Lord, How I Look For Thee In Every Place
Compassion, Mercy And A Glance So Full Of Grace
Will You Grant These To Me, And Help Me Through The Life?
Help To Come To Thee, My Lord, Sathya Sai
O Sathya Sai
Speak To Me Words, O Lord, That Still My Monkey Mind
Beacon Of Righteousness And Love, My Sai, So Kind
Who Can I Turn To, Lord, When Life Is Such A Grind ?
Help Me To Come To Thee, My Lord, Sathya Sai
O Sathya Sai
Songglossary: sai, sathya, so

Title: O my Lord, You surely know
Lyrics:
O my Lord, You surely know I love You
 O my Lord, You surely know I need You
 Guard and guide me, O my Lord
 Night and day, O my Lord
 I am just Your child, my Lord
 Hold me in Your arms, my Lord
 Life, my Lord, is like an ocean deep and blue
 Storms may blow, but I will always cling to You
 Pain and joy are but a passing phase
 Till we merge, my Lord, I yearn for Your Grace

Title: O Nanda’s dear Child
Lyrics:
O Nanda's dear Child, give us Your blessing
 Yashoda's sweet Son, give us Your blessing
 O Nanda's dear Child, give us Your blessing (1X)
 Divine Dancing child, give us Your blessing
 Dear Lord of our hearts, give us Your blessing

Title: O Sai Baba Shirdi Sai
Lyrics:
O Sai Baba Shirdi Sai Baba
Parti Sai Baba Baba Prema Sai Baba
Guru Sai Baba Guru Brahma Sai Baba
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Mahadeva Baba
Meaning: Lord Sai of Shirdi is also Shirdi Sai and Prema Sai. He is Universal teacher and creator, protector, and destroyer.
Songglossary: baba, brahma, guru, mahadev, prem, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi, vishnu

Title: O Sai Baba Tava Suprabhatam
Lyrics:
O Sai Baba Tava Suprabhatam
Mangala Maya Baba Prathah Smaranam [ O Sai ... ]
Sathya Sanathana Tum Ho Baba
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Baba
Meaning: O Lord Sai, we greet You early at the break of dawn to remind ourselves of Your auspiciousness. You are the eternal truth, and You foster and love all religions and faiths.
Songglossary: baba, dharma, ho, mangal, maya, prathah, priya, sai, sanatana, sarva, sathya, smaran, suprabhatam, tava, tum

Title: O Sai Mera Sai
Lyrics:
O Sai Mera Sai
Mera Sai Pyaara Sai
Sai Baba Sai Baba
Sai Baba Tumhe Pranam
Tumhe Pranam Baba Tumhe Pranam (3)
Sai Baba Tumhe Pranam
Meaning: Salutations to my beloved Sai. I offer obeisance to Thee.
Songglossary: baba, mera, pranamami, pyaara, sai, tumhey

Title: O Sai, my Lord of Universe
Lyrics:
O Sai, my Lord of Universe (x3)
Walk beside me everyday, Lord of Compassion guides me on my way
Satya Sai my Lord of Truth, Prema Sai my Lord of Love
O Sai my Lord of Truth, O Sai my Lord of Love, O Sai my Lord of Peace
GeneralComments: The tune is similar to the bhajan "Hey Sai Jagannatha".

Title: O Swami, O Swami
Lyrics:
O Swami, O Swami, O Swami, Swami
 Your form is Love, your form is Love,
 your form is Love, Love, Love (O Swami)
 Sathya Dharma Shaanthi Prema, Sathya Dharma Shaanthi Prema
 Your form is Love, your form is Love,
 Your form is Love, Love, Love (O Swami)

Title: O Sweet Sathya Sai I love you
Lyrics:
O Sweet Sathya Sai I love you so
 You teach me everything I need to know
 Sathya Sai The works begun
 Let me be Your Hanuman
 In my lower self my love flows true
 In my higher self I merge with You
 Sathya Sai the work's begun
 Let me be Your Hanuman
 I cross the ocean just to serve Your Name
 The hairs on my body all repeat Sai Ram
 Sathya Sai the work's begun
 Let me be Your Hanuman

Title: O, my Lord is fine and lovely
Lyrics:
O, my Lord is fine and lovely
 With His dark and curly hair
 And the graceful way He walks about
 In the robe that He does wear
 And the gentle kindness of His face
 When you're seeing Him close by
 Has brought a tear of gratitude
 And joy to many an eye
 O, I love to sing His praises
 Yes, I love to say His name
 And to think about Him here on Earth
 And the reasons why He came
 Just to contemplate His powers grand
 His majesty and might
 And His vow to lead this world of ours
 From darkness into light
 O, the sense of sweet security
 To know He really cares
 That He watches over us ceaselessly
 And that He is everywhere
 And the gentle glow of blissful peace
 When you're feeling Him close by
 Will bring a tear of happiness
 For the love of Sathya Sai
 Will bring a tear of happiness
 For the love of Sathya Sai

Title: Oh God beautiful
Lyrics:
Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful
 At Thy feet oh I do bow.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful.
 In the forest Thou art green.
 In the mountain Thou art high.
 In the river Thou art restless.
 In the ocean Thou art great.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful
 At Thy feet oh I do bow.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful.
 To the serviceful Thou art service.
 To the bhakta Thou art Love.
 To the sorrowful Thou art sympathy.
 To the yogi Thou art bliss.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful
 At Thy feet oh I do bow.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful.
 To the Hindu Thou art Krishna.
 To the Buddhist Thou art Buddha.
 To the Christian Thou art Jesus.
 Now on the earth as Sai Baba.

Title: Oh Lord take my life
Lyrics:
Oh Lord take my life
Take it all, take it all in Your hands
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Oh Lord take my love
Take it all, take it all in Your hands
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Oh Lord take my actions
Take them all, take them all in Your hands
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Oh Lord take my heart
Take it all, take it all in Your hands
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Title: Oh Sai Oh Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Oh Sai Oh Sai Oh Sai Baba
Oh Sai Oh Sai Oh Sai Baba
Anata To Tomoni Warai, Anata To Tomoni Utau
Anata Wa Watashi No Subete, Anata To Tomoni Ikiru
(Fast Only)
Oo Sai Oo Sai Oo Sai Baba
Meaning:
Oh Sai, Oh Sai, Oh Sai Baba,
I laugh (be happy) with you, I sing with you.
You are my everything, I live with you.

Title: Oh Senor Ganesha!
Lyrics:
Oh Senor Ganesha!
Oh Senor de fuerza
Ayudame a llegar al Atma
Ayudame a volar en Dharma
Oh Senor de Parthi!
Sosten del Universo
Convierte las cadenas de mi Karma, en suaves espirales de
Ananda
Meaning: Oh the all-powerful Lord Ganesh, help me attain the Atma, help me fly in Dharma. Oh Lord of Parthi, sustainer of the Universe, transform the chains of my karma into soft spirals of Bliss.
Songglossary: anand, atma, dharma, ganesha, karma, puttaparthi

Title: Oh when the saints
Lyrics:
Oh when the saints, go marching in,
 Oh when the saints go marching in
 Oh how I want to be in that number,
 when the saints go marching in
 Oh on that Hallelujah day, O on that Hallelujah day,
 Oh how I want to be in that number, on that Hallelujah day [Oh when the saints.]
 Oh when they crown Him King of Kings,
 Oh when they crown Him King of Kings
 Oh how I want to be in that number,
 when they crown Him King of Kings

Title: Om beautiful God, Halleluiah
Lyrics:
Om beautiful God, Halleluiah
 Beautiful God, Halleluiah
 Beautiful God, Halleluiah Om
 Sathya Sai Baba Halleluiah...
 (Om) Narayana Halleluiah...
 (Sai) Keshava Halleluiah...
 (Lord) Jesus Christ Halleluiah...
 Great) Jehovah Halleluiah...
 Heavenly Father Halleluiah...
 Divine Mother Halleluiah...
 Holy Ghost Halleluiah...
 Allah (el) Allah Halleluiah...
 Perfect Brahma Halleluiah...
 Beautiful Vishnu Halleluiah...
 Mighty Lord Shiva Halleluiah...
 Hare Rama Halleluiah...
 Hare Krishna Halleluiah...
 Sweet Lord Buddha Halleluiah...
 (Om) Beautiful God Halleluiah...

Title: Om Bhagavaan, Jai Bhagavaan
Lyrics:
Om Bhagavaan, Jai Bhagavaan, Sri Bhagavaan
 Peace Bhagavaan, Love Bhagavaan, Truth Bhagavaan Om Bhagavaan
 Om Bhagavaan, Jai Bhagavaan, Sri Bhagavaan
 Love Bhagavaan, Compassion Bhagavaan, Forgiveness Bhagavaan Om Bhagavaan

Title: Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai
Lyrics: Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Namah (7)
Meaning: Let us bow and chant the glory of Sathya Sai Baba in all aspects. OM, which is the primordial sound, Bhagawan - who possesses excellence in the SIXTEEN (only Krishna in Dwapara Age was supposed to have had) attributes in full splendour. Now, Sai. Shri, which represents prosperity, Sathya the embodiment of truth.
Songglossary: babaya, bhagawan, namah, om, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Nama Om (4)
Tu Hai Sakala Jagat Ke Swami
Tu Hai Merey Ma Baap Bhaiyya
Tu Hai Merey Sai Baba
Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Nama Om
Meaning: We bow down to Lord Sathya Sai Baba. You are the Lord of the entire Universe. You are my mother, father and brother, You are my Lord, my Sai Baba. My salutations to You.
Songglossary: baap, baba, babaya, bhagawan, bhai, hai, jagat, ke, ma, mera, naam, om, sai, sakala, sathya, sri, swami, tum

Title: Om Dattatreya Sai Dattatreya
Lyrics:
Om Dattatreya Sai Dattatreya, to Thee I surrender my soul
 To Thee I surrender my soul
 There's no other way, illusion's the play
 To Thee I surrender my soul
 To Thee I surrender, to Thee I surrender, to Thee I surrender my soul
 The battle is done, my soul You have won, to Thee I surrender my soul
 To Thee I surrender, to Thee I surrender, to Thee I surrender my soul
 Om Dattatreya Sai Dattatreya to Thee I surrender my soul

Title: Om Ennum Pranava Roopa Nayaka
Lyrics:
Om Ennum Pranava Roopa Nayaka
Umayavalin Balane Vinayaka
Devar Muvar Potrum Veda Nayaka
Devadi Devane Vinayaka
Valvinaigal Nikkum Parti Nayaka
Vendum Varam Tandidum Vinayaka
Mounathin Muzhu Porule Nayaka
Mukkannan Maindane Vinayaka
Meaning: Lord Vinayaka, you are the embodiment of Om. O son of Uma and Shiva, praised by the trinity of gods, You are Lord of Lords and author of the Vedas. O Lord of Parthi You remove all our sins. O Lord Vinayaka, You grant all boons and You are the true meaning of all meditation.
Songglossary: bala, deivam, devadi, ennum, maindane, mounathin, mukkannan, muvar, muzhu, nayaka, nikkida, om, porule, potri, pranava, puttaparthi, roopa, tandidum, uma, varam, veda, vendum, vinai, vinayaka

Title: Om Ganesha Vighnesha Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Om Ganesha Vighnesha Namo Namo
Sri Sathya Sayeesha Namo Namo (Om) [ Om Ganesha ... ]
Vidya Buddhi Aur Siddhi Pradatha
Shiva Shivani Sutha Kumara Bhrata
Partheesha Paramesha Namo Namo (Om) [ (Om) Sri Sathya ]
Meaning: Hail the Lord Ganesha, who removes all obstacles. We pray to Sathya Sai who upholds human values to grant all round welfare to the humanity. He is bestower of education, intelligence and success. He is the son of Shiva and Parvathi, He is the brother of Subrahmanya. Our salutations to him, who is the Lord of Parthi, the greatest Lord.
Songglossary: aur, bhrata, buddhi, ganesha, kumara, namo, om, param, partheeshwara, pradatha, sathya, sayee, shiva, siddhi, sri, sutha, vidya, vighnesha

Title: Om Guru Natha Jai Guru
Lyrics:
Om Guru Natha Jai Guru Natha Sadguru Natha Om
Om Guru Natha Jai Guru Natha
Sadguru Natha Om
Meaning: Salutations to the primordial sound, OM (Aum) which is our Guru, our Lord, who is the Guru of Gurus.
Songglossary: guru, jai, natha, om, sadguru

Title: Om Guru Natha Jaya Guru
Lyrics:
Om Guru Natha Jaya Guru Natha
Omkareshwara Shiva Guru Natha [ Om Guru ]
Sadguru Natha Sathya Sai Natha
Parthi Pureeshwara Harey Guru ( Sai ) Natha
Meaning: Meditate on the primordial sound 'OM' (AUM) representing the Parabrahman (the Supreme force). Fortunate are those who have Sai as their preceptor. Let us pray to HIM to guide us to salvation.
Songglossary: guru, hari, jay, natha, om, omkareshwara, purishwara, puttaparthi, sadguru, sai, sathya, shiva

Title: Om Hara Hara Hara Hara
Lyrics:
Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Uma Maheshwara
Gowri Shankara Namah Om
Ksheerabhisheka Priya Shiva Shiva Shambho
Sayeeshwara Namah Om
Shiva Shaktheeshwaraya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Meaning: I pray to the Lord Shiva, Lord of Uma (Parvathi). He is the bestower of auspiciousness and good, the Lord of Gowri. The Lord Shiva who loves to be bathed in milk (abhisheka), Who has now taken the form of Lord Sai, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi.
Songglossary: gowri, hara, ksheerabhisheka, maheshwara, namah, om, priya, sayee, shaktheeshwara, shambho, shankara, shiva, uma

Title: Om Hari Om Hari Om
Lyrics:
Om Hari Om Hari Om Bhajorey Sada Om Hari Om Hari Om
Sai Narayana Hari Om (2)
Sathyanarayana Hari Om (2)
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Om (2)
Sai (Sathya) Narayana Hari Om
Meaning: Chant continuously the divine name, Om Hari That is our Sai Narayana, abode of all beings. He is the liberator, Sathya Narayana, the one True Lord.
Songglossary: bhajao, hari, narayana, om, sada, sai, sathya

Title: Om Jaganmaathey Maathey Jaya Om
Lyrics:
Om Jaganmaathey Maathey Jaya Om (2)
Sai Mata Jaya Om
Meaning: We bow down to the Universal mother Sai, who is the mother of the whole universe. We offer our salutations in humility to the divine mother, Sai.
Songglossary: jagan, jay, mata, matha, om, sai

Title: Om Jagat Janani Sai Mata
Lyrics:
Om Jagat Janani Sai Mata
Omkara Roopini Sai Mata [ Om Jaga ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Mata
Sai Mata Sathya Sai Mata [ Abhaya Pradayini ]
Anatha Rakshaki Sai Mata (2)
Meaning: Oh Mother of the Universe, Sai. Your form is the Pranava, Mother Sai. You are the destroyer of fear and the protector of the forlorn. Mother of the Universe Sai, we offer our prayers to you who grants universal protection to the underprivileged, destitute and deprived.
Songglossary: abhaya, anath, dayini, jagat, janani, mata, om, raksha, sai, sathya, swaroopa

Title: Om Jai Jai Guru Sai
Lyrics:
Om Jai Jai Guru Sai Mukunda
Sai Mukunda Sai Mukunda [ Om Jai ... ]
Satchidananda Ananda Chanda
Devaki Nanda Paramananda
Meaning: Glory and victory to Divine Guide, Lord Sai Mukunda, the bestower of liberation (Mukti) who is embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss. Prince Mukunda is the darling son of (mother) Devaki and (father) Nanda. He is the eternally blissful Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: anand, chand, devaki, guru, jai, mukunda, nanda, om, param, sai, satchidananda

Title: Om Muruga Jaya Muruga
Lyrics:
Om Muruga Jaya Muruga
Va Muruga Vadivel Azhaga
Shakthi Vadivela Sai Muruga
Sharavana Bhava Guha Sai Muruga
Meaning: We offer our prayers to Karthikeya, son of Shiva and Parvathi who is also knows as Subrahmanya and Muruga. He is powerful as he is the Commander in chief of the army of Deities. He who holds the powerful spear of liberation (vadivela), is offered prayers to grant peace and protect us from mortal worries. We surrender to the worshipful Sai Muruga, who dwells in the cave (Guha) of our heart.
GeneralComments: This song also has an alternative tune: Om Muruga Om Muruga.
Songglossary: azhaga, bhava, guha, jay, om, sai, shakthi, sharavana, subramanya, va, vadivel

Title: Om Muruga Jaya Om Muruga
Lyrics:
Om Muruga Jaya Om Muruga
Hara Hara Shanmukha Shiva Shakthi Bala [ Om Muruga ... ]
Om Sharavana Bhava Vela Muruga
Vela Muruga Vela Muruga [ Om Sharavana ]
Bhaktha Mandara Sathya Sai Muruga
Meaning: Hail Muruga, the Six-faced Lord, son of Shiva and Shakthi. We surrender to him as he destroys ill effects of our earthly activities and grants us welfare by his powerful weapon, Vel (spear). He has come as the bestower of Happiness, Sathya Sai, for his devotees.
Songglossary: bala, bhaktha, bhava, hara, jay, manda, om, sai, sathya, shakthi, shanmukha, sharavana, shiva, subramanya, vela

Title: Om Muruga Om Muruga
Lyrics:
Om Muruga Om Muruga
Va Muruga Vadivel Azhaga
Shakthi Vadivela Sai Muruga
Sharavana Bhava Guha Sai Muruga
Meaning: We offer our prayers to Karthikeya, son of Shiva and Parvathi who is also knows as Subrahmanya and Muruga. He is powerful as he is the Commander in chief of the army of Deities. He who holds the powerful spear of liberation (vadivela), is offered prayers to grant peace and protect us from mortal worries. We surrender to the worshipful Sai Muruga, who dwells in the cave (Guha) of our heart.
GeneralComments: This song also has an alternative tune: Om Muruga Jaya Muruga.

Title: Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om
Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om
Shaileshwaraya Namah Om
Gowri Varaya Namah Om
Neelakantaya Namah Om
Mruthyunjaya Namah Om
Lingeshwaraya Namah Om
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om (Sathya)
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Meaning: Meditate on Shankara, the supreme deity. He is the Lord of Srisailam and Kailasa, whose consort is Mother Gowri. He saved the universe by swallowing the 'haalaa-hala' poison (which rested in his throat turning it blue), Who grants us the power to overcome the fear of death. He manifests in the Linga form. Oh Sai Shankara! Protect us and bless us.
Songglossary: gowri, lingeshwara, mruthyu, namah, neela, om, sathya, sayee, shaileshwara, shiva, varaya

Title: Om Namah Shivaya Namo Narayana
Lyrics: Om Namah Shivaya Namo Narayana (4)
Meaning: Chant the sacred mantra, Om Nama Shivaya; Chant the sacred name Narayana and bow in reverence and humility.
Songglossary: namah, namo, narayana, om, shiva

Title: Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah
Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om Namah Om
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Vara
Kailasa Nathaya Namah Om
Gangotri Vasa Sri Sai Natha [ Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om ... ]
Meaning: Chant the mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya', (I bow to Lord Shiva) who is the embodiment of Auspiciousness, Health and Prosperity. He, the beloved of Gowri, with the Ganga in his tresses. We bow down to Him, who is the Lord of Kailasa, who resides in Gangotri (origin of Ganga in Himalayas); He is verily our Lord Sainath.
Songglossary: ganga, gangotri, gowri, hara, kailasa, namah, natha, om, sai, shiva, sri, vara, vasa

Title: Om Namah Shivaya Om Namo
Lyrics: Om Namah Shivaya Om Namo Narayanaya (4)
Meaning: Chant the mantras 'Om Namah Shivaya' and 'Om Namo Narayanaya'
Songglossary: namah, namo, narayana, om, shiva

Title: Om Namah Shivaya Shiva Shambho
Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Shiva Shambho
Gangadharaya Hara Shambho
Shambho Shiva Shiva ( Hara Hara ) Shambho
Shambho Hara Hara Shambho
Chidanandamaya Shambho (Satchidananda)
Nirakara Roopa Shiva Shambho
Hey Nirvana Daata Sai Shambho
Hey Shirdi Sai Shambho
Hey Parthi Baba Shambho [ Chidanandamaya ]
Meaning: We offer our prayerful salutations to Lord Shiva. He is the embodiment of Supreme bliss, though supporting the turbulent Ganges in his matted hair. He is the ever-blissful, formless form, who bestows Nirvana (enlightenment), who is our Lord Sai Shambho.
Songglossary: baba, chidananda, daata, ganga, hara, hey, namah, nirakara, nirvana, om, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, satchidananda, shambho, shirdi, shiva

Title: Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah
Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Meaning: Chant the mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya' - I bow down to Lord Shiva, the bestower of Liberation.
Songglossary: namah, om, shiva

Title: Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah
Lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Mahadeva Hara Hara Mahadeva [ Om Namah ... ]
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baajey
Dhimithaka Dhimithaka Mrudanga Baajey [ Hara Hara ]
Meaning: Chant the mantra "Om Namah Shivaya". I bow down to Lord Shiva, who confers auspiciousness, who is also Hara, who destroys the evil. He is the Great God - Mahadeva, the destroyer of evil, who plays the hand-held drum, Damaru, while the percussion instrument, Mrudanga, keeps the beat, as He dances the cosmic dance.
Songglossary: baaje, dama, damaru, dhimithaka, hara, mahadev, mrudanga, namah, om, shiva

Title: Om Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya
Lyrics:
Om Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya
Hari Om Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya [ Om Namo ... ]
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namo Narayanaya (2) [ Hari Om Namo ]
Meaning: I bow down to Thee, Oh Lord Krishna! Son of Vasudeva. I bow down to Lord Shiva, to Lord Narayana. Adoration to the Lord Vishnu and Lord Shiva, who abide and shine in all beings and is one with Om (Vishnu). Om- Sound symbol of the creator and creation. I bow down to Vasudeva who is the Lord of the Bhagawatha.
Songglossary: bhagawathey, hari, namah, namo, narayana, om, shiva, vasudeva

Title: Om Namo Namah Om Namah
Lyrics:
Om Namo Namah Om Namah Om (2)
Sundaraya Namah Om Sura Vandithaya Namah Om
Madhavaya Namah Om Madhusudhanaya Namah Om
Eshwaraya Namah Om Jagadeeshwaraya Namah Om
Karanaya Namah Om
Narayanaya Namah Om
Meaning: Bow in reverence to Lord Sai, the creator, worshipped by the virtuous as Madhava, Ishwara and also as Lord of the Universe Narayana.
Songglossary: eshwar, jagadeesha, kaarana, madhava, madhu, namah, namo, narayana, om, sundara, sura, vanditha

Title: Om Namo Namah Om Namah
Lyrics:
Om Namo Namah Om Namah Om (2)
Achyuthaya Namah Om Sri Ananthaya Namah Om
Sundaraya Namah Om Sura Vandithaya Namah Om
Madhavaya Namah Om Madhusudhanaya Namah Om
Kaaranaya Namah Om Narayanaya Namah Om
Ramaya Namah Om Krishnaya Namah Om (3)
Meaning: Bow to him in reverence and humility, revere him as he is the source of beauty, The un-decaying, Infinite, beautiful one who is adored by the pious. The Lord of Lakshmi, who killed the demon 'Madhu'. The primal Cause, who indwells in all beings, Bow to him in reverence and humility. Prayerful salutations to OM, the Pranava. We offer salutations to Rama and Krishna, the avatars of Narayana.
Songglossary: achyutha, ananta, kaara, krishna, madhava, madhu, namah, namo, narayana, om, ramaya, sri, sundara, sura, vanditha

Title: Om Namo Narayana Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Om Namo Narayana Namo Namo Narayana
Namo Namo Narayana Namo Lakshmi Narayana
Namo Lakshmi Narayana Namo Sathya Narayana
Namo Sathya Narayana Namo Sai Narayana
Meaning: That supreme is offered prayers as Lakshmi Narayana (Lord of Lakshmi) as well as Sathya Narayana (The Absolute Reality).
Songglossary: lakshmi, namo, narayana, om, sai, sathya

Title: Om Namo Narayanaya Om Namo
Lyrics: Om Namo Narayanaya Om Namo Namo (8)
Meaning: I bow to the Lord who is the indweller of all beings.
Songglossary: namo, narayana, om

Title: Om Om Listen to the sound of Om
Lyrics:
Om Om Listen to the sound of Om
 Ah, come to me Lord
 Ah, Lord, come to me
 Ooo where are You?
 Ooo where can You be?
 Mmm, Mmm, I have found You; Lord, right in side of me.

Title: Om Sai Baba Jai
Lyrics:
Om Sai Baba Jai, Om Sai Baba Jai
 You are endless, You are Boundless, You are everywhere
 You're living in my heart
 I'm living in Your Bliss
 So we live together, so we live together

Title: Om Sai Om Narayana
Lyrics:
Om Sai Om Narayana Oh My Sweet Lord
Due To Some Good Karma Sai, I Have Come To Thee
Let The Vibhuti Of Love Flow Sai, Between You And Me [ Om Sai ... ]
We Try To Be What You Want Us To Be So Guide Us Merciful Lord
Work On Us, Be Kind To Us, Show Us The Right Path [ Om Sai ... ]
Songglossary: karma, narayana, om, sai, so, vibhuti

Title: Om Sai Ram, as we waken to Thee
Lyrics:
Om Sai Ram, as we waken to Thee the sun will rise
 O Love divine, sleeping within our hearts, the sun will shine
 (The gentle) turning of the season brings Your Voice upon the breeze
 (O love) the chanting of Your memory sings whispers through the leaves
 I hear Your Voice within me calling, with every leaf and raindrop falling
 I hear Your Voice within me calling, with every newborn baby crying
 O God of all, we seek You in everything and everywhere

Title: Om Sai Rama Om
Lyrics:
Om Sai Rama Om
 Om Sai Krishna Om
 Om Sai Allah Om
 Om Sai Buddha Om
 Om Sai Mazda Om
 Om Sai Jesus Om
 Om Sai Baba Om
 Om Sai Baba Om

Title: Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
Lyrics:
Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
Gayathri Savitri Saraswathi Om
Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
Gayathri Savitri Saraswathi Om
Meaning: The Mother Goddess is personification of Shakti (power) which pervades the Creation. She is revered as power of the Sun (Savitri), the bestower of wisdom (Saraswathi) and Mother Gayathri, who is the personification of Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi.
Songglossary: gayathri, om, saraswathi, savitri, shakthi

Title: Om Shakti Om Shakti Om
Lyrics:
Om Shakti Om Shakti Om Shakti Om
Brahma Shakti Vishnu Shakti Shiva Shakti Om [ Om Shakti ... ]
Ichcha Shakti Kriya Shakti Gnana Shakti Om [ Om Shakti ... ]
Karta Shakti Akarta Shakti Vyom Shakti Om [ Om Shakti ... ]
Adi Shakti Para Shakti Maha Shakti Om [ Om Shakti ... ]
Shirdi Shakti Sai Shakti Sathya Shakti Om
Meaning: Shakti is the power behind the three worlds. It is creative, sustaining, and destructive power inherent in Brahma, Vishnu, and Shiva. It is also the power of action and inaction, of divine will and of truth. All pervading, primeval and unlimited, it is the inherent power of Sai of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: adi, akarta, brahma, gnana, ichcha, karo, kriya, maha, om, para, sai, sathya, shakthi, shirdi, shiva, vishnu

Title: Om Shiva Om Shiva Parathpara
Lyrics:
Om Shiva Om Shiva Parathpara Shiva
Omkar Atmaka Tava Sharanam
Namami Shankara Bhavani Shankara
Uma Maheshwara Tava Sharanam
Meaning: Bow to Lord Shiva and take refuge in Him. He is the primeval power and Lord of Uma (Parvathi)
Songglossary: atmaka, bhava, maheshwara, namam, om, parathpara, shankara, sharan, shiva, tava, uma

Title: Om Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa
Lyrics:
Om Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa
Om Shiva Shankara Roopa
Om Sathya Sai Swaroopa
Meaning: We offer our humble salutations to Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Shiva and Shakti (Father and mother forms of universal parenthood). Offer prayers with Omkara to Shankara and Shakti for self-realization.
Songglossary: om, roopa, sai, sathya, shakthi, shankara, shiva, swaroopa

Title: Om Shiva Shambho Jaya Shiva
Lyrics:
Om Shiva Shambho Jaya Shiva Shambho
Bhava Bhaya Hari Hey Tripurari [ Om Shiva ... ]
Hey Girija Pathi Gangadhari
Hara Hara Shambho Hey Shiva Shambho
Samba Sadashiva Sai Maheshwara
Meaning: Victory to Lord Shiva, Shambho, Tripurari (destroyer of three cities), Girija Pathey (The Lord of Girija), Ganga Dhari (bearer of the holy Ganges), Samba Sada Shiva and Sai Maheshwara (the Highest Godhood).
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, ganga, girija, hara, hari, hey, jay, maheshwara, om, pathi, sadashiva, sai, samba, shambho, shiva, tripura

Title: Om Shiva Shiva Hara Hara
Lyrics:
Om Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Shankara
Trishooladhara Trinetradhara [ Om Shiva ... ]
Shambho Shankara Samba Shiva
Kailasa Vasa Gangadhara
Saishwara Sarveshwara He Jagadeeshwara
Meaning: Lord Shiva, the embodiment of Om, carries a trident, and resides in Kailasa mountains. The Lord with the eye of wisdom bearing the Holy Ganges, is the Lord of the Universe. He is Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: ganga, hara, jagadeesha, kailasa, om, saiyeeshwara, samba, sarvesha, shambho, shankara, shiva, trinetra, trishoola, vasa

Title: Om Shivaya Om Shivaya
Lyrics:
Om Shivaya Om Shivaya
Shambho Shankara Om Shivaya (3)
Meaning: Bow down to Thee, who gives happiness and prosperity, bestower of good. We offer humble prayers to Shankara who grants auspiciousness and Shiva who grants sustenance to be submerged in universal consciousness.
Songglossary: om, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Om Shivaya Om Shivaya Om
Lyrics:
Om Shivaya Om Shivaya Om Shivaya
Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Hey
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Hey [ Om Shivaya ... ]
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baajey
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bhajey
Jhanaka Jhanaka Jhan Payal Baajey Kailasa Vasa Uma Pathey
Trishoola Uma Pathey Trinetra Gowri Pathey (2)
Meaning: Chant the mantra " Om Shivaya". Chant the name of the Lord of Uma, Resident of Kailasa (pure hearts), Holder of the Trishoola (Trident), the Three-Eyed One, Lord Shiva. Lord Shiva, who enjoys the cosmic dance along with the rhythm of the Damaru (small drum) and the sound of bells.
Songglossary: baaje, bhaja, dama, damaru, ghana, ghanta, gowri, hara, hey, jay, jhan, jhanaka, kailasa, om, pathey, payal, sadashiva, samba, shambho, shankara, shiva, trinetra, trishoola, uma, vasa

Title: Om Sri Bhagawan Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Om Sri Bhagawan Namo Namo
Deena Dayala Parama Krupala [ Om Sri ... ]
Namo Narayana Prashanthi Vasa
Mahaanubhava Devadi Deva
Meaning: We offer prayerful regards to Bhagawan, who is compassionate to the downtrodden and protects us with highest degree of grace. He is greatest of great celestial beings, verily the Lord Narayana, who has come as the Lord of Parthi, to whom we offer our prayers.
Songglossary: bhagawan, dayal, deen, deva, devadi, krupalu, mahanubhava, namo, narayana, om, param, prashanthi, sri, vasa

Title: Om Sri Ram Jai Ram
Lyrics:
Om Sri Ram Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram (4)
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Ram
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita and Shyam, the beloved of Radha. Chant the name of the Lord Sri Rama, Sita Ram and Radhey Shyam.
Songglossary: jai, om, radha, ram, sham, sita, sri

Title: Om Tat Sat
Lyrics:
Om Tat Sat Sri Narayana Tu
Purushothama Guru Tu
Siddha Buddha Tu, Skanda Vinayaka
Savita Pavaka Tu, Savita Pavaka Tu

Brahma Madhya Tu, Yahva Shakthi Tu
Yeshu Pitha Prabhu Tu
Rudra Vishnu Tu, Ramakrishna Tu
Rahim Tao Tu, Rahim Tao Tu

Vasudeva Go Viswa Roopa Tu
Chidananda Hari Tu
Advitiya Tu Akala Nirbhaya
Atma Linga Siva Tu (Sai) (x 3)
Meaning:
Om, Thou art that, You are Narayana, God in the form of man; You are the embodiment of perfection and the perfect teacher.
 
You are the enlightened Buddha; You are Subramanya and Ganesha, the remover of obstacles; You are the Sun-fire that destroys the darkness of ignorance.
 
You are Brahma, the Creator; Mazda, the Great One. You are Jehovah, and Divine Mother, the creative Energy. You are the Father of Jesus.
 
You are Rudra, the Transformer, and Vishnu, the Preserver; You are Rama and Krishna; You are Rahim, all kindness, always giving and expanding; You are the Tao.
 
You are Vasudeva, the Sustenance of all, omnipotent and omnipresent; You are Hari, destroyer of illusion, the blissful Spirit.
 
You are unparallelled and one without a second, beyond time and fearless of adversities; You are Shiva, the atma lingam, symbol of the formless Absolute.

Continuous chanting of His name destroys ill effects of all sins committed by us. The touch of his Lotus Feet redeems us to lead a spiritual and purposeful life and become an example.

Title: Omkaram
Lyrics:
Bhagawan advices starting the day with Omkaram chanting - OM (x 21). He further enunciates:
The Pranava (primeval sound OM) recital is one form of such spiritual effort. It is laid down at Prashaanthi Nilayam that the early dawn recital of Om should be done twenty one times. This number is not arbitrarily fixed; it has a significance of its own. We have the five karmendhriyas (senses of action) and the five jnaanendhriyas (senses of perception); we have also praanas (the five vital energies or airs) to sustain us. Then we have the five koshas (sheaths), enclosing the Divine Spark that is the Reality. These total up to twenty. Hence the recitation of Om twenty one times purifies and clarifies all these twenty components and makes man the twenty-first entity, ready for the final merger with Reality. The Jeevathathwam (life-principle) merges with Parathathwam (the Supreme Reality). The jeevathathwam may be pictured as a rider on the twenty-headed horse. Finally, you end the Pranava recital with the recital of 'shaanthi' three times. That completes the process of clarification and purification. The first call for shaanthi (peace chant) is for the purity of the aadhibhouthik (body) part of the Self. The second call is for the purity of the aadhidhaivik (the mind). The third is for the purification of the aadhyaathmik (the spirit). This Pranava recital will tone you up, calm all agitations in the mind and quicken the downpour of Grace. Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba, Baala Vikas Gurus Training Camp, 06th June 1978
GeneralComments: Please see https://www.sathyasai.org/devotion/omkar.html for more information.
Songglossary: baala, baba, bhagawan, jeeva, mana, nilaya, om, praan, pranava, sai, sathya, sri

 All things are possible, if only we believe
 Only believe, only believe
 All things are possible, if we only believe

But Deliver Us From All That Is Evil, Hallowed ... (2)
For Thine Is The Kingdom, The Power And The Glory, Hallowed ...
For Ever And Ever And Ever And Ever, Hallowed Be Thy Name ... (2)

Zoroaster Guru Nanak 
Mazda Buddha Narayana

Pambanai Mel Palli Konda Ranga Ranga

The one who destroys the stored karma of an individual, Who is Truth, Consciousness and Bliss Oh Mother Sai. She is the embodiment of the primordial sound Aum, the effulgence that pervades and sustains the illusory power. The incarnation of Shiva and Shakti, our dear Sai Ma.

Meaning: Hey Panduranga (Krishna), living at Pandharpur, You are the One who protects the weak. Hey Sai Vittala, Director of the play of life, You are the one who occupies the devotee's heart. Hey Sai of Parthi, You are the one who protects us. You are Sai Vittala and Sai Krishna.

Meaning: Victory to Lord Panduranga (Lord Vittala) of Pandharpur! The ever pure Lord protects and gives liberation to the destitute and friendless.

Meaning: Sing the glory of Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur. The Lord of Pandharpur, who is none other than Lord Narayana. Sing His glory, for your liberation.
Songglossary: bhaja, hari, narayana, natha, pandari, pandu, vittala

Title: Panduranga Panduranga Vittala Paahey

Deena Natha Karuna Natha
Sai Natha Harey
Pandari Natha Panduranga
Vittala Paahey
Meaning: Oh Lord Panduranga! Oh Vittala! You are the Protector of the meek and helpless. You are the merciful lord. Oh! Sai Natha, you are the Lord of Pandharpur.
Songglossary: deen, hari, karuna, natha, paahi, pandari, pandu, sai, vittala

Title: Panduranga Sai Bhaktha Vatsalaya
Lyrics:
Panduranga Sai Bhaktha Vatsalaya
 Parabrahma Lingam, Bhajey Sai Rangam
 (Sathya) Sai Panduranga
 Lotus-eyed Sai, loves me as my Mother
 Beloved Messiah, I run to as my Father

Title: Panduranga Vittala Jai Pandari Natha
Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittala Jai Pandari Natha Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Jai Pundarikaaksha Vittala [ Panduranga ]

Vittala Jai Vittala Jai Rakumayi Vittala
Meaning: Victory to the Lord of Pandari, who waited patiently for his devotee Pundalika. Victory to that Pundarikaksha. Recite the name of Lord Panduranga and Vittala. Victory to Vittala (Vishnu), the Lord of Rakumayi (Rukmini).
Songglossary: jai, natha, pandari, panduranga, pundarikaaksha, purandara, rakumayi, vittala

Title: Panduranga Vittala Jaya Panduranga Vittala
Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittala Jaya Panduranga Vittala
Kasturi Ranga Vittala Kamaneeya Ranga Vittala [ Panduranga ... ]
Govinda Ranga Vittala Gopala Ranga Vittala
Kalyana Ranga Vittala Karunanta Ranga Vittala
Partheesha Ranga Vittala Jaya Sai Ranga Vittala
Meaning: Victory to the Lord Panduranga Vittala. The shining Vittala who attracts like the musk scent. He is the protector of all beings, full of mercy, He is the Lord of Parthi, Sai, the director of the play of life.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jay, kalyan, kamaneeya, karuna, kasturi, pandu, partheeshwara, ranga, sai, vittala

Title: Panduranga Vittala Murari Murari (3)
Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittala Murari Murari (3)
Vittala Murari Ranga Vittala Murari (2)
Meaning: Sing the glory of Panduranga Vittala, who is Krishna, the slayer of demon Mura.
Songglossary: murare, pandu, ranga, vittala

Title: Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
Panduranga Vittaley Sathya Narayana
Ranga Ranga Mohana Ranga
Jaya Hari Vittala Jaya Sai Vittala
Meaning: Oh Lord Panduranga, the dweller of Pandharpur, thou art Lord Hari. Oh Lord of Pandharpur! Oh Sathya Narayana. The enchanting director of the drama of life. Victory to you, Oh Sai Vittala.
Songglossary: hari, jay, mohan, narayana, pandu, ranga, sai, sathya, vittala

Title: Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
Sri Ranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
Jaya Narayana Jaya Narayana [ Panduranga Vittaley ... ]
Sai Ranga Vittaley Namo Narayana
Parthi Ranga Vittaley Sathya Narayana (2)
Meaning: I bow to Panduranga Vittala, who is the Lord Narayana. He is the director of the drama of life, Victory to Narayana, I bow to thee, who is none other than our Lord Sathya Narayana of Parthi.
Songglossary: hari, jay, namo, narayana, pandu, puttaparthi, ranga, sai, sathya, sri, vittala

Title: Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana Hari
Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Govinda (3)
Bhajo ( Sai ) Narayana Govinda (2)
Meaning: Sing the glory of Panduranga Vittala, incarnation of Lord Narayana. The protector and indweller of all beings.
Songglossary: bhaja, govinda, hari, narayana, pandu, sai, vittala

Title: Panduranga Vittaley Panduranga Vittaley
Lyrics:
Panduranga Vittaley Panduranga Vittaley
Pandareesha Panduranga Sri Ranga Vittaley
Antaranga Vittaley Ananda Ranga Vittaley
Pundarika Varada Hey Purandara Vittaley
Panduranga Vittaley Panduranga Vittaley
Meaning: Chant the name of Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur. He is also the Lord Sriranga. He is the indweller, the bestower of Bliss. He is the liberator of Pundarika, the devotee. He is the Lord Panduranga of devotee Saint Purandara Dasa.
Songglossary: anand, antar, hey, pandari, pandu, pundarika, puran, ranga, sri, varada, vittala

Title: Pannaga Shayana Kali Avatara
Lyrics:
Pannaga Shayana Kali Avatara
Narayana Hari Om
Parama Niranjana Neeraja Nayana
Sayeeshwaraya Hari Om
Buddhi Pradayaka Paapa Vinashaka
Sathya Sanathana Tum Ho
Deena Natha Hey Prabhu Parameshwara
Karuna Sagara Tum Ho
Meaning: Lord Narayana, resting on cobra. O Lord of Lords! You are the Incarnation of the Kali Age. We worship the Lotus-Eyed Lord of Lords! The Embodiment of Purity, Lord Sai! You are the granter of liberating wisdom, the destroyer of sins, You are the eternal Reality. The saviour of the dejected and destitute, You are the Ocean of Mercy.
Songglossary: avatar, buddhi, deen, hari, hey, ho, kali, karuna, narayana, natha, nayan, neeraja, niranjan, om, paapa, pannaga, param, prabhu, pradayaka, sagar, sanatana, sathya, sayee, shayana, tum, vinasha

Title: Pannaga Shayana Pankaja Nayana
Lyrics:
Pannaga Shayana Pankaja Nayana
Bhaktha Parayana Narayana
Pandari Natha Pundarikaaksha
Veda Parayana Narayana
Shankhu Chakra Dhara Peetambara Dhara
Vaikunta Vasa Narayana
Sankata Harana Sarva Dayalana
Parthi Nivasa Narayana (2)
Meaning: Lord Narayana, resting on cobra, the Lotus-eyed One, worshipped and adored by the devotees. You are the Lord of Pandharpur. You are the preceptor of the Vedas, Narayana. Dressed in yellow garments, holding the conch and the Disc, You are the dweller of Vaikunta, abode of Narayana. Ocean of mercy, deliverer from pitfalls of materialistic life. You are none other than the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bhaktha, chakra, dayal, dhara, harana, narayana, natha, nayan, nivasa, pandari, pankaja, pannaga, parayana, peetambara, pundarika, puttaparthi, sankata, sarva, shankha, shayana, vaikunta, vasa, veda

Title: Parama Dayakara Shri Ramachandra
Lyrics:
Parama Dayakara Shri Ramachandra
Paramananda Shri Sai Rama
Shri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram (2) [ Parama Dayakara ... ]
Jagadabhi Ram Nayanabhi Ram
Jagadodhara Nayanabhi Ram [ Shri Ram ... ]
Meaning: Glory to the supremely merciful and eternally blissful Lord Rama, the protector of the Universe. He is pleasing to the world's eyes.
Songglossary: dayaka, jagadabhi, jagadodhara, jay, nayan, param, ram, ramachandra, sai, sri

Title: Parama Dayalu Sai Ram (Hey)
Lyrics:
Parama Dayalu Sai Ram (Hey)
Bhagawan Bhagawan [ (Hey) Parama Dayalu ... ]
Treta Yug Mey Dasharatha Nandana
Dwapara Yug Mey Murali Mohana
Kali Yuga Mey Sai Narayana
Ek Prabhu Anek Naam
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Ram! Thou art extremely merciful. Thou incarnated as Prince of King Dasharatha in the age of Treta (Rama); In the age of Dwapara, as charming and enchanting Flute Player (Krishna); And in present age of Kali, as Lord Sai Narayana. One Lord incarnated, assuming many names and forms.
Songglossary: anek, bhagawan, dasha, dayal, dwapara, ek, hey, kali, mohan, murali, naam, nanda, narayana, param, prabhu, ram, sai, treta, yuga

Title: Paramananda Govinda Gopal Jai
Lyrics:
Paramananda Govinda Gopal Jai
Sai Nanda Mukunda Gopal Jai
Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey
Sai Keshava Madhava Mohana Harey [ Paramananda Govinda ... ]
Mukharavinda Gopal Jai
Satchidananda Govinda Gopal Jai [ Sai Nanda ]
Meaning: Glory to supremely blissful, Lord Govinda - Gopala, Mukunda, Keshava, Madhava, Krishna and Rama. Glory to Lotus-Faced Gopala (protector of all beings), Who is the very embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, jai, kesha, krishna, madhava, mohan, mukha, mukunda, nanda, param, ram, sai, satchidananda

Title: Parameshwara Partheeshwara
Lyrics:
Parameshwara Partheeshwara
Pavana Naama Sayeeshwara
Jagadeeshwara Hrudayeshwara
Jagadodhara Jatadhara [ Pavana Naama ]
Meaning: Sing the glorious name of Lord Sai, the incarnation of Parameshwara (Shiva). Sing the beautiful name of He who is the Lord of the Universe and the One who resides in our hearts. Sustainer of Creation, the long-tressed Lord with the glorious name.
Songglossary: hrudayeshwara, jagadeesha, jagadodhara, jatadhara, naam, param, partheeshwara, pavan, sayee

Title: Parkadalil Pallikonda Parandama
Lyrics:
Parkadalil Pallikonda Parandama
Parthipuriyil Avadaritta Sayi Rama
Darmam Katta Raman Niye Sayi Rama
Neela Varna Kannan Niye Sayi Shyama
Kaliyugattu Deivam Niye Parandama
Kattarulvai Karunakara Sai Rama (2)
Meaning: Lord Vishnu reclining on the ocean of milk (consciousness), is now born in Parthi. Rama, the protector of righteousness, and Krishna of blue complexion are the same as Lord Sai of Kaliyuga. Grace us, O compassionate Sai Ram!
Songglossary: avadaritta, deivam, dharma, kaliyuga, kanha, kappai, karuna, kattarulvai, neela, niyallavo, palli, parandama, parkadal, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sham, varna

Title: Partheeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Lyrics:
Partheeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Sri Sai Narayana ( Sai )
Bhava Sagarodhara Bhuvanavana
Sharanagatha Thrana Narayana [ Daya Karo ]
Sri Sai Narayana ( Sai )
Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai, Lord of Puttaparthi, Oh Lord Sai Narayana, have compassion. You are the One who can help us cross the ocean of samsara. Hey Sai Narayana, we surrender to Thee. Please have compassion, Sai Narayana.
Songglossary: bhava, bhuvana, daya, hari, karo, narayana, partheeshwara, sagar, sai, sathya, sayee, sharan, sri, thrana

Title: Partheeshwara Sri Sai Prabho
Lyrics:
Partheeshwara Sri Sai Prabho
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Prabho [ Partheeshwara Sri ]
Eshwar Allah Sri Sai Rama Naam
Buddha Zohrashtra Sai Krishna Naam
Madhava Mohana Sai Narayana
Prema Avatara Prabhu Sai Rama
Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord of Parthi, Sri Sai The darling son of Mother Eshwaramba He is the unifier of all religious denominations. He is the personification of Eshwar, Allah, Krishna, Zohrashtra, Buddha and Madhava. He is the incarnation of Divine Love.
Songglossary: allah, avatar, buddha, eshwar, krishna, madhava, mohan, naam, nanda, narayana, partheeshwara, prabhu, prem, ram, sai, sri, zohrashtra

Title: Partheeshwari Jagat Janani
Lyrics:
Partheeshwari Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sai Janani [ Partheeshwari Jagat ... ]
Veda Kalamayi Devi Bhavani
Naada Vidyamayi Narayani
Karuna Sadani Karunamayi Ma
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Ma [ Jaya Jaya ]
Meaning: Divine Mother of Parthi, Sai Ma, the One who sustains the Universe, victory to you! You are the knowledge of the Vedas, You are the Goddess of Music and the Arts, You are full of Grace, verily the embodiment of Grace. We surrender at Your feet, Mother Sai.
Songglossary: bhava, devi, hey, jagat, janani, jay, kalamayi, karuna, ma, naada, narayani, partheeshwari, sadana, sai, sharan, veda, vidya

Title: Parthi Mera Pandarpur Partheeshwara Sai
Lyrics:
Parthi Mera Pandarpur Partheeshwara Sai Ranga
Shiva Hari Roopa Panduranga
Pundarika Varada Panduranga
Bhaktha Janashraya Sai Ranga
Panduranga Pandari Natha Sai Natha Vittala (Hey) (2)
Meaning: Parthi is my Pandharpur and Lord Sai is the Panduranga from whom the devotees seek solace. He is the embodiment of Lord Shiva and the one who blessed His devotee Pundarika.
Songglossary: bhaktha, hari, hey, janashraya, mera, natha, pandari, pandarpur, pandu, partheeshwara, pundarika, puttaparthi, ranga, roopa, sai, shiva, varada, vittala

Title: Parthi Nandana Radhey Shyama
Lyrics:
Parthi Nandana Radhey Shyama
Aao Aao Sai Ghana Shyama [ Parthi Nandana ... ]
Brindavan Ghana Shyama Govinda
Madhura Manohara Mukharavinda
Hey Giridhari Sai Murari [ Aao Aao ]
Meaning: Come Oh, Beautiful and Charming - dark hued Lord Sai of Parthi. You are the same Lord Krishna of Brindavan. The sweet, enchanting, Lotus faced Lord, who lifted the mountain and conquered the demonic force Mura. Chant the many names of the Lord Govinda, Ghana Shyama and Sai Murari.
Songglossary: aao, brinda, ghana, giridhar, govinda, hey, madhu, manohar, mukha, murare, nanda, puttaparthi, radha, sai, sham

Title: Parthi Pureesha Panduranga
Lyrics:
Parthi Pureesha Panduranga
Pandari Natha Hari Hari
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Meaning: The Lord of Parthi, who is none other than Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur. He is the Lord Vishnu, whose incarnation is the divine child of Nanda, the stealer of the hearts. He is Lord Narayana, Sai Narayana.
Songglossary: chora, hari, kishora, nanda, narayana, natha, navaneetha, pandari, pandu, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Natha
Lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Natha
Parama Dayal Bhagawan
Sita Ram Jaya Ram
Deenodharana Bhava Bhaya Harana
Janaki Jeevana Ram
Alakh Niranjan Asurani Khandana
Sundara Nayanabhi Ram [ Sita Ram ]
Meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi! You are extremely merciful. Victory to Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita. You are the saviour of the meek, the destroyer of the fear, bondage of the birth and death. You are the very life of Janaki, I. e. ; Mother Sita. Victory to the Lord who is unknowable and unstainable (Alakh Niranjan), who destroyed the demonic hordes. Lord Rama, the one with the beautiful eyes.
Songglossary: alakh, asura, bhagawan, bhava, bhaya, dayal, deenodharana, harana, janaki, jay, jeeva, khandana, natha, nayan, niranjan, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sita, sri, sundara

Title: Parthi Pureeshwaram Parama Dayalam
Lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwaram Parama Dayalam
Sadguru Devam Pranamamyaham
Shanthi Nivasam Jaya Sai Natham
Namami Nithyam Sathya Sai Natham
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwaram Pranamamyaham
Meaning: We bow to the Guru of Gurus, Lord of Parthi, the supremely compassionate. Resident of Prashanthi Nilayam, victory to our Sai. We incessantly chant the name of Sathya Sai. He is the Lord of Parthi and Shirdi, we bow to Him.
Songglossary: dayal, devam, jay, namam, natha, nithya, nivasa, param, pranamamyaham, purishwara, puttaparthi, sadguru, sai, sathya, shanthi, shirdi

Title: Parthi Pureeshwari Ma Jaya Sai
Lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwari Ma Jaya Sai Maheshwari Ma
Dukha Nivarani Bhava Bhaya Harini
Abhaya Pradayini Ma ( Sai )
Jaya Ma Sai Ma (3)
Omkara Roopini Ma (2)
Meaning: Victory to the mother of Parthi, who is the incarnation of Mother Eshwari. She removes the afflictions of worldly sorrow and fear; And grants us fearlessness. Victory to that Mother Sai, who is the embodiment of Omkara.
Songglossary: abhaya, bhava, bhaya, dayini, dukh, haarini, jay, ma, maheshwari, nivaran, om, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, swaroopa

Title: Parthi Puri Mata Sri Sathya
Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Mata Sri Sathya Sai Mata
Daya Karo Mata Mujhey Krupa Karo Mata
Merey Janam Janam Saathi Merey Jeevan Ke Aadhaar
Terey Charano Ke Pyaasi Mujhey Darshan Do Mata
Meaning: Oh! Mother Sai, Lord of Puttaparthi, Oh Lord Sathya Narayana, have compassion on me. You are the anchor throughout this ocean of life, the companion who can help us to cross the ocean of samsara. I thirst for the vision of your lotus feet, please grant me your Darshan. I surrender to Thee. Please have compassion.
Songglossary: aadhaar, chara, darsh, daya, do, janam, jeeva, karo, ke, krupa, mata, mera, mujhe, puri, puttaparthi, pyaas, saath, sai, sathya, sri, tera

Title: Parthi Puri Mey Janam Liya
Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Mey Janam Liya Jo Sai Baba Naam Hai
Mayura Mukutadhara Murali Manohara Sai Shyam Naam Hai
Hey Shiva Shankara Uma Maheshwara Sai Shambho Naam Hai
Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara Tu Hi Mera Pran Hai
Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna! You are the one who has been adorned with the crown of peacock feathers. You are the enchanter with the flute! You have incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai Baba. Oh Lord Shambho! Oh Lord Shankara! Oh Lord of Uma. Lord Maheshwara! You have incarnated in Parthi as Sai Shambho. Oh Supreme Lord of Parthi! You are my very life.
Songglossary: baba, hai, hey, janam, jo, ley, maheshwara, manohar, mayur, mera, mukuta, murali, naam, param, pran, puri, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sham, shambho, shankara, shiva, tum, uma

Title: Parthi Puri Nayaki Paripalinchu Kamakshi
Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Nayaki Paripalinchu Kamakshi
Nithya Buddhi Dayaki Neerajakshi Sundari
Bhaktha Loka Palaki Kamitaartha Dayaki
Meaning: The mother-ruler of Parthi, rule over our desires, the bestower of boons. Grant us the eternal wisdom, Oh beautiful Lotus-eyed one. The queen of the devotee's worldly lives, who bestows desired affluence on her devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktha, buddhi, dayaki, kamakshi, kamitaartha, loka, nayaka, neeraja, nithya, palaka, paripala, puri, puttaparthi, soundari

Title: Parthi Puri Sai Gopala Bala
Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Sai Gopala Bala
Shirdi Puri Sai Gopala Bala [ Parthi Puri Sai ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Gopala
Saama (Bhajana) Gaana Priya Sai Gopala
