Meaning: Sing of the protector of all beings, Sai of Parthi, He is also the Sai of Shirdi. The incarnation of Meera's Lord Giridhara Gopala (Krishna). The one who loves bhajans and songs (Saama Veda)
Songglossary: bala, bhaja, gaan, giridhar, gopal, ke, meera, prabhu, priya, puri, puttaparthi, sai, sama, shirdi

Title: Parthi Puri Vasa Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Parthi Puri Vasa Sai Rama
Prashanthi Nilaya Sai Rama
Padmadala Netra Sai Rama
Pavana Naama Sai Rama
Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Rama who resides in Parthi. Sing of Sai Rama of Prashanthi Nilayam. The Sai Rama - with eyes like Lotus petals. Chant the blessed name - Sai Rama.
Songglossary: naam, nethra, nilaya, padma, pavan, prashanthi, puri, puttaparthi, ram, sai, vasa

Title: Parthipuri Gurudev Puttaparthipuri Gurudev
Lyrics:
Parthipuri Gurudev Puttaparthipuri Gurudev
Prashanti Nilaya Prashanti Niketana
Prema Sai Gurudev Puttaparthipuri Gurudev
Parabrahma Gurudev Parama Jyothi Gurudev
Shirdi Purisha Parthipurisha
Sathya Sai Gurudev Puttaparthipuri Gurudev
Meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi and Shirdi residing in Prashanthi Nilayam, is the loving teacher (Guru) and the supreme creator with divine effulgence.
Songglossary: gurudev, jyoth, niketana, nilaya, parabrahma, param, partheeshwara, prasanthi, prem, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, shirdi

Title: Parthipuri Mata He Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Parthipuri Mata He Sathya Sai Mata
Daya Karo Mata Mujhey Krupa Karo Mata
Merey Janam Janam Sathi Merey Jeevan Ke Adhar
Terey Charano Ke Dasi Mujhey Darshan Do Mata
Meaning: O! Mother Sai, please show mercy on me. You are my eternal friend and the basis of my life. Please grant me, the servant at your feet, Your divine vision.
Songglossary: adhar, chara, darsh, dasa, daya, do, janam, jeeva, karo, ke, krupa, mata, mera, mujhe, puttaparthi, sai, sathi, sathya, tera

Title: Parthipurisha Sai Deva
Lyrics:
Parthipurisha Sai Deva
Sthirachara Vishva Vidhata Natha
Sthirachara Vishva Vidhata
Deena Dayala Anatha Natha
Bhagawantha He Dhrata (2) [ Sthirachara Vishva ... Vidhata ]
Meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is the eternal protector of the Universe, and savior of the forsaken and fallen.
Songglossary: anath, bhagawan, dayal, deen, deva, dhrata, natha, partheeshwara, sai, sthira, vidhata, vishwa

Title: Parti Purisham Sai Ganesham
Lyrics:
Parti Purisham Sai Ganesham
Pranavakaram Sai Ganesham
Vighna Vinasham Sai Ganesham
Vishwadharam Sai Ganesham
Mooshika  Vahana Sai Ganesham
Vamana Roopam Sai Ganesham
Vishva Swaroopam Sai Ganesham
Sai Ganesham Sai Ganesham (4)
Meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is Lord Ganesha, whose vehicle is the mouse. He is the source of the primeval sound of creation, removes all obstacles, supports the entire world and His form is both diminutive and as gigantic as the universe.
Songglossary: ganesha, mooshika, pranava, purishwara, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, swaroopa, vahana, vamana, vighna, vinasha, vishwa, vishwadhara

Title: Parvathi Nandana Bala Gajanana
Lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Bala Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Pahi Gajanana
Mooshika  Vahana Mukti Gajanana
Sura Muni Sevitha Shakti Gajanana
Bala Gajanana Pahi Gajanana
Mukti Gajanana Shakti Gajanana
Sura Muni Sevitha Sai Gajanana
Meaning: Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Parvathi, is the personification of the life-force. He uses a mouse as conveyance, is worshipped by the sages and divine beings. He protects, and grants liberation.
Songglossary: bala, gajamukha, mooshika, mukti, muni, nanda, paahi, parvathi, pranava, sai, sevita, shakthi, sura, swaroopa, vahana

Title: Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Pashupathi Ranjana Niranjana [ Parvathi Nandana ... ]
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Prasanna
Girija Nandana Shubhanana
Meaning: Oh Beloved Son of Mother Parvathi! Oh Lord Gajanana! Oh Lord of all beings! Kindly shower Your grace and protect us. Protect us Oh pleasant faced Lord. Oh Beloved Son of Mother Girija! You are forever conferring auspiciousness.
Songglossary: gajamukha, girija, maam, nanda, niranjan, paahi, parvathi, pashu, prabhu, prasanna, ranjana, shubh

Title: Parvathi Shankari Girija Shankari
Lyrics:
Parvathi Shankari Girija Shankari
Sai Shankari Namostuthey (Sathya) (2)
Hey Jagadeeshwari Parthi Pureeshwari
Sai Shankari Namostuthey (Sathya) (3)
Meaning: Pranaams to mother Parvathi, daughter of King of mountains (I. e. Himavan), the consort of Shankara (Lord Shiva). I bow down to thee Oh Sai Shankari, the Mother of the World, residing in Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: girija, hey, jagadeeshwari, namostuthey, parvathi, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, shankari

Title: Parvathi Shankari Uma Maheshwari
Lyrics:
Parvathi Shankari Uma Maheshwari
Puttapartheeshwari Sai Maheshwari [ Parvathi Shankari ... ]
Sai Shiva Shankari Shiva Kameshwari
Shaileshwari Amba Pahi Mam
Akhilandeshwari Raksha Mam
Meaning: Mother Parvathi, consort of Lord Shiva, and Goddess of the mountains, please protect and guard me. You are Sai of Parthi and the Mother of the Universe.
Songglossary: akhila, amba, kameshwari, maheshwari, mam, paahi, parvathi, puttapartheeshwari, raksha, sai, shaileshwara, shankari, shiva, uma

Title: Parvathi Tanaya Bala Gajanana
Lyrics:
Parvathi Tanaya Bala Gajanana
Surya Koti Sama Prabha
Jaya Shubha Dayaka Vishwa Vidhata
Parameshwara Sutha (Parthi Pureeshwara) Paalaya Maam
Meaning: Chant the name of darling son of Parvathi - Lord Gajanana, whose face shines with the effulgence of koti (ten million) suns. Victory to the bestower of auspiciousness, who grants boons to all the world's denizens. The darling son of the Supreme Lord, protect me and grant me spiritual knowledge.
Songglossary: bala, dayaka, gajamukha, jay, koti, maam, paalaya, param, parvathi, prabha, purishwara, puttaparthi, sama, shubh, surya, sutha, tanaya, vidhata, vishwa

Title: Parvathi Tanaya Gajanana
Lyrics:
Parvathi Tanaya Gajanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajavadana [ Parvathi Tanaya ... ]
Mooshika Vahana Gajavadana
Suramuni Sevitha Tava Charana
Meaning: We bow to the Elephant-faced son of Mother Parvathi. The fulfiller of devotees prayers, the remover of their obstacles. The Lord who rides on the mouse, who is served and adored by the pious and the righteous. We bow at your Lotus feet.
Songglossary: chara, gajamukha, mooshika, parvathi, sevita, siddhi, suramuni, tanaya, tava, vahana, vinayaka

Title: Pashupathi Natha Nageshwara
Lyrics:
Pashupathi Natha Nageshwara
Hara Hara Bham Bham Shiva Shankara
Parvathi Pathey Maheshwara
Lingodhbhavakara Lingeshwara
Partheeshwara Sai Parameshwara
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord of all beings, the one who drapes the cobra around his neck. Glory to him, Lord Shiva Shankara, bestower of auspiciousness, who is the Supreme Lord of Parvathi. He is the one who brings out the Linga, the Lord of the Shiva Linga. He is the Lord of Parthi, the Supreme Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bham, hara, lingeshwara, lingodbhava, maheshwara, nageshwara, natha, param, partheeshwara, parvathi, pashu, pathey, sai, shankara, shiva

Title: Pashupathi Tanaya Bala Gajanana
Lyrics:
Pashupathi Tanaya Bala Gajanana
Tum Ho Vighna Vinasha Ganesha
Hey Shiva Nandana Bala Gajanana
Vidya Buddhi Pradatha
Mangala Kara Hey Mangala Kara Hey
Sundara Sai Ganesha Ganesha
Meaning: Chant the name of the darling son of Lord Shiva (Pashupathi); Lord Gajanana, who is Ganesha, the destroyer of obstacles. Oh Son of Lord Shiva, Lord Gajanana! The bestower of wisdom (spiritual) and intellectual. Chant the name of the charming Lord Sai Ganesha, the bestower of auspiciousness.
Songglossary: bala, buddhi, gajamukha, ganesha, hey, ho, kara, mangal, nanda, pashu, pradatha, sai, shiva, sundara, tanaya, tum, vidya, vighna, vinasha

Title: Patitha Pavana Ram
Lyrics:
Patitha Pavana Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Pavana Naam Taraka Naam Paapa Vimochana Ram
Danava Bhanjana Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram [ Pavana Naam ]
Meaning: Chant the pure and sacred name of Lord Sai Ram of Parthi, The sacred name that is the Saviour of the fallen, remover of all sins. Oh Lord Rama! Oh Prince of King Dasharatha! You are the destroyer of demonic qualities.
Songglossary: bhanjana, danava, dasha, naam, nanda, paapa, patitha, pavan, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, taraka, vimochana

Title: Pavana Pavana Sai Nam
Lyrics:
Pavana Pavana Sai Nam
Bhajo Nirantara Sai Ram
Bhakthi Bhava Se Bhajana Sunao
Guru Charano Me Dhyana Lagao
Sai Charano Me Dhyana Lagao
Meaning: Always worship the pure an sacred name of Lord Sai. Chant the glory of the Lord with full devotion. Meditate on the Lotus feet of the divine master and guide, Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhakthi, bhava, chara, dhyaan, guru, lagao, nam, nirantara, pavan, ram, sai, se, sunao

Title: Pavana Rama Patitha Pavana Rama
Lyrics:
Pavana Rama Patitha Pavana Rama
Pavana Rama Janaki Jeevana Rama
Mohana Krishna Garuda Vahana Krishna
Mohana Krishna Shri Jagan Mohana Krishna
Meaning: The holy and sanctified name of Lord Ram, Lord of Janaki, protects the fallen. Lord Krishna, whose conveyance is the eagle, enchants the whole universe.
Songglossary: garuda, jagan, janaki, jeeva, krishna, mohan, patitha, pavan, ram, sri, vahana

Title: Pavana Sutha Hanuman Ki Jai
Lyrics:
Pavana Sutha Hanuman Ki Jai
Sita Pathi (Siyavar) Ramachandra Ki Jai [ Pavana Sutha ... ]
Parakrama Anjaneya Ki Jai (2)
Parthi Puri Sai Nath Ki Jai (2)
Meaning: Victory to Hanuman, the son of the wind God, victory to the chosen Lord of Sita, Lord Ram, victory to the mighty son of Anjana Devi, victory to the Lord of Parthi, Sai Nath.
Songglossary: anjaneya, hanuman, jai, ki, natha, parakram, pathi, pavan, puri, puttaparthi, ramachandra, sai, sita, siyavar, sutha

Title: Pavana Sutha Hanumantha
Lyrics:
Pavana Sutha Hanumantha
Pavana Charitha Bhagawantha
Rama Rama Ram Sada Japantha
Rama Rama Rama Rama Sada Japantha
Ati Balavanta Hey Gunavanta
Meaning: We pray to Hanumantha, the son of Pavana (God of Wind). The Divine one who has a Sacred History. He is one with Extraordinary strength, virtuous and given to chanting the name of Rama incessantly.
Songglossary: ati, balavanta, bhagawan, charitha, gunavanta, hanuman, hey, japo, pavan, ram, sada, sutha

Title: Peace Shanthi Peace On Earth
Lyrics:
Peace Shanthi, Peace On Earth
Shanthi, Shanthi, Peace On Earth
Shiva, Shiva Find Our Hearts
Shiva Shiva Light The Spark Of Love
Sai Baba Find Our Hearts
Sai Baba Light The Spark Of Love
Shiva, Shiva Light The Spark, The Spark Of Love
Sai Baba, Light The Spark, The Spark Of Love
Shiva, Shiva Light The Spark, The Spark Of Love
Sai Baba, Light The Spark, The Spark Of Love
Songglossary: baba, sai, shanthi, shiva

Title: Peace, Peace, Peace
Lyrics:
Peace, Peace, Peace
Peace in me
Brings Peace, Peace, Peace
Peace in my family
Then Peace, Peace, Peace
Peace in our community
Brings Peace, Peace, Peace
Peace in our country
Then Peace, Peace, Peace
Peace on Earth
Peace, Peace, Peace
For all the universe

Title: Permiteme poner a tus Pies
Lyrics:
Permiteme poner a tus Pies
Mi amor, mi amor y devocion, Swami
Tu sabes que eres Todo para mi
Y mi existir te lo debo solo a Ti
Oh Swami!
Sosten mi barca al sucumbir
en el mar de la Ilusion
Quiero ver en todo solo a Ti
y amar sin distinguir
Oh Swami!
Meaning:
Allow me to surrender my love and devotion at Your Feet. You know that You are everything for me and I owe my whole existence only to You. 

Oh Swami! 

Hold my boat so it doesn't sink in the Sea of Illusion. 

I want to see only You in everything and love all without distinction. 

Oh Swami!
GeneralComments: The beautiful flute pieces used in this adaptation of the traditional Inca song "El condor pasa"(the little eagle flying by), makes this bhajan one of the sweetest and most heart warming of the Spanish bhajans. Offered with pure love and devotion to our dear Bhagawan by devotees from South America.
Songglossary: amara, ley, para, swami, todo, tum

Title: Phool Ko Aankha Ma
Lyrics:
Phool Ko Aankha Ma
Phool Ko Aankha Ma
Phoolai Sansara
Kaanda Ko Aankha Ma
Kaandai Sansara
Jhool Kin Cha Hai Chaaya
Bastu Ansaara
Kaanda Ko Aankha Ma
Kaandai Sansara
Phool Ko Aankha Ma
Phoolai Sansara
Kaanda Ko Aankha Ma
Kaandai Sansara
Chita Sudha Hosh Mero
Boli Buddha Hosh
Mero Paitaala
Le Keerai Na Maross
Phool Ko Aankha Ma
Phoolai Sansara
Kaanda Ko Aankha Ma
Kaandai Sansara
Chita Sudha Hosh Mero
Boli Buddha Hosh
Mero Paitaala
Le Keerai Na Maross
Phool Ko Aankha Ma
Phoolai Sansara
Kaanda Ko Aankha Ma
Kaandai Sansara (3x)
Meaning:
In the eyes of a flower, the world appears as a flower,
In the eyes of a thorn, the world appears as a thorn,
As the object, so is its shadow,
Let my heart be pure, let my speech be like of Buddhas,
Let my feet kill not a single insect,
In the eyes of the good, the world opens to be good,
Let me see the bright moon even during dark nights,
Let me listen to the music of life in blissful moments,
For those open and pure hearts, the world also opens for them.

Title: Pibare Rama Rasam Rasane Pibare
Lyrics:
Pibare Rama Rasam Rasane Pibare Rama Rasam
Janana Marana Bhaya Shoka Viduram
Sakala Shastra Nigamagama Saram(2)
Bhajare Rama Rasam Rasane Pibare Rama Rasam
Meaning: Drinking in the nectar of Lord Rama's name by chanting His name helps us escape from the sorrowful cycle of birth and death. His name is the essence of all religious texts.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhaya, janam, maran, nigamagama, pibare, ram, rasa, sakala, saramu, shastra, shoka, vidhura

Title: Poorna Brahma Avatara Sai
Lyrics:
Poorna Brahma Avatara Sai
Sakala Jagat Aadhara Sai [ Poorna Brahma ]
Allah Yesu Rama Sai
Buddha Mahavir Nanak Sai
Hum Bhakthon Ke Baba Sai
Sarva Dharma Avatara Sai
Meaning: Chant the name of Sai, incarnation of the Supreme Lord. He is the sustainer of all the worlds. Sai is one with Allah, Jesus, Rama, Buddha, Mahavir and Nanak. He is the beloved of us devotees. The One who preaches oneness of all religions.
Songglossary: aadhaar, allah, avatar, baba, bhakthon, brahma, buddha, dharma, hum, jagat, ke, mahavir, nanak, poorna, ram, sai, sakala, sarva, yesu

Title: Poornavatara Sai Guru Deva
Lyrics:
Poornavatara Sai Guru Deva
Sathya Sayeesha Paramananda
Prema Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Parama Purusha Prabhu Sri Sai Natha
Purushottama Hey Parthi Pureesha
Prema Sai Bhagawan [ Sathya Sai ]
Meaning: Pray to the Divine Guru, the complete Avatar, Sai. He bestows divine bliss on His devotees. The embodiment of Divine Love. Sathya Sai is none other than the Supreme Lord, who took form as the perfect human. He will come again as Lord Prema Sai.
Songglossary: bhagawan, deva, guru, hey, natha, param, poorna, prabhu, prem, pureesha, purusha, purushottama, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, sayee, sri

Title: Prabho Vega Rava Prema Swaroopa
Lyrics:
Prabho Vega Rava Prema Swaroopa
Sharananidhe Swami Karunimpa Vemi [ Prabhu Vega ... ]
Narayana Hari Govinda Gopala
Murali Madhava Manusha Bandhava
Meaning: O Lord, the embodiment of Love, please come soon. We surrender to you, O Narayana, Hari and Govinda. You are the protector. Please come and save us.
Songglossary: bandha, gopal, govinda, hari, karunimpa, madhava, manusha, murali, narayana, prabhu, prem, raavo, sharan, swami, swaroopa, vega, Vemi

Title: Prabhu Leela Prabhu Mahima
Lyrics:
Prabhu Leela Prabhu Mahima
Kali Avatara Hari Narayana
Prabhu Dhama Param Dhama
Chalore Chal Mana Parti Dhama
Jaya Jaya Jaya He Sai Rama
Meaning: Lord Sai Narayana, the incarnation of Kali age is the compassionate Lord who works His miracles as part of the divine play. Salutations to Sai Rama who resides in our minds.
Songglossary: avatar, chalo, dhama, hari, jay, kali, leela, mahima, mana, narayana, param, prabhu, puttaparthi, ram, sai

Title: Prabhu Ramachandra Ke Dootha Hanumantha
Lyrics:
Prabhu Ramachandra Ke Dootha Hanumantha Anjaneya
Hanumantha Hanumantha Hanumantha Anjaneya
Hey Pavan Putra Hanumantha Balabheema Anjaneya
Balabheema Balabheema Balabheema Anjaneya
Meaning: Lord Hanumantha Oh! Anjaneya, Son of Anjana Devi and Pavana (Wind God); The messenger of Lord Ramachandra and one of Mighty Strength.
Songglossary: balabheem, doota, hanuman, hey, ke, pavan, prabhu, putra, ramachandra

Title: Prabhu Tum Antaryami Sai
Lyrics:
Prabhu Tum Antaryami Sai
Daya Karo Daya Karo Hey Swami [ Prabhu Tum ... ]
Deena Dayala Hey Sayeeshwara
Parama Krupala Jaya Partheeshwara [ Daya Karo ]
Meaning: Lord Sai, the inner motivator of all, please show mercy on us. You are Protector of the meek. Victory to the very compassionate Lord of Parthi, shower Your Grace on us.
Songglossary: antar, daya, dayal, deen, hey, jay, karo, krupalu, param, partheeshwara, prabhu, sai, sayee, swami, tum

Title: Prabhu Vara Sai Vishwanatha
Lyrics:
Prabhu Vara Sai Vishwanatha
Krupa Karo He Jagannatha [ Prabhu Vara ... ]
Tum Ho Mata Tum Ho Pitha
Tum Ho Sarva Sambuddha Vidhata
Tava Pada Sharanam Anatha Natha
Dasa Tumharo Dino Natha
Meaning: Have mercy, Lord Sai, Lord of the Universe, our mother, father and bestower of knowledge. We take refuge at Your feet, which protect the helpless and the forsaken.
Songglossary: anath, dasa, deen, ho, jagan, karo, krupa, mata, natha, paada, pitha, prabhu, sai, sambuddha, sarva, sharan, tava, tum, tumhara, vara, vidhata, vishwanath

Title: Praise God, on all He showers grace
Lyrics:
Praise God, on all He showers grace
 We are His children, every race
 He comes to any name we call
 He is the love within us all
 Praise Jesus, Buddha, any name
 Allah, Sai - they're all the same
 He lives in You, He lives in me
 Praise one and all, God's family
 Praise the Lord in song, all the world over
 Make a joyful noise, come to Him with glad hearts singing
 He is Love, Love without end
 Praise the Lord in song, all the world over
 Thank the Lord within your heart, bless His holy name
 He is so good, His mercy everlasting
 God is Truth, Truth without end
 God is Love, Love without end

Title: Praise my teacher divine
Lyrics:
Praise my teacher divine, the blessed and holy Sai
 Sing His praises on high, the blessed and holy Lord Sai
 Praise my teacher divine, the blessed and holy Sai
 Creator, Protector, Destroyer of darkness,
 the blessed and holy Lord Sai
 Mother and father and teacher divine,
 the blessed and holy Lord Sai

Title: Praise Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Praise Sai Ram, praise Sai Ram
 Praise to You, Lord Sai Ram
 Sing out: praise to You, Lord Sai Ram (2X)
 You are the Refuge for those in need
 In time of trouble, our prayers You heed
 You are the Form of Love Divine
 You are the Savior of all mankind
 Praise to Sathya Sai, glory to His name
 Glory to Sai Baba, Lord of all
 Glory to Sai Baba, Lord of all
 He is the hope of the hopeless heart
 Help for the helpless, Lord of Love
 His is the Name, the Name Divine
 Sathya Sai Baba, Lord sublime

Title: Praise the Lord, Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Praise the Lord, Sathya Sai, bless and keep us forever
 Grant us peace, perfect peace, courage in every endeavor
 Look in your heart and see His face, and His Grace forever
 Praise the Lord Sathya Sai, bless and keep us forever
 God of Love, God of Love, bless and keep us forever
 Grant us peace, perfect peace, courage in every endeavor
 Look in your heart and see His face, and His Grace forever
 Praise the Lord Sathya Sai, bless and keep us forever
 God of Love, God of Love fill my heart with Your pleasure
 Let me share, let me care, let me love without measure
 Father of Light, let me be like You, kind and true forever
 God of Love, God of Love, love me now and forever
 God of Light, God of Light, hold my life in Your keeping
 Let me find peace of mind, guard me waking and sleeping
 Father of Light, guide me every day, all the way forever
 God of Light, God of Light, lead me onward forever

Title: Pranam Sweekar Karo Sai Mahadeva
Lyrics:
Pranam Sweekar Karo Sai Mahadeva
Sai Mahadeva Sai Mahadeva [ Pranam Sweekar ... ]
Allah Eshwar Yesu Sai
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavira Sai
Natana Sutradhari Jagannatha Sai [ Sai Mahadeva ]
Meaning: Accept our salutations Oh Sai, Lord of Gods, You are verily the Supreme One, be it Allah, Eshwar, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavira, The supreme Director and Lord of the world.
Songglossary: allah, buddha, eshwar, jagan, karo, mahadev, mahavir, natana, pranamami, sai, sutra, sweekar, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Pranamami Sri Durge Sai Narayani
Lyrics:
Pranamami Sri Durge Sai Narayani
Jaya Jagadambe Devi Bhavani [ Pranamami Sri ... ]
Jaya Mahishasura Samhaarini
Mahamaya Dukha Haarini
Meaning: I pay obeisance to Mother Durga, Sai Narayani (Sister of Vishnu), Jagad Ambe (the Mother of the Universe) and Devi Bhavani, the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death, the destroyer of the demon Mahishasura (ego) and the remover of miseries and the vast illusion or Maya (ignorance).
Songglossary: amba, bhavani, devi, dukha, durge, haarini, jagadamba, jay, mahamaya, mahishasura, narayani, pranamami, sai, samhaarini, sri

Title: Pranava Swaroopa Hari Om Sai
Lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Hari Om Sai
Narayana Hari Om
Sayeeshwaraya Hari Om (Sathya)
Yadavaya Madhavaya Govindaya Namah Om
Paramatma Roopaya Hari Om
Hari Om Hari Om [ Sayeeshwaraya ]
Meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, you are the very embodiment of the Primordial sound 'Om. ' You are Narayana, the indweller of all beings. You are Krishna of the Yadava clan, one with Vishnu, the Lord of Lakshmi, you are the protector of all beings, Govinda. The embodiment of the Supreme soul, we pay our obeisance to You.
Songglossary: govinda, hari, madhava, namah, narayana, om, param, pranava, roopa, sai, sathya, sayee, swaroopa, yadava

Title: Pranava Swaroopa Paahi Gajanana Vighna
Lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi Gajanana Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Eka Dantha Hey Gunavanta Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Shritha Jana Palana Sindhura Vadana Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Mahadeva Shiva Gowri Nandana Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Meaning: Save us, Oh Elephant faced Lord, who is the embodiment of the Primordial sound, destroyer of impediments in the path of seekers, one without any leader. Single tusked, Storehouse of sacred qualities, Protector of those who seek his refuge. Having vermillion on His forehead, Son of Lord Mahadeva and Mother Gowri.
Songglossary: dantha, eka, gajamukha, gowri, gunavanta, hey, jana, mahadev, nanda, nasha, paahi, paalaya, pranava, shiva, shritha, sindhu, swaroopa, vadana, vighna, vinayaka

Title: Pranavakara Parabrahma
Lyrics:
Pranavakara Parabrahma
Parishuddhatma Yesu Prabhu
Sarva Shakthimaya Bismillah
Sarvaadhara Ahur Mazda
Sarvamaya Sathya Sayeesha
Buddham Sharanam Gachchami
Meaning: I surrender myself to the Cosmic Lord, the source of primordial sound, Jesus, the pure and sacred soul, Bismillah, the all powerful one, Ahur Mazda, the basis for everything in this world, the omnipresent Lord Sathya Sai and Lord Buddha.
Songglossary: ahur, bismillah, buddha, gachchami, mazda, parabrahma, parishuddhatma, prabhu, pranava, sarva, sathya, sayee, shakthi, sharan, yesu

Title: Prasanna Ho Prasanna Ho Prasanna
Lyrics:
Prasanna Ho Prasanna Ho Prasanna Ho Sathya Sai Ram
Krupa Karo Prabhu Krupa Karo Prabhu Krupa Karo Sathya Sai Ram
Daya Karo Prabhu Daya Karo Prabhu Daya Karo Sathya Sai Ram
Meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai Rama! Be pleased with us and shower Your grace and mercy on us.
Songglossary: daya, ho, karo, krupa, prabhu, prasanna, ram, sai, sathya

Title: Prasanna Ho Sathya Sai Ganesha
Lyrics:
Prasanna Ho Sathya Sai Ganesha
Prathama Poojita Vighna Vinasha [ Prasanna Ho ... ]
Pashankusha Dhara Parama Pavitra
Mooshika  Vahana Gajanana [ Prasanna Ho ... ]
Lambodhara He Shambhu Kumara
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
Meaning: At the outset, worship Lord Sai Ganesh to remove all obstacles. The supremely sacred Lord uses a mouse as conveyance and carries the symbolic rope and weapon in His hands. He is the pot-bellied son of Mother Ambika (Parvathi)
Songglossary: amba, dhara, gajamukha, ganesha, ho, kumara, lambodhara, mooshika, param, pashankusha, pavitra, poojita, prasanna, prathama, sai, sathya, shambho, tanaya, vahana, vighna, vinasha

Title: Prashanthi Nilaya Ram Hey Parthi
Lyrics:
Prashanthi Nilaya Ram Hey Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Ahalyodharaka Ram Hey Dasharathey Raghu Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram
Sri Ram Ram Ram Jaya Ram
Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram
Meaning: Oh Lord Rama of Puttaparthi! Oh Lord of Prashanthi Nilayam! Oh Beloved Prince of King Dasharatha! Oh Saviour of Ahalya! Glory to Thee. Victory to Thee. Oh Lord Sai Rama of Prashanthi, salutations to you.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, bhagawan, dasha, hey, jay, nilaya, prashanthi, puri, puttaparthi, raghu, ram, sai, sri

Title: Prashanthi Nilaya Rama Rama Ram
Lyrics:
Prashanthi Nilaya Rama Rama Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Rama Rama Ram
Krishna Narayana Rama Rama Ram
Sri Ranga Panduranga Rama Rama Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of Rama incessantly. The one who is Narayana come down as Sri Krishna, as Panduranga. He is none other than the one residing in Prashanthi Nilayam.
Songglossary: krishna, narayana, nilaya, pandu, prashanthi, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, ranga, sri

Title: Prashanthi Nilayam Paramanin Alayam
Lyrics:
Prashanthi Nilayam Paramanin Alayam
Daiva Swaroopanin Devalayam
Kali Yuga Devanin Karunalayam
Manavar Mohikkum Mantralayam
Paapa Vimochanin Charanalayam (Janma)
Meaning: Prashanthi Nilayam is the abode of Parabrahman (Supreme Lord). It is the temple of the One with the Divine Form. Of the avatar of the Kali age, who showers compassion on all. It is the enchanting divine abode for all humans, of the temple of Love, where the sins of His devotees are washed away at the Lotus Feet.
Songglossary: alayam, chara, daiva, devalayam, devanin, janam, kali, karuna, manava, mantra, mohikkum, nilaya, paapa, param, prashanthi, swaroopa, vimochani, yuga

Title: Prathah Smaranam Sri Guru Charanam
Lyrics:
Prathah Smaranam Sri Guru Charanam
Sayeesha Charanam Sri Guru Charanam [ Prathah Smaranam ... ]
Brahmananda Pradayaka Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha Charanam
Meaning: Meditate on the Lotus Feet of the Guru (Lord Sai) in the early hours of dawn. Meditate on the holy feet of the Sadguru Sayeesha, the dispeller of ignorance. Surrender to the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai, who confers infinite happiness and heavenly bliss. We take refuge at your Lotus Feet, Oh Sainatha.
Songglossary: brahma, chara, guru, pradayaka, prathah, sayee, sharan, smaran, sri

Title: Prathah Smaranam Sri Ramam
Lyrics:
Prathah Smaranam Sri Ramam
Munijana Sevitha Sri Ramam [ Prathah Smaranam ... ]
Ananda Dayaka Sri Ramam
Moksha Pradayaka Sri Ramam
Bhajamana Sai Ramam Ramam
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama in the dawn, the Lord who was worshipped by the sages and noble souls, who bestows happiness and liberation. Chant the name of Sri Rama who is none other than Sai Rama.
Songglossary: anand, bhaja, dayaka, moksha, munijana, pradayaka, prathah, ram, sai, sevita, smaran, sri

Title: Prathama Bhaju Mai Ganapathi Sai
Lyrics:
Prathama Bhaju Mai Ganapathi Sai
Jai Jai Jai Jai Sai
Buddhi Pradayaka He Gana Nayaka
Ganapathi Sai He Sukha Dayi [ Jai Jai ... ]
Meaning: First worship Lord Sai Gajanana, the Lord of the demi-gods, provider of happiness and liberation. Salutations to Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bhaja, buddhi, dayi, gana, gananayaka, jai, mai, nayaka, pradayaka, prathama, sai, sukh

Title: Prathama Ganapathim Pranamamyaham
Lyrics:
Prathama Ganapathim Pranamamyaham
Parvathi Priya Sutha Bhajamyaham
Ashvatha Moola Vasa Devadi Deva
Parti Vinayaka Pahi Gajanana
Bhaktha Priyam Bhava Bhaya Nashanam
Vande Aham Gana Nayakam
Meaning: At the outset, I worship and sing the praises of Lord Ganapathi, the beloved son of Mother Parvathi. He is the source of all and the Lord of Lords. As Lord of Parthi, He is adored by his devotees. He protects and removes their worldly fears and obstacles.
Songglossary: aham, ashvatha, bhaja, bhaktha, bhava, bhaya, deva, devadi, gajamukha, gana, gananayaka, moola, nasha, nayaka, paahi, parvathi, pranamamyaham, prathama, priya, puttaparthi, sutha, vande, vasa, vinayaka

Title: Prathama Namana Gana Nayaka
Lyrics:
Prathama Namana Gana Nayaka
Prathah Smaranam Vinayaka
Parti Ganesha Shubha Dayaka [ Prathama Namana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka He Gananayaka
Buddhi Pradayaka Vinayaka
Parthipurishwara Prashanti Dayaka
Sharana Namostuthey Gananayaka
Sharana Namostuthey Vinayaka
Sharana Namostuthey Shubha Dayaka
Meaning: At the break of dawn, first and foremost, remember to worship Lord Ganesha. He destroys obstacles, bestows good luck, and resides in Parthi. Worship and take refuge in Lord Ganesh, who imparts intelligence, eternal peace and good fortune.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gana, gananayaka, ganesha, naman, namostuthey, nayaka, partheeshwara, pradayaka, prasanthi, prathah, prathama, puttaparthi, sharan, shubh, smaran, vidya, vinayaka

Title: Prathama Poojya Deva Gajanana
Lyrics:
Prathama Poojya Deva Gajanana
Parthipurishwara Sai Gajanana [ Prathama Poojya ... ]
Parvathi Nandana Bala Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Sai Gajanana
Maya Vinashaka Mooshika  Vahana
Mangala Kara He Sai Gajanana
Meaning: Worship first Lord Gajanana, and Lord of Parthi. The son of Mother Parvathi and the life-breath of all, He destroys illusion and bestows good fortune.
Songglossary: bala, deva, gajamukha, kara, mangal, maya, mooshika, nanda, partheeshwara, parvathi, poojya, pranava, prathama, sai, swaroopa, vahana, vinasha

Title: Prathama Sharana Gana Nayaka Om
Lyrics:
Prathama Sharana Gana Nayaka Om
Vighna Vinashaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Mooshika Vahana Sai Gajanana
Meaning: First surrender and pay obeisance to the Lord of the divine forces, Lord Vinayaka. He destroys obstacles and assures success. He who rides a mouse as a vehicle, grants knowledge and pure intellect. Lord Sai is His embodiment.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gajamukha, gana, mooshika, nayaka, om, pradayaka, prathama, sai, sharan, siddhi, vahana, vidya, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Prathama Sharana Gananayaka
Lyrics:
Prathama Sharana Gananayaka
Vighna Vinashaka Siddhi Vinayaka [ Prathama Sharana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Mooshika Vahana Sai Gajanana
Meaning: First pay obeisance to the Lord of the Demigods, Lord Vinayaka. Who destroys obstacles and assures success in our endeavors. Who grants knowledge (spiritual) and intelligence. Lord Sai Gajanana has a mouse (wayward mind is kept under His control) as his vehicle.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gajamukha, gananayaka, mooshika, pradayaka, prathama, sai, sharan, siddhi, vahana, vidya, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Prathama Sharana Gananayaka
Lyrics:
Prathama Sharana Gananayaka
Prathah Smaranam Vinayaka
Parthi Pureeshwara Shubha Dayaka [ Prathama Sharana ]
Vidya Dayaka Hey Gananayaka
Buddhi Pradayaka Vinayaka
Mangala Kara Hey Prashanthi Dayaka
Parvathi Tanaya Vinayak
Prathah Smaranam Vinayaka [ Parthi Pureeshwara Shubha ]
Meaning: We offer first obeisance and surrender to the Lord of ganaas (demigods). He is the bestower of auspiciousness, the Lord of Parthi. He confers knowledge and intelligence, the auspicious Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Parvathi.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gananayaka, hey, kara, mangal, parvathi, pradayaka, prashanthi, prathah, prathama, purishwara, puttaparthi, sharan, shubh, smaran, tanaya, vidya, vinayaka

Title: Prathama Vandana Gananatha
Lyrics:
Prathama Vandana Gananatha
Gajavadana Jaya Gananatha [ Prathama Vandana ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka
Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
Meaning: Our first prayers to the Lord of the ganaas, The elephant-faced Lord Ganesh. He confers knowledge and intelligence. The remover of obstacles in the spiritual path. The One who is praised and adored by the wise and saintly.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gajamukha, gananatha, jay, pradayaka, prathama, suramuni, vandana, vanditha, vidya, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Prathama Vandana Gowri Nandana
Lyrics:
Prathama Vandana Gowri Nandana
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Gajanana [ Prathama Vandana ... ]
Eka Dantha Gunavanta Vinayaka
Vighna Harana Shubha Mangala Charana
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi ( Sai ) Gajanana
Meaning: First pay obeisance to Lord Sai Gajanana, (Lord Ganesh)The beloved Prince of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri. Oh Lord Sai Gajanana! The single-tusked One of noble character. You are the remover of obstacles, the bestower of auspiciousness. We bow to you, the embodiment of Pranava (Omkar).
Songglossary: chara, dantha, eka, gajamukha, gowri, gunavanta, harana, hey, mangal, nanda, paahi, pranava, prathama, sai, shiva, shubh, swaroopa, vandana, vighna, vinayaka

Title: Prathama Vandanam Ganapathi Devam
Lyrics:
Prathama Vandanam Ganapathi Devam
Nithyam Bhajarey Vinayakam (2)
Pranavakaram Parvathi Sutham
Sri Sai Natham Gananatham [ Nithyam Bhajarey ]
Meaning: Offer your first prayer (obeisance) to Lord Ganapathi, Chant incessantly the name of Vinayaka. He is the embodiment of Omkara (Pranava, the primordial sound). The beloved son of Mother Parvathi. He is none other our Lord Sainatha.
Songglossary: bhaja, devam, gananatha, gananayaka, natha, nithya, parvathi, pranava, prathama, sai, sri, sutha, vandana, vinayaka

Title: Precious Lord, precious Lord
Lyrics:
Precious Lord, precious Lord
 You fill my heart with happiness (1X)
 You fill my soul with joy and bliss (1X)
 Peace and love, joy and bliss (1X)
 You fill my heart with happiness (1X)

Title: Prem Bhakthi Jagao Man Mey
Lyrics:
Prem Bhakthi Jagao Man Mey
Aao Merey Bhajan Mey Baba
Tum Ho Deena Janon Ke Sai
Tum Ho Bhaktha Janon Ke Baba [ Aao Merey ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba! Welcome to my heart and please awake within me the love and devotion for Thee. You are the support of those who are meek. You are the dear Sai of the devoted.
Songglossary: aao, baba, bhaja, bhaktha, bhakthi, deen, ho, jagao, jana, ke, mana, mera, prem, sai, tum

Title: Prem Eshwar Hai Eshwar Prem
Lyrics:
Prem Eshwar Hai Eshwar Prem Hai
Har Dhadkan Mey Sai Sama Hai Eshwar Prem Hai [ Prem Eshwar ... ]
Ram Rahim Krishna Karim
Zohrashtra Yesu Nanak
Koi Bhi Naam Japo Rey Manuva Eshwar Prem Hai (Manuva)
Meaning: God is Love; Love is God. Lord Sai is merged and is the sustainer of each heart beat, which repeats God is Love. Oh Mind! Worship any name of the Lord Rama or Krishna, Rahim, Zohrashtra, Jesus or Nanak, as all names and form are love and only love. God is Love Love is God.
Songglossary: bhi, dhadkan, eshwar, hai, hara, japo, karim, koi, krishna, manuva, naam, nanak, prem, rahim, ram, sai, sama, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Prem Se Aao Prabhuji
Lyrics:
Prem Se Aao Prabhuji
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Sada Raho [ Prem Se ... ]
Nayana Mey Aao Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Nayana Mey ... ]
Nachath Nachath Nandalala [ Prem Se ... ]
Shravan Mey Aao Shirdeeshwara
Shirdeeshwara Puttapartheeshwara [ Shravana Mey ... ]
Sath Raho Sathya Sayeeshwara
Meaning: Oh Lord, Please come and decorate our Heart with your presence with Love. Oh Lord Narayana! Let our eyes be filled with your enchanting form as the dancing Nandalala. Oh Lord of Shirdi, Lord of Parthi, let our ears listen to absorbing stories of your plays. So that we ever remain absorbed in your presence.
Songglossary: aao, hrudaya, mandir, nach, nanda, narayana, nayan, prabhu, prem, puttapartheeshwara, raho, sada, sai, sat, sathya, sayee, se, shirdeesha, shravan

Title: Prem Se Bolo Ek Baar
Lyrics:
Prem Se Bolo Ek Baar Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram
Bolo Ram Sai Ram [ Prem Se ... ]
Hey Madhura Manohara Ram
Hey Mohan Moorat Ram
Hey Karuna Sindhu Ram
Hey Raghupathi Raghava Ram
Hey Patitha Pavana Ram [ Jai Jai Ram
Meaning: Once more, recite the name of Lord Sai Ram. Victory to Lord Sai Ram. Chant the name of Lord Rama, of the Raghu Dynasty. Who is charming and pleasing, The ocean of mercy and the saviour of the miserable and fallen.
Songglossary: baar-baar, bolo, ek, hey, jai, karuna, madhu, manohar, mohan, moorat, patitha, pavan, prem, raghava, raghu, ram, sai, se, sindhu

Title: Prem Se Gao Mangala Naam
Lyrics:
Prem Se Gao Mangala Naam
Govinda Gopala Bolo Hari Naam
Prem Ke Sindho Deenon Ke Bandho
Karunamaya Sai Nayanabhi Ram [ Govinda Gopal ]
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (3)
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: With love and devotion chant the auspicious name of the merciful and loving Lord Sai, who is an ocean of love and Companion of the meek. Chant the names Govinda and Gopala. Chant the name of the Compassionate Sai. Hail to Krishna, Ram and Sai Ram.
Songglossary: bandho, bolo, deenon, gao, gopal, govinda, hari, karuna, ke, krishna, mangal, naam, nayan, prem, ram, sai, se, sindhu

Title: Prem Se Gao Pavana Naam
Lyrics:
Prem Se Gao Pavana Naam
Rama Rama Raghu Nandana Rama [ Prem Se ... ]
Janaki Rama Jaya Raghu Rama
Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Sathya Naama
Meaning: With love and devotion, sing the purifying and uplifting name of Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. Victory to the Lord of Janaki, Lord Rama. Victory to Lord Sathya Sai Baba.
Songglossary: gao, janaki, jay, naam, nanda, pavan, prem, raghu, ram, sai, sathya, se

Title: Prema Avatara Sai
Lyrics:
Prema Avatara Sai
Mahima Avatara Sai
Kali Yuga Avatara Sai
Meaning: Pray to Sai, the incarnation of Love, Pray to Sai, the miraculous One Pray to Sai, the incarnation of the present Kali age.
Songglossary: avatar, kali, mahima, prem, sai, yuga

Title: Prema Muditha Man Se Kaho
Lyrics:
Prema Muditha Man Se Kaho (Rama Rama Ram) X 3 Sri Rama Rama Ram
Paapa Katey Dukha Mitey Lekey Rama Naam
Bhava Samudra Sukhada Naava Ek Rama Naam
Parama Shanthi Sukha Nidhana Divya Rama Naam
Niraadhaara Ko Aadhara Ek Rama Naam
Parama Gopya Parama Divya Mantra Rama Naam
Sant Hrudaya Sada Basath Ek Ram Naam
Mata Pitha Bandhu Sakha Sab Hi Ram Naam
Bhaktha Janara Jeevana Dhana Ek Ram Naam
(Rama Rama Ram) X 3 Sri Rama Rama Ram
Meaning: With the heart and mind full of love and devotion, recite the name of Lord Rama. Reciting the name of Lord Rama cuts down sins and miseries. It is the safe boat that helps to cross the ocean of life and death. So potent is Lord Rama's name that it brings eternal peace and bliss. It is the only support of those who have no support (destitute). So loving and so divine is Lord Rama's name that sages and saints always have only Lord Rama's name in their hearts. O Lord Rama! You are my Mother, Father, Relative, Friend, everything else. The only life-long treasure of the devotee is Your name. Chant the mantra 'Rama Rama Rama'.
Songglossary: aadhaar, bandhava, basayi, bhaktha, bhava, dhana, divya, dukh, ek, gopya, hai, hrudaya, jana, jeevan, kaho, katey, ko, ley, mana, mantra, mata, mitey, muditha, naam, naiya, nidhan, niraadhaar, paapa, parama, pitha, prem, ram, sab, sada, sakha, samudra, sant, se, shanthi, sri, sukh, sukhada

Title: Prema Sai Parthi Sai
Lyrics:
Prema Sai Parthi Sai
Pavana Sai Parama Guru Sai [ Prema Sai ... ]
Mangala Kara Karuna Sai
Karuna Sai Karuna Sai (Mangala Kara)
Madhura Madhura Hrudaya Nivasi
Murali Gaana Vilola Sai
Meaning: Sing (chant) the name of Sai who is the embodiment of Love, The inner purifier who is the Supreme Guru Sai, who bestows auspiciousness and full of Grace The sweetest indweller of our hearts He is the enchanter with the flute born again as Sai.
Songglossary: gaan, guru, hrudaya, kara, karuna, madhu, mangal, murali, nivasi, param, pavan, prem, puttaparthi, sai, vilola

Title: Prema Sudha Rasa Deejo Sai
Lyrics:
Prema Sudha Rasa Deejo Sai
Paramananda Sada Sukha Dayi [ Prema Sudha ... ]
Prashanthi Nilaya Dwarakamayi
Pavana Purusha Sadguru Sai
Deena Daya Ghana Sri Raghurayi
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai give us the nectar of divine Love and bliss of the highest order. You are the most blissful, who confers endless joy. The holy and divine preceptor of Dwarakamayi in Shirdi and Prashanthi Nilayam at Parthi. You, belonging to the Raghu lineage, who has unending compassion for the meek.
Songglossary: daya, dayi, deejo, deen, dwaraka, ghana, nilaya, param, pavan, prashanthi, prem, purusha, raghu, rasa, sada, sadguru, sai, sri, sudha, sukh

Title: Prema Swaroopa I am Divine Love
Lyrics:
Prema Swaroopa I am Divine Love
 Prema Swaroopa Sai Ram
 Prema Prema Prema Om
 Sat Chit Aanandha Om
 Sathya Swaroopa I am Divine Truth
 Sathya Swaroopa Sai Ram
 Sathya Sathya Sathya Om
 Sat Chit Aanandha Om
 Shaanthi Swaroopa I am Divine Peace
 Shaanthi Swaroopa Sai Ram
 Shaanthi Shaanthi Shaanthi Om
 Sat Chit Aanandha Om.

Title: Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand
Lyrics:
Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand Prema Swaroopa Prema Bhagavaan
 Your will is my will, Your will is mine
 Your will is my will, Your will's divine
 My will is Your will, my will is Yours
 My will is Your will, our wills entwine
 Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand Prema Swaroopa Prema Bhagavaan
 There's no place to go, there's nothing left to do,
 There's nothing left to see, there's no one left to be
 For Your will is my will, Your will is mine
 Your will is my will, Your will's divine
 Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand Prema Swaroopa Prema Bhagavaan

Title: Prema Swaroopini Janani Ma
Lyrics:
Prema Swaroopini Janani Ma
Charana Namostuthey Sai Ma [ Prema Swaroopini ... ]
Jagadambe Krupa Kari Sai Ma
Karunamayi Janani Sai Ma
Tribhuvana Palini Sai Ma [ Charana Namostuthey ]
Meaning: You are embodiment of Divine Love, Oh mother of Universe. Humble Pranaams at Your holy feet Oh Mother Sai. Please have compassion for me Mother Sai. Oh divine mother of the three worlds, Mother Sai. Humble Salutations to you.
Songglossary: chara, jagadamba, janani, kari, karuna, krupa, ma, namostuthey, palini, prem, sai, swaroopa, tribhuvan

Title: Premamaya Bhagawan Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Premamaya Bhagawan Sai Ram
Karunamaya Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram
Hey Dukha Bhanjana Palanahaarey
Hey Leelamaya Apad Saharey
Sharan Mey Lelo Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram
Meaning: Lord Sai Rama, you are the personification of Love and compassion, who destroys our miseries, who takes care of our troubles, Oh Lord take us in your fold. We surrender at your feet.
Songglossary: apad, bhagawan, bhanjana, dukh, hey, karuna, leela, lelo, palanhaar, premamayi, ram, saharey, sai, sharan

Title: Premamayi Sai
Lyrics:
Premamayi Sai
Parabrahmamayi Sai
Anandamayi Sai
Paratatvamayi Sai
Niramayi Sai
Characharamayi Sai
Mayamayi Sai (Ati)
Meaning: Lord Sai, Love personified, Sai, the Cosmic consciousness, Sai, who endows one with bliss, Sai, who preaches the ultimate and the highest Truth, Sai, who is blemishless, Sai, Present in moving and non - moving objects and creator of illusion (Maya) of this world.
Songglossary: anand, ati, chara, mayam, niramaya, parabrahma, paratatva, premamayi, sai

Title: Premamayi Sai Ma Gnanamayi Sai
Lyrics:
Premamayi Sai Ma Gnanamayi Sai Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Sai Ma Sadananda Roopini Sai Ma
Parabrahma Roopini Sai Ma Tum Hi Moksha Pradayini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You are the Embodiment of love, wisdom and bliss. Victory to Thee Mother Sai. Sai is the embodiment of Lord Shiva and Shakthi in one and ever remaining in a state of bliss. She is supreme consciousness incarnate and grants Liberation.
Songglossary: dayini, gnana, hai, jay, ma, moksha, parabrahma, premamayi, sadana, sai, shakthi, shiva, swaroopa, tum

Title: Premamrutha Barsao Baba
Lyrics:
Premamrutha Barsao Baba
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Tumhari Daya Bin Kaisa Jeevan
Rom Rom Mey Basneywaale Ram
Janana Marana Se Par Utharo
Daya Karo Bhagawan [ Krupa Karo ]
Meaning: Shower Your nectarine Love, Baba. Have compassion on me. Shower Your Grace. This life is meaningless without Your compassion. You are the indweller, life force of my every nerve. Oh Compassionate One, please liberate me from this cycle of life and death.
Songglossary: baba, baraso, basayi, bhagawan, bin, daya, janam, jeeva, kaisa, karo, krupa, maran, par, premamrutha, ram, rom, se, tumhara, utharo

Title: Punya Naam Pavitra Naam Rama
Lyrics:
Punya Naam Pavitra Naam Rama Naam Sai Ram
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Madhura (Amrutha) Naam Sai Ram [ Punya Naam ... ]
Karuna Sindhu Sita Ram Deena Bandhu Radhey Shyam [ Harey Krishna ... ]
Meaning: Recite the pure and holy name of Lord Sai Rama. Glory to the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna and Sai Ram that is sweet and nectarine. Chant the name of Lord Krishna, the protector of the dejected and miserable and Lord Rama, the ocean of mercy. The names confer auspiciousness.
Songglossary: amrutha, bandhava, deen, hari, karuna, krishna, madhura, naam, pavitra, punya, radha, ram, sai, sham, sindhu, sita

Title: Purana Paramananda Swaroopa
Lyrics:
Purana Paramananda Swaroopa
Deena Natha Dayala Swaroopa [ Purana Paramananda ... ]
Sai Natha Krupala Swaroopa
Bholey Natha Vishala Swaroopa
Meaning: Lord Sai is the personification of complete and eternal bliss. Chant the name of the all-merciful and omnipresent Lord of the destitute, Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: bhole, dayal, deen, krupalu, natha, param, puran, sai, swaroopa, vishala

Title: Purandara Ranga Harey Vittala
Lyrics:
Purandara Ranga Harey Vittala
Pandari Ranga Harey Vittala [ Purandara Ranga ... ]
Narahari Ranga Harey Vittala
Murahara Ranga Harey Vittala
Meaning: Chant the name of Purandara Ranga, the Lord worshipped by Saint Purandara Dasa. Glory to Vittala, the Lord of Pandharpur, Murahara Ranga, the glorious one who slayed the demon Mura. Chant the name of Hari, who has taken human form.
Songglossary: hari, murahara, narahari, pandari, purandara, ranga, vittala

Title: Puttaparthi no Kamisama
Lyrics:
Puttaparthi no Kamisama Watashi wa kimashita
 Sakura Saku Kuni kara
 Sai Ram Tonaete
 Misugata Ukabete
 Dharshan no Retsu no Nake de Anata wo Machimasu
 Ai no Kamisama
 Sai Ram Tonaete
 Misugata Ukabete

Title: Pyaarey Nanda Lal Darshan Deejo
Lyrics:
Pyaarey Nanda Lal Darshan Deejo
Yashoda Ke Bal Darshan Deejo [ Pyaarey Nandalal ... ]
Natavara Lal Darshan Deejo
Giridhara Bal Darshan Deejo
Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna! Kindly present Thyself. Oh Beloved Prince of Nanda and Mother Yashoda, give me your Darshan! You are the divinely mischievous child and the one who lifted the Govardhan mountain, please grant me your Darshan!
Songglossary: bala, darsh, deejo, giridhar, ke, lal, nanda, natavara, pyaara, yashoda

Title: Raasa Vilola Nandalala
Lyrics:
Raasa Vilola Nandalala
Radha Madhava Nandalala [ Raasa Vilola ... ]
Nanda Kishora Nandalala
Navaneetha Chora Nandalala
Nandalala Sai Nandalala (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of the son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, who is fond of the Raasa leela (divine folk dance with Gopis). The Lord of Radha, is the one who steals the hearts of devotees.
Songglossary: chora, kishora, madhava, nanda, nandalala, navaneetha, raasa, radha, sai, vilola

Title: Raavo Raavo Ranga Sai
Lyrics:
Raavo Raavo Ranga Sai
Radha Lola Ramaneeya Roopa [ Raavo Raavo ... ]
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala
Vedodharana Vara Sai Rama
Meaning: Come and give us your Darshan Oh Ranga Sai (Krishna - Sai). One who has a lovely form, dear to Radha. One who revels in playing on the Flute, the victorious protector of all beings, You are none other than Sai Rama, who has taken the vow to redeem the Vedas (spiritual way of life).
Songglossary: gopal, lola, raavo, radha, ram, ramaneeya, ranga, roopa, sai, vara, vedodhara, venu, vijaya, vilola

Title: Raavo Raavo Sri Raghu Ram
Lyrics:
Raavo Raavo Sri Raghu Ram
Kaavo Ee Mammu Kodanda Rama [ Raavo Raavo ... ]
Bhava Nashaka Bhadrachala Rama (x2)
Pavana Naama Sri Sai Rama
Meaning: Oh Sri Rama! Won't you come to us and protect us? O Rama of the Bhadrachala temple, the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death, help us. Protect me, Oh Rama, who bears the Bow and Arrow (Kodanda). Oh Lord Sri Sai Rama - the one with the holy name.
Songglossary: bhadrachala, bhava, ee, kaavo, kodanda, mammu, naam, nasha, pavan, raavo, raghu, ram, sai, sri

Title: Radha Jeevana Raasa Vilola
Lyrics:
Radha Jeevana Raasa Vilola
Rakumayi Vittala Vittala Bala
Gopi Vallabha Gokula Bala (2)
Kali Yuga Sai Krishna Gopala
Meaning: Gopala is the very life of Radha, the beloved Krishna of the Gopis, performing the celestial dance with the Gopikas. The cowherd boy of Gokula, Vittala the consort of Rakumayi, has come down as Sai Krishna in the present Kali age.
Songglossary: bala, gokul, gopal, gopi, jeeva, kali, krishna, raasa, radha, rakumayi, sai, vallabha, vilola, vittala, yuga

Title: Radha Ke Natavar Lal Kanhaiya
Lyrics:
Radha Ke Natavar Lal Kanhaiya
Gokula Bala Goparipala [ Radha Ke ... ]
Nanda Kumara Raasa Vilola
Meera Ke Prabhu Nanda Lal Kanhaiya
Meaning: Lord Krishna (Kanhaiya), the Lord of Radha and Meera (devotee), The child of Gokula (city), is the sustainer of all beings. The darling son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, is fond of the Raasa (divine dance depicting the ecstacy of the union of the individual souls with the Supreme One).
Songglossary: bala, gokul, goparipala, kanha, ke, kumara, lal, meera, nanda, natavara, prabhu, raasa, radha, vilola

Title: Radha Krishna Jaya Kunja Vihari
Lyrics:
Sai Krishna Kunja Vihari
Muralidhara Govardhanadhari [ Sai Krishna ]
Shankha Chakra Pitambaradhari
Karuna Sagara Krishna Murari
Krishna Murari Keshava Murari
Madhava Murari Madhusudhana Murari
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha, who walked the gardens (Brindavan). He is described here as the one who plays the flute, wears saffron robes, an ocean of mercy, who held the mountain (Govardhan) aloft to protect His devotees, who carries a conch and a discus and who slayed the demons Madhu and Mura.
Songglossary: chakra, govardhan, karuna, kesha, krishna, kunja, madhava, madhu, murali, murare, sagar, sai, shankha, vihar

Title: Radha Krishna Karuna Lola Radhey
Lyrics:
Radha Krishna Karuna Lola Radhey Govinda
Radhey Govinda Murali Govinda
Radhey Radhey Govinda Murali Govinda
Meaning: Chant the name of the merciful Lord, Radha Krishna. He is Radhey Govinda and Murali Govinda, who plays the enchanting flute.
Songglossary: govinda, karuna, krishna, lola, murali, radha

Title: Radha Krishna Panduranga Radhey Govinda
Lyrics:
Radha Krishna Panduranga Radhey Govinda
Rama Krishna Panduranga Murali Govinda [ Radha Krishna ... ]
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora Narayana Hari Govinda
Narayana Hari Govinda Narayana Govinda [ Nanda Kumara ... ]
Pandari Natha Panduranga Parthi Pureesha Govinda
Meaning: Victory to Lord Radha Krishna, also Radhey Govinda, Son of Nanda, the one who steals butter (hearts) from (of devotees) other houses. Chant the name of Lord Narayana, who installed Himself as Vittala Lord of Pandharpur. He has come down as Lord Sai at Parthi.
Songglossary: chora, govinda, hari, krishna, kumara, murali, nanda, narayana, natha, navaneetha, pandari, pandu, pureesha, puttaparthi, radha, ram

Title: Radha Lola Ramya Suchela
Lyrics:
Radha Lola Ramya Suchela
Rajitha Vana Mala Gopala
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala
Vedagama Moola Gopala
Meaning: Oh! Delightful, elegant, beautiful darling of Radha, Gopala; You are the one who is embellished with a garland of flowers from the vines of the forest, You are the beautiful player of the flute, victorious Gopala, You are the origin of the Vedas too.
Songglossary: gopal, lola, mala, moola, radha, rajitha, ramya, suchela, vana, vedagama, venu, vijaya, vilola

Title: Radha Madhava Gopala
Lyrics:
Radha Madhava Gopala
Raasa Manohara Nandalala
Gopi Jana Mana Mohana Hey Krishna
Govardhana Dhara Nandalala
Parthi Vihara Nandalala (2)
Meaning: Bow Down to the Lord of Lakshmi, who has taken birth as Krishna, who captivates our hearts and minds by His celestial dance with Radha (signifies the coming together of the individual and Cosmic soul). He is the son of Nanda and the one who held aloft the Govardhan mountain. Now strolls around delighting the devotees in Parthi.
Songglossary: dhara, gopal, gopi, govardhan, hey, jana, krishna, madhava, mana, manohar, mohan, nanda, puttaparthi, raasa, radha, vihar

Title: Radha Madhava Gopalana
Lyrics:
Radha Madhava Gopalana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (2)
Narayana Veda Parayana
Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Gopala and Govinda, the protector and sustainer of all beings, Narayana and the Lord of Radha, Lord Madhava, Who is none other than Lord Vishnu, the preacher of the Vedas.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, madhava, narayana, parayana, radha, veda

Title: Radha Madhava Madana Gopala
Lyrics:
Radha Madhava Madana Gopala
Nanda Mukunda Natavara Lala [ Radha Madhava ... ]
Mathura Natha Deena Dayala
Sai Govinda Giridhara Bala
Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna - Madhava, Gopala, Govinda, beloved of Radha. He is the beloved son of Nanda who liberates us with His divine dance. He is the Lord of Mathura, so full of compassion for the meek. Sai is none other than the boy who held up the mountain to save his devotees.
Songglossary: bala, dayal, deen, giridhar, gopal, govinda, lal, madana, madhava, mathura, mukunda, nanda, natavara, natha, radha, sai

Title: Radha Madhava Mana Mohana
Lyrics:
Radha Madhava Mana Mohana
Shyama Mukunda Madhusudhana [ Radha Madhava ... ]
Krishna Murari Yadu Nandana
Mandara Giridhari Gopalana
Madhuvana Sanchari Janardhana
Meaning: Sing the praises of Radha and Madhava who regales the mind of devotees, The dark complexioned Lord of the Yadu clan, Slayer of demons Mura and Madhu, He is the protector who held aloft the Mandara mountain. Janardhana, Who moves about in the forests of Madhu (Madhuvan - Brindavan).
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, janardhana, krishna, madhava, madhu, mana, manda, mohan, mukunda, murare, nanda, radha, sanchari, sham, yadu

Title: Radha Pyaarey Jaya Gopal
Lyrics:
Radha Pyaarey Jaya Gopal
Radha Madhava Jaya Gopal
Brindavan Ke Jaya Gopal
Murali Manohara Jaya Gopal
Meaning: Victory to the universal Protector, the Beloved Lord of Radha (devotee). Victory to that Lord Gopal of Brindavan. Victory to Gopal, the one who enchants with the Divine Flute.
Songglossary: brinda, gopal, jay, ke, madhava, manohar, murali, pyaara, radha

Title: Radha Radha Radha Krishna Radha
Lyrics:
Radha Radha Radha Krishna Radha
Radha Krishna Radha (Jai) [ Radha Radha ]
Meaning: Sing in praise of Radha and Krishna incessantly.
Songglossary: jai, krishna, radha

Title: Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopal
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopal Bhajo
Murali Gopal Bhajo Sai Ghana Shyam
Sai Ghana Shyam (Shyam) Sai Ghana Shyam
Meaning: Sing the praises of Radhey Govinda, Radhey Gopala, who is of deep blue complexion, holding the Flute in His hands. He is none other than our beloved Sai.
Songglossary: bhaja, ghana, gopal, govinda, murali, radha, sai, sham

Title: Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Govinda
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Govinda
Radha Ramana Hari Radhey Govinda [ Radhey Govinda ]
Radha Ramana Hari Radhey Govinda
Radhey (4) Radhey (4) Radhey (4) Radhey Govinda
Meaning: Sing in praise of Radha and her beloved Govinda incessantly. Sing of Govinda who enthralls the heart of Radha. He is but the Lord Hari, the protector of all beings. Chant the holy name of Radhey, Radhey.
Songglossary: bhaja, govinda, hari, radha, ramana

Title: Radhey Govinda Bol Tu Mukh
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bol Tu Mukh Se
Bol Tu Sai Ram (2)
Jai Bolo Sai Ram
Pal Pal Jeevan Beetho Jaaye
Bol Hari Ka Naam [ Jai Bolo ... ]
Radhey Govinda Bol Tu Mukh Se
Bol Tu Sai Ram
Rom Rom Mey Sai Basaaye
Shwas Shwas Mey Ram [ Jai Bolo ... ]
Meaning: Oh Man repeat the names of the Lord Radhey Govinda and Sai Ram with your tongue. Our life span ebbs away with every passing second. Hence, chant the name of Hari and Sai before it is too late. Let every hair on our body vibrate with the name of Sai and our breath with the name of Ram.
Songglossary: basayi, beetho, bol, bolo, govinda, hari, jaaye, jai, jeeva, ka, mukh, naam, pal, radha, ram, rom, sai, se, shwas, tum

Title: Radhey Govinda Bolo Radhey Govinda
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bolo Radhey Govinda
Krishna Mukunda Bolo Krishna Mukunda
Brindavan Chanda Radhey Govinda
Prabhu Paramananda Krishna Mukunda
Sai Satchidananda Sri Mukharavinda [ Krishna Mukunda ]
Krishna Mukunda Bolo Krishna Mukunda
Meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Govinda and Krishna Mukunda. Radhey Govinda is the crowning jewel of Brindavan. While Krishna Mukunda endows one with supreme bliss. The Lotus faced Sai is the very personification of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.
Songglossary: bolo, brinda, chand, govinda, krishna, mukha, mukunda, param, prabhu, radha, sai, satchidananda, sri

Title: Radhey Govinda Gopala
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Gopala ( Jaya )
Mana Mohana Hey Nanda Mukunda [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Mukunda
Sai Mukunda Sai Mukunda
Meaning: Chant the divine names of Radhey Govinda and Gopala. He is the one who attracts the mind and is the darling of Nanda. He is the one who is attractive to all the cowherd girls and is the darling of Gokula. Chant his name who has come down as Sai Mukunda to all his devotees, to help them cross the ocean of life and death.
Songglossary: bala, bhakthon, gokul, gopal, gopi, govinda, hey, jay, ke, lola, mana, mohan, mukunda, nanda, radha, sai, sathya

Title: Radhey Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhey Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala (2) [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Krishna Madhusudhana Madhusudhana Krishna
Gopala Gopala Gopala ( Sai )
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Gopala, Krishna, the one who tends to cows, Lord of Radha (devotee). Repeat the names incessantly of Krishna, who slayed the demon Madhu.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jay, krishna, madhusudhana, radha, sai

Title: Radhey Govinda Harey Murarey
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Harey Murarey
Shyama Mukunda Harey Murarey
Krishna Govinda Harey Murarey
Sai Mukunda Harey Murarey
Meaning: Chant the many names of Lord Krishna, who destroys the miseries of life Radhey Govinda, Shyama Mukunda, Of the dark complexioned liberator, the slayer of demon Mura and of Sai Mukunda.
Songglossary: govinda, hari, krishna, mukunda, murare, radha, sai, sham

Title: Radhey Govinda Harey Radhey Govinda
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Harey Radhey Govinda
Krishna Mukunda Harey Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda Radhey Govinda
Prabhu Paramananda Radhey Govinda
Sai Satchidananda Shri Mukharavinda [ Krishna Mukunda ]
Meaning: Chant the names of Krishna, Radha's Lord and resident of Brindavan. Chant the name of the blissful Lord Sai who is truth, knowledge and bliss.
Songglossary: brinda, chand, govinda, hari, krishna, mukha, mukunda, param, prabhu, radha, sai, satchidananda, sri

Title: Radhey Govinda Jai Jai Radhey
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Jai Jai Radhey Gopala
Deena Natha Govinda Anatha Natha Gopala [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Radha Lola Govinda Raasa Vilola Gopala
Govinda Jaya Govinda Gopala Jaya Gopala
Meaning: Victory to Lord Gopala, the Lord of Radha. You are the Lord of the meek and those who have no support. Oh Lord of Radha! You revel in the cosmic dance with the Gopis. Victory to Lord Govinda. Victory to Lord Gopala, the protector and sustainer of all beings.
Songglossary: anath, deen, gopal, govinda, jai, jay, lola, natha, raasa, radha, vilola

Title: Radhey Govinda Krishna Murarey
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Krishna Murarey
Jaya Sai Mukunda Murarey [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Nanda Ananda Radhey Govinda
Radhey Govinda Sai Govinda [ Jaya Sai ]
Meaning: Oh Blue- Complexioned Lord Govinda of Radha! You are the destroyer of the demon Mura. Victory to you Lord Sai, who bestows liberation. Victory to the blissful son of Nanda, the Lord of Radha, protector of all beings.
Songglossary: anand, govinda, jay, krishna, mukunda, murare, nanda, radha, sai

Title: Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala Sai
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala Sai Ram
Bansidhara Bansidhara Hey Chitha Chora
Hey Natavara Hey Natavara Nanda Kishora
Ghana Shyama Sundara Megha Shyama Sundara Sai Rama
Meaning: Worship the names of the Lord Govinda - Lord of Radha, Gopala - protector of the innocent, Sai Ram. Oh Holder of the Flute! You are the stealer (Chitta Chora) of our awareness, mind and heart. Sing the names of Radhey Govinda, Radhey Gopala. The handsome and mischievous son of Nanda, you have the complexion of thick black clouds, thou art Sai Ram.
Songglossary: bansi, chitha, chora, ghana, gopal, govinda, hey, kishora, megha, nanda, natavara, radha, ram, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Radhey Govinda Shyama Gopala
Lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Shyama Gopala
Radhey Govinda Natavaralala [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Brindavana Ghana Venu Vilola
Devaki Nandana Krishna Kanhaiya
Radhey Govinda Natavaralala
Meaning: Lord Krishna is known by many names: Govinda, the divine dancer, the dark-complexioned Gopala, son of Devaki, Radha's Lord and the flute-playing resident of Brindavan.
Songglossary: brinda, devaki, ghana, gopal, govinda, kanha, krishna, nanda, natavara, radha, sham, venu, vilola

Title: Radhey Krishna Govinda Bol Manuva
Lyrics:
Radhey Krishna Govinda Bol Manuva
Sri Hari Madhava Govinda Bol [ Radhey Krishna ... ]
Nanda Ananda Shyama Govinda
Pandarinatha Panduranga Bhajore
Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the names of Radhey Krishna, Govinda, Madhava, Hari who is the Lord of Lakshmi and the blissful, dark-hued son of Nanda. Sing the name of Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur.
Songglossary: anand, bhajao, bol, govinda, hari, krishna, madhava, manuva, nanda, pandari, panduranga, radha, sham, sri

Title: Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Bhajore
Lyrics:
Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Bhajore Bhajo
Giridhara Nagara Bhajore Bhajo [ Radhey Krishna ... ]
Murali Manohara Bhajore Bhajo
Parthipuri Sai Bhajore Bhajo (Putta)
Meaning: Sing the name of Lord Krishna, Lord of Radha, who plays the enchanting flute and who resides in Puttaparthi (Lord Sai)
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, giridhar, krishna, manohar, murali, nagara, puttaparthi, radha, sai

Title: Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Jai
Lyrics:
Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Jai Sri Krishna Radhey Radhey (2)
Radhey Krishna Radhey Radhey
Jai Sri Krishna Radhey Radhey
Shirdi Krishna Parthi Krishna Sai Krishna Radhey Radhey
Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Jai Sri Krishna Radhey Radhey
Radhey Krishna Radhey Radhey [ Jai Sri ]
Meaning: Repeat the Names of Radhey Krishna, Of Shirdi Krishna and Parthi Krishna. Victory be to Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: jai, krishna, puttaparthi, radha, sai, shirdi, sri

Title: Radhey Mukunda Murari Govinda
Lyrics:
Radhey Mukunda Murari Govinda
Govinda Govinda Ananda (3) [ Radhey Mukunda ... ]
Giridhari Giridhari Ananda (3)
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord of Radha, Mukunda - bestower of liberation, Murari, who slayed the demon Mura Govinda, the protector of the innocent and Giridhari, who held aloft the mountain. Sing repeatedly the names of Radhey Mukunda, Govinda, Giridhari, the real source of Bliss.
Songglossary: anand, giridhar, govinda, mukunda, murare, radha

Title: Radhey Radhey Govinda
Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Govinda
Radhey Radhey Gopala
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala
Radhey Mukunda Harey
Radhey Mukunda Harey (3)
Meaning: Chant the Names of the Radha's Lord Govinda and Gopala, Radhey Gopala and Radhey Mukunda over and over again.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, govinda, hari, mukunda, radha

Title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
Hey Radhey Gopala
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala (2) [ Radhey Radhey ]
Murali Manohara Govinda Hey Madhava Murahari Govinda (2)
Meaning: Let us sing in praise of Radha and Krishna. Praise be to Krishna who is the protector and sustainer, Whose flute music enchants us. He is Madhava, the Lord of Lakshmi.
Songglossary: bhaja, gopal, govinda, hey, madhava, manohar, murahara, murali, radha

Title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Nanda Mukunda
Giridhara Vraja Dhara Radhey Gopal
Murali Manohara Radhey Gopal
Shankha Chakra Dhara Radhey Gopal
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopal
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord the Lord of Radha, Lord Govinda, The one who is the son of Nanda. Lord Mukunda, who liberates the soul. Giridhara the holder of the mountain and the Lord Radhey Gopala, The enchanter with the flute. He is the bearer of the conch, disc and mace (Lord Vishnu). Sing the praise of Radhey Gopal. .
Songglossary: bhaja, chakra, dhara, giridhar, gopal, govinda, manohar, mukunda, murali, nanda, radha, shankha, vraja

Title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey
Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda
Anatha Natha Deena Bandhu Radhey Govinda
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda [ Anatha Natha ]
Bhaktha Vatsala Bhaagavatha Priya Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda [ Anatha Natha ]
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda [ Anatha Natha ]
Pandari Natha Panduranga Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda [ Anatha Natha ]
Pundarikaaksha Purana Purusha Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chanda [ Anatha Natha ]
Meaning: Chant continuously the name of Radhey Govinda - signifying Radha (the individual soul) and Govinda (signifying the Universal soul), the shining star of Brindavana, who is the refuge of the forlorn. He is the son of Nanda, the one who stole butter from the other's houses (steals devotees' hearts), Who takes care of his devotees, Who loves the Bhagawath (epic story of the avatars of Lord Vishnu). Radhey Govinda is the victorious One, who likes to play scintillating music on His Flute. He is Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur. He is the One who waited at the doorstep of devotee Pundarika to grant him liberation. He is Radhey Govinda, the ancient One.
Songglossary: anath, bandhava, bhaagavatha, bhaktha, brinda, chand, chora, deen, gopal, govinda, kumara, nanda, natha, navaneetha, pandari, pandu, priya, pundarika, puran, purusha, radha, vatsala, venu, vijaya, vilola

Title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Venu
Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Venu Gopala
Venu Gopala Sai Gopala [ Radhey Radhey ... ]
Radhika Manohara Raja Gopala
Gopika Manohara Gopi Gopala
Neela Megha Shyama Sundara Sai Gopala
Madhava Keshava Sai Jai Jai Gopala
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Govinda, Gopala, Lord of Radha - The ever blissful and enchanting Flute Player, who is our Sai Gopala. Pray to Lord Krishna, the beautiful cowherd boy with dark blue skin like a cloud The one with beautiful hair who enchants the Gopikas He is the Lord of Lakshmi, victory to Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: gopal, gopi, jai, kesha, madhava, manohar, megha, neela, radha, radhika, raja, sai, sham, sundara, venu

Title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam
Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam
Krishna ( Sai ) Murari Radhey Shyam
Kunja Vihari Radhey Shyam
Muralidhari Radhey Shyam [ Krishna Murari ... ]
Meaning: Let us chant the Name of Radhey Shyam, He is Krishna, the one who killed demon Mura. He moves around the thick bushes of (Kunj) Brindavan, Who holds the flute in his hands.
Songglossary: krishna, kunja, murali, murare, radha, sai, sham, vihar

Title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam Rakumayi
Lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam Rakumayi Vittala
Jaya Hari Sri Hari Sai Hari Vittala [ Radhey Radhey ... ]
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Purandara Vittala Pundarikaaksha Vittala
Meaning: Sing the name of Vittala, beloved of Radha and Rukmini. Victory to Lord Hari, Lord Sai, Lord Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur. He is the Lord of Saint Purandara Dasa and the liberator of devotee Pundarika.
Songglossary: hari, jay, natha, pandari, pandu, pundarika, puran, radha, rakumayi, sai, sham, sri, vittala

Title: Radhey Shyam Panduranga Vittaley Rakumayi
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Panduranga Vittaley Rakumayi
Panduranga Purandara Vittaley Rakumayi
Radhey Shyam Panduranga Vittaley Rakumayi (2) [ Panduranga ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Panduranga Vittala, who is none other than Radhey Shyam. Chant the name of Panduranga Vittala with His consort Rakumayi. He who was worshipped by Saint Purandara dasa.
Songglossary: pandu, puran, radha, rakumayi, sham, vittala

Title: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Radha Madhava Radhey Shyam
Adi Narayana Radhey Shyam
Anadi Purusha Megha Shyam
Anatha Rakshaka Radhey Shyam
Puttapartheeshwara Sai Shyam
Meaning: Oh dark blue complexioned Krishna! Beloved of Radha! You are the Lord of Lakshmi, You are the primordial soul. The ageless one. Oh Lord Govinda! You are the Protector and friend of the meek and humble. Victory you come as Lord Sai, who is the one residing in Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: adi, anadi, anath, madhava, megha, narayana, purusha, puttapartheeshwara, radha, raksha, sai, sham

Title: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Radha Madhava Megha Shyam
Yashoda Bala Radhey Shyam
Murali Krishna Megha Shyam
Karna Kundala Kasturi Tilaka
Kaustubha Abharana Radhey Shyam [ Radhey Shyam ]
Sundara Vadana Radhey Shyam
Nanda Gokula Megha Shyam
Sridhara Madhava Yadava Nandana
Gokula Krishna Radhey Shyam
Meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Shyam, the dark blue hued Lord of Lakshmi. He is the son of Mother Yashoda and an enchanter with the flute. With ornaments on his ears and vermillion mark of the musk on his forehead, adorned with the jewel, Koustubha. The handsome, dark hued son of Gokula chief, Nanda. Lord of wealth, the darling of Yadavas. He is Krishna of Gokula, Radhey Shyam.
Songglossary: abharana, bala, gokul, karna, kasturi, kaustubha, krishna, kundala, madhava, megha, murali, nanda, radha, sham, sridhara, sundara, tilaka, vadana, yadava, yashoda

Title: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Shyam, the dark hued Lord Krishna, beloved of Radha.
Songglossary: radha, ram, sai, sham

Title: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Radha Ramana Sri Ranga Ranga Radha Ramana Sri Ranga
Jaya Yadu Nandana Parama Niranjana
Radha Ramana Govinda Mukunda
Radha Ramana Sri Ranga Ranga Radha Ramana Sri Ranga
Meaning: Chant the name of Shyam, the Lord of Radha. Victory to the Supreme Lord and Leader of the Yadu Dynasty, Lord Govinda. The supreme director of the play of existence. Victory to the Son of Yadava sect, pure and sublime. The enchanter of Radha (Lakshmi), you are Govinda and Mukunda.
Songglossary: govinda, jay, mukunda, nanda, niranjan, param, radha, ramana, ranga, sham, sri, yadu

Title: Radhey Shyama Gopal Ghana Shyam
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Gopal Ghana Shyam Gopal
Ghana Shyam Gopal Giridhari Gopal [ Radhey Shyama ... ]
Brindavana Prabhu Krishna Gopal
Meera Ke Prabhu Nanda Gopal (Mayi)
Hum Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Gopal
Meaning: Praises be to Lord Gopal, beloved of Radha, Of the color of dark blue clouds, To the Lord of Brindavan, Krishna Gopal, To the Lord of Meera, son of Nanda and To our dear Sathya Sai Gopal.
Songglossary: bhakthon, brinda, ghana, giridhar, gopal, hum, ke, krishna, ma, meera, nanda, prabhu, radha, sai, sathya, sham

Title: Radhey Shyama Gopala Radhika Jeevana
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Gopala Radhika Jeevana Sri Ranga
Megha Shyama Gopala Mana Mohana Sundara Sri Ranga [ Radhey ... ]
Pandari Natha Gopala Panduranga Sri Ranga
Parthi Pureesha Gopala Sai Ranga Sri Ranga
Meaning: Pray to Lord Krishna (Ranga) who is the beloved of Radha, the beautiful cowherd boy with dark blue skin like a cloud, who enchants our minds. Pray to the Lord of Pandharpur, Panduranga (Vittala) who resides in Puttaparthi as Sai.
Songglossary: gopal, jeeva, mana, megha, mohan, natha, pandari, pandu, pureesha, puttaparthi, radha, radhika, ranga, sai, sham, sri, sundara

Title: Radhey Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Mangala Dhama [ Radhey Shyama ... ]
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Megha Shyama
Megha Shyama Megha Shyama [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Jaya Jaya Jaya Brindavana Dhama
Meaning: Chant the name of the dark hued Lord of Radha. He who is the Lord of Lakshmi, the abode of auspiciousness. Victory to the cloud complexioned Lord. Victory to the Lord of Brindavan, Krishna.
Songglossary: brinda, dhama, ghana, hey, jay, madhava, mangal, megha, radha, sham

Title: Radhey Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Mangala Dhama [ Radhey Shyama ... ]
Nanda Nandana Govinda
Navaneetha Chora Govinda
Narada Priya Govinda
Natajana Pala Govinda
Narayana Govinda (Hari)
Govinda Gokula Nandana Govinda [ Radhey Shyama ... ]
Bhaktha Vatsala Govinda
Bhaagavatha Priya Govinda
Pakshi Vahana Govinda
Paapa Vinasha Govinda
Narayana Govinda (Hari) [ Govinda Gokula ... ]
Meaning: Radhey Shyama, of the complexion of dark clouds. The source of all auspiciousness, darling son of Nanda, the one who stole butter from others houses (hearts of devotees), The one who is dear to Divine saint Narada, The one who takes complete care of those who have surrendered to Him, The star of the people of Gokula, is Lord Narayana Himself. Lord Govinda is very dear to His devotees, dear to Saints. He has Garuda (Eagle) as his vehicle and he is the destroyer of sins. He is Lord Narayana Himself.
Songglossary: bhaagavatha, bhaktha, chora, dhama, ghana, gokul, govinda, hari, hey, madhava, mangal, nanda, narada, narayana, natajana, navaneetha, paapa, pakshi, pala, priya, radha, sham, vahana, vatsala, vinasha

Title: Radhey Shyama Murari Jai Govinda
Lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Murari Jai Govinda Gopal Jai Govinda Gopal
Madhu Murali Kunjana Krishna Go Gopi Vandana Krishna
Jai Raasa Ranjana Krishna Jai Govinda Gopal
Tana Mana Ranjana Krishna Jai Govinda Gopal Jai Govinda Gopal (Jai)
Jai Jai Govinda Gopal Jai Govinda Gopal
Meaning: Victory to Radhey Shyam, to Govinda and Gopal, The one who slayed demon Mura, The One who moved about the forests playing on His enchanting Flute, Adored by the residents and all the beings of Gokul, Victory to the one who played the celestial dance, Who captivates the body and mind of his devotees Victory to that Govinda Gopal.
Songglossary: go, gopal, gopi, govinda, jai, krishna, kunja, madhu, mana, murali, murare, raasa, radha, ranjana, sham, tanaya, vandana

Title: Radhika Jeevana
Lyrics:
Radhika Jeevana
Krishna Janardhana
Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala
Devaki Nandana [ Radhika ... ]
Nanda Nandana Hey Gopika Ranjana
Murali Mohana
Sri Madhusudhana (Krishna Krishna)
Meaning: Sing the praises of Krishna, the very soul of His devotee (Radha)Krishna the one adored by all The darling son of Devaki and Nanda The enchanter of the Gopikas, with his divine flute He is the slayer of the demon, Madhu.
Songglossary: devaki, gopal, gopi, govinda, hey, janardhana, jeeva, krishna, madhu, mohan, murali, nanda, radha, radhika, ranjana, sri

Title: Radhika Jeevana Krishna Murari
Lyrics:
Radhika Jeevana Krishna Murari
Govardhana Dhari Hrudaya Vihari [ Radhika Jeevana ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Hey Mana Mohana Sharana Tihari
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Krishna residing in Parthi, you are the life of Radha, your beloved, you are the resident in all hearts of devotees, you are the Lord of Meera, you are Giridhari (the one who lifted the hillock Govardhana aloft to save the cowherd community). We surrender to you Oh the most enchanting Lord.
Songglossary: dhari, giridhar, govardhan, hey, hrudaya, jeeva, ke, krishna, mana, meera, mohan, murare, prabhu, puttaparthi, radhika, sai, sharan, vihar

Title: Radhika Manohara Madana Gopala
Lyrics:
Radhika Manohara Madana Gopala
Deena Vatsala Hey Raja Gopala
Bhaktha Jana Mandara Venu Gopala
Muralidhara Hey Gaana Vilola
Meaning: Sing of Madana Gopala, who attracts Radha's mind. We bow to the protector of the meek, the Royal Lord. He who enchants the devotees with his divine flute music and songs. Our salutations to that Divine One!
Songglossary: bhaktha, deen, gaan, gopal, hey, jana, madana, manda, manohar, murali, radhika, raja, vatsala, venu, vilola

Title: Ragamayi Anuragamayi
Lyrics:
Ragamayi Anuragamayi
Premamayi Ma Pranamayi [ Ragamayi ... ]
Karunamayi Anandamayi
Bhagyamayi Ma Bhavamayi
Gnanamayi Ma Gaanamayi
Meaning: Salutations to the Divine Mother, full of compassion and bliss, She is Love personified, the life force of all beings, The one who confers fortunes and relishes the good feeling in our actions. She is wisdom personified and embodiment of good music.
Songglossary: anand, anuragamayi, bhagya, bhava, gaana, gnana, karuna, ma, pranamayi, premamayi, ragamayi

Title: Raghava Raghu Nandana
Lyrics:
Raghava Raghu Nandana
Madhava Madhusudhana [ Raghava Raghu ... ]
Rajeeva Dala Lochana Shyama Bansi Mohana
Donon Hi Naam Hai Anand Dhaam (2)
Meaning: Sing of Raghava, the scion of Raghu dynasty, Lord Ram. He is the Lord of Lakshmi and the one who slayed demonic force Madhu. The Lotus eyed One, who is the dark hued flute playing enchanter. Both the names, Ram and Shyam, lead you to liberation and bliss.
Songglossary: anand, bansi, dala, dhaam, donon, hai, lochana, madhava, madhu, mohan, naam, nanda, raghava, raghu, rajeeva, sham

Title: Raghava Raghuvara Rama Bhajo
Lyrics:
Raghava Raghuvara Rama Bhajo
Mandara Giridhara Shyama Bhajo [ Raghava Raghuvara ... ]
Tulasi Dasa Prabho Rama Bhajo
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyam Bhajo
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Bhajo Murali Mohana Shyama Bhajo
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Bhajo Nanda Nandana Shyama Bhajo
Sai Sundara Naama Bhajo
Meaning: Sing the praises of Raghava of Raghu lineage, of Lord Rama - The Lord of Saint Tulasidas, the son of Dasharatha and of Shyama (Lord Krishna), who lifted the Mandara mountains, the Lord of Meera, the one who delights everyone with lilting music of His Flute, the son of Nanda. Praise our beautiful (Sundara) Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bhaja, dasa, dasha, giridhar, ke, manda, meera, mohan, murali, naam, nanda, prabhu, raghava, raghu, ram, sai, sham, sundara, tulasi

Title: Raghava Sundara Rama Raghuvara
Lyrics:
Raghava Sundara Rama Raghuvara
Parama Pavana Hey Jaga Vandana [ Raghava Sundara ... ]
Patithodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Ravana Mardhana Vighna Bhanjana
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Narayana
Meaning: The beautiful Lord Rama is supreme among the Raghu dynasty. He is worshipped by the entire creation. Liberator of the chaste, venerated by the devotees; He destroys obstacles and annihilated the demon- king Ravana. Worship Lord Narayana, Who has incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai Ram.
Songglossary: bhaktha, bhanjana, hey, jagat, mardana, narayana, param, parayana, patithodhara, pavan, purishwara, puttaparthi, raghava, raghu, ram, ravana, sai, sundara, vandana, vighna

Title: Raghothama Rama Ram
Lyrics:
Raghothama Rama Ram
Ramakantha Rama Ram
Chidananda Rama Ram
Sarojaksha Rama Ram
Sai Rama Rama Ram (4)
Meaning: Sing the praises of Rama who belongs to the Highest order of the Raghu lineage. One who charms Sita (Mother Lakshmi), One who bestows supreme bliss, the Lotus eyed Ram. He is none other than Sai Rama.
Songglossary: chidananda, raghothama, ram, ramakantha, sai, saroja

Title: Raghu Kula Tilaka Shri Ram
Lyrics:
Raghu Kula Tilaka Shri Ram Shri Rama (3)
Kausalyesha Jaya Jaya Rama
Ravana Mardhana Sita Rama [ Raghu Kula ... ]
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Rama
Patitha Pavana Sita Rama
Meaning: Glory to Lord Rama, the jewel of Raghu dynasty and son of mother Kausalya. The Lord of Sita, who destroyed Ravana is the savior of the destitute.
Songglossary: jay, kausalya, kula, mardana, patitha, pavan, raghava, raghu, raja, ram, ravana, sita, sri, tilaka

Title: Raghu Nandana Hey Raghu Nandana
Lyrics:
Raghu Nandana Hey Raghu Nandana (2)
Pyaarey Merey Nandana Raghu Nandana [ Raghu Nandana ... ]
Rajeeva Lochana Raghu Nandana
Dasharatha Tanaya Raghu Nandana
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Raghu Nandana
Janaki Jeevana Raghu Nandana [ Raghu Nandana ]
Meaning: I bow to the Lotus - Eyed Lord Rama of Raghu Dynasty who is beloved to me. He is Prince of King Dasharatha, Destroyer of the ten - headed Ravana. He, who is the Life - breath of Mother Janaki.
Songglossary: dasha, hey, janaki, jeeva, lochana, mardana, mera, mukha, nanda, pyaara, raghu, rajeeva, tanaya

Title: Raghu Nandana Raghava Ram Harey
Lyrics:
Raghu Nandana Raghava Ram Harey
Hey Janaki Jeevana Ram Harey
Hey Rajeeva Lochana Ram Harey
Sita (Sri) Rama Harey Sai Rama Harey (5)
Meaning: Worship Lord Rama of Raghu Dynasty. Worship the Lotus - Eyed Lord Rama, who is the very life- breath of Sita. Sri Rama and Sai Rama, we sing your praises.
Songglossary: hari, hey, janaki, jeeva, lochana, nanda, raghava, raghu, rajeeva, ram, sai, sita, sri

Title: Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Nayana
Lyrics:
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Nayana
Eshwaramba Nandana Sathya Sai Rama
