Janaki Vallabha Lavanya Rama
Nirupama Sundara Sugunabhi Rama
Prashanthi Nilaya Pavana Naama
Jaya Jaya Rama Prabhu Sai Rama
Meaning: Glory to the jewel of the Raghu Dynasty, the Lotus- Eyed Lord Rama. He is the darling son of Mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sathya Sai Rama. The beloved of Janaki (Sita), exquisitely handsome Lord Rama, who is beautifully- complexioned and the most virtuous. Victory to that Rama, who is our Lord Sai Rama, of the sacred Prashanthi Nilayam.
Songglossary: bhooshan, eshwar, janaki, jay, lavanya, naam, nanda, nayan, nilaya, nirupama, pavan, prabhu, prashanthi, raghu, rajeeva, ram, sai, sathya, suguna, sundara, vallabha

Title: Raghupathey Raghava Raja Rama
Lyrics:
Raghupathey Raghava Raja Rama
O Raja ( Sai ) Rama
Patitha Pavana Sita Pathey Rama [ Raghupathey ]
Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama Kausalyatmaja Sundara Rama
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Rama Raghava Mohana Megha Shyama
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Rama Rama Sita Rama [ Patitha Pavana ]
Meaning: Pray and Chant the name of Lord Rama, the handsome Prince of King Dasharatha and Mother Kausalya. Victory to Lord Rama, the Saviour of the downtrodden and the Lord of Sita. Victory be to You Oh Lord Rama. Oh Raghava Lord of Raghu dynasty, of captivating form and of dark complexion.
Songglossary: dasha, jai, jay, kausalya, megha, mohan, nanda, pathey, patitha, pavan, raghava, raghu, raja, ram, sai, sham, sita, sundara

Title: Raghupathey Sita Rama
Lyrics:
Raghupathey Sita Rama
Janaki Jeevana Kodanda Rama [ Raghu Pathey ]
Rajeeva Lochana Ravikula Soma
Ravikula Soma Ravikula Soma [ Rajeeva Lochana ]
Ravana Mardhana Jaya Jaya Rama
Meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Sita, Lord of the Raghu dynasty, who is the life-breath of Mother Sita, Ram who wields the bow, Kodanda. The lotus-eyed star of the lineage of the Sun, who destroyed the demon Ravana.
Songglossary: janaki, jay, jeeva, kodanda, lochana, mardana, pathey, raghu, rajeeva, ram, ravana, ravikula, sita, soma

Title: Raghupathey Sri Rama Chandra
Lyrics:
Raghupathey Sri Rama Chandra
Raghava Raghava [ Raghupathey ]
Ravikula Soma Sarvabhowma
Ramya Susheela Rama Rama
Meaning: We bow to Rama, Lord of the Raghu Dynasty, Who is still and shining as the moon. He is Raghava, Lord of Raghu dynasty. Raghava, who is the doyen of the Solar lineage, respected by everyone and has a charming personality.
Songglossary: chand, raghava, raghu, ram, ramya, ravikula, sarva, soma, sri, susheela

Title: Raghupathey Sri Rama Chandra Raghava
Lyrics:
Raghupathey Sri Rama Chandra Raghava Daya Nidhey (2)
Pashupathey Sri Parvatheesha Shankara Sadashiva (2)
Madhava Sri Radhikesha Govinda Harey Krishna (2)
Meaning: Rama, Lord of the Raghus, who is still and shining as the moon, You are an Ocean of Mercy. Beloved of the Mother Parvathi, You are the unchanging Shiva, the Source of Goodness. Oh Krishna, Splendorous Lord of Radha, Protector of our souls and Remover of sorrows. Oh Lord Sai, You are Lord Rama, Lord Shiva and Lord Krishna.
Songglossary: chand, daya, govinda, hari, krishna, madhava, nidhey, parvatheesha, pashu, radhikesha, raghava, raghu, ram, sadashiva, shankara, sri

Title: Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja ( Sai ) Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai Rama. Oh Lord! You are the salvation of the fallen and repentful. Chant the name of the princely Rama of Ayodhya. Chant the name of Sai Ram whose name purifies us.
Songglossary: jay, patitha, pavan, raghava, raghu, raja, ram, sai, sita

Title: Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha
Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Eshwar Allah Tero Naam Sab Ko Sanmati Do Bhagawan [ Raghupathi ... ]
Nanak Yesu Gautam Ram Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram Sri Ram Jaya Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Meaning: Victory to Lord and King Sri Ram of Raghu lineage, the redeemer of the downtrodden, Lord of Mother Sita. Oh Lord! Bless us with wisdom. You are the very same God known by different names as Eshwar, Allah, Nanak, Yesu and Gautam. Victory to the personification of all forms, Sathya Sai Ram.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, do, eshwar, gautam, jay, naam, nanak, patitha, pavan, raghava, raghu, raja, ram, sab, sai, sanmati, sathya, sita, sri, tera, yesu

Title: Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha
Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Sita Ram Jaya Sita Ram Bhaja Pyaarey Tu Sita Ram
Eshwara Allah Terey Nam Sab Ko Sanmati Dey Bhagawan
(He Bhagawan He Bhagawan Sab Ko Sanmati Dey Bhagawan)
(Shri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram Sita Ram Jaya Sita Ram)
Meaning: Victory to You, Lord Rama, king of the Raghu dynasty, and Lord of Sita, the protector of the poor and helpless. Sing praises to our beloved Lord Sita Ram, known also as Ishwara and Allah. O Lord, please endow us with intelligence.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, bhaja, dey, eshwar, jay, nam, patitha, pavan, pyaara, raghava, raghu, raja, ram, sab, sanmati, sita, sri, tera, tum

Title: Raghupathi Raghava Ram Kaho
Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Ram Kaho
Rajeeva Lochana Ram Kaho
Ram Kaho Sai Ram Kaho
Ram Ram Sai Ram Kaho
Meaning: Worship the Lotus - Eyed Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. Chant the name of Lord Sai Rama. Chant, 'Ram Ram Sai Ram'.
Songglossary: kaho, lochana, raghava, raghu, rajeeva, ram, sai

Title: Raghupathi Raghava Ram Ram
Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Ram Ram
Ram Ram Rama Ram Ram
Ram Ram Rama Ram [ Raghupathi Raghava ]
Janaki Jeevana Ram Ram
Jagadodharana Sai Ram
Meaning: Sing the Glory of the Lord of Raghu dynasty Raghava Ram, the very life of Janaki, the redeemer of the World.
Songglossary: jagadodhara, janaki, jeeva, raghava, raghu, ram, sai

Title: Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey
Lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey
Shyama Sundara Sai Rama Harey
Paramatma Rama Parandhama Rama
Purushottama Sai Rama Harey
Asha Paasha Vinashaka Rama
Sai Rama Rama Harey
Meaning: Pray to Lord Rama who is the doyen of Raghu lineage, having a dark-hued lovely form. He is the cosmic consciousness, the ultimate abode, the most exalted of humans. The destroyer of desires and attachment has come down as Sai Rama.
Songglossary: asha, hari, paasha, param, parandhama, purushottama, raghava, raghu, ram, sai, sham, sundara, vinasha

Title: Raghupathi Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Lyrics:
Raghupathi Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Raghuram [ Raghupathi Ram ... ]
Sita Mohana Janaki Ram
Pavana Naam Mangala Dhaam
Jaya Jaga Vandana Prashanthi Ram
Meaning: Glory and victory to Prince of King Dasharatha, Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. He is dearest to Sita (Janaki). Reciting His name is purifying and helps to attain the auspicious abode. He is adored by the entire world, the Lord of Prashanthi.
Songglossary: dasha, dhaam, jagat, janaki, jay, mangal, mohan, naam, nanda, pavan, prashanthi, raghu, ram, sita, sri, vandana

Title: Raghuveera Ranadheera Rama Rama Ram
Lyrics:
Raghuveera Ranadheera Rama Rama Ram
Rakumayi Vittala Shyama Shyama Shyam [ Raghuveera ... ]
Sukumara Sundara Rama Rama Ram
Shirdeesha Partheesha (Sayeesha) Rama Rama Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sita Ram (3)
Meaning: Let us sing the glories of Ram, champion of Raghu dynasty, one of might and courage at war. Chant the name of Lord Vittala of Rakumayi, the dark hued one, Victory to the good, young and handsome Ram, the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: jai, partheeshwara, raghu, rakumayi, ram, ranadheera, sayee, sham, shirdeesha, sita, sukumara, sundara, vittala

Title: Rahiman Rahiman Ram Rahim
Lyrics:
Rahiman Rahiman Ram Rahim
Sai Ram Sai Ram Krishna Karim
Buddha Zohrashtra Nanak Sai
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Sai Tum Ho
Bhajorey Manuva Ram Rahim
Ram Rahim Sai Krishna Karim
Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the various names of the same Lord Ram, Rahim the gracious One, Krishna, Karim (the compassionate), Sai Ram. Oh Lord Sai! You are Buddha, Zohrashtra, Nanak and You are the one who sent Jesus You are the embodiment of all that has come as One.
Songglossary: bhajao, buddha, ho, karim, krishna, manuva, nanak, pitha, prabhu, rahim, ram, sai, tum, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Rahimana Ram Rahimana Ram
Lyrics:
Rahimana Ram Rahimana Ram
Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Naam
Panduranga Vittala Vittala Naam
Bhajorey Manuva Hari Ka Naam ( Sai Ram )
Ek Omkara Bolo Jai Sathya Naam
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Nanak Naam
Prem Hi Eshwar Prem Hi Ram [ Bhajorey Manuva ]
Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the various names of the same Lord Ram, Rahim the gracious One, Allah and Eshwar are one and the same. Chant the names of Panduranga Vittala and Hari, Oh mind; Omkara is the One True Reality. As preached by the great Guru Nanak. Love is God, Love is the name Oh mind. Chant the name of Hari and Sai Ram.
Songglossary: allah, bhajao, bolo, ek, eshwar, guru, hai, hari, jai, ka, manuva, naam, nanak, om, pandu, prem, rahim, ram, sai, sathya, vahey, vittala

Title: Raja Gopala Radhika Manohara
Lyrics:
Raja Gopala Radhika Manohara
Deena Lola Gokula Ke Bala
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora (2)
Pannaga Shayana Parama Dayala
Raja Gopala Radhika Manohara (2) [ Deena Lola ]
Meaning: Lord Gopala is the King of Mathura, beloved of Radhika. Dear child of Gokula, ever ready to shower His Grace on the forlorn. The child of Nanda who stole the hearts of one and all, Reclining on the great serpent Adi Sesha and the supreme benefactor of the needy.
Songglossary: bala, chora, dayal, deen, gokul, gopal, ke, kishora, lola, manohar, nanda, navaneetha, pannaga, param, radhika, raja, shayana

Title: Raja Rajeshwari Jaganmohini (Amba)
Lyrics:
Raja Rajeshwari Jaganmohini (Amba)
Jagadambe Mangala Kaarini [ (Amba) Raja Rajeshwari ... ]
Jagadodharini Vighna Vinashini
Sthira Sukha Dayini Sai Janani
Meaning: Effulgent and beautiful Goddess Amba enchants the world and bestows auspiciousness. She destroys obstacles and saves the world. Mother Sai grants ever- lasting happiness.
Songglossary: amba, dayini, jagadamba, jagadodhara, jagan, janani, kaari, mangal, raja, rajeshwari, sai, sthira, sukh, vighna, vinashana

Title: Raja Rajeshwari Rajya Pradayini
Lyrics:
Raja Rajeshwari Rajya Pradayini
Raakshasa Nashini Paalaya Maam
Sri Bhuvaneshwari Tripura Sundari
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Paalaya Maam
Meaning: Save us Oh Mother Goddess of Emperors, Donor of Kingdoms, destroyer of the demon race, Save us, Oh! Mother. The Goddess of the entire World, the most beautiful of all the three Worlds, protect us, the Embodiment of Shiva, the male aspect and the Shakthi, the female aspect of God.
Songglossary: bhuvaneshwari, dayini, maam, paalaya, raakshasa, raja, rajeshwari, rajya, shakthi, shiva, soundari, sri, swaroopa, tripura, vinashana

Title: Rajadhi Raja Hey Sai Maharaja
Lyrics:
Rajadhi Raja Hey Sai Maharaja
Deenon Ke Nath Bhagawan
Devadi Deva Hey Sai Mahadeva
Parthi Nivasi Sai Ram
Harey Rama Rama Rama Rama
Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna
Meaning: Chant the name of the King of Kings, the Supreme King, Lord Sai, protector of the miserable and dejected, The Lord of Lords, the resident of Parthi, Lord Sai, You are Lord Rama and Lord Krishna.
Songglossary: bhagawan, deenon, deva, devadi, hari, hey, ke, krishna, mahadev, maharaj, natha, nivasi, puttaparthi, raja, ram, sai

Title: Rajadhi Raja Raja Gambhira
Lyrics:
Rajadhi Raja Raja Gambhira
Raja Marthaanda Raja Kumara
Raavo Raavo Gaana Manohara
Pankaja Lochana Parthi Vihara
Meaning: O King of Kings, with the prestige and dignity of a King, please come to me, O Lover of music, Lord Sai, who lives in Parthi. We beckon You to come O Lord Sai, the King of Kings, The lover of Music, the Lotus eyed, the One who dwells in Parthi.
Songglossary: gaan, gambhira, kumara, lochana, manohar, marthaanda, pankaja, puttaparthi, raavo, raja, vihar

Title: Rajadhi Raja Rama Rajeeva Netra
Lyrics:
Rajadhi Raja Rama Rajeeva Netra Rama
Ramaneeya Vesha Jaya Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Lochana
Raja Ramachandra
Sita Pathey Hey Sundara Rama
Sajjana Sadhu Samrakshaka Rama [ Jaya Rama ... ]
Meaning: Victory to Rama, the King of Kings, the Lotus eyed One, having the looks of a charmer. Sri Rama is the jewel of Raghu lineage, the consort of Sita, handsome Rama, Protector of the pious and the sages. Victory to you oh Sai Rama.
Songglossary: bhooshan, hey, jay, lochana, nethra, pathey, raghu, raja, rajeeva, ram, ramachandra, ramaneeya, sadhu, sai, sajjan, samraksha, sita, sundara, vesha

Title: Rajeeva Lochana Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Rajeeva Lochana Sai Narayana
Narahari Roopa Namo Narayana [ Rajeeva Lochana ... ]
Parama Daya Ghana Patitha Pavana
Nithya Niranjana Sai Narayana [ Narahari Roopa ]
Meaning: Worship the Lotus- Eyed Lord Sai Narayana, who has assumed a human Form, who is the saviour of devotees and towards whom he is extremely merciful and who is the embodiment of purity.
Songglossary: daya, ghana, lochana, namo, narahari, narayana, niranjan, nithya, param, patitha, pavan, rajeeva, roopa, sai

Title: Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Lyrics:
Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Mangala Karini Mata Maheshwari [ Rajeeva Lochani ... ]
Sankata Harini Sai Narayani
Prashanthi Vasini Paapa Vinashini
Prema Swaroopini Sai Bhavani
Meaning: The Goddess of the Emperors, the Lotus eyed, Bestower of auspiciousness, Mother Sai Narayani, the sovereign ruler of this entire creation. She is the remover of sorrows, Destroyer of sins, who lives in Prashanthi Nilayam, The very embodiment of Love, Sai Bhavani.
Songglossary: bhava, haarini, kaarini, lochana, maheshwari, mangal, mata, narayani, paapa, prashanthi, prem, raja, rajeeva, rajeshwari, sai, sankata, swaroopa, vasini, vinashana

Title: Rajeshwari Sri Bhuvaneshwari
Lyrics:
Rajeshwari Sri Bhuvaneshwari
Parameshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari
Partheeshwari Annapoorneshwari
Sarveshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari
Meaning: Divine Mother, Consort of the Ruler of the worlds You are the supreme, Sathya Sayeeshwari, Mother Sai, Lord of Parthi, who confers sustenance to one and all. You are the Principle Goddess, Sathya Sayeeshwari.
Songglossary: annapoorna, bhuvaneshwari, param, partheeshwari, rajeshwari, sarvesha, sathya, sayee, sri

Title: Raksha Karo Bhagawan Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Raksha Karo Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Paahi Dayalo Dehi Krupalo [ Raksha Karo ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradatha
Nithya Nirmala Jeevana Daata
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Roopa
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram

Raksha Karo Bhagawan (3)
Meaning: Protect us, Oh Lord Sathya Sai! You are the compassionate and merciful Lord of the helpless, the bestower of truth, righteousness, peace and love, the ever - cheerful Lord who sustains all life, the embodiment of Brahma (Creator), Vishnu (Sustainer) and Maheshwara (Destroyer of evil). You are Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty.
Songglossary: bhagawan, brahma, daata, dayal, dehi, dharma, jeevan, karo, krupalu, maheshwara, nirmala, nithya, paahi, pradatha, prem, raksha, roopa, sai, sathya, shanthi, shivam, sundaram, vishnu

Title: Raksha Raksha Jagadeeshwara
Lyrics:
Raksha Raksha Jagadeeshwara
Parthi Puri Parameshwara
Paahi Paahi Parameshwara
Dehi Dehi Tava Pada Seva
Meaning: Protect us, Oh Lord of the Universe! Protect us, Oh Lord of Parthi! Protect and bless us. We pray to Thee to grant us the opportunity to serve at Your Lotus Feet.
Songglossary: dehi, jagadeesha, paada, paahi, param, puri, puttaparthi, raksha, seva, tava

Title: Raksha Raksha Prabhu Hey Jagadeesha
Lyrics:
Raksha Raksha Prabhu Hey Jagadeesha
Pavana Naama Shiva Sayeesha
Mangala Daata Shiva Sayeesha
Bhaktha Janashraya Purana Purusha
Meaning: Oh Lord of Universe! Oh Granter of Auspiciousness and Mercy! Oh Lord Sai, Protect us, Protect us. Your name Shiva and Sayeesha are holy and bestows auspiciousness on those who chant it. Grant us Your assurance of protection, Oh the Master of the Universe, Oh Lord! You are the most ancient and loved by all devotees.
Songglossary: bhaktha, daata, hey, jagadeesha, janashraya, mangal, naam, pavan, prabhu, puran, purusha, raksha, sayee, shiva

Title: Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai
Lyrics:
Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Raghu Nandana Ram [ Ram Jai ... ]
Ahalyodharaka Sri Raghu Nandana
Raghukula Bhooshana Ram [ Ram Jai ... ]
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram [ Sai Raghu (2) ]
Meaning: Let Victory be on Your side Oh Lord Rama, the consort of Sita. Rama, the son of Raghu Dynasty, the redeemer of the curse on Ahalya, you are the crest jewel of the Raghu lineage. Chant the mantra Sita Ram, Sita Ram.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, bhooshan, jai, nanda, raghu, ram, sai, sita, sri

Title: Ram Jinka Naam Hai Ayodhya
Lyrics:
Ram Jinka Naam Hai Ayodhya Jinka Dhaam Hai
Hamarey Raghunath Ji Ko Hamarey Lakh Pranam Hai
Krishna Jinka Naam Hai Gokul Jinka Dhaam Hai
Hamarey Yadunath Ji Ko Hamarey Lakh Pranam Hai
Sai Jinka Naam Hai Parthi Jinka Dhaam Hai
Hamarey Pran Nath Ko Hamarey Lakh Pranam Hai
Meaning: We offer a lakh (hundred thousand) obeisance to our Lord of Raghu lineage, whose Name is Ram and Ayodhya His abode. We offer a Lakh obeisance to Lord of Yadu lineage, whose Name is Krishna and Gokul being His abode. We offer a Lakh obeisance to the Lord of our Life, whose Name is Sai and Parthi His abode.
Songglossary: ayodhya, dhaam, gokul, hai, hamarey, ji, jinka, krishna, lakh, naam, natha, pran, pranamami, puttaparthi, raghu, ram, sai, yadu

Title: Ram Jis Ka Naam Hai
Lyrics:
Ram Jis Ka Naam Hai Shanthi Sthapana Kaam Hai
Aise Raghukula Nandana Ko Hamara Pranam Hai
Keshava Jis Ka Naam Hai Dharma Sthapana Kaam Hai
Aise Yadu Kula Nandana Ko Hamara Pranam Hai
Sai Jis Ka Naam Hai Jagadodharana Kaam Hai
Aise Parthi Nandana Ko Hamara Pranam Hai
Meaning: We bow down to the scion of Raghu lineage, whose name is Ram and whose work is to establish Peace. We bow down to the scion of Yadu lineage, whose name is Keshava and whose work is to establish righteousness on Earth. We bow down to the scion of Parthi, whose name is Sai and whose work is to redeem the world.
Songglossary: aise, dharma, hai, hamara, jagadodhara, jis, ka, kaam, kesha, kula, naam, nanda, pranamami, puttaparthi, raghu, ram, sai, shanthi, sthapan, yadu

Title: Ram Kaho Krishna Kaho Eshwara
Lyrics:
Ram Kaho Krishna Kaho Eshwara Allah Sai Kaho
Buddha Kaho Guru Nanak Kaho Zohrashtra Mahavir Yesu Kaho [ Ram Kaho ]
Yug Avatara Tum Ho Vishwa Shakthi Tum Ho
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Mahesha
Parabrahma Tum Ho ( Sai )
Meaning: Chant the name of Ram, Krishna, Eshwara or Allah. Chant the name of Buddha, Guru Nanak or Zohrashtra. Chant either Mahavir or Jesus. O Sai, You are the incarnation of this age. You are the power behind the Universe. You are Sai Mahesha, who loves all religion equally. You are the embodiment of the Supreme One.
Songglossary: allah, avatar, buddha, dharma, eshwar, ho, kaho, krishna, mahavir, mahesha, nanak, parabrahma, priya, ram, sai, sarva, shakthi, tum, vishwa, yesu, yuga, zohrashtra

Title: Ram Kaho Sai Ram Kaho
Lyrics:
Ram Kaho Sai Ram Kaho
Shyam Kaho Ghana Shyam Kaho
Yesu Kaho Zohrashtra Kaho
Jag Ka Vidhata Sai Kaho
Mandir Mey Kabhi Masjid Mey
Apna Hrudaya Mey Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: Call Him by any name be it Rama, Sai Ram, Shyam, Yesu, Zohrashtra, sometimes He is in a temple or Masjid, but the Creator of this Universe Lord Sai lives in our Heart.
Songglossary: apna, bhagawan, ghana, hrudaya, jagat, ka, kabhi, kaho, mandir, masjid, ram, sai, sham, vidhata, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Ram Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo
Lyrics: Ram Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki (4)
Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, Lakshmana, Sita. Victory to Hanuman (monkey devotee of Lord Rama) and Lord Sai Rama.
Songglossary: bolo, hanuman, jai, janaki, ki, lakshmana, ram

Title: Ram Rahim Ko Bhajanewaale Terey
Lyrics:
Ram Rahim Ko Bhajanewaale Terey Poojari Baba
Tera Naam Ek Sahara (3)
Tum Hi Ho Geeta Tum Hi Ramayan
Tum Hi Ho Veda Puran [ Tera Naam ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba! For the devotee's of Lord Rama (Hindus) and of Rahim (Islam), your name is the only refuge. You are the very Form of teachings of Holy scriptures, Bhagawad Gita, Ramayana, four Vedas and eighteen puranas.
Songglossary: baba, bhaja, ek, geeta, hai, ho, naam, pooja, puran, rahim, ram, ramaya, sahara, tera, tum, veda

Title: Ram Ram Bhajo Mana Harey
Lyrics:
Ram Ram Bhajo Mana Harey Harey
Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Harey Harey [ Ram Ram ... ]
Raghupathi Raja Rama Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram [ Sai Ram ]
Meaning: Oh mind! worship Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. The Lord of Sita, Lord Rama, destroys sins and evil, uplifts and liberates the penitent. Chant 'Sai Ram Sai Ram Harey Harey'.
Songglossary: bhajao, hari, mana, patitha, pavana, raghupathey, raja, ram, sai, sita

Title: Ram Ram Brahma Ram
Lyrics:
Ram Ram Brahma Ram - Brahma Ram Ram
 Hear my inner rhythm pound
 Hear my heart song
 Ram Ram Brahma Ram - Brahma Ram Ram
 In Puttaparthi there You dwell
 The light of mankind
 Om Jai Sai Ram - Sathya Sai Baba Naam
 The Light of Mankind

Title: Ram Ram Ram Parama Sumangala
Lyrics:
Ram Ram Ram Parama Sumangala Ram Ram Ram
Janani Janaki Jeevana Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Jayatu Jayatu Rama
Parama Sumangala Ram Ram Ram
Meaning: The Name of Ram is highly auspicious. Lord Rama is the life of the universal Mother Janaki. Victory to Ram and Sai Ram, whose Names are highly auspicious.
Songglossary: jai, janaki, janani, jay, jeevan, parama, ram, sai, sumangala

Title: Rama Bhajo Raghu Rama Bhajo
Lyrics:
Rama Bhajo Raghu Rama Bhajo
Sita Manohara Rama Bhajo
Shyama Bhajo Ghana Shyama Bhajo
Radha Manohara Shyama Bhajo
Shambho Bhajo Shiva Shambho Bhajo
Gowri Manohara Shambho Bhajo
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, consort of Sita, of blue complexioned Lord Krishna, beloved of Radha, and of Lord Shiva, the consort of Gowri.
Songglossary: bhaja, ghana, gowri, manohar, radha, raghu, ram, sham, shambho, shiva, sita

Title: Rama Bhaktha Hanumantha
Lyrics:
Rama Bhaktha Hanumantha
Rama Daasa Hanumantha
Anjana Sutha Abhaya Pradayaka
Vayu Putra Vara Pradayaka
Sri Rama Daasa (Dootha) Namo Namo (2)
Meaning: Hanumantha, the dear devotee and servant of Lord Rama. He whose Mother is Anjana and grants freedom from fear to His devotees. He is the son of the Wind god, bestower of boons. Let us offer our obeisance to the servant and messenger of Sri Rama.
Songglossary: abhaya, anjana, bhaktha, daasa, doota, hanuman, namo, pradayaka, putra, ram, sri, sutha, vara, vayu

Title: Rama Bolo Rahim Bolo
Lyrics:
Rama Bolo Rahim Bolo
Krishna Bolo Karim Bolo [ Rama Bolo ... ]
Gautam Yeshu Nanak Bolo
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Bolo
Sathya Dharma Aur Shanthi Prem Se
Sab Dharmo Ki Jai Jai Bolo
Meaning: Chant the names of Ram, Gautam (Buddha), Jesus, Nanak, Zoroaster, Mahavir, all of whom represent Truth, Right Action, Peace, and Love, the tenets of all religions.
Songglossary: aur, bolo, buddha, dharma, dharmo, gautam, jai, karim, krishna, mahavir, nanak, prem, rahim, ram, sab, sathya, se, shanthi, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Rama Bolo Sita Rama
Lyrics:
Rama Bolo Sita Rama, Shyam Bolo Radhey Sham
Hara Hara Shankar Shiva Shiva Bol,
Gowri Natha Maheshwara Bol
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Bol, Sathya Sai Ke Jai Jai Bol
Allah Bol Eshwar Bol Buddha Bol Nanak Bol
Zohrashtra Mahavir Yesu Bol, Sarva Dharma Ke Jai Jai Bol
(Bol) Sathya Sai Ke Jai Jai Bol
Sathya Sai Ke Jai Jai Bol
Sai Nath Ke Jai Jai Bol
Sai Nath Ke Jai Jai Bol, Sathya Sai Ke Jai Jai Bol
Meaning: Let us chant the name of Rama, consrt of Sita. Of Shyam, savior of Radha. Chant the name of Hara Shankar (Shiva), consort of Mother Gowri. The One Lord loves and fosters all faiths and religions. He is verily Sathya Sai, victory be to Him. Chant the name of Allah, Buddha, Guru Nanak, Zorashtra, Mahavir, and Jesus (Esu). May victory be to all religions and faiths. May victory be to Lord Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: allah, bol, bolo, buddha, dharma, eshwar, gowri, hara, jai, ke, mahavir, maheshwara, nanak, natha, priya, radha, ram, sai, sarva, sathya, sham, shankara, shiva, sita, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Rama Came Krishna Came
Lyrics:
Rama Came, Krishna Came, Our Lord Has Come, His Name Is Sai
Give Us Peace And Grant Us Release
Baba,Baba, Sai Baba Baba,Baba,Sai Baba
One Of Mercy, Wisdom And Truth, Give Us Your Blessing, Lord Of Light
You Are Mother,Father And Friend [ Baba,Baba ... ]
Songglossary: baba, krishna, ram, sai

Title: Rama Charan Sukha Dayi Bhajorey
Lyrics:
Rama Charan Sukha Dayi Bhajorey (3)
Ram Naam Ke Do Akshara Mey
Sab Sukh Shanthi Samayi Rey
Sai Nath Ke Charan Mey Aakar
Jeevan Saphal Banao Rey
Meaning: Worshipping the Lotus Feet of Lord Ram endows one with happiness. Reciting only the two letters Ra and Ma, confers everlasting peace and happiness. Finish the mission of human birth by surrendering to the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai (by merging in Lord Sai).
Songglossary: aakar, akshara, banalo, bhajao, chara, dayi, do, jeeva, ke, naam, natha, ram, sab, sai, saphal, shanthi, sukh

Title: Rama Dhyaana Nirata Anjaneya
Lyrics:
Rama Dhyaana Nirata Anjaneya
Rama Seva Vratha Hanumantha
Swami Mukhya Prana Pavamana
Daithya Kulaantaka Mahavira
Anjanaadri Vasa Gunavanta
Dasanudasa (Sri Rama Dasa) Hanumantha
Meaning: Salutations to Anjaneya, who is always immersed in meditation on Rama, who has taken a vow to be at service to Rama. The one who has won the confidence of Lord Rama. Hanuman is the champion uprooter of the demon race, the storehouse of good qualities, who lives in the Anjanaadri Hills, the one who serves those who serve the Lord, the true servant of Sri Rama.
Songglossary: anjana, daithya, dasa, dasanudasa, dhyaan, gunavanta, hanuman, kulaantaka, mahavir, mukhya, nirata, praan, ram, seva, sri, swami, vasa, vratha

Title: Rama Govinda Harey
Lyrics:
Rama Govinda Harey
Bhajorey Rama Govinda Harey [ Rama Govinda ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Harey
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Harey
Gokula Nandana Shyama Harey
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Harey
Meaning: Sing in Praise of Rama and Govinda. Rama, the darling son of Dasharatha, The One who annihilated the ten headed Ravana. Shyama is the dear son of Gokula Sai, their embodiment, is the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhajao, dasha, gokul, govinda, hari, mardana, mukha, nanda, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sham

Title: Rama Govinda Harey Krishna Gopal
Lyrics:
Rama Govinda Harey Krishna Gopal Harey
Sri Madhusudhana Harey Harey Harey
Sri Madhusudhana Harey
Devaki Nandana Goparipalana
Yadava Nanda Nandana Harey Harey
Yadava Nanda Nandana
Hey Jagat Palana Deena Janavana
Mathura Puri Madhava Harey Harey
Mathura Puri Madhava
Patithodharana Patitha Pavana
Parthi Vihari Krishnana Harey Harey
Parthi Vihari Krishnana
Meaning: Glory to Rama, Govinda (sustainer of all beings) the names of Lord Krishna He is the slayer of demon Madhu. The darling son of Devaki, ruler of all beings; The beloved Yadava child. The ruler of all worlds, benefactor of the meek, glory to that Lord of Mathura, the Lord of Lakshmi. Liberator of the chaste. Glory to the Lord of Parthi, who is verily, the same Krishna.
Songglossary: deen, devaki, gopal, goparipala, govinda, hari, hey, jagat, janavana, krishna, madhava, madhu, mathura, nanda, paalaya, patitha, patithodhara, pavan, puri, puttaparthi, ram, sri, vihar, yadava

Title: Rama Harey Hari Naam Bolo
Lyrics:
Rama Harey Hari Naam Bolo
Hari Naam Bolo Sai Naam Bolo [ Rama Harey ... ]
Sai Rama Parama Dayala
Parama Dayala (2)
Man Mandir Mey Diya Ujaala
Nanak Sai Bolo Govinda Sai Bolo
Yesu Sai Bolo Buddha Sai Bolo
Allah Sai Bolo Maulah Sai Bolo (2)
Meaning: Sing the many names of the Lord Rama, Hari, Govinda. Chant the name of Guru Nanak, Allah, Maulah and the all-pervasive Lord who is extremely compassionate and whose presence has kindled the light in the temple of our hearts. Chant the Name of Rama and of Hari. Light the lamp of Love in our Hearts, Oh Sai the most merciful One. Chant the names of Allah and Maulah Sai, Nanak Sai and Govinda Sai.
Songglossary: allah, bolo, buddha, dayal, diya, govinda, hari, mana, mandir, maulah, naam, nanak, param, ram, sai, ujaala, yesu

Title: Rama Harey Raghu Rama Harey
Lyrics:
Rama Harey Raghu Rama Harey
Shyama Harey Ghana Shyama Harey
Janaki Jeevana Rama Harey
Radha Madhava Shyama Harey
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, Ghana Shyama and Madhava. Chanting the Name destroys sins and evil. Sing the glory of Rama of Raghu clan, the very life of Mother Janaki and Shyama the dark complexioned one who is dear to Radha. Oh son of Nanda and playful stealer of butter (pure heart), Oh Madhava, (All names of Krishna).
Songglossary: ghana, hari, janaki, jeeva, madhava, radha, raghu, ram, sham

Title: Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey
Lyrics:
Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey
Allah Eshwar Sai Harey
Guru Nanak Yesu Buddha Harey
Zohrashtra Mahavira Sai Harey
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey (Baba)
Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey (4)
Meaning: Glory to Rama, glory to Krishna, glory to Lord Sai, who loves all religions equally. Glory to the name of the Lord of all faiths; Who is known by different names as Rama, Krishna, Allah, Eshwar, Guru Nanak, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavira. Sai responds to any of these names.
Songglossary: allah, baba, buddha, dharma, eshwar, hari, krishna, mahavir, nanak, priya, ram, sai, sarva, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Rama Harey Sita Ram
Lyrics:
Rama Harey Sita Ram
Shyam Harey Radhey Shyam
Sita Vallabha Sundara Ram
Murali Manohara Radhey Shyam
Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita, Radhey Shyam, the Lord of Radha. Chant the name of Rama, the handsome consort of Sita, Radhey Shyam, the enchanting Flute Player. They are none other than our Lord of Parthi, Sai Ram.
Songglossary: hari, manohar, murali, purishwara, puttaparthi, radha, ram, sham, sita, sundara, vallabha

Title: Rama Jai Jai Rama Sai
Lyrics:
Rama Jai Jai Rama Sai Rama Jai Jai Ram
Rajeeva Lochana Raghava Sundara Rama Jai Jai Ram
Sai Rama Jai Jai Ram
Sathya Swaroopa Shanthi Pradayaka Rama Jai Jai Ram
Amrutha Bhaashi Abhaya Pradayaka Rama Jai Jai Ram
Anatha Natha Deena Natha Rama Jai Jai Ram [ Sai Rama ]
Meaning: Glory be to Rama, the lotus eyed One, the handsome King, Glory be to Sai Rama. Rama is the personification of Truth; grants Peace and freedom from fear. Glory to the One of nectarine words. Rama, the refuge of the forlorn, Lord Sai Rama.
Songglossary: abhaya, amrutha, anath, bhaashi, deen, jai, lochana, natha, pradayaka, raghava, rajeeva, ram, sai, sathya, shanthi, sundara, swaroopa

Title: Rama Jayam Hari Rama Jayam
Lyrics:
Rama Jayam Hari Rama Jayam
Raghava Dhyanamey Lokamayam [ Rama Jayam ... ]
Rama Sita Pathi Raghava Mantram
Ramya Suguna Gana Sevya Niranthram
Rama Daya Para Sujana Pavitram [ Ravikula ]
Ravikula Dasharatha Suthamuna Hari Jaya
Meaning: Glory be to Lord Rama of Raghu lineage, The entire world meditates on Rama. Glory be to the dear son of Dasharatha of the Solar Dynasty. Chant the Name of Raghava the Lord of Sita, and immerse ourselves ever in extolling His Divine qualities and in His service Rama who shows immense compassion towards the pure and the good ones.
Songglossary: dasha, daya, dhyaan, gana, hari, jay, lokamayam, mantra, nirantara, para, pathi, pavitra, raghava, ram, ramya, ravikula, sevya, sita, suguna, sujana, sutha

Title: Rama Kodanda Rama Rama Pattabhi
Lyrics:
Rama Kodanda Rama Rama Pattabhi Rama Rama Kalyana Rama Raghava
Rama Sita Pathi Rama Neevey Gathi
Rama Neeku Mrokkiti Rama Nee Chey Jikkiti [ Rama Kodanda ... ]
Rama Neekokka Mata Rama Nakokka Moota
Rama Nee Paatey Paata Rama Nee Baatey Baata [ Rama Kodanda ... ]
Rama Neekevaru Todu Rama Kreeganta Choodu
Rama Nenu Neevadu Rama Natho Mathadu [ Rama Kodanda ... ]
Rama Naamamey Melu Rama (Swami) Chintaney Chaalu
Nee Naamamey Melu Nee Chintaney Chaalu
Naamamey Melu Chintaney Chaalu
Rama Neevu Nannelu Rama Raayadey Chaalu [ Rama Kodanda ... ]
Meaning: Lord Rama who bears the Bow and arrow, the crowned King of Ayodhya, Rama, born for the welfare of entire Humanity. There is no refuge other than You, Oh Lord Rama consort of Sita. Rama, I pleaded with You, Oh Lord, I got the support of your benevolent hand, Oh Rama, Your One word is enough to contemplate and that is equivalent to a sack full (moota). Rama, there is no song other than the song about You, there is no path other than the way to You. Oh Rama, who is there for your company, why don't you look at me? I am yours Oh Lord, please converse with me. Chanting the name of Rama is better, Contemplating on Rama is enough. Please protect me, Oh Lord Rama, Your name alone is enough.
Songglossary: baata, baatey, chaalu, chey, chintaney, choodu, gathi, jikkiti, kalyan, kodanda, kreeganta, mata, matha, melu, moota, mrokkiti, naam, nakokka, nannelu, natho, nee, neekevaru, neekokka, neeku, neevadu, neeve, neevu, nenu, paata, paatey, pathi, pattabhi, raaya, raghava, ram, sita, swami, todu

Title: Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana [ Rama Krishna ... ]
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Om Anantha Narayana (Hari) (3)
Meaning: Worship Lord Rama, Krishna, Govinda, Narayana He is none other than Lord Hari, the Supreme one. He is the Lord of the Goddess of Prosperity (goddess Lakshmi). He is the infinite, supreme Lord Hari.
Songglossary: ananta, govinda, hari, krishna, lakshmi, narayana, om, ram, ramana, sri

Title: Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
Rajeeva Nayana Narayana
Ranga Vittala Hari Narayana
Narayana Narayana [ Ranga Vittala ]
Ramaneeya Roopa Narayana (2)
Meaning: Sing of Lord Narayana the Lotus eyed and the charming One, who has incarnated as Rama, Krishna, Govinda and Panduranga Vittala.
Songglossary: govinda, hari, krishna, narayana, nayan, rajeeva, ram, ramaneeya, ranga, roopa, vittala

Title: Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana Keshava
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana Keshava
Radhika Ramana Madhava Jaya Ranga Deva
Harey Rama Harey Krishna Sita Rama Raghava [ Radhika ]
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Narayana, Keshava and Madhava. The one adored by Radhika (Radha), Lord of Lakshmi, victory to you the Lord of the stage (world). Glory to Rama, Krishna.
Songglossary: deva, govinda, hari, jay, kesha, krishna, madhava, narayana, radhika, raghava, ram, ramana, ranga, sita

Title: Rama Krishna Hari Mukunda Murari
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Hari Hari Mukunda Murari
Panduranga Hari Jai Jai Panduranga Hari Hari
Deva Deva Deva Mahadeva Deva
Adi Deva Deva Brahma Vishnu Deva
Brahma Vishnu Deva Sathya Sai Deva [ Panduranga Hari ... ]
Panduranga Hari Jai Jai Panduranga Hari Hari (4)
Panduranga Hari Hari (2)
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Hari, Mukunda, the one who liberates, Murari, the one who slayed the demon, Mura. He is Panduranga, Lord of Lords. He is the great God, Mahadeva (Shiva), He is the primordial Lord, the trinity of Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva. He has taken form as Sathya Sai. Victory to Lord Pandu Ranga Hari.
Songglossary: adi, brahma, deva, hari, jai, krishna, mahadeva, mukunda, murare, panduranga, ram, sai, sathya, vishnu

Title: Rama Krishna Hari Mukunda Murari
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Hari Mukunda Murari
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Hari
Makara Kundala Dhari Bhaktha Bandhu Shourie
Mukti Daata Shakthi Daata Vittala Narahari
Rama Krishna Hari Mukunda Murari [ Panduranga Panduranga ]
Tulasi Dhara Kandhara Bhaktha Hrudaya Mandira
Mandaradri Dhara Mukunda Indiresha Sri Hari
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Mukunda, Murari. He is also Panduranga of Pandharpur, who wears fish shaped ear rings. He is the near and dear of the forlorn devotee Vittala, who bestows liberation and power. Decorated by a garland of Tulasi leaves, He resides in the temple of the heart. He is the one who supported Mount Mandara, He is the one who liberates, Lord of Indra, he is the Supreme Lord, Sri Hari.
Songglossary: bandhava, bhaktha, daata, dhara, dhari, hari, hrudaya, indra, kandhara, krishna, kundala, makara, manda, mandir, mukti, mukunda, murare, narahari, pandu, ram, shakthi, shouri, sri, tulasi, vittala

Title: Rama Krishna Hari Narayana
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Hari Narayana
Deena Janavana Hari Narayana
Deena Sharanya Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Sai Narayana
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, Krishna, Narayana and Hari. Lord Narayana, who is the protector and the One in whom the downtrodden has taken refuge. Lord Sai Narayana, who protects and liberates us from the bondage of life and death.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, deen, harana, hari, janavana, krishna, narayana, ram, sai, sharan

Title: Rama Krishna Hari Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Hari Sathya Sai Murari
Sai Murari Sathya Sai Murari [ Rama Krishna ... ]
Allah Eshwar Yesu Bhi Tum Ho
Tum Ho Ram Aur Shyam Murari
Buddha Bhi Tum Ho Brahma Bhi Tum Ho
Meaning: Oh Sai Baba, You are none other than Rama, Krishna and Hari. Victory to You! You are Jesus Christ, You are Allah. You are Eshwar, Buddha and Lord Brahma.
Songglossary: allah, aur, bhi, brahma, buddha, eshwar, hari, ho, krishna, murare, ram, sai, sathya, sham, tum, yesu

Title: Rama Krishna Jaya Bolo (Bhaja
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Jaya Bolo (Bhaja Mana)
Rama Krishna Jaya Sai Krishna Jaya [ Rama Krishna ... ]
Raghukula Bhooshana Rama Rama Ram
Radha Madhava Shyama Shyama Shyam
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Krishna Harey Ram
Meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the name of Lord Rama and Krishna. Victory to Lord Rama, the Jewel of the Raghu dynasty. Victory to the dark-hued Lord Krishna, Lord of Radha Chant the Mantra, 'Harey Ram Harey Krishna'.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhooshan, bolo, hari, jay, krishna, madhava, mana, radha, raghu, ram, sai, sham

Title: Rama Krishna Rama Krishna Rama
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Rama Krishna Rama Krishna Bhajorey
Sri Hari Madhava Govinda Keshava [ Rama Krishna. ]
Nanda Nanda Shyama Govinda
Pandari Natha Panduranga Bhajorey
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Rama, Krishna, Hari, Madhava, Govinda and Keshava. Sing the Glory of Shyama, the son of Nanda and Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur.
Songglossary: bhajao, govinda, hari, kesha, krishna, madhava, nanda, natha, pandari, pandu, ram, sham, sri

Title: Rama Krishna Tum Ho Jaya
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Tum Ho Jaya Ram Jaya Ram
Sai Krishna Tum Ho Sai Ram Sai Ram
Yesu Pitha Tum Ho Hey Ram Hey Ram
Allah Eshwar Ho Allah Ho Akbar
Shirdi Sai Tum Ho Sai Ram Sai Ram
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are everybody - Rama, Krishna, Yesu, Allah, Eshwar and Shirdi Sai.
GeneralComments:
This bhajan is also sung with the words "Prabhu Tu" in lieu of "Tum Ho".
Read Swami's discourse on the usage of the word "Tu" in bhajans.
Songglossary: akbar, allah, eshwar, hey, ho, jay, krishna, pitha, ram, sai, shirdi, tum, yesu

Title: Rama Krishna Vasudeva Narahari Vittala
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Vasudeva Narahari Vittala
Harey Rama Vittala Harey Krishna Vittala
Panduranga Purandara Pandari Vittala
Shirdi Sai Vittala Parthi Sai Vittala [ Panduranga ]
Sathya Sai Vittala Parthi (Prema) Sai Vittala
Sathya Dharma Vittala Shanthi Prema Vittala
Sai Vittala Sarvam Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Krishna, Vasudeva, Hari in human form Glory to Vittala, who is Rama and Krishna. The Panduranga Vittala, Lord of Saint Purandaradasa, is born in Shirdi as Sai. He is also our Sai of Parthi. He who preaches Truth, Righteousness, Peace is Sai, who encompasses all. Sing of Vittala, Panduranga Vittala.
Songglossary: dharma, hari, krishna, narahari, pandari, pandu, prem, puran, puttaparthi, ram, ranga, sai, sarva, sathya, shanthi, shirdi, vasudeva, vittala

Title: Rama Krishna Vasudeva Narayana Hari
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Vasudeva Narayana Hari Hari
Vishwa Roopa Vasudeva Narayana Hari Hari
Narayana Hari Hari Om Narayana Hari Hari [ Vishwa Roopa ]
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Krishna, Vasudeva, Hari Narayan, The all-pervading cosmic form of the Lord of Lords, Lord Hari, who is Sai Deva.
Songglossary: hari, krishna, narayana, om, ram, roopa, vasudeva, vishwa

Title: Rama Krishna Vasudeva Sai Nandalal
Lyrics:
Rama Krishna Vasudeva Sai Nandalal
Harey Rama Rama Krishna Sai Nandalal
Sai Nandalal Sai Nandalal
Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Sai Nandalal
Sai Nandalal Sai Nandalal
Shirdi Vasa Srinivasa Sai Nandalal [ Sai Nandalal ]
Meaning: Pray to Sai, who is Rama, Krishna, Vasudeva, son of Nanda. Glory to Rama, Krishna and Sai. Sai is the son of Nanda, born again. Refuge of the meek and the forlorn. He is Sai of Shirdi, Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati (Vishnu).
Songglossary: bandhava, deen, hari, krishna, nanda, natha, ram, sai, shirdi, srinivasa, vasa, vasudeva

Title: Rama Lakshmana Janaki
Lyrics:
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Jaya Hanuman Gyaan Guna Saagar
Jaya Kapees Tihu Lok Ujaagar
Rama Doot Atulita Baladhama
Anjani Putra Pavan Suta Naama
O Ram Naam Ke Baan Ki Jaya Bolo Hanuman Ki
Sai Naam Ke Baan Ki Jaya Bolo Hanuman Ki
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
(Fast)
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Shankar Suvan Kesari Nandan
Tej Prataap Maha Jag Vandan
Prabhu Charitra Sunibe Ko Rasiya
Ram Lakhan Sita Man Basiya
O Ram Naam Ke Baan Ki Jaya Bolo Hanuman Ki
Sai Naam Ke Baan Ki Jaya Bolo Hanuman Ki
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki

Title: Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo
Lyrics:
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Anjani Putra Balabheema Anjaneya Balabheema
Balabheem (6) Balabheema
Vayu Kumara Balabheema Vanara Veera Balabheema [ Balabheem (6) ]
Parthi Pureesha Sai Rama Pavana Purusha Sai Rama
Sai Ram (6) Sai Rama
Meaning: Victory to Hanuman, along with Rama, Lakshmana and Sita. Victory to the mighty son of Anjana, Hanuman. He is the son of Vayu (God of wind), He is the son of the monkey clan. Bow to the Lord of Parthi, Sai Rama, the pure and blemishless one.
Songglossary: anjani, balabheem, bolo, hanuman, jai, janaki, kumara, lakshmana, pavan, pureesha, purusha, putra, puttaparthi, ram, sai, vanara, vayu, veera

Title: Rama Naam Smaranam Samastha Paapa
Lyrics:
Rama Naam Smaranam Samastha Paapa Haranam
Kaama Krodha Haranam Raghuveera Naama Smaranam
Deena Janodharanam Bhavaabdhi Dukha Haranam
Meaning: Contemplating on the Name of Rama destroys all sins. Remembering the Name of the Hero of Raghu Dynasty (Rama) destroys desire and anger. Serving the hapless and the forlorn destroys the sorrows of the cycle of birth and death.
Songglossary: bhava, deen, dukh, harana, janodhara, krodha, naam, paapa, raghu, ram, samastha, smaran

Title: Rama Naama Bolo Sai Naama
Lyrics:
Rama Naama Bolo Sai Naama Bolo Radhey Shyam Ghana Shyam Jai Bolo
Rama Naama Bolo Sai Naama Bolo
Radhey Shyam Ghana Shyam
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Sai Rama, Radhey Shyama and Ghana Shyama (Dark blue hued). Chant the Name of Rama, Sai, Radheyshyam and Ghanashyam, Glory be to Him.
Songglossary: bolo, ghana, jai, naam, radha, ram, sai, sham

Title: Rama Naama Smaranam Sada Mokshanandakaram
Lyrics:
Rama Naama Smaranam Sada Mokshanandakaram
Sri Krishna Naama Smaranam Sada Hrudaya Kutuhalam
Sri Govinda Naama Smaranam Sada Lakshmi Krupakaram
Sri Anjaneya Smaranam Sada Dhairyanandakaram
Sri Sai Naama Smaranam Sada Sarva Anandakaram
Meaning: Chanting Rama's name continuously confers liberation. Chanting Krishna's name repeatedly confers enthusiasm in the Heart. Chanting Govinda's name repeatedly confers prosperity. Chanting the Name of Anjaneya (Hanuman) continuously confers courage or fearlessness. Chanting the Name of Sai always confers bliss for all.
Songglossary: anand, dhairya, govinda, hanuman, hrudaya, krishna, krupa, kutuhalam, lakshmi, moksha, naam, ram, sada, sai, sarva, smaran, sri

Title: Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Bhajorey
Lyrics:
Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Bhajorey
Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Japo Rey [ Rama Naama ... ]
Sai Darshanam Paapa Nashanam
Sai Sparshanam Moksha Dayakam
Meaning: Always worship Lord Rama, who helps to liberate oneself. Incessantly chant the liberating name of Rama. The darshan (sight) of Sai liberates you from all sins. The touch of Sai bestows on you enlightenment.
Songglossary: bhajao, darsh, dayaka, japo, moksha, naam, nasha, paapa, ram, sada, sai, sparshanam, taraka

Title: Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Bhajorey
Lyrics:
Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Bhajorey
Sada Bhajorey Sada Japo Rey [ Rama Naama ... ]
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kodanda Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kalyana Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Pattabhi Rama
Meaning: Incessantly worship Lord Rama who helps attain liberation. Victory to Lord Rama, who wields the 'Kodanda' bow. Victory to Lord Rama, the bestower of auspiciousness. Victory to Lord Rama, the crowned King.
Songglossary: bhajao, japo, jay, kalyan, kodanda, naam, pattabhi, ram, sada, taraka

Title: Rama Raghava
Lyrics:
Rama Raghava
Ranjita Roopa Hey Rajeeva Lochana [ Rama Raghava ... ]
Rama Rama Ravikula Soma
Ravikula Soma Ravikula Soma [ Rama Rama Ravikula ... ]
Ravana Samhara Ranadheera
Meaning: Rama, otherwise known as Raghava, attracts all with His Form, the lotus eyed One. The doyen of Ravi lineage, the indomitable warrior who annihilated the demon Ravana.
Songglossary: hey, lochana, raghava, rajeeva, ram, ranadheera, ranjita, ravana, ravikula, roopa, samhara, soma

Title: Rama Raghava ( Sai )
Lyrics:
Rama Raghava ( Sai )
Raghu Nandana Ravikula Soma [ Rama ... ]
Ravana Mardhana Ramabhi Rama
Ramethi Rama Raghu ( Sai ) Rama
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, Lord Sai Rama and Lord Raghava. Rama, also known as Raghava, is the Scion of Raghu dynasty, of Solar lineage. Rama who vanquished the demon Ravana, has now incarnated as Sai Rama.
Songglossary: mardana, nanda, raghava, raghu, ram, ramethi, ravana, ravikula, sai, soma

Title: Rama Raghava Raghuveera
Lyrics:
Rama Raghava Raghuveera
Sridhara Madhava Govinda [ Rama ... ]
Keshava Madhava Madhusudhana
Achyutha Anantha Narayana
Gopi Lola Gopala
Meaning: Chant of Rama, known as Raghava, who is the champion of the Raghu lineage. Chant the various Names of Krishna, Sridhara (the one who bears Mother Lakshmi in His heart), Madhava, Govinda, Keshava (the One with long hair), Madhusudhana (the One who demolished the demon Madhu), Achyutha - un-decaying, Anantha - endless, Narayana (indweller), Gopala (sustainer), who is dear to the Gopis.
Songglossary: achyutha, ananta, gopal, gopi, govinda, kesha, lola, madhava, madhu, narayana, raghava, raghu, ram, sridhara

Title: Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Rama
Lyrics:
Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Pahi Mam (2)
Krishna Keshava Krishna Keshava Krishna Keshava Raksha Mam (2)
Meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, and to Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty. Please protect and save us.
Songglossary: kesha, krishna, mam, paahi, raghava, raksha, ram

Title: Rama Raghuvara Ram Sita Ram
Lyrics:
Rama Raghuvara Ram Sita Ram Rama Ram (2)
Rama Dasharatha Nandana Kamaneeya Komala Ram
Rama Danava Bhanjana Kodanda Raja Ram
Deena Bandhu Karuna Sindhu Rama Sai Ram
Rama Bhaja Mana Rama Bhaja Mana Rama Pavana Naam
Meaning: Chant the Name of Rama whose consort is Mother Sita, He is the son of King Dasharatha. Rama the tender, handsome, one who is the annihilator of the demon clan; The One who wields the bow, an Ocean of compassion and dear to the forlorn. Sing the glory, Oh mind, of the purifying name of Rama.
Songglossary: bandhava, bhaja, bhanjana, danava, dasha, deen, kamaneeya, karuna, kodanda, komala, mana, naam, nanda, pavan, raghu, raja, ram, sai, sindhu, sita

Title: Rama Raghuvara Rama Sita Rama
Lyrics:
Rama Raghuvara Rama Sita Rama Rama Ram
Sri Rama Rama Ram Sai Rama Rama Ram [ Rama Raghuvara ... ]
Hey Patitha Pavana Ram Hey Shyamala Komala Ram
Hey Vaidehi Priya Ram Sai Ram Rama Jaya Ram [ Sri Rama ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Rama whose consort is Mother Sita; He, who liberates the penitent, the handsome and tender Lord. He is the beloved of Vaidehi (Sita), victory to Lord Ram.
Songglossary: hey, jay, komala, patitha, pavan, priya, raghu, ram, sai, sham, sita, sri, vaidehi

Title: Rama Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
Raghuveeram Ranadheeram [ Rama Rama ... ]
Atma Ramam Akhanda Ramam
Ananda Sada Adbhuta Ramam
Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the hero of the Raghu dynasty, the illustrious warrior. He is the indwelling Atma, the unique one. He is the wonderful Rama who bestows eternal bliss.
Songglossary: adbhuta, akhanda, anand, atma, jay, raghu, ram, ranadheera, sada

Title: Rama Rama Jaya Raghukula Tilaka
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Jaya Raghukula Tilaka
Rajeeva Lochana Ram
Eshwaramba Sutha Jaya Jaga Vandana
Ratnakara Kula Deepa (3)
Meaning: Worship the Lotus - Eyed Lord Rama, who is the auspicious symbol of the Raghu dynasty. He is Sai Ram, the son of Mother Eshwaramba and is the glory of the Ratnakara dynasty.
Songglossary: deepa, eshwar, jagat, jay, kula, lochana, raghu, rajeeva, ram, ratnakara, sutha, tilaka, vandana

Title: Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Lyrics: Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram (4)
Meaning: Victory to Rama the consort of Janaki.
Songglossary: jay, raja, ram, sita

Title: Rama Rama Raghu Ram Shyam
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Raghu Ram Shyam Shyam Ghana Shyam
Koi Kahey Ram Koi Kahey Rahim Koi Kahey Ghana Shyam
Nanak Yesu Buddha Mahavir
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan (2)
Meaning: Sing of Lord Rama, the dark-hued Krishna, Some call Him Ram, some Rahim, some say the dark blue hued one. Some bow to Nanak, Jesus, Buddha, Mahavir. Lord Sai is one with all of them.
Songglossary: bhagawan, buddha, ghana, hai, kahey, koi, mahavir, nanak, raghu, rahim, ram, sab, sai, sham, yesu

Title: Rama Rama Ram Raghu Nandana
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Ram Raghu Nandana Atma Ram (Sri)
Sri Rama Rama Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram [ Rama Rama ... ]
Kausalyatmaja Vaidehi Priya Ayodhya Vasi Ram
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Maruti Sevitha Veera Kodanda Ram
Eshwaramba Priya Sutha Hey Avatari Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Janaki Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sita ( Sai ) Ram
Meaning: Sing the Divine Name of Rama who was the son of Dasharatha, Who was the very life of his mother Kausalya and who was the chief of the Raghu clan. Chant the name of Sita's consort, the handsome Rama, resident of Ayodhya. Praise Rama who destroyed Ravana with the famous bow, Kodanda and the one who is served by Hanuman. Sing the name of the son of Eshwaramba, the Lord of Puttaparthi, Sai Rama!
Songglossary: atma, avatar, ayodhya, dasha, eshwar, hey, jai, janaki, kausalya, kodanda, mardana, maruthi, mukha, nanda, priya, raghu, ram, sai, sevita, sita, sri, sutha, vaidehi, vasi, veera

Title: Rama Rama Rama
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
Patheetha Pavana Ram, Deena Rakshaka Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Ram Dashamukha Mardhana Ram
Lakshmana Sevitha Ram Lakshmi Manohara Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram (Shri)
Meaning: Salutaions to You, Lord Rama, the refuge of the downtrodden and the protector of the destitute. You are the slayer of the ten headed Ravana. You are worshipped and attended by Brother Lakshmana and You are the enchanter of Goddess Lakshmi.

Title: Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kodanda
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kodanda Ram
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kalyana Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Vaidehi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Pattabhi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Atmabhi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Sri Sai Rama
Meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the One with the famous bow, Kodanda. Victory to Him, the bestower of auspiciousness. Victory to Him, beloved of Vaidehi (Sita). Victory to Rama, the crown Prince. The one with the sweet form who resides in our hearts, Victory to Lord Sai Rama.
Songglossary: atmabhi, jay, kalyan, kodanda, pattabhi, ram, sai, sri, vaidehi

Title: Rama Rama Rama Ram Sai
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Ram Sai Ram
Karunya Rama Sri Sai Rama [ Rama Rama ... ]
Vaidehi Ram Sai Ram (Rama)
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (Sathya)
Meaning: Sing of Rama, who has come as Sai Ram. The compassionate Rama, Lord Rama The consort of Vaidehi (Sita), Lord Rama. Sing of Sai Rama, Sathya Sai Rama.
Songglossary: karuna, ram, sai, sathya, sri, vaidehi

Title: Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
 Rama Rama Ramchandra
 Lord Of Beauty, Lord of Bliss, Lord Who Made all this
 Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai, Thy Lotus Feet I kiss
 Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
 Rama Rama Ramchandra
 As I look into Your eyes, seeing infinity
 I know that You surely will set my soul free
 Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
 Rama Rama Ramchandra
 In my heart You softly say, Love is all that's True
 Loving You, Sweet Sathya Sai, is all That I can do

Title: Rama Rama Rama Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Sai Rama Namo
Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Namo
Yesu Yesu Yesu Sai Yesu Namo
Buddha Buddha Buddha Sai Buddha Namo
Rama Sai Rama Namo Krishna Sai Krishna Namo
Yesu Sai Yesu Namo
Buddha Namo
Zohrashtra Zohrashtra Sai Namo
Mahavira Mahavira Sai Namo
Guru Nanak Guru Nanak
Meaning: I bow to Rama, Sri Rama I bow to Krishna, Sri Krishna I bow to Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavir & Nanak All are but emanations of our Lord Sai.
Songglossary: buddha, guru, krishna, mahavir, namo, nanak, ram, sai, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Rama Rama Rama Sita
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Sita (4) 
Srimad Ravikulamandu Janinchi 
Sitadevini Preethi varinchi 
Premanahalya Sapamu deerchi 
Priya Bhakthula Rakshinchina Sri Raghu [Rama, Rama ...] 

Munduga Hanumanthuni Deevinchi
Mudamalaraga Ravisuthu Palinchi 
Chendina Kinukatho Vaalini drunchi 
Cherina Vanara Veerula Brochina [Rama, Rama ...]

Karadooshanamukha Danujula Drunchi 
Karuna Jatayu Gathi Savarinchi 
Sarabhangadi Muneendrula Brochi Sabhari 
Phalamulu Prema Bhujinchina [Rama, Rama ...] 

Ravanadisura Vairula Drunchi 
Ramanithoda Sadhula Palinchi 
Aavanarasini Needu Badinchi 
Aadaramuga Vibheeshuni Brochina [Rama, Rama ...]
Songglossary: aadaramuga, bhakthula, bhujinchina, brochi, chendina, cherina, danujula, deerchi, deevinchi, drunchi, gathi, hanuman, janinchi, jatayu, karadooshanamukha, karuna, kinukatho, mudam, munduga, muneendrula, palinchi, phala, preethi, prem, premanahalya, priya, raghu, rakshinchina, ram, ramanithoda, ravana, ravikula, sabha, sadhu, sapamu, savari, sita, sitadevini, sri, sriman, vaalini, vanara, varinchi, veerula, vibheeshuni

Title: Rama Rama Rama Sita Rama
Lyrics: Rama Rama Rama Sita Rama Raghu Rama (4)
Meaning: Chant incessantly the name of Rama, the consort of Sita, the Scion of Raghu dynasty.
Songglossary: raghu, ram, sita

Title: Rama Rama Ravikula Soma
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Ravikula Soma 
Kodanda Rama Patabhi Rama
Sai Rama Saketha Rama
Jai Jai Rama Janaki Rama
Meaning: O Lotus eyed Lord Rama, the Prince of Raghu dynasty O Resident of the heart of devotees and holder of "Kodanda" bow! O Lord Sai Rama you are merciful and beautiful to look at. Victory to Lord Rama consort of Mother Sita.
GeneralComments: Hindi
Songglossary: janaki, jay, kodanda, pattabhi, ram, ravikula, sai, saketa, soma

Title: Rama Rama Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Sai Rama
Parthi Pureesha Sai Ram [ Rama Rama ... ]
Madhura Manohara Sundara Naam
Shyamala Komala Nayanabhi Ram
Ravikula Mandana Rajalalaam
Parama Pavana Mangala Dhaam
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama and Lord Sai Rama of Puttaparthi. Oh Lord Rama! Nectarine is Thy name. You are exceedingly beautiful and charming with a graceful look. You are the jewel of the Ravi Kula (descendant of the Solar dynasty) and You are the greatest among all kings. Reciting Your name confers auspiciousness.
GeneralComments: The fifth line is commonly sung with the words "Rajana Ram" instead of "Rajalalaam".
Songglossary: dhaam, komala, madhura, mandana, mangal, manohar, naam, nayan, parama, pavana, pureesha, puttaparthi, rajalalaam, ram, ravikula, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Rama Rama Sai Rama Sita
Lyrics:
Rama Rama Sai Rama Sita Rama Radhey Shyam (3)
Dasharatha Nandana Sita Rama Vasudeva Nandana Radhey Shyam
Eshwaramba Nandana Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: Glory to Sita Rama the son of Dasharatha and Radhey Shyam, the son of Vasudeva. Glory to Lord Sai Rama, the son of Eshwaramba, the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: dasha, eshwar, nanda, purishwara, puttaparthi, radha, ram, sai, sham, sita, vasudeva

Title: Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Ram (2)
Kausalya Nandana Dasharatha Ram
Janaki Vallabha Jaya Jaya Ram
Lakshmana Sevitha Lavanya Ram
Ravana Mardhana Ranadheera Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Raja Ram
Anjana Priya Sutha Atmabhi Ram
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, who has come as Sai Ram. Rama, the darling son of Kausalya and Dasharatha, victory to Thee, the beloved of Sita. Glory to the gentle Lord who was served by brother Lakshmana. Glory to the illustrious warrior, Rama who destroyed the demon Ravana. Glory to the resident King of Ayodhya, who is the indwelling Lord of the dear son of Anjana (Hanuman).
Songglossary: anjana, atmabhi, ayodhya, dasaratha, janaki, jay, kausalya, lakshmana, lavanya, mardana, nandana, priya, raja, ram, ranadheera, ravana, sai, sevita, sutha, vallabha, vasi

Title: Rama Sharana Bhajo Rama Harey
Lyrics:
Rama Sharana Bhajo Rama Harey (3)
Ahalyodharaka Rama Harey
Alakh Niranjan Rama Harey
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Harey
Sai Jaga Vandana Rama Harey
Rama Harey Sai Rama Harey (2)
Meaning: Sing of glorious surrender to the Lord Ram, the Rama who liberated chaste devotee - Ahalya, the one who is beyond attributes, the spotlessly pure Rama. Glory to the son of Dasharatha. He is Sai, adored by the whole world. Glory to Sai Rama.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, alakh, bhaja, dasha, hari, jagat, nanda, niranjan, ram, sai, sharan, vandana

Title: Rama Sita Krishna Radha Vitthala Rakhumayi
Lyrics:
Rama Sita Krishna Radha Vitthala Rakhumayi Jai Jai Vittala Rakhumayi (2)
Surdas Prabhu Karuna Sagara Vittala Rakhumayi
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara Vittala Rakhumayi
Sai Natha Prabhu Gaana Manohara Vittala Rakhumayi Jai Jai Vittala Rakhumayi
Vittala Vittala Vittala Jai Jai (3)
Vittala Jai Jai Panduranga Jai Jai
Vittala Vittala Vittala Jai Jai
Meaning: Hail Victory to the Lords Rama, Krishna and Vitthala whose praises were sung by Surdas and Meera. Hail Victory to Lord Sai who is pleased with music and who is none other than Vitthala

Title: Rama Sri Ramachandra Jaya Jaya
Lyrics:
Rama Sri Ramachandra Jaya Jaya Rama
Karunabhi Rama Kamaneeya Rama [ Rama Sri ]
Kodanda Rama Kalyana Rama
Sharanagatha Paripalana Sri Charana Rama
Rama Sri Rama Sai Rama
Samara Vijaya Rama Saketa Rama
Meaning: Pray to Rama, who shines like the full moon, The compassionate and attractive Rama The auspicious one who wields the bow, Kodanda The one who protects those who surrender at His Lotus Feet Pray to Lord Rama, the victorious heavenly warrior.
Songglossary: chara, jay, kalyan, kamaneeya, karuna, kodanda, paripala, ram, ramachandra, sai, saketa, samara, sharan, sri, vijaya

Title: Rama Sumira Man Rama Sumira
Lyrics:
Rama Sumira Man Rama Sumira Man
Rama Sumira Man Ram
Janaki Vallabha Dasharatha Nandana
Ramachandra Sri Ram
Bhaja Mana Sita Ram Ram Bhaja Mana Sita Ram
Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyam Shyam Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyam
Bhaja Mana Sai Ram Ram Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Meaning: Oh mind, Chant the name of Lord Rama, the beloved of Sita and the Prince of King Dasharatha. Worship, Oh mind, the Lord Sitaram, Radhey Shyam and Lord Sai Ram.
Songglossary: bhaja, dasha, janaki, mana, nanda, radha, ram, ramachandra, sai, sham, sita, sri, sumira, vallabha

Title: Ramachandra Prabhu Raghu Vamsha Naama
Lyrics:
Ramachandra Prabhu Raghu Vamsha Naama
Sita Pathey Jaya Janaki Rama [ Ramachandra ... ]
Ahalyodharaka Sugunabhi Rama
Ravana Samhara Kodanda Rama
Ayodhya Rama Pattabhi Rama
Nava Nava Komala Sri Sai Rama [ Sita Pathey ... ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Rama! In the Raghu Dynasty You have incarnated as Lord Ramachandra, The husband of Sita, the Lord of Janaki (Sita). Oh Most virtuous Lord Rama! You liberated Ahalya (devotee), destroyed the demon Ravana, as you wielded the Kodanda bow. Oh Lord of Ayodhya (city in the North of India), the crowned King, Lord Ram! You have incarnated as Lord Sai Ram, the ever new and tender embodiment of Love!
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, ayodhya, janaki, jay, kodanda, komala, naam, nava, pathey, pattabhi, prabhu, raghu, ram, ramachandra, ravana, sai, samhara, sita, sri, suguna, vamsha

Title: Ramachandra Raghuveera Ramachandra Ranadheera
Lyrics:
Ramachandra Raghuveera Ramachandra Ranadheera
Ramachandra Raghurama Ramachandra Parandhama
Ramachandra Raghunatha Ramachandra Jagannatha
Ramachandra Mama Bandho Ramachandra Daya Sindho
Raghuveera Ranadheera
Raghurama Parandhama
Raghunatha Jagannatha
Mama Bandho Daya Sindho (2)
Meaning: Glory to Lord Rama, the hero of the Raghu dynasty. Glory to Ramachandra, the illustrious warrior prince. He is verily the heavenly abode, the goal of our life. He is the Lord of Raghu dynasty, the Lord of all worlds. He is our very own relative, the sea of mercy and compassion. Sing the glory of Lord Rama!
Songglossary: bandho, daya, jagan, mama, parandhama, raghu, ramachandra, ranadheera, sindhu

Title: Ramachandra Sri Ram
Lyrics:
Ramachandra Sri Ram
Sai Rama Jaya Rama [ Ramachandra ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Dayabhi Rama
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Rama
Tapasa Ranjana Taraka Naama
Ahalyodharaka Rama Rama
Meaning: Victory to Lord Ramachandra, the darling son of Dasharatha, the merciful Rama. The slayer of the ten-headed demon - Ravana, the liberating name that enthralls the saintly and the one who liberated Ahalya, the chaste devotee.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, dasha, dayabhi, jay, mardana, mukha, naam, nanda, ram, ramachandra, ranjana, sai, sri, tapasa, taraka

Title: Ramam Bhajo Raghu Ramam Bhajo
Lyrics:
Ramam Bhajo Raghu Ramam Bhajo
Raghukula Tilakam Ramam Bhajo [ Ramam Bhajo ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Ramam Bhajo
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Ramam Bhajo
Vaidehi Priya Ramam Bhajo
Vaikunta Vasa Ramam Bhajo
Meaning: Sing the name of Rama, Who is the star of Raghu Clan. Rama, beloved son of Dasharatha who slayed the ten-headed demon, Ravana. The beloved of Sita (Vaidehi) and the one resides in Vaikunta (heavenly abode of Vishnu)
Songglossary: bhaja, dasha, mardana, mukha, nanda, priya, raghu, ram, tilaka, vaidehi, vaikunta, vasa

Title: Ranga Ranga Panduranga Ranga Vittala
Lyrics:
Ranga Ranga Panduranga Ranga Vittala
Vittala Krishna Vittala
Vittala Sai Vittala [ Ranga Ranga ... ]
Rukmini Sametha Pandari Natha
Parthi Ranga Vittala Deena Bandhu Vittala
Vittala Krishna Vittala [ Vittala Sai ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Panduranga, Vittala and Sai. He is Lord Krishna, installed along with Rukmini as the Lord of Pandharpur. He is our Sai Vittala of Parthi, the saviour of the meek.
Songglossary: bandhava, deen, krishna, natha, pandari, pandu, puttaparthi, ranga, rukmini, sai, sametha, vittala

Title: Ranga Sri Ranga Jai Jai
Lyrics:
Ranga Sri Ranga Jai Jai Panduranga
Vittala Jai Vittala Jai Vittala Sri Ranga [ Ranga Sri ]
Radhey Govinda Giridhara Gopal
Natavara Naagara Murali Manohara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ranga
Jai Jai Panduranga (3)
Meaning: Victory to Panduranga Vittal, the Lord of Pandharpur. He is the Lord Krishna of Radha; Giridhar, the one who lifted the mountain. He, who revels in mischief and is the stealer of hearts is none other than the Lord of Parthi, Sai Ranga.
Songglossary: giridhar, gopal, govinda, jai, manohar, murali, naagar, natavara, pandu, purishwara, puttaparthi, radha, ranga, sai, sri, vittala

Title: Ratnakara Kula Bhooshana
Lyrics:
Ratnakara Kula Bhooshana
Rajeeva Nayana Sai Narayana [ Ratnakara ... ]
Eshwaramba Nandana (Hey)
Tribhuvana Palana (Vanditha) Mrudu Charana
Meaning: Oh Lotus-Eyed Lord Sai Narayana! You are the jewel of the Ratnakara dynasty. Oh Darling son of Mother Eshwaramba and the sustainer of all creation. Your soft, Lotus Feet are worshipped and adored by the entire universe.
Songglossary: bhooshan, chara, eshwar, hey, kula, mrudu, nanda, narayana, nayan, paalaya, rajeeva, ratnakara, sai, tribhuvan, vanditha

Title: Ratnakara Kula Bhushana
Lyrics:
Ratnakara Kula Bhushana
Rajeeva Nayana Sai Narayana [ Ratnakara Kula ... ]
Eshwaramba Nandana
Tribhuvana Vanditha Mrudu Charana
Meaning: The entire Universe adores and worships at the soft and tender feet of the lotus-eyes Lord Sai Narayana, jewel of the Ratnakara dynasty and son of Eswaramma.
Songglossary: bhushan, chara, eshwar, kula, mrudu, nanda, narayana, nayan, rajeeva, ratnakara, sai, tribhuvan, vanditha

Title: Ravikula Mandana Rajeeva Lochana Raghava
Lyrics:
Ravikula Mandana Rajeeva Lochana Raghava
Vasudeva Nandana Bandha Vimochana Keshava [ Ravikula Mandana ... ]
Karuna Niketana Krishna Janardhana Yadava
Sri Madhusudhana Murali Mohana Madhava
Meaning: Sai took the form of Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty; In Dwapara yuga, He was the son of Vasudeva, as Krishna, who liberates us from bondage. The abode of compassion, the protector of all, the one who conquered the demon Madhu and the one who enchants all with the melody from his flute.
Songglossary: bandha, janardhana, karuna, kesha, krishna, lochana, madhava, madhu, manda, mohan, murali, nanda, niketana, raghava, rajeeva, ravikula, sri, vasudeva, vimochana, yadava

Title: Rejoice In The Lord Sai
Lyrics:
Rejoice In The Lord Sai Baba And Again I Say Rejoice
Rejoice,Rejoice And Again I Say Replace
Rejoice In The Lord Sai Rama And Again I Say Rejoice
Rejoice,Rejoice And Again I Say Rejoice
Rejoice In The Lord Sai Krishna..
Rejoice In The Lord Sai Buddha ...
Rejoice In The Lord Sai Jesus ...
Songglossary: baba, buddha, krishna, ram, sai

Title: Remind Me My Lord (3)
Lyrics:
Remind Me My Lord (3) Who I Am
I Am Om, I Am Om, Eternal Om
Through This Life Of Distraction And Of Illusion, Remind Me ...
... My Lord, Who I Am
I Am Truth, I Am Peace, Divine Bliss
Ananda Svaroopa, Hey Prema Svaroopa, Remind Me My Lord Who I Am
I Am Love, I Am Love, Pure Love
Songglossary: anand, hey, om, prem

Title: Repeat His Name Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Repeat His Name, Sai Ram, Sai Ram
Say It With Love, Sai Ram, Sai Ram
Picture His Form, Sai Ram, Sai Ram
He Is Everywhere, Feel Him Shining Within You
Rama Rama Ram Ram, Sai Rama Ram Ram
Songglossary: ram, sai

Title: Rhum Jhum Nacho Nanda Dular
Lyrics:
Rhum Jhum Nacho Nanda Dular
Madhava Murahara Murali Gopal [ Rhum Jhum ... ]
Radha Manohara Natavara Lal
Govinda Giridhar Murali Gopal
Meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Madhava, Natavara, Gopala and Govinda. Pray to the Divine Dancer, the beloved child of Nanda. The Lord of Radha, the destroyer of demon, Mura. The enchanter with the flute and the mischievous Lord, who protected his devotees by lifting the mountain.
Songglossary: dular, giridhar, gopal, govinda, lal, madhava, manohar, murahara, murali, nacho, nanda, natavara, radha, rhuma-jhuma

Title: Rise and dance for all to see
Lyrics:
Rise and dance for all to see, Nataraja Shiva
 Play your drums and raise the beat, Nataraja Shiva
 Dance your dance and dance for me, Nataraja Shiva
 Only you can end this dream, Nataraja Shiva
 Dance your dance, we yearn for Thee, Nataraja Shiva
 For your dance will set us free, Nataraja Shiva
 Dance your dance and make us see, Nataraja Shiva
 All are one and all are Thee, Nataraja Shiva

Title: Round and round, up and down
Lyrics:
Round and round, up and down, don't you hear the heavenly sound?
 Over and over and over again
 Om Sri Sai Ram
 Over and over and over again
 It will never, ever end - Om
 Round and round, up and down, don't you hear the heavenly sound - Om

Title: Rudra Swaroopa Omkara Natha
Lyrics:
Rudra Swaroopa Omkara Natha
Neelakantha Sai Deena Natha
Tandava Priyakara Girija Ramana
Vibhuti Sundara Kailasa Rana
Lingodhbhava Kara Shiva Yogeshwara
Meaning: Lord Shiva, with the blue throat, is the protector of the meek. He is the cosmic dancer, the delight of Mother Parvathi and the embodiment of Om. Lord of Kailasa, with the eye of wisdom and adorned with holy ash is the source of creative energy. He is Lord Sai.
Songglossary: deen, girija, kailasa, kara, lingodbhava, natha, neela, om, priya, ramana, rana, rudra, sai, shiva, sundara, swaroopa, tandava, vibhuti, yogi

Title: Sabari Giri Vasa Parama Dayala
Lyrics:
Sabari Giri Vasa Parama Dayala
Swamiye Sharanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa [ Sabari Giri ... ]
Hari Hara Suthane Shri Manikanta
Swamiye Sharanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa [ 2 ]
Meaning: Take refuge in Lord Ayyappa adorned with a necklace of precious gems. He resides in the Sabari mountains and is the all-merciful son of Vishnu (in His Mohini form) and Shiva.
Songglossary: dayal, giri, hara, hari, manikanta, param, ponnaiappa, sabari, sharan, sri, sutha, swami, vasa

Title: Sabari Girisha Engal Nayaga
Lyrics:
Sabari Girisha Engal Nayaga, Sharanam Ayyappa Swami Sharanam Ayyappa
Mohana Roopa Mohini Bala
Sharanam Sharanam Bhagawane Sharanam Ayyappa
Parti Purisha Sadguru Deva, Sharanam Ayyappa Swami Sharanam Ayyappa
Jyothi Swaroopa Paapa Vinasha [ Sharanam Sharanam ... ]
Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa Swami Sharanam Ayyappa (2)
Meaning: We surrender to Ayyappa, the Lord of Mount Sabari. He is the son of Mohini, a captivating form of Vishnu. He is the Lord of Parthi, with divine who destroys our sins.
Songglossary: ayyappa, bala, bhagawan, deva, engal, girisha, jyoth, mohan, nayaka, paapa, pureesha, puttaparthi, roopa, sabari, sadguru, sharan, swami, swaroopa, vinasha

Title: Sada Bhajami Ganeshwaram
Lyrics:
Sada Bhajami Ganeshwaram
Nithya Smarami Sarveshwaram [ Sada Bhajami ]
Dheeram Daya Sagaram
Bhava Dooram Guha Sodaram
Karunya Jaladharam
Bhaktha Kanshepa Pradakaram
Meaning: I Chant the Name of Ganesha always, I constantly remember the Lord of all, The One of valor and the Ocean of compassion, Lord Ganesha, who removes the fear of birth and death. Brother of Lord Guha (Lord Subrahmanya), who is an ocean of compassion to his devotees.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhaktha, bhava, daya, dheera, dooram, gananatha, guha, jaladharam, karuna, nithya, sada, sagar, sarvesha, smaran, sodara

Title: Sada Bhajore Sada Bhajo
Lyrics:
Sada Bhajore Sada Bhajo
Shri Ram Jaya Ram Sada Bhajo
Kausalya Rama Sada Bhajo
Parthipuri Sai Sada Bhajo [ Sada Bhajore ... Ram Sada Bhajo ]
Shri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram (4)
Meaning: Sing constantly the glory of Lord Rama, son of Kausalya, and resident of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, jay, kausalya, puttaparthi, ram, sada, sai, sri

Title: Sada Bhajorey Hari Naama Bhajo
Lyrics:
Sada Bhajorey Hari Naama Bhajo
Madhura Sudha Rasa Hari Naama Bhajo [ Sada Bhajo ... ]
Sri Raghu Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Gowri Shankara Naama Bhajo Bhajo
Meaning: Constantly sing the name of Hari, the name that confers sweet nectar of immortality. Chant the names of Rama and Krishna. Chant the names of Parvathi and Shankara.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, ghana, gowri, hari, hey, madhu, naam, raghu, ram, rasa, sada, sham, shankara, sri, sudha

Title: Sada Bhajorey Shankara Naam (2)
Lyrics:
Sada Bhajorey Shankara Naam (2)
Sada Japo Rey Sai Naam
Samba Sadashiva Sai Sarveshwara
Sundara Roopa Hara Gangadhara
Meaning: Always sing of the name Shankara, Always chant the name Shankara. May the beautiful form of the Lord Sai, who is embodiment of happiness and prosperity, be ever in our hearts.
Songglossary: bhajao, ganga, hara, japo, naam, roopa, sada, sadashiva, sai, samba, sarvesha, shankara, sundara

Title: Sada Nirantara Hari Guna Gao
Lyrics:
Sada Nirantara Hari Guna Gao
Prema Bhakthi Se Bhajan Sunao [ Sada Nirantara ... ]
Sai Nath Ke Charano Mey Aao
Man Mandir Mey Deepa Jalao
Jeevana Naiya Paar Lagao
Meaning: Always sing the glory of our Lord; Let the bhajan resound with love and devotion; Come to the lotus feet of our Lord Sai; In your heart's temple, light the lamp of love; He will take you across the ocean of life.
Songglossary: aao, bhaja, bhakthi, chara, deepa, gao, guna, hari, jalao, jeeva, ke, lagao, mana, mandir, naiya, natha, nirantara, paar, prem, sada, sai, se, sunao

Title: Sada Shiva Sadguru Sai Deva
Lyrics:
Sada Shiva Sadguru Sai Deva
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Deva
Guru Deva Guru Deva
Guru Baba Sai Guru Deva [ Sada Shiva ... ]
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Mahadeva
Narayana Parabrahma Guru Deva
Zohrashtra Buddha Allah Guru Deva
Guru Nanak Yeshu Natha Guru Deva
Sathya Sai Sadguru Sai Deva
Satchidananda Guru Sai Deva
Meaning: Take refuge at the feet of the true Guru, Sathya Sai, who is none other than Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Zoroaster, Buddha, Allah, Jesus, Guru Nanak and the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss.
Songglossary: allah, baba, brahma, buddha, deva, guru, mahadev, nanak, narayana, natha, parabrahma, sada, sadguru, sai, satchidananda, sathya, sharan, shiva, vishnu, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Sadashiva Ranjani Sai Janani
Lyrics:
Sadashiva Ranjani Sai Janani
Sambhavi Shankari Durga Bhavani [ Sadashiva Ranjani ... ]
Akhilandeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Mata Maheshwari Narayani
Meaning: Eternal joy of Lord Shiva, wife of Shiva, She is the giver of life, Mother of all worlds, the queen of queens. She is Mother Parvathi, the sister of Lord Vishnu. She is none other than Mother Sai.
Songglossary: akhila, bhava, durga, janani, maheshwari, mata, narayani, raja, rajeshwari, ranjani, sadashiva, sai, sambhavi, shankari

Title: Sadguru Brahma Sanathana Hey
Lyrics:
Sadguru Brahma Sanathana Hey
Parama Daya Ghana Pavana Hey
Janmaja Dukha Nivarana Hey
Jagadodharana Karana Hey
Sai Krishna Janardhana Hey
Janardhana Hey Janardhana Hey [ Sai Krishna ]
Bhava Bhaya Jaladhi Taarana Hey
Meaning: Worship the merciful Noble Guru, Lord Sai Krishna, whose form is Brahma (Infinity). He is the saviour of the world. Oh Lord Sai Janardhana! Worship merciful, noble, Lord Sai Krishna, the saviour of world. You are the one who helps overcome sorrows and the fear of crossing the ocean of life and death.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, brahma, daya, dukh, ghana, hey, jagadodhara, jaladharam, janardhana, janma, kaarana, krishna, nivarana, param, pavan, sadguru, sai, sanatana, taarana

Title: Sadguru Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
Lyrics:
Sadguru Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
Sri Sathya Sai Sadashiva Shankara
Amrutha Amrutha Daana Karey Sai
Aap Haalaahala Paan Karey
Bhava Bhaya Jaladhi Paar Karey Sai
Jagadodhara Jaya Abhayankara [ Sri Sathya ]
Meaning: Oh! Noble Universal Teacher, You represent the Trinity (Creator, Preserver & Destroyer). You are the one who gave the boon of immortality. You drank the poison arising from the churning of the world! Help me cross the ocean of fear and sorrow. Grant me fearlessness, Oh! ever blissful Lord Sai.
Songglossary: aap, abhaya, amrutha, bhava, bhaya, brahma, daana, haalaahala, jagadodhara, jaladharam, jay, karo, maheshwara, paan, paar, sadashiva, sadguru, sai, sathya, shankara, sri, vishnu

Title: Sadguru Charanam Sada Smarami
Lyrics:
Sadguru Charanam Sada Smarami
Sai Charanam Sada Smarami [ Sadguru Charanam ]
Shankara Charanam Sada Smarami
Pankaja Charanam Pranamamyaham
Meaning: Meditate upon the Lotus Feet of Divine Master. I offer obeisance by prostrating at the auspicious Lotus Feet of Lord Sai. Oh Shankara, I constantly meditate on Your Lotus Feet and offer my obeisance.
Songglossary: chara, pankaja, pranamamyaham, sada, sadguru, sai, shankara, smaran

Title: Sadguru Charanam Sankata Haranam
Lyrics:
Sadguru Charanam Sankata Haranam
Sathya Sanathana Sarathi Charanam [ Sadguru Charanam ... ]
Sada Bhajorey Sada Japo Rey
Sai Naama Smaranam Madhuram
Sai Charanam Shanthi Sadanam
Meaning: Meditate on the Feet of the Universal Guru, they will protect you from harm. They are the feet of the True, eternal charioteer. Always chant and sing of them. Sweet is the remembrance of thy name - Sai. Thy Lotus Feet are the peaceful abode.
Songglossary: bhajao, chara, harana, japo, madhu, naam, sada, sadana, sadguru, sai, sanatana, sankata, sarathi, sathya, shanthi, smaran

Title: Sadguru Nadane Va Va Va
Lyrics:
Sadguru Nadane Va Va Va
Satchidanandane Va Va Va
Sarvadayalane Va Va Va
Sathya Sayi Nadane Va Va Va
Shirdipuri Vasane Va Va Va
Parthipuri Vasane Va Va Va
Siva Sakti Roopane Va Va Va [ Sathya Sayi ... ]
Meaning: O come our true Guru, embodiment of true bliss, merciful incarnation of Shiva and Shakti, and Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: natha, puttaparthi, roopa, sadguru, sai, sarva, satchidananda, sathya, shakthi, shirdi, shiva, va, vasa

Title: Sadguru Namam Madhura Mayam
Lyrics:
Sadguru Namam Madhura Mayam
Sundara Roopam Jyothir Mayam (Ati)
Shyamala Vadanam Shanthi Mayam
Prema Pradayaka Pavana Namam
Paapa Vinashaka Prabhu Namam
Sada Bhajeham Sai Namam
Meaning: Let us ever chant the name of the true Guru, suffused with sweetness, beauty, divine effulgence, and peace. His sanctified name grants love and dispels sins.
Songglossary: ati, bhajami, jyoth, madhu, mayam, namam, paapa, pavan, prabhu, pradayaka, prem, roopa, sada, sadguru, sai, sham, shanthi, sundara, vadana, vinasha

Title: Sadguru Nathudey Ma Baba
Lyrics:
Sadguru Nathudey Ma Baba
Satchidanandudey Ma Baba
Sarva Dayaludey Ma Baba
Sathya Sai Nathudey Ma Baba
Meaning: Baba is our sacred preceptor, the very personification of Truth, Awareness and Bliss. He is compassionate towards all and who is known as Lord Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: baba, dayal, ma, nathudey, sadguru, sai, sarva, satchidananda, sathya

Title: Sadguru Om Sadguru Om
Lyrics:
Sadguru Om Sadguru Om
Shiva Shiva Sai Sadguru Om
Shirdi Pureeshwara Sadguru Om
Sri Sai Deva Sadguru Om
Parthi Pureeshwara Sadguru Om
Parama Dayalo Sadguru Om
Hara Shiva Murthy Sadguru Om
Bhavani Shankara Sadguru Om
Meaning: Chant of the Universal Guru, Omkara Chant of Shiva Sai, the universal Guru He is the Lord of Shirdi & Parthi, the most compassionate, He is none other than the embodiment of Shiva and Parvathi.
Songglossary: bhava, dayal, deva, hara, murthy, om, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, sadguru, sai, shankara, shirdi, shiva, sri

Title: Sadguru Sai Ram Jai Bolo
Lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Ram Jai Bolo Sadguru Sai Ram
Mata Pitha Prabhu Ram Sai Bandhu Sakha Bhagawan [ Sadguru Sai ... ]
Allah Sai Ram Nanak Yesu Sai Ram
Zohrashtra Sai Ram Sai Ram Gautama Sai Ram
Jai Bolo Sai Ram Jai Jai Sai Ram
Jai Bolo Sai Ram Ram Jai Sathya Sai Ram
Jai Sathya Sai Ram
Meaning: Chant Victory to our Divine Preceptor Sai Ram who is our mother, father, lord, relative and friend. O Lord Sathya Sai, You are verily Allah, Guru Nanak, Jesus Christ, Zohrashtra and Gautama Buddha. Victory to Thee, O Lord.

Title: Sadguru Sai Saraswathi
Lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Saraswathi
Brahma Deva Sakhi Bharati
Mangala Manjula Vaagvilasini
Veena Vadini Kalavathi
Hamsa Vahini Vidya Daayini
Veda Mata Sri Sai Bhagawathi
Meaning: Worship the Supreme Teacher, Sai. The auspicious embodiment of all learning and wisdom (Saraswathi), consort of Lord Brahma (Creator aspect of the Trinity); The adept in the art of producing sweet melodies on the Veena (string instrument) and the bestower of all knowledge, who has the celestial swan as vehicle.
Songglossary: bhagavathi, bharati, brahma, daayi, deva, hamsa, kalavathi, mangal, manjula, mata, sadguru, sai, sakha, saraswathi, sri, vaagvilasini, vadini, vahini, veda, veena, vidya

Title: Sadguru Sai Saraswathi
Lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Saraswathi
Sangeeta Priya Shanthimati [ Sadguru Sai ... ]
Vina Vadini Naadamayi
Veda Vidyavati Gnanamayi
Parthipurishwara Premamayi
Shri Saishwari Shwetambari
Meaning: Worship the supreme teacher, Sai, the embodiment of Saraswathi with all knowledge and wisdom. A lover of music, She is also full of peace. She plays beautiful melodies on the Veena and She is the embodiment of eternal sound of creation. As Sai of Parthi, wearing a white robe, She personifies love.
Songglossary: gnana, naada, partheeshwara, premamayi, priya, sadguru, sai, saiyeeshwara, sangeeta, saraswathi, shanthi, shwetambari, sri, vadini, veda, veena, vidya

Title: Sahara Do Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Sahara Do Bhagawan
Mujhey Daya Karo Mujhey Krupa Karo
Sanmati Do Bhagawan [ Sahara Do ... ]
Sada Saath Raho Hey Bhagawan
Sada Raksha Karo Hey Bhagawan
Shanthi Bhakthi Prem Do Bhagawan
Meaning: Oh Lord! Be my companion in this life. Have mercy and shower Your grace on me. Bless me with wisdom. Please be with me always and always protect me. I pray to Thee to grant me peace, devotion and love.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhakthi, daya, do, hey, karo, krupa, mujhe, prem, raho, raksha, saath, sada, sahara, sanmati, shanthi
