Title: Sai ( Baba) Sathya Palana
Lyrics:
Sai ( Baba) Sathya Palana
Hey Shirdi Puri Vasa Sai Sarvesha
Hey Shirdi Puri Vasa Hey Parthi Puri Vasa Sarvesha Sathya Palana [ Sai Sathya ... ]
Akhila Nivasa Jaya Hrishikesha
Mangala Kara Hey Pavana Purusha [ Hey Shirdi Puri ]
Hey Shirdi Puri Vasa Hey Parthi Puri Vasa Sarvesha Sathya Palana
Meaning: Glory to You Oh Lord Sai Baba who is the Embodiment of Truth. Glory to You Oh Lord of Shirdi, Oh Lord of Parthi Who is the Embodiment and Protector of Truth Glory to You Lord who is Omnipresent and Who bestows upon all of us your Grace Glory to You Oh Lord of Shirdi, Oh Lord of Parthi Who is the Embodiment and Protector of Truth.
Songglossary: akhila, baba, hey, hrishikesha, jay, kara, mangal, nivasa, paalaya, pavan, puri, purusha, puttaparthi, sai, sarvesha, sathya, shirdi, vasa

Title: Sai Aao Merey Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Sai Aao Merey Bhagawan
Mujhey Darshan Do Bhagawan
Bhava Paar Karo Bhagawan
Merey Aawaz Suno Sai Ram [ Aao Aao ]
Asatoma Sadgamaya
Tamasoma Jyothirgamaya
Mruthyorma Amruthangamaya
Bhava Paar Karo Bhagawan [ Merey Aawaz ... ]
Meaning: Beloved Sai Bhagawan, please come and give Your Darshan. Help me cross this ocean of life's miseries. Hear my pleas, Oh Sai Ram. Lead me from Untruth to truth, from darkness to light, from death to immortality. Help me overcome this cycle of life and death.
Songglossary: aao, aawaz, amrutha, asatoma, bhagawan, bhava, darsh, do, jyoth, karo, mera, mruthyorma, mujhe, paar, ram, sadgamaya, sai, suno, tamasoma

Title: Sai Avatara Yuga Avatara
Lyrics:
Sai Avatara Yuga Avatara
Deena Dayala Sankata Haara [ Sai Avatara ... ]
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Maheshwara [ Sai Avatara ... ]
Sathya Sai Prema Sai
Sab Dharmon Ke Baba Sai
Sai Parameshwara
Meaning: Oh Supreme Lord Sai! Oh Incarnation of this Kali Age! You are the protector of the meek, the remover of danger. You are Brahma ( Creator), Vishnu (Sustainer) and Maheshwara (Destroyer of evil) and the beloved Sai of devotees. Chant the name of the Lord of Lords, Lord Sathya Sai, Prema Sai, who loves all true religions.
Songglossary: avatar, baba, brahma, dayal, deen, dharmo, harana, ke, maheshwara, param, prem, sab, sai, sankata, sathya, vishnu, yuga

Title: Sai Baba eno Omoi wo Kokoro ni
Lyrics:
Sai Baba eno Omoi wo Kokoro ni
 Watashi wa Tadoru Ai no Michi (Sai Baba eno ...)
 Yasuragi no Niwa ni Hana Saku
 Kibou no Hikari Towa no Ai
GeneralComments: The tune is similar to the bhajan "Raghuveera Ranadheera Rama Rama Ram".

Title: Sai Baba Geeta Sudha Madhuram
Lyrics:
Sai Baba Geeta Sudha Madhuram Madhuram Anandam (3)
Shirdi (Parthi) Baba Geeta Sudha Madhuram Madhuram Anandam
Meaning: The nectarine words of wisdom and the melodies that flow from Lord Sai Baba confer infinite supreme bliss. Sai Baba is the song, which is sweet & gives bliss. Lord of Parthi is the song, which is sweet & gives bliss. Lord of Shirdi is the song, which is sweet & gives bliss.
Songglossary: anand, baba, geeta, madhu, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi, sudha

Title: Sai Baba Is Coming To Fill Up Your Hearts
Lyrics:
(Sathya) Sai Baba's coming to fill up our hearts (2x)
Fill up our hearts from His ocean of love
Sai Baba's coming to fill up our hearts
Fill up our hearts and quench the thirst for love
Share it with others it's the miracle of love (2x)
Fill up our hearts, fill up our hearts, fill up our hearts from His ocean of love
Baba fill up my heart, fill up my heart, fill up my heart from Your ocean of love
Songglossary: baba, sai, sathya

Title: Sai Baba is our Savior
Lyrics:
Sai Baba Sai Baba is our Savior
 Sai Baba Sai Baba is His Name
 When the mind turns to anger, cry out Sai Baba
 When the mind turns to anger, cry out His Name
 Sai Baba Sai Baba is our Savior

Title: Sai Baba Light Of My Life
Lyrics:
Sai Baba Light Of My Life
Lead,Kindly Light, I Pray
Lost In The World Of Illusion An Play
Salvation Is The Only Way
Ocean Of Mercy, Love And Compassion
Bless Me, O Lord, This Day
Lead, Kindly Light, I Pray
Sai, Lead Kindly Light, I Pray
Songglossary: baba, sai

Title: Sai Baba Pranam
Lyrics:
Sai Baba Pranam
Shirdi Baba Pranam
O Merey Atma Ram
Lelo Merey Pranam
Eshwar Allah Ram
Sab Ke Ghar Sai Ram
Pooran Karo Merey Kaam
Hey Parama Shanthi Priya Ram
Meaning: Kindly accept my offering of salutations, Oh resident of my heart, Lord Shirdi Baba, Sai Baba! Chant the name of Eshwar, Allah and Ram. Sai Belongs to all. Please bless me for successful completion of all my works. Oh Lord you love eternal peace.
Songglossary: allah, atma, baba, eshwar, ghar, hey, kaam, karo, ke, lelo, mera, param, poorna, pranamami, priya, ram, sab, sai, shanthi, shirdi

Title: Sai Baba Sadguru Pranaam Pranaam
Lyrics:
Sai Baba Sadguru Pranaam Pranaam
Dispeller Of Darkness, Salaam Salaam
Sai Baba Sadguru Pranaam Pranaam
Salaam Salaam Saashtaanga Pranaam
Lord Of The Universe, Salaam Salaam [ Sai Baba ... ]
Guide Us All Dear Lord Through The Journey Of Life
Lead Us From Darkness, Unto Your Light
(You Are) Lord Of The Universe Salaam Salaam
Songglossary: baba, sadguru, sai, salaam

Title: Sai Baba Sakala Bhuvana ke
Lyrics:
Sai Baba Sakala Bhuvana Ke Daata (3)
Roopa Manohara Kamala Kantha
Yuga Avatar Sai Baba Daya Karo Parthi Baba
Shirdi Parthi Hrudaya Nivasi
Prashanthi Sundara Sai
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Baba, who is the Protector of the universe. Glory to Lord Sai, whose Form is bewitchingly beautiful and soft like that of a Lotus. Glory to you, Avatar of this Age, shower Your Mercy, who is the Avatar of Shirdi and we pray to you to enshrine Yourself in Our Hearts, Oh Lord Prashanthi Sai.
Songglossary: avatar, baba, bhuvana, daata, daya, hrudaya, kamala, kantha, karo, ke, manohar, nivasi, prashanthi, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, sakala, shirdi, sundara, yuga

Title: Sai Baba Sathya Sai Avatar
Lyrics:
Sai Baba Sai Baba Sathya Sai Avatar of the Lord
Rama Krishna Jesus Mohammad Buddha Zorastra Sai Ram
Every Name Is Your Holy Name Sai Every Form Is Your Form Divine
Sai Baba Sai Baba Sathya Sai Avatar of the Lord
Let Me Reach You Dear Sai Let Me Reach You Let Me Reach You Inside of My Heart
Let Me Please You Dear Lord With My Service Let Me Serve You Dear Lord With My Love
I Surrender to You, I Surrender to You, Lord Sri Sai Ram (2)
Songglossary: avatar, baba, buddha, krishna, mohammad, ram, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Sai Baba says embodiments of truth
Lyrics:
Sai Baba says embodiments of truth and love are we
 Full of peace and inner beauty, if we just could see
 Sai Baba says the inner Self is the reality
 We are really only One, so know this and be free
 Baba, let us know You, let us find the One
 Baba, let us flow through into only One
 Sai Baba says the world is just illusion and not real
 Disappointment, anger, fear are only things we feel
 The truth that God is really us, will help our hearts to heal
 And Overflow with precious love, for love is all that's real
 Baba, let us know You, let us find the One
 Baba, let us flow through into only One

Title: Sai Baba Tera Naam Sathya
Lyrics:
Sai Baba Tera Naam Sathya Sai Baba Tera Naam
Tu Hi Brahma Tu Hi Vishnu
Tu Hi Nanak Tu Hi Yesu
Tu Hi Buddha Tu Zohrashtra
Tu Hi Allah Tu Mahavir
Sab Hey Sai Bhagawan (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Baba Tera Naam
Allah Sai Tera Naam Maulah Sai Tera Naam
Yesu Sai Tera Naam Buddha Sai Tera Naam
Sai Baba Tera Naam Sai Rama Tera Naam
Meaning: You are called Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba! You are Brahma (Creator) and Vishnu (Sustainer). You are Guru Nanak, Jesus Christ, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Allah and Mahavir. All are Sai Bhagawan Your name is Sai Baba Your Name is Allah Sai & Maulah Sai Your name is Jesus Sai & Buddha Sai Your name is Sai Baba, Sai Ram.
Songglossary: allah, baba, bhagawan, brahma, buddha, hai, hey, mahavir, maulah, naam, nanak, ram, sab, sai, sathya, tera, tum, vishnu, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Sai Baba we sing to You
Lyrics:
Sai Baba we sing to You in unison today
We join our hands together and united we pray
In the language of the heart we ask that You guide us all the way
Take our love and let it flow to You make us lamps of love today
GeneralComments: This song is best sung in unison.

Title: Sai Baba will never let you go
Lyrics:
Sai Baba will never let you go
 You are safe in the arms of His Love
 And He keeps you so close in His Heart
 that He knows every need of your soul.
 (Chorus)
 Why fear? I am always here
 Sai Baba knows all your cares
 Why fear? I am always here
 The Lord can hear all your prayers.
 Sai Baba will never let you fall
 He will lead you away from all harm.
 He will carry you over the storm
 to the heavenly peace you desire.
 (Chorus)
 Why fear? I am always here
 Sai Baba knows all your cares
 Why fear? .....

Title: Sai Baba Youre Lord Krishna
Lyrics:
Sai Baba, Youre Lord Krishna
Leela Love Dancer Stealing The Heart
Form And Name Sai, You Walk Here Among Us
Sai Baba You Are Omnipresent
Sai Baba, Youre Lord Krishna
Let Us Be Murali, Play Your Song Through Us
O Enchanter Sathya Sai Baba
Songglossary: baba, krishna, leela, murali, sai, sathya

Title: Sai Baba, come to me
Lyrics:
Sai Baba, come to me, never let me be
 Sai Baba, make us free, all are one in Thee
 Sai Baba, God of Love, help us to be free
 In this world of loss and grief, we need only Thee
 Sai Baba, friend in need, show the way to me
 Sai Baba, Guru indeed, kindle our love for Thee
 Sai Baba, God of Love, teach us how to feel
 So at the end of life we feel, only love for Thee
 Sai Baba, O Delight, shower Your Grace on me
 Sai Baba, God of Light, light the way for me
 Sai Baba, God of Love, never forsake me
 I am lost without You, I want only Thee

Title: Sai Baba, mother of creation
Lyrics:
Sai Baba, mother, mother, mother of creation
 Sai Baba, father, father, father of all the nations
 He's omnipresent in all the sounds
 you can see Him in the sky, you can feel Him on the ground.

Title: Sai Baba, O Lord
Lyrics:
Sai Baba, O Lord, You have taken birth to lead
 All of mankind along the path of Prema indeed
 You have come and declared You were Rama in the past
 Rama O Rama, You have come back forth at last
 Let's rejoice that Ram Sri Ram has come to us at last
 Sai Baba Sri Sai, may we always see Thy Face,
 As we roam about in search for Thee and Thy fulfilling Grace

Title: Sai Baba, You’re Child Krishna
Lyrics:
Sai Baba, You're Child Krishna
 Leela Love Dancer stealing the heart
 Form and Name Sai, You walk here among us
 Sai Baba You are Omnipresent (Sai Baba, You're ...)
 Let us be Murali - play Your song through us
 O Enchanter Sathya Sai Baba
 
 Sung to the tune of Nandalala Navaneetha Chora

Title: Sai Bhagavaan, Sathya Sai Bhagavaan
Lyrics:
Sai Bhagavaan, Sathya Sai Bhagavaan
 May I worship at Your Feet Bhagavaan
 In the temple of my heart, Bhagavaan
 There's an altar all prepared, Bhagavaan
 Where I wait for You, and long for You
 To worship at your Feet, Bhagavaan
 Sai Bhagavaan, Sathya Sai Bhagavaan
 In the stillness of my soul, Bhagavaan
 Where Your Truth begins unfolding, Bhagavaan
 There's path to You I'm clinging to,
 Clinging to your Feet, Bhagavaan
 Sai Bhagavaan, Sathya Sai Bhagavaan
 In the fullness of I am, Bhagavaan
 Parabrahma, Ahambrahma
 I worship at my Feet, Bhagavaan

Title: Sai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Ma (2)
Shankari Abhayankari Jai Sai Bhavani Ma
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Jai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Ma
Gayathri Shiva Gowri Maheshwari Sai Bhavani Ma
Meaning: Victory and salutations to the auspiciousness Mother Sai, who is the destroyer of the bondage of life and death and the remover of fear. Victory to the Mother as Durga, Lakshmi, Saraswathi and Gayathri. Glory to Mother Sai Bhavani, who bestows goodness and who protects us. Glory to goddess Gayathri, Gowri and Maheshwari (Parvathi), who is the consort of Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: abhaya, bhava, durga, gayathri, gowri, jai, lakshmi, ma, maheshwari, sai, saraswathi, shankari, shiva

Title: Sai Charan Sukha Daayi Man
Lyrics:
Sai Charan Sukha Daayi Man
Sai Bina Jeena Kya Hai (2) [ Sai Charan ... ]
Mata Bhi Tu Pitha Bhi Tu
Aao Bhagawan Deejo Darshan
Basjao Sai Man Mandir Mey [ Terey ( Sai ) Bina ]
Meaning: Know Oh Mind, there is no greater peace and bliss than when you surrender at the feet of Sai. What is life without you, Oh Sai? Sai - You are our Mother and our Father! Please bestow us your Darshan and Install Yourself in our Hearts, for what is life without you?
Songglossary: aao, basayi, bhagawan, bhi, bina, chara, daayi, darsh, deejo, hai, jeena, kya, mana, mandir, mata, pitha, sai, sukh, tera, tum

Title: Sai Darbar Mey Aao Gao
Lyrics:
Sai Darbar Mey Aao Gao
Keertana Karoon Main Sai Ke (San)
Peetambara Dhara Nayana Manohara
Sai Sab Ka Prana Sakha
Charan Kamal Mey Sharan Pado Tum [ Keertana Karoon ]
Meaning: Welcome to the assembly of devotees and sing His name, in the Divine presence of Lord Sai. The thirst of the gathered devotees is quenched by the singing of devotional songs in praise of the Lord. He is enthralling to our eyes, wearing a yellow costume. We fall at your feet and take refuge at the Lotus Feet of our Sai, who is the dearest of all friends.
Songglossary: aao, chara, darbar, dhara, gao, ka, kamala, karoon, ke, keertan, manohar, nayan, peetambara, praan, sab, sai, sakha, sharan, tum

Title: Sai Dayalu Sai Dayalu
Lyrics:
Sai Dayalu Sai Dayalu
Parthi Pureesha Sai Dayalu
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Parama Dayalu
Palita Dwarakamayi Dayalu
Murali Gaana Vilola Dayalu
Maya Manusha Vesha Dayalu
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai the compassionate one, who is the Lord of Parthi. The Protector of Devotees - the most compassionate one, who is also the Lord of Dwarakamayi (Shirdi). The Compassionate One who plays the sweet music on the flute (Murali). The Compassionate One, who has come down to earth in this deluding Human Form.
Songglossary: bhaktha, dayal, dwaraka, gaan, manusha, maya, murali, palita, param, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai, samraksha, vesha, vilola

Title: Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
Lyrics:
Sai Dev, Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
 (Sai) in the name of Truth You are come
 Sathya Sai Messiah has come
 Sai Dev, Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
 Sai Dev, Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
 In this world of Darkness, pain and fear
 There's warm reassurance, You are here
 Sai Dev, Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
 (Sai) rising up with me like a dove
 Comes a yearning to dissolve in Your Love

Title: Sai Deva Sathya Swaroopa Tum
Lyrics:
Sai Deva Sathya Swaroopa Tum Ho Merey Baba
O Merey Sai Baba
Sab Dharmon Ke Daata
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Sharanam Sharanam Deva (Hey)
Eshwar Hi Tum Allah Ho Tum Mahavir Nanak Tum Ho
Sab Hi Tum Ho Deva Merey Sai Baba [ O Merey ] | Parthi Vasa |
Meaning: You are my Baba, O God, the embodiment of Truth. You are the Origin of all religions. I surrender to You, Sai Deva, the Lord of Parthi. You are Eshwar, Allah, Nanak and Mahavir. You are in all, All are in You, my dear Sai Baba.
Songglossary: allah, baba, daata, deva, dharmo, eshwar, hai, hey, ho, ke, mahavir, mera, nanak, puttaparthi, sab, sai, sathya, sharan, swaroopa, tum, vasa

Title: Sai Deva Sri Ganesha
Lyrics:
Sai Deva Sri Ganesha
Vande Vighna Vinasha
Parvathi Nandana Parthi Pureesha
Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Sayeesha (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai who is verily Sri Ganesha himself. We salute you Oh Lord, who removes all obstacles from our path. We salute you Oh Lord, the beloved child of Goddess Parvathi. We salute you Oh Lord, the darling son Lord Shiva. Victory to you, Lord Sai.
Songglossary: deva, ganesha, hey, jay, nanda, parvathi, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai, sayee, shiva, sri, vande, vighna, vinasha

Title: Sai Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi
Lyrics:
Sai Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi
He Mahimatmayi Tejomayi [ Sai Durga ... ]
Manda Hasita Mayi Prana Vahini
Atma Jyothi Anandamayi (2)
Meaning: Mother Sai, the life-force in all, is Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi. She is the indwelling soul, with a gentle smile, engulfed in divine effulgence and full of bliss.
Songglossary: anand, atma, durga, hasita, jyoth, lakshmi, ma, mahima, manda, praan, sai, saraswathi, teja, vahini

Title: Sai Giridhari Gopala
Lyrics:
Sai Giridhari Gopala
Krishna Murari Gopala [ Sai Giridhari ... ]
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Gopala
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopala
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Gopala the One who lifted the mountain to protect His devotees. He is Krishna, the slayer of demon Mura. The One who is the protector of His devotees. Our salutations, Oh Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhaktha, giridhar, gopal, krishna, murare, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, samraksha

Title: Sai Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda
Lyrics:
Sai Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhey Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala (2) [ Sai Govinda ... ]
Krishna Madhusudhana Madhusudhana Krishna
Gopala Gopala Gopala
Meaning: Victory to Govinda, Gopala, Krishna, and Sai.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jay, krishna, madhu, radha, sai

Title: Sai Govinda Sai Gopala
Lyrics:
Sai Govinda Sai Gopala
Terey Bina Sai Sab Hai Andhera [ Sai Govinda ... ]
Lelo Mujhey Sai Sharan Tumharey
Deejo Merey Sai Darsha Tumharey
Aao Merey Sai Man Mandir Mey (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Govinda! Oh Lord Sai Gopala! Without Thee, there is no one to lead us to the light (of wisdom) and to remove the darkness (of ignorance). Oh Lord Sai Govinda! I pray to Thee to kindly accept me at Your Lotus feet. Oh Lord Sai Gopala! Kindly install Thyself in the temple of my mind and heart.
Songglossary: aao, andhera, bina, darsh, deejo, gopal, govinda, hai, lelo, mana, mandir, mera, mujhe, sab, sai, sharan, tera, tumhara

Title: Sai Guna Gao Sai Naam
Lyrics:
Sai Guna Gao Sai Naam Gao
Ananda Ananda Sai Naam Hey [ Sai Guna ]
Naman Japan Karoon Sai Naam Ke
Shravan Smaran Karoon Sai Naam Ke
Sai Om Sai Om Bhajo Rey Sada
Meaning: Oh Man, Sing the Name of the Lord and His Virtues. The name of Sai confers infinite bliss. Chant and contemplate on this name. Hear and meditate on the Sai name. Sing about the name of Sai.
Songglossary: anand, bhaja, gao, guna, hey, japam, karoon, ke, naam, naman, om, sada, sai, shravan, smaran

Title: Sai Guru Deva Janardhana
Lyrics:
Sai Guru Deva Janardhana
Anantha Shayana Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Madhusudhana
Mangala Pavana Sai Guru Charana [ Anantha Shayana ]
Meaning: Lord Sai, or Lord Krishna (Janardhana) is the Divine Preceptor, Who is reclining on the serpent coil as Narayana. Oh Slayer of the demon Madhu! You are the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death. Praise to the Lord Sai who is our Guru, we bow at His Feet.
Songglossary: ananta, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, chara, deva, guru, janardhana, madhu, mangal, narayana, pavan, sai, shayana

Title: Sai Hai Jeevan Jeevan Sathya
Lyrics:
Sai Hai Jeevan Jeevan Sathya Sai
Sai Mera Jeevan Sahara [ Sai Hai ... ]
Terey Bina Sai Sab Hai Andhera
Paar Karo Merey Jeevan Naiya
Sharan Lagalo Mujhey Sai Kanhaiya
Meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai! You are my life. Sai is the constant companion and support in my life. Without Thee there is darkness (ignorance) in my life. Kindly help me to cross the ocean of life and death. O Lord Sai Krishna! Accept me at Your Lotus Feet.
Songglossary: andhera, bina, hai, jeeva, kanha, karo, lagalo, mera, mujhe, naiya, paar, sab, sahara, sai, sathya, sharan, tera

Title: Sai Hamara Hum Sai Ke
Lyrics:
Sai Hamara Hum Sai Ke Aisa Prema Hamara
Sai Ram Hamara Sai Ram Hamara
Sathya Sai Hai Naama Tumhara Shirdi Sai Avatara [ Sai Ram ]
Hindu Muslim Sikh Isai Sab Ka Palanhaara [ Sai Ram ]
Meaning: O Lord Sai, We belong to You and You are verily Ours; This is the loving relationship that we share; Glory to you, O Lord Sai Ram, He is ours, He is ours Praise be to Lord Sathya Sai who is the Avatar of Shirdi Sai Praise be to Lord Sathya Sai who is the nourisher and protector of Hindus, Muslims, Sikhs and Christians.
Songglossary: aisa, avatar, hai, hamara, hindu, hum, isai, ka, ke, muslim, naam, palanhaar, prem, ram, sab, sai, sathya, shirdi, sikh, tumhara

Title: Sai Harey Bhajo Baba Harey
Lyrics:
Sai Harey Bhajo Baba Harey
Allah Yesu Sai Harey [ Sai Harey ... ]
Nanak Sai Baba Harey
Buddha Mahavira Sai Harey
Zohrashtra Bhajo Sai Baba Harey
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Sai Baba Sing the Glory of Lord Allah, Yesu and Guru Nanak Sing the Glory of Lord Buddha, Mahavira and Zohrashtra Praise be to Lord Sai, who is the embodiment of all religions.
Songglossary: allah, baba, bhaja, buddha, dharma, hari, mahavir, nanak, priya, sai, sarva, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Sai Harey Sai Baba Hare
Lyrics:
Sai Harey Sai Baba Harey Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey
Allah Eshwara Sai Harey Nanak Yeshu Buddha Harey [ Sai Harey ... ]
Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey Zohrashtra Mahavira Sai Harey
Sai Harey Parti Baba Harey Sarva Dharma Priya Baba Harey
Meaning: Lord Sai, the destroyer of sins who upholds all faiths and religions, is worshipped as Allah, Guru Nanak, Yeshu, Rama, Krishna, Zohrashtra and Mahavir. He resides in Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: allah, baba, buddha, dharma, eshwar, hari, krishna, mahavir, nanak, priya, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sarva, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Sai Harey Sai Harey
Lyrics:
Sai Harey Sai Harey
Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey
Baba Harey Baba Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
Meaning: Praise be to the Lord Sai and Baba who is verily our dear Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: baba, hari, sai, sathya

Title: Sai Is The Fountain Of Love
Lyrics:
Sai Is The Fountain Of Love
He Is The Mountain Of Truth
Love Every One, Serve Everyone
Sai Is The Fountain Of Love
We Are All Made Of Love
Truth Is Our Nature Itself
Help Everyone, Hurt No One
(Lets) Be As Fountains Of Love
Songglossary: sai

Title: Sai Jaganmohini Veshadhari
Lyrics:
Sai Jaganmohini Veshadhari
Sai Jagannataka Sutradhari
Jagadodharaka Sai ( Sai )
Jaya Jaya Sai Murari ( Sai )
Meaning: Glory to Mother Sai Jaganmohini (enchanter of the worlds), with a delusive form, the one who controls us like the puppets in her hand, the one who is the liberator of all the worlds, Victory to You Oh Sai Murari.
Songglossary: jagadodhara, jagan, jay, murare, sai, sutra, vesha

Title: Sai Kanhaiya Sai Kanhaiya
Lyrics:
Sai Kanhaiya Sai Kanhaiya
Natavara Naagara Krishna Kanhaiya [ Sai Kanhaiya ]
Giridhara Naagara Gopi Kanhaiya
Yuga Avatara Sai Kanhaiya
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Kanhaiya (Krishna)Glory to the merry mischief maker Lord Krishna Kanhaiya Glory to Lord Kanhaiya who lifted the mountain Govardhana to protect his Gopis and Gopikas (cowherds) Glory to Lord Sai who is the very incarnation of Lord Krishna.
Songglossary: avatar, giridhar, gopi, kanha, krishna, naagar, natavara, sai, yuga

Title: Sai Kanhaiya Sai Kanhaiya
Lyrics:
Sai Kanhaiya Sai Kanhaiya
Paar Karo Merey Jeevana Naiya
Tum Ho Merey Ma Baap Bhaiyya
Hrudaya Nivasi Krishna Kanhaiya
Hrudaya Nivasi Sai Kanhaiya [ Paar Karo ]
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Kanhaiya (Krishna), Ferry us across the ocean of Life, Who is verily our Mother, Father and Brother Glory to Lord Sai Krishna Kanhaiya who resides in our Inner Conscience.
Songglossary: baap, bhai, ho, hrudaya, jeeva, kanha, karo, krishna, ma, mera, naiya, nivasi, paar, sai, tum

Title: Sai Krishna Murali Krishna
Lyrics:
Sai Krishna, Murali Krishna, Oh Lord You have Stolen My Heart
Sai Krishna, Gopi Krishna, Oh Sweet Cowherd Divine [ Sai Krishna ... ]
Make Me An Instrument Of Your Love ( Sai )
So I May Live A Life Of Pure Love
Let It Grow, Let It Flow, Love Is Your Music Divine
Songglossary: gopi, krishna, murali, sai

Title: Sai Krishna Sai Gopala
Lyrics:
Sai Krishna Sai Krishna Sai Gopala 
Seguire tu Luz me hundire en el Ti.
Reunire las fuerzas para poderte seguir. 
Guia mi camino. Alumbra mi vivir. 
No permitas nunca que me aleje de ti. 
Conduceme Senor Sai hacia Ti. 
Sai Krishna Sai Krishna Sai Gopala.
Meaning:
Sai Krishna Sai Krishna Sai Gopala.
I will follow your light. I will meditate on You. I will compile all the strength to follow You.  Guide my path. Enlighten my life. Never allow that I get far from You. Guide me Lord towards You. Sai Krishna Sai Krishna Sai Gopala.
Songglossary: gopal, krishna, para, sai, tum

Title: Sai Lingam Smarami Satatam
Lyrics:
Sai Lingam Smarami Satatam
Nama Roopa Prapanchatitam
Agama Sara Atma Lingam
Partisha Svayam Prakasha Lingam
Meaning: Let me always meditate on Sai Lingam. His name and form transcend the phenomenal Universe. The self-effulgent Lingam is the essence of creation and life.
Songglossary: agama, atma, linga, naam, partheeshwara, prakasha, prapanchamu, roopa, sai, sara, satatam, smaran, svayam

Title: Sai Madre compasiva
Lyrics:
Sai Madre compasiva, Madre universal, Madre mia
 Ven guilla mi manana, muestra (m)el camino que debo seguir
 Se que eres divina, se que eres amor
 O Sai mia, da me tu vision
Meaning: Sai, compassionate Mother, universal Mother, O Mother of mine! Come, guide my future and show me the path that I should follow. I know You are Divine, and You are Love Incarnate. O my Sai, grant me Your vision.

Title: Sai Mahadeva (Sathya)
Lyrics:
Sai Mahadeva (Sathya)
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Baba Maheshwara Hey
Nirupama Guna Sadana Sai Neeraja Dala Nayana
Vibhuti Sundara Hey Sai Baba Maheshwara Hey
Meaning: Praise be to our Lord Sathya Sai, who is the very embodiment of Lord Mahadeva (Shiva). Praise be to our Lord Sai Baba - the Lord of Parthi, who is the embodiment of Lord Maheshwara (Shiva). He, who is of pristine virtues, adorned with Vibhuti and whose eyes are like the tender petals of the Lotus.
Songglossary: baba, dala, guna, hey, mahadev, maheshwara, nayan, neeraja, nirupama, purishwara, puttaparthi, sadana, sai, sathya, sundara, vibhuti

Title: Sai Mahadeva Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Lyrics:
Sai Mahadeva Sathya Sai Mahadeva (2)
Alakh Niranjan Abhaya Karambhuja Sai Mahadeva [ Sai Mahadeva ... ]
Nithya Niranjana Vibhuti Sundara Sai Mahadeva (2)
Hara Hara Shankara Shiva Shiva Shankara (2)
Meaning: Glory to You, Oh Lord Sai Mahadeva To the One who is spotless in His virtues and who is the protector of all beings To the One who is beautifully adorned with the Vibhuti (Sacred Ash) We offer our prayers to you O Lord Sai Mahadeva.
Songglossary: abhaya, alakh, hara, karambhuja, mahadev, niranjan, nithya, sai, sathya, shankara, shiva, sundara, vibhuti

Title: Sai Mahalakshmi Narayani
Lyrics:
Sai Mahalakshmi Narayani
Ananda Roopini Abhaya Pradayini [ Sai Mahalakshmi ... ]
Mangala Roopini Sowbhagya Daayini
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Narayani Sai Narayani
Meaning: Salutations to the auspicious Mother Sai, who is the embodiment of bliss, who dispels darkness and fear. The one who is the very embodiment of auspiciousness and Provider of prosperity. Mother Sai is verily the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi.
Songglossary: abhaya, anand, daayi, dayini, mahalakshmi, mangal, narayani, sai, shakthi, shiva, sowbhagya, swaroopa

Title: Sai Mata Pitha Deena Bandhu
Lyrics:
Sai Mata Pitha Deena Bandhu Sakha
Terey Charano Mey Sai Mera Koti Pranam
Sai Mata Pitha Deena Bandhu Sakha [ Terey Charano ... ]
Mujhey Shakthi Do Merey Sai Shiva
Mujhey Bhakthi Do Merey Sai Shiva
Mujhey Mukti Do Merey Sai Shiva
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! You are the mother, father, kith, kin and friend of forlorn ones. A Million prostrations at Your Lotus Feet. O Lord Sai Shiva! Grant me strength, devotion and liberation.
Songglossary: bandhava, bhakthi, chara, deen, do, koti, mata, mera, mujhe, mukti, pitha, pranamami, sai, sakha, shakthi, shiva, tera

Title: Sai Mera Tu Hai Sahara
Lyrics:
Sai Mera Tu Hai Sahara
Shirdi Avatara Sai Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Deenon Ke Tum Prana Sakha Prabhu
Merey Sai Ram
Merey Sai Ram Baba Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Meaning: My Sai is the support and sustenance of my life; Glory to You who is the Lord of Parthi, the re-incarnation of Shirdi Sai. Glory to You Oh Sai, who is the life-mate of the poor and the downtrodden. You are our very own Oh dearest Sai, the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: avatar, baba, bhagawan, deenon, hai, ke, mera, praan, prabhu, puri, puttaparthi, ram, sahara, sai, sakha, shirdi, tum

Title: Sai Mukunda Mukharavinda
Lyrics:
Sai Mukunda Mukharavinda
Madhura Manohara Mukharavinda [ Sai Mukunda ... ]
Taambula Ranjita Mukharavinda
Manda Smitha Haasa Mukharavinda
Nithya Manohara Mukharavinda
Paramananda Mukharavinda
Satchidananda Mukharavinda
Meaning: Chant the sweet name of Sai Mukunda, whose countenance is described as soft as that of a Lotus. The One whose lips are painted bright red from chewing the betel leaves. The One with the ever smiling visage. The One whose Countenance is filled with Bliss Divine. The One whose Countenance embodies Truth, Auspiciousness and Bliss.
Songglossary: hasita, madhu, manda, manohar, mukha, mukunda, nithya, param, ranjita, sai, satchidananda, smitha, taambula

Title: Sai Murari Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Sai Murari Ghana Shyama
Brindavan Ke Bansiwala Radha Manohara Sai Shyama [ Sai Murari ... ]
Hey Chitha Chora Nanda Kishora
Sundara Shyama Sai Gopala
Brindavan Ke Krishna (Radha)
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who is compared to Lord Krishna The one who slayed the demon Mura and the one who is bewitchingly dark as the cloud Glory to Lord Sai, who is none other than Gopala who played in Brindavan and who fills the mind of Radha Glory to Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bansi, brinda, chitha, chora, ghana, gopal, hey, ke, kishora, krishna, manohar, murare, nanda, radha, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Sai Naam Bolo Govinda Naam
Lyrics:
Sai Naam Bolo Govinda Naam Bolo
Mahadeva Bolo Jai Panduranga Bolo [ Sai Naam ... ]
Rama Krishna Bolo Jai Buddha Sai Bolo
Zohrashtra Mahavira Yesu Sai Bolo
Allah Sai Bolo Maulah Sai Bolo
Prema Sai Shanthi Daayi Sathya Sai Bolo
Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo (3)
Meaning: Sing the name of our Dear Lord Sai who is also Govinda.  Chant the name of Mahadeva and Panduranga. Chant the name of Rama, Krishna and Buddha. Chant the name of Zohrashtra, Mahavira and Yesu. Chant the name of Allah and Maulah Sai. Chant the name of our Dear Lord Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Love and Peace.
Songglossary: allah, bolo, buddha, daayi, gopal, govinda, jai, krishna, mahadev, mahavir, maulah, naam, pandu, prem, ram, sai, sathya, shanthi, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Sai Naam Bolo Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Naam Bolo Sathya Sai Naam Bolo
Sai Madhava Sai Keshava Sri Hari Naam Bolo [ Sai Naam ... ]
Allah Eshwar Eesa Masiha
Buddha Mahavira Ram [ Sai Madhava ]
Meaning: Chant the name of our dear Lord Sathya Sai Chant the name of Sai Madhava Sai Keshava and Shri Hari (names of Lord Vishnu)Chant the Name of Allah, Eshwar, Yesu, Buddha and Mahavir.
Songglossary: allah, bolo, buddha, eesa, eshwar, hari, kesha, madhava, mahavir, masiha, naam, ram, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Sai Naam Keertana Kali Yuga
Lyrics:
Sai Naam Keertana Kali Yuga Sadhana
Jagadodharana Krishna Janardhana
Sai Murari Sri Madhusudhana
Mayura Mukutadhara Madhava Mohana
Neela Varna Ghana Natajana Palana
Natavara Naagara Nanda Sunandandana
Meaning: Singing the glory of Lord Sai is the penance of Kaliyuga. He is Lord Krishna, redeemer of the universe. He is the one who slayed Mura and Madhu, the demons. The enchanter with the peacock crown, the dark blue-hued one who rules our hearts. The mischievous darling son of Nanda.
Songglossary: ghana, jagadodhara, janardhana, kali, keertan, krishna, madhava, madhu, mayur, mohan, mukuta, murare, naagar, naam, nanda, natajana, natavara, neela, paalaya, sadhana, sai, sri, sunanda, varna, yuga

Title: Sai Naamamey Brahmanandamu Sai Charanamey
Lyrics:
Sai Naamamey Brahmanandamu Sai Charanamey Divyanandamu
Sathya Sai Roopamey Nayananandamu
Leela Vinodamey Sai Sankalpamu
Premanandamey Sai Sowmya Roopamu (2)
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai - The chanting of that name confers on all of us supreme Joy, the Lotus Feet confer divine bliss, the vision of the very form of Sri Sathya Sai is blissful to the eyes that see Him He is determined to provide us joy with his miraculous love His subtle and graceful form bestows on us eternal Love and Joy.
Songglossary: brahma, chara, divya, leela, naam, nayan, premananda, roopa, sai, sankalpamu, sathya, sowmya, vinodamey

Title: Sai Narayana Harey Veda Parayana
Lyrics:
Sai Narayana Harey Veda Parayana
Tribhuvana Vanditha Deva
Deena Nath Harey Harey Sai Nath Harey
Deena Nath Harey Sai Nath Harey
Deena Nath Sai Nath Sai Nath Harey
Deena Nath Sai Nath
Deena Nath O Sai Nath
Meaning: Lord Sathya Sai, the upholder of the Vedas, the destroyer of sins and miseries, and the Lord and saviour of the downtrodden, is worshiped in all three worlds.
Songglossary: deen, deva, hari, narayana, natha, parayana, sai, tribhuvan, vanditha, veda

Title: Sai Narayana Narayana
Lyrics:
Sai Narayana Narayana
Sathya Narayana Narayana [ Sai Narayana ... ]
Gaana Lola Prabhu Narayana
Deena Pala Jaya Narayana
Meaning: Chant the name of the merciful and omniscient Lord Sai Narayana, who rejoices when the divine glory is sung. Victory to Lord Narayana who is the protector of the meek.
Songglossary: deen, gaan, jay, lola, narayana, pala, prabhu, sai, sathya

Title: Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
Lyrics:
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
Tribhuvana Vanditha Deva
Deena Natha Harey Harey Sai Natha Harey
Deena Natha Harey Sai Natha Harey
Deena Nath Sai Nath Sai Natha Harey
Deena Nath Deena Nath
Sai Nath (O) Sai Nath
Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai Narayana! The three worlds pay obeisance to Thee. Oh Lord Sai Nath! Oh Destroyer of sins and miseries! You are the Lord and Saviour of the dejected and miserable. Chant the Name of Lord Sai Narayana, Sathya Narayana who is worshipped by all the Gods across the three Worlds. Glory to Sai Nath who is the Lord and the protector of the poor and the downtrodden.
Songglossary: deen, deva, hari, narayana, natha, sai, sathya, tribhuvan, vanditha

Title: Sai Narayana, Luz Del Universo
Lyrics:
Sai Narayana, Luz Del Universo
 Narayana, Sai Narayana, Solo Quiero Amarte
 Solo Quiero Estar A Tus Pies, Solo Quiero Amarte
 Narayana, Sai Narayana, Solo Queiero Amarte
Meaning: Sai Narayana, Light of the Universe, I only want to love You. I only want to be at Your feet.

Title: Sai Natha Anatha Natha
Lyrics:
Sai Natha Anatha Natha
Shambho Shankara Parthi Natha [ Sai Natha ... ]
Chandrashekara Shambho Natha
Nandi Vahana Bhola Natha
Shambho Natha (2)
Parthi Natha (2)
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Natha who is the Lord and Protector of Orphans Glory to Lord Parthi Natha who is also worshipped as Lord Shambho and Shankara (Shiva) Glory to the Lord who is worshipped as Lord Chandrashekara - the one who has adorned the crescent Moon on his crown of hair Glory to the Lord who is worshipped as Lord Nandivahana - the one whose vehicle is the Nandi (Divine Bull) and as Lord Bhola Nath (Lord of the meek and innocent)
Songglossary: anath, bhola, chand, nandi, natha, puttaparthi, sai, shambho, shankara, vahana

Title: Sai Natha Bhagawan Sai Natha
Lyrics:
Sai Natha Bhagawan Sai Natha Bhagawan
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram Sai Natha Bhagawan [ Sai Natha ... ]
Buddham Sharanam Gachchami
Dhammam Sharanam Gachchami
Sangham Sharanam Gachchami
Sayeesha Sharanam Gachchami (Sathya)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are the Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty, Oh Lord Sai. I take refuge in Buddha (the enlightened one). I take refuge in Dhamma (the ultimate Truth) I take refuge in Sangham (the holy community). To Lord God Sai, I surrender all!
Songglossary: bhagawan, buddha, dhammam, gachchami, natha, sai, sangh, sathya, sayee, sharan, shiva, sundara

Title: Sai Natha Deena Natha
Lyrics:
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Rupa Deva
Sarvantaryami Sai Baba (2x)
Tere Charanon Mein Hame Lelo Sai Baba
Hamko Mukti Do Sai Baba (2x)
We pray for strength, we pray for faith, we pray for happiness,
We pray for peace, we pray for liberation, Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet, Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet
Shakti Do Bhakti Do Ananda Do Shanthi Do Janma Ko Mukti Do Baba (2x)
Sathya Dharma Shanti Prema Ahimsa Priya Deva, Sarvantaryami Sai Baba, Sarvantaryami Sai Baba
We pray for strength, we pray for faith, we pray for happiness,
We pray for peace, we pray for liberation, Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet, Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Rupa Deva
(Speed up)
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Rupa Deva
Sarvantaryami Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet, Sai Baba
Sarvantaryami Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet, Sai Baba
Sarvantaryami Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet
Meaning: O Sai who is the Lord of the destitute, the very form of Brahman, the supreme Lord, who is all knowing, please accept us at Thy Holy Feet and grant us liberation. O Lord Sai, You are pleased by truth, right conduct, peace, love and non-violence. Give us strength, devotion, bliss, peace and liberation from birth.
Raga:
Hindi - Madhyamavati / Madhmad Sarang
English - Minor (Natabhairavi)

Title: Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma
Lyrics:
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Roopa Sadguru
Nirakara Hey Akara Sathya Sai Sadguru [ Sai Natha ... ]
Omkara Sadguru Nirvikara Sadguru
Nirvikara Sadguru Omkara Sadguru [ Sai Natha ... ]
Mata Pitha Sadguru Sakala Tum Hi Sadguru
Sakala Tum Hi Sadguru Sakala Tum Hi Sadguru
Meaning: Salutations to You, Oh Lord Sainatha, the Supreme Guru, who is the protector of the weak and the downtrodden, who is the very embodiment of Brahman. You are the Formless that has taken Form as Lord Sai. Glory to You Oh Lord, the unperturbed one, who is present in the primordial sound Omkara. Glory to You, Oh Lord Sai Sadguru, who is our mother, father and our everything.
Songglossary: akara, brahma, deen, hai, hey, mata, natha, nirakara, nirvikara, om, pitha, roopa, sadguru, sai, sakala, sathya, tum

Title: Sai Natha Guru Brahma Nath
Lyrics:
Sai Natha Guru Brahma Nath Guru Sathya Sai Deva
Guru Deva Guru Deva
Pankaja Charanam Sharanam Sharanam
Sathya Sai Deva (2)
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai Natha who is the divine Preceptor. Let us all surrender at His Lotus feet.
Songglossary: brahma, chara, deva, guru, natha, pankaja, sai, sathya, sharan

Title: Sai Natha Guru Govinda Sathya
Lyrics:
Sai Natha Guru Govinda Sathya Sai Jaya Paramananda (3)
Om Guru Natha Jaya Guru Natha Sai Guru Natha (6)
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai Natha who is also worshipped as Guru Govinda, who gives us eternal bliss.
Songglossary: govinda, guru, jay, natha, om, param, sai, sathya

Title: Sai Natha Sharanam (Sathya)
Lyrics:
Sai Natha Sharanam (Sathya)
Shiva Sai Nath Sharanam
Sharavana Bhava Guha Shanmukha Natha
Shiva Guru Raja Prashanthi Vasa
Pranava Kaara Gnana Prakasha
Meaning: Surrender to Lord Sathya Sai who resides in Prashanthi, who is also the Lord Shanmukha (Son of Shiva).
Songglossary: bhava, gnana, guha, guru, kaara, natha, prakasha, pranava, prashanthi, raja, sai, sathya, shanmukha, sharan, sharavana, shiva, vasa

Title: Sai Om Sai Om Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Om Sai Om Sai Om
Tan Man Pran Mey Sai Om [ Sai Om ... ]
Shayan Sapana Mey Sai Om
Gagan Pavana Mey Sai Om [ Shayana ]
Nayan Nayana Mey Sai Om
Janam Marana Mey Sai Om
Meaning: The entire Universe is permeated with the sound of 'Sai Om' the primordial sound. 'Sai Om' is everywhere, it is in the body, in the conscience, in sleep, in dream, in the sky, ether and wind. Whatever and wherever, the eyes perceive, it is nothing but 'Sai Om'. It is from emergence to dissolution.
Songglossary: gagan, janam, mana, maran, nayan, om, pavan, pran, sai, sapana, shayana, tan

Title: Sai Paada Pooja Karo Hey
Lyrics:
Sai Paada Pooja Karo Hey Manuva
Sakala Paapa Bhava Bhaya Haranam [ Sai Paada ... ]
Nataraja Paadam Sai Paadam
Brahma Sevitha Punya Paadam
Shyamala Komala Sai Paadam
Meaning: O Mind - Chant the Holy Name of Sai and offer it at His Lotus Feet. By chanting thus, redeem all your sins and fears across all births. His feet are those of Nataraja (Lord Shiva), they are the holy feet, which were worshipped by Lord Brahma the creator and they are the feet, which are soft and delicate.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, brahma, harana, hey, karo, komala, manuva, nataraj, paada, paapa, pooja, punya, sai, sakala, sevita, sham

Title: Sai Pitha Aur Mata Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Pitha Aur Mata Sai
Deena Dayala Daata Sai [ Sai Pitha ... ]
Sai Guru Sai Sakha Sahodara
Sai Sathya Shiva Sai Sundara
Veda Upanishad Geeta Sai [ Deena ]
Meaning: Chant the Holy name of Sai who is our father and mother and who is the protector of the weak and downtrodden. HE is the preceptor, friend and sibling. HE is verily the Truth, the Goodness and the Beautiful. HE is the embodiment of Vedas, the Upanishads and the Geeta.
Songglossary: aur, daata, dayal, deen, geeta, guru, mata, pitha, sahodara, sai, sakha, sathya, shiva, sundara, upanishad, veda

Title: Sai Pranava Swaroopa Hari Om
Lyrics:
Sai Pranava Swaroopa Hari Om
Narayana Hari Om
Sathya Saishwaraya Namah Om
Yadavaya Madhavaya Govindaya Namah Om
Atma Roopaya Hari Om (Param)
Hari Om Hari Om [ Sathya Saishwaraya ... ]
Meaning: Bow to Sai, the indweller, the personification of the primeval form and sound. He is the embodiment of Narayana who incarnated in the Yadava dynasty as Madhava and Govinda.
Songglossary: atma, govinda, hari, madhava, namah, narayana, om, param, pranava, roopa, sai, saiyeeshwara, sathya, swaroopa, yadava

Title: Sai Prem Dey Shanthi Dey
Lyrics:
Sai Prem Dey Shanthi Dey Ananda Dey Sai Prem Dey
Tum Ho Baba Daya Ke Sagar
Tum Ho Guna Mandira Nata Naagar
Adi Anantha Hey Sathya Sanathana
Alakh Niranjana Sai Janardhana
Satchidananda Prabho Krupa Karo
Prem Dey Shanthi Dey Anand Dey Sai Prem Dey ( Sai )
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai! We pray to thee to grant us peace, happiness and love. You are an ocean of grace and mercy. One who possesses all good and pure qualities. Your form is infinite, eternal truth, with no beginning or end. You are Beyond the perception of senses, always supremely pure, Oh Sai, uplifter of humanity, You are Satchidananda - Existence, Consciousness and Divine bliss. Shower your compassion on us.
Songglossary: adi, alakh, anand, ananta, baba, daya, dey, guna, hey, ho, janardhana, karo, ke, krupa, mandir, naagar, nata, niranjan, prabhu, prem, sagar, sai, sanatana, satchidananda, sathya, shanthi, tum

Title: Sai Prema Sai (Shiva)
Lyrics:
Sai Prema Sai (Shiva)
 O Lord Divine, Its into You we're dying
 Sai Prema Sai (Shiva)
 You're here within us all, shining as our heart
 Let's not miss the chance to merge in Sai
 Feel the flowing power as we open up in God
 Radiance of Bliss exploding in the fire of Love
 O ecstacy divine - to melt in Sai
 You're here within us all, shining as our heart
 There's no time to lose, lets merge in Sai
 We love You Sai (3X)
 Premavathaara Bhagavaan Sathya Sai (4X)

Title: Sai Raghurama
Lyrics:
Sai Raghurama
Sai Sundara Sai Manohara Sai Komala Ram [ Sai ... ]
Ek Tum Hi Ho Sab Ke Eshwara
Patitha Pavana Patithodharana
Jaya Shirdeesha Jaya Partheesha
Man Mandir Mey Aao Sai Ram (3)
Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, the enchanting and delicate one. You are the Lord for one and all and the uplifter of sinners. Victory to you Oh Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, come into the temple of my heart.
Songglossary: aao, ek, eshwar, hai, ho, jay, ke, komala, mana, mandir, manohar, partheeshwara, patitha, patithodhara, pavan, raghu, ram, sab, sai, shirdeesha, sundara, tum

Title: Sai Raghuvara Merey Ram Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Raghuvara Merey Ram Sai Giridhara Merey Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Jagadeesha Srinivasa Partheesha Hrudaya Vasa
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: Victory to you Oh Lord Sai, you are my Rama (Raghuvara) and Krishna (Giridhara), Lord Shiva, Lord Srinivasa, Lord of Parthi and in dweller of my heart.
Songglossary: giridhar, hrudaya, jagadeesha, jai, mera, partheeshwara, raghu, ram, sai, sham, srinivasa, vasa

Title: Sai Ram Bhagavaan
Lyrics:
Sai Ram Bhagavaan
O compassionate loving God 
O Stream of Mercy Divine 
Hear the cry of Humanity, O Great One 
Save us from darkness, Sai Ram 
Protector, Sustainer of Life 
In You we take refuge from strife 
O Stream of Mercy Divine
Songglossary: ram, sai

Title: Sai Ram Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Sai Ram Bhagawan
You Are The Lord Of My Heart And My Soul
Lord Of My Life It's Beyond My Control
Open My Heart To Your Love ( Sai )
Once I Have Seen You, Lord, Heard You And Touched You
How Can I Live In This World Without You?
Open My Eyes To Your Light ( Sai )
Sai Ram, Let Me See You
Everywhere, Let Me Hear You
In Everyone, Let Me Serve You
Sai Ram Bhagawan
Songglossary: bhagawan, ram, sai

Title: Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Sai Ram Bhajore
Radhey Krishna Bhajo Mana Radhey Krishna Bhajore [ Sai Ram ... ]
Sita Ram Bhajo Mana Sita Ram Bhajore
Vittala Bhajo Mana Vittala Bhajore
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Sai Ra, of Krishna (Lord of Radha), of Rama (Lord of Sita), of Vittala (Vishnu)
Songglossary: bhaja, bhajao, krishna, mana, radha, ram, sai, sita, vittala

Title: Sai Ram Ghana Shyam Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Sai Ram Ghana Shyam Bhagawan Tumhara Naam
Tum Bina Koi Nahin Rakhwaley
Tum Bina Koi Nahin Apad Saharey
Tum Bina Prema Koi Nahin Denewaale
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram Baba
Bhagawan ( Sai Ram ) Tumhara Naam
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are none other than Rama and Krishna. We do not have any one other than you to save us from all adversities, to give us unconditional love, Oh Lord Sai you are our Supreme in dweller.
Songglossary: apad, atma, baba, bhagawan, bina, denewaale, ghana, ho, koi, mera, naam, nahin, prem, rakhwaley, ram, saharey, sai, sham, tum, tumhara

Title: Sai Ram hear my call to you
Lyrics:
Sai Ram hear my call to you, Sai Ram hear my call
 In my heart is a burning yearning for you
 In my heart is a burning, yearning for you (second variation)
 I am waiting I am praying I am calling to you

Title: Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram Shirdi Pureeshwara Ram
Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram Parthi Pureeshwara Ram [ Sai Ram ]
Allah Naam Hai Tera O Sai Baba
Sab Ka Malik Tum Ho O Sai Baba
Yesu Nanak Buddha Mahavir Sab Hai Sai Ram
Sab Hai Sai Ram
Meaning: Victory to you Oh Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi. You are the Lord of the entire humanity, you are Allah, Jesus, Nanak, Buddha and Mahavir.
Songglossary: allah, baba, buddha, hai, ho, jai, ka, mahavir, malik, naam, nanak, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sab, sai, shirdi, tera, tum, yesu

Title: Sai Ram Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram [ Sai Ram ... ]
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Eshwara Allah Terey Naam
Sab Ko Sanmati Do Bhagawan
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai Ram who resides in Parthi. He is Lord Rama, the consort of mother Sita. He is the noblest of the Raghu dynasty who uplifts the sinners. He is none other than Lord Shiva and Allah. Oh Lord, bless us with wisdom.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, do, eshwar, jai, naam, patitha, pavan, purishwara, puttaparthi, raghava, raghu, raja, ram, sab, sai, sanmati, sita, tera

Title: Sai Ram Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Gaayen Geet Sada Subah Aur Shyam
Har Ek Pal Mey Har Ek Kshan Mey
Bhajey Hum Sada Tero Naam [ Gaayen Geet ]
Koi Kahey Tujhe Janaki Rama
Koi Pukarey Radhey Shyama
Hamarey Liye Tum Sai Bhagawan [ Gaayen Geet ]
Meaning: Oh dear Lord Sai Ram we sing forever your glory from dawn to dusk. We sing your glory with every breath, every second and forever Oh dear Lord Sai. Some call you Janaki Ram, some others prefer to call you Radhey Shyam, but you will remain as Sai Bhagawan for us. We sing forever your glory from dawn to dusk.
Songglossary: aur, bhagawan, bhaja, ek, gaayen, geet, hamarey, hara, hum, janaki, kahey, koi, kshan, liye, naam, pal, pukar, radha, ram, sada, sai, sham, subah, tera, tum

Title: Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhajo
Sadguru Sai Ram Naama Bhajo
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhajo [ Sai Ram Sai Ram ]
Allah Malik Sai Ram Bhajo
Buddha Mahavir Sai Ram Bhajo
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Sai Ram Bhajo [ Sai Ram Sai Ram ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Ram, the divine preceptor. He is none other than Allah, Buddha, Mahavir and Jesus.
Songglossary: allah, bhaja, buddha, mahavir, malik, naam, pitha, prabhu, ram, sadguru, sai, yesu

Title: Sai Ram Sai Shyam Merey
Lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Shyam Merey Sai Ram
Merey Sai Merey Baba Merey Prana Natha Ram [ Sai Ram ... ]
Terey Dwar Pey Main Avoon Mujhey Shanthi Do Bhagawan
Mujhey Shanthi Do Bhagawan
Merey Jeevana Mey Saath Raho Sai Natha Hey
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Rama, Sai Shyama, my dear Baba, I am standing at Your door step, bestow me with peace Oh Lord, be with me all through my life, Oh Lord Sai.
Songglossary: avoon, baba, bhagawan, do, dwarey, hey, jeevan, mein, mera, mey, mujhe, natha, pey, praan, raho, ram, saath, sai, sham, shanthi, tera

Title: Sai Rama Bolo Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Bolo Sai Rama Bolo
Sita Vallabha Tulasi Rama Lakshmana Sevitha Rama [ Sai Rama ... ]
Atmabhi Rama Ananda Rama
Ahalyodharaka Karunya Rama
Maruti Sevitha Hrudayanta Rama
Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Rama who is the beloved of Sita and is served by Lakshmana and Hanuman, who is the in dweller of all and the most compassionate one who liberated Ahalya from a curse.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, anand, atmabhi, bolo, hrudaya, karuna, lakshmana, maruthi, ram, sai, sevita, sita, tulasi, vallabha

Title: Sai Rama Bolo Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Bolo Sathya Sai Rama Bolo
Sita Vallabha Tulasi Rama Lakshmana Sevitha Rama [ Sai Rama ... ]
Atmabhirama Ananda Dhama
Ahalyodharaka Karunya Rama
Maruti Sevitha Hrdayanta Rama
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama (consort of Sita), adorned with a Tulasi Garland.  He was worshipped by Lakshmana and served by Hanuman.  He liberated Ahalya.  He is Lord Sai, the indweller, where bliss risides, and is full of mercey
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, anand, atmabhi, bolo, dhama, hrudaya, karuna, lakshmana, maruthi, ram, sai, sathya, sevita, sita, tulasi, vallabha

Title: Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey (3)
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey
Rajeeva Lochana Rama Harey
Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Harey
Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Sai Rama residing in Parthi, with your beautiful Lotus shaped eyes, you are the noblest of the Raghu Dynasty.
Songglossary: hari, krishna, lochana, purishwara, puttaparthi, raghava, raghu, rajeeva, ram, sai

Title: Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Raghu Rama [ Sai Rama ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Pavana Naama
Pavana Naama Pavana Naama [ Parthi Pureeshwara ]
Sharanam Sharanam Hey Sai Rama
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai Rama the son of King Dasharatha and the scion of the Raghu dynasty. Glory to you Oh Lord of Parthi whose name is the most sacred one. We surrender ourselves to you Oh Sai Rama.
Songglossary: dasha, ghana, hey, naam, nanda, pavan, purishwara, puttaparthi, raghu, ram, sai, sham, sharan, sri

Title: Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Parama Daya Ghana Atma Rama [ Sai Rama ... ]
Shantha Saguna Hari Hara Paramatma
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Dayabhi Rama
Patitha Pavana Sathya Sai Rama
Sharanam Sharanam Hey Sai Rama
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai Rama, you are the most compassionate, the virtuous, the one who safeguards the devotees and the one who uplifts the sinners, Oh Lord we seek your protection.
Songglossary: atma, bhaktha, daya, dayabhi, ghana, hara, hari, hey, param, patitha, pavan, ram, saguna, sai, samraksha, sathya, sham, shantha, sharan

Title: Sai Rama Jagadeeshwara
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Jagadeeshwara
Sarvabhowma Sarveshwara [ Sai Rama ... ]
Aganita Guna Gana Akhileshwara
Sakala Jana Priya Sarveshwara
Shambho Mahadeva Shiva Shankara
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Rama, you are the greatest of the Emperors and Lord of the Universe, full of virtues, adored by the entire humanity, Oh Lord you are none other than the Lord Shankara.
Songglossary: aganita, akhileshwara, gana, guna, jagadeesha, jana, mahadev, priya, ram, sai, sakala, sarva, sarvesha, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Sai Rama Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Namo Namo
Sai Krishna Namo Namo
Shirdi Nivasa Namo Namo
Parthi Nivasa Namo Namo
Jagadodhara Namo Namo
Pranavakara Namo Namo
Shanthakara Namo Namo
Sakshathkara Namo Namo (2)
Meaning: Chant the names of Sai Rama, Sai Krishna, the one residing in Shirdi and in Parthi, the one who is the upholder of this Universe, the one who is the personification of the Primordial sound "OM", the one who is always at Peace and who can appear before the devotee at will.
Songglossary: jagadodhara, krishna, namo, nivasa, pranava, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sakshat, shantha, shirdi

Title: Sai Rama Raghurama
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Raghurama
Raja Rama Ghana Shyama [ Sai Rama ... ]
Rama Rama Pavana Dhama
Karuna Sindhu Sathya Sai Rama
Meaning: Oh Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, your name is the most sacred one, you are the most compassionate one, Oh Sathya Sai Rama.
Songglossary: dhama, ghana, karuna, pavan, raghu, raja, ram, sai, sathya, sham, sindhu

Title: Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama Bhajo
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Rama Bhajo
Sai Ram Ram Sai Ram Ram Sai Rama Bhajo
Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Rama Bhajo
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyama Bhajo
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Sai Rama and Sita Rama. Sing the Glory of Lord Sai Rama and Radhey Shyam.
Songglossary: bhaja, radha, ram, sai, sham, sita

Title: Sai Rama Your Eyes I Am Caught In Your Eyes Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Sai Rama Your Eyes I Am Caught In Your Eyes Sai Rama
My Wants And Desires They Have Met Their Demise I Am Lost In Your Eyes Sai Rama
Sai Rama Your Gaze I Am Dancing Away Sai Rama
In A World Of Disguise And Maya I Am Soaring The Skies In Your Ananda
Gently Falling Back In Your Arms I'm Entranced By Your Eyes Sai Rama
I Am Lost In Your Eyes Sai Rama

Title: Sai Sai Nama (Sathya)
Lyrics:
Sai Sai Nama (Sathya)
 Rama Sai, Krishna Sai, Shiva Sai, Ranga Sai
 Sai Sai Nama (Sathya)
 Rama Nama, make me pure
 Krishna Nama Sweet and sure
 Sai Sai Nama (Sathya)
 Shiva Naam is ego's pyre
 Panduranga lights the fire
 Sai Sai Nama (Sathya)
 What to say of Sai encompasses them all
 Father - Mother Sai at Your Lotus Feet I fall

Title: Sai Sai Sai Sings My Heart
Lyrics:
Sai Sai Sai Sings My Heart Everyday
Let Us Never Forget Thee, Let Us Never Forget Thee
[Sai Sai Sai ....]
Baba You Are Able To Touch My Life
You Have Made It Worthwhile, You Have Made It Worthwhile
[Sai Sai Sai ....]
We See Your Amazing Grace Everywhere
You Are My Guiding Light, Baba You Are Guiding Light
Songglossary: baba, sai

Title: Sai Sai Sai, Sai on Earth
Lyrics:
Sai Sai Sai, Sai on Earth, Sai Sai Sai, for all the universe
 Peace Peace Peace, Peace on Earth, for all the universe
 Love Love Love, Love on Earth....

Title: Sai Sai Sathya Sai Humney
Lyrics:
Sai Sai Sathya Sai Humney Pukara
Tum Bina Nahin Mujhey Koi Sahara [ Sai Sai ... ]
Dukhiyon Ke Tum Dil Ka Pyaara
Garibon Ke Tum Aankhon Ke Taara
Merey Liye Tum Ek Sahara
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, I called you Sathya Sai, You are the support for the needy, downtrodden and helpless and you are my only support Sai.
Songglossary: aankhon, bina, dil, ek, garibon, hum, ka, ke, koi, liye, mera, mujhe, nahin, pukar, pyaara, sahara, sai, sathya, taarey, tum

Title: Sai Sai Sayanarey Sarvam Brahmam
Lyrics:
Sai Sai Sayanarey Sarvam Brahmam Mayamanarey
Baba Baba Babanarey Bhakthito Bhajana Lo Palgonarey
Rama Rama Ramanarey Raakshasa Gunamulu Pommanarey
Krishna Krishna Krishnanarey Kashtamulanu Poguttunurey
Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Anarey Atma Ramuni Madigonarey
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Anarey Shiva Keshavulanu Samamanarey
Meaning: This Bhajan describes the impact of chanting the names of Lord Sai and His other Forms. It says; Chant Sai 's name and realize that the universe is Brahman (The ultimate and unchanging reality), Chant the name of Baba and participate in Bhajans with devotion, Chant the name of Krishna and it will eliminate your troubles; Chant the name of Hari and find the in dweller in you Chant the name of Shiva and realize that Shiva and Keshava (Krishna) are one and the same.
Songglossary: anarey, atma, baba, babanarey, bhaja, bhakthi, brahma, gunamulu, hari, kashtamulanu, kesha, krishna, ley, mayam, palgonarey, poguttunurey, pommanarey, raakshasa, ram, ramana, sai, samamanarey, sarva, sayanarey, shiva

Title: Sai Sai Smarana Karo
Lyrics:
Sai Sai Smarana Karo
Guru Charana Kamala Dhyana Karo [ Sai Sai ... ]
Keshava Madhava Bhajana Karo
Sadguru Sai Seva Karo (Sri)
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai, meditate upon His Lotus Feet, sing the glory of Keshava, Madhava (Names of Lord Krishna), serve the divine preceptor Sai.
Songglossary: bhajan, charan, dhyaan, guru, kamala, karo, keshava, madhava, sadguru, sai, seva, smaran, sri

Title: Sai Saraswathi Kalavathi (Sathya)
Lyrics:
Sai Saraswathi Kalavathi (Sathya)
Sakala Shastra Vikasini [ Sai Saraswathi ]
Bhaava Raga Laya Tala Vinodini (3)
Parthi Nivasini Bharati Brahmani
Meaning: Lord Sai who is residing in Parthi is none other than Goddess Saraswathi, the one who is personification of all types of Arts and the one who enjoys the Art of Music.
Songglossary: bhaav, bharati, brahma, kalavathi, laya, nivasi, puttaparthi, raga, sai, sakala, saraswathi, sathya, shastra, tala, vikasini, vinodini

Title: Sai Saraswathi Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Sai Saraswathi Namo Namo
Devi Bhagawathi Namo Namo
Veena Vani Vishwa Kalyani
Veda Kalamayi Gnana Swaroopini [ Sai Saraswathi ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradayini
Saama Gaana Priya Prashanthi Nilayey
Meaning: Salutations to Sai Saraswathi (also known as Devi Bhagawathi) residing in Prashanthi Nilayam, the one who holds Veena and looks after the welfare of the Universe, who is mother of Vedas and music, the one who bestows Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love and the one who is delighted to sing Saama Vedam (One of the four Vedas).
Songglossary: bhagavathi, dayini, devi, dharma, gaan, gnana, kalamayi, kalyan, namo, nilaya, prashanthi, prem, priya, sai, sama, saraswathi, sathya, shanthi, swaroopa, vani, veda, veena, vishwa

Title: Sai Sathya Sai Sai Guru
Lyrics:
Sai Sathya Sai Sai Guru Deva
Darshana Deejo Baba Tribhuvana Pala
Darshana Deejo Baba Sai Nandalala
Krupa Karo Sai Deva
Meaning: Our Lord and Guru, Sai the protector of the three worlds, please be kind and let us have Your darshan (vision of a divine being)
Songglossary: baba, darsh, deejo, deva, guru, karo, krupa, nanda, pala, sai, sathya, tribhuvan

Title: Sai Shankara
Lyrics:
Sai Shankara
Narayana Bhagawan
Tum Ho Merey Pran (Baba) (2)
Deejo Merey Prabhu Shanthi Mukti
Sikhao Prabhu Mujhey Prem Aur Bhakthi
Shirdi Roopa Baba (Parthi Pureeshwara) Hey Bhagawan [ Tum Ho ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai of Parthi and Shirdi, you are Lord Shankara and Lord Narayana, you are my life. Oh Lord bestow me with Peace and Liberation and teach me Love and Devotion.
Songglossary: aur, baba, bhagawan, bhakthi, deejo, hey, ho, mera, mujhe, mukti, narayana, prabhu, pran, prem, purishwara, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, shankara, shanthi, shirdi, sikha, tum

Title: Sai Shankara Bholey Shankara
Lyrics:
Sai Shankara Bholey Shankara
Sathya Narayana Narayanam
Damaru Bholey Dama Dama Dam
Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Bholey Mrudangam
Veena Bholey Narayanam [ Sathya Narayana ]
Meaning: Lord Sai Shankara, Sathya Narayana you are none other than Lord Shiva whose Damaru (miniature hand held Drum), the Mrudangam (a Percussion instrument)and the Veena chant your name.
Songglossary: bhole, dam, dama, damaru, dhimi, mrudanga, narayana, sai, sathya, shankara, veena

Title: Sai Shankara Parthi Pureeshwara
Lyrics:
Sai Shankara Parthi Pureeshwara
Ganga Jatadhara Shashidhara Phanidhara [ Sai Shankara ... ]
Phaala Netradhara Kalakoota Hara
Bhasmodbhavakara Bhavani Shankara
Sayeeshwara Hara Parthi Maheshwara
Meaning: Lord Sayeeshwara of Parthi is none other than Lord Shiva whose attributes are described as, the one supporting the sacred river Ganges in His matted hair, adorning the Crescent moon on His head, adorning the serpent as a necklace, having a third eye in the forehead and smeared with ash all over the body.
Songglossary: bhasmodbhavakara, bhava, ganga, hara, jatadhara, kalakoota, maheshwara, netradhara, paalaya, phani, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sayee, shankara, shashi

Title: Sai Shankara Shambho Shankara
Lyrics:
Sai Shankara Shambho Shankara
Natana Manohara Jaya Abhayankara
Chandra Kaladhara Gowri Shankara
Parama Daya Ghana Sai Shankara
Eshwaramba Nandana Parthi Shankara
Paramananda Prabhu Parameshwara
Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Sai of Parthi, the Son of Eshwaramba, you are none other than Lord Shankara who is fond of dance, who bestows victory, who wears the crescent shaped moon on the head, the consort of Gowri (Parvathi), you are the most compassionate and always in a bliss.
Songglossary: abhaya, chand, daya, eshwar, ghana, gowri, jay, kaladhara, manohar, nanda, natana, param, prabhu, puttaparthi, sai, shambho, shankara

Title: Sai Shyam Sai Shyam Sai
Lyrics:
Sai Shyam Sai Shyam Sai Gopala
Jaya Madhava Jaya Keshava Jaya Murali Gaana Lola [ Sai Shyam ... ]
Pandari Natha Panduranga
Parthi Nivasa Sai Deva [ Jaya Madhava ]
Meaning: This bhajan is in praise of Lord Sai Krishna whose abode is Parthi, who is also known as Shyam, Gopala, Madhava, Keshava and Panduranga.
Songglossary: deva, gaan, gopal, jay, kesha, lola, madhava, murali, natha, nivasa, pandari, pandu, puttaparthi, sai, sham

Title: Sai Sri Sai Sath Chitha
Lyrics:
Sai Sri Sai Sath Chitha Sai
Sath Chitha Sai Bhujagendra Sai
Bhujagendra Sai Vatapathra Sai
Vatapathra Sai Sri Ranga Sai
Sri Ranga Sai Namata Namami
Meaning: This bhajan praises the attributes of Lord Sri Ranganatha (another Form of Lord Vishnu) who is reclining on the Celestial Snake Adi Sesha, who is none other than Lord Krishna resting on Ficus Leaf. (Vatapatra Sai the child Krishna floating on ficus leaf in Hinduism is a symbolic representation of the first form of life on earth. )
Songglossary: bhuja, chitha, namam, namata, ranga, sai, sat, sri, vatapathra

Title: Sai Sundara Sundara
Lyrics:
Sai Sundara Sundara
Vyagrambaradhara Harey Hari Hara [ Sai Sundara ... ]
Anantha Guna Mandira Sundara
Natana Sundara Bhuvana Sundara
Meaning: This bhajan praises Lord Sai as the most beautiful in the world, who is none other than Lord Shiva adorning tiger skin, who is highest in virtues and the most charming Cosmic dancer.
Songglossary: ananta, bhuvana, guna, hara, hari, mandir, natana, sai, sundara, vyagrambara

Title: Sai Terey Charano Mey Koti
Lyrics:
Sai Terey Charano Mey Koti Pranam
Daya Karo Merey Atma Rama
Sai Ram Hey Ghana Shyama
Jagadodhara Sri Sai Rama [ Daya Karo ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, I offer million salutations at your Lotus feet. Please show mercy oh my Lord Rama, Sai Rama, Lord Krishna.
Songglossary: atma, chara, daya, ghana, hey, jagadodhara, karo, koti, mera, pranamami, ram, sai, sham, sri, tera

Title: Sai Terey Charano Mey Koti
Lyrics:
Sai Terey Charano Mey Koti Pranam
Sharan Mey Lelo Sai Prabho [ Sai Terey ... ]
Tum Ho Merey Mata Pitha Sai
Tum Ho Merey Bandhu Sakha
Tum Ho Merey Sab Kuch Sai
Deejo Hum Ko Charana Tumharey
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, I offer million salutations at your Lotus feet, please take me in your fold. You are my mother, father, Kith and Kin. You are my every thing Oh Sai, I offer myself at your feet.
Songglossary: bandhava, chara, deejo, ho, hum, koti, kuch, lelo, mata, mera, pitha, prabhu, pranamami, sab, sai, sakha, sharan, tera, tum, tumhara

Title: Sai Tero Naam Tero Naam
Lyrics:
Sai Tero Naam Tero Naam
Janam Janam Mey Gaoon (2)
Charan Tumharey Sadguru Sai
Apne Hrudaya Basaoon
Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai
Prema Sai Guna Gaoon [ Janam ]
Meaning:
(Aalap: We have been blessed with the ever pure Sai Ram just like how Surdas was blessed by Lord Krishna or Shabari by Lord Rama.)
O Lord Sai, I will sing Your name in all my several lives, I will install Your feet in my heart and continue to sing the glory of Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai and Prema Sai.
GeneralComments:
This song is sometimes sung with an Aalap:
 
Surdas Ko Miley Kanhaiya
Shabari Ko Raghurayi Ram
Isi Tarah Se Miley Hai Humko
Nitya Niranjana Sai Ram Sai Ram
Songglossary: apna, basaoon, charan, gao, guna, hai, hamko, hrudaya, isey, janam, kanhaiya, ko, mein, miley, naam, niranjan, nithya, prem, puttaparthi, raghuraya, ram, sabari, sadguru, sai, se, shirdi, surdas, tarah, tera, tumhara

Title: Sai You are in my heart
Lyrics:
Sai You are in my heart as I am in Your heart forever
 We're one heart called Soham called Love
 Sai Hrudaya Vihari You're Dharma and Shaanthi,
 You're Sathya, You're Prema Omnipresent One Soham
 You are the ocean Lord, I am your wave
 You are the mountain Sai, I am your cave
 You are the blue sky I am your star
 Sai Divine Mother One we always are (Sai You are ...)
 You are the Love tree, I am your clinging vine
 You're the Divine Poet, my life is Your rhyme
 You are the Father, I'm Your loving son
 We are Omnipresence from where all has come
 (Sai You are ...)

Title: Sai You Are More Precious
Lyrics:
Sai You Are More Precious Than Silver
Sai You Are More Valued Than Gold
Sai You Are More Beautiful Than Diamonds
Nothing In This World Compares With You
Sai You Are Rama And Krishna
Sai You Are The Sun And The Moon
Sai You Are The Cause Of All Created
All The Universe Depends On You
Sai You Are More Precious Than Silver
Sai You Are More Valued Than Gold
Sai You Are More Beautiful Than Diamonds
Nothing In This World Compares With You
Nothing I Desire Compares With You
Nothing In My Life Compares With You
Songglossary: krishna, more, ram, sai, sun

Title: Sai You Are My Heart
Lyrics:
Sai, You are my heart and soul (2x)
You are my path and my goal (1x)
You make my life more than complete, You give Your love to me (1x)
Sai, You are my heart and soul (1x)
Born in this world in the name of Sai, hold on to Him if you can (2x)
He is in one, He is in all, you can see Him in everything (2x)
Songglossary: make, more, sai

Title: Sai’s Love is so wonderful
Lyrics:
Sai's Love is so wonderful, so wonderful, so wonderful
 Sai's Love is so wonderful, Sai's wonderful love.
 It's so high you can't climb over it
 It's so low you can't go under it
 It's so wide you can't go around it, Sai's wonderful love.

Title: Sai, Embodiment of Love
Lyrics:
Sai, Embodiment of Love
 Turning us all into God
 Sai is turning us all into God
 We open up to find You in our heart
 You show us that we've never been apart
 Sai Baba, wake us from the dream
 Take us to Your blissful Love Supreme
 O melt us in Your blissful Love Supreme
 (Sathya) Sai Baba my Lord (2X) /
 Sai Love Supreme (3X)

Title: Sairam hear my call to You
Lyrics:
Sairam hear my call to You, Sairam hear my call
Sai Ram I know You must hear my call
[Sairam hear my call...]
In my heart is a burning, yearning for You
I am waiting, I am praying, I am calling to/for You
Songglossary: ram, sai

Title: Saisha Sharanam Sharanam Saisha
Lyrics:
Saisha Sharanam Sharanam Saisha
Sathya Shivatmaka Sundara Isha [ Saisha Sharanam ... ]
Tandava Rudra Sadashiva Sai
Karuna Sagara Raghava Sai
Gana Manohara Madhava Sai
Madhava Sai He Yadava Sai
Buddhi Pradayaka Sambhava Sai
Meaning: Surrender to the eternally true Lord Sathya Sai. He is Lord Rudra (Shiva) who performs the cosmic dance. He is Lord Rama and Lord Krishna (Madhava). He enchants with divine music. He is an ocean of compassion who bestows intelligence.
Songglossary: buddhi, esha, gana, karuna, madhava, manohar, pradayaka, raghava, rudra, sadashiva, sagar, sai, saisha, sambhava, sathya, sharan, shiva, sundara, tandava, yadava

Title: Sakshath Parabrahma Sai Guru Vandana
Lyrics:
Sakshath Parabrahma Sai Guru Vandana Sathya Sai
Guru Pada Ranjana Guru Paramesha
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Mahesha
Sadguru Sai Parthi Pureesha
Charana Namostuthey Sai Mahesha
Meaning: Our salutations at your divine Lotus feet Oh Lord Sai. You are our divine preceptor, the Supreme God, and the unified form of the Trinity (Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva).
Songglossary: brahma, chara, guru, mahesha, namostuthey, paada, parabrahma, param, pureesha, puttaparthi, ranjana, sadguru, sai, sakshat, sathya, vandana, vishnu

Title: Salaam Valekum Salaam Valekum Salaam
Lyrics:
Salaam Valekum Salaam Valekum Salaam Valekum Salaam
Allah Ho Allah Ho Allah Ho Akbar [ Salaam Valekum ... ]
Buddha Zohrashtra Yesu Mahavir
Nanak Ji Ki Jai Jaikar Ho
Meaning: God is great, peace be upon you. Victory to Buddha, Zohrashtra, Yesu, Mahavir and Nanak.
Songglossary: akbar, allah, buddha, ho, jai, jaikar, ji, mahavir, nanak, salaam, valekum, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Samba Sadashiva Sai Prabho
Lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Sai Prabho
Shambho Mahadeva Dehi Vibho
Jaya Ganga Jatadhari Gowri Pathey
Sathya Sai Mahadeva Parthi Pathey
Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi, you are Lord Shiva, we seek your protection, Oh Lord who supports sacred river Ganga in your matted hair.
Songglossary: dehi, ganga, gowri, jatadhari, jay, mahadev, pathey, prabhu, puttaparthi, sadashiva, sai, samba, sathya, shambho, vibho

Title: Samba Sadashiva Samba Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Samba Sadashiva
Samba Sadashiva Sai Shiva
Parthi Pureesha Hey Paramesha
Patitha Janavana Pavana Charitha
Parvathi Ramana Parama Dayala
Parvatha Raja Kumari Ramana
Meaning: Salutations to you Lord Samba Sadashiva, who is also the Lord of Parthi, the protector of the weak and downtrodden, the consort of Goddess Parvathi and the most merciful one.
Songglossary: charitha, dayal, hey, janavana, kumari, param, parvatha, parvathi, patitha, pavan, pureesha, puttaparthi, raja, ramana, sadashiva, sai, samba, shiva

Title: Samba Sadashiva Sayeeshwara
Lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Sayeeshwara
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva [ Samba ... ]
Narthana Sundara Natana Manohara
Natya Priyakara Nataneshwara (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sayeeshwara you are none other than Lord Shiva also called by other names like Gangadhara, Gowri Shiva and Nataneshwara who performs the beautiful Cosmic dance.
Songglossary: ganga, gowri, hara, manohar, narthana, natana, nataneshwara, natya, priya, sadashiva, samba, sayee, shiva, sundara

Title: Samba Vinodini Shiva Sai Shankari
Lyrics:
Samba Vinodini Shiva Sai Shankari
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari [ Samba Vinodini ]
Akhilandeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Daya Sagari Parama Krupa Kari
Meaning: Salutations to the most compassionate mother Parvathi the Consort of Lord Shiva, also known by names like Samba Vinodini, Shankari, Gowri, Maheshwari, Akhilandeswari, Raja Rajeshwari etc.
Songglossary: akhila, daya, gowri, kari, krupa, maheshwari, mangal, mata, param, raja, rajeshwari, sagar, sai, samba, shankari, shiva, vinodini

Title: Sambhava Shiva Shambho Shambho
Lyrics:
Sambhava Shiva Shambho Shambho
Narthana Nataraja Nataraja [ Sambhava Shiva ... ]
Mruthyunjaya Mahesha Mahesha
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Paramesha
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva who is the Cosmic dancer Nataraja, who is also known as Mruthyunjaya (Conqueror of death). He is none other than Lord Sai residing in Parthi.
Songglossary: mahesha, mruthyu, narthana, nataraj, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sambhava, shambho, shiva

Title: Sambhavi Shankari Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Sambhavi Shankari Namo Namo
Shantha Swaroopini Namo Namo
Sai Maheshwari Namo Namo (Sathya)
Namo Namo Namo Namo (2)
Meaning: Salutations to Mother Sambhavi Shankari (Goddess Parvathi), who is embodiment of peace, who is none other than mother Sai.
Songglossary: maheshwari, namo, sai, sambhavi, sathya, shankari, shantha, swaroopa

Title: Sanathana Sarathey Sayeesha
Lyrics:
Sanathana Sarathey Sayeesha
Sarvottama Guna Nidhey Paramesha
Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ram
Suramuni Vanditha Sadhu Jana Poshita
Sarva Janashraya Sayeesha
Sadguru Deva Satchidananda
Sashtanga Sharanam Mama Guru Deva [ Ram Sai Ram ]
Meaning: Salutations at your Divine Lotus feet Oh Lord Sai, you are the upholder of the "Eternal Laws" (Sanathana Dharma), the one who is the embodiment of all virtues, the one who is worshipped by sages and noble ones and the one whom the entire humanity worships.
Songglossary: deva, guna, guru, jana, janashraya, mama, nidhey, param, poshita, ram, sadguru, sadhu, sai, sanatana, sarathey, sarva, sarvottama, sashtanga, satchidananda, sayee, sharan, suramuni, vanditha

Title: Sangeeta Rasike Sharadey (Amba)
Lyrics:
Sangeeta Rasike Sharadey (Amba)
Sadananda Roopini Saraswathi [ Sangeeta Rasike ... ]
Bhaava Raga Laya Gaana Viloley
Bhaktha Kalpalatikey Vidya Pathey
Meaning: Oh Mother Saraswathi, you are passionate about music, you are eternally in bliss, you are the indomitable support for all your devotees and you bestow knowledge to all.
Songglossary: amba, bhaav, bhaktha, gaan, kalpa, laya, pathey, raga, rasike, sadana, sangeeta, saraswathi, sharade, swaroopa, vidya, viloley

Title: Sankata Harana Govinda
Lyrics:
Sankata Harana Govinda
Venkata Ramana Govinda [ Sankata ... ]
Pankaja Charana Govinda
Parthi Pureeshwara Govinda (2)
Paahi Prabho Maam Govinda
Meaning: Glory to you Oh Lord Govinda who has now incarnated as the Lord of Parthi, the remover of all obstacles, we offer ourselves at your tender lotus feet.
Songglossary: chara, govinda, harana, maam, paahi, pankaja, prabhu, purishwara, puttaparthi, ramana, sankata, venkatesha

Title: Sankata Harana Govinda
Lyrics:
Sankata Harana Govinda
Pankaja Charana Govinda
Sathya Sai Deva Govinda
Saptagiri Vasa Govinda
Govinda Hari ( Sai ) Govinda
Meaning: Glory to you Oh Lord Govinda who resides in the seven hills and has now incarnated as Lord Sathya Sai, who is the remover of all obstacles. We offer ourselves at your tender lotus feet.
Songglossary: chara, deva, govinda, harana, hari, pankaja, sai, sankata, sapta, sathya, vasa

Title: Sankata Harana Mangala Charana
Lyrics:
Sankata Harana Mangala Charana
Shirdishwara Sai Deva Deva
Parthishwara Sai Deva
Bhava Priya Sai Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Yuga Avatara Jaya Jaga Vandana
Mohana Roopa Manasa Ranjana
Shirdishwara Sai Deva Deva
Parthishwara Sai Deva Deva
Meaning: The holy feet of Sai destroys woes. Incarnations of this age and worshipped by all, both Parthi Sai and Shirdi Sai who are fond of their devotees' reverential feelings, remove their fears of existence. Both the avatars are delightful and beautiful to behold.
Songglossary: avatar, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, chara, deva, harana, jagat, jay, manasa, mangal, mohan, partheeshwara, priya, ranjana, roopa, sai, sankata, shirdi, vandana, yuga

Title: Sankata Harana Sri Sai Ramana
Lyrics:
Sankata Harana Sri Sai Ramana
Pankaja Charana Namo Namo
Vedodharana Venkata Ramana
Lakshmi ( Sai ) Narayana Namo Namo
Namo Namo Namo Namo [ Pankaja Charana ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai (who is also the Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati), the one with feet soft like Lotus, the one who is the upholder of Vedas and who is the Consort of Lakshmi.
Songglossary: chara, harana, lakshmi, namo, narayana, pankaja, ramana, sai, sankata, sri, vedodhara, venkatesha

Title: Sapney Mey Aao Shyama Murari
Lyrics:
Sapney Mey Aao Shyama Murari
Savari Surath Muralidhari [ Sapney Mey ... ]
Sab Ke Sajan Prabhu Giridhari
Sadguru Sai Parthi Vihari
Meaning: Oh dark complexioned Lord Krishna I invite you to come in my dreams. Oh Lord Sai who strolls in Parthi, you are every one's companion.
Songglossary: aao, giridhar, ke, murali, murare, prabhu, puttaparthi, sab, sadguru, sai, sajjana, sapney, savari, sham, surath, vihar

Title: Saraswathi Devi Saraswathi
Lyrics:
Saraswathi Devi Saraswathi
Vani Veena Saraswathi
Brahma Sanathani Brahmamayi
Veda Swaroopini Vedamayi
Vaagdevi Vageshwari
Vaagvilasini Saraswathi
Meaning: Our humble Salutations to mother Saraswathi who is the embodiment of Sound, Speech and Music, who is the eternal one, who is the embodiment of all Vedas.
Songglossary: brahma, devi, sanatana, saraswathi, swaroopa, vaagdevi, vaagvilasini, vageshwari, vani, veda, vedamayi, veena

Title: Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
Sathya Sai Deva
Allah Yesu Buddha Aur Nanak
Zohrashtra Mahavira Tum Ho
Rama Hi Tum Ho Krishna Hi Tum Ho
Vishwa Roopa Tum Ho (2)
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Sai who fosters all faiths and religions. He is verily the embodiment of Allah, Christ, Buddha, Nanak, Zohrashtra, Mahavira, Ram and Krishna.
GeneralComments: The fifth line is also sung as "Rama Bhi Tum Ho Krishna Bhi Tum Ho".
Songglossary: allah, aur, buddha, deva, dharma, hai, ho, krishna, mahavir, nanak, priya, ram, roopa, sai, sarva, sathya, tum, vishwa, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
Sai Deva Deva Deva [ Sarva Dharma ... ]
Allah Yesu Guru Grantha Govinda
Maulah Sai Mahavira Madhava
Zohrashtra Buddha Sai Shankara [ Sai Deva ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is the embodiment of all religions and faiths. HE is none other than Allah, Jesus, Nanak, Mahavir, Krishna, Buddha and Zohrashtra.
Songglossary: allah, buddha, deva, dharma, govinda, grantha, guru, madhava, mahavir, maulah, priya, sai, sarva, shankara, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
Sarvotunga Sanathana [ Sarva Dharma ... ]
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
Yesu Mohammad Buddha Mahavira
Nanak Sai Zohrashtra Shankara
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Dayi
Meaning: Glory to you Oh Lord Sai who protects and nourishes all faiths and religions. Glory to the Eternal one who is the embodiment of Christ, Mohammad, Buddha and Mahavira Nanak, Zohrashtra and Shankara. Glory to you Oh Lord Sai who bestows and sustains Truth, Peace and Love.
Songglossary: buddha, dayi, deva, dharma, mahavir, mohammad, nanak, prem, priya, sai, sanatana, sarva, sathya, shankara, shanthi, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Shankara
Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Shankara
Sarva Dharma Sevitha Shankara
Sarva Jana Poojita Shankara
Sarva Loka Nayaka Shankara
Sarva Paapa Kshayakara Shankara
Sadananda Dayaka Shankara
Shankara Sai Shankara (4)
Meaning: In this Bhajan Lord Shiva also known as Shankara (Sai Shankara) is extolled with attributes like, the one who encompasses all religions, the one who is adored by all, the one who is the Lord of the Universe, the one who destroys all sins and the one who is always in bliss.
Songglossary: dayaka, dharma, jana, kshayakara, loka, nayaka, paapa, poojita, priya, sadana, sai, sarva, sevita, shankara

Title: Sarva Dharma Roopa Parama Gatheesha
Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Roopa Parama Gatheesha
Maha Shakthi Hey Mahaan Teja
Vishwadhara Poorana Brahma Sathya Sayeesha
Prema Roopa Dhara Kali Avatara Sai Mahesha
Shirdi Sai Mahesha Sathya Sai Mahesha
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of all religions who is extolled as the most effulgent, powerful, personification of Love and the incarnation of this Kali age.
Songglossary: avatar, brahma, dhara, dharma, hey, kali, maha, mahesha, param, poorna, prem, roopa, sai, sarva, sathya, sayee, shakthi, shirdi, teja, vishwa

Title: Sarva Dharma Swaroopa Sai
Lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Swaroopa Sai
Shirdi Ke (Parthi Ke) Avatara
Merey Baba Merey Sai
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Hindu Muslim Isai Aatey Hai Terey Dwarey
Milte Hai Terey Dwarey [ Sai Ram Sai Ram ]
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shirdi (Parthi) Sai who is the embodiment of all Religions and Faiths who draws all to HIS door step.
Songglossary: aana, avatar, baba, dharma, dwarey, hai, hindu, isai, ke, mera, milte, muslim, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sarva, shirdi, swaroopa, tera

Title: Sarva Mangala Sai Janani
Lyrics:
Sarva Mangala Sai Janani
Parthi Nivasini Parama Shivani [ Sarva Mangala ... ]
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani
Adi Parashakthi Sai Narayani
Jagadodharini Bhava Bhaya Harini
Meaning: This Bhajan praises Mother Sai residing in Parthi, who is none other than Goddess Durga (with other names like Shivani, Maheshwari, Para Shakthi, all depicting the Consort of Shiva) as the most auspicious one and the one who destroys the fears of this materialistic world.
Songglossary: adi, bhava, bhaya, durga, haarini, jagadodhara, janani, maheshwari, mangal, mata, narayani, nivasi, param, parashakthi, puttaparthi, sai, sarva, shiva

Title: Sarva Naama Swaroopam Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Sarva Naama Swaroopam Sai Baba
Sarva Hrudaya Nivasam Sai Baba [ Sarva Naama ... ]
Sarva Daivatva Swaroopam Sai Baba
Sarva Dharma Virajam Sai Baba
