Om Brahma Sanathana Sai Baba
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, you are the personification of all Names (of Gods), you live in every one's hearts, you are the reflection of all pervading divinity, you are pure and Symbolize all faiths. Oh Lord Sai you are eternal supreme conscience.
Songglossary: baba, brahma, daiva, dharma, hrudaya, naam, nivasa, om, sai, sanatana, sarva, swaroopa, viraja

Title: Sarvatra Govinda Naama Sankeertana Govinda
Lyrics:
Sarvatra Govinda Naama Sankeertana Govinda Hari Govinda
Govinda Hari Govinda Hari Govinda Hari Govinda
Purana Purusha Govinda Hari Punya Shloka Govinda
Bhaktha Vatsala Govinda Hari Bhaagavatha Priya Govinda
Krishna Rama Govinda Hari Rama Krishna Govinda
Sai Rama Govinda Hari Sai Krishna Govinda
Meaning: Chant the name of Govinda, the Supreme Lord who is extolled in the Vedas; the one who is dear to His devotees and to whom He is affectionate. Chant the names of Rama and Krishna who are the same as Sai.
Songglossary: bhaagavatha, bhaktha, govinda, hari, krishna, naam, priya, punya, purana, purusha, ram, sai, sankeertana, sarvatra, shloka, vatsala

Title: Satchidananda Paramananda
Lyrics:
Satchidananda Paramananda
Devaki Nanda Mukunda Radhey Govinda (Vasu)
Anatha Natha Deena Natha
Prashanthi Vasa Shanthi Pradatha
Sai Ananda Mukunda Radhey Govinda
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who resides in Prashanthi Nilayam, who is none other than the son of Devaki and the beloved of Radha, the saviour of needy and downtrodden.
Songglossary: anand, anath, deen, devaki, govinda, mukunda, nanda, natha, param, pradatha, prashanthi, radha, sai, satchidananda, shanthi, vasa, vasudeva

Title: Sath Guru Dev Raaha Dikhao
Lyrics:
Sath Guru Dev Raaha Dikhao Prabhu
Raaha Dikhao Sai Deva [ Sath Guru ... ]
Tum Ho Merey Prana Daata
Tum Ho Merey Bhagya Daata
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, our divine preceptor, show us the path to liberation, you are our life giver as well as the one who bestows all prosperity.
Songglossary: bhagya, daata, dev, deva, dikhao, guru, ho, mera, praan, prabhu, raha, sai, sat, tum

Title: Sathya Deivame Puttaparthi Nadane
Lyrics:
Sathya Deivame Puttaparthi Nadane
Engal Vazhvil Undan Anbai Tandarulvaye
Sayi Unnai Ninaindu Nenjil Dyanam Seidome
Unnai Nadi Vandome Emmai Kattarulvaye
(Sathya) Sayi Undan Pugazhai Padi Sharanadaindome [ Engal ... ]
Meaning: Lord of Truth, Lord of Parthi, bless our lives with Your love; we meditate on you in our hearts, and humbly approach You, singing Your glory. Protect us O Lord, we surrender unto you.
Songglossary: anbum, deivam, dhyaan, emmai, engal, kattarulvai, nadi, natha, nenjil, ninaindu, padi, pugazh, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, seidome, sharan, tandarulvaye, undan, unnai, va, vazh

Title: Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sab
Lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sab Ko Deejo
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa Aap Hai
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Jeevan Ka Marm Hai
Guru Dev Guru Dev (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, our divine preceptor, you are the personification of Truth, Peace, Love and Harmony, which are the foundations of this human life.
Songglossary: aap, deejo, dev, dharma, guru, hai, jeeva, ka, marm, prem, sab, sathya, shanthi, swaroopa

Title: Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa
Lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa Prashanthi Nilaya Deva
Rama Ho Krishna Ho Sai Ram Deva
Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa Baba Hey Deena Palana Baba
Hey Prashanthi Nilaya Baba Hey Poornavatara Baba
Allah Ho Maulah Ho Sai Ram Deva
Meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Prashanthi who is the embodiment of Truth, Peace, Love and Harmony, Oh Lord Sai, You are none other than Rama, Krishna, Shiva, Shakthi, Allah and Maulah, who offers solace to the weak and the downtrodden.
Songglossary: allah, baba, deen, deva, dharma, hey, ho, krishna, maulah, nilaya, paalaya, poornavatara, prashanthi, prem, ram, sai, sathya, shakthi, shanthi, shiva, swaroopa

Title: Sathya Dharmamu Shanthi Premalato
Lyrics:
Sathya Dharmamu Shanthi Premalato
Ni Nithya Jeevana Yatra Saginchu (Jeeva)
Manasu Madakada Gunamule Yaddul
Vivekamanu Chala Kolanun Tisi
Vishalamagu Mee Hrudayamu Dunnudo [ Sathya Dharmamu ... ]
Hrudaya Bhumini Sagu Cheyyandi
Meaning: Truth, Righteousness, peace, and love are the guiding tools of our life's journey. Mind as the tiller, character as the pulling bulls and intellect as the reigns, we must cultivate broadmindedness and love for everybody.
Songglossary: bhumi, Chala, cheyyandi, dharma, dunnudo, gunamule, hrudaya, jeeva, kolanun, madakada, manasu, mee, ni, nithya, premalato, saginchu, sagu, sathya, shanthi, tisi, vishala, vivekamanu, yaddul, yatra

Title: Sathya Guru Dev Raha Dikhao
Lyrics:
Sathya Guru Dev Raha Dikhao Prabhu
Raha Dikhao Sai Deva [ Sathya Guru ... ]
Tum Ho Merey Prana Data
Tum Ho Merey Bhagya Vidhata (2)
Meaning: O Lord Sai, noble teacher, please guide me on the right path. You bestow good fortune on me and You are my life-breath.
Songglossary: bhagya, daata, dev, deva, dikhao, guru, ho, mera, praan, prabhu, raha, sai, sathya, tum, vidhata

Title: Sathya Manohari Sai Maheshwari
Lyrics:
Sathya Manohari Sai Maheshwari
Brindavana Sanchari (Amba)
Characharamayi Sarva Shubha Kari
Yuga Yuga Avatari (Amba)
Meaning: Glory to mother Sai Maheshwari who is ever enchanting and the embodiment of Truth and Wisdom, the one who is eternal and confers HER grace and auspiciousness upon one and all and SHE is the one who is present across all times and ages. .
Songglossary: amba, avatar, brinda, chara, kari, maheshwari, manohar, sai, sanchari, sarva, sathya, shubh, yuga

Title: Sathya Narayana Govinda Madhava Sai
Lyrics:
Sathya Narayana Govinda Madhava Sai Narayana Govinda Keshava (3)
Harey Rama Harey Rama Harey Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Harey Harey
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sathya Narayana, also known as Govinda, Madhava, Narayana, Keshava, Rama and Krishna.
Songglossary: govinda, hari, kesha, krishna, madhava, narayana, ram, sai, sathya

Title: Sathya Narayana Guru Deva
Lyrics:
Sathya Narayana Guru Deva
Bhaktha Parayana Prabhu Deva
Guru Deva Prabhu Deva
Sathya Deva Sai Deva [ Sathya Narayana ... ]
Parti Natha Sathya Sai Deva
Mukti Data Sathya Sai Deva [ Guru Deva ... Sai Deva ]
Meaning: Lord Sathya Narayana of Parthi, Lord and teacher is praised by His devotees. He grants them liberation.
Songglossary: bhaktha, daata, deva, guru, mukti, narayana, natha, parayana, prabhu, puttaparthi, sai, sathya

Title: Sathya Narayani Shantha Swaroopini
Lyrics:
Sathya Narayani Shantha Swaroopini
Mangala Vadani Malini
Maya Vilasini Maha Kamini
Mahishasura Mardhini Harini
Meaning: Glory to you Oh mother Sathya Narayani who is the embodiment of eternal bliss and peace whose countenance is so enchanting and soft like a creeper and emanates radiance and auspiciousness.
Songglossary: haarini, kamini, maha, mahishasura, malini, mangal, mardini, maya, narayani, sathya, shantha, swaroopa, vadana, vilasini

Title: Sathya Sai Arathi
Lyrics:
Om Jay Jagadheesa Harey
Swami Sathya Sai Harey
Bhaktha Jana Samrakshaka
Bhaktha Jana Samrakshaka
Parthi Maheshwara
Om Jay Jagadheesa Harey

Sashi Vadhana Sree Karaa Sarva Praana Pathey
Swami Sarva Praana Pathey
Aasritha Kalpa Latheeka
Aasritha Kalpa Latheeka
Aapadh Baandhavaa
Om Jay Jagadheesa Harey

Maatha Pitha Guru Dhaivamu Mari Anthayu Neevey
Swami Mari Anthayu Neevey
Naadha Brahma Jagan Naatha
Naadha Brahma Jagan Naatha
Naagendra Shayanaa
Om Jay Jagadheesa Harey

Omkaara Roopa Ojaswi Om Sai Mahadeva
Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Mangala Aarathi Anduko
Mangala Aarathi Anduko
Mandhara Giridhari
Om Jay Jagadheesa Harey

Narayana Narayana Om
Sathya Narayana Narayana Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Om
Sathya Narayana Narayana Om
Sathya Narayana Narayana Om
Om Jai Sadguru Deva
Meaning:
The waving of the camphor flame (aarathi) at the end of the prayer or bhajan session is to remind you that your sensual cravings must be burnt away without leaving any trace behind. You must offer yourself completely to God, to be merged in His Glory.Divine Discourse, Sep 8, 1966
1. Victory to Lord of Universe, Lord Sathya Sai, Who destroys grief, evil, and miseries of life and Who guards and protects devotees. Victory to Lord of Lords Lord of Parthi.
 
2. O Graceful and Charming as a full moon! O Auspicious One! O Lord Sai! Thou art the Indweller and life-force of all Beings; the wish-fulfilling divine creeper to those who have surrendered to Thee; and kinsman, protector, and friend in times of distress and calamities. Victory to Lord of Universe.
 
3. O Lord Sai! Thou art Mother, Father, noble Teacher, Supreme Divinity, and everything to us. O Lord Universe! Thou art Primeval Sound and art reclined on coiled serpent.
 
4. O Splendorous One! O Lord of Lords Lord Sai! Thy Form is Pranava. We pray Thee to accept the auspicious waving of flame of light (signifying the removal of ignorance). Victory to Thee, O Lord of Universe, Resident of Mandhar mountain Lord Giridhari.
 
Chant the name of Lord Sathya Sai Narayana, Whose Form is Pranava. Victory to Noble Teacher and Supreme Lord Sai, Sathya Sai.
GeneralComments: Sathya Sai Arathi. Please see http://sairegion3.org/songtag/arathi/ for alternative versions.
Songglossary: aapadh, aarathi, anduko, anthayu, baandhava, bhaktha, brahma, deva, dhaivamu, giridhar, guru, hari, jagadheesa, jagan, jai, jana, jay, kalpa, karaa, maatha, mahadev, maheshwara, mandara, mangal, mari, naagendra, naath, narayana, neeve, om, omkaara, pathey, pitha, praan, puttaparthi, roopa, sadguru, sai, samraksha, sarva, sashi, sathya, shayana, sree, swami, vadhana

Title: Sathya Sai Arathi – English
Lyrics:
The Lord of the Universe is here
Swami Sathya Sai is here
Come to save devotees everywhere
Come to bless his children everywhere
Born at Puttaparthi
The Lord of the Universe is here

Calm and tranquil like the moon
Shining with Divine inner light
Filling all with Bliss at his sight
He is always serving those in need
Answering the prayers of devotees
Giving Grace to you and me
The Lord of the Universe is here

Sai you are Guru, God, and Self
Mother you are everything to us
Father you are everything to us
You are the Divine Primal Energy
Manifest as all that we ever see
You are the One Reality
The Lord of the Universe is here

Sai with the sacred form of Om
Universal radiance Divine
Please accept this offering of mine
The flame of love that burns within my heart
Meaning we can never be apart
You and I are ever One
The Lord of the Universe is here.

Narayana Narayana Om Sathya
Narayana Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Om Sathya
Narayana Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Om Sathya
Narayana Narayana Om
The Lord of the Universe is here.
Meaning: The waving of the camphor flame (aarathi) at the end of the prayer or bhajan session is to remind you that your sensual cravings must be burnt away without leaving any trace behind. You must offer yourself completely to God, to be merged in His Glory.Divine Discourse, Sep 8, 1966
GeneralComments: English Aarti - One Version. Please see http://sairegion3.org/songtag/arathi/ for alternative versions.
Songglossary: guru, narayana, om, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, swami

Title: Sathya Sai Arathi – English
Lyrics:
All praise to You, Lord of the Worlds
Swami Sathya Sai, our Lord
You protect devotees who cling to You
Show Your mercy to us who sing to You
Knowing You are God in human form
All praise to You, Lord of the Worlds

With captivating grace and loveliness
You do everything to bring us happiness
You're aware of all through infinite consciousness
You are master of every living thing
For devotees You're wish-fulfilling
Helping us when we are in distress
All praise to You, Lord of the Worlds

Mother, Father, Teacher and Lord
You remind us there is only one, not two
Swami, there is truly no one else but You
Master of creation, You are adored
People of all nations are striving toward
Realization of our true reward
Our unity with You, Lord of the Worlds

You are the Word of God, pure and bright
The embodiment of all true and right
Sathya Sai, fill our hearts with pure delight
Do accept our prayer and heed us
From darkness we can't bear please lead us
With Your might You make our burdens light
All praise to You, Lord of the Worlds

Narayana Narayana Om, Sathya
Narayana Narayana Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Om, Sathya
Narayana Narayana Om, Sathya
Narayana Narayana Om
All praise to our Teacher Divine
Meaning: The waving of the camphor flame (aarathi) at the end of the prayer or bhajan session is to remind you that your sensual cravings must be burnt away without leaving any trace behind. You must offer yourself completely to God, to be merged in His Glory.Divine Discourse, Sep 8, 1966
GeneralComments: English Aarti - One Version. Please see http://sairegion3.org/songtag/arathi/ for alternative versions.
Songglossary: do, make, narayana, om, sai, sathya, swami

Title: Sathya Sai Arathi – Spanish
Lyrics:
Gloria a Ti, mi Seor,
hacedor de toda la vida.
Como la luna tranquila, con Tu dulzura iluminas,
la luz de nuestro corazn. Gloria a Ti mi Seor.
Eres Padre y Madre de la alegra,
el Seor de toda armona,
el Seor de toda armona,
mi Dios, mi Maestro y mi Gua,
mi Dios, mi Maestro y mi Gua.
El nctar de la compasin.
Gloria a ti mi Seor.

Manantial de gracia y consuelo,
Eres el Padre Supremo,
eres el Padre Supremo,
que nos envuelve en su juego,
que nos envuelve en su juego.
Eres nuestro protector.
Gloria a Ti mi Seor.

Salvador de los afligidos,
ante Tus Pies nos rendimos,
ante Tus Pies nos rendimos,
y con amor Te pedimos,
y con amor Te pedimos,
que nos des Tu bendicin,
Oh, mi Dulcsimo Seor.

Alabado seas Seor,
alabado seas mi Seor,
te entrego todas mis faltas,
te entrego todas mis dudas,
para que T las consumas
en el puro fuego de tu amor.

Om Paz, Paz, Paz
Meaning: The waving of the camphor flame (aarathi) at the end of the prayer or bhajan session is to remind you that your sensual cravings must be burnt away without leaving any trace behind. You must offer yourself completely to God, to be merged in His Glory.Divine Discourse, Sep 8, 1966
GeneralComments: Spanish Aarti. Please see http://sairegion3.org/songtag/arathi/ for alternative versions.
Songglossary: manan, om, para, paz, seor, tum

Title: Sathya Sai Baba Mujhey Charanome
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Baba Mujhey Charanome Lo
Charanome Lo Baba Charanome Lo [ Sathya Sai ... ]
Parti Ke Tum Ho Swami
Antaryami Antaryami
Karuna Karo Baba Deena Jana Ki
Jariba Kari Baba Bhakthon Ko
Sathya Sai Baba Mujhey Charanome Lo [ Charanome Lo ... ]
Meaning: Lord Sai, the indweller and the Lord of Parthi, please receive me at You lotus feet and kindly show me mercy.
Songglossary: antar, baba, bhakthon, chara, deen, ho, jana, kari, karo, karuna, ke, ley, mujhe, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, swami, tum

Title: Sathya Sai Baba, my Lord
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, my Lord
 You taught me how to pray, O my Lord, in a way
 That makes me one with the world when I pray
 God is only one, He is there for everyone
 Whatever Name we call when we pray
 Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Lord, Buddha, Nanak, Christ the Lord
 Allah is great, so pray
 God is great and He is One, He is God for everyone
 Let us sing the song that God is One

Title: Sathya Sai Baba, Prema Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Baba, Prema Sai Baba, Shaanthi Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba
 Truth Sai Baba, Love Sai Baba, Peace Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba
 Truth in my mind, Love in my heart, Peace in my Soul, Om Sai Baba
 Sathya Sai Baba, Prema Sai Baba, Shaanthi Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba
 Truth in all things, Love for all Creation, Peace on our Earth, Om Sai Baba
 Sathya Sai Baba, Prema Sai Baba,
 Shaanthi Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba
 Om Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba, Light of the
 Universe, Om Sai Baba

Title: Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba
 Sathya, Sathya, Sathya Sai
 Baba, Baba, Om (count to 8)
 In Thy Hands I surrender my heart

Title: Sathya Sai Baba, the sound of Your name
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Baba, the sound of Your name
 Fire's my heart's love to a more potent flame
 All life is enriched by the blessings You bring
 Sweet Lord, Your love nourishes everything.
 Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Baba
 Bhagavaan, Lord of all, World Avathaar
 You've come to transform manking into light
 And planet earth to a sacred star.

Title: Sathya Sai es un ser
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Es Un Ser De Luz
Su Amor Inspira Al Cosmos
Con Su Aliento Nos Protege, Con Su Gracia Nos Libera
Cantemos Victoria A Nuestro Guru (2)
Meaning: Sathya Sai is the embodiment of light. His love inspires the cosmos. He protects us with His breath, frees us with His grace. Let's sing victory to our Guru.
Songglossary: guru, sai, sathya, un

Title: Sathya Sai Naamam Pavana Naamam
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Naamam Pavana Naamam
Munijana Sevitha Mohana Naamam [ Sathya Sai ]
Parama Punitham Mangala Naamam
Sundara Naamam Sumadhura Naamam
Tana Mana Ranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Dayaka Naamam
Meaning: The name of Lord Sathya Sai is Holy, the beautiful name, which the sages worshipped, the most auspicious and nectarine name, the name that exhilarates the body and mind, the name, which destroys the fears of the materialistic world and the one name, which bestows, Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.
Songglossary: bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, dayaka, dharma, mana, mangal, mohan, munijana, naam, param, pavan, prem, punitham, ranjana, sai, sathya, sevita, shanthi, sumadhura, sundara, tanaya

Title: Sathya Sai Paadambujam Bhajorey Manasa
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Paadambujam Bhajorey Manasa Nirantharam
Parama Pavitram Pavana Charanam
Kalimala Dahanam Sri Guru Charanam
Bhava Bhaya Nashana Duritha Nivarana
Parthi Pureeshwara Pankaja Charanam
Bhajorey Manasa Nirantharam
Bhajorey Manasa Nirantharam (2)
Meaning: Meditate incessantly upon the most holy and auspicious Lotus Feet of Lord Sathya Sai, the feet of the divine preceptor, which will eradicate the sins of this Kali age, the feet, which will destroy all the fears of this materialistic world and remove the obstacles.
Songglossary: bhajao, bhava, bhaya, chara, dahana, duritha, guru, kalimala, manasa, nasha, nirantara, nivarana, paada, pankaja, param, pavan, pavitra, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Sathya Sai Rama Hey Ghana
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Prema Sudha Baraso Shanthi Sudha Baraso [ Sathya Sai ... ]
Kali Yuga Mey Tum Yuga Avatari
Sathya Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai the most venerable one, shower on us your immense Love and bestow Peace upon us, Oh Lord of this Kali age.
Songglossary: avatar, baraso, ghana, hey, kali, prem, ram, sai, sathya, sham, shanthi, sudha, tum, yuga

Title: Sathya Sai Rama Shiva Shakthi
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Rama Shiva Shakthi Roopa
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Poorna Teja
Eshwaramba Nandana Sathya Narayana
Yuga Avatara Devadi Deva
Jaya Paramesha Parthi Pureesha
Hrudayeshwara Sayeeshwara
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai residing in Parthi and in the hearts of devotees, you are none other than Sathya Sai Rama, Oh Lord you are the personification of Shiva and Shakthi and the son of Eshwaramba Oh Lord Sathya Narayana, you are the incarnation of the Kali Age Oh Lord of Lords, Victory to you.
Songglossary: avatar, deva, devadi, dharma, eshwar, hrudayeshwara, jay, nanda, narayana, param, poorna, prem, pureesha, puttaparthi, ram, roopa, sai, sathya, sayee, shakthi, shanthi, shiva, teja, yuga

Title: Sathya Sai Sai Nama
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Sai Nama
 Rama Sai Krishna Sai Ranga Sai (Sathya Sai..)
 Rama Nama make me pure
 Krishna Nama sweet and sure (Sathya Sai.)
 Shiva Nama is Ego's Pyre
 Panduranga lights the Fire (Sathya Sai..)

Title: Sathya Sai Shiva Shambho Shankara
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Shiva Shambho Shankara
Neelakanta Sai Tejonmaya Roopa
Sadguru Satchidananda
Gowri Vara Hara Mruthyunjaya Shiva
Sathya Sanathana Mangala Dayaka
Sadguru Satchidananda
Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai, you are Lord Shiva (Also called, Shambho, Shankara, Neelakanta) and the personification of radiant effulgence. You bestow auspiciousness.
Songglossary: dayaka, gowri, hara, mangal, mruthyu, neela, roopa, sadguru, sai, sanatana, satchidananda, sathya, shambho, shankara, shiva, tejonmaya, vara

Title: Sathya Sai Smaranam Smaranam Parthi
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Smaranam Smaranam Parthi Sai Smaranam
Tribhuvana Palaka Sai Mahesha Sathya Sai Smaranam
Sri Guru Charanam Bhava Dukha Haranam
Sathya Sai Smaranam Smaranam
Sathya Sai Smaranam
Meaning: Constantly remember the name of Sathya Sai - the Lord of Parthi, the one who sustains all three worlds, chant the name of Sai Mahesha the one who removes all fears and sorrows of this materialistic world.
Songglossary: bhava, chara, dukh, guru, harana, mahesha, palaka, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, smaran, sri, tribhuvan

Title: Sathya Sai Thy Name so sweet
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Thy Name so sweet, Name so sweet
 Keep us always at Thy feet, at Thy feet
 Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram

Title: Sathya Sai Tumhara Charan Hai
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai Tumhara Charan Hai Rama Charan
Sathya Sai Tumhara Charan Hai Rama Charan Hai Krishna Charan
[ Sathya Sai ... ]
Jo Hi Roop Me Brahma Vishnu Vo Hi Roop Me Sai
Jo Hi Roop Me Rama Krishna Vo Hi Roop Me Sai
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: Lord Sathya Sai, Your holy feet are the same as Lord Rama's and Lord Krishna's. You are the personification of Brahma, Vishnu, Rama, and Krishna.
Songglossary: brahma, chara, hai, jo, krishna, ram, roopa, sai, sathya, tumhara, vishnu

Title: Sathya Sai we pray
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai we pray we will win Your grace today
Sathya Sai we pray we will live in love every way 
Baba, teach us how to live together 
Baba, teach us how to love forever 
Let us open our hearts to Thee 
Help us become what You want us to be (Sathya Sai... )
Let us give you our pure devotion 
Take us over the blissful ocean 
Grant us wisdom, and give us compassion 
Love is the answer, now what was the question? (Sathya Sai... )
Fill us with Your radiant light
Guide us to know what is right
Let us see the world through Your eyes
Make a temple of our lives (Sathya Sai... )

Title: Sathya Sai, hear our prayer
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, hear our prayer, Sathya Sai
 O Lord of Parthi we call out to You
 Sweet Lord of mercy, we call out You
 O Lord of Parthi, Enchanter of our minds,
 Sweet Lord of mercy, let our souls be Thine

Title: Sathya Sai, hear us calling
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai, hear us, hear us calling
 May we receive Your Grace and always feel You
 Passionate consuming Fire burn away all our cares
 We feel Your Presence as we surrender
 Joyfully, joyfully bowing down to thee
 Losing ourselves we touch Your fiery Heart

Title: Sathya Sai, You are my master
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai, You are my master
 You are my reason, You are my Love
 Will You keep me ever after, help me, help me, rise above
 Whether in Prashanthi Nilayam or in my home away from You
 Help me, help me feel Your presence in my heart, in all I do

Title: Sathya Sai, You are the Heart
Lyrics:
Sathya Sai, You are the Heart of the universe,
 You shine before our very eyes
 Lord Sai, You've come to grace our lives
 Sathya Sai, You are the Voice of the universe,
 You sing creation's song
 Lord Sai, You teach us to sing along
 Sathya Sai, You are the Eyes of the universe,
 You live within our souls
 Lord Sai, our freedom is Your goal
 Sathya Sai, You are the life of the universe, You
 teach us how to live
 Lord Sai, You teach us to forgive
 Sathya Sai, You are the Love of the universe,
 You fill the world with light
 Lord Sai, You've come to end our night
 Sathya Sai, You are the Soul of the universe,
 You've come to set us free
 Lord Sai, let us merge into Thee
 Let us merge into Thee (2X)

Title: Sathya Saishwara Parama Dayaghana
Lyrics:
Sathya Saishwara Parama Dayaghana
Sharanagatha Priya Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana [ Sathya Saishwara ... ]
Alakha Niranjana Asura Nikhandana
Jagadodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Parthipurishwara He Jaga Vandana He Jaga Vandana
Meaning: Supremely compassionate Lord Sai, dispels the fear of rebirth. He loves those who surrender to Him. He is pure and destroys out bad qualities. He is protector of the Universe and is adored by all.
Songglossary: akhanda, alakh, asura, bhaktha, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, dayaghana, jagadodhara, jagat, niranjan, param, parayana, partheeshwara, priya, saiyeeshwara, sathya, sharan, vandana

Title: Sathya Sanathana Nithya Niranjana Bhaktha
Lyrics:
Sathya Sanathana Nithya Niranjana Bhaktha Parayana Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana (2)
Narayana Sai Narayana
Parthi Purandara Narayana [ Govinda Govinda ]
Meaning: Oh Sai Narayana you are the in dweller of your devotees who chant your name at all times, you are personification of Truth and Purity.
Songglossary: bhaktha, govinda, narayana, niranjan, nithya, parayana, puran, puttaparthi, sai, sanatana, sathya

Title: Sathya Sanathani Sai Ma
Lyrics:
Sathya Sanathani Sai Ma
Shashwata Ananda Dayini Ma [ Sathya Sanathani ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Ma
Ashrta Palini Sai Ma
Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma [ Shashwata Ananda ... ]
Meaning: Mother Sai is the eternal truth. She grants perpetual bliss and freedom from fear, and protects the virtuous.
Songglossary: abhaya, anand, ashrta, dayini, ma, palini, sai, sanatana, sathya, shashwat

Title: Sathya Swaroopa Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Rama
Shri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Sai Rama [ Sathya Swaroopa ... ]
Parthipureeshwara He Parabrahma
Adi Narayana Param Dhama
Meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is the embodiment of truth. He is Lord Rama, Vishnu and eternal Brahman.
Songglossary: adi, dhama, jay, narayana, parabrahma, param, partheeshwara, ram, sai, sathya, sri, swaroopa

Title: Sathya Swaroopa Shri Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Sathya Swaroopa Shri Sai Rama
Dharma Swaroopa Dayabhirama
Shantha Swaroopa Sugunabhirama
Prema Swaroopa Prashanti Rama
Karuna Swaroopa Karunya Rama
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Rama (2)
Meaning: Lord Sai Rama is the personification of truth, righteousness, eternal peace, love and compassion. He is all-merciful.
Songglossary: dayabhi, dharma, karuna, prasanthi, prem, ram, sai, sathya, shantha, shanthi, sri, suguna, swaroopa

Title: Sathya Swaroopini Ma Sai Prema
Lyrics:
Sathya Swaroopini Ma Sai Prema Swaroopini Ma
Ananda Dayini Hrudaya Viharini Parthi Nivasini Ma (Param)
Vighna Vinashini Bhava Bhaya Harini Kaali Kapalini Ma
Hey Tribhuvana Palini Mangala Karini Moksha Pradayini Ma [ Ananda ]
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Mother Sai - the embodiment of truth and bliss, the one who showers joy, the one who is present in everyone's heart, the one who removes all obstacles, fear and sorrow, the one who protects and sustains all the three worlds and is the embodiment of auspiciousness and the one who leads us to the path of liberation.
Songglossary: anand, bhava, bhaya, dayini, dhari, haarini, hey, hrudaya, kaali, kaarini, kapalini, ma, mangal, moksha, nivasa, palini, param, pradaayini, prem, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, swaroopa, tribhuvan, vighna, vihara, vinashana

Title: Sathyam Dharmam Shanthi Prema
Lyrics:
Sathyam Dharmam Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Sathya Sai
 Tell the truth, never lie, says Sathya Sai
 Do what's right, never wrong, says Dharma Sai
 Peace within and without says Shanti Sai
 Love all men as God, says Prema Sai
 Sathyam Dharmam Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Sathya Sai
 Fill your heart with Love and You will see
 Service to the needy holds the key
 The key to the Love of the Lord
 The key to the grace of the Lord
 Service to the needy holds the key

Title: Sathyam Gnanam Anantham Brahma (3)
Lyrics:
Sathyam Gnanam Anantham Brahma (3)
Sathyam Brahma
Gnanam Brahma
Anantham Brahma
Meaning: Glory to You O Lord Sai who is the embodiment of Eternal Truth, Wisdom and Infinite.
Songglossary: ananta, brahma, gnana, sathya

Title: Satnam, Vahe Guru (3x)
Lyrics:
Satnam, Vahe Guru (3x)
Satnam, Vahe Guru (3x)
Satnam, Vahe Guru (3x)
Satnam, Vahe Guru (3x)
Rab Da Gun Gao Ram Da Naam Japo (2x)
Satnam Satnam Bol Vahe Guru Vahe Guru Bol (2x)

Title: Save your food for those who need
Lyrics:
Save your food for those who need
 Everything is divine
 Save your money for a selfless deed
 Everything is divine
 Oh Swami advises ceiling on desires
 (In Unison)
 Daily ... Remember ... Everything is divine
 Food is God and Money is God
 Everything is divine
 Energy is God and Time is God
 Everything is divine
 Oh Swami advises ceiling on desires
 (In Unison)
 Daily ... Remember ... Everything is divine (2X)
 Make your energy pure for man
 Everything is divine
 Fill your time with love for man
 Everything is divine
 Oh Swami advises ceiling on desires
 (In Unison)
 Daily ... Remember ... Everything is divine (2X)
 Desires take your life as fee
 Everything is divine
 Sacrifice will make you free
 Everything is divine
 Oh Swami advises ceiling on desires
 (In Unison)
 Daily ... Remember ... Everything is divine (2X)
 Oh Swami advises ceiling on desires (2X)
 (In Unison)
 Daily ... Remember ... Everything is divine (2X)

Title: Say the name of Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
Say the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
 Chant the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
 Praise the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
 Remember the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
 Honor the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
 Pray to the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
 Adore the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai

Title: Say the Name, say the Name
Lyrics:
Say the Name, say the Name, say the Name
 The holy Name can remove a mountain of blame
 Say the Name, say the Name, say the Name, say the Name
 Om Sai Ram, Hari Om Sai Ram
 Hari Om Sai Ram
 Say the Name, say the Name, Say the Name,
 Say the holy Name, say it with devotion
 Purify the heart, quiet the emotions
 It's the little raft that takes us 'cross the ocean
 Say the Name
 Om Sai Ram, Hari Om Sai Ram
 Hari Om Sai Ram
 Say the Name, say the Name, say the Name,
 Say the Name, say the Name, say the Name

Title: Sayeesha Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha
Lyrics:
Sayeesha Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha
Sathya Shivatmaka Sundara Esha [ Sayeesha ... ]
Tandava Rudra Sadashiva Sai
Karuna Sagara Raghava Sai
Gaana Manohara Madhava Sai
Buddhi Pradayaka Sambhava Sai
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai we surrender ourselves at your Lotus Feet. You are the most beautiful eternal and embodiment of all that is good and true. We surrender to you Oh Lord, you are the most enchanting Cosmic Dancer Oh Lord Sadashiva, you are the most compassionate one Oh Lord Raghava, you are the embodiment and connoisseur of all music Oh Lord Madhava, you who bestow wisdom Oh Lord Sambhava, we surrender completely to you.
Songglossary: buddhi, esha, gaan, karuna, madhava, manohar, pradayaka, raghava, rudra, sadashiva, sagar, sai, sambhava, sathya, sayee, sharan, shiva, sundara, tandava

Title: Sayeeshwara Jagadeeshwara
Lyrics:
Sayeeshwara Jagadeeshwara
Parameshwara Partheeshwara [ Sayeeshwara ]
Karunamaya Jaganmohana
Shaileshwara Bhuvaneshwara
Kailasa Natha Maheshwara
Meaning: This Bhajan extols the attributes of Lord Shiva who is none other than Lord Sai residing in Parthi. The attributes are Jagdeeshwara (of the entire universe), Karunamaya (the one with kindness), Jaganmohana (the most beautiful one), Shaileshwara, Kailasa Natha (the one whose abode is the mount Kailasa).
Songglossary: bhuvaneshwara, jagadeesha, jagan, kailasa, karuna, maheshwara, natha, param, partheeshwara, sayee, shaileshwara

Title: Sayeeshwaraya Om Namashivaya
Lyrics:
Sayeeshwaraya Om Namashivaya
Triloka palaya Namashivaya [Sayeeshwaraya...]
Kasi Vishweswara Namashivaya
Amarnath Swayambhoo Shivaya
Madurapuri Sundareshwaraya
Hrudayeshwaraya Sayeeshwaraya

Om Namashivaya Sai Shivaya (x3)
Meaning:
Prayers to our Lord Sayeeshwara and Lord Shiva the protector of the three worlds.
Prayers to Lord Shiva as Vishweshwara in Kasi, the self-created Shiva in Amarnath, Sundareshwara in Madura, and to our Lord Sayeeshwara who is the Lord in our hearts.

Title: Sayeeshwari Amba Bhuvaneshwari
Lyrics:
Sayeeshwari Amba Bhuvaneshwari
Partheeshwari Amba Parameshwari [ Sayeeshwari Amba ]
Omkara Roopini Akhileshwari
Uma Maheshwari Jagadeeshwari (Amba)
Meaning: Salutations to you mother Sayeeshwari residing in Parthi (called by other names such as, Bhuvaneshwari, Parameshwari, Akhileshwari, Maheshwari etc. ). You are the primordial sound of "Om" personified.
Songglossary: akhileshwara, amba, bhuvaneshwari, jagadeeshwari, maheshwari, om, param, partheeshwari, sayee, swaroopa, uma

Title: Sayeeshwari Amba Jagadeeshwari
Lyrics:
Sayeeshwari Amba Jagadeeshwari
Kalyani Kanchi Puri Kamakshi [ Sayeeshwari Amba ... ]
Partheeshwari Amba Parameshwari
Matangi Madura Puri Meenakshi
Meaning: Salutations to mother Sai whose abode is Parthi, who is the mother to this entire universe. She is also the presiding deity in Kanchi (by name Kamakshi) and Madhura (by name Meenakshi).
Songglossary: amba, jagadeeshwari, kalyan, kamakshi, kanchi, madura, matangi, meena, param, partheeshwari, puri, sayee

Title: Sayeeshwari Chandramukhi
Lyrics:
Sayeeshwari Chandramukhi
Sharanagatha Paripalini
Shashwata Ananda Dayini
Sharanam Sharanam Jaganmayi
Meaning: Glory to you Oh Mother Sayeeshwari who is as resplendent and beautiful as the moon, to the one who showers on all of us eternal bliss and joy. We Offer our humble surrender to you Oh mother Sai.
Songglossary: anand, chand, dayini, jagan, paripalini, sayee, sharan, shashwat

Title: Sayi Engal Annaiyam Sayi Engal
Lyrics:
Sayi Engal Annaiyam Sayi Engal Tandaiyam
Sayi Engal Sadguru (Sayi Engal Deivamam) (2) [ Sayi Engal ]
Allah Yeshu Mahavirum Sathya Sayi Ramanam
Buddha Zohrashtranum Sayi Avataranama
Brahma Vishnu Maheshanum Sathya Sayi Roopamam
Sarva Loka Nayakanam Sathya Sayi Devanam
Meaning: Sai is our mother, father, Sadguru, and God. Sai is all of the divine incarnations: Allah, Jesus, Mahavir, Buddha, and Zoroaster.
Songglossary: allah, amma, avatar, brahma, buddha, deivam, engal, loka, mahavir, mahesha, nayaka, ramana, roopa, sadguru, sai, sarva, sathya, tandai, vishnu, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Sayi Ramanin Namam Solvom
Lyrics:
Sayi Ramanin Namam Solvom
Pinigalum Vinaigalum Ningidume [ Sathya Sayi ... ]
Sathya Dharmamu Shanthi Premaiyum
Nittamum Manadil Nilai Pera Vendum
Siddiyum Perave Arul Puraivaye
Shirdi Parti Baba Sayi
Sayi Ram Sathya Sayi Ram (3)
Meaning: Let us chant the name of Sai Ram, so all our ills and troubles will pass. May truth, righteousness, peace, and love prevail in our minds forever. Grace us with Your blessings, O Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: arul, baba, dharma, mana, namam, nikkida, nilai, nittamum, pera, pinigalum, pozhiyum, prem, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sathya, shanthi, shirdi, siddhi, solvom, vendum, vinai

Title: Scatter the seeds of love
Lyrics:
Scatter the seeds of love on dreary desert hearts,
 Then love will sprout and grow
 And make the wasteland green with joy
 Blossoms of love will make the air more fragrant
 Rivers of love will murmur through the valleys
 And every bird will beat his wings
 And every child will sing a song of love
 Start the day with love, fill the day with love
 End the day with love dear children, for love brings happiness.

Title: Schma Israel, Adonai Elohenu
Lyrics:
Schma Israel, Adonai Elohenu, Adonai Echod
 Kyrie Eleison, Christe Eleison, Adonai Echod
 Allah Hu Akbar, Alhamdulilah, Adonai Echod
 Hear O Israel, the Lord our God, our Lord is One
 Our Holy Father, our Blessed Jesus, our Lord is One
 Our God Resplendent, all Glory to Him, our Lord is One

Title: Seek ye first the kingdom of God
Lyrics:
Seek ye first the kingdom of God, and its righteousness
 And all these things shall be added unto you, Allelu Alleluia
 Alleluia Alleluia, Alleluia Allelu Alleluia
 Ask and it shall be given unto you, seek and ye shall find
 Knock and the door shall be opened unto you, Allelu Alleluia
 Alleluia Alleluia, Alleluia Allelu Alleluia
 Senor Shiva, Padre Madre Shiva
 Corazon de azucar, piel azul
 Senor Shiva, Padre Madre Shiva
 Muestra mel camino, tengo que llegar
 Tengo que empesar, tengo que empesar
Meaning:
Lord Shiva, You are the Divine Father and Mother. Your heart is as sweet as sugar, and your neck is a
 beautiful blue hue. Show me the path so that I may reach - I must begin the journey

Title: Senor Senor Senor Shiva Nataraja
Lyrics:
Senor, Senor, Senor, Shiva Nataraja, Senor, Senor, Senor, ...
... Maha Sathya Sai
Shiva Nataraja, Shiva Nataraja, Shiva Nataraja, De Mi Corazon
Danza, Danza, Danza Senor, Al Son Del Tambor, Llename, Llename, ...
... Llename, De Amor
Meaning: Lord Shiva Nataraj, Maha Sathya Sai, is dear to my heart. Lord, dance to the beat of the drums, and fill me with your love.
Songglossary: maha, nataraj, sai, sathya, shiva, tambor

Title: Shaila Girishwara Uma Maheshwara Kashi
Lyrics:
Shaila Girishwara Uma Maheshwara Kashi Vishweshwara Sadashiva
Sadashiva Sadashiva
Sadashiva Shambho Sadashiva
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sadashiva who is also the Lord of Kashi (Also known as Benares) and the consort of Goddess Uma (Parvathi).
Songglossary: girisha, kashi, maheshwara, sadashiva, shaila, shambho, uma, vishweshwara

Title: Shaktheeshwari Jaya Sayeeshwari Jaya
Lyrics:
Shaktheeshwari Jaya Sayeeshwari Jaya
Kadambari Jaya Kameshwari Jaya [ Shaktheeshwari Jaya ... ]
Partheeshwari Paripalini Jaya Jaya (2)
Manava Roopini Mata Jaya Jaya
Meaning: Victory to Mother Sayeeshwari who is the embodiment of Shakthi, also known by other names such as Kadambari and Kameshwari, the one who is the Lord of Parthi and who protects the Universe.
Songglossary: jay, kadamba, kameshwari, manava, mata, paripalini, partheeshwari, sayee, shaktheeshwari, swaroopa

Title: Shakthi Swaroopini Sai Ma (Shiva)
Lyrics:
Shakthi Swaroopini Sai Ma (Shiva)
Chidananda Roopini Sai Ma [ Shiva Shakthi ]
Bhava Bhaya Harini Sai Ma
Bhakthodharini Sai Ma
Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma (2)
Meaning: Glory to Mother Sai who is the embodiment of Shakthi who destroys all fears and sorrows, who protects and uplifts Her devotees.
Songglossary: bhakthodhari, bhava, bhaya, chidananda, haarini, ma, sai, sathya, shakthi, shiva, swaroopa

Title: Shalom Aleichem Shalom Shalom
Lyrics:
Shalom Aleichem Shalom Aleichem Sha*lom Shalom
 Shalom Aleichem Shalom Aleichem Shalom Shalom
Meaning: This Hebrew song means we bring you peace and may be sung as a round.

Title: Shambho Mahadeva (3) (Shiva)
Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva (3) (Shiva)
Chandra Kaladhara Gangadhara
Gowri Vara Sundara
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shambho
Hara Hara Hara Shambho
Hara Gowri (Sathya Sai) Natha Shambho
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva - (who is also known as Mahadeva and Shambho) the one who adorns the crescent Moon on His Forehead and the sacred river Ganges in His Matted Locks, the one who is the consort of Gowri.
Songglossary: chand, ganga, gowri, hara, kaladhara, mahadev, natha, sai, sathya, shambho, shiva, sundara, vara

Title: Shambho Mahadeva Gangadhara
Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Gangadhara
Hara Hara Shankara Sadashiva [ Shambho Mahadeva ... ]
Chandrashekara Sayeeshwara
Sayeeshwara
Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara [ Chandrashekara ]
Sharanam Sharanam Shiva Shaktheeshwara
Meaning: Chant the names Lord Shiva (Also called Shambho, Mahadeva, Shankara and Sadashiva) - the One who adorns the crescent moon on His head and the sacred river Ganges in His Matted Locks. He is none other than the Lord Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: chand, ganga, hara, mahadev, sadashiva, sathya, sayee, shaktheeshwara, shambho, shankara, sharan, shiva

Title: Shambho Mahadeva Gangadhara
Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Gangadhara
Kailasa Vasa Shiva Shankara
Parvathi Ramana Parameshwara
Parathpara Jagadeeshwara
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shiva Shankara (Also known as Mahadeva) who holds the Sacred river, Ganges in His matted Locks and has made Mount Kailasa His abode, who is Higher than the Highest, the Lord of the Universe, the consort of Goddess Parvathi.
Songglossary: ganga, jagadeesha, kailasa, mahadev, param, parathpara, parvathi, ramana, shambho, shankara, shiva, vasa

Title: Shambho Mahadeva Mallikarjuna
Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Mallikarjuna
Mangala Charana Trilochana
Pinaka Paani Parvathi Ramana [ Shambho Mahadeva ... ]
Bhava Bhaya Harana Sanathana
Parthi Pureeshwara Patitha Pavana
Meaning: Our salutations at the sacred feet of Lord Shiva, (also known as Shambho, Mahadeva & Mallikarjuna) who wields the Bow (Pinaka), who is the consort of Parvathi, who destroys the fear of materialistic world and who is none other than Lord Sai of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, chara, harana, mahadev, mallikarjuna, mangal, paani, parvathi, patitha, pavan, pinaka, purishwara, puttaparthi, ramana, sanatana, shambho, trilochana

Title: Shambho Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Mahadeva
Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Mahadeva
Samba Sadashiva Sai Shankara Shambho Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Shambho Bhava Bhaya Hara Hara Shambho
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shambho Sathya Sayeeshwara Shambho
Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord who is worshipped in the form of Lord Shambho, Mahadeva, Shiva and Shankara.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, hara, mahadev, sadashiva, sai, samba, sathya, sayee, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Shambho Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Mahadeva
Lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Mahadeva
Hara Haraya Bhava Bhavaya Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Om Om Namah Shivaya Om
Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva who is also called as Shambho and Mahadeva, who destroys the fear of the materialistic world.
Songglossary: bhava, hara, mahadev, namah, om, shambho, shiva

Title: Shambho Murarey Shankara Murarey
Lyrics:
Shambho Murarey Shankara Murarey
Murahara Phani Dhara Shankara Murarey
Shambho Murarey Shankara Murarey [ Murahara Phani ]
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Shambho (Shankara), who is the slayer of the demon Mura and the One who adorns the serpent around HIS neck as an ornament.
Songglossary: dhara, murahara, murare, phani, shambho, shankara

Title: Shambho Nachey Maharaja
Lyrics:
Shambho Nachey Maharaja
Damaru Bhajey Nachey Nataraja [ Shambho Nachey ... ]
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Hari Om Hari Om Sai Om Sai Om
Hari Om Hari Om [ Hari Om Hari ... ]
Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva (Shambho) who is worshipped in the form of the cosmic dancer Nataraja, the eternal one who dances to the beat of the Damaru (Miniature Drum held by Lord. Shiva). Chant the name of Hari Om and Sai Om.
Songglossary: bhaja, damaru, hari, maharaj, nach, namah, nataraj, om, sai, shambho, shiva

Title: Shambho Shambho Shambho
Lyrics:
Shambho Shambho Shambho
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho [ Shambho Shambho ... ]
Neela Kanthaya Namasthey
Shoola Hastaaya Namasthey
Atma Lingaya Namasthey
Kshema Lingaya Namasthey
Prema Roopaya Namasthey ( Sai )
Meaning: I bow to You, the blue necked Lord Sai Shiva, who carries a trident and who self-manifests the auspicious Linga. Lord Sai is Love incarnate.
Songglossary: atma, hara, hasta, kantha, kshema, linga, namostuthey, neela, prem, roopa, sai, shambho, shiva, shoola

Title: Shambho Shambho Shankara Samba Sada
Lyrics:
Shambho Shambho Shankara Samba Sada Shiva
Ganga Jatadhara Kanaka Sabesha [ Shambho Shambho ... ]
Kailasa Vasa He Paramesha
Shiva Shakti Roopa Sai Sarvesha (2)
Meaning: Lord of Lord Sai resides in Mount Kailas. He is Lord Shiva and Mother Parvathi in one, wearing the Ganges in His matted hair.
Songglossary: ganga, jatadhara, kailasa, kanaka, kanaka-sabesha, param, roopa, sada, sai, samba, sarvesha, shakthi, shambho, shankara, shiva, vasa

Title: Shambho Shankara Deva
Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Deva
Bholey ( Sai ) Baba Mahadeva
Paahi Prabho Sharanam Deva (2) [ Bholey ( Sai ) Baba ]
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (3) [ Bholey ( Sai ) Baba ]
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (3)
Meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Shiva (Also known as Shambho Shankara and Mahadeva). Sing the Glory of Lord Sai who is the Avatar of Lord Shiva. We offer our salutations to you and surrender to you Oh Lord.
Songglossary: baba, bhole, deva, ganga, hara, mahadev, paahi, prabhu, sai, shambho, shankara, sharan

Title: Shambho Shankara Parvathi Ramana Pashupathi
Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Parvathi Ramana Pashupathi Paramesha
Chandra Chuda Dhara Chandra Kaladhara
Gangadhara Shambho
Meaning: Obeisance to Lord Shiva who is also known as (Shambho Shankara and Paramesha)to the one who is the consort of mother Parvathi, who is as effulgent as the Moon and who holds the mighty Ganges in His matted locks.
Songglossary: chand, chuda, dhara, ganga, kaladhara, param, parvathi, pashu, ramana, shambho, shankara

Title: Shambho Shankara Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Sadashiva
Chandra Kaladhara Hara Ganga Dhara [ Shambho Shankara ... ]
Parvathi Ramana Parameshwara
Parameshwara Parameshwara [ Parvathi Ramana ]
Parthi Pureesha Prabhu Sayeesha
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai of Parthi who is none other than Lord Shiva (Shambho, Shankara Sadashiva), to the one who holds the crescent Moon on His head and the mighty Ganges in His matted Locks, to the one who is the consort of mother Parvathi and the Lord of the Universe.
Songglossary: chand, dhara, ganga, hara, kaladhara, param, parvathi, prabhu, pureesha, puttaparthi, ramana, sadashiva, sayee, shambho, shankara

Title: Shambho Shankara Sai Shiva
Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Sai Shiva
Samba Sadashiva Sarvesha
Ganga Jatadhara Shashidhara Shankara
Nithya Lola Kailasa Vasa
Meaning: We pray to Lord Shambho Shankara who is also worshipped as Samba Sadashiva. We surrender to the one who holds the mighty Ganges in His matted locks, the one who holds the crescent Moon on His head, the one whose abode is mount Kailasa.
Songglossary: ganga, jatadhara, kailasa, lola, nithya, sadashiva, sai, samba, sarvesha, shambho, shankara, shashi, shiva, vasa

Title: Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva
Sai Shankara Shambho Sai Shankara Shambho
Girija Shankara Hara Hara Shiva Shiva [ Sai Shankara ... ]
Meaning: Chant the names of Shiva, the beautiful divine dancer who wears the Ganges in His matted hair. Bow to the Supreme Lord Sai who resides in Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: girija, hara, sadashiva, sai, samba, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Shambho Shankara Shiva Shambho Shankara
Lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Shiva Shambho Shankara
Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva Shambho Shankara
Parthi Nayaka Paramesha Paahi Maam (2) [ Shambho Shankara ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai, who is none other than Shambho, Shiva, Shankara, Sadashiva and Paramesha (All names of Shiva).
Songglossary: maam, nayaka, paahi, param, puttaparthi, sadashiva, samba, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Shambho Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Shambho Shiva Shankara
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva [ Shambho Shiva ... ]
Hara Hara Mahadeva Kailasa Vasa
Partheesha Paramesha Paahi Prabho
Meaning: Protect us Oh Lord Partheesha (Who is none other than Lord Shiva who is also called by names such as, Shambho, Shiva, Shankara, Mahadeva and Paramesha), living on the mount Kailasa and supporting sacred river Ganga on your head.
Songglossary: ganga, gowri, hara, kailasa, mahadev, paahi, param, partheeshwara, prabhu, shambho, shankara, shiva, vasa

Title: Shambhu Kumara Gajanana
Lyrics:
Shambhu Kumara Gajanana
Shankari Tanaya Gajanana
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
Ambuja Lochana Gajanana
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Gajanana son of Lord Shiva (Shambho) and Mother Parvathi (Shankari, Ambika). His eyes are of the shape of Lotus.
Songglossary: amba, ambuja, gajamukha, kumara, lochana, shambho, shankari, tanaya

Title: Shambhu Kumara Gowri Tanaya
Lyrics:
Shambhu Kumara Gowri Tanaya
Gajanana Sadaya Jaya Jaya
Varada Ganesha Duritha Vinasha
Pranava Kaara Natha Sadaya [ Gajanana Sadaya ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesha the son of Lord Shiva (Shambhu) and Parvathi (Gowri), who grants boons, destroys obstacles and who is personification of the Primordial sound "Om".
Songglossary: duritha, gajamukha, ganesha, gowri, jay, kaara, kumara, natha, pranava, sadaya, shambho, tanaya, varada, vinasha

Title: Shambhu Kumara Haro Hara Shiva
Lyrics:
Shambhu Kumara Haro Hara Shiva Shankari Bala Haro Hara
Uma Sutha Shanmukha Guha
Shiva Sharavana Bhava Haro Hara
Palani Girisha Haro Hara Puttaparthi Pureesha Haro Hara
Hara Hara Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva [ Shiva Sharavana ... ]
Meaning: Worship Lord Kumara residing on the hills of Palani, the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi. He is none other than Lord Sai whose abode is Puttaparthi.
Songglossary: bala, bhava, girisha, guha, hara, harana, kumara, palani, pureesha, puttaparthi, shambho, shankari, shanmukha, sharavana, shiva, sutha, uma

Title: Shankara Abhayankara
Lyrics:
Shankara Abhayankara
Daya Nidhey Manohara [ Shankara ]
Saama Gaana Priyakara
Sai Jaga Vandana
Parameshwara Maheshwara
Sabha Pathey (Krupa Nidhey) Manohara
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shankara who dispels all fears, the one who is the Ocean of mercy, the one who is most beautiful and the one who loves music. We offer our salutations to the Lord of the Universe Lord Sai.
Songglossary: abhaya, daya, gaan, jagat, krupa, maheshwara, manohar, nidhey, param, pathey, priya, sabha, sai, sama, shankara, vandana

Title: Shankara Naama Bhajo
Lyrics:
Shankara Naama Bhajo
Shankara Shankara Naama Bhajo (3) [ Shankara Naama ... ]
Peetambara Dhara Sai Shankara
Chandra Kalaa Dhara Gowri Manohara
Meaning: Chant the Name of Lord Shankara the consort of Gowri, the one who adorns the yellow dress (Peetambara) and has the crescent Moon on the head.
Songglossary: bhaja, chand, dhara, gowri, kala, manohar, naam, peetambara, sai, shankara

Title: Shankara Roopa Sajjana Vanditha Sai
Lyrics:
Shankara Roopa Sajjana Vanditha Sai Rama Namostuthey
Raghupathi Roopa Ramya Charitha Sai Rama Namostuthey
Keshava Roopa Klesha Vinashaka Sai Rama Namostuthey
Adbhuta Charitha Anjaneya Aartha Rakshaka Namostuthey
Sarvaadhara Sadhu Janavana Sai Rama Namostuthey
Nirvikara Nirupama Charitha Sai Rama Namostuthey
Meaning: We sing in praise of Lord Sai Rama who is the embodiment of Lord Shankara and who is worshipped by all noble being. He is the embodiment of Lord Rama who has unblemished character, HE is the embodiment of Lord Keshava who destroys all obstacles and the one who is the Lord of Hanuman who is the protector of all beings. We offer our salutations to You Oh Lord Sai Rama the protector of the Universe and the one adored by the saints, the one who is worshipped as the Formless one.
Songglossary: aartha, adbhuta, charitha, hanuman, janavana, kesha, klesha, namostuthey, nirupama, nirvikara, raghu, raksha, ram, ramya, roopa, sadhu, sai, sajjan, sarva, shankara, vanditha, vinasha

Title: Shankara Sadashiva Chandrashekara
Lyrics:
Shankara Sadashiva Chandrashekara
Chandrashekara Sai Shankara [ Shankara Sadashiva ... ]
Neelakanta Shooladhari Sai Shankara
Phaala Netra Tripura Haari Sai Shankara
Chandrashekara Sai Shankara
Meaning: Obeisance to Lord Sai who is none other than Shankara (Sadashiva), the One who holds the crescent moon on His head. He is also known as Neelakanta, as His throat is blue in color (due to the poison He swallowed during the conflict between Gods and demons), Salutations to the one who holds the Trident and who has the Third Eye on HIS forehead and who has slayed the demon Tripura.
Songglossary: chand, harana, neela, nethra, paalaya, sadashiva, sai, shankara, shoola, tripura

Title: Shankara Sadashiva Sabha Pathey Manohara
Lyrics:
Shankara Sadashiva Sabha Pathey Manohara
Chandrashekara Jatadhara Uma Maheshwara
Shankara Sadashiva Sabha Pathey Manohara
Chandrashekara Jatadhara Uma Maheshwara (2)
Shankara Sadashiva
Sabhapathey Manohara
Chandrashekara Chandrashekara
Chandrashekara Jatadhara Uma Maheshwara
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara (Sadashiva) the Consort of Sabha (Daughter of King Daksha Prajapathi), to the one who holds the crescent moon in HIS matted hair. We offer our humble salutations to Uma Maheshwara (Consort of Goddess Uma). {Lord Shiva's Consort Parvathi has several other names like Uma, Bhavani, Dakshayani, Sabha, Gowri etc.}
Songglossary: chand, jatadhara, maheshwara, manohar, pathey, sabha, sadashiva, shankara, uma

Title: Shankara Sadashiva Shiva Shiva Shambho
Lyrics:
Shankara Sadashiva Shiva Shiva Shambho
Chandrashekara Hara Hara Hara Shambho [ Shankara Sadashiva ]
Bhasma Bhooshitanga Sai Shiva Shiva Shambho
Bala Shashi Vibhushana Hara Hara Shambho
Omkara Roopa Sai Shiva Shiva Shambho
Om Namah Shivaya Hara Hara Shambho
(Om Namah Shivaya) X 4
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva, (Shambho) who is adorned with sacred ash and has crescent of moon on HIS head, who is the Primordial "Om" personified.
Songglossary: bala, bhasma, bhooshita, bushan, chand, hara, namah, om, roopa, sadashiva, sai, shambho, shankara, shashi, shiva

Title: Shankara Samba Shiva Hara Hara
Lyrics:
Shankara Samba Shiva Hara Hara
Shankara Samba Shiva [ Shankara Samba ... ]
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Mahesha
Chandra Kaladhara Hey Paramesha
Kailasa Vasa Kashi Pathey
Karuna Sagara Parthi Pathey
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shankara (Samba Shiva) the one who holds the mighty Ganges in His Locks, the Lord of Kashi (The City of Banaras where He is adored as Lord Viswanath), the ocean of compassion and mercy, the Lord of Parthi, we pray and offer our salutations to you.
Songglossary: chand, ganga, gowri, hara, hey, jatadhara, kailasa, kaladhara, karuna, kashi, mahesha, param, pathey, puttaparthi, sagar, samba, shankara, shiva, vasa

Title: Shankara Shankara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara
Shankari Manohara
Parvathi Nayaka
Paahi Gangadhara
Pankaja Lochana
Pannaga Bhooshana
Chandrabimba Mukha
Chandrashekara Harey
Jai Jai Shankara Hara Hara Shankara (6)
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shankara, the consort of Mother Shankari (Parvathi) and the One who holds the Ganges in His Locks, who is as beautiful as the Moon and has Lotus eyes, who adorns serpents as ornaments and who holds the crescent Moon, We pray and offer our salutations to Thee.
Songglossary: bhooshan, chand, ganga, hara, hari, jai, lochana, manohar, mukha, nayaka, paahi, pankaja, pannaga, parvathi, shankara, shankari

Title: Shankara Shankara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara
Sai Shankara
Naada Shareera Vedodhara
Kali Yuga Avatara Sai
Hara Shiva Shankara Sai Shiva Shiva Shankara Sai
Chandrashekara Sai Parthi Shankara Sai
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Shankara who is the embodiment of Music and the Vedas who have taken the form of Sai in this age of Kali, we hail victory to you and offer our salutations to you Oh Sai.
Songglossary: avatar, chand, hara, kali, naada, puttaparthi, sai, shankara, shareera, shiva, vedodhara, yuga

Title: Shankara Shankara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara
Shambho Shankara Sayeeshwara [ Shankara ... ]
Ganga Jatadhara Shankara
Gowri Manohara Shankara
Shankara Shankara
Girija Ramana Shiva Shambho
Hara Hara Hara Hara Hara Shambho
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shankara who holds the mighty Ganges in His Matted Locks, who is the consort of Mother Gowri (Girija).
Songglossary: ganga, girija, gowri, hara, jatadhara, manohar, ramana, sayee, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Shankara Shankara Chandrashekara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Chandrashekara
Chandramouli Shankara Shambho Shankara (2)
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara
Paapa Vimochana Shashi Shekara
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Shankara
Parthi Puri Shankara Shambho Shankara (2)
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara (also known as Chandramouli and Shambho) the one who holds the Ganges in His Locks, the one who is worshipped as the consort of Mother Gowri, the one who holds the crescent Moon on His head and to the Sai Shankara who creates the sacred Lingam.
Songglossary: chand, ganga, gowri, jatadhara, lingodbhava, paapa, puri, puttaparthi, sai, shambho, shankara, shashi, shekara, vimochana

Title: Shankara Shankara Chandrashekara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Chandrashekara
Hara Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shiva Chandrashekara [ Shankara ... ]
Neelakanta Shooladhari Chandrashekara
Brihadheeshwara Shaileshwara Chandrashekara
Shirdeeshwara Partheeshwara Sayeeshwara
Jagadheeshwara Hrudayeshwara Sayeeshwara
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shankara, the blue-throated one who is adorned with the moon on His head and the Trident. He is the Lord Brihadheeshwara of Tanjore and the Lord of the mountains. He is verily our Lord Sai of Shirdi and Puttaparthi who is the master of this universe as well as our hearts.

Title: Shankara Shankara Sadashiva
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Sadashiva
Sadashiva Hey Samba Shiva [ Shankara ... ]
Amba Sahita Samba Shiva
Samba Shiva Sai Sarveshwara
Meaning: Pray to the Universal Lord Shankara (Sadashiva) who is always with Mother Amba (Parvathi).
Songglossary: amba, hey, sadashiva, sahita, sai, samba, sarvesha, shankara, shiva

Title: Shankara Shankara Sai Shankara Jaya
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Sai Shankara Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Om
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva (Shiva Sai) Om
Shirdi Mahesha Shiva Paramesha Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Om
Jaya Jaya Shiva Sai Om
Parthi Mahesha Pranavakara Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Om
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva (Shiva Sai) Om
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva ( Sai ) Om (3)
Shiva Om Sai Om (2)
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shankara (Shiva) who is the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: jay, mahesha, om, param, pranava, puttaparthi, sai, shankara, shirdi, shiva

Title: Shankara Shankara Samba Shiva
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Samba Shiva
Samba Sadashiva Sai Shiva [ Shankara ... ]
Chandramouli Sadashiva
Sadguru Sathya Sai Shiva
Meaning: Salutations to You Oh Lord Shankara (also known as Samba Shiva) who is worshipped as Sadashiva and Chandramouli we offer our salutations to you Oh Lord and universal Preceptor Sathya Sai Shiva.
Songglossary: chand, sadashiva, sadguru, sai, samba, sathya, shankara, shiva

Title: Shankara Shankara Shankara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Shankara
Shankara Abhayankara
Paahi Maam Krupakara
Paahi Maam Sayeeshwara
Meaning: We seek your protection Oh Lord Sai who in the form of Lord Shankara gives succor to all.
Songglossary: abhaya, krupa, maam, paahi, sayee, shankara

Title: Shankara Shankara Shankara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Shankara Shankara Shambho Shankara
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho Shiva Shiva Hara Shambho
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho 
Shambho Shankara Sayeesha
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Dhari
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho |Shambho Shankara...|
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva (with other names like Shambho, Shankara), the one who is armed with the Trident and with the third eye on His forehead.

Title: Shankara Shankara Shankara Shankara Shambho
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Shankara Shankara Shambho Shankara
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho Shiva Shiva Hara Shambho
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho
Shambho Shankara Sayeesha
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Dhari
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho [ Shambho Shankara ... ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva (with other names like Shambho, Shankara), the one who is armed with the Trident and with the third eye on His forehead.
Songglossary: dhari, hara, sayee, shambho, shankara, shiva, trinetra, trishoola

Title: Shankara Shankara Shankara Shiva Shambho
Lyrics:
Shankara Shankara Shankara Shiva Shambho (4x)
Shiva Shambho Shiva Shambho Shiva Shambho Shiva Shambho (2x)
Meaning: This bhajan is in praise of Divine Lord Shiva, who is auspiciousness himself.
GeneralComments: This is a unison bhajan.

Title: Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Roopa Maheshwara Sai
Shankara Shankara Shankara Sai
Omkara Priya Shiva Shankara Sai
Kailasa Priya Shiva Shankara Sai
Nata Jana Priya Shiva Shankara Sai [ Shankara Shankara ]
Meaning: Salutations to You Oh Sai who is the embodiment of Lord Shiva (with other names like Shankara and Maheshwara), the one who is worshipped as the  personification of Primordial "Om", the one who is dear to the devotees and whose abode is the Holy mountains of Kailasa.
Songglossary: jana, kailasa, maheshwara, nata, om, priya, roopa, sai, shankara, shiva

Title: Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Sai Shankar
Parthi Ke Tum Ho Nivasi
Kailas Ke Tum Ho Nivasi [ Shankara Shiva ]
Shankara Roop Se Tum Ne Aya Gangadhari Tum Ho Swami
Gangadhari Tum Ho Sai
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you have Parthi and Kailasa as your abodes, you are none other than Lord Shiva (Shankara) with the sacred Ganges on your head.
Songglossary: aya, ganga, ho, kailasa, ke, nivasi, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, se, shankara, shiva, swami, tum

Title: Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Shambho
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shambho Mahadeva [ Shankara ... ]
Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey Shankara Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bhajey
( Hara ) Hara Bholey Natha Shambho Hara Sai Natha Shambho
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara, also known as Shiva and Shambho who dances to the sound of Damaru (The miniature drum in His hand) and the ringing of bells. Chant the name of Sai Natha Shambho.
Songglossary: bhaja, bhole, dama, damaru, ghana, ghanta, hara, mahadev, natha, sai, shambho, shankara, shiva

Title: Shankaram Bhajey Jai Jai Shankaram
Lyrics:
Shankaram Bhajey Jai Jai Shankaram Bhajey
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Shankaram Bhajey
Sadgurum Bhajey Jai Sadgurum Bhajey
Satchidananda Guru Sadgurum Bhajey
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai whose abode is Parthi, who is none other than Lord Shankara. Chant the name of the Universal Preceptor who is the embodiment of bliss.
Songglossary: bhaja, deva, guru, jai, puttaparthi, sadguru, sai, satchidananda, shankara, vasa

Title: Shankaram Bhajey Shankaram Bhajey
Lyrics:
Shankaram Bhajey Shankaram Bhajey
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Shankaram Bhajey
Sadgurum Bhajey Sadgurum Bhajey
Satchidananda Guru Sadguru Bhajey
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai whose abode is Parthi, who is none other than Lord Shankara, chant the name of the Universal Preceptor who is the embodiment of bliss.
Songglossary: bhaja, deva, guru, puttaparthi, sadguru, sai, satchidananda, shankara, vasa

Title: Shankaraya Namah Shivaya
Lyrics:
Shankaraya Namah Shivaya
Sadashivaya Namah Shivaya [ Shankaraya ... ]
Uma Varaya Namah Shivaya
Omkaraya Namah Shivaya (2)
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara, Sadashiva who is the consort of Mother Uma. Lord Shiva who is the embodiment of the Primordial Sound.
Songglossary: namah, om, omkaraya, sadashiva, shankara, shiva, uma, varaya

Title: Shankari Bhaktha Vashankari Ma
Lyrics:
Shankari Bhaktha Vashankari Ma
Sankata Haarini Sai Ma
Pranava Swaroopini Prema Dayini
Parthi Pureeshwari Paalaya Maam
Mangala Kaarini Manjula Bhaashini
Prema Dayini Sai Ma
Sai Ma (Sathya) Sai Ma
Meaning: Salutations to Mother Shankari, who is the remover of obstacles, Mother Sai who is the embodiment of Love and the Primordial Sound "OM" and the Lord of Parthi and who bestows auspiciousness and Love.
Songglossary: bhaashi, bhaktha, dayini, haarini, kaari, ma, maam, mangal, manjula, paalaya, pranava, prem, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, sankata, sathya, shankari, swaroopa, vashankari

Title: Shankha Chakra Dhara Sai Krishna
Lyrics:
Shankha Chakra Dhara Sai Krishna
Shyamala Komala Murali Krishna [ Shankha ... ]
Radha Lola Raasa Vilola
Ranga Ranga Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala (2)
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna who is the beloved of Radha. He is dark complexioned and soft natured, with a Conch and Disc in each hand. He is none other than Sai who is also Vittala.
Songglossary: chakra, dhara, komala, krishna, lola, murali, raasa, radha, ranga, sai, sham, shankha, vilola, vittala

Title: Shankha Chakra Peetambara Dhari
Lyrics:
Shankha Chakra Peetambara Dhari Karuna Sagara Rama Murari
Shankha Chakra Peetambara Dhari Karuna Sagara Krishna Murari
Shankha Chakra Peetambara Dhari Karuna Sagara Sai Murari
Meaning: Glory to the Lord, who bears the Conch and Disc and who wears the peacock crown. Glory to the ever merciful Lord Rama, Krishna and Sai.
Songglossary: chakra, dhari, karuna, krishna, murare, peetambara, ram, sagar, sai, shankha

Title: Shanmukha Shanmukha Sai Sundara
Lyrics:
Shanmukha Shanmukha Sai Sundara
Shiva (Guru) Sharavana Bhava Om
Mangala Gowri Shankari Nandana [ Shiva (Guru) ]
Parthi Vihari Pranava Kaari [ Shiva (Guru) ]
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who resides in Parthi and who is the personification of the primordial sound "Om", is worshipped as Lord Shanmukha and as the Guru, who is the blessed son of Mother Gowri and Lord Shankara.
Songglossary: bhava, gowri, guru, kaari, mangal, nanda, om, pranava, puttaparthi, sai, shankari, shanmukha, sharavana, shiva, sundara, vihar

Title: Shantha Durge Shanthi Svarupini
Lyrics:
Shantha Durge Shanthi Svarupini
Shyamala Komala Mana Mohini [ Shantha Durge ... ]
Mangala Dayini Madhura Vani
Gita Vinodini Sai Janani
Meaning: The loving form of Goddess Durga, the embodiment of peace, captivates our hearts and pervades the beginning the end, and the entire universe. She liberates us from the bondage of worldly existence.
Songglossary: dayini, durge, gita, janani, komala, madhu, mana, mangal, mohan, sai, sham, shantha, shanthi, swaroopa, vani, vinodini

Title: Shantha Durge Shanthi Swaroopini
Lyrics:
Shantha Durge Shanthi Swaroopini
Shyamala Komala Mana Mohini [ Shantha Durge ... ]
Adi Anadi Anantha Swaroopini
Moksha Pradayini Narayani (2)
Meaning: This Bhajan extols Mother Durga whose attributes are, Peaceful appearance, attractive dark complexioned soft features, the embodiment of a form all pervading without beginning and end and the one who liberates us from the cycle of Birth and Death.
Songglossary: adi, anadi, ananta, dayini, durge, komala, mana, mohan, moksha, narayani, sham, shantha, shanthi, swaroopa

Title: Sharadey He Sukha Paani
Lyrics:
Sharadey He Sukha Paani
Bharati Janani Bhagya Vidayini [ Sharadey He ... ]
Mangala Dayini Madhura Vani
Gita Vinodini Sai Janani
Meaning: Mother Sarasvati, the Goddess of knowledge, whose speech is sweet, auspicious, and bestows fortune is Mother Sai, the creator of enchanting music.
Songglossary: bhagya, bharati, dayini, gita, janani, madhu, mangal, paani, sai, sharade, sukh, vani, vinodini

Title: Sharadey Jaya Sharadey Vaagvilasini Sharadey
Lyrics:
Sharadey Jaya Sharadey Vaagvilasini Sharadey
Sharadey Jaya Sharadey Vidya Daayini Sharadey
Sharadey Jaya Sharadey Veda Mata Sharadey
Veda Mata Sharadey
Meaning: Glory and Victory to Mother Sharada who resides in our speech, who is the embodiment of knowledge, who is the mother of all Vedas.
Songglossary: daayi, jay, mata, sharade, vaagvilasini, veda, vidya

Title: Sharana Bina Shanthi Nahi
Lyrics:
Sharana Bina Shanthi Nahi
Shankara Sai Shankara
Nama Bina Paramananda Nahi
Nama Bhajore Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (5)
Meaning: There is no peace (of mind) without surrendering at the lotus feet of Lord Shiva Shankara. There is no supreme happiness without reciting the name of Lord Sai Shankara, or bowing to Him (Shiva)
Songglossary: bhajao, bina, naam, nahi, namah, om, param, sai, shankara, shanthi, sharan, shiva

Title: Sharanagatha Sai Paapa Haro
Lyrics:
Sharanagatha Sai Paapa Haro
Sadguru Eshwara Kalpataru [ Sharanagatha Sai ... ]
Deena Bandhava Tum Bhakto Ke
Abhaya Pradayaka Dasa Jano Ke (2)
Meaning: Surrender to Sai and be rid of your sins. He, the Supreme teacher and Lord, protects His devotees, and fulfills their wishes.
Songglossary: abhaya, bandha, bhakthon, dasa, deen, eshwar, harana, jana, kalpa, ke, paapa, pradayaka, sadguru, sai, sharan, tum

Title: Sharanam Guru Deva
Lyrics:
Sharanam Guru Deva
Sharanam Sai Deva [ Sharanam ... ]
Mata Pitha Guru Deva
Bandhu Sakha Sai Deva
Sab Ka Malik Sai Deva
Satchidananda Guru Sai Deva
Meaning: Surrender to Sai who is our Preceptor, Mother, Father, Friend and Relation. He is the Lord of all Faiths, He is Being (Sath), Awareness (Chith) and Bliss (Ananda).
Songglossary: bandhava, deva, guru, ka, malik, mata, pitha, sab, sai, sakha, satchidananda, sharan

Title: Sharanam Sharanam Paahi Gajananam
Lyrics:
Sharanam Sharanam Paahi Gajananam
Vighna Vinashaka Gananatham
Buddhi Pradayaka Paahi Gajananam
Asura Nikhandana Paahi Gajananam
Paahi Gajananam Paahi Gajananam [ Vighna Vinashaka ]
Meaning: Surrender to Lord Gajanana, who removes and destroys all obstacles in our path to salvation, the one who bestows wisdom, the one who destroys all the demonic qualities within us.
Songglossary: akhanda, asura, buddhi, gajamukha, gananatha, paahi, pradayaka, sharan, vighna, vinasha

Title: Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha Sharanam
Lyrics:
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha Sharanam
Sri Guru Mama Guru Sadguru Sai Guru [ Sharanam Sharanam ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopalam
Shanthi Nivasam Guru Deva Sharanam (Pra)
Meaning: Surrender to our Lord Sai who is our Divine Preceptor, whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi.
Songglossary: deva, gopal, guru, mama, nivasa, purishwara, puttaparthi, sadguru, sai, sayee, shanthi, sharan, sri

Title: Sharavana Bhava Guha Shiva Shakthi
Lyrics:
Sharavana Bhava Guha Shiva Shakthi Bala
Shanmukha Natha Vadivela
Kanda Kumara Karthikeya
Subrahmanya Deva Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: Sharavana is another name for Shiva and Parvathi's son who is also called, Shanmukha, Muruga, Kanda, Kumara, Karthikeya and Subrahmanya Deva. He is none other than Lord Sai.
Songglossary: bala, bhagawan, bhava, deva, guha, kanda, karthikeya, kumara, natha, sai, shakthi, shanmukha, sharavana, shiva, subramanya, vadivel

Title: Sharavana Bhava Sri Shanmukha Natha
Lyrics:
Sharavana Bhava Sri Shanmukha Natha
Hara Hara Hara Hara Harom Hara
Gowri Nandana Harom Hara
Gangadhara Sutha Harom Hara
Palani Girisha Parthi Pureesha
Sai Natha Harom Hara (3)
Meaning: This Bhajan is in praise of Lord Shanmukha (also called Muruga, Kumara), the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi. His abode is on top of Palani Hills. Our obeisance to HIM.
Songglossary: bhava, ganga, girisha, gowri, hara, nanda, natha, palani, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai, shanmukha, sharavana, sri, sutha

Title: Sharavana Bhavaney Shanmukha
Lyrics:
Sharavana Bhavaney Shanmukha
Velayuda Vel Muruga [ Sharavana Bhavaney ]
Valli Natha Karthikeya
Karuna Sagara Kumara Guruvara
Mayura Vahana Muruga Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Parthi ( Sai ) Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Muruga ( Sai ) Natha (5)
Meaning: This Bhajan is in praise of Lord Shanmukha (also called Muruga, Kumara), the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi. He is extolled as the one who is armed with divine Spear and accompanied by HIS consort Valli, a compassionate Lord riding on Peacock. We seek HIS blessings. Our salutations to Lord Sai Natha.
Songglossary: bhava, guru, karthikeya, karuna, kumara, mayur, natha, puttaparthi, sagar, sai, shanmukha, sharan, sharavana, subramanya, vahana, valli, vel, velayuda

Title: Shata Baar Kaho Rey Sai
Lyrics:
Shata Baar Kaho Rey Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Hey Mangala Nayana Ram Hey Gopi Jeevana Shyam
Hey Shirdi Ke Bhagawan Hey Prashanthi Nilaya Ram
Shata Koti Namana Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Meaning: Our innumerable Salutations to Sairam, to the one whose look is the most auspicious one and who is the life giver to Gopikas. Let us chant HIS name million times.
Songglossary: baar-baar, bhagawan, gopi, hey, jeeva, kaho, ke, koti, mangal, naman, nayan, nilaya, prashanthi, ram, sai, sham, shata, shirdi

Title: Shata Koti Pranam Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Shata Koti Pranam Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Paapa Vimochana Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Hey Mangala Pavana Naam Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Man Mandir Hey Tera Dhaam Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (4)
Meaning: We offer our million salutations to you Oh Lord Sairam, to the one who destroys all our sins, whose name is the most beautiful and auspicious. Lord Sai resides in our hearts.
Songglossary: dhaam, hey, koti, mana, mandir, mangal, naam, paapa, pavan, pranamami, ram, sai, shata, tera, vimochana

Title: Sheetala Charanam Komala Charanam Manjula
Lyrics:
Sheetala Charanam Komala Charanam Manjula Charanam Mama Guru Charanam
Mrudula Charanam Anugraha Charanam
Sadguru Charanam Sada Smarami
Prem Daata Sai Guru Natha
Pavana Charanam Sada Bhajami
Meaning: The feet of my preceptor are cold and soft, they are tender to touch and they are full of grace. Let us all meditate and offer our prayers to these holy feet, which always shower love and grace.
Songglossary: anugraha, bhaja, chara, daata, guru, komala, mama, manjula, mrudu, natha, pavan, prem, sada, sadguru, sai, sheetala, smaran

Title: Shesha Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Shesha Sai Narayana
Vasudeva Narayana
Paasha Nashana Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sathya) Narayana
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana (3)
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Narayana who is worshipped as Sesha Sai, Vasudeva, Hari and Lord Sathya Narayana who destroys all our sins.
Songglossary: hari, narayana, nasha, paasha, sai, sathya, shesha, vasudeva

Title: Shesha Shaila Vasa Narayana
Lyrics:
Shesha Shaila Vasa Narayana
Bhaktha Parijata Narayana [ Shesha Shaila ... ]
Sarva Jeeva Vasa Narayana
Saama Gaana Lola Narayana
Sathya Sai Roopa Narayana (Hey)
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Narayana who is reclining on the Celestial Serpent Adi Sesha. Oh Narayana you are the saviour of your devotees, resident in the hearts of all beings and music is your past time. Oh Lord Sathya Sai you are none other than Lord Narayana.
Songglossary: bhaktha, gaan, hey, jeeva, lola, narayana, parijata, roopa, sai, sama, sarva, sathya, shaila, shesha, vasa

Title: Shirdi Ke Bhagawan Sai Ram
Lyrics:
Shirdi Ke Bhagawan Sai Ram
Parthi Mey Tum Janam Liyo Rey [ Shirdi Ke ... ]
Mandir Mandir Ghanta Baajey
Terey Hi Naam Ki Mahima Gaayen
Bhakthon Ke Rakhwaley Gopala
Meaning: Oh Lord of Shirdi, you have incarnated in Parthi. Every temple and religious place is ringing the bells in praise of you and your name, Oh Lord Gopala you are the protector of the devotees.
Songglossary: baaje, bhagawan, bhakthon, gaayen, ghanta, gopal, hai, janam, ke, ley, mahima, mandir, naam, puttaparthi, rakhwaley, ram, sai, shirdi, tera, tum

Title: Shirdi Ke Sai Parthi Ke
Lyrics:
Shirdi Ke Sai Parthi Ke Baba
Tum Ho Hamarey Pyaarey Sai Baba [ Shirdi Ke ... ]
Premamaya Sai Prema Pradatha
Eshwaramba Nandana Jagat Paripala
Paapa Vinashaka Parama Krupala
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai you are Shirdi Sai as well as Parthi Baba. You are our loving Sai Baba. You are the Lord of this Universe, personification of Love, bestower of Love, Oh compassionate Son of Mother Eshwaramba, annihilate our sins.
Songglossary: baba, eshwar, hamarey, ho, jagat, ke, krupalu, nanda, paapa, param, paripala, pradatha, prem, premamayi, puttaparthi, pyaara, sai, shirdi, tum, vinasha

Title: Shirdi Mahadeva Deva Shirdi Mahadeva
Lyrics:
Shirdi Mahadeva Deva Shirdi Mahadeva
Shanthi Prema Sadguru Natha
Shirdi Puri Vasa Deva
Shirdi Ke Sai Natha Sadguru Natha
Parthi Ke Sathya Sai Sadguru Deva
Guru Dev Guru Dev Guru Dev Guru Dev
Meaning: Glory to the Lord of Shirdi who is the embodiment of Love and Peace. Glory to You Oh Guru Dev (Preceptor), you are the embodiment of Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.
Songglossary: dev, deva, guru, ke, mahadev, natha, prem, puri, puttaparthi, sadguru, sai, sathya, shanthi, shirdi, vasa

Title: Shirdi Mahesha Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Shirdi Mahesha Shiva Shankara
Parthi Pureesha Parameshwara
Shankara Shiva Shankara Sai Shankara
Shiva (4) Shivaya Namah Om
Hara (4) Haraya Namah Om
Shivaya Namah Om Haraya Namah Om (2)
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara who resided in Shirdi and Parthi. Chant the name of Shiva.
Songglossary: hara, mahesha, namah, om, param, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai, shankara, shirdi, shiva

Title: Shirdi Nivasa Sai Shankara
Lyrics:
Shirdi Nivasa Sai Shankara
Parthi Nivasa Sai Shankara
Bhaavatheetha Bhaava Gochara
Kaalatheetha Kaala Bhairava
Jai Jagadeeshwara Omkareshwara (5)
Meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Shankara who is the embodiment of Shirdi Baba and Parthi Baba, and who is beyond time and imagination.
Songglossary: bhaav, bhairava, gochara, jagadeesha, jai, kaala, nivasa, omkareshwara, puttaparthi, sai, shankara, shirdi

Title: Shirdi Sai Bhajana Karo
Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Bhajana Karo
Sathya Sai Bhajana Karo (2)
Prema Sai Bhajana Karo
Narayana Bhajana Karo
Meaning: Come One and All and sing the Glory of Lord Shirdi Sai, Lord Prema Sai, Lord Sathya Sai and Lord Narayana.
Songglossary: bhaja, karo, narayana, prem, sai, sathya, shirdi

Title: Shirdi Sai Dwarakamayi
Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Dwarakamayi
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan
Tum Ho Sai Bhagawan
Sab Bhakto Ke Tum Ho Data
Sab Ko Hai Tum Prana Data
Ananda Data He Sukha Data [ Tum Ho ... Sai Bhagawan ]
Meaning: Lord of Shiva who resides in Dwarakamayi is my Lord and that of all devotees. He bestows happiness and comfort to all and is their life-breath.
Songglossary: anand, bhagawan, bhakthon, daata, dwaraka, hai, ho, ke, mera, praan, sab, sai, shirdi, sukh, tum

Title: Shirdi Sai Dwarakamayi Jai Jai
Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Dwarakamayi Jai Jai Ho Sathya Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ho Sathya (Parthi Pureeshwara)Sai Ram
Meaning: Glory and salutations to Lord of Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: dwaraka, ho, jai, purishwara, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sathya, shirdi

Title: Shirdi Sai Dwarakamayi Prashanthi Vasi
Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Dwarakamayi Prashanthi Vasi Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Ek Naam Sundara Naam [ Shirdi Sai ... ]
Allah Eshwara Sai Ram
Parthi Puri Ke Hey Bhagawan
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Raksha Karo Hey Bhagawan [ Sai Ram ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Shirdi Baba the Lord of Dwarakamayi and to the Lord of Prashanthi, Sai Ram, the name so enthralling. He is none other than Allah and Eshwar and the Lord of Parthi. Oh Lord show mercy and protect us.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, daya, dwaraka, ek, eshwar, hey, karo, ke, krupa, naam, prashanthi, puri, puttaparthi, raksha, ram, sai, shirdi, sundara, vasi

Title: Shirdi Sai Hey Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Hey Bhagawan
Uddhara Karo Bhagawan
Janam Maran Se Paar Karo Tum Sai Natha Bhagawan
Bhava Bandhan Se Door Karo Tum Deena Natha Bhagawan
Daya Karo Bhagawan (Mujhey)
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shirdi Sai, We plead You to redeem us from this world, take us from this bondage of birth and death and from the bondage of emotion, sorrow and attachment, Oh Lord Sai Natha.
Songglossary: bandha, bhagawan, bhava, daya, deen, door, hey, janam, karo, maran, mujhe, natha, paar, sai, se, shirdi, tum, uddhara

Title: Shirdi Sai Parthi Baba
Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Parthi Baba
Deena Janon Ke Sai Bhaktha Janon Ke Baba
Kali Yuga Avatara Merey Jeevan Aadhara
Sri Guru Sai Ram Sadguru Sai Ram
Meaning: Glory to Lord Shirdi Sai who is now in the form of Parthi Baba who is the protector of His devotees as well as the weak and the downtrodden, who has come in this age of Kali to sustain and protect all beings We offer our salutations to You Oh Sai Ram, You are our divine Preceptor.
Songglossary: aadhaar, avatar, baba, bhaktha, deen, guru, jana, jeeva, kali, ke, mera, puttaparthi, ram, sadguru, sai, shirdi, sri, yuga

Title: Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Hum
Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Hum Ko Deejo Premamrutha Dhara Premamrutha Dhara
Tava Seva Ke Avasar Deejo Sathya Sai Mahadev
Ganamrutha Mey Bhaav Bhi Deejo Prema Sai Bhagawan Prema Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai please let the perennial stream of Love flow from you to us, Oh Lord Sathya Sai please provide us the opportunity to serve you, Oh Lord Prema Sai please instill the devotion and Love whenever we sing your Glorious Name.
Songglossary: avasar, bhaav, bhagawan, bhi, deejo, dhara, ganamrutha, hum, ke, mahadev, prem, premamrutha, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, seva, shirdi, tava

Title: Shirdi Sai Shankara Parthi Vihari
Lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Shankara Parthi Vihari Shankara
Shankara Abhayankara Bhava Bhaya Haari Shankara [ Shirdi Sai ... ]
Paramatma Shiva Shankara Pavana Purusha Shankara
Sathya Swaroopa Shankara Sathya Sai Shankara
Meaning: Obeisance to Lord Shirdi Sai who made Parthi as HIS abode, who is the embodiment of Lord Shankara. To the one who is all pervading, the most auspicious and sacred, who removes all fear, we salute you Oh Lord Sathya Sai Shankara and offer our humble salutations.
Songglossary: abhaya, bhava, bhaya, harana, param, pavan, purusha, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, shankara, shirdi, shiva, swaroopa, vihar

Title: Shirdi Sai Vittala Shesha Sai
Lyrics:
