Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Rama of Prashanthi, from whom the entire world seeks solace and liberation, you are none other than the Lord Rama who liberated Ahalya, Oh Lord of Parthi we offer our salutations at your sacred feet.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, bandha, bhava, chara, dhama, hari, jagadashraya, mangal, naam, pavan, prashanthi, pureesha, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sri, sundara, vimochana

Title: Sri Sai Sharanam Sharanam Deva
Lyrics:
Sri Sai Sharanam Sharanam Deva
Sadguru Mama Guru Sharanam Deva [ Sri Sai ... ]
Guru Sakshath Parabrahma Deva
Guru Vishnu Guru Maheshwara Deva
Sadguru Charanam Sharanam Deva (2)
Meaning: I surrender at the feet of my Divine preceptor, Sai, who is none other than the all pervading Parabrahma (The Supreme Cosmic Spirit). HE is Trinity (Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva) combined in one form.
Songglossary: chara, deva, guru, maheshwara, mama, parabrahma, sadguru, sai, sakshat, sharan, sri, vishnu

Title: Sri Sai Shirdeeshwara Parthi Vasa
Lyrics:
Sri Sai Shirdeeshwara Parthi Vasa Parameshwara
Patitha Pavana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Lokesha Bhaktha Palana [ Sri Sai ]
Jaalileda Deena Bandhava
Chaala Mela Jagat Bandhava
Bhaktha Hrudayalaya Srishti Sthithi Laya Sathya Dharma Shanthi Premalaya [ Sri Sai ]
Paahi Paahi Parameshwara Jata Joota Shambho Shankara
Trishoola Dhara Trinetra Dhari Girija Kantha Sadashiva
Meaning: Oh Sai of Shirdi and Parthi, you are none other than Lord Shiva who gives succor to your devotees. Oh compassionate Lord show your mercy without delay, you are the cause for the Creation, Existence and Dissolution and the one who establishes Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love in this universe. Please come to protect us Oh compassionate Parameshwara (Lord Shiva) with your matted hair, Trident in hand having three eyes and accompanied by your Consort Girija (Parvathi).
Songglossary: bandha, bhaktha, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, chaala, deen, dhara, dhari, dharma, girija, hrudaya, jaalileda, jagat, jata, joota, kantha, laya, lokesha, mela, paahi, paalaya, param, patitha, pavan, premalaya, puttaparthi, sadashiva, sai, sathya, shambho, shankara, shanthi, shirdeesha, sri, srishti, sthithi, trinetra, trishoola, vasa

Title: Sri Vasudeva Narayana
Lyrics:
Sri Vasudeva Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Janardhana Madhusudhana
Madhusudhana Madhusudhana [ Janardhana ... ]
Govardhanodhara Gopalana
Sri Sai Govinda Madhava Keshava
Meaning: Worship the Lord Hari who is known by many names as Vasudeva, Narayana, Janardhana, Madhusudhana, Govardhanodhari, Gopalana, Madhava, Keshava.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, janardhana, kesha, madhava, madhu, narayana, sai, sri, vasudeva

Title: Sri Vasudeva Narayana Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Sri Vasudeva Narayana Sai Narayana
Janardhana Hey Madhusudhana Sai Narayana
Govardhanodhara Gopalana Sai Narayana
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Narayana
Meaning: Worship and chant Vasudeva, Janardhana, Madhusudhana, Narayana (All names of Krishna) who as Gopala had lifted Govardhana mountain to protect His devotees. He is the charming Hari.
Songglossary: gopal, hari, hey, janardhana, madhu, narayana, om, sai, sri, vasudeva

Title: Sri Venkatesha Sayeeshwara
Lyrics:
Sri Venkatesha Sayeeshwara
Tirumalai Vasa Sayeeshwara
Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Balaji Govinda Sayeeshwara (2)
Akhilanda Natha Ananda Roopa
Venkatesha Sai Venkatesha (3) [ Balaji Govinda(2) ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is also the Lord Venkateshwara or Balaji who resides in Tirumala as the Lord Govinda. He is the Lord of the whole Universe and the embodiment of happiness. Worship Lord Sathya Sayeeshwara!
Songglossary: akhila, anand, balaji, govinda, natha, roopa, sai, sathya, sayee, sri, tirumala, vasa, venkatesha

Title: Sridhara Sundara Radhikeshwara
Lyrics:
Sridhara Sundara Radhikeshwara
Gaana Priyakara Murali Manohara [ Sridhara Sundara ]
Natavara Giridhara Gopikeshwara
Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Meaning: The beautiful Lord Vishnu - who is the Lord of Lakshmi and adored by Radha, the Lord who is fond of music and beautiful to look at with his flute, who is the supreme actor and dancer, the Lord of the Gopis, one who lifted the Govardhana Mountain, He is none other than our Lord Sathya Sayeeshwara.
Songglossary: gaan, giridhar, gopikeshwara, manohar, murali, natavara, priya, radhikeshwara, sathya, sayee, sridhara, sundara

Title: Srikari Krupakari Kshemankari Sayeeshwari
Lyrics:
Srikari Krupakari Kshemankari Sayeeshwari
Shankari Abhayankari Shubhankari Sayeeshwari [ Srikari Krupakari ... ]
Tandavakeli Priyakari Bhairavi Abhayankari
Sarveshwari Sundari Dayakari Maheshwari
Meaning: The beautiful, compassionate and all pervading goddess Parvathi, the consort of Shankara, is extolled by various names such as- Srikari "The one who bestows Auspiciousness", Krupakari "Compassionate", Kshemankari "Looking after the welfare of devotees", Abhayankari ", who bestows fearlessness", Shubhakari "Always doing good" and Tandava Keli Priyakari "One who is fond of 'Tandava' dance".
Songglossary: abhaya, bhairavi, dayaka, krupa, kshema, maheshwari, priya, sarvesha, sayee, shankari, shubh, soundari, srikari, tandava

Title: Srinivasa Govinda Sri Venkatesha Govinda
Lyrics:
Srinivasa Govinda Sri Venkatesha Govinda
Purana Purusha Govinda Pundarikaaksha Govinda
Dashavidha Roopa Govinda Krishna Rama Govinda
Krishna Rama Govinda Rama Krishna Govinda
Sai Rama Govinda Sai Krishna Govinda
Meaning: Chant the names of Srinivasa, Govinda, Venkatesha (All names of Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati) The one who was the Lord of great Epics (Puranas) and the one who has taken ten incarnations. He is also the Lord Sai Rama and Sai Krishna.
Songglossary: dasha, govinda, krishna, pundarika, puran, purusha, ram, roopa, sai, sri, srinivasa, venkatesha

Title: Srinivasa Sri Venkatesha
Lyrics:
Srinivasa Sri Venkatesha
Balaji Govinda Sayeesha [ Srinivasa Sri ... ]
Parama Dayala Tirumalai Vasa
Padma Lakshmi Vallabha Esha
Pundarikaaksha Paapa Vinasha
Meaning: Oh Lord Srinivasa, Sri Venkatesha, Balaji, Govinda (All names of Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati) Oh Lord Sayeesha You are compassionate Lord residing on the hills of Tirumala accompanied by Padmavati and Lakshmi, You are Pundarikaksha (The lotus-eyed; a title of Vishnu and Krishna) the destroyer of our sins.
Songglossary: balaji, dayal, esha, govinda, lakshmi, paapa, padma, param, pundarika, sayee, sri, srinivasa, tirumala, vallabha, vasa, venkatesha, vinasha

Title: Srinivasa Sri Venkatesha
Lyrics:
Srinivasa Sri Venkatesha
Dashavidha Roopa Govinda
Tirumalesha Govinda
Pundarikaaksha Govinda
Parthi Nivasa Govinda
Govinda Hari ( Sai ) Govinda (2)
Meaning: Chant Lord Srinivasa, Sri Venkatesha who took ten forms. He is also adored as Pundarikaksha. He resides at Parthi. HE is Govinda, Hari and Sai Govinda. (All are names of Krishna)
Songglossary: dasha, govinda, hari, nivasa, pundarika, puttaparthi, roopa, sai, sri, srinivasa, tirumalesha, venkatesha

Title: Srinivasa Venkatesha
Lyrics:
Srinivasa Venkatesha
Shritha Jana Paripala Sayeesha [ Srinivasa Venkatesha ]
Tirupati Giri Vasa Govinda
Garuda Vahana Govinda Govinda
Govinda Govinda Srinivasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Shirdi Vasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Parthi Vasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Srinivasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Shirdi Vasa Govinda
Govinda Govinda Parthi Vasa Govinda
Meaning: Sing the name of Srinivasa, Venkatesha The Lord Sayeesha who protects all those who have surrendered to him, Lord Govinda who resides in Tirupati, One who rides on Garuda.
Songglossary: garuda, giri, govinda, jana, paripala, puttaparthi, sayee, shirdi, shritha, srinivasa, tirupati, vahana, vasa, venkatesha

Title: Srishti Sthithi Layakara Amrutotbhavakara
Lyrics:
Srishti Sthithi Layakara Amrutotbhavakara
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara [ Srishti Sthithi ]
Lingodhbhavakara Shiva Shiva Shiva Shankara
Shambho Mahadeva Sai Parameshwara
Meaning: Salutations to the Lord Shiva who is responsible for creation, existence and destruction. He is the creator of Amrutha-the immortal nectar. He is the preceptor in the form of Trinity (Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara). Lord Sai is none other than Lord Shiva who is the creator of holy Shiva Linga.
Songglossary: amrutotbhavakara, brahma, devo, guru, layakara, lingodbhava, mahadev, maheshwara, param, sai, shambho, shankara, shiva, srishti, sthithi, vishnu

Title: Start the Day with Love
Lyrics:
Start The Day With Love
Fill The Day With Love
End The Day With Love, Sweet Love
That Is The Way To God

Title: Start the day with Love
Lyrics:
Start the day with Love
 Fill the day with Love
 End the day with Love
 That's the Golden road, the Golden way to Love
 Wake up your song in our heart Lord

Title: Subah Aur Shyam Bol Hari
Lyrics:
Subah Aur Shyam Bol Hari Naam
Gopi Gopala Bhajo Sai Ghana Shyam [ Subah Aur ... ]
Chalo Man Chalo Chaley Baba Ke Dhaam
Shirdi Ke Dhaam Puttaparthi Ke Dhaam
Meaning: Chant the name of Lord Hari day in day out, Chant Gopi, Gopala, Sai Ghana Shyam (All names of Krishna) Oh Mind let us proceed with our journey to the abodes of Shirdi Sai and Parthi Sai.
Songglossary: aur, baba, bhaja, bol, chalo, dhaam, ghana, gopal, gopi, hari, ke, mana, naam, puttaparthi, sai, sham, shirdi, subah

Title: Subete no Kokoro ni Yadoru Sai
Lyrics:
Subete no Kokoro ni Yadoru Sai
 Kurushii Toki nimo Yasashiku Sukuu
 Subete no Kokoro ni Yadoru Sai
 Sai no Namae no Fushigi na Chikara
 Mugen no Chikara
 Idai na Chikara
 Rinne no Umi wo Watashi Tamae
 Sai Ram Sai Ram Tonaete Inoru
 
 Sung to the tune of Antharyami Sai Murari

Title: Subrahmanya Maam Paahi Sai Natha
Lyrics:
Subrahmanya Maam Paahi Sai Natha Maam Paahi
Shambhu Kumara Maam Paahi Sharavana Bhava Guha Maam Paahi
Shanmukha Natha Maam Paahi Sai Natha Maam Paahi
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Subrahmanyam Hara Hara Hara Hara Subrahmanyam
Shiva Shiva Bala Subrahmanyam Hara Hara Bala Subrahmanyam
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Subrahmanyam Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Subrahmanyam
Meaning: We take refuge in Lord Subrahmanya, son of Lord Shambhu (Lord Shiva) Praise Him as Sharavana.
Songglossary: bala, bhava, guha, hara, kumara, maam, natha, paahi, sai, shambho, shanmukha, sharavana, shiva, subramanya

Title: Subrahmanya Namostuthey
Lyrics:
Subrahmanya Namostuthey
Sura Samhara Namostuthey
Suramuni Pala Namostuthey
Kanda Kumara Namostuthey
Shambhu Kumara Namostuthey
Shankari Bala Namostuthey
Shanmukha Natha Namostuthey
Sai Natha Namostuthey (2)
Meaning: Pray to Lord Subrahmanya destroyer of demon Sura. He is worshipped by pious sages and noble souls. He is son of mother Shankari. Our Salutations to you Oh Sai Natha.
Songglossary: bala, kanda, kumara, namostuthey, natha, pala, sai, samhara, shambho, shankari, shanmukha, subramanya, sura, suramuni

Title: Subramanyam Subramanyam
Lyrics:
Subramanyam Subramanyam Shanmukha Natha Subramanyam
Subramanyam Subramanyam Sai Natha Subramanyam
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Subramanyam Hara Hara Hara Hara Subramanyam
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Subramanyam Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Subramanyam
Shiva Sharavana Bhava Subramanyam Guru Sharavana Bhava Subramanyam
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Subramanyam Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Subramanyam
Meaning: We take refuge in Lord Subrahmanyam and praise Him as Sharavana. Glory to Lord Subrahmanya and Lord Sai Natha.
Songglossary: bhava, guru, hara, natha, sai, shanmukha, sharavana, shiva, subramanya

Title: Sumiran Kar Man Naam Prabhu
Lyrics:
Sumiran Kar Man Naam Prabhu Ka
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Prabhu Ka [ Sumiran Kar ]
Kamal Nayana Prabhu Sundara Shyama
Karley Sumiran Sai Rama
Meaning: Oh Mind meditate upon the form of Lord Sai of Parthi, He is none other than the Lotus eyed Lord Krishna. Meditate upon the form of Lord Sai Rama.
Songglossary: ka, kamala, karo, ke, mana, naam, nayan, prabhu, puri, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sham, sumira, sundara

Title: Sun Ley Pukar Sai Murali
Lyrics:
Sun Ley Pukar Sai Murali (2)
Madhura Murali Mangala Murali
Mohana Murali Mukunda Murali
Sumadhura Murali Sunaada Murali
Madhava Murali Yadava Murali
Madhumathi Radha Lola Murali
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murali
Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna of Yadava clan, please listen to my appeal, you are the Murali krishna who raptures everyone with your sublime, sweet lilting music on your flute, going around the beautiful forest with Radha as consort.
Songglossary: ley, lola, madhava, madhu, mangal, mohan, mukunda, murali, pukar, radha, sai, sanchari, sham, sumadhura, sun, sunaada, yadava

Title: Sunaada Vinodini Sai Janani
Lyrics:
Sunaada Vinodini Sai Janani
Bhavani Jaganmohini Sai Janani [ Sunaada Vinodini ... ]
Sambhavi Shiva Ranjani Sai Janani
Shankari Narayani Sai Janani
Bhagawathi Vara Dayini Sai Janani
Meaning: The mother Sai who enjoys music has several forms and names. They are, the Goddess Bhavani who has enchanted the whole world, the Goddess Sambhavi who pleases and entertains Lord Shiva, the Goddess Shankari, Narayani and the Lord Bhagawathi who bestows boons to all.
Songglossary: bhagavathi, bhava, dayini, jagan, janani, narayani, ranjani, sai, sambhavi, shankari, shiva, sunaada, vara, vinodini

Title: Sunaada Vinodini Suhaasini
Lyrics:
Sunaada Vinodini Suhaasini
Anatha Rakshaki Sri Bhuvaneshwari
Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Meaning: The Divine Mother revels in sacred music, is bliss personified, protector of helpless and needy and the one who bestows solace to all.
Songglossary: abhaya, anand, anath, bhuvaneshwari, dayini, raksha, sri, suhaasini, sunaada, swaroopa, vinodini

Title: Sundara Mukha Sri Gajanana
Lyrics:
Sundara Mukha Sri Gajanana
Eka Dantha Sri Gajanana [ Sundara Mukha ... ]
Prathama Namami Gajanana
Rishi Muni Vanditha Gajanana
Gajanana Om Gajanana (3)
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesh the beautiful elephant faced Lord with a single tusk and is the one whom the entire universe worships first. The wise and noble sages too worship him first.
Songglossary: dantha, eka, gajamukha, mukha, muni, namam, om, prathama, rishi, sri, sundara, vanditha

Title: Sundara Paadam Sai Paadam
Lyrics:
Sundara Paadam Sai Paadam
Pankaja Charanam Paapa Vimochanam [ Sundara Paadam ... ]
Nataraja Natanam Sai Paadam
Sri Krishna Narthanam Sai Paadam
Bhava Dukha Haranam Sai Paadam
Jagadodharanam Sai Paadam
Meaning: The feet of Sai are beautiful. The feet, which are soft like Lotus petals give relief from our sins. The feet of Sai are the dancing feet of Lord Shiva and that of Lord Krishna. The feet of Sai provide solace from the trials and tribulations in our lives and they are the feet that uplift the world from miseries and calamities.
Songglossary: bhava, chara, dukh, harana, jagadodhara, krishna, narthana, natana, nataraj, paada, paapa, pankaja, sai, sri, sundara, vimochana

Title: Sundara Rama Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Sundara Rama Sai Rama
Sugunatheetha Megha Shyama
Srishti Sthithi Laya Karana Rama
Munijana Poojita Taraka Naama
Sath Chith Ananda Swaroopa Naam (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram (4)
Meaning: Oh Beautiful Rama, your virtues are of highest order, your color is that of dark clouds, you are responsible for Creation and existence, you are adored by sages, you are the liberator from the cycle of birth and death and you are always in bliss.
Songglossary: anand, chitha, kaarana, laya, megha, munijana, naam, poojita, ram, sai, sat, sham, srishti, sthithi, suguna, sundara, swaroopa, taraka

Title: Sundara Sayi Shankara Potri
Lyrics:
Sundara Sayi Shankara Potri
Nangu Vedattin Nadane Potri [ Sundara Sayi ... ]
Uma Mahesha Hara Hara Potri
Unmai Porule Shiva Shiva Potri
Adi Andam Illa Ishane Potri
Ambalattadum Iraivane Potri
Meaning: Glory be unto Shankar, the Lord of the four Vedas, the Lord of Uma, the only existing reality, without a beginning or end. Lord Sa embodies Shiva who dances in the temple of our hearts.
Songglossary: adi, andam, hara, illa, iraivane, ishane, mahesha, nangu, natha, ponnambalavanna, porule, potri, sai, shankara, shiva, sundara, uma, unmai, veda

Title: Sundara Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Lyrics:
Sundara Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Hey Ghana Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Natavara Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Radhey Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Sai Shyam Nayanabhi Ram
Meaning: This Bhajan extols Lord Krishna as the blue dark complexioned Shyama, the supreme dancer and actor, the Lord of Radha who is very beautiful and enchanting for the eyes.
Songglossary: ghana, hey, natavara, nayan, radha, ram, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Sundara Shyama Gopala Sai Radhe
Lyrics:
Sundara Shyama Gopala Sai Radhey Govinda Govinda
Jaya Radhey Jaya Radhey Radhey Gopala Gopala [ Sundara Shyama ... ]
Radha Jeevana Shyama Sai Radhey Govinda Govinda
Jaya Gopala Radhey Radhey Radhey Gopala Gopala
Meaning: Sing the different names (Govinda, Gopala, Sai) of the dark-complexioned and beautiful Krishna who is the life of Radha.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, jay, jeeva, radha, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Sundara Shyama Murari Sai
Lyrics:
Sundara Shyama Murari Sai
Gopala Sri Hari Sri Hari (2)
Parama Niranjana Madhava Sai
Sakala Charachara Vyapaka Sai [ Gopala Sri ... ]
Meaning: The beautiful Lord Sai, also known as Shyama Murari, Gopala and Sri Hari, Lord Madhava Sai (all synonyms with Krishna) who is always pure, is spread everywhere in all the animate and inanimate things.
Songglossary: chara, gopal, hari, madhava, murare, niranjan, param, sai, sakala, sham, sri, sundara, vyapaka

Title: Sundara Sugunabhi Rama Rama
Lyrics:
Sundara Sugunabhi Rama Rama
Mandara Makaranda Madhurya Naama Rama [ Sundara Sugunabhi ]
Kodanda Mandita Ranadheera Rama Rama
Ananda Mandira Rama
Rama Jai Jai Ram Sri Rama Jai Jai Ram (3)
Meaning: Oh Beautiful and Virtuous Rama, your name is sweeter than honey. Oh Rama with the Kodanda (the Sacred Bow) in hand you are the personification of Valor in the battle. You are the temple of Bliss. Victory to you Oh Rama.
Songglossary: anand, jai, kodanda, madhu, makara, manda, mandir, mandita, naam, ram, ranadheera, sri, suguna, sundara

Title: Sundara Sundara Nachey Sundara Sai
Lyrics:
Sundara Sundara Nachey Sundara Sai Ghana Shyam
Nachey Rey Sai Sundara Shyam
Rhumaka Jhumaka Jhum Ghungaroo Bhajey Nachey Ghana Shyam
Nachey Natavara Sai Sundara Merey Sai Ram
Nachey Nachey Mana Mandir Mey Merey Sai Ram [ Nachey Rey ... ]
Meaning: Oh Lord it is a treat for the eyes and ears when the dark complexioned Shyam (Krishna) dances with the jingling anklets on His little feet, which go in rhythm to the tune. Oh Lord please dance in our hearts the same way for the song of our life.
Songglossary: bhaja, ghana, ghungaroo, mana, mandir, mera, nach, natavara, ram, rhuma-jhuma, sai, sham, sundara

Title: Sundara Sundara Sai Sundara
Lyrics:
Sundara Sundara Sai Sundara
Sundara Nanda Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Murali Madhava Mohana Roopa
Munijana Manasa Chora
Chitha Chora Maakhan Chora
Meaning: Salutations to the enchanting Lord Sai Gopala, the son of Nanda, the one who loves the music of the flute, the one who steals butter as well as the hearts of sages.
Songglossary: chitha, chora, gopal, maakhan, madhava, manasa, mohan, munijana, murali, nanda, roopa, sai, sundara

Title: Sundara Sundara Vinayaka
Lyrics:
Sundara Sundara Vinayaka
Shubha Mangala Dayaka Vinayaka
Vighna Koti Hara Vimala Gajanana
Sakala Vighna Hara Sai Gajanana
Eshwari Nandana Parthi Gajanana
Jai Jai Ganesha Jai Sri Ganesha (4)
Meaning: Lord Ganesha who is very beautiful, who bestows everything good and auspicious. HE is the remover of millions of obstacles that come in our way. He is Sai Gajanana (Another name for Lord Ganesha meaning Elephant faced) who resides in Parthi.
Songglossary: dayaka, eshwar, gajamukha, ganesha, hara, jai, koti, mangal, nanda, puttaparthi, sai, sakala, shubh, sri, sundara, vighna, vimala, vinayaka

Title: Sundara Vadana Gopala
Lyrics:
Sundara Vadana Gopala
Nayana Sunayana Hey Nandalala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Radha Jeevana Sai Gopala
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Gopala, you are most enchanting, with beautiful eyes Oh son of King Nanda, Lord of Meera and the beloved of Radha, our salutations to you.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gopal, hey, jeeva, ke, meera, nanda, nayan, prabhu, radha, sai, sunayana, sundara, vadana

Title: Sundara Vadana Sarasija Nayana
Lyrics:
Sundara Vadana Sarasija Nayana
Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Jagat Paripala Prashanthi Nilaya
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Parthi Pureesha Hey Bhuvanesha
Raksha ( Sai Krupa ) Karo Bhagawan
Meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi with eyes like Lotus and who has a beautiful face who protects and sustains the world and who resides in Prashanthi Nilayam, You are my Lord. Please have compassion on me and shower your grace on me Oh Lord of Parthi and Lord of the World.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhuvanesha, daya, hey, ho, jagat, karo, krupa, mera, nayan, nilaya, paripala, prashanthi, pureesha, puri, puttaparthi, raksha, sai, sarasija, sundara, tum, vadana

Title: Sundara Vadani Suguna Manohari
Lyrics:
Sundara Vadani Suguna Manohari
Manda Haasa Mukha Shashi Vadani
Chandana Kumkuma Alankruta Vadani
Sai Maheshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Om Shakthi Om Om Shakthi Om Om Shakthi Om Om Shakthi Om (2)
Meaning: Chant the name 'Om Shakthi Om' repeatedly, which extols Mother as Maheshwari, virtuous Goddess of Emperors, having a blissful smile with the Sandal paste and vermillion on her beautiful face.
Songglossary: alankruta, chand, hasita, kumkuma, maheshwari, manda, manohar, mukha, om, raja, rajeshwari, sai, shakthi, shashi, suguna, sundara, vadana

Title: Sundari Soundari Suguna Manohari
Lyrics:
Sundari Soundari Suguna Manohari
Shankari Sambhavi Sayeeshwari (2)
Nithya Niranjani Niramayi
Ranjani Rakshaki Sathya Sayeeshwari
Meaning: The Divine Mother is beauty personified, highly virtuous, consort of Shankara, ever blemishless, the one who protects Her devotees is none other than Sathya Sayeeshwari.
Songglossary: manohar, niramaya, niranjan, nithya, raksha, ranjani, sambhavi, sathya, sayee, shankari, soundari, suguna

Title: Sunle Pukar Sai Murali (2)
Lyrics:
Sunle Pukar Sai Murali (2)
Madhura Murali Mangala Murali
Mohana Murali Mukunda Murali
Sumadhura Murali Sunada Murali
Madhava Murali Yadava Murali
Madhumathi Radha Lola Murali
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murali
Meaning: Krishna, Lord of Radha, and prince of the Yadavas, bestows prosperity and well-being. The beautiful Lord plays the flute ever so sweetly, in the gardens (Brindavan). Please listen to my prayers.
Songglossary: lola, madhava, madhu, mangal, mohan, mukunda, murali, pukar, radha, sai, sanchari, sham, sumadhura, sunada, sunle, yadava

Title: Suprabhatham
Lyrics:
Easwarambaa Suthah Sriman
Poorva Sandhya Pravarthathe
Utthishta Sathya-Sayeesha
Karthavyam Daivamahnikam

Utthishthothishta Partheesha
Uthishta Jagateepathe
Utthishta Karunapoorna
Lokamangala Siddhaye

Chitravathi Thata Vishala Sushantha Soudhe
Thisthanthi Sevakajanah Sthava Darshanartham
Aadithya-Kanthiranubhati Samastha Lokaan
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, Thava Suprabhatham

Thwannama-Keerthana-raathasthava Divyanaama
Gayanthi Bhakti-rasapanaa-Prahrishta Chitthaah
Daathum Kripassahita-Darshnamshu tebhyah
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, Thava Suprabhatham

Aadaaya Divya-Kusumani Manoharaani
Sripaadapoojanavidhim Bhavadandhri-Moole
Kartum Mahothsukathaaya Pravishanthi Bhaktaah
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, Thava Suprabhatham

Desaantaraagatha-Budaasthava Divyamoorthim
Sandarshnaabhirathi-Sanyutha-Chiththvruthyaa
Vedoktha Manthrapathanena Lasanthyajastram
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, Thava Suprabhatham

Shruthva Thavaadbhutha Charithram Akhanda Keerthim
Vyaaptham Diganthara Vishaala Dharaathalesmin
Jignaasu Lokau pathishtathi Chaasramesmin
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, Thava Suprabhatham

Seetha Sathi Sama Vishuddha Hridambhujaathaah
Bahvanganaa Karagruheetha Supushpa Harah
Sthunvanthi Divyanuthibhih Phanibhushanam Thwaam
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, Thava Suprabhatham

Suprabhatham Idam Punyam Ye
Patanthi Dine Dine
Tey Vishanthi Param Dhaama
Jnaana Vijnaana Shobhithaah

Mangalam Guru Devaaya
Mangalam Jnaana Dhaayine
Mangalam Parthi Vaasaaya
Mangalam Sathya Saayine
Meaning:
Su means good, auspicious and Prabhath means morning. Suprabhatam refers to the morning prayers that are chanted in praise of the Lord to awaken the divinity present within each individual. It is the act of dedicating oneself to the Lord and praying for His blessings right at the start of a new day.
 
1. O Son of Easwaramba! O Resplendent Majestic One! Dawn is heralding in the East. The daily tasks of Divinity, which Thou hast undertaken has to be accomplished, therefore, awake, O Lord Sathya Sai!
 
2. Awake, Awake, O Lord of Parthi! O Lord of the entire Universe and Mankind! Awake, O Compassionate Lord! So that the world attain auspiciousness, happiness, prosperity, welfare and blessings.
 
3. In the vast Mansion, full of bliss and tranquility, (Prashanthi Nilayam) on the banks of the river Chitravathi, those anxious to serve Thee are waiting for Thy Darshan. The radiance of the Sun is illumining the World. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
4. Devotees engrossed in singing Thy Glory are happy and blissful, when they taste the nectar of devotion. Kindly shower Thy Grace by granting them Thy Darshan. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
5. Bringing holy flowers with captivating colors and fragrance, for worshipping Thy Lotus Feet, in the form as prescribed by the scriptures, Thy devotees are coming in, with great yearning and enthusiasm. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
6. Wise persons from distant countries, moved by yearning to have Thy Darshan, have come and they are having great delight in reciting constantly mantras of the Vedas. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
7. Hearing Thy marvellous tales and fame that has reached the farthest horizons, earnest seekers of Reality have come to this place and are waiting. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
8. Women devotees, whose (petals of) heart are unattached to the world like Lotus petals (which are unattached to the water in which they grow, even though they cannot survive without water) and are similar to Mother Seetha in virtues and piousness are singing Thy Glory - the Glory of Lord Shiva adorned with Serpent around His neck - through holy hymns holding excellent flower garlands in their hands. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
9. Whoever daily recites this morning awakening Hymn will attain the Highest Abode resplendent with the Supreme intelligence as well as Supreme wisdom.
 
10. May the divine Guru be auspicious to us; May the Bestower of wisdom be auspicious to us; May the Lord, Who manifested in Parthi be auspicious to us; May Bhagawan Sathya Sai Baba be auspicious to us.
GeneralComments:
Please click here for the English version.

Songglossary: akhanda, bhagawan, bhava, daiva, darsh, dhaam, dhara, divya, guru, jagat, karuna, mangal, manohar, manthra, param, partheeshwara, pathi, phani, punya, puttaparthi, sai, sama, samastha, sathi, sathya, sevaka, shobhitha, sri, sriman, suprabhatam, sutha, thata, thava, vaasa, vishala

Title: Suprabhatham – English
Lyrics:
Easwarambas Resplendent Son
Its the start of a bright new day
Time to rise, time to shine, Lord Divine
Time to lead us along lifes way

Awake, Lord of Puttaparthi
Awake, O Lord of all mankind
Awake, O Lord of compassion
That the world good fortune may find

On Chithravathi's peaceful shore stands our hearts own mansion
We yearn to serve You and are longing for Your darshan
Mornings begun and oer the world spreads the radiant sun
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagavan, may Your glory now dawn

We love to sing Your sweet name with blissful emotion
We taste the sweet nectar that comes of true devotion
Come shower drops of blessings on us, we pray Gracious One
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagavan, may Your glory now dawn

Weve brought to You colorful flowers with fragrance so sweet
Our dear Guru, our object now is to worship Your feet
Your devotees are gathered into the place where we meet
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagavan, may Your glory now dawn

Among the seekers of the world knowledge that You're here grew
From far and near people are coming who long to see You
They are reciting Vedic mantras knowing their value
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagavan, may Your glory now dawn

Throughout the Earth people of worth are learning of Your fame
They know Your glory and the sweet story of why You came
Seekers of Truth from every land now are singing Your name
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagavan, may Your glory now dawn

Women demure as Mother Sita now sing in rapture
Like lotus blooms drawn to the light their hearts are soft and pure
With garlands of sweet flowers they will adorn Your picture
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagavan, may Your glory now dawn

Whoever sings this waking chant
Sings it faithfully every day
Great peace to you the Lord will grant
And the wisdom for which we pray

Oh Auspicious Divine Teacher
Oh Auspicious All Seeing Eye
Oh Auspicious Lord of Parthi
Oh Auspicious Sri Sathya Sai
Meaning: Su means good, auspicious and Prabhath means morning. Suprabhatam refers to the morning prayers that are chanted in praise of the Lord to awaken the divinity present within each individual. It is the act of dedicating oneself to the Lord and praying for His blessings right at the start of a new day.

Title: Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
Lyrics:
Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
Ananda Dayaka Vinayaka
Hey Shiva Nandana Shubhanana
Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka
Paahi Ganesha Paahi Ganesha Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka (2)
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Vinayaka, son of Lord Shiva. You are worshipped by all gods and sages and you bestow happiness to all.
Songglossary: anand, dayaka, ganesha, hey, nanda, paahi, shiva, shubh, suramuni, vanditha, vinayaka

Title: Surrender To The Feet Of The Lord
Lyrics:
Surrender To The Feet Of The Lord Sai Baba Surrender ...
... To The Feet Of The Lord
Surrender To The One We Adore Sai Baba Surrender ...
... To The One We Adore
And With Devotion We Can Cross This Ocean With Baba ...
... Beside Us To Guide Us [ Surrender To The One ... ]
Songglossary: baba, sai

Title: Surrender to the Lord
Lyrics:
Surrender to the Lord, to the Lord, surrender
 Take my love in fullness of devotion to Thee, O Lord
 Take my hands, let them work incessantly for Thee, O Lord
 Take my soul and let it be merged in one with Thee, O Lord
 Surrender to the Lord, to the Lord, surrender
 Take my mind, let it be in tune with Thee, O Lord
 O take my everything, let me be your instrument
 Take my soul and let it be merged in one with Thee, O Lord

Title: Swagatham Swagatham Sri Sathya Paahi
Lyrics:
Swagatham Swagatham Sri Sathya Paahi Suswagatham
Prashanthi Nilayam Paramatma Roopam
Parthi Pureesham Suswagatham [ Swagatham Swagatham ... ]
Sathya Swaroopam Sadguru Natham
Dharma Swaroopam Suswagatham
Meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai a very warm welcome to you, Oh Lord of Prashanthi Nilaya and personification of the Divine Atma (Higher Self or Higher Conscience), welcome to you the Lord of Parthi Oh Sadguru, the embodiment of Truth and Righteousness, a very warm welcome to you.
Songglossary: dharma, natha, nilaya, paahi, param, prashanthi, pureesha, puttaparthi, roopa, sadguru, sathya, sri, suswagatham, swagatham, swaroopa

Title: Swami Breathe Through Us
Lyrics:
Swami, O Swami, Breathe Through Us Your Sacred Breath
Sing Through Us Your Sacred Song
Love Is All
Swami, O Swami, Let Us Tell You How We Feel
You Have Filled Us With Your Riches
We Love You So
Songglossary: so, swami

Title: Swami of Love, Swami of Mercy
Lyrics:
Swami of Love, Swami of Mercy I pray to You come to me
Swami of Love, Swami of Mercy I pray to You set me free
Free from the ups and downs of life, free from sorrow and pain
Free from the bondage of my soul that causes birth and pain
Swami of Love, Swami of Mercy, I pray to You come to me
Swami of Love, Swami of Mercy, I pray to You set me free
Make my heart an ocean of Love that makes me one with all
Let mercy be the flower of Love that blooms in one and all

Title: Swami Take My Hand
Lyrics:
Swami Take My Hand, Jesus Take My Hand,
Dear Lord Take My Hand, Take My Hand And Lead The Way
I'll Never Forget You, You'll Always Be With Me,   [ Dear Lord  ... ]
You Are Guide And Protector, Mother And Father,  [ Dear Lord  ... ]
Teach Me Loving Service, Peace And Contentment
[ Dear Lord ... ]
Songglossary: swami

Title: Swami we adore You
Lyrics:
Swami we adore You
 Lay our lives before You
 How we love You

Title: Swamiye Charanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Lyrics:
Swamiye Charanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Swami Illadoru Sharanam Illaiappa
Mohini Sudane Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Mohana Roopa Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Sadguru Nadane Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Sabari Girishane Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Akhilandeshwara Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Ananda Roopa Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Meaning: Our only refuge are the holy feet of blissful Lord Ayyappa, the true Guru, resident of Sabari mountain. Lord of the Universe and the beautiful son of Mohini.
Songglossary: akhila, anand, chara, girisha, illa, mohan, natha, ponnaiappa, roopa, sabari, sadguru, sharan, sutha, swami

Title: Swamiye Sharanam Sharanam Pon Ayyappa
Lyrics:
Swamiye Sharanam Sharanam Pon Ayyappa 
Swami Sharanam Sharanam Pon Ayyappa (2x)
Swamiye Sharanam Sharanam Pon Ayyappa 
Mohini Sutane Sharanam Pon Ayyapa
Mohana Roopa Sharanam Pon Ayyapa (2x)
Sathguru Nathane Sharanam Pon Ayyappa 
Shabari Gireeshame Sharanam Pon Ayyappa
Akhilandeshwara Sharanam Pon Ayyappa
Ananda Roopa Sharanam Pon Ayyappa (2x)
Meaning: Take refuge in Ayyappa, the Lord of Sabari mountain and Puttaparthi, who bestows supreme peace.

Title: Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (2)
Lyrics:
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (2)
Sayeesha Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha (2) [ Swamiyey Sharanam ... ]
Sabari Giri Vasa Dharma Shastha
Parthi Puri Vasa Dharma Rakshaka
Mohini Bala Pampa Vasa
Eshwari Bala Chithravathi Vasa
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Kali Avatara (2)
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (3)
Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (2)
Meaning: I surrender myself to thee O Lord Ayyappa, son of Mohini, who has incarnated to establish righteousness on Earth residing on the hills of Sabari near the river Pampa. I surrender myself to Lord Sayeesha son of Mother Eshwaramba residing on the banks of river Chitravathi, the incarnation of this Kali age who has taken the vow to protect His devotees.
Songglossary: avatar, ayyappa, bala, bhaktha, chithravathi, dharma, eshwar, giri, kali, mohan, pampa, puri, puttaparthi, raksha, sabari, samraksha, sayee, sharan, shastha, swami, vasa

Title: Sweet Lord of all
Lyrics:
Sweet Lord of all, You have come to take us Home
 Joining all our hearts together in the sound of Om
 Let us look into each other's eyes and see we're one
 Let us always serve each other knowing where we're from
 Sai Baba, You've come to take us Home
 We call You Yahweh, Allah, Abba and Lord
 Adi - Buddha, Maheshwara - you're the One adored
 Sai Baba, Help us Find the Way
 May we find the Light of God
 May we shine the Light You are
 For this we humbly pray
 O Sai Ram Ram Ram Aanandha Prabhu Sai
 O Sai Ram Rama Ram Aanandha Prabhu Sai
 Sai Baba, You've come to take us Home

Title: Sweeter Than Music
Lyrics:
Sweeter than music is the Love He has,
Brighter than sunshine is the One who really cares,
Softer than starlight is the gentleness He shares,
Glows like the moon, but there's no gloominess here   
and He knows because He's always.... sweeter than music
He knows because He's always....brighter than sunshine
He knows because He's always...softer than starlight

(Bridge)
Well He knows 'cuz He's the only one, who can change your life and make you feel this way, He knows cuz He's the only one, that can make your life seem brand new every day

My Lord knows the secrets, of life eternal and true, He's willing to share them, with everybody, with me and with you

(Chorus)
So come on get to know Him.....sweeter than music
Well come on and get to see Him...brighter than sunshine
Come on and get to touch Him....softer than starlight

Now come on 'cuz He's the only one, who can change your life and make you feel this way, He knows cuz He's the only one, that can make your life seem brand new every day
GeneralComments: Written in the 1980's.

Title: Swing the cradle
Lyrics:
Swing the cradle of the child of Brij
 The beloved Son of Nanda is swinging in the cradle
 The cradle of gold has a string of silk
 Sing the Arathi to Nandalala
 Who swings happily in His cradle

Title: Ta Parole est lumiere, Halleluja!
Lyrics:
Ta Parole est lumiere, Halleluja!
 Ta Parole est sagesse, Halleluja!
 Ta Parole est tendresse, Halleluja!
 Ta parole est vivante, Halleluja!
 Chantez au Seigneur un chant nouveau!
 Benissez son nom et rendez Grace!
 Au son de la trompette et du cor,
 Eclatez en cris de joie!
 Refrain
 Tu etends la main et tu me sauves.
 Seigneur, eternel est Ton Amour!
 Ne cesse pas l`oeuvre de tes mains
 Ta parole est Verite !
 Refrain
 Tu as fait connaitre Ton salut !
 Tu as fait connaitre Tes Merveilles!
 Chantez au Seigneur un chant nouveau.
 Maintenant et a jamais!
 
 Meaning:
 Your word is light!
 Your word is wisdom!
 Your word is tenderness!
 Sing to the Lord a new song
 Bless His name and give Thanks
 To the sound of the trumpet and the horn!
 Raise shouts of joy!
 You stretch out Your hand and You save me !
 Lord, Eternal is Your Love!
 Do not cease the work of Your hands
 Your word is Truth!
 You made known Your salvation!
 You made known Your wonders!
 Sing [for] the Lord a new song!
 Now until forever

Title: Take a lesson from the sun
Lyrics:
Take a lesson from the sun that shines its light on everyone
 or the rain that falls on every single shore
 No distinction of our race or the color of our face
 Nature's gifts are there for all men rich or poor
 Chorus:
 Love all Serve all Understand that love and peace are what we need.
 Love all serve all In every single thought word and deed
 Bear all and do nothing, hear all abnd say nothing
 Give all and take nothing in return
 Love is giving and forgiving; self is getting and forgetting
 Love all in the spirit of pure joy
 Serve all in the spirit of pure love
 (Repeat Chorus)

Title: Take me away, wont You carry me
Lyrics:
Take me away, wont You carry me
Love me with the sweetness of Your smile
Take me away, won't You carry me
Let me rest in Your arms for a while

Take me away
Baba take me away

Take me away won't You carry me
Let me fly beside You for a while

Take me away wont You carry me
Let me rest in Your arms for a while
Songglossary: baba

Title: Take my Hand O Sai
Lyrics:
Take my Hand O Sai Sathya Sai
 Take my Hand and walk me through this land
 Take my hand O Sai Sathya Sai (second variation)
 Take my Hand and walk me through this land
 Take my heart O Sai Sathya sai
 Take my heart and fill it with your love
 Your Love will be the Love Divine
 Walk with me dear Sai your Hand in Mine

Title: Take one step towards Me
Lyrics:
Take one step towards Me, one step towards Me,
 I'll take a hundred towards you
 Lord of Creation, Lord of Truth
 Lord of Love
 Shed only one tear, only one tear, I'll wipe a hundred away
 Lord of Compassion, Lord of Peace
 Lord of Love

Title: Take our hands and guide us
Lyrics:
Take our hands and guide us, Lord
 Take our hands we pray
 Take our hands and guide us, Lord
 And help us find the way
 Through the darkest night
 Through the hardest day
 Take our hands and guide us, Lord
 And we will find the way

Title: Take us to the Kalpataru
Lyrics:
Take us to the Kalpataru, grant our wishes, fill our needs
 Let us climb into its branches, rest in the Tree of Life
 Baba planted the Kalpataru, Baba gave us life to live
 We're all part of the Kalpataru, limbs on the Tree of Life

Title: Talk with Him, glory Divine
Lyrics:
Talk with Him, glory Divine
 Walk with Him, Love of mine
 Move with Him in the spirit of holiness
 Work, there's work to be done
 Meditate on Him glory Divine
 Concentrate on Him, Love of mine
 Do your part with hands and heart
 Work, There's work to be done

Title: Tamaso ma jyotir gamaya
Lyrics:
Tamaso ma jyotir gamaya
 Lead us from darkness into the light
 Shirdi Baba Jai, Shirdi Baba Jai, Baba Aum
 Sathya Baba Jai, Sathya Baba Jai, Baba Aum
 Prema Baba Jai, Prema Baba Jai, Baba Aum

Title: Tandava Priyakara Sai Parameshwara
Lyrics:
Tandava Priyakara Sai Parameshwara
Nachey Sai Shankara Nataraja
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey
Ghana Ghana Bhajey Payaliya
Nachey Gangadhara Nachey Bimbadhara [ Nachey Sai ... ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Sai, the Lord of Lords, Lord Shiva is adorned with the sacred Ganges in His hair and wears the crescent moon. He delights in His cosmic dance to the beat of the drums while the sound of His anklets reverberates in tune.
Songglossary: bhaja, bimbadhara, dama, damaru, ganga, ghana, nach, nataraj, param, payal, priya, sai, shankara, tandava

Title: Tataeyo Tataeyo Sai Baba wo
Lyrics:
Tataeyo Tataeyo Sai Baba wo
 Ai ni Michita Kami wo (Sai)
 Jiai no Umi no Kami wo (Sai)
 Chikara Naki Mono Mamoru Kami
 Kurushii Toki no Yorisou Kami
 Ai no Keshin yo Sai Baba
 Sei naru Ai no Kami Sai Baba
 
 Sung to the tune of Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram

Title: Te Damos Gracias Senor
Lyrics:
Te Damos Gracias Senor, Por Tu Gran Presencia Humana
 Te Alabamos Senor, Sathya Sai Narayana
 Apartanos Senor, De Toda Vida Mundana
 Danos Tu Darshan Senor, Sathya Sai Narayana
Meaning:
We thank You, O Lord, for Your great human presence; We worship You, O Lord, Sathya Sai Narayana
 Keep us away, O Lord, from all the mundane in this world, and grant us Your darshan (vision).

Title: Teertha Vittala Kshetra Vittala
Lyrics:
Teertha Vittala Kshetra Vittala
Deva Vittala Pooja Vittala [ Teertha Vittala ... ]
Sai Vittala Baba Vittala
Bandhu Vittala Guravey Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sri Hari Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sai Hari Vittala
Meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Panduranga Vittala, the Lord who resides in all holy places, the God you worship, who is your preceptor, kith and kin and who is none other than Sai Hari.
Songglossary: baba, bandhava, deva, guru, hari, kshetra, natha, pandari, pandu, pooja, sai, sri, teertha, vittala

Title: Tell us a story
Lyrics:
Tell us a story so we understand
 Jesus, teacher and friend
 Show us heaven that children know
 Let our love for the Father grow
 Ever gentle and humble
 Jesus, my teacher and friend

Title: Temple bells are ringing
Lyrics:
Temple bells are ringing now in Parthi
Calling us to come and see our Lord
Let's rejoice and sing His divine glory
Blessed are we to have His love and grace (2x)
Krishna, Buddha, Jesus, Allah, Sai
All are but the soul that shines within
Let's rejoice and sing His divine glory
Blessed are we to have His love and grace (2x)
Songglossary: allah, buddha, krishna, puttaparthi, sai

Title: Ten Pazhani Nadanukku Hara Haro
Lyrics:
Ten Pazhani Nadanukku Hara Haro Hara
Eru Mayil Velanukku Hara Haro Hara
Hara Haro Hara Muruga Hara Haro Hara
Hara Haro Hara Shanmuga Hara Haro Hara
Swamimalai Nadanukku Hara Haro Hara
Tiruchendur Velanukku Hara Haro Hara
Parthipuri Nadanukku Hara Haro Hara 
Shakti Vadivelanukku Hara Haro Hara 
Hara Haro Hara Muruga Hara Haro Hara
Hara Haro Hara Shanmuga Hara Haro Hara
Meaning: Glory be to the Lord of Palani (Lord Subrahmanyam), the one who rides on a peacock, the Lord of many holy places, and to the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: eru, hara, harana, mayil, natha, pazhani, puttaparthi, shakthi, shanmukha, subramanya, swami, ten, tiruchendur, vadivel, vel

Title: Terey Darshana Ko Mera Mana
Lyrics:
Terey Darshana Ko Mera Mana Tarasey
Gopala Darshana Do Nandalala
Neeraja Lochana Hey Guna Dhama
Peetambara Dhara Hey Ghana Shyama
Darshana Do Darshana Do Nandalala [ Gopala Darshana ]
Meaning: Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) the virtuous one with lotus eyes, wearing the yellow clothes, please give your vision me, my heart is pining for you.
Songglossary: darsh, dhama, dhara, do, ghana, gopal, guna, hey, lochana, mana, mera, nanda, neeraja, peetambara, sham, taras, tera

Title: Terey Janam Din Me Sai
Lyrics:
Terey Janam Din Me Sai Tujhe Koti Pranam Karenge
Tujhe Koti Pranam Karenge Tujhe Koti Pranam Karenge [ Terey Janam ... ]
Teri Janma Bhumi Me Sai Aye Bichchade Behan Aur Bhai
Teri Pooja Karne Baba Teri Prashanti Me Ayenge [ Terey Janam ... ]
Dhanya Ho Eshwaramba Merey Sai Ko Tumne Janma
Teyis November Ko Baba Sai Bhajan Aur Gaan Karenge
Happy Birthday To You Sai Rama Happy Birthday To You Sai Baba
Meaning: Lord Sai on Your Birthday, we bow to you a million times. We, brothers and sisters, will congregate in Prashanthi, Your birth place, to perform puja to You. Blessed Mother Eshwaramba gave birth to my Sai on November 23rd, so that I may sing his praises.
Songglossary: aana, aao, aur, baba, behan, bhai, bhaja, bhumi, bichchade, dhanya, din, eshwar, gaan, ho, janam, karo, karoon, koti, mera, pooja, pranamami, prasanthi, ram, sai, tera, teyis, tum

Title: Terey Siwa Prabhu Koi Nahin
Lyrics:
Terey Siwa Prabhu Koi Nahin Hai Tuj Ko Mera Pranam
Tuj Ko Mera Pranam O Sai Baba Tuj Ko Mera Pranam
Murali Manohara Asha Na Todo
Dukh Bhanjana Mera Sath Na Chodo
Dwar Khada Hoon Main Dukhiyara
Sun Ley Meri Pukar O Sai Baba Sun Ley Meri Pukar
Meaning: Oh Lord there is nobody for me except you, please accept my salutations. Oh beautiful Lord Krishna (Murali Manohara) do not disappoint me, Oh destroyer of sorrows, do not leave me. I am standing at your door with sorrowful mind. Please listen to my cries Oh Sai Baba.
Songglossary: asha, baba, bhanjana, chodo, dukh, dukhiya, dwarey, hai, hoon, khada, koi, ley, manohar, mera, murali, na, nahin, prabhu, pranamami, pukar, sai, sat, siwa, sun, tera, todo, tumhey

Title: The devotee should always remember the Master
Lyrics:
The devotee should always remember the Master by name
 The name of the Master is the name of the Great One
 Praise the living God by name
 The name of the Master is the name of the Great One

Title: The Lord gave the world
Lyrics:
The Lord gave the world such a beautiful sound
Om, Om, Om, Hari Om
The Lord gave the world such a beautiful sound
Om, Om, Om, Hari Om

Hari Om, Hari Om, Hari Om, Hari Om
Om, Om, Om, Hari Om
Hari Om, Hari Om, Hari Om, Hari Om
Om, Om, Om, Hari Om

From the silence of nothing the Lord gave the Word
Om, Om, Om, Hari Om
From the sound of God came this beautiful world
Om, Om, Om, Hari Om

Hari Om, Hari Om, Hari Om, Hari Om
Om, Om, Om, Hari Om
Hari Om, Hari Om, Hari Om, Hari Om
Om, Om, Om, Hari Om

Title: The Lord is deep within me
Lyrics:
The Lord is deep within me
 The Lord is deep within me
 Loving and holy so I want to be
 a vessel of honor for Him
 a vessel of honor for God
 a vessel of honor for God
 loving and holy so I want to be
 a vessel of honor for God
 I praise the Lord by serving Him
 I praise the Lord by serving Him
 loving and holy so I want to be
 a vessel of honor for God
 a vessel of honor for God
 a vessel of honor for God
 loving and holy so I want to be
 a vessel of honor for God

Title: The Lord is with you
Lyrics:
The Lord is with you, be not afraid
 Behold I am with You from age to age
 The Lord is with you, be not afraid
 Sing Praises to our Lord in every Name and Form
 Rama Buddha Jesus Allah Praise to our Lord
 Sing Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai
 Sathya Sai Ram Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram (4X)

Title: The Lord of Light
Lyrics:
The Lord of Light shines within our hearts, He purifies our lives
 O Holy God, make us one with Thee, in divinity
 Sweet Lord Sai, fill us with your love
 The Lord of peace stills our troubled minds, He soothes us with His Bliss
 O Holy God, bring us into Thee, in infinity
 Sweet Lord Sai, fill us with Your Love

Title: The Lord unites our many faiths
Lyrics:
The Lord unites our many faiths
 Sai brings us together
 Allah Jesus Buddha and Nanak
 You are Zoroastra and Mahavir (2x)
 You are Rama, You are Krishna
 You are everything to me (2x)
 
 Sung to the tune of Sarva Dharma Priya Deva

Title: The Name Of God Is Flowing
Lyrics:
The Name Of God Is Flowing Within Me
I Hear It Always Singing Within Me
Allah, Allah Shivaya Sathya Sai Baba
Rama Rama Jehovah Buddha Lord Jesus
The Name Of God Is Flowing Within Me
I Hear It Always Singing Within Me
Songglossary: allah, baba, buddha, ram, sai, sathya, shiva

Title: The Name of God is sweet
Lyrics:
The Name of God is sweet on the tongue,
 So sing the Lord's Name everyone
 When we are near Him and call His Name,
 He brings us closer to Him again
 It doesn't matter what Name is sung,
 The Name of God is sweet on the tongue
 Krishna and Buddha, Jesus and Ram,
 Sathya Sai Baba, Bhagavaan.

Title: The ocean is wide
Lyrics:
The ocean is wide I can't cross over
 And neither have I wings to fly
 But there's a boat that can carry me
 He has the Name Sathya Sai
 His love is great, His love is endless
 His love is vaster than the sea
 O Swami, please, come take my hand
 Open my heart, lead me to Thee

Title: The one word to live by
Lyrics:
The one word to live by is Love
 Pure unselfish love
 When there is Love in your heart
 There is God in your heart
 I bless you to serve mankind
 Be living examples of Love
 When there is Love in your heart
 There is God in your heart

Title: The star is shining so bright
Lyrics:
The star is shining so bright
 Everything is going to be alright
 Remember the Lord within
 And everything is going to be alright
 When you have no one to turn to
 Surrender yourself at His Feet
 Loving Jesus will be by your side
 Our Savior is by our side
 The star is shining so bright
 Everything is going to be alright

Title: The teacher of the teachers
Lyrics:
The teacher of the teachers is our Sai (2x)
 He teaches us peace
 He teaches us love
 He teaches us kindness
 He teaches us righteousness
 Come you all, come to Him
 Come you all, learn from Him
 The teacher of the teachers is our Sai

Title: There are many races in this land
Lyrics:
There are many races in this land; in different halls we pray
 We call Him by different Names, the One Who shows the way
 The One who shows the way, my Lord, by what Name can we pray?
 Krishna, Buddha, Jesus Allah, come and show the way
 Your children here do pray
 Please come and show the way

Title: There Is Love within Me
Lyrics:
There Is Love Within Me (3), I Am Love
There Is Peace Within Me (2), There Is Peace, I Am Peace
There Is Truth Within Me (3), I Am Truth
There Is Bliss Within Me (2), There Is Bliss, I Am Bliss
There Is Light Within Me (3), I Am Light
There Is God Within Me (2), There Is God, I Am God
Harey Rama Rama (3), Harey Om
Sai Rama Rama, Sai Rama Rama, Sai Ram, Sai Om
Songglossary: hari, om, ram, sai

Title: There Is No Birth, There Is No Death
Lyrics:
There Is No Birth, There Is No Death, There Is No You Or I
There Is Only Sathya Sai, Beloved Sathya Sai
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Beloved Sathya Sai
There Is No Sun, There Is No Moon, There Is No Earth Or Sky
There Is Only Sathya Sai, Beloved Sathya Sai [ Sathya Sai ... ]
Songglossary: sai, sathya, sun

Title: There Is Only One Religion
Lyrics:
There Is Only One Religion, The Religion Of Love
There Is Only One Language, The Language Of The Heart
There Is Only One God, And He Is Omnipresent
No More Anxiety, Simply Joy And Peace
There Is Only One Religion, The Religion Of Love
Songglossary: more

Title: There’s a change in the air
Lyrics:
There's a change in the air
 There's a new day comin'
 A new way of living, and a new way of lovin'
 A new way of knowing
 Understanding and sharing
 For Sathya Sai Baba teaches
 Service and caring
 Sathya Sai, to You we pray - help us share our love today
 Grant us vision, that we may see - instruments of love we'll be
 Sathya Sai Baba, we're never parted
 As long as we're loving, and open - hearted
 Love is the way, and love is the key
 Let's open the door to living peaceful and free
 One people, one planet - it's within our grasp
 As Sathya Sai Baba makes it come to pass
 It's very simple, there's nothing to it
 Let's open our hearts and go out and do it

Title: There’s a song in my heart
Lyrics:
There's a song in my heart, in my heart (2x)
 I think constantly of Him
 So He guides me from within
 He's the song and the beat of my heart
 Sai is here in my heart, in my heart (2X)
 When I call out in distress
 I let go, He'll do the rest
 Sai is here in my heart, in my heart
 Sai is God in my heart, in my heart (2X)
 Sai has come to you and me
 Wonders for all to see
 Sai is God in my heart, in my heart
 Sai is Love in my heart, in my heart (2X)
 His message is His life
 Serving others ends the strife
 Sai is Love in my heart, in my heart

Title: There’s a world of love
Lyrics:
There's a world of love around us, there's a world of love inside us,
 there is love if we could only feel it now
 The Avatar has come to save us, the Avatar has come to guide
 us, the Avatar has come and His name it is Sai
 Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
 Speak the truth, never lie, keep your word,
 see this world is but a dream - it is not real
 Look inside, search for peace, do not pray for wealth or power, or worldly things
 The Avatar has come to save us, the Avatar has come to guide
 us, the Avatar has come and His name it is Sai
 Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
 This world has many nations, races, castes, and religions
 Let us work to be together not apart
 We should love one another, we should help and serve each other,
 let us strive to see the many as the One
 Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
 (This song may be sung in unison, or with only the chorus in unison)

Title: There’s only one God
Lyrics:
There's only one God, but many are His names
 The goal of all religions has always been the same
 To purify your mind and heart, and to yourself be true
 And never do to others what you wouldn't want done to you
 There's only one God
 And He is everywhere
 He's love
 And love's for all to share
 So purify your mind and heart, and to yourself be true
 And never do to others what you wouldn't want done to you

Title: These are the days
Lyrics:
These are the days when the golden age has come
 We are the workers who chose to make the run
 From darkness into light
 Swami is our light
 He's the one
 This is the time when the changes will occur
 We must be prepared to help the helpless ones
 From darkness into light
 Swami is our light
 He's the One

Title: This little light of mine,
Lyrics:
This little light of mine,
 I'm gonna let it shine.
 This little light of mine,
 I'm gonna let it shine.
 This little light of mine,
 I'm gonna let it shine.
 Let it shine, let it shine, let it shine.
 Even in my home,
 I'm gonna let it shine.
 Even in my home,
 I'm gonna let it shine.
 Even in my home,
 I'm gonna let it shine.
 Let it shine, let it shine, let it shine.
 God gave it to me and
 I'm gonna let it shine.
 God gave it to me and
 I'm gonna let it shine.
 God gave it to me and
 I'm gonna let it shine.
 Let it shine, let it shine, let it shine.
 (First verse sung as a chorus throughout)

Title: Thou art the Father
Lyrics:
Thou art the Father, Thou art the Mother
 Thou art the Guru, come in Sathya form
 To manifest all form
 Thy Name is Sai Ram
 Thy Form is Om
 Thy Voice is Vedam
 Called once, Thou come thrice
 For one step, Thou take three
 Come, my Lord, embrace
 Come, my Lord, enlighten
 Come, my Lord, my love
 Come, my Lord, my life

Title: Through eyes of Love
Lyrics:
Through eyes of Love, the world is beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautiful and perfect, just as it is. 
Ev'rything is in its place, and is perfect!

Title: Thy will be done on earth
Lyrics:
Thy will be done on earth as in heaven
Thy will be done Sai, Thy will be done
Thy will be done on earth as in heaven
Thy will be done Sai, Thy will be done
Help us surrender Sai, help us remember you with every breath
Thy will be done Sai, Thy will be done
GeneralComments: The scale switches to Major in the line "Help us surrender Sai ... ".
Songglossary: sai

Title: Thy will be done on earth
Lyrics:
Thy will be done on earth as in Heaven
 Thy will be done Sai Thy will be done
 Thy will be done on earth as in Heaven
 Thy will be done Sai Thy will be done
 Help us surrender Sai, Help us remember you with every breath (2X)

Title: Tiene cabeza de elefante y
Lyrics:
Tiene Cabeza De Elefante Y Un Vientre Grande De Gloton
Destruye Las Dificultades Del Hombre Que Busca A Dios
Shri Ganesha, Shri Ganesha, Shri Ganesha Protegenos
Meaning: You have the head of an elephant and a large stomach. Destroy the difficulties of men who look for God. Shri Ganesha, protect us.
Songglossary: ganesha, sri, un

Title: Time waste is life waste
Lyrics:
Time waste is life waste for me and for you
 This lesson from Sai we all know is true
 So use your time wisely and watch yourself grow
 closer to God as each day does go
 Time waste is life waste for me and for you
 This lesson from Sai we all know is true

Title: Tirumala Vasa Tirupati Esha
Lyrics:
Tirumala Vasa Tirupati Esha
Devadi Deva Govinda
Pushkarini Thata Vasa Srinivasa
Punya Murthy Sathya Sai Govinda
Govinda Govinda Tirupati Vasa (Parthi Nivasa) Govinda
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Govinda, Lord of Virtues, who has Tirumala Hills at Tirupati as your abode on the banks of sacred Pushkarini.
Songglossary: deva, devadi, esha, govinda, murthy, nivasa, punya, pushkarini, puttaparthi, sai, sathya, srinivasa, thata, tirumala, tirupati, vasa

Title: Tirumalesha Ramana Govinda
Lyrics:
Tirumalesha Ramana Govinda
Parthi Puri Ramana Sayeesha [ Tirumalesha Ramana ... ]
Gangadhara Hara Pannaga Bhooshana
Sri Nilaya Hari Kaustubha Dhari
Hari Hara Roopa Sri Venkatesha
Meaning: Oh Lord Sayeesha the beloved Lord of Parthi, you are the Lord Govinda the beloved Lord of Tirumala and Lord Shankara holding river Ganges on the head and adorning serpent as an ornament. You are the one who wears the Kaustubha jewel and you are Lord Venkatesha who is the embodiment of Hari (Vishnu) and Hara (Shiva).
Songglossary: bhooshan, dhari, ganga, govinda, hara, hari, kaustubha, nilaya, pannaga, puri, puttaparthi, ramana, roopa, sayee, sri, tirumalesha, venkatesha

Title: Tirupati Malaimel Iruppavane
Lyrics:
Tirupati Malaimel Iruppavane
Tirada Vinayellam Tirppavane
Shrinivasa Govinda Shri Venkatesha Govinda
Ullamam Kovilil Iruppavane Ulagorai Vazhvikka Vandavane
Sankatam Tavirttidum Govinda Venkata Ramana Govinda
Ezhu Malaimel Iruppavane Ella Vinaigalaiyum Tirppavane
Shirdi Sayi Govinda Shri Sathya Sayi Govinda
Meaning: Lord Govinda residing on Mount Tirupati, is the remover of all sins. He dwells in the temple of the heart and incarnates to save the world. residing beyond the seven hills, He is also Lord Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.
Songglossary: ella, ezhu, govinda, iruppavane, kovilil, malaimel, ramana, sai, sankata, sathya, shirdi, sri, srinivasa, tavirttidum, tirada, tirkkum, tirupati, ulagorai, ullam, varum, vazh, venkatesha, vinai

Title: Tis a gift to be simple
Lyrics:
Tis a gift to be simple, 'tis a gift to be free
 'Tis a gift to know one's own divinity
 And when our hearts are filled by the bright shining sun
 We will see God's light within everyone
 When true simplicity is gained
 To bow and to bend we won't be ashamed
 By serving each other, we serve the Lord
 And are tied to the Truth with a golden cord.

Title: Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy
Lyrics:
Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy a Ti (iiiiiii)
Te Lo Doy a Ti Como Tu Me Lo Diste a Mi
Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
Todo Mi Trabajo Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
Todo Mi Trabajo Te Lo Doy a Ti (iiiiiii)
Te Lo Doy a Ti Como Tu Me Lo Diste a Mi
Todo Mi Trabajo Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
Toda Mi Mente Te La Doy a Ti Baba
Toda Mi Mente Te La Doy a Ti (iiiiiii)
Te Lo Doy a Ti Como Tu Me La Diste a Mi
Toda Mi Mente Te La Doy a Ti Baba
Toda Mi Vida Te La Doy a Ti Baba
Toda Mi Vida Te La Doy a Ti (iiiiiii)
Te Lo Doy a Ti Como Tu Me La Diste a Mi
Toda Mi Vida Te La Doy a Ti Baba
Meaning: I Give All My Love To You Baba; I Give To You What You have Given To Me. I Give All My efforts To You Baba; I Give To You What You have Given To Me. I Give All My Thoughts To You Baba. I Give All My Life To You Baba; I Give To You What You have Given To Me. I Give All My Life To You Baba. I dedicate myself and all that I do to You. I give my life, my work, and my mind to You. I am love because You loved me first. So I give everything to You for You have given everything to me.

Title: Treta Yug Me Ram Dwapara
Lyrics:
Treta Yug Me Ram Dwapara Yug Me Shyam
Kaliyug Ke Sai Ram Parthipuri Sai Shyam
Shri Ram Ghana Shyam Sai Ram Sai Shyam [ Treta Yug ... ]
Ayodhyavasi Ram Mathura Vasi Shyam
Prashanti Vasi Ram Parthipuri Sai Shyam [ Shri Ram ... ]
Meaning: Sai is the incarnation of this Kali age residing in Parthi. In the Treta age He was Rama, resident of Ayodhya and in the Dwapara age, He incanted as Krishna in Mathura.
Songglossary: ayodhya, dwapara, ghana, kali, ke, mathura, prasanthi, puttaparthi, ram, sai, sham, sri, treta, vasi, yuga

Title: Tribhuvana Pala Shirdi Pureesha
Lyrics:
Tribhuvana Pala Shirdi Pureesha
Araj Suno Merey Baba
Deena Janon Ke Tum Rakhwaley
Shyama Manohara Muraliwale
In Aankhon Ke Pyaas Bujhadey
Darshana Do Parthi Baba [ Araj Suno ... ]
Meaning: Oh Lord of Shirdi, who sustains of the three worlds, guardian of the helpless, who has an enchanting form with the flute, in His hand. Oh Lord, pay heed to our prayers and satiate our hunger for your vision Oh Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: aankhon, araj, baba, bujhadey, darsh, deen, do, jana, ke, manohar, mera, murali, pala, pureesha, puttaparthi, pyaas, rakhwaley, sham, shirdi, suno, tribhuvan, tum

Title: Trilochana Hey Tripurari
Lyrics:
Trilochana Hey Tripurari
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara [ Trilochana ... ]
Paahi Murari Jaya Partheesha
Nandi Vahana Nagabharana
Meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi, protect us, you are none other than Lord Shankara who is the Consort of Mother Gowri and the Lord of the three worlds. You are the three eyed Lord Shankara who adorns snake as an ornament, who rides on a Bull (Nandi).
Songglossary: ganga, gowri, hey, jatadhara, jay, murare, nagabharana, nandi, paahi, partheeshwara, shankara, trilochana, tripura, vahana

Title: Triloka Palaka Trishoola Dharaka
Lyrics:
Triloka Palaka Trishoola Dharaka
Trilochana Harey Bala Shiva
Shibey Jata Joota Kantey Kalakoota
Chidambaresha Natana Shiva
Meaning: Lord Shiva sustains the three worlds, three eyed and holds Trident, as the weapon, is young, having matted hair, is the presiding Lord of dance at the temple town Chidambaram.
Songglossary: bala, chidambara, dhara, hari, jata, joota, kalakoota, kantey, natana, palaka, shiva, trilochana, triloka, trishoola

Title: Triloka Palini Jagadeeshwari
Lyrics:
Triloka Palini Jagadeeshwari
Sadananda Roopini Sayeeshwari [ Triloka Palini ... ]
Karunya Lavanya Kadambari
Partheeshwari Amba Shiva Shankari
Meaning: Oh Mother Sayeeshwari, the protector of the three worlds, one who is always blissful, compassionate and beautiful, the Mother of Parthi, the consort of Shiva, our salutations to Thee.
Songglossary: amba, anand, jagadeeshwari, kadamba, karuna, lavanya, palini, partheeshwari, sada, sayee, shankari, shiva, swaroopa, triloka

Title: Tripura Sundari Ma Amba Daya
Lyrics:
Tripura Sundari Ma Amba Daya Sagari Ma
Sundara Vadani Ma Amba Suguna Manohari Ma
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Amba Jagadodharini Ma
Parthi Nivasini Ma Amba Paapa Vimochani Ma
Meaning: Oh mother of Parthi you are the most beautiful in all the three worlds, you are the ocean of compassion, full of virtues you are the mother who liberates the world and frees us from our sins.
Songglossary: amba, daya, jagadodhara, jagat, janani, jay, ma, manohar, nivasi, paapa, puttaparthi, sagar, soundari, suguna, sundara, tripura, vadana, vimochana

Title: Tripurari Shiva Shankara
Lyrics:
Tripurari Shiva Shankara
Naga Bhooshana Naga Bharana [ Tripurari Shiva ... ]
Omkareshwara Namah Shivaya
Mahakaleshwara Namah Shivaya
Meaning: Oh Lord Shiva (also called Shankara), the slayer of the demons of Tripura, the one who wears the serpent as ornament, the personification of the primordial sound "Om", the Lord Mahakaleshwar (Shiva's another name), I offer my salutations to Thee.
GeneralComments: The second line is also sung as "Nandi Vahana Naga Bharana".
Songglossary: bharana, bhooshan, mahakaleshwara, naga, namah, omkareshwara, shankara, shiva, tripurari

Title: True, Knowing, Boundless God
Lyrics:
True, Knowing, Boundless God (3x)
 True God / Knowing God / Boundless God
 
 Sung to the tune of Sathyam Jnanam Anatham Brahma

Title: Truth is the doorway
Lyrics:
Truth is the doorway, Peace is the key.
 Step through in goodness - Such love you'll see.
 The Lord is watching, He'll show you the way
 To bliss and freedom, with every new day.
 Through all our sorrows, He shines His grace,
 Comforts and guides us, with His smiling face.
 At last you'll see Him, He'll take you home.
 Sai, Mother, Father, Jai Sai Ram Om

Title: Tu eres el Amor
Lyrics:
Tu eres el Amor de este corazon
Y eres esa Luz que brilla en mi interior
Tu eres la dulzura que embriaga el alma
Y eres la ternura que me da calma
Tu eres la sonrisa en labios infantiles
Y eres el suspiro en los an'os seniles
T eres la esperanza en la juventud
Y eres la Conciencia en la Plenitud
Tu eres Esto y eres Aquello
Y eres Todo a mi alrededor
Tu eres el Padre y eres la Madre
Y eres el duen'o de mi corazon
Meaning:
You Are the Love of this heart and You are the bright light that is inside me.

You are the sweetness that engrosses the soul and You are the tenderness that calms me.

You are the smile in the infant's lips and You are the sigh of relief to the old.

You are the hope for the young and You are the Consciousness for the Plentiful (liberated soul).

You are This, You are That and You are everything around me. 

You are the Father and You are the Mother and You are the Owner of my heart.
GeneralComments: This bhajan has been composed by a devotee from Miami Sai Center who is affectionately known as Mom Cuca. She dedicated her life completely to Swami doing service even in her last days. She left her mortal coil precisely on November 23 some years ago.
Songglossary: todo, tum

Title: Tu eres Ram Tu eres
Lyrics:
Tu Eres Ram, Tu Eres Shyam, To Lo Eres Todo, Oh Mi Senor
Yo Te Ilamo Baba, Yo Te Ilamo Sai, Solo Te Pido Yo Tu Bendicion [ Tu Eres ... ]
Omkaram, Om Sai Ram, Oh Mi Senor, Om
Yo Te Ofrezco Mi Oracion, So Te Alabo Y Lloro Tu Nombre.
Ayudame Oh Sai, Cuidame Oh Sai, Solo Te Pido Tu Bendicion
Meaning: You are Ram, You are Shyam, You are everything, Lord. I call Baba, I call Sai, I only ask for your blessing. I offer my prayer only to praise You and call Your name. Help me O Sai, take care of me. I only ask for your blessing.
Songglossary: baba, ley, om, ram, sai, sham, so, todo, tum

Title: Tu Hai Anatha Bandhu
Lyrics:
Tu Hai Anatha Bandhu
Karuna Sindho Sri Sai Bhagawan [ Tu Hai ... ]
Dukh Aur Dard Ko Door Karo
Sukh Ke Karana Dukh Ke Nivaran
Main Kya Janoon Teri Leela (Mahima)
Mamata Maya Mey Sab Hai Andhera (2)
Meaning: Lord Sai is the friend of the forlorn and HE is full of compassion. How can we ever know your grandeur, Oh Sai ? You are the cause of happiness and remover of sorrow when we are stooped in the darkness of ignorance ?
Songglossary: anath, andhera, aur, bandhava, bhagawan, dard, door, dukh, hai, jaanat, kaarana, karo, karuna, ke, kya, leela, mahima, mamata, maya, nivarana, sab, sai, sindhu, sri, sukh, tera, tum

Title: Tu que eres la lluvia
Lyrics:
Tu que eres la lluvia
 Tu que eres el sol
 Haz que mi mente sea limpia
 Y puro mi corazon, oh! Sen`or
 Tu que vaz por la vida.
 Cosechando amor
 Toma mi mano y perdona.
 Mis faltas oh! Sen`or
 Toma mi mano y camina.
 Dentro de mi corazon, dame amor
 
 Meaning:
 You, Who are the rain
 You, Who are the sun
 Please cleanse my mind
 Make my heart pure, oh! My Lord
 You, Who go through life.
 Sowing love
 Take my hand and forgive.
 All my faults, oh! My Lord
 Take my hand and walk.
 Within my heart, let me develop love

Title: Tulasi Mala Dhaari Krishna
Lyrics:
Tulasi Mala Dhaari Krishna
Tunga Teera Vihari Krishna [ Tulasi Mala Dhaari ... ]
Gopi Manasa Gopala Krishna
Gopala Krishna Gopala Krishna [ Gopi Manasa ... ]
Govinda Govinda Sai Krishna
Meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Gopala Krishna, Govinda Krishna the one who has worn the Tulasi garland and has installed Himself on the banks of River Tunga and has captured the minds of the Gopikas.
Songglossary: dhaari, gopal, gopi, govinda, krishna, mala, manasa, sai, teera, tulasi, tunga, vihar

Title: Tum Bin Pran Nahin O
Lyrics:
Tum Bin Pran Nahin O Sai Merey
Sab Bhakthon Ka Tu Hai Sahara
Rahim Kaho Raghu Rama Kaho [ Tum Bin ... ]
Nanak Yesu Mahavira Shiva Shankara Premavatara Sai Ram
Tum Ho Merey Pran O Sai Merey
Tu Hai Sai Bhagawan
Meaning: Oh compassionate Lord Sai Ram, Lord Shankara you are also none other than Guru Nanak, Yesu and Mahavira. Lord Sai, we adore You as personification of Love, the basis of all faiths. Chant, Ram, Rahim, Nanak, Yesu, Mahavir. Oh Sai there would be no life without You.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhakthon, bin, hai, ho, ka, kaho, mahavir, mera, nahin, nanak, pran, premavatara, raghu, rahim, ram, sab, sahara, sai, shankara, shiva, tum, yesu

Title: Tum Ho Allah Tum Ho
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Allah Tum Ho Maulah
Sarva Dharma Priya Guru Deva
Tum Ho Yeshu Tum Ho Nanak
Sarva Dharma Priya Guru Dev
Tum Ho Buddha Tum Ho Bhagawan
Sarva Dharma Priya Guru Dev
Gurudev Gurudev
Sai Ram Megha Shyam
Meaning: Lord Sai! You uphold all religions and support the unity of all faiths. You are Allah, Nanak, Buddha, Jesus, and the Eternal Teacher.
Songglossary: allah, bhagawan, buddha, dev, deva, dharma, guru, gurudev, ho, maulah, megha, nanak, priya, ram, sai, sarva, sham, tum, yesu

Title: Tum Ho Anatha Nath Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Anatha Nath Bhagawan
O Sai Merey Prana Sakha Bhagawan
Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Tum Ho
Bhaktha (Deena) Sakha Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan (2)
Prana Sakha Bhagawan (O Sai Merey)
Meaning: Oh Sai Bhagawan, You are the Lord of the forlorn, closest friend for your devotees. You are everything, the Mother, Father, preceptor and even the kith and kin.
Songglossary: anath, bandhava, bhagawan, bhaktha, deen, guru, ho, mata, mera, natha, pitha, praan, sai, sakha, tum

Title: Tum ho Daata Sai Shankara
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Daata Sai Shankara
Hum Ko Deejo Ananda Baba [ Tum Ho Daata ... ]
Aao Shankara Anatha Natha
Deejo Darshana Deena Natha
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Shankara you are the one who bestows everything. We pray that you give us the eternal bliss. Please come and give vision Oh Lord Shankara, to the helpless and downtrodden.
Songglossary: aao, anand, anath, baba, daata, darsh, deejo, deen, ho, hum, natha, sai, shankara, tum

Title: Tum Ho Hamarey Sai Rakhawale
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Hamarey Sai Rakhawale
Darshan Do Bhagawan Darshan Do Bhagawan (Mujhe)
Tumhi Ho Mata Pitha Tumhi Ho
Tum Ho Deena Dayal (Baba) [ Darshan Do ... ]
Dukhi Jano Ke Bhaktha Jano Ke
Tum Ho Karuna Nidhan (Baba) [ Darshan Do ... ]
Meaning: O Lord Sai Ram! Please grant us the vision of Your Divine Form. O merciful Lord Baba! You are our Protector, Father, and Mother. You are the treasure house of compassion for the afflicted devotees.
Songglossary: baba, bhagawan, bhaktha, darsh, dayal, deen, do, dukhiya, hamarey, ho, jana, karuna, ke, mata, mujhe, nidhan, pitha, rakhwaley, sai, tum

Title: Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan (Baba)
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan (Baba)
Parthi Pureesha Sri Sai Natha
Shirdi Pureesha Hey Jagannatha [ Tum Ho ... ]
Prashanthi Vasa Sri Sai Natha
Purana Purusha Hey Jagannatha
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai, who was the Lord of Shirdi and now is the Lord of Parthi and is also Lord of the world and the Lord who was mentioned in great Epics (Puranas) like Mahabharata, Ramayana etc. , you are my Lord.
Songglossary: baba, bhagawan, hey, ho, jagan, mera, natha, prashanthi, puran, pureesha, purusha, puttaparthi, sai, shirdi, sri, tum, vasa

Title: Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan O
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan O Sai
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram [ Tum Ho ]
Allah Tum Ho Eshwar Tum Ho
Nanak Sai Yesu Tum Ho
Sab Dharmon Ke Sai Tum Ho
Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (2)
Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (2)
Meaning: Salutations to Sai Ram who is the Rama residing in our Atma (Higher Conscience or Higher Self). He is Allah, Eshwar, Nanak, Yesu and belongs to all faiths.
Songglossary: allah, atma, bhagawan, bolo, dharmo, eshwar, ho, jai, ke, mera, nanak, ram, sab, sai, tum, yesu

Title: Tum Ho Prabhu Ghana Shyam
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Prabhu Ghana Shyam O Sai
Parthi Vihari Shyama Murari [ Tum Ho ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Natavara Sundara Shyama Murari
Charana Kamala Balihaari Murari
Meaning: You are the Lord Krishna (Ghana Shyam) of the color of dark thick clouds, who slayed demon Mura, the supreme actor, enchanting, extolled by devotee Meera as Giridhara Naagara (Lifted the mountain Mandara, dexterously). I offer myself at your Lotus feet Oh Lord.
Songglossary: balihaari, chara, ghana, giridhar, ho, kamala, ke, meera, murare, naagar, natavara, prabhu, puttaparthi, sai, sham, sundara, tum, vihar

Title: Tum Ho Ram Tum Ho
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Ram Tum Ho Shyam
Bhakthon Ke Pran Bhagawan Sai Ram
Sita Ram Radhey Shyam
Eka Prabhu Sai Ram Bhagawan [ Bhakthon Ke ]
Meaning: Oh Sai, you are the very life of your devotees, all forms blended in one, though known as Sita Ram and Radhey Shyam.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhakthon, eka, ho, ke, prabhu, pran, radha, ram, sai, sham, sita, tum

Title: Tum Ho Shyam Ram Rahim
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Shyam Ram Rahim (Baba)
Ram Rahim Shyama Rahim [ Tum Ho ... ]
Allah Yesu Buddha Mahavira
Nanak Sai Zohrashtra Bhi Ho
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Narayana (Shankara)
Tum Ho Shyam Ram Rahim
Ram Rahim Shyam Rahim (3)
Meaning: You are the Lord of every religion Oh Sai. Devotees adore you as Ram, Rahim, Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahavira, Nanak, Zohrashtra, Narayana and Shankara.
Songglossary: allah, baba, bhi, buddha, dharma, ho, mahavir, nanak, narayana, priya, rahim, ram, sai, sarva, sham, shankara, tum, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Tum Ho Vighna Vinasha Ganesha
Lyrics:
Tum Ho Vighna Vinasha Ganesha (3)
Parvathi Nandana Paahi Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Parthi Pureesha
Paahi Ganesha Vighna Vinasha
Meaning: Protect me Oh Lord Ganesha, the destroyer of all obstacles, the son of Parvathi, the embodiment of primordial sound "OM" and the Lord of Parthi.
Songglossary: ganesha, ho, paahi, parvathi, pranava, pureesha, puttaparthi, swaroopa, tum, vighna, vinasha

Title: Tumhey Namaskar Sai Baba Tumhey
Lyrics:
Tumhey Namaskar Sai Baba Tumhey Namaskar Sai Baba
Pranam Mera Sweekar Bhagawan Parthi Puri Sai Deva [ Tumhey Namaskar ]
Hey Shiva Lingadhaari Baba Hey Ananda Daayi Baba [ Pranam Mera ]
Hey Vibhuti Sundara Baba Tum Ati Sundara Sai Baba (2)
Meaning: Accept our repeated obeisance Oh Bhagawan Sai Baba, the Lord of Parthi, the one who adorns the Shiva Linga, giver of supreme bliss. You smear yourself with Vibhuti (Holy Ash) and you are the most beautiful Sai.
Songglossary: anand, ati, baba, bhagawan, daayi, deva, hey, linga, mera, naman, pranamami, puri, puttaparthi, sai, shiva, sundara, sweekar, tum, tumhey, vibhuti

Title: Uma Maheshwara Kumara Ganapathi
Lyrics:
Uma Maheshwara Kumara Ganapathi
Namami Gajamukha Daya Nidhey
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sai Ganesha (2)
Bala Gajanana Krupa Nidhey (2)
Meaning: I bow to the elephant faced Lord Ganesha, with His entire family, parents Uma (Parvathi) and Maheshwara (Shiva) and brother Kumara (Lord Muruga). The Lord of ganaas (attendants of Lord Shiva) is dear to His devotees and is the repository of benevolence.
Songglossary: bala, bhaktha, daya, gajamukha, gananayaka, ganesha, jana, krupa, kumara, maheshwara, namam, nidhey, priya, sai, uma

Title: Uma Nandana Shri Ganesha
Lyrics:
Uma Nandana Shri Ganesha
Ganesha Ganesha Ganesha
Buddhi Pradatha Sai Ganesha
Pahi Prabho Mam Sai Ganesha
Prema Pradatha Vighna Vinasha
Ananda Dayaka Sai Ganesha
Atmabhibodhaka Jai Shri Ganesha
Meaning: Lord Ganesh, son of Mother Uma (Parvathi) bestows intellect, love, bliss, and self-realization. Glory to Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles and protector of his devotees.
Songglossary: anand, atmabhi, buddhi, dayaka, ganesha, jai, mam, nanda, paahi, prabhu, pradatha, prem, sai, sri, uma, vighna, vinasha

Title: Umayavale Arul Purivaiyamma
Lyrics:
Umayavale Arul Purivaiyamma
Omkara Roopini Akhilanda Nayaki
Adiyargal Vinai Tirkkum Adi Parasakti [ Umayavale Arul ... ]
Nan Seida Pizhaigalellam Poruppayamma
Jagadambige Shivaranjani
Meaning: Grace us O Goddess Uma! Ruler of the Universe! You are the personification of Aum; You are the divine energy, and the destroyer of sins. Forgive us, all our past errors, O Mother of the Universe, consort of Shiva.
Songglossary: adi, adiyargal, akhila, arul, jagadamba, nan, nayaka, om, parashakthi, pizhaigal, poruppai, pozhiyum, seibavane, shiva, swaroopa, tirkkum, uma, vinai

Title: Un Solo Dios
Lyrics:
Un Solo Dios Eres Tu, Eres Tu Mi Senor
Jesucristo, Mahavira, Un Solo Dios Y Nada Mas
Jehova O Allah, Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Sai
Zoroastro, Guru Nanak, Mazda, Buddha,
Narayana
Sathya Sai Baba Nos Unira, En Una Sola
Humanidad
Un Solo Dios Reinara, Un Solo Dios Nos Amara
Meaning: One God are you, You are my Lord, Jesus Christ Mahavira, Jehovah or Allah, Brahma Vishnu Shiva Sai Zoroaster Guru Nanak Mazda Buddha Narayana, Sathya Sai Baba will unite us into one humanity. One God will reign, one God will love us.
Songglossary: allah, amara, baba, brahma, buddha, guru, mahavir, mazda, nada, nanak, narayana, sai, sathya, shiva, tum, un, vishnu

Title: Va Va Murugaiyya Vadivel Azhaga
Lyrics:
Va Va Murugaiyya Vadivel Azhaga
Va Va Va Kumara Tiru Karthikeya [ Va Va ... ]
Singara Vela Shiva Shakti Bala
Sangeeta Lola Sathya Sayisha
Va Va Muruga Vadivel Azhaga (6)
Meaning: Come O beautiful Lord Muruga! Protect us, Karthikeya, the youthful son of Shiva and Shakti, and the bearer of the divine spear. You are Lord Sathya Sai, who enjoys divine music.
Songglossary: azhaga, bala, karthikeya, kumara, lola, murugaiyya, saisha, sangeeta, sathya, shakthi, shiva, singara, sri, subramanya, va, vadivel, vela

Title: Vahey Guru Vahey Guru
Lyrics:
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Bol

Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Bolo [ Vahey Guru ... ]

Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo

Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Bolo

Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwara Sri Sai Bol [ Sathya Naam ... ]
Meaning: Chant the names of Vahey Guru, Sathya Sai, Govinda, Gopala the Lord of Radha and Shirdi Sai.
Songglossary: bol, bolo, gopal, govinda, guru, hari, naam, purishwara, puttaparthi, radha, ramana, sai, sathya, shirdi, sri, vahey

Title: Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey
Lyrics:
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Ji Bolo
Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Jai Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiyey Terey Naam Jai Bolo [ Sathya Naam ]
Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Jai Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiyey Rama Naam Jai Bolo
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiyey Krishna Naam Jai Bolo
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai (2)
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Meaning: Always chant the names of Vahey Guru (Guru Nanak), Rama, Krishna and Govinda the beloved of Radha.
Songglossary: bolo, gopal, govinda, guru, hari, jai, japo, ji, krishna, naam, nithya, radha, ram, ramana, sathya, tera, vahey

Title: Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey
Lyrics:
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Bol
Sathya Nam Sathya Nam Sathya Nam Bol [ Vahey Guru ... ]
Govinda Bol Gopala Bol
Gopala Bol Govinda Bol
Govinda Bol Gopala Bol
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Bol
Meaning: Chant the names of Lord Sathya Sai, our Guru and of Govinda, Gopala, Hari and Radha's beloved, Lord Krishna.
Songglossary: bol, gopal, govinda, guru, hari, nam, radha, ramana, sathya, vahey

Title: Vaidehi Priya Vaikunta Rama
Lyrics:
Vaidehi Priya Vaikunta Rama
Ahalyodharaka Rama
Raghu Vara Janani Janaki Rama
