Lakshmana Sevitha Lavanya Rama
Dasharatha Nandana Rama [ Raghu Vara ]
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Rama of Vaikunta, beloved of Vaidehi/Janaki (Other names of mother Sita) the liberator of Ahalya, worshipped by Lakshmana, son of Dasharatha and the Lord of the Raghu dynasty.
Songglossary: ahalyodharaka, dasha, janaki, janani, lakshmana, lavanya, nanda, priya, raghu, ram, sevita, vaidehi, vaikunta, vara

Title: Vaijayanti Dhara Vanamala Dhara
Lyrics:
Vaijayanti Dhara Vanamala Dhara
Shankha Chakra Dhara Pitambara Dhara [ Vaijayanti Dhara ... ]
Shri Kara Purandara Giridhara Nagara
Muralidhara Ghana Shyama Manohara
Meaning: The dark-hued Lord Krishna wears a garland of flowers and plays the enchanting flute. Wearing the golden robe Vishnu holds the wheel (time) and the conch (sound-Aum). He is Lord Purandara who confers auspiciousness.
Songglossary: chakra, dhara, ghana, giridhar, kara, manohar, murali, nagara, pithambaradhari, puran, sham, shankha, sri, vaijayanti, vanamala

Title: Vaikuntapathey Narayana
Lyrics:
Vaikuntapathey Narayana
Varija Nayana Narayana [ Vaikuntapathey Narayana ]
Vakshasthala Kaustubha Mani Bhooshita
Shankha Chakra Peetambara Shobhita
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Narayana, who resides in Vaikunta, who has eyes in the shape of lotus, with the Kaustubha jewel on his chest and is adorned with Shanka (Conch) Chakra (Disc) and auspicious dress (Yellow and Orange colors. )
Songglossary: bhooshita, chakra, hari, kaustubha, mani, narayana, nayan, peetambara, sai, shankha, shobhita, vaikunta, vakshasthala, varija

Title: Vaikuntapathey Sai Harey
Lyrics:
Vaikuntapathey Sai Harey
Vaijayanti Mala Dhari [ Vaikuntapathey Sai ... ]
Hari Govinda Hari Gopala (3)
Vara Godavari Teera Vihari
Meaning: The Lord Sai of Vaikunta, who wears the Vyjayanthi garland (A necklace worn by Lord Narayana as a sign of victory), the Lord Hari and Govinda who strolls on the banks of Godavari.
Songglossary: dhari, godavari, gopal, govinda, hari, mala, sai, teera, vaijayanti, vaikunta, vara, vihar

Title: Vaishnavi Ma Varahi Ma
Lyrics:
Vaishnavi Ma Varahi Ma
Vishweshwari Ma Vani Ma [ Vaishnavi Ma ... ]
Shakthi Swaroopini Sai Ma
Shanthi Pradayini Santoshi Ma (Pra)
Meaning: Salutations to the Mother Vaishnavi also known as Santoshi, the mother of the world, the personification of Shakthi and the giver of peace.
Songglossary: dayini, ma, sai, santoshi, shakthi, shanthi, swaroopa, vaishnavi, vani, varahi, vishweshwari

Title: Vakratunda Mahakaya Sri Ganesha Paahi
Lyrics:
Vakratunda Mahakaya Sri Ganesha Paahi Maam
Vighna Raja Vighna Nasha Vighneshwara Paahi Maam [ Vakratunda Mahakaya ... ]
Paahi Maam Karunakara Paahi Maam Jagadeeshwara [ Vighna Raja ]
Meaning: Protect us Oh compassionate Lord Ganesha, Lord of the world, with your contorted body you destroy the obstacles in life.
Songglossary: ganesha, jagadeesha, karuna, maam, mahakaya, nasha, paahi, raja, sri, vakratunda, vighna, vighnesha

Title: Vanamala Shritha Jana Pala
Lyrics:
Vanamala Shritha Jana Pala
Darshanam Ivvayya Gopala ( Sai )
Goparipala Gopi Lola
Radha Manasa Giridhara Bala
Giridhara Bala Raasa Vilola (Radha Lola) (2)
Meaning: Oh Gopala, the protector of good and the pious, who adorns the garland of forest flowers, grant us Your vision. You are the protector of the cows. You occupy the thoughts of Radha, you are the one who protected the devotees by lifting the Mandara Mountain and the one who performed the celestial dance.
Songglossary: bala, darsh, giridhar, gopal, goparipala, gopi, ivvayya, jana, lola, manasa, pala, raasa, radha, sai, shritha, vanamala, vilola

Title: Vanamali Brinda Vanamali Krishna (2)
Lyrics:
Vanamali Brinda Vanamali Krishna (2)
Vanamali Brinda Vanamali
Kalinga Narthana Kamsadi Mardhana
Radha Hrudaya Nivasa Harey Krishna
Meaning: Oh Krishna, the one who adorns the garland of forest flowers grown in Brindavan. You are the one who put an end to the poisonous snake Kalinga, annihilated wicked Kamsa and you dwell in the heart of Radha.
Songglossary: brinda, hari, hrudaya, kalinga, kamsadi, krishna, mardana, narthana, nivasa, radha, vanamali

Title: Vanamali Radha Ramana Giridhari Govinda
Lyrics:
Vanamali Radha Ramana Giridhari Govinda
Neela Megha Sundara Narayana Govinda [ Vanamali Radha ... ]
Bhaktha Hrudaya Mandara Bhanu Koti Sundara
Nanda Nanda Gopa Vrinda Narayana Govinda
Narayana Govinda (9)
Narayana Narayana Narayana Govinda (2)
Narayana Govinda (3)
Meaning: Chant the names of Govinda, also called the Giridhari, beloved of Radha, the wearer of garland of forest flowers, the beautiful and dark blue Narayana, who is like the Mandara flower in the hearts of his devotees, who is beautiful and effulgent like a million Suns, the son of Nanda and one among the cowherds.
Songglossary: bhaktha, bhanu, giridhar, gopa, govinda, hrudaya, koti, manda, megha, nanda, narayana, neela, radha, ramana, sundara, vanamali, vrinda

Title: Vanamali Vasudeva Jaganmohana Radha Ramana
Lyrics:
Vanamali Vasudeva Jaganmohana Radha Ramana
Jaganmohana Radha Ramana (2)
Shashi Vadana Sarasija Nayana Jaganmohana Radha Ramana (3)
Radha Ramana Radha Ramana (4)
Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna, adorning the garland made of forest flowers, You attract all minds and the whole world. Your charming bright face which is like a shining moon and Your lotus eyes are admired by Radha.
Songglossary: jaganmohana, nayan, radha, ramana, sarasija, shashi, vadana, vanamali, vasudeva

Title: Vanamali Vedodhara
Lyrics:
Vanamali Vedodhara
Vaikuntapathey Narayana
Giridhari Gaana Manohara
Garuda Vahana Narayana (4) [ Vaikuntapathey Narayana ]
Meaning: Oh Lord the one who adorns the garland made of forest flowers, the one who protects and nourishes the Vedas, you are Narayana the Lord of Vaikunta, the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain to protect your devotees and the one who relishes the sweetness of divine music.
Songglossary: gaan, garuda, giridhar, manohar, narayana, vahana, vaikunta, vanamali, vedodhara

Title: Vande Sai Sadguru Charanam
Lyrics:
Vande Sai Sadguru Charanam
Pavana Charanam Pankaja Charanam [ Vande Sai ... ]
Brahmananda Swaroopa Manoharam
Paramananda Swaroopa Smaranam
Jagadodharana Shanthi Sadanam
Sai Charanam Paapa Haranam [ Pavana Charanam ... ]
Meaning: Let us offer our obeisance at the sacred lotus feet of the benevolent Guru, Sai, the very embodiment of supreme and highest bliss and up-lifter of the down trodden.
Songglossary: brahma, chara, harana, jagadodhara, manohar, paapa, pankaja, param, pavan, sadana, sadguru, sai, shanthi, smaran, swaroopa, vande

Title: Vande Uma Nandanam Gajananam
Lyrics:
Vande Uma Nandanam Gajananam
Suramuni Sevitha Sumukha Gajananam [ Vande Uma ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Paahi Gajananam
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Gajanana, the son of Uma and the one who is worshipped by sages, who is the giver of knowledge, intellect and boons.
Songglossary: buddhi, dayaka, gajamukha, nanda, paahi, pradayaka, sevita, siddhi, sumukha, suramuni, uma, vande, vidya, vinayaka

Title: Varuvai Niye Sayi Nada
Lyrics:
Varuvai Niye Sayi Nada
Padidum Podu Niye Varuvai [ Varuvai Niye ... ]
Annaiyum Niye Tandaiyum Niye
Guruvai Niyevaruvaye
Anbum Niye Arulum Niye
Ellam Alittidum Paramporul Niye
Meaning: Lord Sai ! Please come while we sing Your Name. You are our mother, father, and Guru. Full of Love and Grace, You are God who gives us everything.
Songglossary: alittidum, amma, anbum, arul, ella, guru, nada, niyallavo, niyevaruvaye, padidum, param, podu, sai, tandai, varum

Title: Varuvai Varuvai Varuvai Amma
Lyrics:
Varuvai Varuvai Varuvai Amma
Tiruve Uruvai Varuvai Amma
Irulai Nikkida Varuvai Amma
Undan Arulai Pozhindidu Sayi Amma [ Varuvai Varuvai ... ]
Kalyani Karumari Kamakshi Niye
Mahalakshmi Matangi Meenakshi Niye
Varalakshmi Varahi Visalakshi Niye
Ulagalum Maye Prashanti Taye
Amma Amma Amma Amma
Meaning: Mother Sai! Please come in the form of grace to remove darkness. You are the various goddesses, and the Mother of the Universe who resides in Prashanthi.
Songglossary: amma, arul, irulai, kalyan, kamakshi, karumari, mahalakshmi, matangi, maye, meena, nikkida, niyallavo, pozhiyum, prasanthi, sai, sri, thai, ulagalum, undan, uruvai, varahi, varalakshmi, varum, visalakshi

Title: Vata Patra Sai Narayana
Lyrics:
Vata Patra Sai Narayana
Vanditha Charana Narayana
Dwarakamayi Narayana
Vasudeva Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (3)
Meaning: Bow at the feet of Lord Sai Narayana reclining on a fig leaf. He is also Vasudeva and Shirdi Sai who resided in Dwarakamayi.
Songglossary: chara, dwaraka, narayana, patra, sai, vanditha, vasudeva, vata

Title: Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera
Lyrics:
Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera
Ati Balavanta Hanumantha
Kesari Nandana Anjani Putra
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Pavana Kumara (2)
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Pavana Kumara (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Hanuman, the son of Kesari and Anjana, you are the most powerful, victory to you Oh blessed son of Wind God (born to Kesari and Anjana out of boon from the Lord of Wind)
Songglossary: anjani, ati, balavanta, hanuman, ho, jay, kesari, kumara, nanda, pavan, putra, vanara, vayu, veera

Title: Veda Kalamayi Naada Svarupini
Lyrics:
Veda Kalamayi Naada Svarupini
Kadamba Priyey Karuna Sagari
Vina Venu Mrudanga Vinodini
Nanabharana Bhushani Ranjani
Meaning: Mother Goddess is the personification of sound (music), the arts and the Veda. The one who likes sugar cane, She is an ocean of compassion. She is the essence of enchanting music (flute, Veena, Mrudanga). Adorned with many ornaments. She is a delight to behold.
Songglossary: bhushan, kadamba, kalamayi, karuna, mrudanga, naada, nanabharana, priye, ranjani, sagar, swaroopa, veda, veena, venu, vinodini

Title: Veda Kalamayi Naada Swaroopini
Lyrics:
Veda Kalamayi Naada Swaroopini
Kadamba Priyey Karuna Sagari
Veena Venu Mrudanga Vinodini
Gnana Bharana Bhooshani Ranjani
Meaning: Salutations to the repository of Vedas (Goddess Saraswathi), who is personification of melody, the one who has decorated herself with various jewels, loves music, plays Veena, Flute and Mrudangam (Indian percussion instrument used mostly in South India).
Songglossary: bharana, bhooshan, gnana, kadamba, kalamayi, karuna, mrudanga, naada, priye, ranjani, sagar, swaroopa, veda, veena, venu, vinodini

Title: Veena Gaana Priyey Sharadey
Lyrics:
Veena Gaana Priyey Sharadey
Vedakalaa Nilayey Saraswathi [ Veena Gaana Priyey ... ]
Vidya Sahitey Vimaley Kamaley
Bhavalankruta Gaana Viloley
Mukti Pradayini Hey Jagat Janani
Parthi Pureeshwari Hey Bhavani
Meaning: Salutations to Goddess Sharada (Saraswathi) who is fond of the music of Veena, in whom all the knowledge and arts of the Vedas are enshrined, the mother of the world who gives liberation, the Mother Bhavani of Parthi.
Songglossary: bhava, dayini, gaan, hey, jagat, janani, kamale, mukti, nilaya, priye, purishwara, puttaparthi, sahita, saraswathi, sharade, vedakala, veena, vidya, viloley, vimale

Title: Veena Vadini Saraswathi Ma
Lyrics:
Veena Vadini Saraswathi Ma
Jaya Jagadambe Janani Ma [ Veena Vadini ... ]
Ambe Bhavani Sai Ma
Jaya Jagadeeshwari Rakshaya Ma
Meaning: Please protect me Oh Universal Mother Sai, you are none other than Goddess Saraswathi playing celestial music with her Veena.
Songglossary: amba, bhava, jagadamba, jagadeeshwari, janani, jay, ma, raksha, sai, saraswathi, vadini, veena

Title: Veera Dheera Shoora Hanuman Ki
Lyrics:
Veera Dheera Shoora Hanuman Ki Jai
Pavana Putra Anjaneya Hanuman Ki Jai [ Veera Dheera ... ]
Sada Rama Naama Japata Hanuman Ki Jai
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram [ Sada Rama ... ]
Sita Shoka Nasha Kaarana Hanuman Ki Jai
Meaning: Victory to Lord Hanuman the one of valor, courage, strength, son of Pavana (the wind god) and Anjana Devi, who chants Lord Rama's name incessantly and who is responsible for the removal of Mother Sita's sorrow.
Songglossary: dheera, hanuman, jai, japo, kaara, naam, nasha, pavan, putra, ram, sada, shoka, shoora, sita, veera

Title: Veera Hanumathey Namo Namo
Lyrics:
Veera Hanumathey Namo Namo
Vayu Kumara Namo Namo [ Veera Hanumathey ... ]
Raghava Priyakara Namo Namo
Sri Rama Dootha Namo Namo
Meaning: Salutations to Hanuman the personification of courage, who is son of wind god, messenger and dearest to Lord Rama.
Songglossary: doota, hanuman, kumara, namo, priya, raghava, ram, sri, vayu, veera

Title: Veera Maruti Gambhira Maruti
Lyrics:
Veera Maruti Gambhira Maruti
Dheera Maruti Ati Dheera Maruti
Geeta Maruti Sangeeta Maruti
Dootha Maruti Rama Dootha Maruti
Bhaktha Maruti Parama Bhaktha Maruti
Meaning: Maruti the son of Wind God, is one of supreme valor, courage and was highly talented in Music. He is the messenger and devotee of the highest order of Lord Rama.
Songglossary: ati, bhaktha, dheera, doota, gambhira, geeta, maruthi, param, ram, sangeeta, veera

Title: Veinkuzhal Udi Varum Kanna Kanna
Lyrics:
Veinkuzhal Udi Varum Kanna Kanna
Maya Lilai Seibavane Madhusudhana [ Veinkuzhal Udi ... ]
Gajarajan Tuyar Tirtha Adi Mulame
Kaliyugattai Kattunirkkum Sayi Deivame
Yuga Yugamai Tondri Nirkum Avatarame
Kamalakkanna Karmega Vanna
Azhi Mazhai Kanna Male Manivanna
Meaning: You are Krishna playing the flute. Your divine play happens through Your Maya. You are the primal source who ended the suffering of the helpless elephant. Lord Sai, You are the protector of Kali age and You incarnate in every age. You are Krishna with dark complexion and lotus eyes.
Songglossary: adi, avatar, azhi, deivam, gajarajan, kaliyuga, kamala, kanha, karmega, kattarulvai, leela, madhu, manivanna, maya, mazhai, mulame, nikkida, sai, seibavane, tiratha, tondri, tuyar, udi, vanna, varum, veinkuzhal, yuga

Title: Ven Mi Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Ven Mi Sai Rama
Haz De Mi Mente Un Jardin, Dionde Florezca Dharma Shanthi Prema
Ven Shiva Sathya Sai, Y Baila
Baila En Mi Corazon (4)
Baila En Mi Corazon Tu Cosmica Danza
Meaning: Come my Sai Rama, make my mind a garden where Dharma, Shanthi, and Prema bloom. Come Shiva Sathya Sai and dance. Perform Your cosmic dance in my heart.
Songglossary: dharma, prem, ram, sai, sathya, shanthi, shiva, un

Title: Vibhuti  Sacred Ash Prayer - Paramam Pavithram Baba Vibhuthim
Lyrics:
Paramam Pavithram Baba Vibhuthim
Paramam Vichithram Leela Vibhuthim
Paramaartha Ishtaartha Moksha Pradatham
Baba Vibhuthim Idham Asrayami (Sai)
Meaning:
Sacred, Holy and Supreme is Babas Vibhuthi
Pouring forth in endless stream His play of Vibhuthi
So auspicious is its might it grants Liberation
Babas Vibhuthi its power protects me (Sai)
Songglossary: baba, ishta, leela, moksha, vibhuthi

Title: Vibhuti Sundara Sai Nath
Lyrics:
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Nath
Sai Nath Sai Nath Sathya Sai Nath
Gangadhara Hara Samba Sadashiva [ Sai Nath ]
Meaning: Chant the name of Sathya Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva who is covered with sacred ash and on whose head He adorns the pious river Ganga.
Songglossary: ganga, hara, natha, sadashiva, sai, samba, sathya, sundara, vibhuti

Title: Vibhuti Sundara Sai Nath Hara
Lyrics:
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Nath Hara Hara Mahadeva
Bilva Dala Priya Chandrakaladhara
Hara Hara Mahadeva
Vyagrambaradhara Sai Sundara
Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Meaning: Lord Shiva also known as Hara and Sadashiva, the Lord of Lords, has the sacred ash smeared all over His body, loves the Bilva leaf (Leaf of wood apple tree or Bel tree) used in HIS worship, bears the Crescent moon on His head and wears the Tiger skin.
Songglossary: bilva, chand, dala, hara, mahadev, natha, priya, sadashiva, sai, shiva, sundara, vibhuti, vyagrambara

Title: Vidya Dayini Bhagavathi
Lyrics:
Vidya Dayini Bhagavathi
Namo Namo Namo Sai Narayani [ Vidya Dayini ... ]
Chinmaya Roopini Naada Swaroopini [ Namo Namo ... ]
Meaning: Obeisance to the Goddess who bestows Knowledge and who plays musical instruments (Goddess Saraswathi), the embodiment of sound, energy and Cosmic consciousness.
Songglossary: bhagavathi, chinmaya, dayini, naada, namo, narayani, sai, swaroopa, vidya

Title: Viene con el Sol en la voz
Lyrics:
Viene con el Sol en la voz
Cantando la luz, cantando la luz
Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Babaji
Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Babaji
En el corazon del viento esta
cantando el Amor(2)
Sri Bhagawan Sai Babaji
Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Babaji
Meaning:
(He) came with the Sun in His Voice 

Singing the Light(2)

Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Babaji(2)

In the Wind 's heart He is singing the Love.

Singing the Love.

Sri Bhagawan Sai Babaji.

Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Babaji
GeneralComments: The last two lines are based on the Major scale.
Songglossary: bhagawan, sai, sathya, sri

Title: Vighna Vinashaka Deva
Lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Deva
Suramuni Vanditha Deva
Tribhuvana Palaka Deva Deva [ Vighna Vinashaka ]
Triloka Vanditha Jaya Gana Deva
Pranava Swaroopa Deva Deva
Pranava Swaroopa Deva
Meaning: Salutations to the Lord Ganesha who destroys the obstacles in life and is worshipped by sages and pious. He rules all the three worlds and is worshipped in the three worlds. He is the personification of the primordial sound "OM".
Songglossary: deva, gana, jay, palaka, pranava, suramuni, swaroopa, tribhuvan, triloka, vanditha, vighna, vinasha

Title: Vighna Vinashaka Devadi Deva
Lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Devadi Deva
Adi Sanathana Deva
Prathama Poojya Gananatha
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Nithya Niranjana
Siddhi Vinayaka Deva
Mangala Dayaka Shambho Manohara [ Prathama Poojya ]
Meaning: You are always offered the first prayers in any worship Oh Lord of ganaas (the attendants of Lord Shiva), Oh Lord of Lords, eternal, ancient and destroyer of obstacles. You annihilate the fear of birth and death, Lord of powers acquired through austerities, blemishless, who bestows auspiciousness and dear son of Lord Shiva. .
Songglossary: adi, bhanjana, bhava, bhaya, dayaka, deva, devadi, gananatha, mangal, manohar, niranjan, nithya, poojya, prathama, sanatana, shambho, siddhi, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Vighna Vinashaka Gananatha
Lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Gananatha
Gajanana Hey Gajavadana
Gananatha Gananatha
Pranava Swaroopa Gananatha
Parthi Pureeshwara Gananatha [ Gajanana Hey ]
Meaning: The elephant faced Lord Ganesha is the leader of ganaas (the attendants of Lord Shiva), destroyer of all obstacles. He is the embodiment of primordial sound "Om" and resides in Parthi.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gananatha, hey, pranava, purishwara, puttaparthi, swaroopa, vighna, vinasha

Title: Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka (3)
Lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka (3)
Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambhu Kumara
Karunya Lavanya Akhilandeshwara
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha), the destroyer of obstacles in life, who is the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi (Amba Bhavani), who is compassionate and beautiful and who is the Lord of the Universe.
Songglossary: akhila, amba, bhava, karuna, kumara, lavanya, shambho, shiva, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Vighneshwara Gananatha Gajanana
Lyrics:
Vighneshwara Gananatha Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Mangala Murthy Sri Ganaraya
Jaya Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya (2)
Ashta (Siddhi) Vinayaka Shubhanana
Meaning: Victory to Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha) the son of Parvathi,, having a pleasant and auspicious face, who bestows eight types of blessings. He is also known as Siddhi Vinayaka. (Fulfills your prayers).
Songglossary: ashta, gajamukha, gananatha, ganaraya, jay, mangal, murthy, nanda, parvathi, shubh, siddhi, sri, vighnesha, vinayaka

Title: Vighneshwara Gananatha Gajanana
Lyrics:
Vighneshwara Gananatha Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Mangala Murthy Shri Ganaraya
Jaya Ganaraya Shri Ganaraya (2)
Ashta Vinayaka Shubhanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Shubhanana
Meaning: The elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Parvathi, the leader of the divine forces, destroys obstacles. He is auspiciousness personified and confers success. He is worshipped as "Ashta Vinayaka" at eight places of pilgrimage in India (in Maharashtra state)
Songglossary: ashta, gajamukha, gananatha, ganaraya, jay, mangal, murthy, nanda, parvathi, shubh, siddhi, sri, vighnesha, vinayaka

Title: Vighneshwara Maha Devadi Deva
Lyrics:
Vighneshwara Maha Devadi Deva
Vighna Vinashaka Deva
Pranavakara Jyothi Swaroopa
Jaya Mangala Kara Deva
Jaya Mangala Kara Deva (3)
Meaning: Victory to Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha), Lord of Lords, destroyer of obstacles in life, personification of the primordial sound OM and  also the embodiment of divine light.
Songglossary: deva, devadi, jay, jyoth, kara, maha, mangal, pranava, swaroopa, vighna, vighnesha, vinasha

Title: Vighneshwara Vinayaka
Lyrics:
Vighneshwara Vinayaka
Vishwa Dhara Namostuthey
Namostuthey Namostuthey [ Vishwa Dhara ]
Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Vinayaka
Sharanam Sharanam Vinayaka (2)
Meaning: Salutations and surrender to Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha) who sustains the Universe, who is worshipped by Holy and Pious sages and who destroys the fear of this world.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, dhara, namostuthey, nasha, sharan, suramuni, vanditha, vighnesha, vinayaka, vishwa

Title: Vighneshwaram Bhaja Vighneshwaram Sadguru Natham
Lyrics:
Vighneshwaram Bhaja Vighneshwaram Sadguru Natham Gowri Sutham
Jaya Shiva Nandana Vighneshwaram Pranavanandam Devi Sutham
Siddhi Vinayaka Vighneshwaram Vidya Dayaka Gowri Sutham
Vighneshwaram Bhaja Vighneshwaram Sharanam Sharanam Devi Sutham
Meaning: Sing the praises of the master of obstacles, Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha), son of Shiva and Gowri, the embodiment of "Om" (the primordial sound), one who bestows knowledge and spiritual boons. Let us surrender to the son of Devi.
Songglossary: bhaja, dayaka, devi, gowri, jay, nandana, natha, pranava, sadguru, sharan, shiva, siddhi, sutha, vidya, vighnesha, vinayaka

Title: Vighneshwaram Bhajorey Manasa Vighna Haram
Lyrics:
Vighneshwaram Bhajorey Manasa Vighna Haram Bhajorey (2) 
(Bhajorey) Vighneshwaram Bhajorey Manasa Vighna Haram Bhajorey
Meaning: Oh Mind! Sing the praises of Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha) who removes all obstacles and destroys them.
Songglossary: bhajao, harana, manasa, vighna, vighnesha

Title: Vina Pusthaka Mala Dharini
Lyrics:
Vina Pusthaka Mala Dharini
Sai Saraswathi Shwetambari
Saishwari Patitha Pavani
Parthishwari Parameshwari
Vishnu Mohini Lakshmi Narayani
Shiva Shakti Roopini Sai Narayani [ Sai Saraswathi ... ]
Meaning: Saraswathi is the Goddess of learning and music. Adorned in white (purity) and a garland of flowers. She holds the Veena and the books. She is also Goddess Lakshmi and Shakti. As Mother Sai, She is the protector of the meek.
Songglossary: dhari, lakshmi, mala, mohan, narayani, param, parteeshwari, patitha, pavan, pusthaka, sai, saiyeeshwara, saraswathi, shakthi, shiva, shwetambari, swaroopa, veena, vishnu

Title: Vinati Karoon Main Baar Baar
Lyrics:
Vinati Karoon Main Baar Baar Sai
Darshana Do Mujhey Ek Baar Sai [ Vinati Karoon ... ]
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Sai
Lelo Hum Ko Charano Mey Sai
Deejo Hum Ko Charan Tumharey
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai I plead with you time and again, to give me Darshan at least once and enshrine yourself in my heart. I prostrate at your feet. Please accept me to your fold.
Songglossary: aao, baar-baar, chara, darsh, deejo, do, ek, hrudaya, hum, karoon, lelo, mandir, mujhe, sai, tumhara, vinati

Title: Vinati Suno Ma Vinati Suno
Lyrics:
Vinati Suno Ma Vinati Suno
Merey Mana Ki Vinati Suno [ Vinati Suno ... ]
Sab Kuch Aap Ho Sai Ma
Mana Ko Shanthi Do Sai Ma
Terey Bina Aur Koi Nahi Hai
Sharan Me Lekar Raha Dikhao Sai
Meri Asha Puran Karo ( Sai ) (2) [ Merey Mana ... ]
Meaning: Mother Sai! Please listen to my heartfelt request. You are my everything; grant me peace of mind. I have none but You; take me in Your refuge; show me the way and fulfill my wishes.
Songglossary: aap, asha, aur, bina, dikhao, do, hai, ho, karo, koi, kuch, ley, ma, mana, mera, nahi, puran, raha, sab, sai, shanthi, sharan, suno, tera, vinati

Title: Vinati Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
Lyrics:
Vinati Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
Daya Karo Merey Sai Bhagawan
Bhaktha Janon Ke Tum Ho Pran
Deena Dayala Karuna Nidhan
Tribhuvana Pala Sadhu Paritra
Meaning: Please listen to my pleadings Oh my Lord Sai, have compassion on me, you are the very life of your devotees, you are the treasure house of compassion showing mercy on the downtrodden, you are the one who sustains the three worlds and the protector of Saints.
Songglossary: bhagawan, bhaktha, daya, dayal, deen, ho, jana, karo, karuna, ke, mera, nidhan, pala, paritra, pran, sadhu, sai, suno, tribhuvan, tum, vinati

Title: Vinati Suno Vinati Suno
Lyrics:
Vinati Suno Vinati Suno
Vinati Suno Ma Vinati Suno
Ma Vinati Suno
Sankata Harini Santoshi Ma
Sadhu Jana Priya Sai Ma
Sada Ananda Dayini Ma
Sadashiva Priya Sai Ma
Sathya Sai Ma
Meaning: Oh Sathya Sai Ma, (Represents Goddess Parvathi here) you are very dear to Lord Shiva, you bestow happiness to all, you are very dear to all the Saints, Oh Santoshi Ma you are the annihilator of all sufferings, please listen to my pleadings.
Songglossary: anand, dayini, haarini, jana, ma, priya, sada, sadashiva, sadhu, sai, sankata, santoshi, sathya, suno, vinati

Title: Vinayaka Shiva Bala
Lyrics:
Vinayaka Shiva Bala
Sura Muni Vanditha Guna Sheela
Vakratunda Dhara Pranavakara
Lambodhara Gananatha
Meaning: Lord Ganesha, son of Lord Shiva, is worshipped by sages and saints. The pot-belled Ganesha with the curved trunk is full of noble qualities, and is the source of all life.
Songglossary: bala, dhara, gananatha, guna, lambodhara, muni, pranava, sheela, shiva, sura, vakratunda, vanditha, vinayaka

Title: Vinayaka Vighna Nashaka
Lyrics:
Vinayaka Vighna Nashaka
Anatha Rakshaka Ananda Dayaka
Uma Maheshwara Hey Shiva Nandana
Meaning: Salutations to Oh Lord Vinayaka, the destroyer of obstacles, protector of the downtrodden, who bestows happiness and who is son of Goddess Uma (Parvathi's another name) and Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: anand, anath, dayaka, hey, maheshwara, nanda, nasha, raksha, shiva, uma, vighna, vinayaka

Title: Vinayaka Vinayaka
Lyrics:
Vinayaka Vinayaka
Vishwadhara Vinayaka (Hey) [ Vinayaka Vinayaka ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Bhava Bhaya Nasha
Suramuni Vanditha Sri Ganesha [ Vishwadhara Vinayaka.. ]
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha) who gives sustenance to the Universe, who fulfills the wishes of every one, the one who destroys fear and whom Sage Sura worshipped.
Songglossary: bhava, bhaya, ganesha, hey, nasha, siddhi, sri, suramuni, vanditha, vinayaka, vishwa

Title: Vinayaka Vinayaka
Lyrics:
Vinayaka Vinayaka
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka
Gowri Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha), the destroyer of obstacles, the elephant faced son of Parvathi and Shiva, the one who rides on the Mouse and who has Modaka (a type of sweet) in his hand.
Songglossary: gajamukha, gowri, hasta, hey, modaka, mooshika, nanda, parvathi, shiva, vahana, vighna, vinasha, vinayaka

Title: Vishnu Mohini Sai Narayani
Lyrics:
Vishnu Mohini Sai Narayani
Ksheerabdhi Tanaye Sai Narayani [ Vishnu Mohini ... ]
Lakshmi Manorama Kanchanabharini
Kamala Kamini Sai Narayani
Sukha Sampada Sowbhagya Pradayini
Meaning: Mother Narayani (Goddess Lakshmi) is the enchanter of Lord Vishnu, born out of the ocean of milk, having a splendorous face, one who loves the Lotus flower, who bestows comfort and prosperity for everyone.
Songglossary: dayini, kamala, kamini, kanchana, ksheerabdhi, lakshmi, manorama, mohan, narayani, sai, sampada, sowbhagya, sukh, tanaya, vishnu

Title: Vishnu Satchidananda Venu Gopala Bala
Lyrics:
Vishnu Satchidananda Venu Gopala Bala
Krishna Rama Govinda Hari Hari (3)
Meaning: Chant the various names of the Lord Vishnu, namely Rama, Govinda, Hari and the Child Krishna holding the flute in His hand, who are all the embodiments of Being (Sath), Awareness (Chith) and Bliss (Ananda).
Songglossary: bala, gopal, govinda, hari, krishna, ram, satchidananda, venu, vishnu

Title: Vishwadhari Shiva Avatari
Lyrics:
Vishwadhari Shiva Avatari
Sai Shankara Namo Namo [ Vishwadhari Shiva ... ]
Mathura Natha Narayana Hari
Sai Shankara Namo Namo (Sathya) (2)
Meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai, you are the very incarnation of Shiva and Lord Narayana of Mathura (Krishna).
Songglossary: avatar, hari, mathura, namo, narayana, natha, sai, sathya, shankara, shiva, vishwa

Title: Vishwamayi Shiva Shakthimayi
Lyrics:
Vishwamayi Shiva Shakthimayi
Parama Dayamayi Premamayi [ Vishwamayi Shiva ]
Vedamayi Hey Brahmamayi
Premamayi Hey Gnanamayi
Jyothi Swaroopini Jaganmayi
Meaning: In this Bhajan the Mother Sai is extolled as one who is full of compassion, love and goodness and the embodiment of Veda, Speech and Sound (Brahma) and effulgence pervading the whole world.
Songglossary: brahma, dayamayi, gnana, hey, jagan, jyoth, param, premamayi, shakthi, shiva, swaroopa, vedamayi, vishwa

Title: Vittala Bhajo Sai Vittala Bhajo
Lyrics:
Vittala Bhajo Sai Vittala Bhajo (2)
Pandari Natha Panduranga Vittala Bhajo
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Vittala Bhajo
Meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord Vittala, also known as Panduranga the Lord of Pandharpur and the Lord Sai residing in Parthi.
Songglossary: bhaja, deva, natha, pandari, pandu, puttaparthi, sai, vasa, vittala

Title: Vittala Hari Vittala (3)
Lyrics:
Vittala Hari Vittala (3)
Panduranga (Purandara) Vittaley Hari Narayana
Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
Meaning: Sing the glory of  Hari Vittala, also known as Panduranga Vittala, Purandara Vittala, Sai Narayana and Sathya Narayana.
Songglossary: bhaja, hari, narayana, pandu, puran, sai, sathya, vittala

Title: Vittala Narayana
Lyrics:
Vittala Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Vittala ]
Madhusudhana Narayana
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
Narayana (Hari) Sai Narayana (2)
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala (2)
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Narayana reclining on Adi Sesha (the celestial Snake). He is none other than Madhusudhana (Krishna),
Songglossary: hari, hey, madhu, narayana, pandu, puttaparthi, ranga, sai, shayana, shesha, vittala

Title: Vittala Rakumayi Vittobha Rakumayi
Lyrics:
Vittala Rakumayi Vittobha Rakumayi
Shirdi Maajhey Pandarpura Sai Maajhey Rakumayi
Pundalika Varada Panduranga Hari Vittala
Meaning: Sing praises of Mother Rakumayi and Her consort Vittala, of Shirdi and Pandharpur, the one who conferred boons on His devotee Pundalika.
Songglossary: hari, pandarpur, pandu, pundalika, rakumayi, sai, shirdi, varada, vittala

Title: Vittala Vittala Hari Vittala
Lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Hari Vittala
Vittala Vittala Naama Bhajo Hari Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Vittala Vittala Naam
Vittala Vittala Naama Bhajo Hari Vittala
Vittala Vittala Hari ( Sai ) Vittala
Meaning: Chant the name of Vittala, Panduranga Vittala, Sai Vittala. Sing the glories of Lord Vittala at all times.
Songglossary: bhajao, hari, naam, panduranga, sai, vittala

Title: Vittala Vittala Narayana
Lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Narayana
Panduranga Vittala Narayana
Sri Ranganatha Narayana [ Vittala Vittala ... ]
Paramesha Narayana
Paramatma Narayana
Jaya Parthi Vasa Narayana
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana of Parthi you are verily Panduranga Vittala, Ranganatha, Paramesha and Paramatma, the supreme Lord (Synonyms of Lord Narayana).
Songglossary: hari, jay, narayana, pandu, param, puttaparthi, ranga, sai, sri, vasa, vittala

Title: Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Govinda Gopala Hari Narayana ( Sai )
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa Panduranga Vittala (2) [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord Panduranga Vittala, Govinda, Gopala, Narayana who has His abode at Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, narayana, pandu, prashanthi, pureesha, puttaparthi, sai, vasa, vittala

Title: Vittobha Vittala Panduranga
Lyrics:
Vittobha Vittala Panduranga
Panduranga Hari Panduranga [ Vittobha Vittala ... ]
Narahari Ranga Ranga Panduranga
Purandara Ranga Panduranga [ Panduranga Hari ]
Meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Panduranga, also known as Vittobha and Vittala, Narahari Ranga, Purandara Ranga and several other names.
Songglossary: hari, narahari, pandu, puran, ranga, vittala

Title: Wahamba Nathi
Lyrics:
ZULU
Wahamba nathi, oh wahamba nathi 
Oh wahamba nathi, siyabonga
Siyabonga Jesu, Siyabonga ngonyama yezulu
Siyabonga Jesu, Siyabonga
Wahamba nathi, oh wahamba nathi 
Oh wahamba nathi, siyabonga 
NDEBELE
Siyathokoza Jesu, Siyathokoza kakaramba 
Siyathokoza Jesu, Siyathokoza 
SOTHO
Wa tsamaya le rona, oh wa tsamaya le rona 
Oh wa tsamaya le rona, re a boka 
Re a boka jesu, re a boka tlatlamathjolo
Re a boka jesu, re ya boka
Siyabonga Jesu, Siyabonga ngonyama yezulu 
Siyabonga Jesu, Siyabonga
Meaning: You walked with us, oh You walked with us, oh You walked with us, we thank You. We thank You Jesus, Lion of heaven, we thank You Jesus, we thank You. You walked with us, oh You walked with us, oh You walked with us, we thank You. We thank You Jesus, mighty Go, we thank You Jesus, we thank You. You walked with us, oh You walked with us, oh You walked with us, we thank You. We thank You Jesus, Lion of heaven, we thank You Jesus, we thank You. We thank You Jesus, Lion of heaven, we thank You Jesus, we thank You.

Title: Wake Up Now My Children
Lyrics:
Wake Up Now My Children Wherever You Are
Wake Up Now My Children And See Who You Are
It Is Time To Wake Up And You Have Slept For So Long
It Is Time To Wake Up Now And Sing Me A/Your Song X 2
Sai Ram Sai Ram
It Is Time To Wake Up Now And Sing Me A Song
A New Day Is Dawning, A New Day Is Here
Give Up All Your Worries, Give Up All Your Fears
That Is Why I Have Awakened You The reason I came
Surrender Your Troubles And Sing Out My Name X 2
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Surrender Your Troubles And Sing Out My Name
Open Your Eyes Now And See The Light
Open Your Eyes The End Is In Sight
Come Now My Children And Set Yourselves Free
Come Now My Children And Merge In To Me X 2
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Come Now My Children And Merge In To Me
Songglossary: ram, sai, so

Title: We Are Blessed
Lyrics:
We Are Blessed We Are Blessed We Are Blessed
Sai Baba Is Watching Over Us
We Are Here To Sing Your Sweet Name
Let The Light Of Your Glory Shine On Us
Bless Us All With Your Presence, Gurudev [ We Are Blessed ... ]
No More Tears No More Sorrow No More Death
Banish The Darkness With Your Love
We Are Born In The Golden Age Of Sai [ We Are Blessed ... ]
Songglossary: baba, gurudev, sai

Title: We Are Brothers And Sisters
Lyrics:
We Are Brothers And Sisters All In One God
Peace And Love Is What We Seek In The Good Lord
We May Call And Worship God By Many Names
But The God Of All Names Is Just The Same
God Has Come In Life For Us To Purify
Came As Rama, Krishna, Buddha, Jesus, Shirdi Sai
Hail To Rama, Hail To Krishna, Hail To Buddha, And Hail To Jesus
Hail To Shirdi And Sathya Sai, Hail To All These Loving Divine Teachers
Hail To All These Divine Teachers
Songglossary: buddha, krishna, ram, sai, sathya, shirdi

Title: We Are Calling Sai
Lyrics:
We Are Calling Sai, Be With Us. We Are Calling Sai, Be With Us
We Are Calling Sai, Be With Us. O Sai, Be With Us
In Our Hearts My Lord, Youre The Light (3)
O Lord, Youre The Light
You Are Shining Lord, The Whole World Through (2)
O Lord, The Whole World Through
Fill Our Hearts With Love, Expand The Light (3)
O Lord, Expand The Light
Songglossary: sai

Title: We are in the light
Lyrics:
We are in the light, the light is in us
 We are the light, so shine shine shine
 All light is one, give light to everyone
 Making our hearts pure, drawing God's grace near

Title: We are marching in the light of God
Lyrics:
We are marching in the light of God,
We are marching in the light of God
We are marching, we are marching,
We are marching in the light of God
Siyahamba khukhanyen kwenkos,
Siyahamba khukhanyen kwenkos.
Siyahamba, Siyahamba
Siyahamba khukhanyen kwenkos

Title: We Are One In Love
Lyrics:
We Are One In Love Forever, Shining Like The Sun
Giving Is Loves Nature, The Same Is Everyone [ We Are ... ]
With Our Hands In Service, We Can Touch The Lord
Giving To Others, We Receive Loves Blessing
Love, Love, Love, Love, Love Is Like The Sun
Shining, Shining, Love Omnipresent
Songglossary: sun

Title: We are one in the heart of the Mother
Lyrics:
We are one in the heart of the Mother
 We are one in the heart of Love
 We are one in the heart of the Father
 We are one in God
 Chorus
 Ave Maria Kyrie Eleison

Title: We are one with Baba
Lyrics:
We are one with Baba, we are one with Baba, Sai Babaji
 We are love with Baba, we are love with Baba, Sai Babaji
 Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Om Shaanthi
 And He walks the shorelines of our hearts
 Bringing peace and love and harmony

Title: We Bow Down At your Feet
Lyrics:
We Bow Down At your Feet Sai Ganesha (2)
 Ganesha Ganesha (2)
 We Bow Down At your Feet Sai Ganesh
 Ganesha I Pray you Will Clear My Way (3)
 Ganesha Ganesha (2)
 We Bow Down At your Feet Sai Ganesha
 Jai Ganesha Sai Ganesh Clear My Way To Swami
 Jai Ganesha Sai Ganesh Clear My Way To Baba
 Jai Ganesha Sai Ganesh Clear My Way To Swami
 Ganesha Ganesha (2)
 We Bow Down At your Feet Sai Ganesha

Title: We bow to Him who removes all obstacles
Lyrics:
We bow to Him who removes all obstacles,
 We bow to Ganapathi Sai Ganesh
 We bow to Him who can do all miracles,
 We bow to Ganapathi Sai Ganesh
 Ganapathi Dava, Ganapathi Deva, Ganapathi Deva Sai Ganesh

Title: We Gather At Your Feet
Lyrics:
We Gather At Your Feet Lord
To Sing Your Praises Sweet Lord
We Bring Our Joys And Sorrows
And Strive For New Tomorrows
Help Us With Your Grace Lord
Show Us Your Loving Face Lord
Keep Us Near And Gently Guide Us
On The Lonely Path Home

Title: We keep our thoughts fixed on You
Lyrics:
We keep our thoughts fixed on You
 We keep our words sweet and true
 We place our actions at Your feet
 Unity of thought, word and deed
 There's a land sweet and fair
 There's a God-Man living there
 He's in our hearts, He's everywhere
 Unity of thought, word and deed
 A river flows through our lives
 It's filled with peace it never dies
 It's our sould's journey toward the One
 Unity of Thought word and deed

Title: We love our Lord Sai Baba
Lyrics:
We love our Lord Sai Baba
 In our hearts we cherish You
 For You have come to guide our way
 If only we ask You to
 Hear our prayers, Dear Baba
 We seek to follow You
 Grant us the wisdom of divine truth
 And help us to merge with You
 We praise, we praise You Sai Baba
 At Your feet we kneel
 We strive to serve our fellow man
 In reaching we touch God's hand

Title: We Pray To You Ganesha
Lyrics:
We Pray To You Ganesha, Our Lord
We Sing To You Ganesha, Our Lord
We Bow To You Ganesha, Our Lord
Oh Mighty Lord Ganesha, Remove All Our Obstacles (2)
Bless Us Ganesha, Our Lord (3)
Songglossary: ganesha

Title: We Rejoice! The Lord has come!
Lyrics:
We rejoice! Rejoice! Rejoice! the Lord has come!
 In Puttaparthi where He stays, people of all faiths congregate
 To get glimpse, a touch, a smile, and receive blessings from Him.
 He is Sai Baba, He is Sai Baba, Glory to the Lord of the world!
 We rejoice! Rejoice! Rejoice! Lord Sai is here
 He has come to transform and command, no matter what condition we are.
 Guiding us to work, worship and wisdom, calling us back to His Fold.

Title: We Sanctify The Day
Lyrics:
We Sanctify The Day The Lord Is Born Within Us
Glorifying God We Celebrate This Day [ We Sanctify ... ]
No Other Day Lord This Is Our New Birth
No Other Way Lord This Is Our True Birth
Living A Life Of Loving Service [ Glorifying God ... ]

Title: We sing Your song Sathya Sai
Lyrics:
We sing Your song Sathya Sai
 We pray at Your feet Sathya Sai
 You are my Mother, You are my Father,
 You are my Lord Sathya Sai
 Give me protection Give me devotion
 Lead us to the Light sathya Sai
 Sai Sai Sai Sai Sai Sathya Sai (2X)

Title: We Three Kings
Lyrics:
We Three Kings Of Orient Are
Bearing Gifts We Traverse Afar.
Field And Fountain, Moor And Mountain,
Following Yonder Star.
O Star Of Wonder, Star Of Night,
Star With Royal Beauty Bright,
Westward Leading, Still Proceeding,
Guide Us To Thy Perfect Light.
Born A King On Bethlehem's Plain,
Gold I Bring To Crown Him Again,
King Forever, Ceasing Never
Over Us All To Reign.
Myrrh Is Mine: It's Bitter Perfume
Breaths A Life Of Gathering Gloom.
Sorrowing, Sighing, Bleeding Dying,
Sealed In The Stone-cold Tomb.

O Star Of Wonder, Star Of Night,
Star With Royal Beauty Bright,
Westward Leading, Still Proceeding,
Guide Us To Thy Perfect Light.
Glorious Now Behold Him Arise,
King And God And Sacrifice.
Alleluia, Alleluia!

Sounds Through The Earth And Skies.
O Star Of Wonder, Star Of Night,
Star With Royal Beauty Bright,
Westward Leading, Still Proceeding,
Guide Us To Thy Perfect Light.

Title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas
Lyrics:
We Wish You A Merry Christmas (X3)
And A Happy New Year
Good Tidings We Bring
To You And Your Kin
We Wish You A Merry Christmas
And A Happy New Year

Now Bring Us Some Figgy Pudding (X3)
And A Cup Of Good Cheer
We Won't Go Until We Get Some (X3)
So Bring It Right Here
So Bring Us Some Figgy Pudding (X3)
And Bring It Right Here

Good Tidings We Bring
To You And Your Kin
We Wish You A Merry Christmas And A Happy New Year (X3)
Songglossary: go, so

Title: We’re Never Away From The Avatar Eyes
Lyrics:
We're Never Away From The Avatar Eyes, Avatar Eyes, Sai Avatar Eyes
We're Only As Far As The Space From Our Hearts, He Lives ...
... In Our Hearts, He Lives In Our Hearts
We're Never Lost He Is Always The Light, Always The Light, Sai ...
... Always The Light
Soothing Our Souls With His Avatar Eyes, Avatar Eyes, Sai Avatar Eyes
[ Never Away ... ]
Songglossary: avatar, sai

Title: What a relief
Lyrics:
What a relief to know we are all di-vine. 
Pain is real on-ly through time, and time is an il-lusion! 
What a relief to know magic is made by the mind, A-ham. 
Oh, -- what a relief to know that ---!

Title: What Is the Day But For Loving You
Lyrics:
What Is The Day But For Loving You, My Lord?
Sathya Sai Baba, My Lord
What Is The Night But For Merging With You? [ Sathya Sai ... ]
What Is A Song But For Praising You, My Lord? [ Sathya Sai ... ]
What Is My Heart But An Offering To You? [ Sathya Sai ... ]
Songglossary: baba, sai, sathya

Title: What wonderous love is this
Lyrics:
What wonderous love is this, O my soul, O my soul!
 What wonderous love is this, O my soul
 What wonderous love is this, that caused the Lord of Bliss
 To send this perfect peace to my soul, to my soul,
 To send this perfect peace to my soul

Title: When Dark Clouds Fill Your Skies
Lyrics:
When Dark Clouds Fill Your Skies, Hiding Sunshine From Your Eyes
Say His Name, See His Form, Hold On
Hold On, Hold On, Say His Name, See His Form, Hold On
When Things Are Getting Rough And You Feel Enoughs Enough
Say His Name, See His Form, Hold On
Hold On, Hold On, Say His Name, See His Form, Hold On
When Life Seems So Unfair And No One Seems To Care
Say His Name, See His Form, Hold On
Hold On, Hold On, Say His Name, See His Form, Hold On
Say His Name, See His Form, Hold On
Hold On, Hold On, Say His Name, See His Form, Hold On

Title: When Love of God enfolds you
Lyrics:
When Love of God enfolds you
 And the Light of God surrounds you
 Then you will be so light and free
 Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama
 Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna
 Be so light and free
 And you will see
 That we'll all be as happy as can be

Title: When we realize the greatness of God
Lyrics:
When we realize the greatness of God
 When we trust Him to protect us from harm
 All that He does is only for our good
 Then we really feel Sai's sweetness
 Lord prepare us to receive your eternally
 When He gives us what is hard to accept
 Let our hearts remember all of His Love
 Sorrow and pain are the things we must feel
 only to receive Sai's sweetness
 Lord prepare us to receive you eternally

Title: When you’re lonely
Lyrics:
When you're lonely, sad and gray
 When it's hard to make it through the day
 Love the Lord and sing His Name
 Chant Sai Ram, Jai Sai Ram
 Sai Ram, Jai Sai Ram
 Sai Ram, Jai Sai Ram
 Love the Lord and sing His Name
 Chant Sai Ram, Jai Sai Ram
 Then your heart will fill with light
 Everything will be alright
 Love the Lord and sing His Name
 Chant Sai Ram, Jai Sai Ram
 Feel the joy of God within
 All our happiness is with Him
 Love the Lord and sing His Name
 Chant Sai Ram, Jai Sai Ram

Title: Who am I?
Lyrics:
Who am I? Who's behind these eyes?
 If I am not this body, who am I?
 Who am I? Who's the one inside?
 If I am not my mind, then who am I?
 The message is: to look within ourselves, for
 truth to be revealed. We ask, we search, we pray
 Who am I? Who's the I inside? If I am not my feelings, who am I?
 Behind each thought, there always is the I;
 if I am not my thoughts, than who am I?
 The message is: to look within ourselves, for truth to be revealed.
 We ask, Where does this 'I' come from? (3X)
 Who am I? Who's behind my mind? If I am not my ego, who am I?
 Beyond this 'I', who projects the I?
 The answer comes by asking, Who am 'I'?
 We seek the source from which the mind springs.
 We ask, we search, we pray. (2X)
 But then it's not by doing, but only by being, that
 the final discovery is made.
 I Am God, I am pure Light inside.
 And I am Sathya Sai and He is I.
 I am you, truly you are I.
 And you and I and Sai are one inside.

Title: Who can still the stirring of a soul
Lyrics:
Who can still the stirring of a soul
 That longs for something more
 Only You my gentle Baba
 Only You my Lord
 Who replies to the voice I hear inside
 That cries out 'who am I'
 Only You all knowing Baba
 Only You Sathya Sai
 All my life I've spent in searching
 Reaching for a star
 My journey ends where I began it
 Here within my heart
 Who can turn illusion into truth
 Desire to devotion
 Only You my loving Baba
 You're the only one
 Only You my loving Baba
 You and I are one.

Title: Who can understand the Glory of God?
Lyrics:
Who can understand the Glory of God?
 Wondrous One transcending space - time and form
 (Yet) Sai - You are Here for us, O Sai, so very dear to us
 (O) Sai - It is clear that You are Love
 Touching, healing, and blessing every soul
 You guide us, even carry us, until we reach the Goal
 Sai Baba, You have come, for every one
 Reaching out, you take us by the hand
 Lead, kindly Lord, into the Light
 The brilliant Light of Love Divine
 Touching, healing, and blessing every soul
 You guide us, even carry us, until we reach the Goal
 Sai - You are here for us, O Sai, so very dear to us
 (O) Sai - It is clear that You are Love

Title: Who is in my temple?
Lyrics:
Who is in my temple?
 Who is in my temple?
 All the doors do open themselves
 All the lamps do light themselves
 Darkness like a dark bird, flies away
 O, flies away

Title: Who is Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Who is Sai Baba? He's the form of Love
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Eternal Om
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Truth and Love
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Everything
 (Chorus)
 What does Sai Baba say?
 Sai Baba says God is Love,
 Sai Baba says God is Truth and Love.
 Sai Baba says God is Everything
 Sai Baba says God is Om
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Righteousness
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Eternal Om
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Truth and Love
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Everything
 (Repeat Chorus)

Title: Who Is the Lord Of The Universe
Lyrics:
Who Is The Lord Of The Universe
He Is The Lord Of The Self
Open Your Eyes And Realize The Lord Is Residing Within You
Dive Deeper And Deeper Inside
Fill Your Heart With His Love's Pure Light (2x, to Dive...)
Master Your Senses, Give Up Pretenses
Know That Forever The Lord And You Are One
Know That Forever The Lord And I Are One

Title: Who is the man all clothed in red
Lyrics:
Who is the man all clothed in red
With a dome of hair upon His head?
His love extends as far as can be seen -
Who is that man loving me?
O, my Lord (2X)
Who is the man feeding the poor,
Teaching us there is something more?
He says service to people in need
Will open our hearts to ecstasy.
O, my Lord (2X)
Who is the man who dries our tears
And takes away all our fears?
Who is the man who always gives,
Teaching us by how he lives?
O, my Lord (2X)
Who is the man who raises His hand,
And showers blesssings on all of man?
He says the new world has come, and there's
Only one religion, the religion of love.
O, Sathya Sai (2X)
Songglossary: mana, sai, sathya

Title: Why Fear When I am Here
Lyrics:
Why Fear When I Am Here?
So Says Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, My Lord [ Why Fear ... ]
All I Want Is Your Love My Child, All I Want Is Your Faith
All I Want Is Your Love In God, No Matter What Your Faith
So Says Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, My Lord [ Why Fear ... ]
Krishna, Buddha, Jesus, Mohammed All Came To This Land
All Of Them Brought The Message Of Love, Love Your Fellow Man
So Says Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, My Lord [ Why Fear ... ]
The Light You See In The Dark Of Night Is That Of God In Man
Find The Light That Is In Your Heart And Reach The Promised Land
So Says Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, My Lord
Songglossary: baba, buddha, krishna, sai, sathya

Title: With a heart that’s full of love
Lyrics:
With a heart that's full of love, repeat the name of Ram,
 Rama Rama Ram, Rama Rama Ram, Sai Rama Rama Ram
 Great is the power of the Name, burning our sin and sorrow
 Helping us live without the fear of what may happen tomorrow
 Saing the Name will bring eternal peace and happiness
 Comforting when we need support, it helps in times of distress
 Saing the Name will give protection; worries and doubts will cease
 When we call, wherever we are, the Name will give us peace
 Rama's Name is Father and Mother, it is our dearest friend
 We have no need of any other, on Ram we can depend
 Rama Rama Ram, Rama Rama Ram, Rama Rama Ram, Sai Rama Rama Ram

Title: With Your flute You enchant
Lyrics:
With Your flute You enchant all who hear You
 Dance, O dance on, O sweet little Krishna
 Little Krishna, dearest Krishna
 Dance, O dance on, O sweet Sai Krishna
 You captured the hearts of the Gopas and Gopis
 You're here once again charming all Your devotees
 Dance, O dance on, O sweet Sai Krishna
 Sai Krishna, Sai Krishna
 Dance, O dance on, O sweet Sai Krishna

Title: Without Singing To The Lord
Lyrics:
Without Singing To The Lord There's No Peace Or Happiness
Without Singing His Name There's No Feeling Of Bliss
Without Love And Devotion We Never Will Be Free
Without Service To Him No Salvation Can There Be
Without Serving Mankind No Salvation Can There Be
[ Without Singing ... ]
We Find Union With Him When Our Minds Are At Rest
The Best Wisdom Is Seeing The Lord Everywhere
The Most Righteous Of Deeds Shows Compassion And Care
There Is No One As Near And As Dear As The Lord
He Is Present In All And In All Can Be Adored
GeneralComments: This is the English version of "Hari Bhajana Bina Suka Shanthi Nahin".

Title: Without Thee, Sai, there is no one
Lyrics:
Without Thee, Sai, there is no one,
 Come, O Lord of my heart, Sai
 Come, O Lord of my heart, O Sai Ram, come, O Lord of my heart
 O beautiful Sai, don't disappoint me
 Beloved Sai, don't ever leave me
 Outside Your door I'm standing and waiting (2X)
 Hear the cry of my soul, O Sai Ram, hear the cry of my soul

Title: Worship In Your Mind The Feet Of The Guru
Lyrics:
Worship in your mind the Feet of the Guru
For crossing the ocean of life is hard to do
Remover of all darkness, praise to Thee
Shiva Sai, Lord of Light, Shiva Sai
Praise to You, Shiva, Praise to You, Shiva,
Praise to You, Shiva
You light the pathway Home
Lord of the Mountain, Shiva,
Lord of the Mountain, Shiva,
Lord of the Mountain, Shiva,
You light the pathway Home
You are Om, Baba, You are Om, Baba,
You are Om, Baba, You are the Form of Om
GeneralComments:
Same tune as "Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam".
 
Alternative English Version: "Worshipping In Your Mind At The Guru's Feet".
Songglossary: baba, do, guru, om, sai, shiva

Title: Worship the feet of Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Worship the feet of Sai Baba, Worship the feet of the Lord
 Reach for the love everlasting, Rise to the Love of Lord Sai
 Worship the feet of Sai Baba, Worship the feet of the Lord
 Look at the face of Lord God in the form of Avataar
 He is here to save our souls, pray to the Lord Sai Ram

Title: Worshipping In Your Mind At The Guru’s Feet
Lyrics:
Worshipping in your mind at the Guru's Feet
Gives you the blessing to make your life complete
Banisher of darkness, praise to You
Sathya Sai, our Lord ever true
Praise to Shiva, Praise to Shiva, Praise to Shiva
Sai Shiva, praise to You
Lord of Protection, Lord of Protection, Lord of
Protection, Lord Sai, praise to You
You are Om, Baba, You are Om, Baba, You are
Om, Baba, You are the Form of Om
GeneralComments:
Same tune as "Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam".
 
Alternative English Version: "Worship In Your Mind The Feet Of The Guru".
Songglossary: baba, make, om, sai, sathya, shiva

Title: Wouldn’t it be nice
Lyrics:
Wouldn't it be nice
 Doing only good
 To practice what we preach
 Each and every day
 Sathya, Dharma, Prema
 Shaanthi and Ahimsa
 With the Lord's Divine Love
 To help us on our way
 Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh and Jain
 Christian, Jew or Muslim
 You'll get there just the same
 Wouldn't it be nice
 Doing what is right
 To Love our fellow man
 And help in any way
 Yellow, black or white
 We're all equal in His sight
 With our Lord's Divine Love
 To help us on our way
 Prophets and sages
 From beginning of time
 Have come down to teach us
 That we are all entwined
 How blessed this human race
 To be showered with His Grace
 Because our Divine Lord
 Is here on Earth today!

Title: Yadava Kula Deepa Hey Nandalala
Lyrics:
Yadava Kula Deepa Hey Nandalala
Hey Nandalala Sai Gopala [ Yadava Kula ]
Trayee Brindavana Shyama Gopala ( Sai Gopala )
Sri Madhusudhana Sai Gopala
Jaya Muralidhara Hey Vraja Bala
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Gopala you are the light of Yadu Dynasty, the Shyama Gopala of Trayee Brindavan. You are the Sai Gopala who annihilated demon Madhu in Dwapara age. Victory to You.
Songglossary: bala, brinda, deepa, gopal, hey, jay, kula, madhu, murali, nanda, sai, sham, sri, trayee, vraja, yadava

Title: Yadu Kula Nandana Sri Hari
Lyrics:
Yadu Kula Nandana Sri Hari Madhava
Govinda Gopala Krishna Krishna
Madhava Murali Sri Madhusudhana
Mohana Radhey Krishna Krishna
Meaning: Oh Lord Krishna of the Yadava clan, you are also known by different names as Madhava, Govinda, Gopala, Madhusudhana, Mohana and Radhey Krishna.
Songglossary: gopal, govinda, hari, krishna, kula, madhava, madhu, mohan, murali, nanda, radha, sri, yadu

Title: Yadu Nandana Gopala
Lyrics:
Yadu Nandana Gopala
Jaya Brindavana Lola
Jaya Murali Gaana Vilola
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
Meaning: Chant the name of Sai Gopala, the son of Yadu dynasty, who moved around in Brindavan and who is enchanted by the sound of Flute He plays.
Songglossary: brinda, gaan, gopal, jay, lola, murali, nanda, sai, vilola, yadu

Title: Yadu Nandana Hey Ghana Shyam
Lyrics:
Yadu Nandana Hey Ghana Shyam
Brindavana Sanchari Shyam [ Yadu Nandana ... ]
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Dhari
Bansi Mohana Shyam
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Ke Natkat
Devaki Nandana Shyam (2)
Meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna also known as Shyam, son of Yadu dynasty, who strolls in Brindavan, wearing peacock feathers in His crown, dressed in yellow colored clothes, who is fond of playing Flute, who steals butter from the house of Gopikas and the darling son of mother Yashoda and Devaki.
Songglossary: bansi, brinda, chora, devaki, dhari, ghana, hey, ke, maakhan, mohan, mora, mukuta, nanda, natkat, peetambara, sanchari, sham, yadu, yashoda

Title: Yadu Nandana Yashoda Bala
Lyrics:
Yadu Nandana Yashoda Bala
Madhava Keshava [ Yadu Nandana ... ]
Mathura Natha Mama Sai Natha
Mandara Giridhara Madhusudhana Hey
Meaning: Oh Son of Yadu dynasty, the son of Yashoda, you are the Lord Madhava and Keshava, the one who held aloft the hillock Mandara, Oh Lord Madhusudhana (Krishna).
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, hey, kesha, madhava, madhu, mama, manda, mathura, nanda, natha, sai, yadu, yashoda

Title: Yamuna Teera Vihari Brindavana Sanchari
Lyrics:
Yamuna Teera Vihari Brindavana Sanchari
Govardhana Giridhari Gopala Krishna Murari
Chithravathi Teera Vihari Chinni Krishna Murari [ Govardhana Giridhari ... ]
Prema Hrudaya Sanchari Parthi Puri Sri Sai [ Govardhana Giridhari ... ]
Meaning: Lord Krishna moves about in Brindavan and in the hearts of devotees filled with divine love and also on the banks of river Yamuna. The cute little Krishna who lifted the hillock Govardhana with his little finger, is the Sai of Parthi on the banks of the river Chitravathi.
Songglossary: brinda, chinni, chithravathi, giridhar, gopal, govardhan, hrudaya, krishna, murare, prem, puri, puttaparthi, sai, sanchari, sri, teera, vihar, yamuna

Title: Yashoda Bala Nanda Gopala
Lyrics:
Yashoda Bala Nanda Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopala Bala [ Yashoda Bala ... ]
Yaduvara Giridhara Krishna Gopala
Jaya Jaya Meera Prabhu Nandalala
Meaning: Oh son of Nanda born of Yadu clan who held aloft the hillock Govardhana, who moves about in Gokula, Victory to you Oh Lord of devotee Meera.
Songglossary: bala, giridhar, gokul, gopal, jay, krishna, meera, nanda, prabhu, yadu, yashoda

Title: Yasni svet garit vdushe,
Lyrics:
Yasni svet garit vdushe,
eto thi prishol ka mne,
gaspoyt Sai Baba
Mir sagrel svayim teplom,
nam atkril duhovne dom,
gaspoyt Sai Baba
Y pafsyudu na puti
del blagyh tvayih slidi,
gaspoyt Sai Baba
Eto hramov kupola,
eto nebo y zimlya,
gaspoyt Sai Baba
Thi prihodish knam va snah
y Iisus nash y Alah,
gaspoyt Sai Baba
Darish vsyem lyubov svayu,
dlya tebya syertsa payut,
gaspoyt Sai Baba
Meaning:
The bright light burns in my soul, it's You who has come to me, Lord Sai Baba. You warmed up the world
with Your Love and opened to us the house of spirituality, Lord Sai Baba.
And everywhere along Your path there are footprints of Your noble deeds, Lord Sai Baba. Its the cupolas
of the Temples, its the sky and the Earth, The Lord Sai Baba.
You come to us in our dreams, You are our Jesus and Allah, The Lord Sai Baba. You give Your Love to
everyone, the hearts are singing for You, The Lord Sai Baba.

Title: Yesu Masiha Sarva Loka Nayaka
Lyrics:
Yesu Masiha Sarva Loka Nayaka
Allah Ho Akbar Ilahi Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Sai Shirdi Sai Sathya Sai Jagannatha
Zohrashtra Buddha Mahavir Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Meaning: Lord Sathya Sai, the master of the entire world and of all faiths, responds to all names such as Yesu Masiha, Allah, Zohrashtra, Buddha and Mahavir.
Songglossary: akbar, allah, buddha, ho, ilahi, jagan, loka, mahadev, mahavir, masiha, nayaka, sai, sarva, sathya, shirdi, yesu, zohrashtra

Title: Yogishwara Sathya Saishwara
Lyrics:
Yogishwara Sathya Saishwara
Parthipurisha Pavana
Patitodhara Sai Ram
Amrutha Roopa Ananda Data
Eshwari Nandana Sai Ram
Jagadodhara Sai Ram
Shri Sathya Sai Swagatham
Meaning: Welcome Lord Sai, master of the Saints, holy Lord of the Parthi, and uplifter of the weak. Son of the Mother Eswaramma, personification of the Eternal, grants bliss and protects the Universe.
Songglossary: amrutha, anand, daata, eshwar, jagadodhara, nanda, partheeshwara, pavan, ram, roopa, sai, saiyeeshwara, sathya, sri, swagatham, yogi

Title: You Are Lord Of The Universe
Lyrics:
You Are Lord Of The Universe, Lord Of The Universe, ...
... Reside In Our Hearts Sai Baba
Sai Baba Sai Baba, Reside In Our Hearts Sai Baba
You Are Lord Of All Creation Preserver And Destroyer ...
... Satchidananda Sai Baba
Sai Baba Sai Baba, Satchidananda Sai Baba
You Are Mother Of The Universe, Father Of The Universe, ...
... The Light Of Mankind Sai Baba
Sai Baba Sai Baba, The Light Of Mankind Sai Baba
Songglossary: baba, sai, satchidananda

Title: You are Lord of the Universe
Lyrics:
You are Lord of the Universe, Lord of the Universe, ...
... Reside in our hearts Sai Baba
Sai Baba Sai Baba, reside in our hearts Sai Baba
Cause of all creation, preserver and destroyer ...
... Satchidananda Sai Baba
Sai Baba Sai Baba, Satchidananda Sai Baba
(You are) Mother of the Universe, Father of the Universe, ...
... The light of Mankind Sai Baba
Sai Baba Sai Baba, the light of mankind Sai Baba

Title: You are mine mine mine, You are mine
Lyrics:
You are mine mine mine You are mine, My beloved Divine You are mine
No one can ever take You from me, Nor surpass You in Your Beauty
For, I possess You and You possess me
You are mine mine mine You are mine, My beloved Divine You are mine
Every conscious being worships and adores You Oh Love Divine Oh Love Divine
(But) Still You bless me with this special feeling that You're mine and only mine

Title: You Are My Mother, You Are My Father
Lyrics:
You Are My Mother, You Are My Father 
You Are My Closest Kin, You Are My Dearest Friend
You Are My Wisdom, You Are My Treasure
You Are My Everything My Lord, My Loving Lord
You Are The Beginning, You Are The Middle
And You Are Beyond The End
I Love You So You Help Me See
See You In Everyone See You In Me
For I Am In You And You Are In Me
Songglossary: so

Title: You are my safest place
Lyrics:
You are my safest place, 
Im always in your sacred hands, 
You protect me Lord whenever fear comes near I believe in You
Yes I believe in You, and I know that I am strong in the Love of my Lord
GeneralComments: This song is best sung in unison with harmonies and canon (rounds).

Title: You are our Rama
Lyrics:
You are our Rama
 You are our Krishna
 You are our Budha
 You are our Jesus
 You are our Father
 You are our Mother
 You are our Teacher
 The Lord of the universe
 Bless me Bless Me Bless Me
 Bless me Bless Me Bless Me
 Come my Lord and Bless me

Title: You are the center of my life
Lyrics:
You are the center of my life, my Lord, You are the pillar of my faith
 I open up my heart to You, and pray for Your Grace
 I feel the pull of Your call, my Lord, but my senses are the gate
 Help me open up the door, my Lord, to reach Your blissful state
 I will love one and all, my Lord, I will help my fellow man
 I'll lead a life of Truth, my Lord, I know that I can

Title: You are the Lord of all religions
Lyrics:
You are the Lord of all religions
 My Lord, My Sri Sathya Sai
 With love You come, give us Your blessings
 Om Sai Ram (2X)
 You are the Lord of all creation
 My Lord, my Sri Sathya Sai
 With peace You come, give us Your comfort
 Om Sai Ram (2X)
 You are the Lord of the universe
 My Lord, my Sri Sathya Sai
 With truth You come, give us Your wisdom
 Om Sai Ram (3X)

Title: You are the Lord of my heart and my soul
Lyrics:
You are the Lord of my heart and my soul
 Lord of my life it's beyond my control
 (Sai) Open my heart to Your Love (2X)
 Once I have seen You, Lord
 heard You and touched You
 How can I live in this world without You
 (Sai) Open my eyes to Your Light (2X)
 Sai Ram, let me see You
 Everywhere let me hear You
 In everyone let me serve You
 Sai Ram Bhagavaan

Title: You are the Lord of my heart and my soul
Lyrics:
You are the Lord of my heart and my soul
Lord of my life it's beyond my control
(Sai) Open my heart to Your Love (2X)
Once I have seen You, Lord heard You and touched You
How can I live in this world without You
(Sai) Open my eyes to Your Light (2X)
Sai Ram, let me see You
Everywhere let me hear You
In everyone let me serve You
Sai Ram Bhagavaan

Title: You are the only one, my Lord
Lyrics:
You are the only one, my Lord, my God, my all
 You are the only one, my Lord, my God, my all
 God alone, God alone, God alone

Title: You Burn Brightly Within Me
Lyrics:
You Burn Brightly Within Me
Illuminate My Way Home
O Sai Baba
You Burn Brightly Within Me
Illuminate My Way Home
O Sweet Jesus
You Burn Brightly Within Me
Illuminate My Way Home
Songglossary: baba, sai

Title: You Call To My Soul
Lyrics:
You Call To My Soul Through The Mists Of Maya, Sai Baba, Sai Baba
To Gather The Lost To The Light Of Your Star And I Wake ...
... From My Dream Sai Ram
Uuchorus:Sai Ram, I Have Seen Your Light, Light Of My Soul, Sai Baba
Sai Baba, I Have Heard Your Voice, Aum Without End, Sai Ram
You Call To My Heart Through The Dark Of Desire, Sai Baba, Sai Baba
To Lead With The Zeal Of Celestial Fire And I Love Only You, Sai Ram
Chorus: Sai Ram, I Have Seen ...
You Call To My Life That Its Breath Is Your Own, Sai Baba, Sai Baba
To Silence My Mind With Sound Of Aum And My ...
... Thoughts Are Of You, Sai Ram
Chorus: Sai Ram, I Have Seen ...
I Leave At Your Feet All The World That Was Mine, Sai Baba,Sai Baba
To Sing In The Void Of An Anguish Divine And I Die In ...
Your Love, Sai Ram
Chorus: Sai Ram, I Have Seen ...
Songglossary: baba, maya, ram, sai

Title: You Danced Into Shirdi
Lyrics:
You Danced Into Shirdi And We Sat At Your Feet
You Cured Our Ills With Vibhuthi
You Thrilled Us With Wonders And You Showed Us The Way
And Sai You Would Return One Day Dance Where Ever You May Be
Sai Is The Lord Of The Dance And He
Bestows His Grace So We May Know The Bliss
Of Sharing In This Dance Of His
You Dance Into Parthi And You Teach Us To Sing
You Give Us All Theres Nothing We Can Bring
You Take Our Hearts And You Fill Our Hands
We Clasp Your Feet To Learn Your Dance
Songglossary: puttaparthi, sai, sat, shirdi, so, vibhuthi

Title: You Made The Planets And Stars
Lyrics:
You Made The Planets And Stars'n Heavens
Mountains And Valleys, Rivers And Ravines
Beautiful Flowers And Butterflies
You Are The Lord Of The Wondrous Skies
This Is Your Kingdom O Sathya Sai
Shower Your Blessings On Me And Mine
Lead Me To Knowledge And Truth And Light
Sai, Be My Beacon, Serene And Bright
Songglossary: sai, sathya

Title: You make my heart sing
Lyrics:
You make my heart sing, and set each worldly
 fear winging, Lord of Light, Lord of Light
 Pure and bright, beyond sound and sight, Lord of
 Light, Sai, Lord of Light

Title: You take all the obstacles away
Lyrics:
You take all the obstacles away, O Lord Gananatha
You give us happiness, You give us auspiciousness
You take all the sorrows away, O Lord Gananatha
There is no emptiness, there is no loneliness
When we start off the day with your name, O Lord Gananatha
Songglossary: gananatha

Title: You walked into my life
Lyrics:
You walked into my life, O I thought that I was dreaming
 With the love of the ages, You woke me from my sleep
 You say that life is full of joy that we never have seen
 O help us to rise and awake from our dreams
 Help us to set aside all the fear we have of growing
 Let us be a reflection Your pure, unceasing Love
 And help our minds to be free of the suffering and pain
 Let us spread Your Love like the gently falling rain
 May we find joy and laughter
 May we see the light
 May we know ever after
 Love in our sight
 May our hearts fly to meet You
 May our eyes see
 May our love break its bondage
 And make us free

Title: Your divine hand rests lightly upon me
Lyrics:
Your divine hand rests lightly upon me
 I feel it with such joy
 My heart yearns for your smile
 Eyes for a glimpse of the flame that is you my Lord
 quench my thirst in the sea of your Truth
 List me free of desire to follow your way Lord, day by day
 Sri Sathya Sai, Sri Sathya Sai, Sri Sathya Sai Avathaar

Title: Yug Avatar Radhey Shyam
Lyrics:
Yug Avatar Radhey Shyam
Radhey Shyam Bolo Radhey Shyam
Parama Niranjana Radhey Shyam
Paapa Vimochana Radhey Shyam
Parthi Pureeshwara Radhey Shyam [ Radhey Shyam ]
Meaning: Sing the name of Radhey Shyam of Parthi, the incarnation of this KALI age, who is always pure and who liberates us from all our sins.
Songglossary: avatar, bolo, niranjan, paapa, param, purishwara, puttaparthi, radha, sham, vimochana, yuga

Title: Yug Yug Ke Avatar Tum
Lyrics:
Yug Yug Ke Avatar Tum Hi Ho
Merey Ram Merey Shyam Shirdi Sai Parthi Ram
Jag Ke Palanhaar Tum Hi Ho
Allah Eshwara Terey Naam
Sab Ko Sanmati Do Bhagawan
Allah Eshwar Terey Naam Shirdi Sai Parthi Ram [ Jag Ke ... ]
Meaning: Oh Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, you have incarnated from age to age, you are my Lord Rama and my Lord Krishna. you are the ruler of this Universe. You are Allah, Eshwar, bless us with wisdom Oh Lord.
Songglossary: allah, avatar, bhagawan, do, eshwar, hai, ho, jagat, ke, mera, naam, palanhaar, puttaparthi, ram, sab, sai, sanmati, sham, shirdi, tera, tum, yuga

Title: Yuga Avatara Paapa Samhara
Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Paapa Samhara
Kaivalya Dayaka Ram O Sai [ Yuga Avatara ... ]
Karuna Sagara Prem Ke Sindho
Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Krupala
Anupama Sundara Prashanti Vasa Hrudayeshwara Sai Ram
Meaning: Lord Sai, the incarnation of this age, is the destroyer of sins. Ocean of compassion and love, the beautiful Sai uplifts the unfortunate ones, and resides in your heart.
Songglossary: anupama, avatar, bandhava, dayaka, deen, hrudayeshwara, kaivalya, karuna, ke, krupalu, natha, paapa, prasanthi, prem, ram, sagar, sai, samhara, sindhu, sundara, vasa, yuga

Title: Yuga Avatara Palanhaara
Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Palanhaara
Kaivalya Dayaka Ram O Sai [ Yuga Avatara ... ]
Karuna Sagara Prem Ke Sindhu
Deena Bandhu Deena Nath Bhagawan
Alakh Niranjana Prashanthi Vasa Hrudayeshwara Sai Ram
Meaning: Oh Baba! You have incarnated in this age, you are the one who grants liberation, you are the ocean of love and compassion, friend and Lord of the oppressed, ever pure and resident of Prashanthi Nilayam.
Songglossary: alakh, avatar, bandhava, bhagawan, dayaka, deen, hrudayeshwara, kaivalya, karuna, ke, natha, niranjan, palanhaar, prashanthi, prem, ram, sagar, sai, sindhu, vasa, yuga

Title: Yuga Avatara Parti Vihara Hari
Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Parti Vihara Hari Narayana Om
Paramananda Satchidananda Shri Sai Shankara Om
Parama Dayakara Paapa Samhara Vibhuti Sundara Om
[ Paramananda Satchidananda ... ]
Shirdi Purishwara Parti Purishwara Prema Saishwara Om
[ Paramananda Satchidananda ... ]
Meaning: The incarnation of Vishnu in this Kali age resides now at Puttaparthi. He is Supreme Bliss, all merciful and destroyer of sins. Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai and Prema Sai are incarnations of Lord Shiva.
Songglossary: avatar, dayaka, hari, narayana, om, paapa, param, prem, purishwara, puttaparthi, sai, saiyeeshwara, samhara, satchidananda, shankara, shirdi, sri, sundara, vibhuti, vihar, yuga

Title: Yuga Avatara Sai Rama
Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Sai Rama
Rama Rama Ram ( Sai )
Rama Rama Ram Sita Pathey Sri Ram (2) [ Yuga Avatara ... ]
Parama Niranjana Prashanthi Rama
Sri Raghu Rama Sai Rama
Rama Rama Ram ( Sai )
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai Rama you are the incarnation of this KALI age, the consort of Sita, Oh Lord Rama of Prashanthi, you are eternally pure, you are the Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty.
Songglossary: avatar, niranjan, param, pathey, prashanthi, raghu, ram, sai, sita, sri, yuga

Title: Yuga Avatara Sayeeshwara
Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Sayeeshwara
Yadava Yadu Kula Nandana
Sundara Shubha Kara Sridhara
Madhava Keshava
Mangala Sai Gopala
Meaning: You are the incarnation of this KALI age Oh Sayeeshwara, you bestow auspiciousness, you are of Madhu lineage, of Yadu clan and the Consort of Goddess Lakshmi.
Songglossary: avatar, gopal, kara, kesha, kula, madhava, mangal, nanda, sai, sayee, shubh, sridhara, sundara, yadava, yadu, yuga

Title: Yuga Avatara Sayeeshwara
Lyrics:
Yuga Avatara Sayeeshwara
Yadava Yadu Nandana
Hrudaya Vihari Hey Deena Bandho
Hari Hari Hari Om Jagadeka Bandho
Hey Deena Bandho Karuna Sindho
Meaning: Oh Sayeeshwara the incarnation of this KALI age, of Yadava dynasty you are the kin of the downtrodden and also the whole world, you wander in people's hearts and you are the ocean of compassion.
Songglossary: avatar, bandho, deen, hari, hey, hrudaya, jagadeka, karuna, nanda, om, sayee, sindhu, vihar, yadava, yadu, yuga

Title: Yuga Yuga Ke Avatara Sai
Lyrics:
Yuga Yuga Ke Avatara Sai Rama Sai Krishna Sai Baba
Baba Sai Baba Baba Sai Baba [ Yuga Yuga ... ]
Allah Yesu Nanak Sai
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavira Sai
Ram Rahim Jai Ram Rahim Jai Ram Rahim Jai Ram (2)
Meaning: Oh Lord Sai You incarnate through different ages as Rama, Krishna and as Sai Baba. The devotees worship you by different names as Allah, Eshwara, Nanak, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavira, Ram and Rahim.
Songglossary: allah, avatar, baba, buddha, jai, ke, krishna, mahavir, nanak, rahim, ram, sai, yesu, yuga, zohrashtra

Title: Yuga Yuga Vanditha Sai Baba
Lyrics:
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Sai Baba
Sharanam Sharanam Shata Koti Sharanam
Treta Yuga Mey Tum Ho Ram Baba
Dwapara Yug Mey Tum Ho Krishna Baba
Kali Yug Mey Tum Ho Sathya Sai Baba [ Sharanam Sharanam ]
Sai Ram Sai Ram (3)
Meaning: Oh Baba, Millions surrendered at your feet during the past several eons. In the age of TRETA you were Rama, In the age of DWAPARA you were Krishna and in this age of KALI you are Sathya Sai Baba Oh my Sai Ram.
Songglossary: baba, dwapara, ho, kali, koti, krishna, ram, sai, sathya, sharan, shata, treta, tum, vanditha, yuga
